text: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ , the son of David , the son of Abraham .
text2: Serɨ serɨ Sises tamokori ton ese ' asi ' , kin pe te ' sen Tepi ' pa pe iyesi ' pʉ , Epʉra ' an pa pe nɨrɨ kanan iyesi ' pʉ .

text: Abraham begat Isaac ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat Judas and his brethren ;
text2: Epʉra ' an esi ' pʉ Aisi ' kʉipʉnʉ pe , Aisi ' esi ' pʉ Seko ' kʉipʉnʉ pe , Seko ' esi ' pʉ Isuta mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyakon non kʉipʉnʉ pe ,

text: And Judas begat Phares and Zara of Thamar ; and Phares begat Esrom ; and Esrom begat Aram ;
text2: Isuta esi ' pʉ Peres mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Sera pokon kʉipʉnʉ pe , Temarʉ esi ' pʉ na ' ne ' to ' san pe . Peres esi ' pʉ Esuran kʉipʉnʉ pe , Esuran esi ' pʉ Ran kʉipʉnʉ pe ,

text: And Aram begat Aminadab ; and Aminadab begat Naasson ; and Naasson begat Salmon ;
text2: Ran esi ' pʉ Aminatapu kʉipʉnʉ pe , Aminatapu esi ' pʉ Naisan kʉipʉnʉ pe , Naisan esi ' pʉ Sarʉman kʉipʉnʉ pe ,

text: And Salmon begat Booz of Rachab ; and Booz begat Obed of Ruth ; and Obed begat Jesse ;
text2: Sarʉman esi ' pʉ Powas kʉipʉnʉ pe , Reyapu esi ' pʉ na ' ne ' isan pe , Powas esi ' pʉ Ope ' kʉipʉnʉ pe , Ru ' esi ' pʉ na ' ne ' isan pe , Ope ' esi ' pʉ Ise ' si kʉipʉnʉ pe ,

text: And Jesse begat David the king ; and David the king begat Solomon of her that had been the wife of Urias ;
text2: Ise ' si nin si esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ Tepi ' kin pe te ' sen kʉipʉnʉ pe . Tepi ' esi ' pʉ Saraman kʉipʉnʉ pe , Iuraya no ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ esi ' pʉ na ' ne ' isan pe ,

text: And Solomon begat Roboam ; and Roboam begat Abia ; and Abia begat Asa ;
text2: Saraman esi ' pʉ Reyopowan kʉipʉnʉ pe , Reyopowan esi ' pʉ Apaya kʉipʉnʉ pe , Apaya esi ' pʉ Esa kʉipʉnʉ pe ,

text: And Asa begat Josaphat ; and Josaphat begat Joram ; and Joram begat Ozias ;
text2: Esa esi ' pʉ Iseyosapa ' kʉipʉnʉ pe , Iseyosapa ' esi ' pʉ Iseyoran kʉipʉnʉ pe , Iseyoran esi ' pʉ Usaya kʉipʉnʉ pe ,

text: And Ozias begat Joatham ; and Joatham begat Achaz ; and Achaz begat Ezekias ;
text2: Usaya esi ' pʉ Iso ' tan kʉipʉnʉ pe , Iso ' tan esi ' pʉ Eyas kʉipʉnʉ pe , Eyas esi ' pʉ Esi ' kaya kʉipʉnʉ pe ,

text: And Ezekias begat Manasses ; and Manasses begat Amon ; and Amon begat Josias ;
text2: Esi ' kaya esi ' pʉ Mana ' sa kʉipʉnʉ pe , Mana ' sa esi ' pʉ Eman kʉipʉnʉ pe , Eman esi ' pʉ Iso ' saya kʉipʉnʉ pe ,

text: And Josias begat Jechonias and his brethren , about the time they were carried away to Babylon :
text2: Iso ' saya esi ' pʉ Ise ' konaya mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyakon non kʉipʉnʉ pe . To ' eyaton non uya Esuwerʉ amʉ ' a ' sisa ' arɨ a ' tai ' ne Paperan pona .

text: And after they were brought to Babylon , Jechonias begat Salathiel ; and Salathiel begat Zorobabel ;
text2: Paperan pona Esuwerʉ amʉ ' a ' sisa ' asa ' to ' eyaton non uya a ' tai : Ise ' konaya esi ' pʉ Siya ' tiyerʉ kʉipʉnʉ pe , Siya ' tiyerʉ esi ' pʉ Userupaperʉ kʉipʉnʉ pe ,

text: And Zorobabel begat Abiud ; and Abiud begat Eliakim ; and Eliakim begat Azor ;
text2: Userupaperʉ esi ' pʉ Apaiyutʉ kʉipʉnʉ pe , Apaiyutʉ esi ' pʉ Iraiya ' kin kʉipʉnʉ pe , Iraiya ' kin esi ' pʉ Esorʉ kʉipʉnʉ pe ,

text: And Azor begat Sadoc ; and Sadoc begat Achim ; and Achim begat Eliud ;
text2: Esorʉ esi ' pʉ Isato ' kʉipʉnʉ pe , Isato ' esi ' pʉ A ' kin kʉipʉnʉ pe , A ' kin esi ' pʉ Iraiyutʉ kʉipʉnʉ pe ,

text: And Eliud begat Eleazar ; and Eleazar begat Matthan ; and Matthan begat Jacob ;
text2: Iraiyutʉ esi ' pʉ Eriyesarʉ kʉipʉnʉ pe , Eriyesarʉ esi ' pʉ Ma ' tan kʉipʉnʉ pe , Ma ' tan esi ' pʉ Seko ' kʉipʉnʉ pe ,

text: And Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary , of whom was born Jesus , who is called Christ .
text2: Seko ' esi ' pʉ Isose ' kʉipʉnʉ pe , Meri taan ' pʉ si . Meri esi ' pʉ Sises san pe , Kʉrai tato ' san pe si .

text: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations ; and from David until the carrying away into Babylon are fourteen generations ; and from the carrying away into Babylon unto Christ are fourteen generations .
text2: Epʉra ' an awonsi ' kɨ Tepi ' , kin pe te ' sen pʉ ' kʉ pona , 14 kaisa rɨ itamokori ton u ' tɨsa ' esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ . Tepi ' , kin pe te ' sen awonsi ' kɨ , to ' eyaton non uya Esuwerʉ amʉ ' a ' sisa ' arɨ Paperan pona pʉ ' kʉ pona , 14 kaisa rɨ itamokori ton u ' tɨsa ' esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ . To ' eyaton non uya Esuwerʉ amʉ ' a ' sisa ' arɨ ' pʉ Paperan pona awonsi ' kɨ , Kʉrai entu pʉ ' kʉ pona , 14 kaisa rɨ itamokori ton u ' tɨsa ' esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ .

text: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise : When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph , before they came together , she was found with child of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Serɨ serɨ , Sises Kʉrai entu ' pʉ pantomʉ : Isanon pe te ' ton kon , Meri , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Isose ' pokon usauro ' sa ' esi ' pʉ temari ' mato ' kon pe , e ' tane to ' uta ' pɨtʉ rawɨrɨ rɨ , tʉumono ' tasa ' i ' tu ' pʉ Meri uya , Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ winɨ .

text: Then Joseph her husband , being a just man , and not willing to make her a publick example , was minded to put her away privily .
text2: Isose ' esi ' pʉ ipokena ' pe te ' sen , mɨrɨpan ekoneka ' pʉ ama ' ai imari ' mato ' tʉuya ereutanʉ ' to ' pe tʉuya .

text: But while he thought on these things , behold , the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream , saying , Joseph , thou son of David , fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife : for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' isenuminka ' pʉ tʉpo , Papa inserʉʉi uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' iye ' ne ' pɨtʉ yau , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Isose ' , Tepi ' pa rʉ ' pʉ , tenari ' nʉnse pʉra Meri anʉnkɨ ɨno ' pʉ pe , apʉne pʉra Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ winɨ imono ' tasa ' mɨrɨ .

text: And she shall bring forth a son , and thou shalt call his name JESUS : for he shall save his people from their sins .
text2: Warawo ' pe entunʉ ' to ' iya oton , imʉre mese ' tɨi ' Sises tukai ' , apʉne pʉra tʉtonpa ton pika ' tɨto ' iya oton pe iyesi pɨ ' to ' makooi apai , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Now all this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Serɨ e ' kupʉ ' pʉ pena Papa usaurokʉ ' pʉ pu ' kena ' Aisaya awɨrɨ a ' ku ' tɨnin pe :

text: Behold , a virgin shall be with child , and shall bring forth a son , and they shall call his name Emmanuel , which being interpreted is , God with us .
text2: “ A ' pɨ ' pʉn uri ' san umono ' tato ' oton , mɨrɨpan entuto ' oton warawo ' pe , mɨrɨpan esa ' to ' oton to ' uya Maniwerʉ tukai ' tawon , ” ta ' pʉ iya , “ Papa esi upiyau ' nokon ” ta e ' kwa pe .

text: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him , and took unto him his wife :
text2: Isose ' upakasa ' uya nin si , Meri mari ' ma ' pʉ mɨrɨ , Itepuru inserʉʉi uya tauro ' ka ' pʉ awɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan uya arɨ ' pʉ tiwʉ ' ta ' ,

text: And knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son : and he called his name JESUS .
text2: e ' tane iyentu rawɨrɨ a ' pɨ ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ iya pen . Mɨrɨpan mʉre entusa ' ese ' tɨ ' pʉ iya “ Sises ” tukai ' .

text: Now when Jesus was born in Bethlehem of Judaea in the days of Herod the king , behold , there came wise men from the east to Jerusalem ,
text2: Sises entu ' pʉ tʉpo Pe ' teri ' en po Isutiya yau , kin pe Era ' esi a ' tai , pu ' kena ' amʉ ' uyee ' pʉ wʉi enu uyepʉ winɨpai Surusiran pona ,

text: Saying , Where is he that is born King of the Jews ? for we have seen his star in the east , and are come to worship him .
text2: mɨrɨpan kon uya , “ Nai airɨ mʉre , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' kin pe te ' ton entusa ' nai ? Kaiyono ' epa ' kasa ' ene ' pʉ ina uya iyentusa ' ekamanin . Mɨrɨ pɨ ' apurɨpɨ ' se ' na ina uye ' sa ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: When Herod the king had heard these things , he was troubled , and all Jerusalem with him .
text2: Serɨ tawon etasa ' kin pe te ' sen Era ' uya a ' tai , isewankama ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kaisa rɨ Surusiran pon kon usewankama ' pʉ .

text: And when he had gathered all the chief priests and scribes of the people together , he demanded of them where Christ should be born .
text2: Tanporo Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Main pɨ ' enupanin nan amʉranʉ ' sa ' tʉuya a ' tai , to ' ekama ' po ' pʉ iya , “ Nai yau Kʉrai entuto ' oton tasa ' pu ' kena ' amʉ ' uya nai ? ” tukai ' .

text: And they said unto him , In Bethlehem of Judaea : for thus it is written by the prophet ,
text2: “ Pe ' teri ' en po , Isutiya yau , ” tukai ' to ' uya eikʉ ' pʉ . “ Serɨ tukai ' pu ' kena ' uya imenuka ' pʉ esi pena rɨ :

text: And thou Bethlehem , in the land of Juda , art not the least among the princes of Juda : for out of thee shall come a Governor , that shall rule my people Israel .
text2: “ ‘ Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon , Isutiya yawon , Pe ' teri ' en pata pon kon , Isutiya yawo ' nan pata ton tentakai ' apata kon yau eke esa ' wannɨ e ' sepoto ' oton , karimeru esa ' esi to ' esa ' pe kasa umunkɨ , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' esa ' pe te ' ton , ’ tawon , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Then Herod , when he had privily called the wise men , inquired of them diligently what time the star appeared .
text2: Serɨ etasa ' Era ' uya a ' tai , tʉmaimu ennoko ' pʉ iya pu ' kena ' amʉ ' piya ' to ' pokon pe ama ' ai te ' sepoto ' kon pe , mɨrɨpan kon winɨ eta ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨ a ' tai kaiyono ' epa ' ka ' pʉ tukai ' .

text: And he sent them to Bethlehem , and said , Go and search diligently for the young child ; and when ye have found him , bring me word again , that I may come and worship him also .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon ennoko ' pʉ iya Pe ' teri ' en pona , “ Wakʉ pe mʉre mʉwarinpatʉi ' . Eposa ' auya ' nokon a ' tai , upana ' tɨi ' mɨsi ' tʉi ' , urɨ rɨ nɨrɨ utɨto ' pe apurɨpɨ ' se ' na , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: When they had heard the king , they departed ; and , lo , the star , which they saw in the east , went before them , till it came and stood over where the young child was .
text2: Kin maimu eta tʉuya ' nokon tʉpo , to ' utɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya kaiyono ' kanan enkaa ' pʉ , tʉnene ' pʉ kon nʉ ' pʉ wʉi enu uyepʉ winɨ , mɨrɨpan pɨ ' to ' epori ' ma ' pʉ . Mɨrɨpan kon rawɨrɨ kaiyono ' utɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan ereuta ' pʉ mʉre pata epoi .

text: And when they were come into the house , they saw the young child with Mary his mother , and fell down , and worshipped him : and when they had opened their treasures , they presented unto him gifts ; gold , and frankincense , and myrrh .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , pu ' kena ' amʉ ' ewomʉ ' pʉ ɨutɨ ta ' . Mʉre si ensa ' tʉuya ' nokon a ' tai , isan , Meri pokon pe , to ' e ' sekunka ' pʉ apurɨpɨtʉ pe . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , timamin kon yen a ' koka ' pʉ to ' uya , mɨrɨpan kon uya irepapɨtʉ ' pʉ epe ' kena ' ton ke : korʉ ke , a ' po ' nan ikɨtun , pʉrankensens tato ' ke mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ karapa , mɨrʉ tato ' ke .

text: And being warned of God in a dream that they should not return to Herod , they departed into their own country another way .
text2: Papa uya to ' pana ' tɨ ' pʉ to ' e ' ne ' pɨtʉ yau , to ' enna ' po namai ' kin pe te ' sen Era ' piya ' , mɨrɨpan kon enna ' po ' pʉ tʉpata kon ya ' tʉron nɨ awɨrɨ .

text: And when they were departed , behold , the angel of the Lord appeareth to Joseph in a dream , saying , Arise , and take the young child and his mother , and flee into Egypt , and be thou there until I bring thee word : for Herod will seek the young child to destroy him .
text2: To ' utɨ ' pʉ tʉpo , Itepuru inserʉʉi usenpoika ' pʉ Isose ' piya ' iye ' ne ' pɨtʉ yau , “ Isose ' , e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' , mʉre mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ isan tanʉnse ainʉnkɨ Isi ' pona . Kin Era ' man iwarinpa pɨ ' iwɨto ' pe tʉuya , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: When he arose , he took the young child and his mother by night , and departed into Egypt :
text2: Mɨrɨpan e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' uya mʉre mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ isan arɨ ' pʉ ewarupɨ nau Isi ' pona ,

text: And was there until the death of Herod : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet , saying , Out of Egypt have I called my son .
text2: mɨrɨpan kon uko ' mamʉ ' pʉ Era ' uma ' ta pona rɨ . Pena pu ' kena ' amʉ ' nekama ' pʉ uta ' ku ' tɨ ' pʉ , “ Umu kɨ ' ma uya Isi ' apai , ” tawon .

text: Then Herod , when he saw that he was mocked of the wise men , was exceeding wroth , and sent forth , and slew all the children that were in Bethlehem , and in all the coasts thereof , from two years old and under , according to the time which he had diligently inquired of the wise men .
text2: Era ' uya i ' tusa ' a ' tai pu ' kena ' amʉ ' uya tennakasa ' , ipan pe isakorota ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya , “ Warawo ' munkɨ amʉ ' Pe ' teri ' en pon kon itʉ ' katɨ ' asa ' ron wʉipiya airon kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ mɨrɨ o ' koi ' no kon nɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya , pu ' kena ' amʉ ' uya ekama ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying ,
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , pu ' kena ' Iseremaya nekama ' pʉ uta ' ku ' tɨ ' pʉ :

text: In Rama was there a voice heard , lamentation , and weeping , and great mourning , Rachel weeping for her children , and would not be comforted , because they are not .
text2: “ Main useta Rama pata po , tʉuta ' kwarʉkai ' ukaran nɨ esi eke pe rɨ , Rʉi ' serʉ esi ukaran nɨ pɨ ' tʉmunkɨ amʉ ' wenai , tʉpori ' ma i ' se pʉra iyesi , to ' pʉra iyesi pɨ ' , ” tawon .

text: But when Herod was dead , behold , an angel of the Lord appeareth in a dream to Joseph in Egypt ,
text2: Era ' uma ' ta ' pʉ tʉpo , inserʉ usenpoika ' pʉ iye ' ne ' pɨtʉ yau Isose ' piya ' , Isi ' po ,

text: Saying , Arise , and take the young child and his mother , and go into the land of Israel : for they are dead which sought the young child ' s life .
text2: “ E ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' , mʉre mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ isan akɨ Esuwerʉ pata pona . Kamoro mʉre wɨnɨ i ' se te ' san uma ' ta ' pʉ man , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he arose , and took the young child and his mother , and came into the land of Israel .
text2: Mɨrɨpan e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ , mʉre mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ isan arɨ ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan kon utɨ ' pʉ Esuwerʉ pata pona .

text: But when he heard that Archelaus did reign in Judaea in the room of his father Herod , he was afraid to go thither : notwithstanding , being warned of God in a dream , he turned aside into the parts of Galilee :
text2: E ' tane A ' keras enasa ' tʉkʉipʉnʉ Era ' pata ' pʉ ya ' kin pe Isutiya po eta ' pʉ iya . Enari ' ke ' pe iyesi ' pʉ , mɨrɨ ya ' ɨtɨpai pʉra . Ipanamasa ' esi ' pʉ iye ' ne ' pɨtʉ yau , mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ Kiyarari nono pona .

text: And he came and dwelt in a city called Nazareth : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophets , He shall be called a Nazarene .
text2: Mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ ɨko ' manse ' na Nasare ' pona . Pu ' kena ' ton nekama ' pʉ uta ' ku ' tɨ ' pʉ mɨrɨ , “ Nasarin tukai ' esa ' to ' oton , ” tawon .

text: In those days came John the Baptist , preaching in the wilderness of Judaea ,
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Isaan Pa ' tes uyee ' pʉ . Itekare ekama ' pʉ iya Isutiya rɨmono ' taai awɨrɨ ,

text: And saying , Repent ye : for the kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: “ Amakooi kon apai era ' tɨtɨ ' , apʉne pʉra Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe a ' ko pe man , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: For this is he that was spoken of by the prophet Esaias , saying , The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Isaan pʉse rɨ pu ' kena ' Aisaya usaurokʉ ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ ipɨ ' : “ Rɨmono ' tau ka ' pon ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉ , ‘ Itepuru e ' ma ikonekatɨ ' , to ' sa rɨ ite ' ma ikonekatɨ ' , ’ tawon , ” ta ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ ipɨ ' .

text: And the same John had his raiment of camel ' s hair , and a leathern girdle about his loins ; and his meat was locusts and wild honey .
text2: Isaan pon esi ' pʉ kiyamerʉ i ' po ' konekasa ' , o ' pi ' pɨ konekasa ' esi ' pʉ ipokʉrʉʉi pe iworo ' pai pɨ ' . Iti ' kiyari esi ' pʉ kairau amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ teusan e ' ku .

text: Then went out to him Jerusalem , and all Judaea , and all the region round about Jordan ,
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' utɨ ' pʉ ipiya ' Surusiran mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Isutiya apai , tanporo Isotan nono piyawo ' nan pata apai ' ne .

text: And were baptized of him in Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Tʉmakooi kon ekama pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan kon pa ' taisima ' pʉ iya Isotan tuna tʉu ' tɨsen kau .

text: But when he saw many of the Pharisees and Sadducees come to his baptism , he said unto them , O generation of vipers , who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?
text2: E ' tane tu ' ke Pari ' si amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Satu ' si amʉ ' uyepʉ ene tʉuya a ' tai epa ' taisiman ku ' to ' iya airɨ , ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon ɨsɨ ton ɨkʉi munkɨ ton ! Ɨnʉ ' uya apana ' tɨsa ' kon ayainʉmʉ kon pa nʉye ' ai ' ne ' ekota ' man nɨto ' piyapai ?

text: Bring forth therefore fruits meet for repentance :
text2: Epetatɨ ' ɨyera ' tɨsa ' kon amakooi kon apai ekamanin ke .

text: And think not to say within yourselves , We have Abraham to our father : for I say unto you , that God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon pe rɨ kɨsenuminkatʉu , ‘ Epʉra ' an esi ina kʉipʉnʉ pe , ’ tukai ' . Apana ' tɨ uya ' nokon serɨ , serɨ ton tɨ ' apai Papa uya Epʉra ' an munkɨ oton kon koneka mɨrɨ .

text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees : therefore every tree which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Wa ' ka e ' kamasa ' man yʉi amʉ ' mi ' airɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporon yʉi amʉ ' tepetasen pen a ' tɨto ' oton nɨ mɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan eno ' ma apo ' ya ' .

text: I indeed baptize you with water unto repentance : but he that cometh after me is mightier than I , whose shoes I am not worthy to bear : he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost , and with fire :
text2: “ Apa ' taisima uya ' nokon tuna ke , amakooi kon apai ɨyera ' tɨ kon pa . E ' tane uye ' ma ' pʉ pe meruntɨ kuru uyepʉ mɨrɨ uyentaino , isapatooi arɨ uya poken pʉra e ' ai ' ne ' . Apa ' taisima iya ' nokon mɨrɨ Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ ke mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ apo ' ke .

text: Whose fan is in his hand , and he will throughly purge his floor , and gather his wheat into the garner ; but he will burn up the chaff with unquenchable fire .
text2: Sara ' sara ' pan ti ' kiyari pi ' pɨ menkato ' iya ike esi itemiyatʉ yau , mɨrɨpan uya i ' kwato ' tʉuya apon akoroka , ta ' nasi , wi ' amʉranʉkʉ iya itiwʉ ' ta ' , ipi ' pɨ rʉ ' pʉ po ' tɨ iya tʉusenkʉ ' sen pen apo ' ke , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then cometh Jesus from Galilee to Jordan unto John , to be baptized of him .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uyee ' pʉ Kiyarari winɨ Isaan piya ' Isotan tuna airɨ tʉpa ' taisimato ' pe iya ,

text: But John forbad him , saying , I have need to be baptized of thee , and comest thou to me ?
text2: Isaan esi ' pʉ ɨnereutanʉ ' pai , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Upa ' taisima auya ru ' ku i ' se e ' ai ' , mɨrɨ pe ' e ' tane upiya ' ɨuye ' sa ' ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Suffer it to be so now : for thus it becometh us to fulfil all righteousness . Then he suffered him .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Tɨwɨ mɨrɨ kasa rɨ iku ' kɨ , serɨ pe rɨken iye ' to ' pe . Serɨ winɨ tanporo Papa e ' to ' i ' se rɨ kupʉ mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Isaan uya ikupʉ ' pʉ imaimu awɨrɨ .

text: And Jesus , when he was baptized , went up straightway out of the water : and , lo , the heavens were opened unto him , and he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove , and lighting upon him :
text2: Inke pʉra tepa ' taisima ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ pe , Sises ekanwaka ' pʉ tuna kapai . Mɨrɨ a ' tai kuru rɨ , ka ' uta ' koka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya Papa A ' kwarʉ u ' tɨ ene ' pʉ wako ' wa kasa , mɨrɨpan uta ' si ' pʉ ipɨ ' .

text: And lo a voice from heaven , saying , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Main , Epʉn winon uya ta ' pʉ , “ Umu pʉse rɨ , uni ' nʉnkanʉ ; ipɨ ' epori ' mayai ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then was Jesus led up of the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted of the devil .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Iya ' kwarʉ uya Sises arɨ ' pʉ rɨmono ' ta ' Makoi uya i ' tupɨ ' to ' pe .

text: And when he had fasted forty days and forty nights , he was afterward an hungred .
text2: Tʉuseruma tʉpo tenta ' nai ' pʉra 40 kaisa rɨ wʉi mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ewarupɨ , mɨrɨpan esi ' pʉ ipan pe kuru iwan pe .

text: And when the tempter came to him , he said , If thou be the Son of God , command that these stones be made bread .
text2: I ' tupɨ ' nin uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Papa Mumu pe ɨwesi yau , se ton tɨ ' amʉ ' pɨ ' pʉreti pe enakɨ ka ' kɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But he answered and said , It is written , Man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of God .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Iye ' menukasa ' , ‘ Ka ' pon esi tʉuko ' mansen pʉreti pɨ ' rɨken pen , e ' tane tanporon nɨ main pɨ ' Papa mʉta yapai tʉuye ' sen , ’ tawon , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then the devil taketh him up into the holy city , and setteth him on a pinnacle of the temple ,
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Makoi uya Sises arɨ ' pʉ wakʉ eke pata pona , mɨrɨpan uya Papa ena ' Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' ka ' tawon inakapu putu po iye ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' pe ikupʉ ' pʉ .

text: And saith unto him , If thou be the Son of God , cast thyself down : for it is written , He shall give his angels charge concerning thee : and in their hands they shall bear thee up , lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone .
text2: “ Papa Mumu pe ɨwesi yau , ata ' mo ' kakɨ , apʉne pʉra iye ' menukasa ' : “ ‘ Tinserʉʉi ton apiyo ' ma iya ɨpɨ ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya temiyatʉ kon yau ayanʉmʉ tɨ ' pona a ' ta wɨnɨ auya namai ' , ’ tawon , ” ta ' pʉ Makoi uya ipɨ ' .

text: Jesus said unto him , It is written again , Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Iye ' menukasa ' rɨ nɨrɨ , ‘ Itepuru , Papa , itese ' pɨ ' ɨwe ' to ' kʉsi ' tupɨtʉi , ’ tasa ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' .

text: Again , the devil taketh him up into an exceeding high mountain , and sheweth him all the kingdoms of the world , and the glory of them ;
text2: Makoi uya kanan arɨ ' pʉ ka ' tawon wʉ ' pona , mɨrɨpan uya tanporo eke ton pata enpoika ' pʉ itenu ya ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wakʉ pe rɨ iye ' to ' .

text: And saith unto him , All these things will I give thee , if thou wilt fall down and worship me .
text2: “ Tanporo serɨ ton ke ɨrepa uya , urɨ pɨ ' te ' sekunkai ' ɨwɨpʉrema yau , ” ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' .

text: Then saith Jesus unto him , Get thee hence , Satan : for it is written , Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God , and him only shalt thou serve .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Upiyapai enta , Se ' tan ! Apʉne pʉra iye ' menukasa ' , ‘ Itepuru , Papa , itese ' pɨ ' ɨwe ' to ' pɨ ' rɨken ɨpʉrema ' ; Kʉrɨ rɨ rɨken poitorʉ pe e ' kɨ , ’ tawon , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: Then the devil leaveth him , and , behold , angels came and ministered unto him .
text2: Mɨrɨpan piyapai Makoi utɨ ' pʉ . Inserʉ amʉ ' uyee ' pʉ ipika ' tɨi ' .

text: Now when Jesus had heard that John was cast into prison , he departed into Galilee ;
text2: Sises uya Isaan esi pariki ' si tau tawon etasa ' a ' tai , iyenna ' po ' pʉ Kiyarari pona .

text: And leaving Nazareth , he came and dwelt in Capernaum , which is upon the sea coast , in the borders of Zabulon and Nephthalim :
text2: Ɨko ' manse ' na itɨ ' pʉ Ka ' paneyan pona , Nasare ' tʉnɨnse . Mɨrɨ pata esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ parau ku ' pɨri piyau Sepuran mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Na ' tari nono airɨ .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Pu ' kena ' Aisaya uya ta ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ a ' ku ' tɨ pe :

text: The land of Zabulon , and the land of Nephthalim , by the way of the sea , beyond Jordan , Galilee of the Gentiles ;
text2: “ Sepuran mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Na ' tari nono pon kon , ka ' pon amʉ ' Kiyarari e ' ma awɨron kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tuna Isotan ratoi pon kon , Kiyarari , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen nono yau te ' san .

text: The people which sat in darkness saw great light ; and to them which sat in the region and shadow of death light is sprung up .
text2: Pʉsamoro ka ' pon amʉ ' ewarupɨ yau tʉuko ' mansan uya eke rɨ iweyu ensa ' man ; uma ' tan nɨto ' nono yau te ' san pona iweyu e ' wei ' tɨsa ' man . ”

text: From that time Jesus began to preach , and to say , Repent : for the kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Mɨrɨ si ' kɨrɨ rɨ Sises epiya ' tɨ ' pʉ itekare ekama pɨ ' , “ Era ' tɨtɨ ' amakooi kon apai , apʉne pʉra Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe man a ' ko pe ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus , walking by the sea of Galilee , saw two brethren , Simon called Peter , and Andrew his brother , casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Sises usarɨ koro ' tau parau ku ' pɨri Kiyarari piyawɨrɨ , ka ' pon ene ' pʉ iya , takon ya ' te ' san , Saiman itese ' , Pi ' ta tato ' ipɨ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Anturu si itakon . Tʉpunwerʉ kon tʉrʉ pɨ ' to ' esi ' pʉ parau ku ' pɨri kau , apʉne pʉra moro ' amʉ ' a ' sinin nan pe tesi kon pɨ ' .

text: And he saith unto them , Follow me , and I will make you fishers of men .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Upɨkɨrɨ ɨsi ' tɨ ' , ɨkonekato ' kon pe uya ka ' pon amʉ ' a ' sinin nan pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they straightway left their nets , and followed him .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe rɨ , tʉpunwerʉ kon tʉnɨnse to ' utɨ ' pʉ ipɨkɨrɨ .

text: And going on from thence , he saw other two brethren , James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , in a ship with Zebedee their father , mending their nets ; and he called them .
text2: Mɨrɨ apai tʉutɨi ' , tʉron kon asa ' ron kon ɨsirunan ene ' pʉ iya , Isens mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Isaan , Sepiti munkɨ amʉ ' . Kanau yau to ' esi ' pʉ , tʉkʉipʉnʉ kon Sepiti pokon pe tʉpunwerʉ kon konepɨtʉ pɨ ' . Sises uya to ' kɨ ' ma ' pʉ .

text: And they immediately left the ship and their father , and followed him .
text2: Inke pʉra , tʉkanwa kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉkʉipʉnʉ kon tʉnɨnse to ' utɨ ' pʉ ipɨkɨrɨ .

text: And Jesus went about all Galilee , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing all manner of sickness and all manner of disease among the people .
text2: Sises utɨ ' pʉ siya rɨ Kiyarari awɨrɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' enupa pɨ ' Esuwerʉ amʉ ' usenupato ' iwʉ ' tau ' ne . Wakʉ itekare ekama pɨ ' iyesi ' pʉ , Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe pɨ ' . Paran pokon kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ takuru ' kena ' nan ka ' pon amʉ ' epi ' tɨ pɨ ' iyesi ' pʉ .

text: And his fame went throughout all Syria : and they brought unto him all sick people that were taken with divers diseases and torments , and those which were possessed with devils , and those which were lunatick , and those that had the palsy ; and he healed them .
text2: Itekareei utɨ ' pʉ siya rɨ Siriya poron pata awɨrɨ ' ne rɨ , mɨrɨpan ka ' pon amʉ ' uya tanporo e ' ne ' pe te ' san nee ' pʉ ipiya ' , ti ' tui ' pʉra rɨ teparan ke te ' san . Tʉron kon eparan esi ' pʉ ipan pe kuru te ' kʉnkʉnmasen , tʉron kon yau makoi a ' kwarʉ esi ' pʉ , tʉron kon eparan esi ' pʉ yai to ' enno ' pɨ ' nin , tʉron kon ipu ' tɨka ' pɨ ' sa ' kon Sises uya tanporo pʉsamoro epi ' tɨ ' pʉ .

text: And there followed him great multitudes of people from Galilee , and from Decapolis , and from Jerusalem , and from Judaea , and from beyond Jordan .
text2: Eke pe rɨ anpisin Kiyarari awɨron kon , Te ' ka ' pores , Surusiran , Isutiya pon kon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Isotan nono ratoi pon kon utɨ ' pʉ ipɨkɨrɨ .

text: And seeing the multitudes , he went up into a mountain : and when he was set , his disciples came unto him :
text2: Sises uya anpisin pe ka ' pon amʉ ' ensa ' a ' tai , iyekainʉmʉ ' pʉ i ' kʉrʉ pona , mɨrɨpan ereuta ' pʉ . Ipoitorʉ ton amʉra ' pʉ ipiya ' ,

text: And he opened his mouth , and taught them , saying ,
text2: mɨrɨpan kon enupa pɨ ' iye ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ :

text: Blessed are the poor in spirit : for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: “ Pori ' pe entu ' ma ' na ' ne ' nan ta ' kwarʉ kon yau esi , apʉne pʉra to ' iwano ' pe Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe esi .

text: Blessed are they that mourn : for they shall be comforted .
text2: Pori ' pe te ' ton kon kamoro tʉuta ' kwarʉkai ' ukaran nɨ pɨ ' na ' ne ' nan serɨ pe , apʉne pʉra Papa uya pori ' pe to ' ku ' to ' oton .

text: Blessed are the meek : for they shall inherit the earth .
text2: Pori ' pe te ' ton kon kamoro mɨ pe te ' ku ' san pen , apʉne pʉra tanporo rɨ non tʉrʉ Papa uya to ' ena ' .

text: Blessed are they which do hunger and thirst after righteousness : for they shall be filled .
text2: Pori ' pe te ' ton kon kamoro iwan pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tuna ' kiri ' ke na ' ne ' nan ipokena ' i ' se , apʉne pʉra to ' rɨ a ' wetato ' oton .

text: Blessed are the merciful : for they shall obtain mercy .
text2: Pori ' pe te ' ton kon kamoro ɨsentu ' kena ' ton , apʉne pʉra Papa usentu ' mato ' oton to ' pɨ ' .

text: Blessed are the pure in heart : for they shall see God .
text2: Pori ' pe te ' ton kon kamoro wakʉ pe tewan kon yau nekonekayai ' ne ' nan , apʉne pʉra to ' uya Papa ento ' oton .

text: Blessed are the peacemakers : for they shall be called the children of God .
text2: Pori ' pe te ' ton kon kamoro ɨsɨ pe te ' san i ' nɨ ' pankanin nan , apʉne pʉra Papa munkɨ amʉ ' pe to ' e ' to ' oton .

text: Blessed are they which are persecuted for righteousness ' sake : for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Pori ' pe te ' ton kon kamoro ɨsɨ pe rɨ , ipan pe rɨ tʉkota ' masan wakʉ kupʉ to ' uya wenai , to ' iwano ' pe Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe esi .

text: Blessed are ye , when men shall revile you , and persecute you , and shall say all manner of evil against you falsely , for my sake .
text2: “ Pori ' pe ɨwesi kon mɨrɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' uya asapema kon a ' tai , iwenai pʉra ɨkota ' ma ' nokon a ' tai mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' usaurokʉ ɨri pe rɨ ɨpɨ ' nokon a ' tai urɨ uriya ' .

text: Rejoice , and be exceeding glad : for great is your reward in heaven : for so persecuted they the prophets which were before you .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' ipan pe pori ' pe kuru e ' tɨ ' , apʉne pʉra eke rɨ ɨyepe ' pʉ kon esi pɨ ' Epʉn po , apʉne pʉra mɨrɨ kasa rɨ arawɨron kon pu ' kena ' amʉ ' kota ' mapɨtʉ ' pʉ to ' uya mɨrɨ .

text: Ye are the salt of the earth : but if the salt have lost his savour , wherewith shall it be salted ? it is thenceforth good for nothing , but to be cast out , and to be trodden under foot of men .
text2: “ Non waiyori pe rɨ ɨwesi kon , e ' tane ine ' ne ' pe pʉra waiyo enasa ' yau , nai kasa ine ' ne ' pe kanan iye ' to ' pe ikupʉ ? Wakʉ pe pʉra rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ , eno ' mato ' pe rɨ iyesi ka ' pon amʉ ' uya iwasa ' pɨ ' to ' pe tʉusarɨ kon a ' tai .

text: Ye are the light of the world . A city that is set on an hill cannot be hid .
text2: “ Serɨ non weyu pe rɨ ɨwesi kon . Wʉ ' pon pata e ' so ' namʉ pʉra iyesi mɨrɨ .

text: Neither do men light a candle , and put it under a bushel , but on a candlestick ; and it giveth light unto all that are in the house .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe pʉra ka ' pon amʉ ' uya raan ' pu po ' tɨsa ' nonka pʉra iyesi mɨrɨ pʉsau o ' koi ' . E ' tane ru ' ku , to ' uya inonka iyapon pona , mɨrɨpan uya tanporon kon nɨ wei ' tɨ ɨutɨ tau .

text: Let your light so shine before men , that they may see your good works , and glorify your Father which is in heaven .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa , tɨwɨ ɨweyu pe na ' ne ' ne ' wei ' tɨi ka ' pon amʉ ' uya ento ' pe . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , wakʉ ɨnkupʉnʉ ento ' pe to ' uya , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa , ɨkʉipʉnʉ , Epʉn pon apurɨpɨ ' to ' pe to ' uya nɨrɨ .

text: Think not that I am come to destroy the law , or the prophets : I am not come to destroy , but to fulfil .
text2: “ Pu ' kena ' amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Mosi ' nekama ' pʉ Main eno ' mai ' uye ' sa ' tukai ' kʉsi ' tutʉu . Eno ' mase ' na uye ' sa ' pen e ' tane a ' ku ' tɨi ' ru ' ku uye ' sa ' .

text: For verily I say unto you , Till heaven and earth pass , one jot or one tittle shall in no wise pass from the law , till all be fulfilled .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; Epʉn mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ non e ' weuka pʉ ' kʉ pona , ɨ ' rɨ rɨ mo ' ka pʉra iyesi Papa Maimu yapai . Aiko pe rɨ na ' ne ' pen nʉwarai ' ka ' pʉ esi moro rɨ Main pe tanporon nɨ uta ' ku ' tɨ pʉ ' kʉ pona .

text: Whosoever therefore shall break one of these least commandments , and shall teach men so , he shall be called the least in the kingdom of heaven : but whosoever shall do and teach them , the same shall be called great in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ aiko pe rʉ ' kwɨ na ' ne ' Main tonpa i ' kwɨ ' nin mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉron kon enupanin mɨrɨ rɨ marɨ ku ' to ' pe to ' uya e ' to ' oton aiko pe Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe yau ; e ' tane ɨnʉ ' rɨ Main kupʉ pɨ ' na ' ne ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipɨ ' enupanin pe na ' ne ' e ' to ' oton eke pe kuru Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe yau .

text: For I say unto you , That except your righteousness shall exceed the righteousness of the scribes and Pharisees , ye shall in no case enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Ta uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , wakʉ rɨken ku ' to ' auya ' nokon pe iyesi Pari ' si amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Main pɨ ' enupanin nan entai ; mɨrɨ kupʉ auya pʉra iyesi a ' tai , Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe ya ' ɨyepa ' kato ' oton kon parɨ pen nɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time , Thou shalt not kill ; and whosoever shall kill shall be in danger of the judgment :
text2: Miyarɨ rɨ usenupan nɨto ' ekama ' pʉ Sises uya ; “ Eta ' pʉ auya ' nokon pena rɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' ta ' pʉ , ‘ Ɨtonpa kʉ ' wɨnɨi , ’ tawon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ , ‘ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ tʉtonpa wɨnin nʉ ' pʉ kota ' mato ' oton , ’ tawon ,

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever is angry with his brother without a cause shall be in danger of the judgment : and whosoever shall say to his brother , Raca , shall be in danger of the council : but whosoever shall say , Thou fool , shall be in danger of hell fire .
text2: e ' tane ta uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , ɨnʉ ' rɨ sakoro ' pe na ' ne ' tʉtonpa pɨ ' kota ' mato ' oton Papa uya . Takapʉ uya kanan , ɨnʉ ' rɨ tʉtonpa esa ' nin ‘ Ra ' ka , ’ tukai ' esi Esuwerʉ amʉ ' Konsʉrʉʉi ton nʉkota ' ma ton pe , e ' tane ɨnʉ ' uya , ‘ Ɨmɨrɨ , iya ' kwarʉ pʉn ! ’ tasa ' a ' tai tʉtonpa pɨ ' , ɨsɨ rɨ apo ' e ' ma tau iyesi mɨrɨ .

text: Therefore if thou bring thy gift to the altar , and there rememberest that thy brother hath ought against thee ;
text2: “ Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , ɨuse ' mato ' Papa ena ' esi a ' tai , moro ɨyenu yau ɨri pe ɨtonpa e ' ku ' to ' ɨpɨ ' tʉku ' se itɨkɨ ɨtonpa e ' ku ' to ' ɨri pe ɨpɨ ' konekai ' .

text: Leave there thy gift before the altar , and go thy way ; first be reconciled to thy brother , and then come and offer thy gift .
text2: Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' apon piyau ɨntʉrʉnʉ tʉnonkai ' , wapiya ɨtonpa a ' kɨrɨ ekoneka ta , ɨyenna ' po pa ɨntʉrʉnʉ tʉse ' na .

text: Agree with thine adversary quickly , whiles thou art in the way with him ; lest at any time the adversary deliver thee to the judge , and the judge deliver thee to the officer , and thou be cast into prison .
text2: “ Oko pe pʉra ɨyeyaton ko ' tʉ ta ' ayayai ' ne ' a ' kɨrɨ ekonekaka ' kɨ ipokon pe rɨ marɨ ɨwesi koro ' tau , ɨkota ' mato ' ya ' ɨtʉrʉ iya wapiya , eseru aimenkanin uya ɨtʉrʉ pʉresiman ena ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨyeno ' ma to ' uya pariki ' si ta ' .

text: Verily I say unto thee , Thou shalt by no means come out thence , till thou hast paid the uttermost farthing .
text2: I ' napairon nɨ ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; ɨyepa ' kato ' oton pen nɨ tanporo ɨne ' manʉ kon i ' ma ' ka auya ' nokon pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ .

text: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time , Thou shalt not commit adultery :
text2: “ Eta ' pʉ auya ' nokon ; ‘ Tʉtaan ' pʉ kenan kʉsekumankai , ’ tawon .

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever looketh on a woman to lust after her hath committed adultery with her already in his heart .
text2: E ' tane ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ uri ' san ensa ' a ' tai ekumai ' pe , iyekumaka ' sa ' rɨ mɨrɨ uri ' san a ' kɨrɨ tewan yau .

text: And if thy right eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish , and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell .
text2: Enwo ' ne ' winon ɨyenu uya ɨye ' makoima emapu ' tɨ pe iyesi yau , imo ' kakɨ eno ' ma pa ; wakʉ iwa pe rɨ iyesi tikin nɨ ɨpun tonpa ' kasa ' auya a ' tai , tanporo ɨpun eno ' ma ekota ' man nɨto ' ya ' entai .

text: And if thy right hand offend thee , cut if off , and cast it from thee : for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish , and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell .
text2: Enwo ' ne ' winon ɨyemiyatʉ uya ɨye ' makoima emapu ' tɨ pe iyesi yau , a ' tɨkɨ eno ' ma pa ; wakʉ iwa pe iyesi mɨrɨ tikin nɨ ɨpun tonpa ' kasa ' auya a ' tai , tanporo ɨpun eno ' ma ekota ' man nɨto ' ya ' entai , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: It hath been said , Whosoever shall put away his wife , let him give her a writing of divorcement :
text2: “ Tasa ' iya kanan , ‘ Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ tʉno ' pʉ nonka a ' tai , tɨwɨ nʉkaretai ' tɨi kuru rɨ iye ' nonka karetaai ke , ’

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever shall put away his wife , saving for the cause of fornication , causeth her to commit adultery : and whosoever shall marry her that is divorced committeth adultery .
text2: e ' tane ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; ɨnʉ ' rɨ tʉno ' pʉ nonkayai ' ne ' , iyekumasa ' pen nɨ e ' tane uya tekumasen pe iyesi emapu ' tɨ mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨnʉ ' rɨ inonkasa ' rʉ ' pʉ mari ' mayai ' ne ' , ekuma pe iyesi mɨrɨ .

text: Again , ye have heard that it hath been said by them of old time , Thou shalt not forswear thyself , but shalt perform unto the Lord thine oaths :
text2: “ Eta ' pʉ auya ' nokon pena rɨ kanan ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' ta ' pʉ , ‘ Ausauro ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ ipɨ ' , iku ' to ' pe auya kʉ ' pʉremekʉi , e ' tane Papa ya ' ausauro ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ awɨrɨ rɨ e ' kɨ . ’

text: But I say unto you , Swear not at all ; neither by heaven ; for it is God ' s throne :
text2: E ' tane ekama uya ɨpɨ ' ; ɨ ' rɨ rɨ kʉkai ɨnku ' ton pen nɨ pɨ ' , Epʉn nɨ kʉsesakʉi - - - Papa apon mɨrɨ ,

text: Nor by the earth ; for it is his footstool : neither by Jerusalem ; for it is the city of the great King .
text2: non nɨ kʉsesakʉi - - - Papa pʉta apon mɨrɨ ; Surusiran nɨ kʉsesakʉi - - - eke kin pata ' se ' mɨrɨ .

text: Neither shalt thou swear by thy head , because thou canst not make one hair white or black .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ a ' pai rɨ kʉsesakʉi , apʉne pʉra tikin nɨ rɨ a ' pai i ' po ' aimu ' naka auya pʉra iyesi mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' kʉrʉntanʉkʉ auya pʉra rɨ iyesi .

text: But let your communication be , Yea , yea ; Nay , nay : for whatsoever is more than these cometh of evil .
text2: Ewai ' ta auya a ' tai , ewai ' ka ' kɨ ; kane ta auya a ' tai , kane ka ' kɨ rɨ nɨrɨ . Tʉron nɨ pe ausaurokʉ a ' tai mɨrɨ esi Makoi winon pe .

text: Ye have heard that it hath been said , An eye for an eye , and a tooth for a tooth :
text2: “ Eta ' pʉ auya ' nokon nɨ , ‘ En epe ' pʉ pe en nɨ esi ; ɨ epe ' pʉ pe ɨ rɨ esi , ’ tawon .

text: But I say unto you , That ye resist not evil : but whosoever shall smite thee on thy right cheek , turn to him the other also .
text2: E ' tane ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; ɨri pe ɨku ' nin nʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' kɨse ' mai . Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ɨwɨnɨ yau enwo ' ne ' winon ɨye ' peta pɨ ' , iratoi rʉ ' pʉ rɨ marɨ ira ' tɨkɨ iwinɨkʉi ' .

text: And if any man will sue thee at the law , and take away thy coat , let him have thy cloke also .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ayarɨ pe iyesi yau ko ' tʉ ta ' ɨ ' rɨ wenai rɨ , mɨrɨpan uya ɨpon mo ' ka pe iyesi yau itepe ' pʉ pe , tɨwɨ ipʉro ' pon pokon pe ɨpon mo ' kai .

text: And whosoever shall compel thee to go a mile , go with him twain .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ta ' kwarʉkai ' ayarɨ ta ' kɨrɨ a ' tai 1 mayirʉ , enta 2 mayirʉ e ' to ' airɨ .

text: Give to him that asketh thee , and from him that would borrow of thee turn not thou away .
text2: Ɨyekama ' poyai ' ne ' nokon irepatɨ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kera ' tɨi ɨnʉ ' rɨ ɨyekama ' ponin ɨiwano ' pɨ ' piyapai .

text: Ye have heard that it hath been said , Thou shalt love thy neighbour , and hate thine enemy .
text2: “ Eta ' pʉ auya ' nokon ; ‘ Ɨtonpa i ' nʉnkakɨ , ɨyeyaton ewaruma ' tɨi ' ma . ’

text: But I say unto you , Love your enemies , bless them that curse you , do good to them that hate you , and pray for them which despitefully use you , and persecute you ;
text2: E ' tane ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; ɨyeyaton kon nɨ i ' nʉnkatɨ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨpʉrematɨ ' ɨkota ' manin kon pona ,

text: That ye may be the children of your Father which is in heaven : for he maketh his sun to rise on the evil and on the good , and sendeth rain on the just and on the unjust .
text2: Epʉn pon ɨkʉipʉnʉ kon munkɨ amʉ ' pe ɨwesi kon pa . Ɨri ton nɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wakʉ ton nɨ weyu pe wʉi enu enuku emapu ' tɨnin . Ipokena ' ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipokena ' ton pen nɨ pona tuna ennoko iya .

text: For if ye love them which love you , what reward have ye ? do not even the publicans the same ?
text2: Ɨi ' nʉnkanin kon nɨken i ' nʉnka auya ' nokon yau , ɨ ' rɨ ken si ɨyepe ' pʉ kon eporo auya ' nokon mɨrɨ ? Mɨrɨ pe ' kupʉ pʉrata amʉranʉ ' nin nan uya pʉra nai ?

text: And if ye salute your brethren only , what do ye more than others ? do not even the publicans so ?
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨtonpa ton nɨken nɨ pɨ ' miyarɨ ta auya ' nokon yau , ɨ ' rɨ ken si kupʉ auya ' nokon tʉron kon entai ? Mɨrɨ pe ' kupʉ Papa apurɨnin nan pen uya pʉra nai ?

text: Be ye therefore perfect , even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , wakʉ pe e ' tɨ ' , ɨkʉipʉnʉ kon , Epʉn pon esi wakʉ pe kasa . ”

text: Take heed that ye do not your alms before men , to be seen of them : otherwise ye have no reward of your Father which is in heaven .
text2: Sises e ' sara ' tɨkaa ' pʉ kanan tʉpoitorʉ ton enupa pɨ ' . Ta ' pʉ iya , “ Ti ' tui ' e ' tɨ ' , wakʉ ɨnkupʉnʉ kon yau , wakʉ pe e ' nɨto ' pɨ ' ka ' pon amʉ ' uya ɨyento ' pe tukai ' . Mɨrɨ ku ' sa ' auya a ' tai , ɨyepe ' pʉ eporo auya pʉra rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ ɨkʉipʉnʉ , Epʉn pon winɨ .

text: Therefore when thou doest thine alms , do not sound a trumpet before thee , as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the streets , that they may have glory of men . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' entu ' manin nan repa auya ' nokon a ' tai , eke pe kʉsekamai , wakʉ pe te ' ku ' san uya ikupʉ kasa Esuwerʉ amʉ ' usenupato ' iwʉ ' tau , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ asanta tawɨrɨ rɨ , tapurɨto ' kon pe ka ' pon amʉ ' uya tukai ' . I ' napairon nɨ ekama uya serɨ ɨpɨ ' nokon , to ' uya tepe ' pʉ kon epoka ' sa ' rɨ mɨrɨ .

text: But when thou doest alms , let not thy left hand know what thy right hand doeth :
text2: E ' tane entu ' manin nan repa auya a ' tai , tɨwɨ akamisi winon ɨyemiyatʉ kʉsi ' tunin ɨyenwo ' netʉ winon ɨyemiyatʉ nʉkupʉnʉ ,

text: That thine alms may be in secret : and thy Father which seeth in secret himself shall reward thee openly .
text2: mɨrɨ pɨ ' ɨnkupʉnʉ e ' to ' pe nesii ama ' ai , ɨkʉipʉnʉ , ama ' ai ɨnkupʉnʉ ennin nʉ ' pʉ uya ɨye ' mato ' pe .

text: And when thou prayest , thou shalt not be as the hypocrites are : for they love to pray standing in the synagogues and in the corners of the streets , that they may be seen of men . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨwɨpʉrema kon a ' tai , wakʉ pe te ' ku ' san kasa ke ' tʉu . Ɨpʉremapaino kon te ' mʉ ' sa ' kai ' Esuwerʉ amʉ ' usenupato ' iwʉ ' tau mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ asanta ka ' taporo rɨ , tento ' kon pe ka ' pon amʉ ' uya . I ' napairon nɨ ekama uya serɨ ɨpɨ ' nokon , to ' uya tepe ' pʉ kon epoka ' sa ' rɨ mɨrɨ .

text: But thou , when thou prayest , enter into thy closet , and when thou hast shut thy door , pray to thy Father which is in secret ; and thy Father which seeth in secret shall reward thee openly .
text2: E ' tane ɨwɨpʉrema a ' tai , ɨiwʉ ' pʉ ' kʉ ta ' ewonkɨ , ɨmʉra ' taai a ' kokɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨwɨpʉrema pa tʉusensen pen nɨ ɨkʉipʉnʉ pɨ ' . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ɨkʉipʉnʉ , ama ' ai ɨnkupʉnʉ ennin uya ɨye ' mato ' pe .

text: But when ye pray , use not vain repetitions , as the heathen do : for they think that they shall be heard for their much speaking .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ amaimu rɨ marɨ tʉna ' popɨ ' se kɨpʉremai , Papa i ' tunin nan pen kasa tʉmaimu kon useta pe tekamai ' , apʉne pʉra tu ' kan nɨ esakʉ tʉuya ' nokon pɨ ' .

text: Be not ye therefore like unto them : for your Father knoweth what things ye have need of , before ye ask him .
text2: To ' kasa ke ' tʉu , ɨkʉipʉnʉ uya rɨ i ' tuka ' sa ' i ' se ɨwe ' to ' tekama ' po auya wapiya rɨ .

text: After this manner therefore pray ye : Our Father which art in heaven , Hallowed be thy name .
text2: “ Se kasa nin si ɨwɨpʉremato ' kon esi mɨrɨ : “ ‘ Ina Kʉipʉnʉ Epʉn pon , tʉnamasen pe ɨyese ' nesii .

text: Thy kingdom come . Thy will be done in earth , as it is in heaven .
text2: Ina esa ' pe ɨwe ' to ' nʉyepʉi , serɨ non po ɨyeseru ne ' kupʉi Epʉn po iyesi na ' ne ' kasa .

text: Give us this day our daily bread .
text2: Ina irepakɨ serɨ pe wʉi kaisa rɨ te ' sen ina i ' kiyari ke .

text: And forgive us our debts , as we forgive our debtors .
text2: Ina nʉko ' manʉkʉnʉ ɨri pɨ ' ɨsentu ' makɨ , ina usentu ' masa ' ɨri ko ' manʉ ' nin nan pɨ ' na ' ne ' kasa .

text: And lead us not into temptation , but deliver us from evil : For thine is the kingdom , and the power , and the glory , for ever . Amen .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ina kʉsarɨi i ' tupɨ ' nɨto ' ya ' , e ' tane ɨri pe te ' sen piyapai ina imo ' kakɨ . ’

text: For if ye forgive men their trespasses , your heavenly Father will also forgive you :
text2: “ Apʉne pʉra ka ' pon amʉ ' uya ɨri pe ɨku ' sa ' a ' tai , to ' pɨ ' ɨusentu ' ma yau , ɨkʉipʉnʉ , Epʉn pon nɨ nɨrɨ usentu ' ma mɨrɨ ɨpɨ ' .

text: But if ye forgive not men their trespasses , neither will your Father forgive your trespasses .
text2: E ' tane ɨri pe ɨku ' nin nan nʉ ' pʉ kon pɨ ' ɨusentu ' ma kon pʉra iyesi yau , ɨkʉipʉnʉ rɨ nɨrɨ usentu ' ma pʉra iyesi ɨpɨ ' .

text: Moreover when ye fast , be not , as the hypocrites , of a sad countenance : for they disfigure their faces , that they may appear unto men to fast . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: “ Ɨuseruma a ' tai tenta ' nai ' pʉra , pokoi pe ɨyemʉ ' kʉ ' kupʉi wakʉ pe te ' ku ' san e ' to ' kasa , temʉ ' rɨ to ' ena ka ' pon amʉ ' uya rɨ nin tento ' kon pe , ka ' pon amʉ ' uya rɨ nin tapurɨto ' kon pe . I ' napairon nɨ ekama uya ɨpɨ ' , to ' uya tepe ' pʉ kon epoka ' sa ' rɨ mɨrɨ .

text: But thou , when thou fastest , anoint thine head , and wash thy face ;
text2: E ' tane ɨuseruma a ' tai tenta ' nai ' pʉra , ɨsenpatauka ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ekarapaima ' .

text: That thou appear not unto men to fast , but unto thy Father which is in secret : and thy Father , which seeth in secret , shall reward thee openly .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ka ' pon uya ɨto ' ka ' nʉkʉ pʉra iyesi mɨrɨ ɨuseruma tenta ' nai ' pʉra tukai ' , e ' tane ɨkʉipʉnʉ , tʉusensen pen nɨ uya i ' tu , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨkʉipʉnʉ , ama ' ai te ' ku ' sen ennin nʉ ' pʉ uya rɨ ɨye ' mato ' pe .

text: Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth , where moth and rust doth corrupt , and where thieves break through and steal :
text2: “ Ɨimamin kʉsamʉranʉkʉi serɨ non po , ene amʉ ' uya ima ' tanʉ ' to ' yau rɨ , ikaranto ' yau rɨ , ama ' amʉ ' e ' to ' ama ' pe yau rɨ .

text: But lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven , where neither moth nor rust doth corrupt , and where thieves do not break through nor steal :
text2: E ' tane Epʉn po ɨimamin kon amʉranʉ ' tɨ ' , ene amʉ ' uya ima ' tanʉ ' to ' pen pata ' se ' yau , ikaranto ' pen yau , ama ' amʉ ' e ' to ' ama ' pe pata pen nɨ yau .

text: For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
text2: Apʉne pʉra ɨimamin kon e ' to ' airɨ , mɨrɨ yau ɨyewan kon nɨ nɨrɨ esi .

text: The light of the body is the eye : if therefore thine eye be single , thy whole body shall be full of light .
text2: “ En esi pun raan ' puui pe rɨ . Wakʉ pe ɨyenu esi yau , tanporo ɨpun esi a ' kwa pe .

text: But if thine eye be evil , thy whole body shall be full of darkness . If therefore the light that is in thee be darkness , how great is that darkness !
text2: E ' tane , wakʉ pe pʉra ɨyenu esi a ' tai , ewarupɨ pe rɨ ɨpun esi . Iweyu pʉra ɨpun esi yau , ipan pe rɨ ewarupɨ pe iyesi mɨrɨ !

text: No man can serve two masters : for either he will hate the one , and love the other ; or else he will hold to the one , and despise the other . Ye cannot serve God and mammon .
text2: “ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ e ' tʉrawasoma pʉra iyesi asa ' ron kon tepuru ton apiyo ' pe . Tikin nan ewaruma ' tɨ iya , isakon i ' nʉnka iya ; tikin nan pɨ ' ita ' si , isakon sanoma iya pʉra . Asa ' rɨ rɨ marɨ Papa mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pʉrata apiyo ' pe ɨwesi pʉra iyesi .

text: Therefore I say unto you , Take no thought for your life , what ye shall eat , or what ye shall drink ; nor yet for your body , what ye shall put on . Is not the life more than meat , and the body than raiment ?
text2: “ Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , ekama uya serɨ ɨpɨ ' nokon , ɨuko ' manto ' kon pɨ ' rɨ kɨsewankamatʉu , ɨi ' kiyari kon pɨ ' rɨ mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨuku kon pɨ ' rɨ , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨpun kon pɨ ' rɨ , ɨ ' rɨ esi upon pe tukai ' . Ɨuko ' manto ' pe ' esi pen mɨrɨ kiyari entai ? Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨpun kon pe ' esi pen pon entai ?

text: Behold the fowls of the air : for they sow not , neither do they reap , nor gather into barns ; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them . Are ye not much better than they ?
text2: Apʉne toron amʉ ' entɨ ' ka ' tawon kon . Ti ' kiyari kon pɨnnin nan pen nɨ , anʉnnin nan pen nɨ , mɨrɨ pe pʉra amʉranʉ ' nin nan pen nɨ , e ' tane rɨ ɨkʉipʉnʉ kon , Epʉn pon uya to ' ewekʉ . Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon ken pe ' si esi pen i ' nʉnkena ' pe to ' entai ?

text: Which of you by taking thought can add one cubit unto his stature ?
text2: Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ tʉuko ' manto ' ɨnka miyarɨ parɨ ipɨ ' tʉusewankamai ' ?

text: And why take ye thought for raiment ? Consider the lilies of the field , how they grow ; they toil not , neither do they spin :
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' pon pɨ ' ɨusewankama kon ? Apʉne entɨ ' pata ipʉrʉ esi wakʉ pe rɨ iya ' ta tʉpata ' se ' yau , te ' tʉrawasomasen pen mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨ ' pɨ ' nin pen .

text: And yet I say unto you , That even Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
text2: Mɨrɨ rɨ e ' tane ekama uya serɨ ɨpɨ ' nokon ; Saraman , imaminkena ' epontɨsa ' pʉra iyesi ' pʉ mɨrɨ ton kasa .

text: Wherefore , if God so clothe the grass of the field , which to day is , and to morrow is cast into the oven , shall he not much more clothe you , O ye of little faith ?
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa si Papa uya wana ' rɨ pontɨ pe iyesi yau wana ' serɨ pe na ' ne ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ awanapairɨ eno ' ma apo ' ya ' , mɨrɨ na ' ne ' entai pe ' ɨpontɨ iya ' nokon pen mɨ ? Aiko sɨ , aiko pe rʉ ' kwɨ rɨ apurɨto ' auya ' nokon esi !

text: Therefore take no thought , saying , What shall we eat ? or , What shall we drink ? or , Wherewithal shall we be clothed ?
text2: “ Mɨrɨ pɨ ' kɨsewankamatʉu , ‘ Ɨ ' rɨ kuru ɨ ' to ' pe ? ’ mɨrɨ pe pʉra , ‘ Ɨ ' rɨ kuru ensito ' pe ? ’ mɨrɨ pe pʉra , ‘ Ɨ ' rɨ kuru e ' to ' pe upon kon pe ? ’ tukai ' .

text: ( For after all these things do the Gentiles seek : ) for your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Papa i ' tunin nan pen e ' to ' ipɨkɨrɨ ton serɨ , mɨrɨpan ɨkʉipʉnʉ kon , Epʉn pon uya i ' tu serɨ ton i ' se ɨwesi kon .

text: But seek ye first the kingdom of God , and his righteousness ; and all these things shall be added unto you .
text2: E ' tane ru ' ku , wapiya kuru esa ' wannɨ pe iye ' to ' iwarinpatɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipokena ' pe iye ' to ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporo serɨ ton nɨ nin si e ' tʉrʉ mɨrɨ ɨyena ' nokon nɨ nɨrɨ .

text: Take therefore no thought for the morrow : for the morrow shall take thought for the things of itself . Sufficient unto the day is the evil thereof .
text2: Awanapairo ' pɨ ' kɨsewankamai , tʉponaron nɨ mɨrɨ awanapairo ' pɨ ' usewankaman ; wʉi kaisa rɨ iponaro ' rɨ usewankaman nɨto ' esi , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: Judge not , that ye be not judged .
text2: “ Ka ' pon amʉ ' eseru kʉsaimenkatʉu , ɨyeseru kon nɨ nɨrɨ aimenka kʉse ' nin .

text: For with what judgment ye judge , ye shall be judged : and with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you again .
text2: Apʉne pʉra ka ' pon amʉ ' eseru maimenkayatʉi ' ne ' kasa rɨ marɨ ɨyeseru kon aimenka mɨrɨ . I ' tuto ' auya ' nokon yai pe rɨ ɨnkupʉ ' pʉ yai rɨ ɨyena ' nokon i ' tu mɨrɨ .

text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye , but considerest not the beam that is in thine own eye ?
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' aiko rʉ ' kwɨ rɨ paranka punu ' pɨ ɨnenpai ɨwesi ɨtonpa enu yawon , eke rɨ paranka e ' tane ɨyenu yau ?

text: Or how wilt thou say to thy brother , Let me pull out the mote out of thine eye ; and , behold , a beam is in thine own eye ?
text2: Nai kasa ɨtonpa pɨ ' , ‘ Apʉne amuru simo ' kai ' ɨyenu apai , ’ ta auya inke rɨ moro paranka e ' tane ɨyenu yau ?

text: Thou hypocrite , first cast out the beam out of thine own eye ; and then shalt thou see clearly to cast out the mote out of thy brother ' s eye .
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon wakʉ pe te ' ku ' san , wapiya kuru ɨyenu apai paranka imo ' kaka ' kɨ , mɨrɨ a ' tai wakʉ pe ene auya ɨtonpa enu apai amuru mo ' ka pa , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Give not that which is holy unto the dogs , neither cast ye your pearls before swine , lest they trample them under their feet , and turn again and rend you .
text2: “ Wakʉ pe te ' sen kʉ ' tʉtʉu pero amʉ ' ena ' ; mokon pun ton ɨiwano ' kon kʉseno ' matʉu peiruku amʉ ' ena ' , to ' uya iwasa ' kapɨtʉ esi mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' era ' tɨ esi akarapɨ ' se ' na .

text: Ask , and it shall be given you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened unto you :
text2: “ Ekama ' potɨ ' ; mɨrɨ a ' tai , ɨyena ' nokon nɨ iye ' tʉrʉ . Iwarinpatɨ ' ; mɨrɨ a ' tai , eporo auya ' nokon . Mʉra ' ta iwɨpɨ ' tɨ ' , mɨrɨpan uta ' kokato ' pe ɨyena ' nokon .

text: For every one that asketh receiveth ; and he that seeketh findeth ; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened .
text2: Apʉne pʉra tanporon kon ekama ' po pɨ ' na ' ne ' nan uya eporo ; kʉrɨ rɨ iwarinpa pɨ ' na ' ne ' uya rɨ eporo , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kʉrɨ rɨ iwɨpɨtʉ pɨ ' na ' ne ' ena ' rɨ mʉra ' ta uta ' koka .

text: Or what man is there of you , whom if his son ask bread , will he give him a stone ?
text2: Nai kʉrɨ warai uya tʉmu uya pʉreti ekama ' po yau irepa tɨ ' ke ?

text: Or if he ask a fish , will he give him a serpent ?
text2: Mɨrɨ pe pʉra , moro ' ekama ' po iya yau , irepa ɨkʉi ke ?

text: If ye then , being evil , know how to give good gifts unto your children , how much more shall your Father which is in heaven give good things to them that ask him ?
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon nin si ɨri ton uya i ' tu yau wakʉ ton e ' repan nɨto ' ke ɨmunkɨ kon amʉ ' repa auya ' nokon , mɨrɨ entai kuru ɨkʉipʉnʉ kon , Epʉn pon uya wakʉ ton e ' repan nɨto ' tʉrʉ kamoro ekama ' ponin nan ena ' .

text: Therefore all things whatsoever ye would that men should do to you , do ye even so to them : for this is the law and the prophets .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ pɨ ' , tanporon yau rɨ iku ' tɨ ' tʉron kon pɨ ' , ikupʉ to ' uya i ' se me ' ai ' ne ' ɨpɨ ' nokon . Serɨ uya Main mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pu ' kena ' amʉ ' rɨ nʉmenuka ' pʉ amʉranʉkʉ mɨrɨ .

text: Enter ye in at the strait gate : for wide is the gate , and broad is the way , that leadeth to destruction , and many there be which go in thereat :
text2: “ Ewontɨ ' aiko rʉ ' kwɨ mʉra ' ta awɨrɨ , apʉne pʉra eke mʉra ' ta mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eke asanta esi uma ' tan nɨto ' ya ' utɨn e ' ma pe , mɨrɨpan tu ' kan kon nɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' ewomʉ iyawɨrɨ ,

text: Because strait is the gate , and narrow is the way , which leadeth unto life , and few there be that find it .
text2: e ' tane aiko rʉ ' kwɨ mʉra ' ta mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ aiko rʉ ' kwɨ asanta esi wakʉ uko ' man nɨto ' ya ' utɨn e ' ma pe , e ' tane tu ' kan kon pen nɨ utɨto ' iyawɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: Beware of false prophets , which come to you in sheep ' s clothing , but inwardly they are ravening wolves .
text2: Miyarɨ rɨ Sises esi ' pʉ to ' enupa pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ , “ Akono amʉ ' pe te ' san entɨ ' ; to ' uyepʉ karimeru kasa , e ' tane ɨsɨ ton , ene amʉ ' kasa to ' esi .

text: Ye shall know them by their fruits . Do men gather grapes of thorns , or figs of thistles ?
text2: To ' i ' tu auya ' nokon mɨrɨ to ' eperu winɨ . Tikʉ kenan apai pe ' kʉre ' pʉipɨ ' nin nan ka ' pon amʉ ' , mɨrɨ pe pʉra pi ' rɨ ɨmɨ ' nɨ ' ta apai ? ( Kane . )

text: Even so every good tree bringeth forth good fruit ; but a corrupt tree bringeth forth evil fruit .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ , wakʉ yʉi epeta wakʉ pe rɨ , ɨri yʉi epeta ɨri pe rɨ .

text: A good tree cannot bring forth evil fruit , neither can a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit .
text2: Wakʉ yʉi epeta pʉra iyesi ɨri pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨri yʉi epeta pʉra iyesi mɨrɨ wakʉ pe .

text: Every tree that bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' uya tʉusepetasen pen yʉi a ' tɨ eno ' mato ' pe tʉuya ' nokon apo ' ya ' .

text: Wherefore by their fruits ye shall know them .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa to ' eperu winɨ to ' i ' tu auya ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Not every one that saith unto me , Lord , Lord , shall enter into the kingdom of heaven ; but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Tanporon kon ka ' pon amʉ ' , ‘ Uyepuru , uyepuru ! ’ tawon nan upɨ ' epa ' kato ' oton pen nɨ Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe pata ' se ' ya ' , e ' tane kʉrɨ rɨken ukʉipʉnʉ , Epʉn pon e ' to ' i ' se ku ' nin .

text: Many will say to me in that day , Lord , Lord , have we not prophesied in thy name ? and in thy name have cast out devils ? and in thy name done many wonderful works ?
text2: Iweyu e ' seposa ' a ' tai , tu ' kan kon nɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' uya tato ' oton upɨ ' , ‘ Uyepuru , uyepuru , pu ' kena ' pe pe ' ina usaurokʉ pʉn ɨyese ' yau , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨyese ' yau pe ' ɨri a ' kwarʉ ton enpa ' kapɨtʉ ' pʉ ina uya pʉn , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eke Papa tʉrawasooi ku ' pɨtʉ pʉn pe ' ina uya ? ’

text: And then will I profess unto them , I never knew you : depart from me , ye that work iniquity .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , tʉwapu ' tɨi ' pʉra to ' pɨ ' ekamato ' uya oton , ‘ Ɨi ' tusa ' uya ' nokon pʉra man . Entantɨ ' upiyapai , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon ɨri ku ' nin nan ! ’ ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Therefore whosoever heareth these sayings of mine , and doeth them , I will liken him unto a wise man , which built his house upon a rock :
text2: “ Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , tanporon kon serɨ ton umaimu ton eta pɨ ' na ' ne ' nan mɨrɨpan kupʉ pɨ ' na ' ne ' nan esi mɨrɨ ta ' kwarʉ kenan ka ' pon kasa tɨ ' po tiwʉ ' amɨnin .

text: And the rain descended , and the floods came , and the winds blew , and beat upon that house ; and it fell not : for it was founded upon a rock .
text2: Tuna uyee ' pʉ , tuna apɨrʉ ton u ' ma ' pʉ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ a ' setun uyee ' pʉ e ' se ' ne ' pe ɨutɨ tʉwɨse , e ' tane ita ' mo ' ka ' pʉ pen nɨ , apʉne pʉra tɨ ' po iyapon esi pɨ ' .

text: And every one that heareth these sayings of mine , and doeth them not , shall be likened unto a foolish man , which built his house upon the sand :
text2: E ' tane tanporon kon serɨ ton umaimu ton eta pɨ ' na ' ne ' nan mɨrɨpan kupʉ to ' uya pʉra na ' ne ' nan esi mɨrɨ iya ' kwarʉ pʉn ka ' pon kasa tiwʉ ' amɨnin wɨ ' sɨ ' po .

text: And the rain descended , and the floods came , and the winds blew , and beat upon that house ; and it fell : and great was the fall of it .
text2: Tuna uyee ' pʉ , tuna apɨrʉ ton u ' ma ' pʉ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ a ' setun uyee ' pʉ e ' se ' ne ' pe ɨutɨ tʉwɨse , mɨrɨpan uta ' mo ' ka uya eke pe pata a ' merunpa ' pʉ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had ended these sayings , the people were astonished at his doctrine :
text2: Serɨ ton pɨ ' Sises usaurokʉ e ' nonkasa ' a ' tai , anpisin ton nɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' usewansiuka ' pʉ enupan nɨto ' iya pɨ ' ,

text: For he taught them as one having authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: apʉne pʉra enupan iya pɨ ' tʉmeruntɨrʉ kenan pe kuru rɨ , Main pɨ ' enupanin nan kasa pʉra .

text: When he was come down from the mountain , great multitudes followed him .
text2: Wʉ ' ponsi ' kɨ Sises u ' tɨsa ' a ' tai , anpisin ton nɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' uya e ' ma ' pʉka ' pʉ .

text: And , behold , there came a leper and worshipped him , saying , Lord , if thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Erekʉ ' pan ka ' pon uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' , mɨrɨpan e ' sekunka ' pʉ irau . Mɨrɨpan uya , “ Uyepuru , ɨnku ' pai ɨwesi yau , wakʉ pe rɨ ukupʉ auya , ” ta ' pʉ .

text: And Jesus put forth his hand , and touched him , saying , I will ; be thou clean . And immediately his leprosy was cleansed .
text2: Temiyatʉ ɨnka ' pʉ Sises uya , mɨrɨpan uya a ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨnku ' pai rɨ e ' ai ' , wakʉ pe e ' kɨ ! ” ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' . Inke pʉra rɨ , tʉwereei apai iyekoneka ' pʉ .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , See thou tell no man ; but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer the gift that Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya , “ Ɨnʉ ' pɨ ' rɨ kʉsekamai , ” ta ' pʉ , “ e ' tane enta ɨsenpoikata use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin ena ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨntʉrʉnʉ pe te ' sen Mosi ' uya tasa ' na ' ne ' awɨrɨ mʉtʉrʉi ' . Mɨrɨ uya rɨ nin si ɨusepi ' tɨsa ' ekama mɨrɨ to ' pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when Jesus was entered into Capernaum , there came unto him a centurion , beseeching him ,
text2: Sises epa ' kasa ' a ' tai , Ka ' paneyan pona , soisa amʉ ' epuru uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' tʉpika ' tɨto ' pe iya ekama ' pose ' na .

text: And saying , Lord , my servant lieth at home sick of the palsy , grievously tormented .
text2: “ Uyepuru , upoitorʉ man ipan pe e ' ne ' pe iyesi , ipu ' tɨka ' sa ' te ' kwe ' tau rɨ iyesi , pata po , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , I will come and heal him .
text2: “ Miyarɨ rɨ utɨ mɨrɨ epi ' tɨi ' , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya ipɨ ' .

text: The centurion answered and said , Lord , I am not worthy that thou shouldest come under my roof : but speak the word only , and my servant shall be healed .
text2: Soisa amʉ ' epuru uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Uyepuru , uiwʉ ' ta ' ɨuyepʉ pokena ' pen nɨ urɨ . Amaimu rɨken itʉkɨ ; mɨrɨ a ' tai , upoitorʉ usepi ' tɨto ' pe .

text: For I am a man under authority , having soldiers under me : and I say to this man , Go , and he goeth ; and to another , Come , and he cometh ; and to my servant , Do this , and he doeth it .
text2: Apʉne pʉra urɨ kʉrɨ rɨ tepuru kenan , soisa amʉ ' esa ' uwo ' noro te ' san . Pʉse pɨ ' , ‘ Enta , ’ ta uya a ' tai , itɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kʉrɨ pɨ ' , ‘ Ɨsi ' kɨ , ’ ta uya a ' tai , iyepʉ . Upoitorʉ pɨ ' , ‘ Se iku ' kɨ , ’ ta uya a ' tai , ikupʉ iya , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: When Jesus heard it , he marvelled , and said to them that followed , Verily I say unto you , I have not found so great faith , no , not in Israel .
text2: Sises uya serɨ etasa ' a ' tai , isewansiuka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ tʉpɨkɨrɨ te ' san ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' , “ I ' napairon ekama uya serɨ ɨpɨ ' nokon , ɨnʉ ' rɨ eposa ' uya pʉra rɨ man Esuwerʉ po eke rɨ serɨ waraino apurɨto ' esa ' .

text: And I say unto you , That many shall come from the east and west , and shall sit down with Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob , in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Ta uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , tu ' kan kon nɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' uye ' to ' oton pata wʉi enu uyepʉ , wʉi enu utɨ winɨ ' ne , mɨrɨpan kon ereutato ' oton enta ' nan pɨ ' Epʉra ' an , Aisi ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Seko ' pokon pe Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe yau .

text: But the children of the kingdom shall be cast out into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: E ' tane esa ' wannɨ pe e ' nɨto ' yau te ' ton kon tasa ' kon nʉ ' san eno ' mato ' iya oton ewarupɨ ya ' , ukaran nɨto ' oton , ɨ e ' kɨtɨtɨi ' mato ' oton ya ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus said unto the centurion , Go thy way ; and as thou hast believed , so be it done unto thee . And his servant was healed in the selfsame hour .
text2: Mɨrɨpan soisa amʉ ' epuru pɨ ' Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Enna ' po ' , anapurɨnʉ awɨrɨ rɨ ɨpoitorʉ usepi ' tɨ mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨ a ' tai rɨ , ipoitorʉ usepi ' tɨ ' pʉ .

text: And when Jesus was come into Peter ' s house , he saw his wife ' s mother laid , and sick of a fever .
text2: Sises utɨ ' pʉ Pi ' ta iwʉ ' ta ' . Mɨrɨ yau , Pi ' ta ewo ' pʉ ene ' pʉ iya te ' kwe ' tau e ' kɨɨi ' man pɨ ' .

text: And he touched her hand , and the fever left her : and she arose , and ministered unto them .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya itemiyatʉ pɨ ' a ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ a ' tai rɨ , iye ' kɨɨi ' mato ' ereuta ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ to ' mʉta ' napase ' na .

text: When the even was come , they brought unto him many that were possessed with devils : and he cast out the spirits with his word , and healed all that were sick :
text2: Pata uko ' mansa ' a ' tai , ka ' pon amʉ ' uya tu ' kan kon nɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' makoi a ' kwarʉ yen ton pe te ' san nee ' pʉ Sises piya ' . Se kasa rɨ tʉusauro ' se makoi a ' kwarʉ ton ennoko ' pʉ iya , tanporo rɨ takuru ' kena ' nan epi ' tɨ ' pʉ iya .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying , Himself took our infirmities , and bare our sicknesses .
text2: Serɨ ton kupʉ ' pʉ iya pena pu ' kena ' Aisaya nekama ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ a ' ku ' tɨ pe : “ Ɨ ' sɨ ' mʉra e ' nɨto ' mo ' ka ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan uya uyeparan kon arɨ ' pʉ , ” tawon .

text: Now when Jesus saw great multitudes about him , he gave commandment to depart unto the other side .
text2: Sises uya anpisin ensa ' a ' tai tʉwoi , tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' , “ Parau ku ' pɨri ratoi pona e ' kwɨrɨ ' nɨpai ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And a certain scribe came , and said unto him , Master , I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest .
text2: Mɨrɨpan Main pɨ ' enupanin uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' , “ Uyepuru , siya rɨ mʉtɨyai ' ne ' ya ' rɨ aya ' kɨrɨ utɨ serɨ , ” tase ' na ipɨ ' .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , The foxes have holes , and the birds of the air have nests ; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Maikan amʉ ' kamoro tenkena ' nan , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ toron amʉ ' kanan esi tʉpon ke , e ' tane Ka ' pon , Papa winon esi mɨrɨ ti ' pai nonkato ' iya yau pʉn nɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And another of his disciples said unto him , Lord , suffer me first to go and bury my father .
text2: Tʉron nɨ kanan ka ' pon Sises poitorʉ pe e ' paino uya , “ Uyepuru , apʉne ken si , wapiya ukʉipʉnʉ siu ' na ' tɨka ' tai ' , ” ta ' pʉ .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Follow me ; and let the dead bury their dead .
text2: E ' tane Sises uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Tɨwɨ tʉ ' koro ' tau ' nokon te ' sen eri ' sa ' u ' na ' tɨi to ' ; uya ' kɨrɨ ru ' ku utɨnpai , ” ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' .

text: And when he was entered into a ship , his disciples followed him .
text2: Sises ekanwa ' tɨ ' pʉ kanau ya ' , mɨrɨpan a ' kɨrɨ ipoitorʉ ton utɨ ' pʉ .

text: And , behold , there arose a great tempest in the sea , insomuch that the ship was covered with the waves : but he was asleep .
text2: Mɨrɨ koro ' tau , ite ' kwanau pʉra rɨ pana ' pe , ɨsɨ pe rɨ a ' setun uyee ' pʉ parau ku ' pɨri ka ' , mɨrɨpan uya eke pe rɨ sipa ' sipa kupʉ ' pʉ tuna pʉro ' po . Eke pe sipa ' sipa esi uya to ' kanwa paru ' tɨ esi ' pʉ , e ' tane rɨ Sises esi ' pʉ e ' nʉn nɨ pɨ ' .

text: And his disciples came to him , and awoke him , saying , Lord , save us : we perish .
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton utɨ ' pʉ ipiya ' enpakase ' na , ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' , “ Ina epuru ! Ina ipika ' tɨkɨ ! Ina aputan pɨ ' man ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he saith unto them , Why are ye fearful , O ye of little faith ? Then he arose , and rebuked the winds and the sea ; and there was a great calm .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon , aiko rʉ ' kwɨ apurɨto ' iya to ' ton , ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' ɨyetʉipɨtʉ kon ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . Iye ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya a ' setun mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ sipa ' sipa eseremekʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan e ' nɨ ' pamʉ ' pʉ .

text: But the men marvelled , saying , What manner of man is this , that even the winds and the sea obey him !
text2: Kamoro si ka ' pon amʉ ' usewansiuka ' pʉ mɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan kon usekama ' popɨtʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pan si pʉse rɨ ka ' pon ? A ' setun mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ sipa ' sipa rɨ e ' to ' imaimu awɨrɨ ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And when he was come to the other side into the country of the Gergesenes , there met him two possessed with devils , coming out of the tombs , exceeding fierce , so that no man might pass by that way .
text2: Sises mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipoitorʉ ton uya si parau ku ' pɨri Kiyarari nʉ ' kwɨrɨ ' nʉ ' sa ' a ' tai , ka ' pon amʉ ' Katara nono po tʉuko ' mansan , asa ' ron kon makoi a ' kwarʉ yen ton pe te ' san uyee ' pʉ uruwai ' apai to ' winɨkʉi ' . Ɨsɨ ton nɨ , ɨnʉ ' utɨ pokena ' pen nɨ mɨrɨ awɨrɨ .

text: And , behold , they cried out , saying , What have we to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of God ? art thou come hither to torment us before the time ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe ina ku ' se ' na ɨuye ' sa ' , Papa Mumu ? Iweyu rawɨrɨ rɨ pe ' ina kota ' mai ' ɨuye ' sa ' ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And there was a good way off from them an herd of many swine feeding .
text2: Ɨnnɨ kuru pʉra rɨ to ' piyapai tu ' kan kon nɨ peiruku amʉ ' esi ' pʉ enta ' nan pɨ ' .

text: So the devils besought him , saying , If thou cast us out , suffer us to go away into the herd of swine .
text2: Makoi a ' kwarʉ yen ton uya Sises ekama ' po ' pʉ ipan pe , “ Ina ken si ennoko auya a ' tai pʉsamo ka ' pon amʉ ' apai , apʉne ken si ina enno ' kɨ kamo tu ' kan kon peiruku amʉ ' ya ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he said unto them , Go . And when they were come out , they went into the herd of swine : and , behold , the whole herd of swine ran violently down a steep place into the sea , and perished in the waters .
text2: “ Entantɨ ' si , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya to ' pɨ ' . To ' epa ' ka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon utɨ ' pʉ peiruku amʉ ' ya ' ewonse ' na . Tanporo rɨ si kamoro peiruku amʉ ' eka ' tumʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ parau ku ' pɨri ka ' tepitoren awɨrɨ rɨ , mɨrɨpan kon aputapɨtʉ ' pʉ .

text: And they that kept them fled , and went their ways into the city , and told every thing , and what was befallen to the possessed of the devils .
text2: Mɨrɨ yau , to ' mainanpa pɨ ' te ' san eka ' tumʉ ' pʉ pata pona , mɨrɨpan kon uya tanporo iye ' ku ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ ekama ' pʉ ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' . To ' uya rɨ nɨrɨ kamo makoi a ' kwarʉ yen ton pe te ' san ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' iye ' ku ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ ekama ' pʉ .

text: And , behold , the whole city came out to meet Jesus : and when they saw him , they besought him that he would depart out of their coasts .
text2: Mɨrɨpan tanporo rɨ mɨrɨ pata yau te ' san ka ' pon amʉ ' utɨ ' pʉ Sises ense ' na . To ' uya Sises ensa ' a ' tai , tʉnono kon apai iyenna ' poto ' pe ipan pe to ' uya auro ' ka ' pʉ .

text: And he entered into a ship , and passed over , and came into his own city .
text2: Sises mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipoitorʉ ton ekanwa ' tɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon ɨ ' kwɨrɨtʉ ' pʉ . To ' uyee ' pʉ tʉpata ' se ' kon ya ' .

text: And , behold , they brought to him a man sick of the palsy , lying on a bed : and Jesus seeing their faith said unto the sick of the palsy ; Son , be of good cheer ; thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Tʉron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uya ipu ' tɨka ' sa ' nee ' pʉ Sises piya ' . Sises uya pʉsamoro ka ' pon amʉ ' napurɨnʉ ene ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ipu ' tɨka ' sa ' pɨ ' , “ Utonpa , kenari ' nʉmʉi , amakooi pɨ ' usentu ' masa ' man , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And , behold , certain of the scribes said within themselves , This man blasphemeth .
text2: Serɨ etasa ' Main pɨ ' enupanin nan tonpa ton uya a ' tai , “ Pʉse rɨ ka ' pon usaurokʉ Papa sapema pe rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya tewan kon yau .

text: And Jesus knowing their thoughts said , Wherefore think ye evil in your hearts ?
text2: Sises uya to ' usenuminkato ' i ' tu ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨto ' pe ɨri pe rɨ ɨusenuminka kon ɨyewan kon yau ?

text: For whether is easier , to say , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and walk ?
text2: Nai esi sa ' man pe pʉra : ‘ Amakooi pɨ ' usentu ' ma , ’ ta ; mɨrɨ pe pʉra , ‘ E ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' , asakɨ , ’ ta katɨ ipu ' tɨka ' sa ' pɨ ' ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( then saith he to the sick of the palsy , ) Arise , take up thy bed , and go unto thine house .
text2: I ' tu kon pa , Ka ' pon , Papa winon piyau meruntɨ esi serɨ non po makoi pɨ ' usentu ' man nɨto ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Sises uya ta ' pʉ ipu ' tɨka ' sa ' ka ' pon pɨ ' , “ E ' mʉ ' sa ' kakɨ , ayapon anʉnkɨ , enna ' pokɨ si apata ' se ' ya ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' .

text: And he arose , and departed to his house .
text2: Pʉse rɨ ka ' pon ena ' pʉ wakʉ pe , mɨrɨpan e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' , enna ' po ' pʉ tʉpata ' se ' ya ' .

text: But when the multitudes saw it , they marvelled , and glorified God , which had given such power unto men .
text2: Serɨ ensa ' tʉuya ' nokon a ' tai , ipan pe rɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' enari ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ . To ' uya si Papa apurɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ eke rɨ serɨ meruntɨ tʉsa ' iya pɨ ' ka ' pon amʉ ' ena ' .

text: And as Jesus passed forth from thence , he saw a man , named Matthew , sitting at the receipt of custom : and he saith unto him , Follow me . And he arose , and followed him .
text2: Sises uya si mɨrɨ pata nɨmɨ a ' tai , ka ' pon ereutasa ' ene ' pʉ iya pʉrata amʉranʉ ' nin pe e ' nɨ iwʉ ' tau , Ma ' siu itese ' . Sises uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ɨsi ' kɨ upoitorʉ pe , Ma ' siu , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨpan e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ , iya ' kɨrɨ itɨ ' pʉ .

text: And it came to pass , as Jesus sat at meat in the house , behold , many publicans and sinners came and sat down with him and his disciples .
text2: Sises enta ' na koro ' tau Ma ' siu iwʉ ' tau , tu ' kan kon nɨ pʉrata amʉranʉ ' nin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉmakooikena ' nan uyee ' pʉ ipokon pe enta ' nase ' na , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipoitorʉ ton pokon pe rɨ nɨrɨ .

text: And when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto his disciples , Why eateth your Master with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai si , Pari ' si amʉ ' uya serɨ ensa ' a ' tai , ta ' pʉ to ' uya Sises poitorʉ ton pɨ ' , “ Ɨ ' rɨto ' pe ɨti ' saai kon enta ' na pʉrata amʉranʉ ' nin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉmakooikena ' nan pokon pe rɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: But when Jesus heard that , he said unto them , They that be whole need not a physician , but they that are sick .
text2: Sises uya to ' eta ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon pɨ ' ta ' pʉ iya , “ Atu ' ka ' pon esi pen mɨrɨ ta ' ta i ' se e ' tane , takuru ' kenan esi i ' se .

text: But go ye and learn what that meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice : for I am not come to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Ɨsenupatantɨ ' , ɨ ' rɨ ta iya e ' kwa pe serɨ esi tukai ' : ‘ Ka ' pon amʉ ' i ' se esi ɨsentu ' kena ' pe , o ' ke tʉuse ' masan i ' se esi pen , ’ tawon . Uye ' sa ' serɨ ipokena ' ton ka ' pon amʉ ' kɨ ' mai ' pen , e ' tane uye ' sa ' serɨ tʉmakooikena ' nan kɨ ' mase ' na , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then came to him the disciples of John , saying , Why do we and the Pharisees fast oft , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo , Isaan poitorʉ ton uyee ' pʉ Sises piya ' . To ' uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' ina mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pari ' si amʉ ' useruma tenta ' nai ' pʉra , e ' tane ɨpoitorʉ ton useruma pʉra iyesi ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber mourn , as long as the bridegroom is with them ? but the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken from them , and then shall they fast .
text2: Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Nai kasa warawo ' temari ' masen nʉkɨ ' ma ' san esi tʉuta ' kwarʉkai ' ukaran nɨ pɨ ' tʉpiyau ' nokon nɨ iye ' tane ? Iweyu rɨ e ' seporo mɨrɨ temari ' masen utanʉnto ' oton to ' piyapai , mɨrɨ a ' tai nin si to ' useruma mɨrɨ tenta ' nai ' pʉra , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: No man putteth a piece of new cloth unto an old garment , for that which is put in to fill it up taketh from the garment , and the rent is made worse .
text2: Sises uya rɨ ta ' pʉ , “ Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ pon pooi ' pɨ pona pon atʉ punu ' pɨ a ' si ' tɨ pʉra rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ ; emenna ' pon punu ' pɨ uya ipooi ' pɨ pon karaka mɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan uya eke pe iteuta kupʉ mɨrɨ .

text: Neither do men put new wine into old bottles : else the bottles break , and the wine runneth out , and the bottles perish : but they put new wine into new bottles , and both are preserved .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ , ka ' pon amʉ ' uya emenna ' waain entɨ pʉra iyesi mɨrɨ ipooi ' pɨ iten ya ' . Mɨrɨ ku ' sa ' to ' uya a ' tai , emenna ' waain uya penaro ' rʉ ' pʉ iten toi ' kwa rɨ mɨrɨ ; mɨrɨ tʉpo , asa ' rɨ rɨ marɨ waain mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iten uma ' tasa ' rɨ mɨrɨ . Ka ' pon amʉ ' uya emenna ' waain entɨto ' pe iyesi emenna ' iten ya ' . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , asa ' rɨ rɨ marɨ wakʉ pe iyesi mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: While he spake these things unto them , behold , there came a certain ruler , and worshipped him , saying , My daughter is even now dead : but come and lay thy hand upon her , and she shall live .
text2: Serɨ rɨ ta Sises uya koro ' tau , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' . Iye ' sekunka ' pʉ Sises rakʉi ' , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Uyensi uma ' tasa ' man serɨ pe rɨ , e ' tane uya ' kɨrɨ ɨsi ' kɨ uiwʉ ' ta ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ a ' pɨ ' tanʉ ' kɨ ito ' panto ' pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus arose , and followed him , and so did his disciples .
text2: Sises e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ iya ' kɨrɨ . Ipoitorʉ ton nɨ nɨrɨ utɨ ' pʉ iya ' kɨrɨ .

text: And , behold , a woman , which was diseased with an issue of blood twelve years , came behind him , and touched the hem of his garment :
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai rɨ , uri ' san , mʉn ennoko pɨ ' te ' sen uyee ' pʉ ipɨkɨrɨ , ipon e ' pi a ' pɨ ' se ' na . Mɨrɨ pɨ ' iko ' mansa ' esi ' pʉ 12 kaisa rɨ wʉipiya .

text: For she said within herself , If I may but touch his garment , I shall be whole .
text2: Tewan yau rʉ ' kwɨ rɨ , “ Sises pon nɨ a ' pɨ ' sa ' uya yau , usepi ' tɨ rɨ mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But Jesus turned him about , and when he saw her , he said , Daughter , be of good comfort ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And the woman was made whole from that hour .
text2: Sises era ' tɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ene ' pʉ . Ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' , “ Kɨsewankamai , ma ' non . Papa uya ɨyepi ' tɨsa ' mɨrɨ , apʉne pʉra apurɨ auya ke , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya ipɨ ' . Mɨrɨ a ' tai rɨ , uri ' san usepi ' tɨ ' pʉ .

text: And when Jesus came into the ruler ' s house , and saw the minstrels and the people making a noise ,
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises ewomʉ ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru iwʉ ' ta ' . Mɨrɨ yau , ka ' pon amʉ ' , sarakuwa turunpa pɨ ' te ' san mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉron kon ukaran nɨ pɨ ' te ' san ene tʉuya a ' tai ,

text: He said unto them , Give place : for the maid is not dead , but sleepeth . And they laughed him to scorn .
text2: ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ Entantɨ ' , iyeri ' sa ' pen mɨrɨ ; iye ' nʉnsa ' rɨ nin mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya . E ' tane to ' uta ' kɨrɨ ' pʉ ipɨ ' .

text: But when the people were put forth , he went in , and took her by the hand , and the maid arose .
text2: Pʉroroi pona to ' enpa ' ka tʉpo , ɨutɨ ta ' iyewomʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya uri ' san anʉmʉ ' pʉ itemiyatʉ pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan uto ' pamʉ ' pʉ .

text: And the fame hereof went abroad into all that land .
text2: Mɨrɨpan ekareei utɨ ' pʉ siya rɨ mɨrɨ nono kaisarɨ rɨ .

text: And when Jesus departed thence , two blind men followed him , crying , and saying , Thou Son of David , have mercy on us .
