text2: Sises uya si mɨrɨ pata nɨmɨ koro ' tau , asa ' ron kon tenku ' na ' nan uya e ' ma ' pʉka ' pʉ . To ' ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉ ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ɨmɨrɨ , Tepi ' pa rʉ ' pʉ , ina pɨ ' ɨsentu ' ma ' ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And when he was come into the house , the blind men came to him : and Jesus saith unto them , Believe ye that I am able to do this ? They said unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai si ɨutɨ ta ' Sises ewonka ' sa ' koro ' tau , to ' uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' . To ' ekama ' po ' pʉ iya , “ Mapurɨyatʉu pe ' ɨyepi ' tɨ uya ' nokon tukai ' ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨpan kon uya si ta ' pʉ , “ Ewai ' , Uyepuru , ina uya rɨ ayapurɨ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Then touched he their eyes , saying , According to your faith be it unto you .
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo , Sises uya to ' enu a ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ , “ Ɨsepi ' tɨtɨ ' si , apurɨ auya ' nokon ke , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And their eyes were opened ; and Jesus straitly charged them , saying , See that no man know it .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ennin nan pe si to ' ena ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ tʉpo , Sises uya ta ' pʉ ipan pe to ' pɨ ' , “ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ kʉ ' pana ' tɨtʉu serɨ pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But they , when they were departed , spread abroad his fame in all that country .
text2: E ' tane rɨ to ' utɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya serɨ si itekareei ekama ' pʉ siya rɨ mɨrɨ nono kaisarɨ rɨ .

text: As they went out , behold , they brought to him a dumb man possessed with a devil .
text2: To ' utɨka ' tane rɨ , ka ' pon amʉ ' uya makoi yen , tʉusauro ' sen pen ka ' pon nee ' pʉ Sises piya ' .

text: And when the devil was cast out , the dumb spake : and the multitudes marvelled , saying , It was never so seen in Israel .
text2: Mɨrɨpan enpa ' kasa ' iya a ' tai , isaurokʉ ' pʉ . Ipan pe rɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' usewansiuka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya ta ' pʉ , “ Serɨ waraino e ' kupʉ ensa ' pʉra rɨ iyesi wapiya Esuwerʉ po ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: But the Pharisees said , He casteth out devils through the prince of the devils .
text2: E ' tane Pari ' si amʉ ' uya ta ' pʉ , “ Makoi amʉ ' epuru winɨ makoi amʉ ' enpa ' kapɨtʉ iya , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And Jesus went about all the cities and villages , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing every sickness and every disease among the people .
text2: Sises utɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ tanporon eke iwa ton pata yau ' ne , mɨrɨpan uya ka ' pon amʉ ' enupa ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' usenupato ' iwʉ ' tau ' ne . Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe ekareei ekama ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan uya tanporo ka ' pon amʉ ' epi ' tɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ ti ' tui ' pʉra paran pɨ ' takuru ' ke te ' san .

text: But when he saw the multitudes , he was moved with compassion on them , because they fainted , and were scattered abroad , as sheep having no shepherd .
text2: Tu ' kan kon ka ' pon amʉ ' ensa ' tʉuya a ' tai , to ' pɨ ' isentu ' ma ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra ipan pe rɨ usewankaman pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tiwano ' kon pe to ' epika ' tɨ poken pʉra rɨ to ' esi pɨ ' . To ' esi ' pʉ karimeru amʉ ' ipa ' simanin pʉnon kon kasa .

text: Then saith he unto his disciples , The harvest truly is plenteous , but the labourers are few ;
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' , “ Eke pe rɨ umɨ yau kiyari akʉ ' pʉsa ' tanʉnsen man e ' tane , tu ' ke pʉra tʉrawaso amʉ ' amʉranʉ ' nin nan esi .

text: Pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he will send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: Umɨ esa ' ekama ' potɨ ' , ka ' pon amʉ ' enno ' to ' pe iya kiyari akʉ ' pʉsa ' anʉmʉ amʉranʉ ' nin nan pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when he had called unto him his twelve disciples , he gave them power against unclean spirits , to cast them out , and to heal all manner of sickness and all manner of disease .
text2: 12 kaisaron kon tʉpoitorʉ ton kɨ ' ma ' pʉ iya tʉpiya ' , mɨrɨpan kon repa ' pʉ iya ɨri a ' kwarʉ pa ' kato ' meruntɨrʉ ke , ti ' tui ' pʉra rɨ paran ton pɨ ' takuru ' ke ' ne te ' san nɨrɨ epi ' tɨpɨ ' nin nan pe .

text: Now the names of the twelve apostles are these ; The first , Simon , who is called Peter , and Andrew his brother ; James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother ;
text2: Pʉsamoro na ' ne ' 12 kaisaron kon enno ' sa ' kon ese ' ton : wapiya Saiman ( Pi ' ta tukai ' tesa ' sen ) , iyakon Anturu ; Isens , Sepiti mu , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyakon Isaan ;

text: Philip , and Bartholomew ; Thomas , and Matthew the publican ; James the son of Alphaeus , and Lebbaeus , whose surname was Thaddaeus ;
text2: Piri ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pa ' taramiu ; Tamas , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Ma ' siu , Roman kopʉnaai ena ' use ' man nɨto ' amʉranʉ ' nin ; Isens ( Arʉ ' piyas mu ) , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Tatiyas ;

text: Simon the Canaanite , and Judas Iscariot , who also betrayed him .
text2: Saiman , Usera ' tukai ' tesa ' sen ; mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Isutas Eskariya ' , eparankanin pe iyesi ' pʉ na ' ne ' .

text: These twelve Jesus sent forth , and commanded them , saying , Go not into the way of the Gentiles , and into any city of the Samaritans enter ye not :
text2: Pʉsamoro 12 kaisaron kon tʉpoitorʉ ton ennoko ' pʉ iya to ' tauro ' kai ' se kasa : “ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' ton pen nɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' piya ' kʉtɨtʉu , mɨrɨ pe pʉra kepa ' katʉu Sameriya pata ton ya ' rɨ .

text: But go rather to the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: E ' tane Esuwerʉ amʉ ' piya ' entantɨ ' , karimeru utano ' masa ' waraino kon piya ' .

text: And as ye go , preach , saying , The kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Ɨutɨ kon pe rɨ , serɨ itekare mekamatʉi ' : ‘ A ' ko pe Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe man , ’ tukai ' .

text: Heal the sick , cleanse the lepers , raise the dead , cast out devils : freely ye have received , freely give .
text2: Takuru ' kenan kon ka ' pon amʉ ' mepi ' tɨtʉi ' , iyeri ' sa ' kon nɨrɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' mi ' mʉ ' sa ' kapɨ ' tʉi ' . Ere ' pɨ ' te ' san mepi ' tɨtʉi ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨri a ' kwarʉ ton menpa ' kapɨ ' tʉi ' . Te ' mai ' pʉra eposa ' auya ' nokon kasa rɨ , te ' mai ' pʉra mʉtʉtʉi ' .

text: Provide neither gold , nor silver , nor brass in your purses ,
text2: Korʉ , sirʉpa , ka ' pa rɨ kʉsatʉu ɨpokʉrʉʉi kon yau ;

text: Nor scrip for your journey , neither two coats , neither shoes , nor yet staves : for the workman is worthy of his meat .
text2: paiki , sapato , teke ' sen , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tu ' ke ipona ɨpon kon kʉsatʉu aya ' kɨrɨ ' nokon , apʉne pʉra tʉrawaso amʉ ' pe ɨwesi kon , mɨrɨ epe ' pʉ rɨ eporo auya ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And into whatsoever city or town ye shall enter , inquire who in it is worthy ; and there abide till ye go thence .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Eke iwa pata ya ' ɨutɨ kon a ' tai , wakʉ pe tiwʉ ' kon ta ' ɨyereutanʉ ' nin kon mɨnentʉi ' . Itiwʉ ' tau me ' tʉi ' inɨmɨ auya ' nokon pona rɨ .

text: And when ye come into an house , salute it .
text2: To ' iwʉ ' ta ' ɨyewomʉ kon a ' tai , ‘ Miyarɨ , ’ mʉkatʉi ' .

text: And if the house be worthy , let your peace come upon it : but if it be not worthy , let your peace return to you .
text2: To ' uya ɨyereutanʉkʉ kon a ' tai , tɨwɨ ‘ Miyarɨ , ’ ta ' pʉ auya ' nokon nɨ ne ' nonkai to ' pona . Mɨrɨ kupʉ to ' uya pʉra iyesi a ' tai ɨpɨ ' nokon , mʉna ' potʉi ' to ' piyapai .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear your words , when ye depart out of that house or city , shake off the dust of your feet .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ wakʉ pe ɨyereutanʉkʉ kon pʉra iyesi yau , mɨrɨ pe pʉra amaimu kon eta to ' uya pʉra iyesi yau , a ' ta kon mʉtɨutɨpɨ ' tʉi ' mɨrɨ pata nɨmɨ auya ' nokon a ' tai .

text: Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , Satan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Komora uya imoronka poken parɨ iye ' to ' oton eseru aimenka weyu a ' tai mɨrɨ pata uya imoronka entai iye ' tane , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Behold , I send you forth as sheep in the midst of wolves : be ye therefore wise as serpents , and harmless as doves .
text2: Sises esi ' pʉ miyarɨ rɨ 12 kaisaron kon tʉpoitorʉ ton auro ' ka pɨ ' . Ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ Ɨyennoko uya ' nokon serɨ ɨri ton ka ' pon amʉ ' koro ' ta ' , karimeru ennoko kasa ɨsɨ ton , ene amʉ ' koro ' tau . Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , emepoke ' pe me ' tʉi ' ɨkʉi kasa , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨsɨ pe pʉra wako ' wa kasa me ' tʉi ' .

text: But beware of men : for they will deliver you up to the councils , and they will scourge you in their synagogues ;
text2: Tenu ke nɨrɨ me ' tʉi ' ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' ; to ' uya ɨtʉto ' oton kon mɨrɨ pata epuru ton ena ' . To ' uya nɨrɨ ayari ' po ' pɨ ' to ' oton kon mɨrɨ tʉusenupato ' kon iwʉ ' tau ' ne .

text: And ye shall be brought before governors and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them and the Gentiles .
text2: To ' uya ayato ' oton kon mɨrɨ kopʉna mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kin amʉ ' piya ' urɨ wenai , urɨ ekama kon pa Esuwerʉ amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen pɨ ' .

text: But when they deliver you up , take no thought how or what ye shall speak : for it shall be given you in that same hour what ye shall speak .
text2: E ' tane kɨsewankamatʉu to ' uya aya ' sisa ' kon a ' tai , ɨ ' rɨ ta uya , nai kasa ta uya tukai ' . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , amaimu ' tɨ uya ' nokon mɨrɨ .

text: For it is not ye that speak , but the Spirit of your Father which speaketh in you .
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon pe ausaurokʉ kon pen mɨrɨ , e ' tane ɨkʉipʉnʉ kon A ' kwarʉ usauro ' to ' oton mɨrɨ ayawɨrɨ ' nokon .

text: And the brother shall deliver up the brother to death , and the father the child : and the children shall rise up against their parents , and cause them to be put to death .
text2: “ Eri ' nɨto ' ya ' tʉrui eparankato ' oton iyakon uya , ikʉipʉnʉ uya nɨrɨ tʉmʉre ; mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ , mʉre amʉ ' enato ' oton tʉsan kon amʉ ' ewa ' noma pɨ ' to ' eri ' to ' ya ' to ' tʉrʉ pɨ ' .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that endureth to the end shall be saved .
text2: Urɨ wenai tu ' kan kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uya ɨyewaruma ' tɨto ' oton kon , e ' tane kʉrɨ rɨ pana ' pe ne ' mʉ ' sa ' kayai ' ne ' iu ' matʉ pona rɨ epika ' tɨto ' oton mɨrɨ .

text: But when they persecute you in this city , flee ye into another : for verily I say unto you , Ye shall not have gone over the cities of Israel , till the Son of man be come .
text2: To ' uya pata yau ɨkota ' ma kon a ' tai , tʉron nɨ pata ya ' mapʉrʉntʉi ' . I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pata ton awɨrɨ ɨutɨto ' kon i ' ma ' kasa ' auya ' nokon pʉra iye ' tane Ka ' pon , Papa winon uye ' to ' oton , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: The disciple is not above his master , nor the servant above his lord .
text2: Sises uya rɨ ta ' pʉ , “ Tʉusenupasen esi pʉra iyesi tʉti ' saai entai , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ipoitorʉ pe te ' sen tesa ' entai .

text: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master , and the servant as his lord . If they have called the master of the house Beelzebub , how much more shall they call them of his household ?
text2: Tʉusenupasen e ' to ' pe iyesi tʉti ' saai kasa , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipoitorʉ kanan tesa ' kasa rɨ . Ɨutɨ esa ' pe te ' sen esakʉ pe iyesi yau Pirɨsipupʉ tukai ' , mɨrɨ entai kuru rɨ si to ' uya itiwʉ ' tawon kon esakʉ !

text: Fear them not therefore : for there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; and hid , that shall not be known .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ pɨ ' , to ' pɨ ' kenari ' nʉntʉu . Ɨ ' rɨ pʉra rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ iwapu ' tɨsa ' te ' nɨponkasen pen , mɨrɨ pe pʉra onansa ' i ' tu pʉra te ' sen .

text: What I tell you in darkness , that speak ye in light : and what ye hear in the ear , that preach ye upon the housetops .
text2: Ewarupɨ yau kanpana ' tɨyatʉi ' ne ' ekamatɨ ' wʉi nai ; apana kon ya ' ɨyetarerumʉ ' pʉ kon ekamatɨ ' ɨutɨ nakapu ponsi ' kɨ .

text: And fear not them which kill the body , but are not able to kill the soul : but rather fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell .
text2: Ɨpun kon wɨnin nan pɨ ' kenari ' nʉntʉu , aya ' kwarʉ kon wɨnin nan pen nɨ pɨ ' . E ' tane ru ' ku , kʉrɨ pɨ ' enari ' nʉntɨ ' , asa ' rɨ rɨ marɨ ɨpun mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ aya ' kwarʉ wɨnin pɨ ' ekota ' man nɨto ' yau .

text: Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing ? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father .
text2: Asa ' ron kon pe ' toron amʉ ' tekʉrʉpo ' pomasan pen tikin nan pʉrata punu ' pɨ kaisa rɨ ? E ' tane tikin nan nɨ to ' tonpa uta ' mo ' ka pen mɨrɨ non pona ɨkʉipʉnʉ wanmʉra .

text: But the very hairs of your head are all numbered .
text2: A ' pai i ' po ' tu ' kanoro esi tanporo i ' tusa ' pe .

text: Fear ye not therefore , ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai , kenari ' nʉntʉu , i ' nʉnkena ' ton ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon , tu ' kan kon toron amʉ ' entaino kon .

text: Whosoever therefore shall confess me before men , him will I confess also before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: “ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ uyekamayai ' ne ' , ‘ I ' nai rɨ iyesi tukai ' , ’ ka ' pon amʉ ' rau , urɨ uya rɨ nɨrɨ ekama , ‘ I ' nai rɨ iyesi tukai ' , ’ ukʉipʉnʉ , Epʉn pon rau .

text: But whosoever shall deny me before men , him will I also deny before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: E ' tane ɨnʉ ' rɨ , unonkayai ' ne ' ka ' pon amʉ ' rau , urɨ uya rɨ nɨrɨ inonka mɨrɨ ukʉipʉnʉ , Epʉn pon rau .

text: Think not that I am come to send peace on earth : I came not to send peace , but a sword .
text2: “ Serɨ non pona tʉusewankamai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' ne ' sa ' uya tukai ' ke ' tʉu , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya . “ Tʉusewankamai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' ne ' se ' na uye ' sa ' pen , e ' tane supara ne ' sa ' uya .

text: For I am come to set a man at variance against his father , and the daughter against her mother , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: Apʉne pʉra uye ' sa ' rɨ tasa ' : “ ‘ warawo ' era ' tɨto ' pe tʉkʉipʉnʉ ewa ' noma pɨ ' , uri ' san tʉsan ewa ' noma pɨ ' , ipa ' se tewo ' pʉ ewa ' noma pɨ ' — ka ' pon eyaton pe itiwʉ ' tawon kon nɨ enato ' oton , ’ ” tawon .

text: He that loveth father or mother more than me is not worthy of me : and he that loveth son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ tʉkʉipʉnʉ , tʉsan i ' nʉnkanin urɨ i ' nʉnka tʉuya entai esi mɨrɨ upoitorʉ ye ' pe pʉra rɨ . Ɨnʉ ' rɨ kʉrɨ tʉmu , mɨrɨ pe pʉra tensi i ' nʉnkanin urɨ i ' nʉnka tʉuya entai esi mɨrɨ upoitorʉ ye ' pe pʉra rɨ ,

text: And he that taketh not his cross , and followeth after me , is not worthy of me .
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨnʉ ' rɨ tʉkurusukuui tanʉnse upɨkɨrɨ ɨtɨpai pʉra na ' ne ' esi uiwano ' pe pʉra .

text: He that findeth his life shall lose it : and he that loseth his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ kʉrɨ tʉuko ' manto ' eporo pɨ ' na ' ne ' uya tʉuko ' manto ' nonka rɨ mɨrɨ . Ɨnʉ ' rɨ kʉrɨ tʉuko ' manto ' nonkanin nʉ ' pʉ uwenai uya tʉuko ' manto ' epoto ' oton mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: He that receiveth you receiveth me , and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ miyarɨ rɨ , “ Kʉrɨ ayanʉnyai ' ne ' uya uyanʉmʉ rɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kʉrɨ uyanʉnyai ' ne ' uya kʉrɨ uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ anʉmʉ .

text: He that receiveth a prophet in the name of a prophet shall receive a prophet ' s reward ; and he that receiveth a righteous man in the name of a righteous man shall receive a righteous man ' s reward .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' uya Papa Maimu anin ereutanʉ ' sa ' a ' tai , Papa Maimu anin pe iyesi pɨ ' uya itepe ' pʉ tonpa eporo mɨrɨ tepe ' pʉ eporo iya a ' tai . Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ipokena ' ka ' pon ereutanʉ ' sa ' a ' tai , ipokena ' pe iyesi pɨ ' , kʉrɨ rɨ uya rɨ ipokena ' ka ' pon epe ' pʉ tonpa eporo mɨrɨ tepe ' pʉ eporo iya a ' tai .

text: And whosoever shall give to drink unto one of these little ones a cup of cold water only in the name of a disciple , verily I say unto you , he shall in no wise lose his reward .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨnʉ ' uya pʉsamoro sepa ' nan nʉ ' kwɨ rɨ o ' pa yau komi ' tuna ke rʉ ' kwɨ rɨ , apʉne pʉra upoitorʉ pe to ' esi pɨ ' , i ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , tepe ' pʉ nonka iya pen kuru rɨ mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had made an end of commanding his twelve disciples , he departed thence to teach and to preach in their cities .
text2: 12 kaisaron kon tʉpoitorʉ ton auro ' ka tʉpo , Sises utɨ ' pʉ mɨrɨ pata apai itekare ekamai ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' enupai ' Kiyarari po ' nan pata ton yau .

text: Now when John had heard in the prison the works of Christ , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Isaan Pa ' tes uya etasa ' a ' tai pariki ' si tawonsi ' kɨ Kʉrai nʉkupʉnʉ , tʉpoitorʉ ton ennoko ' pʉ iya

text: And said unto him , Art thou he that should come , or do we look for another ?
text2: ekama ' popɨ ' se ' na , “ Ɨmɨrɨ pe ' kʉrɨ rɨ tʉuye ' ton ta ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ ipɨ ' , tʉron nɨ rɨ katɨ uyepʉ enupɨkɨrɨ ina e ' to ' nai ? ” tukai ' .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Go and shew John again those things which ye do hear and see :
text2: Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Enna ' potɨ ' , ɨneta ' pʉ kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨnene ' pʉ kon ekamatantɨ ' Isaan pɨ ' ;

text: The blind receive their sight , and the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , and the deaf hear , the dead are raised up , and the poor have the gospel preached to them .
text2: tenku ' na ' nan enasa ' man ennin nan pe ; ise ' mesa ' kon enasa ' man tʉusasan pe ; erekʉ ' pa ' nan usepi ' tɨsa ' man ; etanin nan pen enasa ' man etanin pe ; eke ' amʉ ' e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' man , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wakʉ itekare usekamasa ' man entu ' manin nan pana ya ' .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Pori ' pe ka ' pon esi mɨrɨ tʉuta ' mo ' kasen pen unkupʉnʉ uriya ' , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And as they departed , Jesus began to say unto the multitudes concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Isaan poitorʉ ton enna ' po koro ' tau , Sises epiya ' tɨ ' pʉ anpisin auro ' ka pɨ ' Isaan pɨ ' , “ Ɨ ' rɨ ense ' na ɨutɨ ' pʉ kon rɨmono ' ta ' ? Wana ' rɨ ari ' ma a ' setun uya ense ' na ?

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? behold , they that wear soft clothing are in kings ' houses .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe pʉra iyesi yau , ɨ ' rɨ ken ense ' na ɨutɨ ' pʉ kon ? Wakʉ pe katɨ ka ' pon epontɨpɨ ' sa ' ense ' na ? Kane . Kamoro rupɨ ton nin esi mɨrɨ epe ' kena ' ton ipon ton esi kin iwʉ ' tawon kon .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? yea , I say unto you , and more than a prophet .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ kuru ken ense ' na ɨutɨ ' pʉ kon ? Pu ' kena ' katɨ ? Ewai ' apana ' tɨ uya ' nokon , pu ' kena ' entaino rɨ .

text: For this is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Pʉse rɨ sa ' ne si kʉrɨ rɨ ko iye ' menukasa ' itekare usauro ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ ipɨ ' : “ ‘ Umaimu ekamanin ennoko uya mɨrɨ arawɨrɨ , ɨye ' ma konekanin pe awapiya , ’ ta ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ ipɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Verily I say unto you , Among them that are born of women there hath not risen a greater than John the Baptist : notwithstanding he that is least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he .
text2: “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , kamo uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' nentunʉkʉ ' san koro ' tau pʉra iyesi mɨrɨ eke Isaan Pa ' tes entaino ; mɨrɨ e ' tane , kʉrɨ aiko pe te ' sen Epʉn po esa ' wannɨ pe e ' nɨto ' yawon esi eke pe Isaan entai .

text: And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence , and the violent take it by force .
text2: Isaan Pa ' tes weyu rʉ ' pʉ si ' kɨrɨ serɨ pʉ ' kʉ pona , Epʉn po esa ' wannɨ pe e ' nɨto ' uta ' tu ' man pɨ ' man meruntɨ pe , mɨrɨpan a ' si pɨ ' meruntɨ ton ka ' pon amʉ ' man .

text: For all the prophets and the law prophesied until John .
text2: Tanporon kon nɨ pu ' kena ' amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Main usenupan nɨto ' ipɨ ' uya Papa Maimu ekama ' pʉ , Isaan Pa ' tes uyepʉ pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ .

text: And if ye will receive it , this is Elias , which was for to come .
text2: Serɨ si to ' maimu anapurɨpai ɨwesi kon yau , Isaan nɨ si kʉrɨ rɨ Iraisa uyepʉ tasa ' rʉ ' pʉ ipɨ ' .

text: He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ tʉpana ke na ' ne ' tɨwɨ netai , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: But whereunto shall I liken this generation ? It is like unto children sitting in the markets , and calling unto their fellows ,
text2: Sises uya kanan takaa ' pʉ , “ Ɨnʉ ' yan kasa to ' esi tukai ' serɨ a ' taino kon ekama uya ? Mʉre amʉ ' ereutapɨ ' sa ' kʉrʉpo ' po pata ' se ' yau na ' ne ' tʉukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨ ' san tʉron kon pɨ ' kasa to ' esi :

text: And saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned unto you , and ye have not lamented .
text2: “ ‘ Sarakuwa turunpa ' pʉ ina uya , e ' tane aumanʉnsa ' kon pʉra iyesi . Eke ' eremu pɨ ' ina userenka ' pʉ , e ' tane tʉuta ' kwarʉkai ' aukaransa ' kon pʉra iyesi , ’ tawon nan kasa .

text: For John came neither eating nor drinking , and they say , He hath a devil .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Isaan uyee ' pʉ iyenta ' na mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨ ' rɨ ensi iya pʉra , mɨrɨpan pɨ ' , ‘ Makoi esi iyau , ’ ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: The Son of man came eating and drinking , and they say , Behold a man gluttonous , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners . But wisdom is justified of her children .
text2: Ka ' pon , Papa winon uyee ' pʉ tenta ' nasen nɨ waain ensinin nɨ , mɨrɨpan pɨ ' , ‘ Eke pe tenta ' nasen , te ' taripasen , ’ ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' . ‘ Pʉrata amʉranʉ ' nin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉmakooikena ' nan nɨ tonpa pe iyesi , ’ ta ' pʉ to ' uya . E ' tane Papa pu ' ketʉ usi ' tu mɨrɨ i ' napai rɨ inkupʉnʉ pɨkɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then began he to upbraid the cities wherein most of his mighty works were done , because they repented not :
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises usaurokʉ ' pʉ ka ' pon amʉ ' pata yau to ' eno ' ma pe , eke Papa tʉrawasooi kupʉ ' pʉ tʉuya yau ' ne , apʉne pʉra tʉmakooi kon apai to ' era ' tɨ kasa pʉra .

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works , which were done in you , had been done in Tyre and Sidon , they would have repented long ago in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: “ Ɨsɨ sɨ , Korasin pon kon ! Ɨsɨ sɨ , Pe ' saita pon kon ! Ɨ ' koro ' tau ' nokon ne ' ku ' ai ' ne ' eke Papa tʉrawasooi e ' ku ' sa ' pe iyesi yau Taya mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Saitan pon kon koro ' tau , pena rɨ to ' era ' tɨ ' pʉ nesii ' no tʉmakooi kon apai . To ' epontɨpɨ ' sa ' esi ' pʉ nesii ' no isa ' ka ' si ya ' , urumɨrʉ ' pʉ yau to ' nesii ' no .

text: But I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the day of judgment , than for you .
text2: E ' tane apana ' tɨ uya ' nokon Taya mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Saitan pon kon uya parɨ imoronkato ' oton eseru aimenka weyu e ' seposa ' a ' tai ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon entai .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted unto heaven , shalt be brought down to hell : for if the mighty works , which have been done in thee , had been done in Sodom , it would have remained until this day .
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon , Ka ' paneyan pon kon , autanʉnto ' oton kon pe ' ka ' takʉi ' ? Kane ! I ' na ' auta ' mo ' kato ' oton kon mɨrɨ ta ' mu kenan pen nɨ ya ' . Ɨ ' koro ' tau ' nokon ne ' ku ' ai ' ne ' eke Papa tʉrawasooi e ' ku ' sa ' pe iyesi yau Satan po , moro rɨ mɨrɨ pata nesii ' no serɨ pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ .

text: But I say unto you , That it shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom in the day of judgment , than for thee .
text2: E ' tane pʉra rɨ ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , Satan pon kon uya parɨ imoronkato ' oton eseru aimenka weyu e ' seposa ' a ' tai ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon entai , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: At that time Jesus answered and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , because thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Kanyapurɨpɨ ' ai ' , Papai , Epʉn mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ non Epuru , apʉne pʉra serɨ ton onansa ' auya pɨ ' pu ' kena ' ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ isenupasa ' kon piyapai , mɨrɨpan enpoikasa ' auya pɨ ' aiko ton mʉre amʉ ' ena ' .

text: Even so , Father : for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: Ewai ' Papai , serɨ ku ' sa ' auya i ' se ɨwe ' to ' awɨrɨ pori ' pe ɨku ' nin pe iyesi pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: All things are delivered unto me of my Father : and no man knoweth the Son , but the Father ; neither knoweth any man the Father , save the Son , and he to whomsoever the Son will reveal him .
text2: Tʉwɨpʉrema tʉpo , ka ' pon amʉ ' auro ' ka pɨ ' iye ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ . “ Tanporon nɨ esi ukʉipʉnʉ nʉnonka ' pʉ pe uyena ' . Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ imu i ' tu pʉra iyesi , e ' tane ikʉipʉnʉ uya rɨken i ' tu . Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ikʉipʉnʉ i ' tu pʉra iyesi , e ' tane imu uya rɨken i ' tu mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kamo nɨrɨ imu na ' ne ' e ' to ' ɨnenpoikapai itena ' ton , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Come unto me , all ye that labour and are heavy laden , and I will give you rest .
text2: “ Ɨsi ' tɨ ' ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon iseta ' kasa ' kon , e ' tape ' ne ' esa ' pe te ' san , ɨumoronkapʉ kon pa ɨku ' to ' kon pe uya .

text: Take my yoke upon you , and learn of me ; for I am meek and lowly in heart : and ye shall find rest unto your souls .
text2: Uwari ' sarʉ apon anʉntɨ ' ɨpona ' nokon , ɨusenupa kon pa upɨ ' , ɨsɨ pen nɨ urɨ , mɨ pe te ' ku ' sen pen nɨ uyewan yau , aya ' kwarʉ kon umoronka ' to ' eporo kon pa .

text: For my yoke is easy , and my burden is light .
text2: Wakʉ rɨ mɨrɨ uwari ' sarʉ apon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uwari ' sarʉ esi asi ' ono pe , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: At that time Jesus went on the sabbath day through the corn ; and his disciples were an hungred , and began to pluck the ears of corn , and to eat .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises utɨ ' pʉ a ' nai ' e ' kwa nawɨrɨ Sapa ' a ' tai . Ipoitorʉ ton esi ' pʉ iwan pe , mɨrɨpan kon e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ a ' nai ' e ' suruupɨ ' sa ' i ' kwɨ ' pɨtʉ pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya ɨku ' pʉ .

text: But when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto him , Behold , thy disciples do that which is not lawful to do upon the sabbath day .
text2: Pari ' si amʉ ' uya serɨ e ' kupʉ ensa ' a ' tai , Sises pɨ ' ta ' pʉ to ' uya , “ Apʉne enkɨ , ɨpoitorʉ ton uya Main uya tʉku ' sen pen Sapa ' a ' tai tasa ' rʉ ' pʉ kupʉ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' .

text: But he said unto them , Have ye not read what David did , when he was an hungred , and they that were with him ;
text2: Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Kin Tepi ' nʉkupʉ ' pʉ pe ' etasa ' auya ' nokon pʉra nai , tʉpoitorʉ ton pokon pe iwan pe tesi kon a ' tai ?

text: How he entered into the house of God , and did eat the shewbread , which was not lawful for him to eat , neither for them which were with him , but only for the priests ?
text2: Iyewomʉ ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' ta ' tʉtonpa ton pokon pe mɨrɨpan kon uya ipʉremasa ' pʉreti ɨku ' pʉ , to ' nʉkupʉnʉ tasa ' pen nɨ Main uya e ' tane . Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan yu pe rɨken te ' sen ɨku ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Or have ye not read in the law , how that on the sabbath days the priests in the temple profane the sabbath , and are blameless ?
text2: Mɨrɨ rɨken pe pʉra , ene auya ' nokon pʉra pe ' iyesi Main yau Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan uya Papa iwʉ ' tau Sapa ' a ' tai Main i ' kwɨtʉ ' pʉ te ' tʉrawasoma kon winɨ , e ' tane wakʉ pe rɨ to ' esi ?

text: But I say unto you , That in this place is one greater than the temple .
text2: “ Ɨpɨ ' nokon ekama uya serɨ ; moro rɨ iyesi serɨ yau eke pe te ' sen Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' entaino .

text: But if ye had known what this meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice , ye would not have condemned the guiltless .
text2: I ' tusa ' auya ' nokon pe iyesi yau ɨ ' rɨ ta e ' kwa pe serɨ main esi tukai ' , ‘ Ɨsentu ' kena ' pe ɨwesi kon i ' se esi , o ' ke ɨuse ' ma kon i ' se esi pen , ’ tawon , wakʉ ton nɨ eno ' masa ' auya ' nokon nesii ' no pen .

text: For the Son of man is Lord even of the sabbath day .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Ka ' pon , Papa winon esi Sapa ' Epuru pe rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when he was departed thence , he went into their synagogue :
text2: Mɨrɨ apai tʉutɨi ' , itɨ ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' usenupato ' iwʉ ' ta ' .

text: And , behold , there was a man which had his hand withered . And they asked him , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath days ? that they might accuse him .
text2: Mɨrɨ yau , itemiyatʉ aipʉtasa ' amʉrasa ' ka ' pon esi ' pʉ . Sises eseru ' tɨto ' pe tʉuya ' nokon , mɨrɨ yawon kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Main awɨrɨ pe ' e ' nɨ pe iyesi mɨrɨ , Sapa ' a ' tai ka ' pon epi ' tɨsa ' a ' tai ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he said unto them , What man shall there be among you , that shall have one sheep , and if it fall into a pit on the sabbath day , will he not lay hold on it , and lift it out ?
text2: Ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ Karimeru esa ' pe ɨwesi kon yau mɨrɨpan uta ' mo ' ka yau akasa ' ya ' Sapa ' a ' tai , ta ' sii ' pe ' anʉmʉ auya ' nokon pen ?

text: How much then is a man better than a sheep ? Wherefore it is lawful to do well on the sabbath days .
text2: Ka ' pon esi i ' nʉnkena ' pe karimeru entai . Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , Sapa ' a ' tai ka ' pon pika ' tɨsa ' esi Main awɨrɨ e ' nɨ pe rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then saith he to the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it forth ; and it was restored whole , like as the other .
text2: Mɨrɨpan a ' tai , “ Ɨyemiyatʉ ɨnka ' , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya ka ' pon pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan uya temiyatʉ ɨnka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan enna ' po ' pʉ tesi ' pʉ ya ' , itemiyatʉ ratoi kasa rɨ marɨ .

text: Then the Pharisees went out , and held a council against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: E ' tane si Pari ' si amʉ ' epa ' kasa ' utɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon ekoneka ' pʉ iwɨto ' tʉuya ' nokon pɨ ' .

text: But when Jesus knew it , he withdrew himself from thence : and great multitudes followed him , and he healed them all ;
text2: Sises uya Pari ' si amʉ ' ekonekasa ' i ' tusa ' a ' tai , itɨ ' pʉ mɨrɨ pata apai . Tu ' kan kon ka ' pon amʉ ' utɨ ' pʉ ipɨkɨrɨ , mɨrɨ yau to ' koro ' tau takuru ' kena ' nan esi ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon epi ' tɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ iya .

text: And charged them that they should not make him known :
text2: To ' panama ' pʉ iya tʉron kon pɨ ' kʉrɨ rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ ta to ' uya namai ' tʉpɨ ' .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Serɨ kupʉ ' pʉ iya pu ' kena ' Aisaya yai Papa usaurokʉ ' pʉ uta ' ku ' tɨto ' pe :

text: Behold my servant , whom I have chosen ; my beloved , in whom my soul is well pleased : I will put my spirit upon him , and he shall shew judgment to the Gentiles .
text2: “ Upoitorʉ pe , unanʉmʉ ' pʉ pʉse rɨ . Ipan pe uni ' nʉnkanʉ , mɨrɨpan pɨ ' epori ' ma . Uya ' kwarʉ ennoko uya mɨrɨ ipona , mɨrɨpan uya wakʉ pe e ' nɨ eseru ekamato ' oton tanporon kon ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' .

text: He shall not strive , nor cry ; neither shall any man hear his voice in the streets .
text2: Mɨrɨpan usauro ' to ' oton ama ' ai ; eke pe asanta tau isauro ' to ' oton pen .

text: A bruised reed shall he not break , and smoking flax shall he not quench , till he send forth judgment unto victory .
text2: Iye ' sekeukasa ' wana ' i ' kwɨtʉ iya pen , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ usenkʉ ' nɨ poken te ' sen apo ' enkʉ ' nʉkʉ iya pen , wakʉ ena itentai pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ .

text: And in his name shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: Itese ' yau tanporon kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uya te ' ku ' to ' kon tʉto ' oton , ” tawon .

text: Then was brought unto him one possessed with a devil , blind , and dumb : and he healed him , insomuch that the blind and dumb both spake and saw .
text2: Mɨrɨ yau , tʉron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uya makoi yen ka ' pon nee ' pʉ Sises piya ' . Kʉrɨ rɨ ka ' pon esi ' pʉ tenku ' nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉusauro ' sen pen . Mɨrɨpan epi ' tɨ ' pʉ Sises uya makoi a ' kwarʉ tenpa ' kai ' , mɨrɨpan enasa ' esi ' pʉ tʉusauro ' sen pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ennin pe .

text: And all the people were amazed , and said , Is not this the son of David ?
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ka ' pon amʉ ' usewansiuka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya , “ Tepi ' pa rʉ ' pʉ pe pe ' iyesi serɨ , itenupɨkɨrɨ e ' nɨto ' Me ' saya ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: But when the Pharisees heard it , they said , This fellow doth not cast out devils , but by Beelzebub the prince of the devils .
text2: E ' tane Pari ' si amʉ ' uya serɨ etasa ' tʉuya ' nokon a ' tai , “ Pirɨsipupʉ , makoi amʉ ' epuru uya tʉpika ' tɨi ' makoi amʉ ' enpa ' kapɨtʉ pʉse rɨ uya mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And Jesus knew their thoughts , and said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and every city or house divided against itself shall not stand :
text2: Sises uya to ' usenuminkato ' i ' tusa ' esi ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Tanporo esa ' wannɨ pe te ' san epantakapɨ ' sa ' a ' tai ɨsewa ' nomai ' tiwano ' kon pe rɨ , to ' uma ' ta mɨrɨ ; pata mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨsiwʉ ' tawon kon ka ' pon amʉ ' epantakapɨ ' sa ' a ' tai ɨsewa ' nomai ' tiwano ' kon pe rɨ uko ' mamʉ pen nɨ mɨrɨ .

text: And if Satan cast out Satan , he is divided against himself ; how shall then his kingdom stand ?
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa si iyesi Se ' tan uya Se ' tan nɨrɨ enpa ' kasa ' a ' tai , tiwano ' pe rɨ iyepantakasa ' pe iyesi ɨsewa ' nomai ' ; mɨrɨ kasa iyesi a ' tai , nai kasa ken Se ' tan e ' to ' itesa ' pe uko ' mamʉ ?

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your children cast them out ? therefore they shall be your judges .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ makoi amʉ ' enpa ' ka uya pe iyesi yau Pirɨsipupʉ ke , ɨnʉ ' ke ken ɨpoitorʉ kon to ' enpa ' kanin nan ? To ' nin si esi mɨrɨ ɨyeseru kon aimenkanin nan pe .

text: But if I cast out devils by the Spirit of God , then the kingdom of God is come unto you .
text2: E ' tane makoi amʉ ' enpa ' ka uya pe iyesi yau Papa A ' kwarʉ ke , Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe nin si uye ' sa ' mɨrɨ ɨpona ' nokon .

text: Or else how can one enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he first bind the strong man ? and then he will spoil his house .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ pe pʉra kanan , nai kasa ɨnʉ ' rɨ ewomʉ pana ' pan iwʉ ' ta ' itapuruui ton ase ' na ? Wapiya auronpɨ ' sa ' a ' tai rɨ nin iye ' kupʉ . Mɨrɨ a ' tai nin itimamin arɨ iya itiwʉ ' tapai .

text: He that is not with me is against me ; and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad .
text2: “ Kʉrɨ rɨ ka ' pon utonpa pe pʉra na ' ne ' esi mɨrɨ uyeyaton pe ; kʉrɨ rɨ amʉranʉkʉ iya pʉra na ' ne ' uya ' kɨrɨ uya , ita ' nʉkʉ mɨrɨ .

text: Wherefore I say unto you , All manner of sin and blasphemy shall be forgiven unto men : but the blasphemy against the Holy Ghost shall not be forgiven unto men .
text2: Ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , tanporon nɨ makoi mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa sapema pe isauro ' sa ' kon ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' rɨ usentu ' man , e ' tane Iya ' kwarʉ sapema pe isauro ' sa ' kon pɨ ' usentu ' man pen nɨ .

text: And whosoever speaketh a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but whosoever speaketh against the Holy Ghost , it shall not be forgiven him , neither in this world , neither in the world to come .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ Ka ' pon , Papa winon pɨ ' ewa ' noma pe isauro ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' usentu ' man , e ' tane ewa ' noma pe Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ pɨ ' isauro ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' usentu ' man pen nɨ , serɨ a ' tai ' ne mɨrɨ pe pʉra serɨ entawon a ' tai ' ne rɨ .

text: Either make the tree good , and his fruit good ; or else make the tree corrupt , and his fruit corrupt : for the tree is known by his fruit .
text2: “ Wakʉ pe yʉi iku ' kɨ ; mɨrɨ a ' tai , wakʉ pe iteperu esi mɨrɨ . Mɨrɨ pe pʉra , ɨri pe yʉi iku ' kɨ ; mɨrɨ a ' tai , ɨri pe rɨ iteperu esi mɨrɨ , apʉne pʉra yʉi usi ' tu mɨrɨ iteperu winɨ .

text: O generation of vipers , how can ye , being evil , speak good things ? for out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaketh .
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon ɨkʉi munkɨ ton ! Nai kasa ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon ɨri pe te ' san usaurokʉ wakʉ pe ? Apʉne pʉra ɨyewan kon epe ' tɨsa ' apaino kuru enpa ' ka auya ' nokon mɨrɨ anta kon yai .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of the heart bringeth forth good things : and an evil man out of the evil treasure bringeth forth evil things .
text2: Wakʉ ka ' pon uya wakʉ ton enpa ' ka mɨrɨ wakʉ usentɨsa ' tʉyau , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨri ka ' pon uya ɨri enpa ' ka mɨrɨ ɨri usentɨsa ' tʉyau .

text: But I say unto you , That every idle word that men shall speak , they shall give account thereof in the day of judgment .
text2: Serɨ ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , Papa uya ka ' pon amʉ ' aimenkato ' oton tanporon nɨ tʉusenuminkai ' pʉra rɨ to ' usauro ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' .

text: For by thy words thou shalt be justified , and by thy words thou shalt be condemned .
text2: Wakʉ amaimu kon winɨ ayanʉnto ' oton kon , ɨri amaimu kon winɨ ɨyeno ' mato ' oton kon , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: Then certain of the scribes and of the Pharisees answered , saying , Master , we would see a sign from thee .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Pari ' si amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Main pɨ ' enupanin nan uya ta ' pʉ Sises pɨ ' , “ Ti ' sa , eke Papa tʉrawasooi ɨi ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ kupʉ auya ɨnenpai ina man , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: But he answered and said unto them , An evil and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given to it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas :
text2: To ' maimu eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Ɨri ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyemari ' masa ' ekumankanin nan ka ' pon amʉ ' uya eke Papa tʉrawasooi i ' tuto ' tʉuya ' nokon ipɨkɨrɨ ekama ' po . Ikupʉ uya pen e ' tane Isona , pu ' kena ' pɨ ' i ' tuto ' ipɨ ' rʉ ' pʉ rɨken kupʉ uya .

text: For as Jonas was three days and three nights in the whale ' s belly ; so shall the Son of man be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Isona esi ' pʉ osorʉwau wʉi mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ osorʉwau ewarupɨ nɨrɨ eke moro ' ewan yau . Mɨrɨ na ' ne ' kasa , Ka ' pon , Papa winon uko ' manto ' oton osorʉwau wʉi mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ osorʉwau ewarupɨ non ewan yau .

text: The men of Nineveh shall rise in judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : because they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' Ninipa pon kon e ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' oton eseru aimenka weyu a ' tai serɨ a ' taino kon pokon pe to ' eno ' ma pe ; apʉne pʉra to ' era ' tɨ ' pʉ tʉmakooi kon apai Isona uya itekare ekama pɨ ' . Serɨ pe eke Isona entaino man serɨ yau .

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for she came from the uttermost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Kwin , wʉi enu uye ' to ' kamisi winon e ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' oton eseru aimenka weyu a ' tai serɨ a ' taino kon pokon pe to ' eno ' ma pe ; apʉne pʉra iye ' sa ' wenai non u ' matʉ apai Saraman pu ' ketʉ etase ' na . Serɨ pe eke Saraman entaino man serɨ yau , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest , and findeth none .
text2: “ Makoi a ' kwarʉ epa ' kasa ' a ' tai ka ' pon apai , itɨ mɨrɨ tʉ ' kenan pata ya ' . Tereutato ' yau warinpa pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan eporo iya pʉra iyesi .

text: Then he saith , I will return into my house from whence I came out ; and when he is come , he findeth it empty , swept , and garnished .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ‘ Enna ' po serɨ ɨutɨ unnɨmɨ ' pʉ ta ' , ’ ta iya . Iye ' sa ' a ' tai , eporo iya itawon pʉra , wakʉ pe akorokasa ' pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ikonekasa ' pe .

text: Then goeth he , and taketh with himself seven other spirits more wicked than himself , and they enter in and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first . Even so shall it be also unto this wicked generation .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , itɨ 7 kaisaron kon a ' kwarʉ ton ɨri ton kuru tentaino kon nepʉ iya ta ' kɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan kon ewomʉ , to ' uko ' mamʉ mɨrɨ yau . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , pʉse rɨ ka ' pon esi mɨrɨ ɨri pe kuru wapiya tesi ' pʉ entai . Mɨrɨ na ' ne ' kasa , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon ɨri pe nʉko ' manyai ' ne ' nan serɨ a ' taino kon e ' to ' oton , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: While he yet talked to the people , behold , his mother and his brethren stood without , desiring to speak with him .
text2: Anpisin auro ' ka pɨ ' Sises esi koro ' tau rɨ marɨ , isan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyakon non e ' soto ' pɨ ' sa ' esi ' pʉ pʉroroi po . Iya ' kɨrɨ asauro ' pai to ' esi ' pʉ .

text: Then one said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to speak with thee .
text2: Ka ' pon uya ipana ' tɨ ' pʉ , “ Asan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ayakon non e ' soto ' pɨ ' sa ' man pʉroroi po . Ayauro ' kapai to ' esi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But he answered and said unto him that told him , Who is my mother ? and who are my brethren ?
text2: Eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Ɨnʉ ' si usan ? Ɨnʉ ' yan si uyakon non ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he stretched forth his hand toward his disciples , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Tʉpoitorʉ ton enusimai ' ma ta ' pʉ iya , “ Pʉsamo nin usanon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uyakon non .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of my Father which is in heaven , the same is my brother , and sister , and mother .
text2: Apʉne pʉra ɨnʉ ' rɨ ukʉipʉnʉ , Epʉn pon e ' to ' i ' se ku ' nin esi mɨrɨ , uyakon pe , uparusi pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ usan pe , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: The same day went Jesus out of the house , and sat by the sea side .
text2: Mɨrɨ wʉi a ' tai si , Sises epa ' ka ' pʉ ɨutɨ tapai , mɨrɨpan utɨsa ' ereuta ' pʉ parau ku ' pɨri e ' pi po .

text: And great multitudes were gathered together unto him , so that he went into a ship , and sat ; and the whole multitude stood on the shore .
text2: Tu ' ke kuru rɨ anpisin pe ka ' pon amʉ ' esi pɨ ' tʉwoi , kanau ya ' tekanwa ' tɨi ' iyereuta ' pʉ ka ' pon amʉ ' e ' tane a ' mun po .

text: And he spake many things unto them in parables , saying , Behold , a sower went forth to sow ;
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , tu ' kan pɨ ' rɨ to ' auro ' ka ' pʉ iya panton yai . “ Umɨ pɨ ' te ' sen utɨ ' pʉ kiyari ye ' pɨnse ' na tʉpa ' karakai ' .

text: And when he sowed , some seeds fell by the way side , and the fowls came and devoured them up :
text2: Ipa ' karaka iya koro ' tau , tʉron nɨ ton uta ' pokʉ ' pʉ asanta ta ' . Toron amʉ ' uyee ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya ɨku ' pʉ .

text: Some fell upon stony places , where they had not much earth : and forthwith they sprung up , because they had no deepness of earth :
text2: Tʉron nɨ uta ' pokʉ ' pʉ tɨ ' pe te ' sen ya ' eke pe pʉra te ' sen non ya ' . Iya ' ta ' pʉ inke pʉra , apʉne pʉra i ' nau pʉra non esi ke .

text: And when the sun was up , they were scorched ; and because they had no root , they withered away .
text2: E ' tane wʉi enu enu ' sa ' a ' tai , a ' ne ' pe ipuru ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan aipʉta ' pʉ apʉne pʉra imi ' utɨpɨ ' sa ' pʉra iyesi wenai .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprung up , and choked them :
text2: Tʉron nɨ ton uta ' pokʉ ' pʉ tikʉkenan nʉ ' ta ' , mɨrɨpan ɨmɨ ' nɨ ' ta a ' ta uya ɨwɨtanʉkʉ ' pʉ .

text: But other fell into good ground , and brought forth fruit , some an hundredfold , some sixtyfold , some thirtyfold .
text2: Mɨrɨ e ' tane rɨ , tʉron nɨ ton uta ' pokʉ ' pʉ wakʉ non ya ' , mɨrɨpan epeta ' pʉ 100 kaisarɨ rɨ , 60 mɨrɨ pe pʉra 30 kaisarɨ rɨ ite ' kwa ipɨmɨ ' pʉ entai rɨ .

text: Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ tʉpana ke na ' ne ' tɨwɨ netai , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And the disciples came , and said unto him , Why speakest thou unto them in parables ?
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' ekama ' pose ' na , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' ka ' pon amʉ ' auro ' ka auya panton yai ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: He answered and said unto them , Because it is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven , but to them it is not given .
text2: To ' eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Ɨnʉ ' ni ' tunʉ pen nɨ ama ' aino Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe i ' tu kon pa ɨyena ' nokon itʉsa ' , e ' tane to ' ena ' itʉsa ' pʉra iyesi .

text: For whosoever hath , to him shall be given , and he shall have more abundance : but whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken away even that he hath .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ itesa ' pe te ' sen repa mɨrɨ miyarɨ rɨ , mɨrɨpan e ' to ' pe eke pe itesa ' pe . Ɨnʉ ' rɨ ɨ ' rɨ esa ' pen nɨ enapai imo ' ka mɨrɨ itenawon nʉ ' kwɨ rɨ .

text: Therefore speak I to them in parables : because they seeing see not ; and hearing they hear not , neither do they understand .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' to ' auro ' ka uya mɨrɨ panton yai : “ Ennin pe rɨ to ' e ' tane , to ' uya ene pʉra iyesi pɨ ' ; etanin pe rɨ to ' e ' tane , to ' uya eta mɨrɨ pe pʉra ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ pʉra iyesi pɨ ' .

text: And in them is fulfilled the prophecy of Esaias , which saith , By hearing ye shall hear , and shall not understand ; and seeing ye shall see , and shall not perceive :
text2: Pu ' kena ' Aisaya nekama ' pʉ uta ' ku ' tɨsa ' to ' pɨ ' : “ ‘ Eta pɨ ' rɨ ɨwe ' to ' oton e ' tane , ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ auya pʉra iye ' to ' oton ; ene pɨ ' rɨ miyarɨ rɨ ɨwe ' to ' oton e ' tane , ento ' auya oton pen .

text: For this people ' s heart is waxed gross , and their ears are dull of hearing , and their eyes they have closed ; lest at any time they should see with their eyes , and hear with their ears , and should understand with their heart , and should be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Pʉsamoro ka ' pon amʉ ' ewan enasa ' sa ' man pe ; to ' uya eta pʉra rɨ iyesi tʉpana kon ke , tenu kon a ' kopɨ ' sa ' to ' uya , tenu kon ke to ' uya ene nesii ' no , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉpana kon ke to ' netai ' no , tewan kon ke to ' nʉto ' ka ' nʉkʉi ' no , to ' nera ' tɨi ' no , mɨrɨpan kon sepi ' tɨi ' no , ’ tawon .

text: But blessed are your eyes , for they see : and your ears , for they hear .
text2: E ' tane wakʉ pe ɨyenu kon esi mɨrɨ , apʉne pʉra ene iya pɨ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ apana kon eta iya pɨ ' .

text: For verily I say unto you , That many prophets and righteous men have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , tu ' kan kon nɨ pu ' kena ' amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipokena ' ton ka ' pon amʉ ' esi ' pʉ menyatʉi ' ne ' ɨnenpai e ' tane , to ' uya ene ' pʉ pen ; mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ metayatʉi ' ne ' ɨnetapai e ' tane , to ' uya eta ' pʉ pen , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: Hear ye therefore the parable of the sower .
text2: “ Etatɨ ' ɨ ' rɨ ta e ' kwa pe tʉpa ' karakai ' te ' pɨnsen pantomʉ esi tukai ' :

text: When any one heareth the word of the kingdom , and understandeth it not , then cometh the wicked one , and catcheth away that which was sown in his heart . This is he which received seed by the way side .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ itekare eta a ' tai Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe pɨ ' , e ' tane ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ iya pʉra iyesi , Makoi uyepʉ itewan ya ' ipa ' karakasa ' mo ' kase ' na . Serɨ esi ite ' ipa ' karakasa ' asanta ta ' .

text: But he that received the seed into stony places , the same is he that heareth the word , and anon with joy receiveth it ;
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ ite ' uta ' po ' sa ' na ' ne ' tɨ ' pona kasa esi ka ' pon Main etanin nʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya inke pʉra anʉmʉ ' pʉ pori ' pe esii ' ma .

text: Yet hath he not root in himself , but dureth for a while : for when tribulation or persecution ariseth because of the word , by and by he is offended .
text2: E ' tane imi ' pʉra iyesi wenai , inke pʉra kuru itano ' ma . Manenpanin mɨrɨ pe pʉra kota ' manin uye ' sa ' a ' tai Main wenai , inke pʉra kuru ita ' mo ' ka .

text: He also that received seed among the thorns is he that heareth the word ; and the care of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , choke the word , and he becometh unfruitful .
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ ite ' ita ' po ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ tikʉkenan nʉ ' ta ' esi mɨrɨ ka ' pon Main etanin nʉ ' pʉ , e ' tane tʉusewankamasen wakʉ pe ɨko ' manpai tesi pɨ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ imaminke ' pe te ' to ' pɨ ' tʉusenku ' tɨsen . Mɨrɨ uya ɨwɨtanʉkʉ , tepetasen pe pʉra ikupʉ iya .

text: But he that received seed into the good ground is he that heareth the word , and understandeth it ; which also beareth fruit , and bringeth forth , some an hundredfold , some sixty , some thirty .
text2: E ' tane kʉrɨ rɨ ite ' ita ' po ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ wakʉ non ya ' esi ka ' pon Main etanin mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ito ' ka ' nʉ ' nin nɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan epeta 100 kaisa rɨ ' ne rɨ , 60 kaisa rɨ ' ne rɨ , mɨrɨ pe pʉra 30 kaisa rɨ ' ne rɨ ite ' kwa ipa ' karakasa ' rʉ ' pʉ entai , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man which sowed good seed in his field :
text2: Sises uya tʉron nɨ panton ekama ' pʉ ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' , “ Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe esi ka ' pon tʉpa ' karakai ' wakʉ kiyari ye ' pɨnnin nʉ ' pʉ tʉmainarʉ yau kasa .

text: But while men slept , his enemy came and sowed tares among the wheat , and went his way .
text2: Ewarupɨ nau , kʉrɨ rɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipoitorʉ ton e ' nʉnsa ' e ' tane , iteyaton uyee ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya wana ' e ' pɨmɨ ' pʉ mɨrɨ rɨ umɨ yau , mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ .

text: But when the blade was sprung up , and brought forth fruit , then appeared the tares also .
text2: Emennʉ ' pʉ rɨ , kiyari ye ' a ' ta ' pʉ epetan pɨ ' iye ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ e ' tane , ipoitorʉ ton uya wana ' e ' a ' tasa ' ene ' pʉ kiyari ye ' koro ' tau .

text: So the servants of the householder came and said unto him , Sir , didst not thou sow good seed in thy field ? from whence then hath it tares ?
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton utɨ ' pʉ tepuru kon piya ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya , ‘ Ina epuru , wakʉ sa ' ne kiyari ye ' pɨntai ina ko , ina apiyontɨ ' pʉ auya awɨrɨ rɨ , e ' tane nai awon wana ' e ' a ' tasa ' ? ’ ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: He said unto them , An enemy hath done this . The servants said unto him , Wilt thou then that we go and gather them up ?
text2: “ To ' epuru uya nin si , ‘ Uyeyaton uya rɨ ipɨnsa ' pe iyesi mɨrɨ , ’ ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' . “ ‘ Wana ' ken pe ' nai ' ina utɨ i ' se me ' an ? ’ ta ' pʉ ipoitorʉ ton uya .

text: But he said , Nay ; lest while ye gather up the tares , ye root up also the wheat with them .
text2: “ E ' tane , ‘ Kane , wana ' na auya ' nokon koro ' tau , iya ' tai pʉra kiyari ye ' kanan na auya ' nokon esi , ’ ta ' pʉ to ' epuru uya to ' pɨ ' .

text: Let both grow together until the harvest : and in the time of harvest I will say to the reapers , Gather ye together first the tares , and bind them in bundles to burn them : but gather the wheat into my barn .
text2: ‘ Tɨwɨ asa ' rɨ rɨ nʉsemo ' kai iteperu akʉ ' pʉsa ' anʉmʉ weyu e ' seporo pona rɨ . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , anʉnnin nan apiyontɨto ' pe uya , wapiya kuru wana ' nato ' pe to ' uya , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' uya auronpɨ ' to ' pe iyepo ' tɨpɨ ' to ' pe , mɨrɨ tʉpo nin si to ' uya a ' nai ' i ' kwɨ ' pɨ ' to ' pe , mɨrɨpan amʉranʉ ' to ' pe to ' uya ui ' kiyari iwʉ ' ta ' , ’ ta ' pʉ itepuru uya tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya anpisin ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' .

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is like to a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and sowed in his field :
text2: Tʉron nɨ panton ekama ' pʉ Sises uya ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' , “ Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe esi kiyari ye ' mosta ' itese ' ena ' pɨ , ka ' pon nʉpɨmɨnʉ tʉmainarʉ yau kasa .

text: Which indeed is the least of all seeds : but when it is grown , it is the greatest among herbs , and becometh a tree , so that the birds of the air come and lodge in the branches thereof .
text2: Mɨrɨ ena ' pɨ esi aiko ton kuru tʉron nɨ ena ' pɨ pokon pe i ' tu a ' tai , e ' tane eke pe isemo ' ka tʉron kon umɨ yau te ' sen kiyari ye ' entai , mɨrɨpan usemo ' ka eke yʉi pe , toron amʉ ' rɨ esi ipanta po ' ne , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: Another parable spake he unto them ; The kingdom of heaven is like unto leaven , which a woman took , and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉron nɨ kanan panton ekama ' pʉ Sises uya , “ Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe esi pʉrowa a ' sarutanʉ ' nin kasa , uri ' san nanʉmʉnʉ , mɨrɨpan uya pʉrowa pokon pe eke pe iki ' ma , tanporo ipun yau iyena pʉ ' kʉ pona , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: All these things spake Jesus unto the multitude in parables ; and without a parable spake he not unto them :
text2: Sises uya tanporo serɨ ton ekama ' pʉ ka ' pon amʉ ' anpisin ton pɨ ' panton yai ; ɨ ' rɨ ke rɨ panton yai pʉra to ' auro ' ka iya pʉra iye ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying , I will open my mouth in parables ; I will utter things which have been kept secret from the foundation of the world .
text2: Serɨ kupʉ ' pʉ iya , pena rɨ Papa nekama ' pʉ pu ' kena ' yai uta ' ku ' tɨto ' pe : “ Panton yai ka ' pon amʉ ' auro ' kato ' uya oton , non ekoneka a ' tai rɨ iye ' so ' nansa ' rʉ ' pʉ ekamato ' uya oton , ” tawon .

text: Then Jesus sent the multitude away , and went into the house : and his disciples came unto him , saying , Declare unto us the parable of the tares of the field .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya anpisin ka ' pon amʉ ' nɨmɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ itau te ' to ' ɨutɨ ta ' . Ipoitorʉ ton utɨ ' pʉ iya ' kɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan kon uya , “ Apʉne , ɨ ' rɨ ta e ' kwa pe wana ' umɨ yawon esi tukai ' ekama ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: He answered and said unto them , He that soweth the good seed is the Son of man ;
text2: Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Kʉrɨ wakʉ itena ' pɨ pɨnnin nʉ ' pʉ tʉpa ' karakai ' esi Ka ' pon , Papa winon .

text: The field is the world ; the good seed are the children of the kingdom ; but the tares are the children of the wicked one ;
text2: Umɨ esi ka ' pon amʉ ' serɨ non po te ' san , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wakʉ kiyari ye ' esi esa ' wannɨ pe e ' nɨ munkɨ amʉ ' ; wana ' esi Makoi munkɨ amʉ ' ekamanin pe ,

text: The enemy that sowed them is the devil ; the harvest is the end of the world ; and the reapers are the angels .
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eyaton , wana ' pɨnnin nʉ ' pʉ esi Makoi . Kiyari akʉ ' pʉsa ' anʉmʉ esi non weyu u ' ma ' sa ' a ' taino , kiyari anʉnnin nan esi inserʉ amʉ ' .

text: As therefore the tares are gathered and burned in the fire ; so shall it be in the end of this world .
text2: “ Wana ' na mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipo ' tɨ kasa , mɨrɨ kasa si iye ' to ' oton pata weyu u ' ma ' sa ' a ' tai .

text: The Son of man shall send forth his angels , and they shall gather out of his kingdom all things that offend , and them which do iniquity ;
text2: Ka ' pon , Papa winon uya tinserʉʉi ton enno ' to ' oton serɨ non pona , mɨrɨpan kon uya ɨri ku ' nin nʉ ' san mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉtonpa kon e ' makoima emapu ' tɨnin nʉ ' san amʉranʉ ' to ' oton Papa pata ' se ' yapai ,

text: And shall cast them into a furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: mɨrɨpan kon eno ' mato ' to ' uya oton apo ' ya ' . Mɨrɨ yau , to ' ukaranto ' oton , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉyɨ kon kɨtɨtɨi ' mato ' oton to ' uya .

text: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father . Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: E ' tane ipokena ' ton e ' wei ' tɨto ' oton wʉi enu kasa tʉkʉipʉnʉ kon e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe yau . Kʉrɨ rɨ tʉpana ke na ' ne ' tɨwɨ netai , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto treasure hid in a field ; the which when a man hath found , he hideth , and for joy thereof goeth and selleth all that he hath , and buyeth that field .
text2: Miyarɨ rɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' enupa ' pʉ Sises uya , “ Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe esi i ' nʉnkena ' mamin umɨ yau onansa ' te ' sen kasa . Mɨrɨpan eposa ' ka ' pon uya a ' tai , iu ' na ' tɨkapʉ iya kanan , mɨrɨpan esi pori ' pe , mɨrɨpan uya tanporo timamin kʉrʉpo ' poma , mɨrɨpan epe ' pʉ ke mɨrɨ non e ' ma iya .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a merchant man , seeking goodly pearls :
text2: “ Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe esi epe ' kena ' mokon pun tʉne ' manʉ ton warinpa kʉrʉpo ' po pokon uya na ' ne ' kasa .

text: Who , when he had found one pearl of great price , went and sold all that he had , and bought it .
text2: Mɨrɨpan eposa ' tʉuya a ' tai , itɨ tanporo timamin kʉrʉpo ' pomai ' , mɨrɨpan epe ' pʉ pʉrata ke mɨrɨ mokon pun e ' mato ' pe tʉuya .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a net , that was cast into the sea , and gathered of every kind :
text2: “ Se kasa kanan Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe esi punwe esi na ' ne ' kasa ka ' pon amʉ ' nʉtʉrʉnʉ parau ku ' pɨri ka ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya ɨ ' si ' tau rɨ moro ' amʉ ' a ' si .

text: Which , when it was full , they drew to shore , and sat down , and gathered the good into vessels , but cast the bad away .
text2: Punwe epe ' tɨsa ' a ' tai , to ' uya ipi ' sikʉ makʉi ' . Tereutai ' , tansan pe te ' san menkato ' pe tʉuya ' nokon pa ' siki ' ti ya ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tansan pen ma ' kɨrɨi ' ma .

text: So shall it be at the end of the world : the angels shall come forth , and sever the wicked from among the just ,
text2: Serɨ kasa si iye ' to ' oton pata weyu u ' ma ' sa ' a ' tai . Inserʉ amʉ ' uye ' to ' oton , mɨrɨpan kon uya ɨri ton ka ' pon amʉ ' menkato ' oton ipokena ' ton piyapai ,

text: And shall cast them into the furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: mɨrɨpan kon uya ɨri ton ka ' pon amʉ ' eno ' mato ' oton apo ' ya ' . To ' ukaranto ' oton , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉyɨ kon kɨtɨtɨi ' mato ' oton to ' uya mɨrɨ yau , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Have ye understood all these things ? They say unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: “ Usaurokʉine ' ipɨ ' pe ' mʉto ' ka ' nʉ ' tʉu ? ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' . Mɨrɨ pɨ ' , “ Ewai ' , ina uya ito ' ka ' nʉ ' sa ' man , ” ta ' pʉ ipoitorʉ ton uya ipɨ ' .

text: Then said he unto them , Therefore every scribe which is instructed unto the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which bringeth forth out of his treasure things new and old .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' ta ' pʉ iya , “ Tanporon kon Main pɨ ' enupanin usenupasa ' Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe pɨ ' esi mɨrɨ , ka ' pon tiwʉ ' tawon emenna ' ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ penaro ' ton timamin enpa ' kapɨ ' nin kasa , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these parables , he departed thence .
text2: Panton amʉ ' i ' ma ' kasa ' tʉuya a ' tai , Sises utama ' pʉ mɨrɨ apai .

text: And when he was come into his own country , he taught them in their synagogue , insomuch that they were astonished , and said , Whence hath this man this wisdom , and these mighty works ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ tʉpata ' se ' ya ' . Ka ' pon amʉ ' enupa pɨ ' iye ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ to ' usenupato ' iwʉ ' tau . Mɨrɨpan kon usewansiuka ' pʉ . “ Nai yau si tʉpu ' ketʉ eporo ' pʉ iya tʉusauro ' to ' pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉpana ' pano eke Papa tʉrawasooi ku ' nin pe te ' to ' pe ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Is not this the carpenter ' s son ? is not his mother called Mary ? and his brethren , James , and Joses , and Simon , and Judas ?
text2: “ Kiya ' pinta mu pen pe ' pʉse rɨ ? Meri pen pe ' isan ese ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Isens , Isose ' , Saiman , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Isutas pokon pe ' yakon non pen ?

text: And his sisters , are they not all with us ? Whence then hath this man all these things ?
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporo pʉra pe ' iparusi ton nai upiyau ' nokon ? Nai yau ken si serɨ ton epopɨtʉ ' pʉ iya ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And they were offended in him . But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , save in his own country , and in his own house .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon ɨkɨnʉmʉ ' pʉ ipɨ ' , e ' tane Sises uya to ' maimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ipata ' se ' yau rɨken mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itonpa ton uya pu ' kena ' nama pʉra iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he did not many mighty works there because of their unbelief .
text2: Tu ' ke eke Papa tʉrawasooi kupʉ Sises uya pʉra iyesi ' pʉ mɨrɨ yau , apʉne pʉra apurɨto ' to ' uya pʉra iyesi pɨ ' .

text: At that time Herod the tetrarch heard of the fame of Jesus ,
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , kopʉna Era ' uya ka ' pon amʉ ' nekamanʉ eta ' pʉ mɨrɨ kupʉ Sises uya tukai ' .

text: And said unto his servants , This is John the Baptist ; he is risen from the dead ; and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ ka ' pon amʉ ' tʉpiyawon kon pɨ ' , “ Isaan Pa ' tes kʉrɨ rɨ . Iye ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' terikʉ ' pʉ apai ; mɨrɨ wenai , eke Papa tʉrawasooi kupʉ iya mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: For Herod had laid hold on John , and bound him , and put him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife .
text2: Era ' uya Isaan a ' sisa ' mɨrɨpan auronpɨ ' sa ' tʉsa ' pariki ' si ta ' esi ' pʉ , Eratiyas , Piri ' takon no ' pʉ wenai ,

text: For John said unto him , It is not lawful for thee to have her .
text2: apʉne pʉra Isaan uya ta esi ' pʉ ipɨ ' : “ Main awɨrɨ ɨwesi pe pʉra iyesi kʉrɨ rɨ anʉnsa ' auya na ' ne ' , ” ta .

text: And when he would have put him to death , he feared the multitude , because they counted him as a prophet .
text2: Era ' esi ' pʉ Isaan ɨnwɨpai , e ' tane iyenari ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' , apʉne pʉra Isaan i ' tu to ' uya pɨ ' pu ' kena ' pe .

text: But when Herod ' s birthday was kept , the daughter of Herodias danced before them , and pleased Herod .
text2: Era ' uya tentu ' pʉ weyu rʉ ' pʉ kupʉ esi ' pʉ iyenta ' nato ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Eratiyas mʉre umanumʉ ' pʉ to ' iwano ' pe . Serɨ uya Era ' kupʉ ' pʉ ipan pe rɨ pori ' pe ,

text: Whereupon he promised with an oath to give her whatsoever she would ask .
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ rɨ ekama ' po auya a ' tai , ɨrepa uya kuru rɨ mɨrɨ , ” tukai ' isaurokʉ ' pʉ .

text: And she , being before instructed of her mother , said , Give me here John Baptist ' s head in a charger .
text2: Isan uya imaimu ' tɨ ' pʉ mɨrɨ ekama ' pokɨ tukai ' , mɨrɨpan uya , “ Isaan Pa ' tes i ' pai rʉ ' pʉ ke urepakɨ serɨ yau parapi po , ” ta ' pʉ .

text: And the king was sorry : nevertheless for the oath ' s sake , and them which sat with him at meat , he commanded it to be given her .
text2: Kin upokoita ' pʉ tʉusaurokʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' ipan pe , e ' tane ikupʉ uya kuru mɨrɨ tasa ' tʉuya rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' enta ' nai ' tʉnkɨ ' ma ' san pana yai rɨ ikupʉ iya rɨ esi ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya tʉsoisaai amʉ ' apiyo ' ma ' pʉ inesakʉ ' pʉ ku ' to ' pe to ' uya ,

text: And he sent , and beheaded John in the prison .
text2: mɨrɨpan kon uya Isaan i ' pairʉka ' pʉ pariki ' si tau .

text: And his head was brought in a charger , and given to the damsel : and she brought it to her mother .
text2: I ' pai rʉ ' pʉ nee ' pʉ to ' uya parapi po , mɨrɨpan kon uya itʉrʉ ' pʉ uri ' san ena ' , mɨrɨpan arɨ ' pʉ iya tʉsan ena ' .

text: And his disciples came , and took up the body , and buried it , and went and told Jesus .
text2: Isaan poitorʉ rʉ ' san uyee ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya itekepu arɨ ' pʉ iu ' na ' tɨto ' pe tʉuya ' nokon , mɨrɨpan kon utɨ ' pʉ Sises pana ' tɨi ' .

text: When Jesus heard of it , he departed thence by ship into a desert place apart : and when the people had heard thereof , they followed him on foot out of the cities .
text2: Iye ' ku ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ etasa ' tʉuya a ' tai , Sises ekanwa ' tɨ ' pʉ kanau ya ' , mɨrɨpan kon utɨ ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton pokon pe tʉ ' kena ' pɨ ya ' . Tu ' kan kon nɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' uya serɨ eta ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon utɨ ' pʉ tʉ ' ta kon po Sises pɨkɨrɨ pata ton apai ' ne .

text: And Jesus went forth , and saw a great multitude , and was moved with compassion toward them , and he healed their sick .
text2: Sises ekanwakasa ' uya tu ' ke anpisin pe ka ' pon amʉ ' ensa ' a ' tai , ipan pe rɨ to ' pɨ ' isentu ' ma ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya rɨ to ' koro ' tau takuru ' ke ' ne te ' san epi ' tɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ .

text: And when it was evening , his disciples came to him , saying , This is a desert place , and the time is now past ; send the multitude away , that they may go into the villages , and buy themselves victuals .
text2: Ko ' mamʉ pe rɨ iyenaka ' tane , ipoitorʉ ton uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ɨnnon sa ' ne serɨ pata ko , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pata kanan uko ' manka ' sa ' . Ka ' pon amʉ ' ipana ' tɨ ' tiwano ' kon pe ti ' kiyari kon epose ' na to ' utɨto ' pe eke iwa ton pata pona ' ne , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: But Jesus said unto them , They need not depart ; give ye them to eat .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ To ' kʉsenno ' tʉu . To ' a ' re ' tɨtɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they say unto him , We have here but five loaves , and two fishes .
text2: “ Ina piyau 5 kaisaron nɨken itekiino pʉreti mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ asa ' ron kon nʉ ' kwɨ moro ' amʉ ' esi , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' .

text: He said , Bring them hither to me .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Pʉreti mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ moro ' amʉ ' ine ' tɨ ' uyena ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the grass , and took the five loaves , and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed , and brake , and gave the loaves to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' , “ Ereutapɨ ' tɨ ' wana ' pona ' ne , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨ tʉpo , 5 kaisaron itekiino pʉreti mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ moro ' amʉ ' anʉmʉ ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan uya tenu anʉmʉ ' pʉ ka ' winɨkʉi ' , mɨrɨpan uya pʉreti , moro ' amʉ ' i ' kwɨ ' pɨtʉi ' ma tenki ta ' pʉ Papa pɨ ' . Mɨrɨ tʉpo , itʉrʉ ' pʉ iya tʉpoitorʉ ton ena ' , mɨrɨpan ekamʉ ' pʉ to ' uya ka ' pon amʉ ' ena ' .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the fragments that remained twelve baskets full .
text2: Tanporon kon nɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' enta ' na ' pʉ ta ' wetapɨ ' se , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipoitorʉ ton uya kiyari punu ' pɨ e ' nonkasa ' ke 12 kaisaron pa ' siki ' ti arʉ ' tɨ ' pʉ .

text: And they that had eaten were about five thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Mɨrɨ yau si 5 , 000 e ' to ' airɨ warawoti ' si amʉ ' tu ' kanoro esi ' pʉ . Uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' , mʉre amʉ ' nɨrɨ esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ yau to ' pokon pe pʉra to ' i ' tusa ' .

text: And straightway Jesus constrained his disciples to get into a ship , and to go before him unto the other side , while he sent the multitudes away .
text2: Inke pʉra tʉpoitorʉ ton ekanwa ' tɨto ' pe kanau ya ' ikuu ' pʉ Sises uya , to ' utɨto ' pe tʉrawɨrɨ iratoi pona , anpisin enno ' tane tʉuya .

text: And when he had sent the multitudes away , he went up into a mountain apart to pray : and when the evening was come , he was there alone .
text2: To ' ennoko tʉpo , Sises utɨ ' pʉ wʉ ' pona tikin sarɨ ɨpʉremase ' na Papa pɨ ' . Pata uko ' mansa ' a ' tai , tikin sarɨ rɨ mɨrɨ yau iyesi ' pʉ .

text: But the ship was now in the midst of the sea , tossed with waves : for the wind was contrary .
text2: E ' tane ipoitorʉ ton e ' to ' yau kanau esi ' pʉ ɨnnɨ rɨ ite ' pi piyapai . Eke pe rɨ sipa ' sipa esi ' pʉ kanau rɨ tʉwɨpɨ ' se , apʉne pʉra a ' setun uyee ' pʉ ɨsɨ pe to ' winɨkʉi ' .

text: And in the fourth watch of the night Jesus went unto them , walking on the sea .
text2: Awanakʉi ' kuru , pata emakʉ wapiya , Sises epa ' ka ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton piya ' . Parau ku ' pɨri po itɨ ' pʉ .

text: And when the disciples saw him walking on the sea , they were troubled , saying , It is a spirit ; and they cried out for fear .
text2: Parau ku ' pɨri po iyepʉ ene tʉuya ' nokon a ' tai , ipan pe rɨ to ' etʉipɨtʉ ' pʉ . “ A ' kwarʉ ' pʉ rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ ! ” tukai ' to ' ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ tetʉipɨtʉ kon pe .

text: But straightway Jesus spake unto them , saying , Be of good cheer ; it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Sises uya inke pʉra rɨ to ' pɨ ' ta ' pʉ , “ Meruntɨ pe e ' tɨ ' ! Urɨ rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ ! Ketʉipɨ ' tʉu ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Peter answered him and said , Lord , if it be thou , bid me come unto thee on the water .
text2: Pi ' ta uya ta ' pʉ , “ Uyepuru , ɨmɨrɨ pe iyesi yau , ukɨ ' makɨ ɨpiya ' utɨto ' pe tuna pʉro ' po ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said , Come . And when Peter was come down out of the ship , he walked on the water , to go to Jesus .
text2: Sises uya , “ Ɨsi ' kɨ si upiya ' ! ” ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' . Mɨrɨ pɨ ' Pi ' ta ekanwaka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ tuna pʉro ' po Sises piya ' .

text: But when he saw the wind boisterous , he was afraid ; and beginning to sink , he cried , saying , Lord , save me .
text2: E ' tane mɨrɨ a ' tai , Pi ' ta uya eke rɨ sipa ' sipa , a ' setun nɨrɨ ene ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ pɨ ' iyenari ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ e ' sʉnkan pɨ ' tuna ka ' , mɨrɨpan ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ , “ Uyepuru , upika ' tɨ ' ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And immediately Jesus stretched forth his hand , and caught him , and said unto him , O thou of little faith , wherefore didst thou doubt ?
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , inke pʉra rɨ Sises uya temiyatʉ ɨnka ' pʉ a ' sise ' na , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ Pi ' ta pɨ ' , “ Aiko pe kuru anapurɨnʉ man ! Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' ikasima ' pʉ auya ? ” ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' .

text: And when they were come into the ship , the wind ceased .
text2: Kanau ya ' to ' ekanwa ' tɨsa ' a ' tai rɨ , a ' setun ereuta ' pʉ .

text: Then they that were in the ship came and worshipped him , saying , Of a truth thou art the Son of God .
text2: Kamoro nin si kanau yawon kon uya apurɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ , “ I ' napairɨ rɨ Papa Mumu pe ɨwesi , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And when they were gone over , they came into the land of Gennesaret .
text2: To ' ɨ ' kwɨrɨ ' sa ' a ' tai , to ' e ' te ' ka ' pʉ Kenesare ' airɨ .

text: And when the men of that place had knowledge of him , they sent out into all that country round about , and brought unto him all that were diseased ;
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' mɨrɨ yau te ' san uya Sises to ' ka ' nʉ ' sa ' a ' tai , to ' uya si tʉmaimu kon enno ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ a ' ko pa ' nan ka ' pon amʉ ' ena ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya si tanporo takuru ' kena ' nan nee ' pʉ Sises piya ' .

text: And besought him that they might only touch the hem of his garment : and as many as touched were made perfectly whole .
text2: Ipan pe Sises pawana ' tɨ ' pʉ to ' uya , “ Tɨwɨ takuru ' kena ' nan ka ' pon amʉ ' ɨpon e ' pi a ' pɨ ' pɨtʉi , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya , mɨrɨpan tanporo kon a ' pɨ ' pɨ ' nin nʉ ' san usepi ' tɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ .

text: Then came to Jesus scribes and Pharisees , which were of Jerusalem , saying ,
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Pari ' si amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Main pɨ ' enupanin nan tonpa ton utɨ ' pʉ Sises piya ' Surusiran poi , mɨrɨpan kon uya ,

text: Why do thy disciples transgress the tradition of the elders ? for they wash not their hands when they eat bread .
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' ɨpoitorʉ ton uya ina epuru ton eseru rʉ ' pʉ i ' kwɨtʉ ? Temiyatʉ kon korʉka to ' uya pʉra iyesi tenta ' na kon rawɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' .

text: But he answered and said unto them , Why do ye also transgress the commandment of God by your tradition ?
text2: Sises uya to ' maimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe ken iyesi pɨ ' Papa Maimu i ' kwɨtʉ auya ' nokon , ɨyeseru kon awɨrɨ ɨwesii ' ma ' nokon ?

text: For God commanded , saying , Honour thy father and mother : and , He that curseth father or mother , let him die the death .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Papa uya , ‘ Asanon kon inamatɨ ' , ’ tasa ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ , ‘ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ tʉsanon pa ' nʉ ' nin wɨto ' pe kuru rɨ iyesi , ’ tasa ' .

text: But ye say , Whosoever shall say to his father or his mother , It is a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ;
text2: E ' tane ta auya ' nokon , ka ' pon uya rɨ tʉkʉipʉnʉ pɨ ' mɨrɨ pe pʉra tʉsan pɨ ' , ‘ Ɨpika ' tɨto ' pe ɨneporonʉ uwinɨ tʉsa ' man Papa ena ' , ’ ta yau ,

text: And honour not his father or his mother , he shall be free . Thus have ye made the commandment of God of none effect by your tradition .
text2: mɨrɨ ke tʉkʉipʉnʉ namato ' iya pʉra iyesi . Mɨrɨ kasa si ipʉra Papa maimu kupʉ auya ' nokon ɨyeseru kon pɨkɨrɨ .

text: Ye hypocrites , well did Esaias prophesy of you , saying ,
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon wakʉ pe te ' ku ' san ! I ' napai rɨ kuru rɨ Aisaya usaurokʉ ' pʉ man ɨpɨ ' nokon :

text: This people draweth nigh unto me with their mouth , and honoureth me with their lips ; but their heart is far from me .
text2: “ ‘ Pʉsamoro uya unama tʉnta kon ke rɨ , e ' tane ɨnnɨ rɨ to ' ewan esi upiyapai .

text: But in vain they do worship me , teaching for doctrines the commandments of men .
text2: To ' ɨpʉrema upɨ ' , ɨ ' rɨ epoton kon kasa rɨ , to ' usenupato ' esi ka ' pon amʉ ' uya rɨken to ' enupa ' pʉ ipɨ ' to ' e ' to ' yawɨrɨ pe , ’ tawon , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he called the multitude , and said unto them , Hear , and understand :
text2: Anpisin ton kɨ ' ma ' pʉ Sises uya tʉpiya ' , mɨrɨpan uya , “ Umaimu etatɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ito ' ka ' nʉ ' tɨ ' .

text: Not that which goeth into the mouth defileth a man ; but that which cometh out of the mouth , this defileth a man .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ rɨ ka ' pon mʉta ya ' nʉtɨyai ' ne ' uya wakʉ pe pʉra ka ' pon kupʉ pen ; e ' tane ka ' pon mʉta yai nepa ' kayai ' ne ' uya kuru wakʉ pe pʉra ka ' pon kupʉ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then came his disciples , and said unto him , Knowest thou that the Pharisees were offended , after they heard this saying ?
text2: Sises poitorʉ ton uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya , “ Mi ' tuyan pe ' serɨ pe kuru masaurokʉine ' uya Pari ' si amʉ ' ɨkɨnʉnpa ' pʉ ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' .

text: But he answered and said , Every plant , which my heavenly Father hath not planted , shall be rooted up .
text2: To ' eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Tanporon nɨ ite ' tʉnpɨmɨ ' pʉ pen kuru ' kato ' oton ukʉipʉnʉ Epʉn po na ' ne ' uya .

text: Let them alone : they be blind leaders of the blind . And if the blind lead the blind , both shall fall into the ditch .
text2: Tɨwɨ kamoro itepuru ton nesii , itenu pʉra to ' esi mɨrɨ . Tenku ' nan uya tenku ' nan arɨ a ' tai , asa ' rɨ rɨ to ' uta ' mo ' ka mɨrɨ akasa ' ya ' , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Declare unto us this parable .
text2: Pi ' ta uya Sises ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ ta e ' kwa pe serɨ panton esi ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus said , Are ye also yet without understanding ?
text2: Sises uya , “ Ito ' ka ' nʉ ' nin nan pe pʉra rɨ marɨ pe ' ɨwesi kon mɨrɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ .

text: Do not ye yet understand , that whatsoever entereth in at the mouth goeth into the belly , and is cast out into the draught ?
text2: “ Ene auya ' nokon pʉra pe ' iyesi ɨ ' rɨ rɨ mʉta ya ' newonyai ' ne ' utɨ ewan ya ' , mɨrɨpan epa ' ka pun apai ?

text: But those things which proceed out of the mouth come forth from the heart ; and they defile the man .
text2: E ' tane ɨri main ka ' pon mʉta yai nepa ' kayai ' ne ' uyepʉ itewan yapai . Serɨ ton uya ka ' pon kupʉ mɨrɨ ɨri pe .

text: For out of the heart proceed evil thoughts , murders , adulteries , fornications , thefts , false witness , blasphemies :
text2: Apʉne pʉra ka ' pon ewan yapai ɨri pɨ ' isenuminkato ' uyepʉ ; e ' wɨn , tʉron kon no ' pʉ a ' kɨrɨ te ' sen pe , tʉnmari ' ma ' pʉ pen nɨ a ' kɨrɨ tekumasen pe , ama ' e ' pe rɨ , kasi ye ' pe rɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨri pe tʉron kon pɨ ' tʉusauro ' sen pe .

text: These are the things which defile a man : but to eat with unwashen hands defileth not a man .
text2: Serɨ ton uya ka ' pon kupʉ mɨrɨ ɨri pe , temiyatʉ tʉkorʉkai ' pʉra iyenta ' na uya pen , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: Then Jesus went thence , and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon .
text2: Mɨrɨ pata tʉnɨnse , Sises utɨ ' pʉ Kiyarari ponsi ' kɨ Taya mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Saitan itese ' ton nono ya ' ne .

text: And , behold , a woman of Canaan came out of the same coasts , and cried unto him , saying , Have mercy on me , O Lord , thou Son of David ; my daughter is grievously vexed with a devil .
text2: Mɨrɨ yawon , uri ' san , Esuwerʉ pe pʉra te ' sen uyee ' pʉ ɨkɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉi ' ma Sises piya ' , “ Uyepuru , kin Tepi ' pa rʉ ' pʉ , upɨ ' ɨsentu ' ma ' ! Makoi a ' kwarʉ yen pe umʉre esi ekota ' man pɨ ' man ipan pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But he answered her not a word . And his disciples came and besought him , saying , Send her away ; for she crieth after us .
text2: E ' tane Sises uya imaimu eikʉ pʉra iyesi pɨ ' , ipoitorʉ ton uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' mɨrɨpan kon uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Enno ' kɨ , apʉne pʉra ɨkɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉi ' ma uye ' ma ' pʉkapɨtʉ kon pɨ ' man , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: But he answered and said , I am not sent but unto the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Sises uya nin si eikʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ , “ Papa uya uyenno ' sa ' serɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' piya ' rɨken , itano ' masa ' kon karimeru amʉ ' kasa te ' san piya ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then came she and worshipped him , saying , Lord , help me .
text2: Uri ' san uyee ' pʉ Sises piya ' , mɨrɨpan e ' sekunka ' pʉ ipiyau , mɨrɨpan uya , “ Uyepuru , upika ' tɨ ' ! ” ta ' pʉ .

text: But he answered and said , It is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it to dogs .
text2: Eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Ipoken pʉra iyesi mʉre amʉ ' yu pʉreti eno ' ma to ' ikʉn non pero amʉ ' ena ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And she said , Truth , Lord : yet the dogs eat of the crumbs which fall from their masters ' table .
text2: “ Ewai ' , Epuru , e ' tane tesa ' i ' kiyari punu ' pɨ uta ' po ' sa ' tepʉrʉ poi pɨ ' rɨ tʉuta ' re ' tɨsan kamoro pero amʉ ' , ” ta ' pʉ uri ' san uya .

text: Then Jesus answered and said unto her , O woman , great is thy faith : be it unto thee even as thou wilt . And her daughter was made whole from that very hour .
text2: Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' , “ Eke pe kuru apurɨto ' auya man ! Tɨwɨ si ɨnekama ' po ' pʉ ne ' kupʉi , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya ipɨ ' , mɨrɨpan mʉre ena ' pʉ wakʉ pe mɨrɨ a ' tai rɨ .

text: And Jesus departed from thence , and came nigh unto the sea of Galilee ; and went up into a mountain , and sat down there .
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo , Sises uya mɨrɨ pata nɨmɨ ' pʉ ; parau ku ' pɨri Kiyarari e ' pi poro itɨ ' pʉ . Wʉ ' pona iyenuku ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan ereuta ' pʉ .

text: And great multitudes came unto him , having with them those that were lame , blind , dumb , maimed , and many others , and cast them down at Jesus ' feet ; and he healed them :
text2: Mɨrɨ yau , anpisin pe ka ' pon amʉ ' uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya tʉusasan pen mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tenku ' na ' nan nee ' pʉ ta ' kɨrɨ ' nokon ; tʉron kon nee ' pʉ to ' uya ise ' mepɨ ' sa ' kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉusauro ' san pen , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉron kon nɨ e ' ne ' pe te ' san , mɨrɨpan kon nonkapɨtʉ ' pʉ to ' uya Sises piya ' , mɨrɨpan uya tanporo rɨ to ' epi ' tɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ .

text: Insomuch that the multitude wondered , when they saw the dumb to speak , the maimed to be whole , the lame to walk , and the blind to see : and they glorified the God of Israel .
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' usewansiuka ' pʉ , tʉusauro ' san pen ka ' pon amʉ ' usaurokʉ tetase , tʉron kon ipu ' tɨka ' sa ' kon usepi ' tɨsa ' tense , tʉusasan pen usarɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tenku ' na ' nan enasa ' ennin pe tense . Mɨrɨ tense Papa apurɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ to ' uya Esuwerʉ amʉ ' ɨpʉremato ' ipɨ ' .

text: Then Jesus called his disciples unto him , and said , I have compassion on the multitude , because they continue with me now three days , and have nothing to eat : and I will not send them away fasting , lest they faint in the way .
text2: Sises uya tʉpoitorʉ ton kɨ ' ma ' pʉ tʉpiya ' , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ , “ Pʉsamoro ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' usentu ' mayai ' , apʉne pʉra osorʉwau wʉi upiyau ' nokon to ' uko ' mansa ' , mɨrɨpan kon enta ' nato ' ipɨ ' pʉra iyesi to ' ɨnenno ' pai pʉra esi iwan pe , yai to ' utɨ esi tʉutɨ kon koro ' tau , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And his disciples say unto him , Whence should we have so much bread in the wilderness , as to fill so great a multitude ?
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' ipoitorʉ ton uya , “ Nai yau rɨ eke pe pʉreti eporo ina uya pʉsamoro ka ' pon amʉ ' a ' re ' tɨto ' ike serɨ ɨnnon nɨ pata yau ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven , and a few little fishes .
