text2: Sises uya to ' ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ kaisa rɨ pʉreti nai ɨpiyau ' nokon ? ” tukai ' . Mɨrɨ pɨ ' , “ 7 pe rɨken mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tu ' kan kon pen aiko ton moro ' amʉ ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the ground .
text2: Anpisin auro ' ka ' pʉ iya to ' ereutato ' pe non pona .

text: And he took the seven loaves and the fishes , and gave thanks , and brake them , and gave to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya 7 kaisaron pʉreti mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tu ' kan kon pen moro ' amʉ ' anʉmʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya tenki ta ' pʉ tʉuya rʉ ' pʉ pe i ' kwɨ ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ . Tʉpoitorʉ ton ena ' itʉpɨtʉ ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan kon uya ka ' pon amʉ ' ena ' ekamʉ ' pʉ .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets full .
text2: Tanporo to ' enta ' na ' pʉ ta ' wetapɨ ' se . Mɨrɨ tʉpo , ipʉ ' kʉ rʉ ' san e ' nonkasa ' amʉranʉkʉ ' pʉ ipoitorʉ ton uya , 7 kaisaron pa ' siki ' ti tʉpe ' ke ' ne .

text: And they that did eat were four thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Kamoro iyenta ' nasa ' kon tu ' kanoro esi ' pʉ 4 , 000 kaisa rɨ , uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ mʉre amʉ ' pokon ti ' tui ' pʉra .

text: And he sent away the multitude , and took ship , and came into the coasts of Magdala ,
text2: Anpisin ka ' pon amʉ ' ennoko tʉpo , Sises ekanwa ' tɨ ' pʉ kanau ya ' tʉpoitorʉ ton pokon pe , mɨrɨpan kon utɨ ' pʉ Makatan itese ' pʉ ' kʉ pona .

text: The Pharisees also with the Sadducees came , and tempting desired him that he would shew them a sign from heaven .
text2: Pari ' si amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Satu ' si amʉ ' uyee ' pʉ Sises piya ' i ' tupɨ ' se ' na ti ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ Epʉn poino ku ' to ' pe iya .

text: He answered and said unto them , When it is evening , ye say , It will be fair weather : for the sky is red .
text2: Entakanoma ' pʉ iya , “ Ko ' mamʉ pe kuru pata enasa ' a ' tai , ‘ Tuna uyepʉ pen mɨrɨ , apʉne pʉra isuweyu pe ka ' man , ’ ta auya ' nokon ,

text: And in the morning , It will be foul weather to day : for the sky is red and lowring . O ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky ; but can ye not discern the signs of the times ?
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ awanakʉi ' , ‘ Serɨ pe tuna pokon pe a ' setun pe pata esi mɨrɨ , apʉne pʉra isuweyu pe ka ' esi mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ewarupɨ pe , ’ ta auya ' nokon . Ka ' winɨ rɨ ɨ ' rɨ rɨ enpoikanin pe ɨwesi kon , e ' tane si pata weyu i ' tuto ' ipɨ ' enpoika auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi .

text: A wicked and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given unto it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas . And he left them , and departed .
text2: Ɨri ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyemari ' masa ' ekumankanin nan ka ' pon amʉ ' esi eke Papa tʉrawasooi i ' tuto ' tʉuya ' nokon ipɨkɨrɨ kupʉ uya i ' se . Ikupʉ uya pen , e ' tane Isona pɨ ' i ' tuto ' ipɨ ' rʉ ' pʉ na ' ne ' rɨken kupʉ uya , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨpan kon tʉnɨnse Sises utɨ ' pʉ .

text: And when his disciples were come to the other side , they had forgotten to take bread .
text2: Parau ku ' pɨri ratoi pona to ' ɨ ' kwɨrɨ ' sa ' a ' tai , pʉreti arɨ to ' uya pʉra ipoitorʉ ton upu ' tɨkaa ' pʉ esi ' pʉ .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Take heed and beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: “ Ti ' tui ' e ' tɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya to ' pɨ ' , “ te ' mainanpai ' e ' tɨ ' Pari ' si amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Satu ' si amʉ ' uya pʉrowa a ' sarutanʉ ' to ' ike namai ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have taken no bread .
text2: To ' usaurokʉ ' pʉ tiwano ' kon pe , “ Apʉne pʉra pʉreti ne ' sa ' kasa pʉra isaurokʉ mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Which when Jesus perceived , he said unto them , O ye of little faith , why reason ye among yourselves , because ye have brought no bread ?
text2: To ' usauro ' to ' i ' tu tʉuya pɨ ' , Sises uya to ' ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon aiko rʉ ' kwɨ apurɨto ' iya ton ! Ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' ausaurokʉ kon pʉreti pʉra ɨwesi kon pɨ ' ?

text: Do ye not yet understand , neither remember the five loaves of the five thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: Ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ auya ' nokon pʉra rɨ marɨ pe ' iyesi ? Ɨyenu kon yau pe ' ikupʉ auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi 5 kaisaron pʉreti 5 , 000 kaisaron kon iwano ' rʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pa ' siki ' ti ton pe ' tɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ auya ' nokon ?

text: Neither the seven loaves of the four thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: Mɨrɨ pe pʉra , 7 kaisaron pʉreti 4 , 000 kaisaron kon iwano ' , ɨ ' rɨ kaisa rɨ pa ' siki ' ti mamʉranʉ ' ta ' tʉi ?

text: How is it that ye do not understand that I spake it not to you concerning bread , that ye should beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees ?
text2: Nai pe ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi pʉreti pɨ ' ayauro ' ka uya ' nokon pen tukai ' ? E ' tane Pari ' si amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Satu ' si amʉ ' uya pʉreti a ' sarutanʉ ' to ' namai ' ɨye ' mainanpa kon pa , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then understood they how that he bade them not beware of the leaven of bread , but of the doctrine of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , to ' uya ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ ' pʉ pʉrowa a ' sarutanʉ ' nin itisu pen nɨ pɨ ' kenʉ ' Sises usaurokʉ ' pʉ tukai ' , e ' tane Pari ' si amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Satu ' si amʉ ' uya enupan nɨto ' pɨ ' kenʉ ' tukai ' .

text: When Jesus came into the coasts of Caesarea Philippi , he asked his disciples , saying , Whom do men say that I the Son of man am ?
text2: Sises mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipoitorʉ ton uya Sisariya Piri ' pai nono eposa ' a ' tai , tʉpoitorʉ ton ekama ' po ' pʉ iya , “ Ɨnʉ ' pe Ka ' pon , Papa winon esi tukai ' ka ' pon amʉ ' nʉsauro ' an ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they said , Some say that thou art John the Baptist : some , Elias ; and others , Jeremias , or one of the prophets .
text2: To ' uya entakanoma ' pʉ , “ Tʉron kon uya Isaan Pa ' tes ta ɨpɨ ' ; tʉron kon uya kanan pu ' kena ' Iraisa ta ; tʉron kon uya rɨ marɨ Iseremaya mɨrɨ pe pʉra tʉron kon pu ' kena ' amʉ ' tonpa ton ta ɨpɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: He saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ?
text2: “ E ' tane si , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon , ɨnʉ ' pe ken si esi mʉkayatʉu ? ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And Simon Peter answered and said , Thou art the Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Saiman Pi ' ta uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨmɨrɨ kʉrɨ rɨ Kʉrai , nurɨne te ' sen Papa Mumu , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Blessed art thou , Simon Barjona : for flesh and blood hath not revealed it unto thee , but my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Pori ' rɨ ɨmɨrɨ , Saiman , Isona mu , i ' napairon serɨ uye ' sa ' ka ' pon amʉ ' winɨ pen e ' tane tʉmɨrɨ pe Papa uya ekamasa ' ɨpɨ ' .

text: And I say also unto thee , That thou art Peter , and upon this rock I will build my church ; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it .
text2: Ekama uya serɨ , Pi ' ta pe ɨyese ' esi , Tɨ ' ta e ' kwa pe . Uso ' sii nin si amɨ uya , ɨmɨrɨ tɨ ' po , iyeri ' sa ' kon utɨto ' ya ' pata mʉra ' taai enato ' oton pen itentai .

text: And I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom of heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe yau kii ke ɨrepa uya ; serɨ non po ɨ ' rɨ rɨ auronsa ' auya a ' tai , Papa uya kanan auromʉ mɨrɨ Epʉn po ; mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ serɨ non po ɨ ' rɨ rɨ eukasa ' auya iyesi a ' tai , Papa uya kanan euka mɨrɨ Epʉn po , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then charged he his disciples that they should tell no man that he was Jesus the Christ .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya tʉpoitorʉ ton panama ' pʉ ɨnʉ ' rɨ pana ' tɨ to ' uya namai ' Kʉrai pe iyesi , tukai ' .

text: From that time forth began Jesus to shew unto his disciples , how that he must go unto Jerusalem , and suffer many things of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be killed , and be raised again the third day .
text2: Mɨrɨ si ' kɨrɨ , Sises uya tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' ekama ' pʉ Surusiran pona tʉutɨto ' oton nɨ , mɨrɨ yau tu ' kan yau rɨ itepuru ton uya , Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Main pɨ ' enupanin nan uya rɨ tʉkota ' mato ' oton , mɨrɨpan kon uya tʉwɨto ' oton , mɨrɨpan te ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' oton itosorʉwano wʉi a ' tai tʉuko ' manton pe ekama ' pʉ iya .

text: Then Peter took him , and began to rebuke him , saying , Be it far from thee , Lord : this shall not be unto thee .
text2: Pi ' ta uya Sises arɨ ' pʉ , ɨnnɨ kuru pʉra rɨ tʉron kon ipoitorʉ ton piyapai esereme ' se ' na . “ Mɨrɨ kasa kasaurokʉi ! Serɨ kʉse ' ku ' nin ɨpɨ ' , uyepuru ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But he turned , and said unto Peter , Get thee behind me , Satan : thou art an offence unto me : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but those that be of men .
text2: Sises era ' tɨ ' pʉ Pi ' ta winɨkʉi ' , mɨrɨpan uya , “ Atamakɨ , Se ' tan ! ” ta ' pʉ . “ Uye ' ma tau uwa ' kʉ ' pɨ ' nin tɨ ' pe me ' ai ' ; ka ' pon usenuminkato ' kasa ɨusenuminka , Papa usenuminkato ' kasa pʉra , ” ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Sises uya tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' ta ' pʉ , “ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ upoitorʉ pe e ' pai na ' ne ' , tɨwɨ teseru nonkai mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tekota ' mato ' kurusu ' anʉmʉi , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ upɨkɨrɨ tʉuye ' to ' pe .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : and whosoever will lose his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Apʉne pʉra ɨnʉ ' rɨ serɨ yau tʉuko ' manto ' ɨnnonkapai pʉra na ' ne ' uya epoto ' oton pen nɨ , e ' tane ɨnʉ ' rɨ serɨ yau tʉuko ' manto ' nonkanin uya , urɨ wenai , epoto ' oton .

text: For what is a man profited , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ? or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ wakʉ esi ka ' pon pɨ ' serɨ po tanporon nɨ eposa ' iya yau ta ' kwarʉ nonkai ' ma ? Mɨrɨ pe pʉra , ɨ ' rɨ tʉrʉ iya ta ' kwarʉ entakano ' pe ?

text: For the Son of man shall come in the glory of his Father with his angels ; and then he shall reward every man according to his works .
text2: Apana ' tɨ uya ' nokon serɨ ; Ka ' pon , Papa winon uye ' to ' oton tʉkʉipʉnʉ meruntɨrʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itinserʉʉi ton pokon pe . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , to ' epe ' pʉ ke ka ' pon amʉ ' e ' mato ' iya oton to ' nʉkupʉ ' pʉ pɨkɨrɨ .

text: Verily I say unto you , There be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the Son of man coming in his kingdom .
text2: I ' napairon kuru ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , serɨ yau iye ' soto ' pɨ ' sa ' na ' ne ' nan tonpa ton eri ' to ' oton pen Ka ' pon , Papa winon uyepʉ esa ' wannɨ pe te ' to ' yau ene tʉuya ' nokon rawɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And after six days Jesus taketh Peter , James , and John his brother , and bringeth them up into an high mountain apart ,
text2: 6 kaisa rɨ wʉi tʉpo , Sises uya Pi ' ta , Isens , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyakon Isaan pokon nɨken arɨ ' pʉ ta ' kɨrɨ wʉ ' nakapu pona .

text: And was transfigured before them : and his face did shine as the sun , and his raiment was white as the light .
text2: Mɨrɨ yau , tʉron nɨ pe iyena ' pʉ , itemʉ ' e ' wei ' tɨ ' pʉ wʉi enu kasa , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipon ena ' pʉ aimu ' ne , enkena ' pe .

text: And , behold , there appeared unto them Moses and Elias talking with him .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai kuru si mɨrɨ yau , Mosi ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Iraisa usenpoika ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya Sises auro ' ka esi ' pʉ .

text: Then answered Peter , and said unto Jesus , Lord , it is good for us to be here : if thou wilt , let us make here three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Pi ' ta uya ta ' pʉ Sises pɨ ' , “ Uyepuru ! Wakʉ rɨ pan pe serɨ yau ina man ! I ' se ɨwesi yau , osorʉwau ɨiwʉ ' kon amɨ uya mɨrɨ ; tikin nɨ ɨiwano ' pe , Mosi ' iwano ' pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Iraisa iwano ' pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: While he yet spake , behold , a bright cloud overshadowed them : and behold a voice out of the cloud , which said , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased ; hear ye him .
text2: Pi ' ta usaurokʉ koro ' tau , enkena ' kapuru ' uya to ' nɨpontɨ ' pʉ . Main kapuru ' yawon uya ta ' pʉ , “ Umu pʉse rɨ , Uni ' nʉnkanʉ , ipɨ ' pori ' pe e ' ai ' ipan pe ; imaimu etatɨ ' ! ” tawon .

text: And when the disciples heard it , they fell on their face , and were sore afraid .
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton uya serɨ main etasa ' a ' tai , to ' etʉipɨtʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uta ' mo ' ka ' pʉ non pona itemʉ ' .

text: And Jesus came and touched them , and said , Arise , and be not afraid .
text2: E ' tane Sises uyee ' pʉ to ' a ' pɨ ' se ' na , “ E ' mʉ ' sa ' katɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya , “ Ketʉipɨ ' tʉu , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when they had lifted up their eyes , they saw no man , save Jesus only .
text2: Tenu kon anʉnsa ' to ' uya a ' tai , ɨnʉ ' ene ' pʉ to ' uya pen nɨ , Sises rɨken ene ' pʉ to ' uya tikin sarɨ .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , Jesus charged them , saying , Tell the vision to no man , until the Son of man be risen again from the dead .
text2: Wʉ ' ponsi ' kɨ ɨu ' tɨi ' ma rɨ , Sises uya to ' panama ' pʉ , “ Ɨnʉ ' pɨ ' rɨ ɨnene ' pʉ kon kʉsekamatʉu , Ka ' pon , Papa winon eri ' sa ' e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Why then say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe ken si iyesi pɨ ' Main pɨ ' enupanin nan uya Iraisa kuru uye ' to ' oton wapiya ta ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Elias truly shall first come , and restore all things .
text2: Sises uya to ' entakanoma ' pʉ , “ I ' napairɨ rɨ Iraisa uye ' to ' oton ta to ' uya , tanporon nɨ konekai ' iyesi ' pʉ ya ' .

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is come already , and they knew him not , but have done unto him whatsoever they listed . Likewise shall also the Son of man suffer of them .
text2: E ' tane nin si ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , Iraisa uye ' kaa ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan i ' tu to ' uya pʉra rɨ iyesi ' pʉ , e ' tane i ' se te ' to ' kon awɨrɨ ɨri eseru kupʉ ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' . Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ Ka ' pon , Papa winon ekota ' mato ' oton to ' enau , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then the disciples understood that he spake unto them of John the Baptist .
text2: Iraisa pɨ ' Sises usaurokʉ a ' tai , Isaan Pa ' tes pɨ ' isaurokʉ tukai ' ipoitorʉ ton uya i ' tu ' pʉ .

text: And when they were come to the multitude , there came to him a certain man , kneeling down to him , and saying ,
text2: Anpisin ton koro ' ta ' to ' uye ' sa ' a ' tai , ka ' pon uyee ' pʉ Sises piya ' , mɨrɨpan e ' sekunka ' pʉ ipiyau .

text: Lord , have mercy on my son : for he is lunatick , and sore vexed : for ofttimes he falleth into the fire , and oft into the water .
text2: Ta ' pʉ iya Sises pɨ ' , “ Uyepuru , umu pɨ ' ɨsentu ' makɨ . Yai itɨpɨtʉ , ipan pe iyekota ' ma . Apo ' ya ' , tuna ka ' rɨ ita ' mo ' kapɨ ' pɨtʉ .

text: And I brought him to thy disciples , and they could not cure him .
text2: Ɨpoitorʉ ton piya ' inee ' pʉ uya , e ' tane to ' uya epi ' tɨ poken pʉra iyesi ' pʉ , ” ta ' pʉ iya Sises pɨ ' .

text: Then Jesus answered and said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him hither to me .
text2: “ Ɨri sɨ ! Ɨri ton nɨ , apurɨnin nan pen nɨ serɨ a ' taino kon ! Ɨ ' rɨ pʉ ' kʉ pona useta ' ka pʉra uko ' mamʉ ɨpiyau ' nokon ? Ɨ ' rɨ pʉ ' kʉ pona aya ' kɨrɨ ' nokon esi ? Ine ' tɨ ' upiya ' ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus rebuked the devil ; and he departed out of him : and the child was cured from that very hour .
text2: Sises uya makoi a ' kwarʉ eseremekʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan epa ' ka ' pʉ warawo ' mʉre apai . Mɨrɨ a ' tai rɨ , isepi ' tɨ ' pʉ .

text: Then came the disciples to Jesus apart , and said , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises piya ' ipoitorʉ ton uyee ' pʉ ama ' ai , mɨrɨpan kon uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' ina uya enpa ' ka pʉra iyesi ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Because of your unbelief : for verily I say unto you , If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye shall say unto this mountain , Remove hence to yonder place ; and it shall remove ; and nothing shall be impossible unto you .
text2: Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Apʉne pʉra aiko pe rʉ ' kwɨ apurɨto ' auya ' nokon esi . I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; aiko rʉ ' kwɨ mosta ' ena ' pɨ kasa apurɨto ' auya ' nokon esi yau , wʉ ' pɨ ' , ‘ Atamakɨ mairɨ ! ’ tasa ' auya ' nokon a ' tai , itama rɨ . Ɨ ' rɨ rɨ kupʉ auya ' nokon a ' tai , sa ' man pe pʉra rɨ iyesi ɨpona ' nokon .

text: Howbeit this kind goeth not out but by prayer and fasting .
text2: E ' tane serɨ rupɨ epa ' ka pʉra iyesi ɨpʉreman mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ useruman tʉuta ' re ' tɨi ' pʉra uya rɨken enpa ' ka , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And while they abode in Galilee , Jesus said unto them , The Son of man shall be betrayed into the hands of men :
text2: Tanporo to ' amʉrasa ' a ' tai Kiyarari pona , Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Ka ' pon , Papa winon eparankato ' oton ka ' pon amʉ ' ena ' .

text: And they shall kill him , and the third day he shall be raised again . And they were exceeding sorry .
text2: To ' uya iwɨto ' oton , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itosorʉwano wʉi a ' tai iye ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' oton tʉuko ' manto ' ya ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan poitorʉ ton upokoita ' pʉ ipan pe .

text: And when they were come to Capernaum , they that received tribute money came to Peter , and said , Doth not your master pay tribute ?
text2: Sises mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipoitorʉ ton uya Ka ' paneyan pata eposa ' a ' tai , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' ta ' te ' masen amʉranʉ ' nin nan uyee ' pʉ Pi ' ta piya ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨti ' saai kon pe ' Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' ta ' tʉuse ' masen ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: He saith , Yes . And when he was come into the house , Jesus prevented him , saying , What thinkest thou , Simon ? of whom do the kings of the earth take custom or tribute ? of their own children , or of strangers ?
text2: Pi ' ta uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ewai ' , e ' manin kʉrɨ rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨpan Pi ' ta utɨ ' pʉ ɨutɨ ta ' . Sises usaurokʉ ' pʉ wapiya kuru , mɨrɨpan uya Pi ' ta ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ tukai ' mɨsenuminkayan Saiman ? Ɨnʉ ' yan rupɨ winɨpai kin amʉ ' uya pʉrata amʉranʉ ' to ' pe iyesi ? Patawon amʉ ' mɨrɨ pe pʉra ka ' kʉran amʉ ' winɨpai katɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Peter saith unto him , Of strangers . Jesus saith unto him , Then are the children free .
text2: Pi ' ta uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ka ' kʉran amʉ ' winɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya . “ Patawon amʉ ' use ' mato ' pe pʉra iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: Notwithstanding , lest we should offend them , go thou to the sea , and cast an hook , and take up the fish that first cometh up ; and when thou hast opened his mouth , thou shalt find a piece of money : that take , and give unto them for me and thee .
text2: “ E ' tane pʉsamoro ka ' pon amʉ ' ɨnɨkɨntanʉ ' pai pʉra e ' nɨ . Mɨrɨ pɨ ' , konoi ' pɨ ' enta parau ku ' pɨri ka ' , mɨrɨpan wapiya kuru anma ' pʉ moro ' inta nau pʉrata pun eporo auya mɨrɨ , asakɨrɨ ' ne wʉi e ' tʉrawasoman nɨsa ' epe ' pʉ airon nɨ , mɨrɨpan ke e ' mase ' na mɨtɨi ' uiwano ' pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨiwano ' pe nɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: At the same time came the disciples unto Jesus , saying , Who is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven ?
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises poitorʉ ton uyee ' pʉ ekama ' poi ' , “ Ɨnʉ ' kuru si e ' to ' oton eke pe Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe yau ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And Jesus called a little child unto him , and set him in the midst of them ,
text2: Sises uya mʉre rʉ ' kwɨ kɨ ' ma ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan soto ' ka ' pʉ iya to ' koro ' tau ,

text: And said , Verily I say unto you , Except ye be converted , and become as little children , ye shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ , “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; ɨusensima kon a ' tai rɨken mʉre amʉ ' pe tenai ' , ɨyepa ' ka kon Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe ya ' .

text: Whosoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child , the same is greatest in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ esi mɨ pe te ' ku ' sen pe pʉra mʉre na ' ne ' kasa esi mɨrɨ eke pe Papa pona .

text: And whoso shall receive one such little child in my name receiveth me .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ , ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ aiko rʉ ' kwɨ mʉre pʉse rɨ warai ereutanʉkʉ a ' tai , uyese ' yau , uyereutanʉkʉ iya pe rɨ iyesi .

text: But whoso shall offend one of these little ones which believe in me , it were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea .
text2: “ E ' tane ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ pʉsamoro uyapurɨnin nan aiko ton nʉ ' kwɨ tonpa e ' makoima emapu ' tɨsa ' yau , wakʉ iwa pe rɨ iyesi kʉrɨ rɨ ka ' pon i ' mʉ pɨ ' eke a ' nai ' e ' pato ' ike tɨ ' ewa ' tɨsa ' a ' tai , mɨrɨpan eno ' mato ' pe parau ka ' iyaputato ' pe .

text: Woe unto the world because of offences ! for it must needs be that offences come ; but woe to that man by whom the offence cometh !
text2: Ɨsɨ sɨ , ka ' pon amʉ ' non pon kon , apʉne pʉra ka ' pon amʉ ' umakoita emapu ' tɨ to ' uya pɨ ' . Mɨrɨ warai ton nɨ e ' ku ' to ' pe iyesi e ' tane , ɨsɨ yau kʉrɨ man iye ' kupʉ emapu ' tɨnin .

text: Wherefore if thy hand or thy foot offend thee , cut them off , and cast them from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life halt or maimed , rather than having two hands or two feet to be cast into everlasting fire .
text2: Ɨyemiyatʉ mɨrɨ pe pʉra a ' ta uya ɨye ' makoima emapu ' tɨ pe iyesi yau , a ' tɨkɨ eno ' ma pa ; wakʉ iwa pe iyesi itemiyatʉ pʉra mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' ta pʉra esii ' ma tɨwɨrɨ rɨ ɨuko ' manto ' ya ' ɨyepa ' ka a ' tai , tanporo ɨpun eno ' ma apo ' , tɨwɨro ' rɨ ya ' entai .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life with one eye , rather than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨyenu uya ɨye ' makoima emapu ' tɨ pe iyesi yau , imo ' ka ' eno ' ma pa ; wakʉ iwa pe iyesi tikin nɨ itenu esii ' ma tɨwɨrɨ rɨ ɨuko ' manto ' ya ' ɨyepa ' ka a ' tai , asa ' rɨ itenu apo ' , iya ' mu pʉn ya ' ɨyeno ' ma entai , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Take heed that ye despise not one of these little ones ; for I say unto you , That in heaven their angels do always behold the face of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Miyarɨ rɨ Sises esi ' pʉ usauro ' nɨ pɨ ' , “ Pʉsamoro aiko ton nʉ ' kwɨ kʉsenpɨ ' tʉu . Ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , to ' inserʉʉi ton esi ukʉipʉnʉ emʉ ' ennin nan pe tɨwɨrɨ rɨ Epʉn po .

text: For the Son of man is come to save that which was lost .
text2: Serɨ ta uya ɨpɨ ' nokon apʉne pʉra Ka ' pon , Papa winon uye ' sa ' itano ' masa ' kon pika ' tɨi ' .

text: How think ye ? if a man have an hundred sheep , and one of them be gone astray , doth he not leave the ninety and nine , and goeth into the mountains , and seeketh that which is gone astray ?
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ tukai ' mɨsenuminkayan ? Ka ' pon esi yau 100 kaisaron kon karimeru amʉ ' esa ' pe , mɨrɨpan kon tonpa utano ' masa ' yau , 99 pan kon pe ' karimeru amʉ ' nɨmɨ iya pen wʉ ' po itano ' masa ' rʉ ' pʉ warinpase ' na tʉutɨto ' pe ?

text: And if so be that he find it , verily I say unto you , he rejoiceth more of that sheep , than of the ninety and nine which went not astray .
text2: Mɨrɨpan eposa ' tʉuya yau , i ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; pori ' pe kuru iyesi tikin nan itano ' masa ' rʉ ' pʉ karimeru pɨ ' 99 pan kon itano ' masa ' kon pen karimeru amʉ ' pɨ ' pori ' pe tesi entai .

text: Even so it is not the will of your Father which is in heaven , that one of these little ones should perish .
text2: Mɨrɨ na ' ne ' kasa , ɨkʉipʉnʉ , Epʉn pon esi pʉsamoro aiko ton nʉ ' kwɨ uyapurɨnin nan utano ' ma i ' se pʉra , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee , go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone : if he shall hear thee , thou hast gained thy brother .
text2: Miyarɨ rɨ Sises esi ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton auro ' ka pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ , “ Ɨri pe ɨtonpa uya ɨku ' sa ' yau , ɨri inkupʉ ' pʉ ekama ta ipɨ ' , asa ' ken esii ' ma . Amaimu etasa ' iya yau , mɨrɨ nin si ɨtonpa pe ina ' posa ' auya .

text: But if he will not hear thee , then take with thee one or two more , that in the mouth of two or three witnesses every word may be established .
text2: E ' tane amaimu eta iya pʉra iyesi yau , tikin nɨ mɨrɨ pe pʉra asa ' rɨ rɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' akɨ aya ' kɨrɨ auro ' kaka ' se ' na . Pʉsamoro asa ' ron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' esi , ‘ auro ' ka pɨ ' ɨpika ' tɨnin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨri pe ɨwe ' sa ' esi i ' napai rɨ tawon nan pe ipɨ ' . ’

text: And if he shall neglect to hear them , tell it unto the church : but if he neglect to hear the church , let him be unto thee as an heathen man and a publican .
text2: E ' tane to ' ɨnetapai pʉra kanan iyesi yau , ekamatɨ ' so ' si tawon kon pɨ ' , e ' tane ɨnetapai pʉra kanan iyesi yau , inonkatɨ ' Papa apurɨnin pen mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pʉrata amʉranʉ ' nin kasa iye ' to ' pe .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; serɨ non po ɨ ' rɨ rɨ auronsa ' auya ' nokon a ' tai , Epʉn po kanan Papa uya auromʉ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ serɨ non po ɨ ' rɨ rɨ eukasa ' auya ' nokon a ' tai , Papa uya kanan euka Epʉn po .

text: Again I say unto you , That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask , it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: “ Se kanan ekama uya etatɨ ' : Asa ' rɨ tekonekai ' serɨ non po ɨ ' rɨ rɨ ɨnekama ' ponʉ kon pɨ ' , ukʉipʉnʉ , Epʉn pon uya rɨ amaimu kon eikʉ .

text: For where two or three are gathered together in my name , there am I in the midst of them .
text2: Asa ' ron kon , osorʉwawon kon nʉ ' kwɨ rɨ amʉrasa ' a ' tai , uyese ' yau , to ' piyau rɨ esi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then came Peter to him , and said , Lord , how oft shall my brother sin against me , and I forgive him ? till seven times ?
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Pi ' ta uyee ' pʉ Sises piya ' ekama ' pose ' na , “ Uyepuru , ɨ ' rɨ kaisa rɨ ite ' kwa utonpa e ' makoimasa ' upɨ ' pɨ ' usentu ' ma ? 7 kaisa rɨ ite ' kwa pe ' ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus saith unto him , I say not unto thee , Until seven times : but , Until seventy times seven .
text2: Sises uya Pi ' ta eikʉ ' pʉ , “ 7 kaisa rɨ ite ' kwa pen e ' tane , 70 kaisa rɨ 7 ite ' kwa kuru , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Therefore is the kingdom of heaven likened unto a certain king , which would take account of his servants .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya panton ekama ' pʉ Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe eseru pɨ ' . “ Se na ' ne ' kasa Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe eseru esi : Kin esi ' pʉ ka ' pon amʉ ' tʉpʉrataai ko ' manʉ ' pɨ ' nin nan winɨ tʉpʉrataai amʉranʉkʉ pɨ ' .

text: And when he had begun to reckon , one was brought unto him , which owed him ten thousand talents .
text2: Iyepiya ' tɨ koro ' tau , ipoitorʉ uya eke kuru rɨ ipʉrataai ko ' manʉ ' pɨ ' nin nʉ ' pʉ nee ' pʉ ipiya ' .

text: But forasmuch as he had not to pay , his lord commanded him to be sold , and his wife , and children , and all that he had , and payment to be made .
text2: Ipʉrataai pʉra iyesi ' pʉ tepuru e ' mato ' iya ike . Kin uya ta ' pʉ , ‘ Ikʉrʉpo ' pomatɨ ' , ino ' pʉ , imunkɨ amʉ ' pokon pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itimamin ton nɨ , mɨrɨpan epe ' pʉ uya inko ' manʉ ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ e ' mato ' pe , ’ ta ' pʉ kin uya .

text: The servant therefore fell down , and worshipped him , saying , Lord , have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: “ Mɨrɨpan poitorʉ uta ' mo ' ka ' pʉ irau tese ' mu po tenai ' , ‘ Apʉne parɨ , ɨye ' ma uya rɨ mɨrɨ tanporo , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then the lord of that servant was moved with compassion , and loosed him , and forgave him the debt .
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai , kin usentu ' ma ' pʉ ipɨ ' , iye ' womasa ' rʉ ' pʉ rɨ nin si tʉkukai ' , ennoko ' pʉ iya mɨrɨ .

text: But the same servant went out , and found one of his fellowservants , which owed him an hundred pence : and he laid hands on him , and took him by the throat , saying , Pay me that thou owest .
text2: “ E ' tane pʉse rɨ utɨ ' pʉ aiko rʉ ' kwɨ rɨ nin tʉpʉrataai ko ' manʉ ' pɨ ' nin piya ' , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' sii ' i ' mʉ pɨ ' , i ' mʉ kʉtʉtʉ ' ka ' pʉ . ‘ Inke pʉra upʉrataai itʉkɨ ! ’ tai ' ma .

text: And his fellowservant fell down at his feet , and besought him , saying , Have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Mɨrɨpan nʉ ' kwɨ sa ' ne uta ' mo ' ka ' pʉ irau temʉ ' po , ‘ Apʉne sa ' ne , ɨye ' ma uya rɨ mɨrɨ , ’ tai ' ma .

text: And he would not : but went and cast him into prison , till he should pay the debt .
text2: E ' tane , ewai ' ta iya pʉra iyesi ' pʉ , a ' si ' pʉ iya pariki ' si ta ' tʉnko ' manʉkʉ ' pʉ e ' ma iya pʉ ' kʉ pona .

text: So when his fellowservants saw what was done , they were very sorry , and came and told unto their lord all that was done .
text2: Tʉron kon ipoitorʉ ton uya ensa ' a ' tai , inkupʉnʉ tense ipan pe to ' upokoita ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , to ' utɨ ' pʉ tepuru kon pɨ ' ekamase ' na tanporo inkupʉ ' pʉ .

text: Then his lord , after that he had called him , said unto him , O thou wicked servant , I forgave thee all that debt , because thou desiredst me :
text2: Mɨrɨpan epuru uya ikɨ ' ma ' pʉ , ‘ Ɨmɨrɨ ɨri rɨ , ’ ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' . ‘ Tɨwɨ rɨ si nesii , ta ' pʉ uya ɨpɨ ' , apʉne pʉra ipan pe rɨ auta ' kwarʉka pɨ ' .

text: Shouldest not thou also have had compassion on thy fellowservant , even as I had pity on thee ?
text2: Ɨsentu ' mapai pʉra pe ' ɨwesi mɨ ɨtonpa pɨ ' , usentu ' mataine ' kasa ɨpɨ ' ? ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And his lord was wroth , and delivered him to the tormentors , till he should pay all that was due unto him .
text2: Tʉusakorotai ' itepuru uya itʉrʉ ' pʉ pʉresiman amʉ ' ena ' to ' uya a ' sito ' pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipanta ' mapɨ ' to ' pe to ' uya , tanporo tʉpʉrataai na ' po iya pona rɨ .

text: So likewise shall my heavenly Father do also unto you , if ye from your hearts forgive not every one his brother their trespasses .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ na ' ne ' kasa kuru Epʉn pon , ukʉipʉnʉ uya ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon , ɨtonpa kon pɨ ' ɨyewan kon yau tʉusentu ' masan pen , ku ' to ' oton , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these sayings , he departed from Galilee , and came into the coasts of Judaea beyond Jordan ;
text2: Serɨ ton ta tʉuya e ' nonkasa ' a ' tai , Sises uya Kiyarari nɨmɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ Isutiya nono , Isotan tuna ratoi pona .

text: And great multitudes followed him ; and he healed them there .
text2: Tu ' kan kon anpisin utɨ ' pʉ ipɨkɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan kon epi ' tɨ ' pʉ iya mɨrɨ yau .

text: The Pharisees also came unto him , tempting him , and saying unto him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife for every cause ?
text2: Pari ' si amʉ ' tonpa ton uyee ' pʉ i ' tupɨ ' se ' na . To ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Main awɨrɨ rɨ e ' nɨ pe rɨ pe ' iyesi ka ' pon uya tʉno ' pʉ nonkato ' ɨ ' rɨ rɨ wenai ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he answered and said unto them , Have ye not read , that he which made them at the beginning made them male and female ,
text2: “ Ene auya ' nokon pʉra pe ' ne ' pɨ ' an kareta yau ? ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' . “ Pena iyepiya ' tɨ a ' tai , ‘ Ka ' nin uya warawo ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uri ' san nɨrɨ koneka ' pʉ . ’

text: And said , For this cause shall a man leave father and mother , and shall cleave to his wife : and they twain shall be one flesh ?
text2: Ta ' pʉ iya , ‘ Mɨrɨ wenai , warawo ' uya tʉkʉipʉnʉ , tʉsan nɨrɨ nɨnto ' pe iyesi , mɨrɨpan uta ' sikʉ tʉno ' pʉ ya ' , mɨrɨpan asa ' ron kon ena tikin nɨ ipun . ’

text: Wherefore they are no more twain , but one flesh . What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa , asa ' rɨ to ' esi pen , e ' tane tikin nɨ . Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , Papa na ' sikʉ ' san ɨsipona , mo ' ka ka ' pon uya kʉse ' nin , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: They say unto him , Why did Moses then command to give a writing of divorcement , and to put her away ?
text2: To ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe ken si iyesi pɨ ' e ' nonkan nɨto ' karetaai tʉmenukai ' ɨno ' pʉ inonkakɨ tasa ' Mosi ' uya ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: He saith unto them , Moses because of the hardness of your hearts suffered you to put away your wives : but from the beginning it was not so .
text2: Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Mosi ' uya ɨno ' pʉ kon amʉ ' inonkatɨ ' tasa ' , sa ' man pe rɨ ɨyewan kon esi wenai , mɨrɨpan pen nin pena iyepiya ' tɨ ' pʉ si ' kɨrɨ .

text: And I say unto you , Whosoever shall put away his wife , except it be for fornication , and shall marry another , committeth adultery : and whoso marrieth her which is put away doth commit adultery .
text2: Ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; ɨnʉ ' rɨ tʉno ' pʉ nonkayai ' ne ' , iyekumasa ' pen nɨ e ' tane , mɨrɨpan uya tʉron nɨ uri ' san mari ' ma , iyekuma pe iyesi mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: His disciples say unto him , If the case of the man be so with his wife , it is not good to marry .
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton uya ta ' pʉ , “ Mɨrɨ na ' ne ' kasa iyesi yau , tɨwɨ uri ' san mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ warawo ' emari ' ma e ' pai pʉra rɨ nin si man , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' .

text: But he said unto them , All men cannot receive this saying , save they to whom it is given .
text2: Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Tanporon kon pɨ ' ta pen nɨ mɨrɨ , e ' tane kamo rɨken anʉnnin nʉ ' san nɨ .

text: For there are some eunuchs , which were so born from their mother ' s womb : and there are some eunuchs , which were made eunuchs of men : and there be eunuchs , which have made themselves eunuchs for the kingdom of heaven ' s sake . He that is able to receive it , let him receive it .
text2: Tʉron kon entusa ' temari ' masen ye ' pe pʉra rɨ , tʉron kon konekasa ' ka ' pon amʉ ' uya temari ' masen ye ' pe pʉra rɨ , tʉron kon nɨrɨ e ' ku ' sa ' tiwano ' kon pe temari ' masen ye ' pe pʉra te ' to ' kon pe , Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe uriya ' . Ɨnʉ ' rɨ kʉrɨ tikin sarɨ e ' paino e ' to ' pe rɨ iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: Then were there brought unto him little children , that he should put his hands on them , and pray : and the disciples rebuked them .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , mʉre amʉ ' nee ' pʉ to ' uya Sises piya ' temiyatʉ tʉto ' pe iya to ' pona mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyɨpʉremato ' pe to ' pona , e ' tane ipoitorʉ ton uya kamoro to ' ne ' nin nʉ ' san eseremekʉ ' pʉ .

text: But Jesus said , Suffer little children , and forbid them not , to come unto me : for of such is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Tɨwɨ mʉre amʉ ' nʉyepʉi upiya ' ; to ' kʉsereutanʉ ' tʉu , apʉne pʉra pʉsamoro waraino kon kuru iwano ' mɨrɨ Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he laid his hands on them , and departed thence .
text2: Temiyatʉ tʉrʉ tʉpo to ' pona , itɨ ' pʉ mɨrɨ apai .

text: And , behold , one came and said unto him , Good Master , what good thing shall I do , that I may have eternal life ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan a ' tai , ka ' pon uyee ' pʉ Sises piya ' ekama ' pose ' na , “ Ti ' sa , ɨ ' rɨ wakʉ ku ' to ' uya pe iyesi tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko ' manto ' epoto ' pe uya ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God : but if thou wilt enter into life , keep the commandments .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' wakʉ pɨ ' uyekama ' po auya ? Mɨrɨ yau iyesi mɨrɨ tikin nan nɨ wakʉ . Uko ' man nɨto ' ya ' epa ' kapai ɨwesi yau , Mosi ' nʉmenuka ' pʉ ton awɨrɨ e ' kɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: He saith unto him , Which ? Jesus said , Thou shalt do no murder , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness ,
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Nai ton ? ” tukai ' . Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ kʉ ' wɨnɨi , iyemari ' masa ' uri ' san kʉsekumankai , ama ' pe kesii , kasi pe ka ' pon pɨ ' kasaurokʉi ,

text: Honour thy father and thy mother : and , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: ɨkʉipʉnʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ asan nɨrɨ inamakɨ , ɨtonpa ti ' nʉnkai ' e ' kɨ , mɨsi ' nʉnkayai ' ne ' kasa , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: The young man saith unto him , All these things have I kept from my youth up : what lack I yet ?
text2: “ Tanporo mɨrɨ ton ku ' sa ' uya man . Ɨ ' rɨ kuru ken e ' ku ' sa ' nai ? ” ta ' pʉ moineri ' pɨ uya .

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou wilt be perfect , go and sell that thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come and follow me .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Wakʉ pe e ' pai ɨwesi yau , itɨkɨ ɨimamin kʉrʉpo ' pomase ' na , mɨrɨ tʉpo entu ' manin nan mʉrepai ' itepe ' pʉ pʉrata ke . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Epʉn po imaminke ' pe ɨwesi mɨrɨ . Mɨrɨ ku ' sa ' auya tʉpo , upɨkɨrɨ si ɨsi ' kɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: But when the young man heard that saying , he went away sorrowful : for he had great possessions .
text2: Moineri ' pɨ uya serɨ etasa ' a ' tai , pokoi pe rɨ esii ' ma itɨ ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra eke pe kuru itimamin esi ' pʉ .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , Verily I say unto you , That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya ta ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' , “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; sa ' man pe kuru iyesi imaminke ' epa ' ka poken pʉra Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe ya ' .

text: And again I say unto you , It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Ekamakapʉ uya kanan ; sa ' man pe pʉra rɨ kiyamerʉ epa ' ka akusa enu euta awɨrɨ , imaminke ' epa ' ka Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe ya ' entai . ”

text: When his disciples heard it , they were exceedingly amazed , saying , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton uya serɨ etasa ' a ' tai , to ' usewansiuka ' pʉ ipan pe . To ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨnʉ ' kuru ken si epika ' tɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: But Jesus beheld them , and said unto them , With men this is impossible ; but with God all things are possible .
text2: To ' enei ' ma , Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Ka ' pon pona sa ' man pe iyesi , e ' tane Papa pona tanporo sa ' man pe pʉra iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Behold , we have forsaken all , and followed thee ; what shall we have therefore ?
text2: Pi ' ta uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Tanporon nɨ nɨnsa ' ina uya man ɨpɨkɨrɨ tʉutɨto ' kon pe . Ɨ ' rɨ ken si e ' to ' oton ina iwano ' pe ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That ye which have followed me , in the regeneration when the Son of man shall sit in the throne of his glory , ye also shall sit upon twelve thrones , judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; Papa uya emenna ' pe tanporon nɨ koneka a ' tai , Ka ' pon , Papa winon ereuta a ' tai a ' kwa tapon po , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon upɨkɨrɨ iye ' sa ' kon nɨrɨ ereutato ' oton 12 kaisaron apono ' po 12 kaisaron kon Esuwerʉ pon kon eseru aimenka pɨ ' .

text: And every one that hath forsaken houses , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my name ' s sake , shall receive an hundredfold , and shall inherit everlasting life .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporon kon kamoro tiwʉ ' kon , takon kon nɨ , tʉparusi kon nɨ , tʉkʉipʉnʉ kon nɨ , tʉsan kon nɨ , tʉmunkɨ kon nɨ , tʉmainarʉ kon nɨ nɨnnin nʉ ' san urɨ wenai uya 100 kaisa rɨ ' ne ite ' kwa epoto ' oton , mɨrɨpan kon uya tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko ' man nɨto ' epoto ' oton .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last shall be first .
text2: E ' tane tu ' kan kon wapiyaro ' kon nʉ ' san e ' to ' oton ite ' ma ' pʉ pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tu ' kan kon iu ' matʉ pe iye ' sa ' kon e ' to ' oton wapiyaro ' pe , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which went out early in the morning to hire labourers into his vineyard .
text2: “ Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe esi non esa ' kasa . Awanakʉi ' itɨ ' pʉ ka ' pon amʉ ' anʉnse ' na tʉmainarʉ yau te ' tʉrawasoma ton kon .

text: And when he had agreed with the labourers for a penny a day , he sent them into his vineyard .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , to ' pokon pe iyekoneka ' pʉ to ' e ' mato ' pe tʉuya tikin nɨ wʉi e ' tʉrawasoman epe ' pʉrata pun ke , mɨrɨpan kon ennoko ' pʉ iya tʉmainarʉ ya ' .

text: And he went out about the third hour , and saw others standing idle in the marketplace ,
text2: “ Awanakʉi ' , 9 a ' kʉra ' a ' tai , itɨ ' pʉ kʉrʉpo ' po pɨ ' e ' nɨto ' pata ' se ' ya ' . Mɨrɨ yau , ka ' pon amʉ ' e ' soto ' pɨ ' sa ' ene ' pʉ iya , ɨ ' rɨ kupʉ pɨ ' pʉra rɨ .

text: And said unto them ; Go ye also into the vineyard , and whatsoever is right I will give you . And they went their way .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , to ' auro ' ka ' pʉ iya , ‘ Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon nɨ marɨ , itɨtɨ ' umainarʉ ya ' e ' tʉrawasomai ' . Ɨye ' ma uya ' nokon mɨrɨ iye ' to ' awɨrɨ rɨ , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Again he went out about the sixth and ninth hour , and did likewise .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon utɨ ' pʉ umɨ ya ' e ' tʉrawasomase ' na . “ Non esa ' kanan utɨkaa ' pʉ kʉrʉpo ' po pɨ ' e ' nɨto ' pata ' se ' ya ' 12 a ' kʉra ' a ' tai , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ 3 a ' kʉra ' kanan ka ' pon amʉ ' anʉnse ' na to ' e ' tʉrawasomato ' pe tʉmainarʉ yau .

text: And about the eleventh hour he went out , and found others standing idle , and saith unto them , Why stand ye here all the day idle ?
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo , non esa ' utɨ ' pʉ kʉrʉpo ' po pɨ ' e ' nɨto ' pata ' se ' ya ' ko ' mamʉ pe 5 a ' kʉra ' a ' tai . Mɨrɨ yau , ka ' pon amʉ ' e ' soto ' pɨ ' sa ' ene ' pʉ iya . To ' ekama ' po ' pʉ iya , ‘ Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' ɨye ' soto ' pɨ ' sa ' kon te ' tʉrawasomai ' pʉra rɨ ? ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: They say unto him , Because no man hath hired us . He saith unto them , Go ye also into the vineyard ; and whatsoever is right , that shall ye receive .
text2: “ ‘ Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ina anʉnsa ' pʉra iyesi , ’ ta ' pʉ to ' uya . “ Ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , ‘ Itɨtɨ ' e ' tʉrawasomatantɨ ' umainarʉ ya ' , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: So when even was come , the lord of the vineyard saith unto his steward , Call the labourers , and give them their hire , beginning from the last unto the first .
text2: “ Ko ' mamʉ pe , umɨ esa ' uya ta ' pʉ to ' epuru pɨ ' , ‘ Tʉrawaso amʉ ' ikɨ ' makɨ to ' e ' ma pa to ' epe ' pʉ ke , ’ ta ' pʉ iya . ‘ Iu ' matʉ pe anʉnsa ' kon tʉrawaso pe me ' mai ' wapiya , iyepiya ' tɨ pe anʉnsa ' kon e ' ma pa iu ' matʉ pe , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when they came that were hired about the eleventh hour , they received every man a penny .
text2: “ Tʉrawaso amʉ ' iye ' sara ' tɨsa ' kon e ' tʉrawasoman pɨ ' 5 a ' kʉra ' a ' tai uyee ' pʉ tʉpʉrataai kon ipun si epose ' na .

text: But when the first came , they supposed that they should have received more ; and they likewise received every man a penny .
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' wapiya iye ' sara ' tɨsa ' kon tʉrawaso pe uyee ' pʉ tepe ' pʉ kon epose ' na . To ' e ' kupʉ ' pʉ eke pe parɨ pʉrata eporo tʉuya ' nokon tukai ' , e ' tane to ' uya tikin nɨ rɨ marɨ pʉrata pun eporo ' pʉ .

text: And when they had received it , they murmured against the goodman of the house ,
text2: Pʉrata eporo tʉuya ' nokon a ' tai , to ' entarumʉ ' pʉ non esa ' pɨ ' .

text: Saying , These last have wrought but one hour , and thou hast made them equal unto us , which have borne the burden and heat of the day .
text2: ‘ Pʉsamoro ka ' pon amʉ ' iye ' tʉrawasomasa ' kon aka ' ne ' pe rɨ e ' masa ' auya ' nokon , ina kaisarɨ rɨ marɨ , sa ' man pe rɨ ina e ' tʉrawasomasa ' e ' tane a ' ne ' rɨ wʉi yau , ’ ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: But he answered one of them , and said , Friend , I do thee no wrong : didst not thou agree with me for a penny ?
text2: “ E ' tane tikin nan to ' tonpa eikʉ ' pʉ iya , ‘ Utonpa , wakʉ pe rɨ iyesi serɨ pɨ ' e ' tʉrawasoma rɨ , tikin nan nɨ pʉrata pun pɨ ' , ta ' pʉ auya .

text: Take that thine is , and go thy way : I will give unto this last , even as unto thee .
text2: Ɨyepe ' pʉ anʉnkɨ , itɨkɨ . E ' kupʉ ' pʉ ka ' pon amʉ ' e ' mato ' pe uya iu ' matʉ pe unanʉmʉ ' san kɨnye ' mayai ' ne ' kasa rɨ .

text: Is it not lawful for me to do what I will with mine own ? Is thine eye evil , because I am good ?
text2: Upʉrataai ke pe ' i ' se e ' to ' rɨ kupʉ uya pen ? Upɨ ' rɨ katɨ ɨyɨkɨnta amʉre ' mʉra esi pɨ ' ? ’ ta ' pʉ iya , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: So the last shall be first , and the first last : for many be called , but few chosen .
text2: Sises uya tʉpantomʉ i ' ma ' ka ' pʉ se kasa : “ Mɨrɨ kasa iu ' matʉ pe iye ' sa ' kon e ' to ' oton iyepiya ' tɨ pe ; kamoro iyepiya ' tɨ pe iye ' sa ' kon e ' to ' oton iu ' matʉ pe , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And Jesus going up to Jerusalem took the twelve disciples apart in the way , and said unto them ,
text2: Sises utɨ koro ' tau Surusiran pona , 12 kaisaron kon tʉpoitorʉ ton pantaka ' pʉ iya mɨ airɨ . Ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' ,

text: Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be betrayed unto the chief priests and unto the scribes , and they shall condemn him to death ,
text2: “ Surusiran pona utɨ ' nokon serɨ , Ka ' pon , Papa winon eparankato ' oton use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Main pɨ ' enupanin nan ena ' , to ' uya eno ' mato ' oton ima ' tato ' ya ' ,

text: And shall deliver him to the Gentiles to mock , and to scourge , and to crucify him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: mɨrɨpan tʉto ' oton to ' uya Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen ena ' to ' uya isapemato ' pe , ari ' po ' pɨ ' to ' pe , ipokapɨ ' to ' pe kurusu ' pona . Itosorʉwano wʉi a ' tai , iye ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' oton uko ' man nɨto ' ya ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then came to him the mother of Zebedee ' s children with her sons , worshipping him , and desiring a certain thing of him .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sepiti munkɨ amʉ ' san uyee ' pʉ Sises piya ' tʉmunkɨ amʉ ' pokon pe , mɨrɨpan e ' sekunkasa ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , wakʉ ku ' to ' pe iya tiwano ' pe .

text: And he said unto her , What wilt thou ? She saith unto him , Grant that these my two sons may sit , the one on thy right hand , and the other on the left , in thy kingdom .
text2: Sises uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ i ' se me ' an ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨpan eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Pʉsamoro asa ' ron kon umunkɨ amʉ ' iku ' kɨ to ' ereutato ' pe ɨyenwo ' netʉ winɨ , tʉron nɨ akamisi winɨ esa ' wannɨ pe ɨwe ' to ' yau , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But Jesus answered and said , Ye know not what ye ask . Are ye able to drink of the cup that I shall drink of , and to be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ? They say unto him , We are able .
text2: “ I ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi mekama ' poyatʉi ' ne ' , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya to ' pɨ ' . “ Ɨyekota ' ma kon poken ken pe ' nai ekota ' mato ' oton na ' ne ' kasa ? ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya to ' pɨ ' . “ Ewai ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he saith unto them , Ye shall drink indeed of my cup , and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with : but to sit on my right hand , and on my left , is not mine to give , but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared of my Father .
text2: “ I ' napairɨ rɨ ɨyekota ' ma kon urɨ ekota ' mato ' oton kasa rɨ , e ' tane umeruntɨrʉ pʉra man iku ' to ' pe uya , ɨnʉ ' ereutato ' pe uyenwo ' netʉ winɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ukamisi winɨ nɨrɨ . Serɨ pata ton esi mɨrɨ kamoro ukʉipʉnʉ uya to ' pata pe ikonekasa ' na ' ne ' iwano ' pe iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when the ten heard it , they were moved with indignation against the two brethren .
text2: 10 kaisaron kon uya asa ' ron kon tʉtonpa kon maimu etasa ' a ' tai , to ' usakorota ' pʉ .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Ye know that the princes of the Gentiles exercise dominion over them , and they that are great exercise authority upon them .
text2: Sises uya tanporo to ' tʉkɨ ' mai ' to ' amʉranʉkʉ ' pʉ . Ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ I ' tu auya ' nokon Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen epuru ton esi to ' esa ' pe , mɨrɨpan eke ton uya tʉmeruntɨrʉ kon apurɨ to ' pɨ ' .

text: But it shall not be so among you : but whosoever will be great among you , let him be your minister ;
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa ɨwesi kon pen . E ' tane ru ' ku , ɨnʉ ' rɨ esi yau eke pe enapai ɨ ' koro ' tau ' nokon e ' to ' pe iyesi ɨpoitorʉ kon pe ,

text: And whosoever will be chief among you , let him be your servant :
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨnʉ ' rɨ esi yau wapiyaro ' e ' pe e ' pai , tɨwɨ nesii ɨpoitorʉ kon pe .

text: Even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Ka ' pon , Papa winon uye ' sa ' na ' ne ' kasa rɨ tapiyo ' pe e ' nɨto ' pe pen , e ' tane iyapiyo ' pe e ' se , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉuko ' manto ' tʉse ' na , tu ' kan kon ka ' pon amʉ ' epe ' pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And as they departed from Jericho , a great multitude followed him .
text2: Sises mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipoitorʉ ton uya Iseri ' ko nɨmɨ koro ' tau , anpisin ka ' pon amʉ ' utɨ ' pʉ ipɨkɨrɨ .

text: And , behold , two blind men sitting by the way side , when they heard that Jesus passed by , cried out , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Asa ' ron kon tenku ' na ' nan ka ' pon amʉ ' ereutasa ' esi ' pʉ asanta ka ' ta po . Sises utɨ etasa ' tʉuya ' nokon a ' tai , to ' ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉ ' pʉ , “ Ina epuru , Tepi ' pa rʉ ' pʉ , ina pɨ ' ɨsentu ' makɨ ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And the multitude rebuked them , because they should hold their peace : but they cried the more , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Tu ' kan kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uya to ' eseremekʉ ' pʉ , “ E ' pana e ' tɨ ' ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya , e ' tane rɨ eke pe parɨ to ' ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉ ' pʉ , “ Ina epuru , Tepi ' pa rʉ ' pʉ , ina pɨ ' ɨsentu ' makɨ ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And Jesus stood still , and called them , and said , What will ye that I shall do unto you ?
text2: Sises uya to ' etasa ' a ' tai , te ' takʉ ' kai ' to ' kɨ ' ma ' pʉ iya . To ' ekama ' po ' pʉ iya , “ Ɨ ' rɨ kupʉ uya i ' se me ' atʉu ɨiwano ' kon pe ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: They say unto him , Lord , that our eyes may be opened .
text2: To ' uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ina epuru , ennin pe e ' pai ina esi , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: So Jesus had compassion on them , and touched their eyes : and immediately their eyes received sight , and they followed him .
text2: Sises usentu ' ma ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' . To ' enu a ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ iya . Inke pʉra rɨ , ennin pe to ' ena ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ ipɨkɨrɨ .

text: And when they drew nigh unto Jerusalem , and were come to Bethphage , unto the mount of Olives , then sent Jesus two disciples ,
text2: To ' uya Surusiran eporo koro ' tau , Pe ' pake ya ' si to ' uye ' kaa ' pʉ Are ' Wʉpʉ pon . Sises uya asa ' ron kon tʉpoitorʉ ton ennoko ' pʉ ,

text: Saying unto them , Go into the village over against you , and straightway ye shall find an ass tied , and a colt with her : loose them , and bring them unto me .
text2: tai ' ma to ' pɨ ' , “ Entantɨ ' ɨyentau ' nokon na ' ne ' eke iwa pata ya ' . Mɨrɨ yau , inke pʉra rɨ isa ' ka ' si ewa ' tɨsa ' eporo auya ' nokon mɨrɨ , imʉre ipiyau , mɨrɨpan kon teukai ' , to ' mʉne ' tʉi ' upiya ' .

text: And if any man say ought unto you , ye shall say , The Lord hath need of them ; and straightway he will send them .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ɨ ' rɨ rɨ ta yau ɨpɨ ' nokon , ‘ Itepuru esi to ' i ' se , ’ mʉkatʉi ' . Mɨrɨ a ' tai nin si , to ' uya to ' ennoko mɨrɨ inke pʉra rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: All this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Serɨ si pu ' kena ' amʉ ' awɨrɨ isetasa ' rʉ ' pʉ uta ' ku ' tɨ :

text: Tell ye the daughter of Sion , Behold , thy King cometh unto thee , meek , and sitting upon an ass , and a colt the foal of an ass .
text2: “ Surusiran pon kon ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' ekamatɨ ' , ‘ Kin , ɨiwano ' kon uye ' nɨ pɨ ' man , mɨ pe te ' ku ' se rɨ iyepʉ pen , iyepʉ isa ' ka ' si mʉre po , ’ ” tawon .

text: And the disciples went , and did as Jesus commanded them ,
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ipoitorʉ ton utɨ ' pʉ Sises uya ta ' pʉ awɨrɨ rɨ iku ' se ' na .

text: And brought the ass , and the colt , and put on them their clothes , and they set him thereon .
text2: To ' uya isa ' ka ' si mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ imʉre ne ' kaa ' pʉ . To ' uya tʉpon kon tʉpɨtʉ ' pʉ to ' pona , mɨrɨpan po Sises ereuta ' pʉ .

text: And a very great multitude spread their garments in the way ; others cut down branches from the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Anpisin ton kuru ka ' pon amʉ ' uya tʉpon kon ta ' nʉkʉ ' pʉ asanta tawɨrɨ Sises utɨto ' pe ipo . Tʉron kon uya yʉi panta ton a ' tɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan ta ' nʉkʉ ' pʉ to ' uya asanta tawɨrɨ .

text: And the multitudes that went before , and that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna to the Son of David : Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord ; Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Anpisin ton ka ' pon amʉ ' irawɨrɨ tʉutɨsan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipɨkɨrɨ te ' san ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉ ' pʉ , “ Usana ! Kin Tepi ' pa rʉ ' pʉ apurɨpɨtʉ serɨ ! ” “ Pori ' pe kʉrɨ esi mɨrɨ Itepuru ese ' yau nʉye ' ai ' ne ' ! ” “ Usana ka ' entawon yau ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And when he was come into Jerusalem , all the city was moved , saying , Who is this ?
text2: Surusiran pona Sises epa ' kasa ' a ' tai , ka ' pon amʉ ' eke pata pon kon e ' tʉrʉnka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya , “ Ɨnʉ ' pʉse rɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ .

text: And the multitude said , This is Jesus the prophet of Nazareth of Galilee .
text2: Anpisin ton uya to ' maimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Sises pʉse rɨ , pu ' kena ' Nasare ' winon , Kiyarari pon ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And Jesus went into the temple of God , and cast out all them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ,
text2: Sises ewomʉ ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' pʉ ' kʉ ta ' , mɨrɨ yau te ' san ka ' pon amʉ ' usennan pɨ ' , kʉrʉpo ' po pɨ ' te ' san enpa ' ka ' pʉ iya . Pʉrata ensimanin nan tepʉrʉʉi mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wako ' wa amʉ ' kʉrʉpo ' pomanin nan apon ton nɨ rawoipɨtʉ ' pʉ iya .

text: And said unto them , It is written , My house shall be called the house of prayer ; but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ Iye ' menukasa ' , ‘ Uiwʉ ' e ' to ' oton ɨpʉreman iwʉ ' , ’ tukai ' e ' tane ‘ ama ' amʉ ' en pe rɨ ’ mʉku ' atʉi ' ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And the blind and the lame came to him in the temple ; and he healed them .
text2: Tenku ' na ' nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ise ' mesa ' kon uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' ta ' , mɨrɨpan kon epi ' tɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ iya .

text: And when the chief priests and scribes saw the wonderful things that he did , and the children crying in the temple , and saying , Hosanna to the Son of David ; they were sore displeased ,
text2: Use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton , Main pɨ ' enupanin nan uya wakʉ kupʉ iya ensa ' a ' tai , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ mʉre amʉ ' ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉ , “ Usana ! Kin Tepi ' pa rʉ ' pʉ apurɨpɨtʉ serɨ ! ” tawon etasa ' a ' tai , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton usakorota ' pʉ ipan pe mɨrɨ pɨ ' .

text: And said unto him , Hearest thou what these say ? And Jesus saith unto them , Yea ; have ye never read , Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings thou hast perfected praise ?
text2: “ To ' maimu pe ' metayan ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya Sises pɨ ' . “ Ewai ' , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya . “ Iye ' menukasa ' pe ' ene auya ' nokon pʉra nai : “ ‘ Apurɨpɨ ' nin pe eke ton nʉ ' kwɨ mʉre amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ mana ' pokon kon mʉre amʉ ' ku ' sa ' , ’ tawon ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he left them , and went out of the city into Bethany ; and he lodged there .
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo si , Sises uya to ' nɨmɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ Pe ' tani pona . Mɨrɨ yau , pata tʉrʉ ' pʉ iya .

text: Now in the morning as he returned into the city , he hungered .
text2: Awanakʉi ' kuru , iyenna ' po koro ' tau eke pata pona , iwan pe iyesi ' pʉ .

text: And when he saw a fig tree in the way , he came to it , and found nothing thereon , but leaves only , and said unto it , Let no fruit grow on thee henceforward for ever . And presently the fig tree withered away .
text2: Asanta piyau tʉna ' sen ye ' , pi ' tukai ' tesa ' sen ene tʉuya pɨ ' , itekare pɨ ' itɨ ' pʉ , e ' tane ɨ ' rɨ eporo ' pʉ iya pen nɨ ipo , iyare ton nɨken , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Tɨwɨ si tepetasen pe pʉra e ' kɨ ! ” ta ' pʉ iya . Inke pʉra rɨ yʉi useketa ' pʉ .

text: And when the disciples saw it , they marvelled , saying , How soon is the fig tree withered away !
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton uya serɨ ensa ' a ' tai , to ' usewansiuka ' pʉ , to ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Nai kasa si pi ' e ' useketa inke pʉra rɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Verily I say unto you , If ye have faith , and doubt not , ye shall not only do this which is done to the fig tree , but also if ye shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; it shall be done .
text2: “ I ' napairon ekama uya serɨ ɨpɨ ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya . “ Apurɨto ' auya ' nokon esi a ' tai , tʉkasimai ' pʉra , mɨrɨ pi ' e ' pɨ ' iku ' sa ' na ' ne ' rɨken kupʉ auya ' nokon pen e ' tane , ‘ Ata ' mo ' kakɨ tuna ka ' , ’ ta auya ' nokon a ' tai wʉ ' pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan nɨ e ' kupʉ .

text: And all things , whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer , believing , ye shall receive .
text2: Apurɨ auya pe iyesi yau , eporo auya rɨ ɨnekama ' po ' pʉ ɨwɨpʉremato ' yau , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' .

text: And when he was come into the temple , the chief priests and the elders of the people came unto him as he was teaching , and said , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority ?
text2: Sises ewomʉ ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' pʉ ' kʉ ta ' . Mɨrɨ yau , to ' enupa pɨ ' iyesi koro ' tau , Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' epuru ton pokon uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' . “ Ɨ ' rɨ meruntɨrʉ winɨ serɨ ton kupʉ auya ? Ɨnʉ ' uya serɨ meruntɨ ke ɨrepa ' pʉ ? ” tukai ' to ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I also will ask you one thing , which if ye tell me , I in like wise will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Sises uya entakanoma ' pʉ , “ Tikin nan pɨ ' rɨ marɨ ɨyekama ' po uya ' nokon nɨ nɨrɨ mɨrɨ . Umaimu ei ' sa ' auya ' nokon a ' tai , ekama uya rɨ nɨrɨ mɨrɨ ɨpɨ ' nokon , ɨnʉ ' uya umeruntɨrʉ ' tɨsa ' serɨ ton ku ' to ' pe uya tukai ' .

text: The baptism of John , whence was it ? from heaven , or of men ? And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say unto us , Why did ye not then believe him ?
text2: Isaan uya pa ' taisiman nɨto ' — nai winɨ iye ' sa ' ? Epʉn winɨ pe ' , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ka ' pon amʉ ' winɨ katɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨpan kon usaurokʉ ' pʉ tiwano ' kon pe , “ ‘ Epʉn winɨ ’ ta pe iyesi yau , uyekama ' po iya ' nokon , ‘ Ɨ ' rɨ pe ken iyesi pɨ ' Isaan apurɨ auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi ' pʉ ? ’ tukai ' .

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; we fear the people ; for all hold John as a prophet .
text2: E ' tane ‘ ka ' pon amʉ ' winɨ ’ ta yau , ka ' pon amʉ ' uya enari ' pan , apʉne pʉra Isaan esi pu ' kena ' tukai ' to ' uya apurɨ ' pʉ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And they answered Jesus , and said , We cannot tell . And he said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Sises nin si eikʉ ' pʉ to ' uya mɨrɨ , “ Ina uya i ' tu pʉra man , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ta ' pʉ iya , “ Ekamasa ' auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi ke , ekama uya nɨrɨ pen nɨ serɨ mɨrɨ meruntɨrʉ winɨ serɨ ton kupʉ uya tukai ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But what think ye ? A certain man had two sons ; and he came to the first , and said , Son , go work to day in my vineyard .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ tukai ' se pɨ ' mɨsenuminkayatʉu ? Ka ' pon esi ' pʉ asa ' ron kon imunkɨ amʉ ' . Wapiyaro ' tʉmu piya ' itɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya , ‘ Mooi , e ' tʉrawasomai ' enta kʉre ' itese ' kiyari e ' kwa na ' , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: He answered and said , I will not : but afterward he repented , and went .
text2: “ E ' tane imu uya , ‘ Kane , ’ tukai ' imaimu eikʉ ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ ta tʉpo , teseru ensima ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ .

text: And he came to the second , and said likewise . And he answered and said , I go , sir : and went not .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ rɨ marɨ tase ' na ikʉipʉnʉ utɨ ' pʉ tʉmu , isakon pɨ ' . ‘ Mooi , serɨ pe e ' tʉrawasomata kʉre ' kiyari e ' kwa na ' , ’ ta ' pʉ iya . ‘ Ewai ' , utɨ rɨ , ’ ta ' pʉ iya , e ' tane itɨ ' pʉ pen .

text: Whether of them twain did the will of his father ? They say unto him , The first . Jesus saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That the publicans and the harlots go into the kingdom of God before you .
text2: “ Nai kʉrɨ rupɨ uya tʉkʉipʉnʉ e ' to ' i ' se kupʉ ' pʉ tukai ' , mi ' tuyatʉu ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . “ Wapiyaro ' uya kuru , ” tukai ' to ' uya imaimu eikʉ ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ I ' napairon ekama uya serɨ ɨpɨ ' nokon ; pʉsamoro pʉrata amʉranʉ ' nin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' ɨri pe iteseru iko ' mansa ' rʉ ' san uya Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe epoto ' oton arawɨrɨ ' nokon .

text: For John came unto you in the way of righteousness , and ye believed him not : but the publicans and the harlots believed him : and ye , when ye had seen it , repented not afterward , that ye might believe him .
text2: Wakʉ pe e ' nɨ eseru enpoikase ' na Isaan uyee ' pʉ ɨpiya ' nokon e ' tane , apurɨ auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi ' pʉ , pʉrata amʉranʉ ' nin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' ɨri pe iteseru iko ' mansa ' kon nʉ ' pʉ uya rɨken apurɨ ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ rɨ si ene tʉpo amakooi kon apai ɨyera ' tɨ kon pʉra rɨ iyesi , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ apurɨ auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya to ' pɨ ' .

text: Hear another parable : There was a certain householder , which planted a vineyard , and hedged it round about , and digged a winepress in it , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country :
text2: “ Tʉron nɨ kanan panton etatɨ ' : Moro non esa ' ka ' pon esi ' pʉ kiyari ye ' si ' na ' pe te ' sen patama ' pʉ iya . Iwoi iwa ' kʉtʉi pe iwekupiri ' tɨ ' pʉ iya . Non aka ' pʉ iya tʉmainarʉ yau ikasu ' kato ' yai , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipa ' simato ' ponsi ' kɨ ka ' tawon soto ' pan ɨutɨ amɨ ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨpan uya umɨ pɨ ' te ' san ena ' tʉmainarʉ tʉrʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ ɨnnon pata ya ' .

text: And when the time of the fruit drew near , he sent his servants to the husbandmen , that they might receive the fruits of it .
text2: “ Kiyari akʉ ' pʉsa ' weyu e ' seposa ' a ' tai , tʉpoitorʉ ton ennoko ' pʉ iya umɨ tʉrʉ ' pʉ tʉuya itena ' ton piya ' tiwano ' oton epose ' na .

text: And the husbandmen took his servants , and beat one , and killed another , and stoned another .
text2: Umɨ esanon uya ipoitorʉ ton a ' si ' pʉ . Tikin nan panta ' ma ' pʉ to ' uya , tʉron nɨ wɨnɨ ' pʉ to ' uya , to ' osorʉwano wɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ to ' uya tɨ ' ke .

text: Again , he sent other servants more than the first : and they did unto them likewise .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai tʉron kon nʉ ' san tʉpoitorʉ ton ennoko ' pʉ iya wapiyaro ' ennoko ' pʉ tʉuya entai , umɨ esanon uya mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ to ' kupʉ ' pʉ .

text: But last of all he sent unto them his son , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: Tanporon kon u ' matʉ pe , tʉmu nin si ennoko ' pʉ iya to ' piya ' . ‘ To ' uya kuru umu nama mɨrɨ , ’ ta ' pʉ iya ,

text: But when the husbandmen saw the son , they said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and let us seize on his inheritance .
text2: e ' tane imu ensa ' tʉuya ' nokon a ' tai , ta ' pʉ to ' uya tʉtonpa kon pɨ ' , ‘ Pʉse rɨ kuru pʉse rɨ kiyari pata ' se ' anʉnton . Apʉne , iwɨpai ' nokon , inanʉmʉnʉ anʉnto ' kon pe , ’ ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And they caught him , and cast him out of the vineyard , and slew him .
text2: Mɨrɨpan tanʉnse to ' uya eno ' ma ' pʉ kiyari e ' kwa yapai , mɨrɨpan wɨnɨ ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: When the lord therefore of the vineyard cometh , what will he do unto those husbandmen ?
text2: “ Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , kiyari e ' kwa esa ' uye ' sa ' a ' tai , ɨ ' rɨ ken si kupʉ iya itena ' tʉnonka ' san pɨ ' ? ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: They say unto him , He will miserably destroy those wicked men , and will let out his vineyard unto other husbandmen , which shall render him the fruits in their seasons .
text2: “ To ' ma ' tanʉkʉ ' pʉ iya , kamoro ɨri ton , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉron kon nʉ ' san ena ' nin si kiyari e ' kwa tʉrʉ iya tʉrepanin nan nin si ena ' , umɨ winɨ tʉneporonʉ kon yapai , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Did ye never read in the scriptures , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner : this is the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Iye ' menukasa ' itekare yau ennin nan pen pe ' ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon : “ ‘ Tɨ ' , ɨutɨ amɨnin nan neno ' ma ' pʉ enasa ' itekun airon tɨ ' pe ; serɨ ku ' sa ' Itepuru uya , mɨrɨpan esi wakʉ pe kuru uyenu kon yau , ’ tawon ?

text: Therefore say I unto you , The kingdom of God shall be taken from you , and given to a nation bringing forth the fruits thereof .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ pɨ ' Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe emo ' kato ' oton ɨpiyapai ' nokon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wakʉ pe epetanʉ ' nin nan ena ' iye ' tʉto ' oton .

text: And whosoever shall fall on this stone shall be broken : but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Kʉrɨ serɨ tɨ ' pona nʉta ' mo ' kayai ' ne ' utakiti ' kwa mɨrɨ , e ' tane kʉrɨ tɨ ' nʉta ' mo ' kayai ' ne ' ipona uta ' si ' kɨrɨ mɨrɨ ipʉra rɨ nin , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when the chief priests and Pharisees had heard his parables , they perceived that he spake of them .
text2: Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pari ' si amʉ ' uya Sises pantomʉ to ' ka ' nʉ ' sa ' a ' tai tʉpɨ ' nokon isaurokʉ tukai ' ,

text: But when they sought to lay hands on him , they feared the multitude , because they took him for a prophet .
text2: a ' sito ' ipɨkɨrɨ warinpa pɨ ' to ' esi ' pʉ , e ' tane anpisin ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' to ' enari ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra ka ' pon amʉ ' uya apurɨ pɨ ' pu ' kena ' pe iyesi tukai ' .

text: And Jesus answered and spake unto them again by parables , and said ,
text2: Sises uya kanan to ' auro ' kakaa ' pʉ panton yai . Ta ' pʉ iya :

text: The kingdom of heaven is like unto a certain king , which made a marriage for his son ,
text2: “ Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe esi kin , tʉmu emari ' ma i ' kiyari konekanin nʉ ' pʉ kasa ,

text: And sent forth his servants to call them that were bidden to the wedding : and they would not come .
text2: mɨrɨpan uya tʉpoitorʉ ton ennoko ' pʉ tʉnkɨ ' ma ' san pana ' tɨse ' na to ' uye ' to ' pe , e ' tane ɨsi ' pai pʉra to ' esi ' pʉ .

text: Again , he sent forth other servants , saying , Tell them which are bidden , Behold , I have prepared my dinner : my oxen and my fatlings are killed , and all things are ready : come unto the marriage .
text2: “ Serɨ rɨken pe tʉpoitorʉ ton ennoko ' pʉ iya , ‘ Apʉne enkɨ ! Tanporon nɨ ekonekaka ' sa ' man . Paka amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eka ' nʉ ' sa ' ton paka munkɨ amʉ ' wɨka ' sa ' ekonekasa ' man . Ɨsi ' tɨ ' si emari ' man i ' kiyari pɨ ' enta ' nai ' ! ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But they made light of it , and went their ways , one to his farm , another to his merchandise :
text2: E ' tane tetai ' pʉra to ' utɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan tikin nan utɨ ' pʉ tʉmainarʉ ya ' , tʉron nɨ tʉnkupʉnʉ rɨ ku ' se ' na .

text: And the remnant took his servants , and entreated them spitefully , and slew them .
text2: Tʉron kon uya ipoitorʉ ton a ' si ' pʉ , ipan pe rɨ to ' kota ' ma ' pʉ to ' uya , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' wɨnɨ ' pʉ rɨ to ' uya .

text: But when the king heard thereof , he was wroth : and he sent forth his armies , and destroyed those murderers , and burned up their city .
text2: Kin usakorota ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya tʉsoisaai amʉ ' ennoko ' pʉ kamoro to ' wɨnin nʉ ' san ma ' tanʉ ' se ' na , to ' pata ' se ' rɨ po ' tɨpɨ ' se ' na .

text: Then saith he to his servants , The wedding is ready , but they which were bidden were not worthy .
text2: “ Mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' , ‘ Emari ' man i ' kiyari rɨ e ' nonkasa ' man e ' tane , kamoro unkɨ ' ma ' san uye ' to ' pe pʉra rɨ kenʉ ' iyesi ' pʉ .

text: Go ye therefore into the highways , and as many as ye shall find , bid to the marriage .
text2: Entantɨ ' asanta ka ' ta pona rɨ , ɨneporo ' pʉ kon nɨ mʉkɨ ' matʉi ' , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: So those servants went out into the highways , and gathered together all as many as they found , both bad and good : and the wedding was furnished with guests .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' ipoitorʉ ton utɨ ' pʉ asanta ka ' ta pona ka ' pon amʉ ' tʉneporonʉ kon nɨ amʉranʉ ' se ' na , asa ' rɨ rɨ , wakʉ ton , ɨri ton nɨ , mɨrɨpan emari ' man nɨto ' itau ɨutɨ epe ' tɨ ' pʉ ka ' pon amʉ ' ke .

text: And when the king came in to see the guests , he saw there a man which had not on a wedding garment :
text2: “ E ' tane kin uye ' sa ' a ' tai to ' ense ' na , ene ' pʉ iya moro ka ' pon emari ' man pon pe pʉra ipon .

text: And he saith unto him , Friend , how camest thou in hither not having a wedding garment ? And he was speechless .
text2: ‘ Utonpa , nai kasa ɨuye ' sa ' emari ' man pon yau pʉra rɨ ? ’ tukai ' ekama ' po ' pʉ iya . Isauro ' to ' pʉra iyesi ' pʉ .

text: Then said the king to the servants , Bind him hand and foot , and take him away , and cast him into outer darkness ; there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , kin uya ta ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' , ‘ Auronpɨ ' tɨ ' , itemiyatʉ pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' ta pɨ ' eno ' ma kon pa pʉroroi pona ewarupɨ ya ' . Mɨrɨ yau ikaranto ' pe , tʉyɨ kɨtɨtɨi ' mato ' pe iya , ’ ta ' pʉ kin uya .

text: For many are called , but few are chosen .
text2: “ Tu ' kan kon nɨ kɨ ' ma e ' tane , tu ' ke pʉra to ' anʉmʉ , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: Then went the Pharisees , and took counsel how they might entangle him in his talk .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' Pari ' si amʉ ' utɨ ' pʉ nai kasa ipoken pʉra isauro ' to ' pe ikupʉ ' nokon ka ' se ' na .

text: And they sent out unto him their disciples with the Herodians , saying , Master , we know that thou art true , and teachest the way of God in truth , neither carest thou for any man : for thou regardest not the person of men .
text2: To ' uya tʉpoitorʉ kon ennoko ' pʉ Sises piya ' . Kin pe te ' sen , Era ' pɨkɨron kon pokon pe rɨ , mɨrɨpan kon uya ta ' pʉ Sises pɨ ' , “ Ti ' sa , ina i ' tupɨ ' man i ' napairon ye ' pe ɨwesi tukai ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa eseru pɨ ' enupan auya i ' napairon awɨrɨ . Ka ' pon amʉ ' rɨ nensimanʉ pe pʉra ɨyeseru esi , apʉne pʉra ɨnʉ ' pe rɨ to ' esi pɨ ' te ' namasen pe pʉra ɨwesi .

text: Tell us therefore , What thinkest thou ? Is it lawful to give tribute unto Caesar , or not ?
text2: Ina pɨ ' ekamakɨ ; ɨ ' rɨ ta auya se pɨ ' ; ipoken pe ' iyesi Sisa ena ' pʉrata tʉtʉsen e ' ma a ' tai , kane katɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: But Jesus perceived their wickedness , and said , Why tempt ye me , ye hypocrites ?
text2: E ' tane , ɨri kupʉ pɨ ' to ' e ' ku ' to ' i ' tu tʉuya ke Sises uya ta ' pʉ . “ Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon wakʉ pe te ' ku ' san , ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' usa ' mapai ɨwesi kon ?

text: Shew me the tribute money . And they brought unto him a penny .
text2: Apʉne , use ' man nɨto ' ike enpoikatɨ ' uyena ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨpan kon uya pata esa ' apon pʉrata pun nee ' pʉ itena ' .

text: And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya to ' ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨnʉ ' nai ipɨ ' , ɨnʉ ' ese ' nai ipɨ ' ? ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: They say unto him , Caesar ' s . Then saith he unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which are Caesar ' s ; and unto God the things that are God ' s .
text2: “ Sisa , ” tukai ' to ' uya imaimu eikʉ ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ Sisa iwano ' itʉtɨ ' itena ' rɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa iwano ' rɨ itʉtɨ ' Papa ena ' rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: When they had heard these words , they marvelled , and left him , and went their way .
text2: Serɨ tawon eta tʉuya ' nokon a ' tai , to ' usewansiuka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon utɨ ' pʉ ipiyapai .

text: The same day came to him the Sadducees , which say that there is no resurrection , and asked him ,
text2: Mɨrɨ wʉi yau rɨ , Satu ' si amʉ ' , eri ' nɨ tʉpo e ' mʉ ' sa ' kan pʉra iyesi tawon nan uyee ' pʉ Sises piya ' ekama ' pose ' na .

text: Saying , Master , Moses said , If a man die , having no children , his brother shall marry his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: Ta ' pʉ to ' uya , “ Ti ' sa , Mosi ' uya tasa ' upɨ ' nokon , tʉumu ' tai ' pʉra ka ' pon eri ' sa ' yau , iyakon nʉ ' pʉ uya ino ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ mari ' mato ' pe iyesi imu ' tanʉ ' to ' pe tʉuya itiwano ' pe .

text: Now there were with us seven brethren : and the first , when he had married a wife , deceased , and , having no issue , left his wife unto his brother :
text2: Moro 7 kaisaron kon ɨsirunan esi ' pʉ ina koro ' tau . Wapiyaro ' emari ' ma ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan erikʉ ' pʉ , tʉmunkɨ ke pʉra tʉno ' pʉ tʉnonkai ' , mɨrɨpan no ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ e ' nonka ' pʉ iyakon ena ' .

text: Likewise the second also , and the third , unto the seventh .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ , iyakon nʉ ' pʉ erikʉ ' pʉ imʉre pʉra rɨ . To ' osorʉwano esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ kasa rɨ . Tanporo 7 pe te ' to ' kon kaisa rɨ .

text: And last of all the woman died also .
text2: Kamoro eri ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ pata ' pʉ pe , to ' no ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ erikʉ ' pʉ .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife shall she be of the seven ? for they all had her .
text2: Eri ' nɨ tʉpo , e ' mʉ ' sa ' kan a ' tai , ɨnʉ ' kuru no ' pʉ pe ken si iyesi , 7 kaisaron kon koro ' tapai , apʉne pʉra 7 kaisaron kon uya imari ' masa ' pɨ ' ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Ye do err , not knowing the scriptures , nor the power of God .
text2: Sises uya to ' maimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon esi ipoken pʉra , apʉne pʉra iye ' menukasa ' itekare mɨrɨ pe pʉra Papa meruntɨrʉ i ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi pɨ ' .

text: For in the resurrection they neither marry , nor are given in marriage , but are as the angels of God in heaven .
text2: Eri ' nɨ tʉpo e ' mʉ ' sa ' kan a ' tai , ka ' pon amʉ ' emari ' mato ' oton pen nɨ , mɨrɨ pe pʉra to ' e ' tʉrʉ pen nɨ emari ' man nɨto ' yau ; inserʉ amʉ ' , Epʉn pon kon kasa rɨ to ' e ' to ' oton .

text: But as touching the resurrection of the dead , have ye not read that which was spoken unto you by God , saying ,
text2: E ' tane eri ' nɨ tʉpo e ' mʉ ' sa ' kan nɨto ' ensa ' auya ' nokon pʉra pe ' nai Papa uya ayauro ' ka ' pʉ kon ipɨ ' ?

text: I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ? God is not the God of the dead , but of the living .
text2: ‘ Papa urɨ , Epʉra ' an , Aisi ' , Seko ' e ' to ' itese ' ipɨ ' , ’ tawon . Papa , iyeri ' sa ' kon e ' to ' itese ' pɨ ' pen e ' tane nurɨnan kon , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And when the multitude heard this , they were astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Serɨ tawon eta tʉuya ' nokon a ' tai , to ' usewansiuka ' pʉ tenupato ' iya ' nokon pɨ ' .

text: But when the Pharisees had heard that he had put the Sadducees to silence , they were gathered together .
text2: Sises uya Satu ' si amʉ ' maimu ' kasa ' tense , Pari ' si amʉ ' amʉra ' pʉ .

text: Then one of them , which was a lawyer , asked him a question , tempting him , and saying ,
text2: To ' tonpa , ipan pe Main i ' tunin uya Sises ekama ' po ' pʉ i ' tupɨtʉ pe ,

text: Master , which is the great commandment in the law ?
text2: “ Ti ' sa , nai kuru esi eke pe iyawɨrɨ e ' nɨto ' pe Main , Mosi ' winon yau ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus said unto him , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ ‘ Papa i ' nʉnkakɨ tanporo ɨyewan pokon pe , aya ' kwarʉ pokon pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨusenuminkato ' pokon pe . ’

text: This is the first and great commandment .
text2: Serɨ serɨ wapiyaro ' , eke kuru iyawɨrɨ e ' nɨto ' .

text: And the second is like unto it , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipɨkɨron esi iwaraino rɨ marɨ : ‘ Ɨtonpa i ' nʉnkakɨ mɨsi ' nʉnkayai ' ne ' kasa , ’ tawon .

text: On these two commandments hang all the law and the prophets .
text2: Serɨ si asa ' ron iyawɨrɨ e ' nɨto ' po , tanporo Main mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pu ' kena ' amʉ ' esi mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: While the Pharisees were gathered together , Jesus asked them ,
text2: Pari ' si amʉ ' amʉrasa ' koro ' tau , Sises uya to ' ekama ' popɨtʉ ' pʉ ,

text: Saying , What think ye of Christ ? whose son is he ? They say unto him , The Son of David .
text2: “ Ɨnʉ ' pe rɨ Kʉrai esi tukai ' mi ' tuyatʉu ? Ɨnʉ ' pa rʉ ' pʉ pe iyesi ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . “ Tepi ' pa rʉ ' pʉ tukai ' , ” to ' uya eikʉ ' pʉ .

text: He saith unto them , How then doth David in spirit call him Lord , saying ,
text2: Ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe ken iyesi pɨ ' Tepi ' usaurokʉ Iya ' kwarʉ yau uya esakʉ , ‘ Uyepuru , ’ tukai ' ? Apʉne pʉra ta iya ,

text: The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: “ ‘ Itepuru uya ta ' pʉ uyepuru pɨ ' : “ Uyenwo ' netʉ winɨ ereutakɨ , ɨyeyaton non tʉrʉ uya pʉkʉ pona a ' ta o ' koi ' , ” ’ tasa ' .

text: If David then call him Lord , how is he his son ?
text2: Tepi ' uya , ‘ Uyepuru , ’ tukai ' esakʉ pe iyesi yau , nai kasa nɨrɨ ipa rʉ ' pʉ pe nesii ' no ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And no man was able to answer him a word , neither durst any man from that day forth ask him any more questions .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ imaimu entakanoma poken pʉra iyesi ' pʉ , mɨrɨ wʉi awonsi ' kɨ ɨnʉ ' rɨ esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ enta ' ɨnekama ' popɨ ' pai pʉra .

text: Then spake Jesus to the multitude , and to his disciples ,
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya ta ' pʉ iyamʉrasa ' kon pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' :

text: Saying , The scribes and the Pharisees sit in Moses ' seat :
text2: “ Main pɨ ' enupanin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pari ' si amʉ ' esi mɨrɨ Mosi ' pata ' pʉ akan pe .

text: All therefore whatsoever they bid you observe , that observe and do ; but do not ye after their works : for they say , and do not .
text2: To ' maimu awɨrɨ me ' tʉi ' , ɨ ' rɨ rɨ tasa ' to ' uya na ' ne ' ɨpɨ ' nokon mʉku ' tʉi ' , e ' tane to ' nʉkupʉnʉ kʉ ' ku ' tʉu , apʉne pʉra tʉusauro ' to ' kon ku ' nin nan pen kamoro .

text: For they bind heavy burdens and grievous to be borne , and lay them on men ' s shoulders ; but they themselves will not move them with one of their fingers .
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' ekama ' po to ' uya itekare ku ' to ' pe to ' uya sa ' man pe rɨ te ' sen , e ' tane ɨ ' rɨ rɨ kupʉ to ' uya pʉra rɨ iyesi tʉnauro ' kapʉ kon pika ' tɨnin pe .

text: But all their works they do for to be seen of men : they make broad their phylacteries , and enlarge the borders of their garments ,
text2: “ Tanporon nɨ to ' nʉkupʉ ' pʉ pe na ' ne ' esi mɨrɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' uya tento ' kon ipɨ ' pe : tʉwɨpʉremato ' kon yen konepɨtʉ to ' uya eke ton pe ika ' ta , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉpon kon sousowʉ pe te ' sen kanan ɨnkapɨtʉ to ' uya kusan ton pe .
