text: And love the uppermost rooms at feasts , and the chief seats in the synagogues ,
text2: Eke ton ereutato ' pata ' se ' yau kuru ereutapaino kon enta ' nan a ' tai ' ne mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' usenupato ' iwʉ ' tau .

text: And greetings in the markets , and to be called of men , Rabbi , Rabbi .
text2: Anpisin ka ' pon amʉ ' kʉrʉpo ' po pata ' se ' iyawon kon uya , ‘ Miyarɨ , ’ ta i ' se te ' san tʉnama kon pe , ka ' pon amʉ ' uya , ‘ Rapai , ’ ta i ' se kuru to ' esi tʉpɨ ' nokon .

text: But be not ye called Rabbi : for one is your Master , even Christ ; and all ye are brethren .
text2: “ E ' tane ɨusesa ' to ' kon pʉra iyesi ‘ Ti ' sa ’ tukai ' , apʉne pʉra tikin nan nɨ esi ɨyepuru kon pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨsitonpa pe rɨ nin ɨwesi kon .

text: And call no man your father upon the earth : for one is your Father , which is in heaven .
text2: Mɨrɨpan ɨnʉ ' rɨ kʉsesa ' tʉu , ‘ Ukʉipʉnʉ , ’ tukai ' serɨ non po , apʉne pʉra tikin nan nɨ ɨkʉipʉnʉ kon esi , Epʉn pon .

text: Neither be ye called masters : for one is your Master , even Christ .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ esa ' to ' pʉra rɨ iyesi , ‘ Ti ' sa , ’ tukai ' , apʉne pʉra tikin nan nɨ kʉrɨ rɨ Ti ' sa ; Kʉrai .

text: But he that is greatest among you shall be your servant .
text2: Eke pe na ' ne ' ɨ ' koro ' tau ' nokon esi mɨrɨ ayapiyo ' kon pe rɨ .

text: And whosoever shall exalt himself shall be abased ; and he that shall humble himself shall be exalted .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ eke pe te ' ku ' sen ena mɨrɨ se pe rɨ ; mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ se pe rɨ te ' ku ' sen ena mɨrɨ eke pe , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: But woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye shut up the kingdom of heaven against men : for ye neither go in yourselves , neither suffer ye them that are entering to go in .
text2: “ Ɨsɨ sɨ , Main pɨ ' enupanin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pari ' si amʉ ' , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon wakʉ pe te ' ku ' san ! Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ ya ' rɨ ɨtɨpaino kon wa ' kʉ ' sa ' auya ' nokon man . Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon pe rɨ epa ' kapai pʉra ɨwesi kon , mɨrɨ pe pʉra epa ' kapai na ' ne ' nan epa ' kato ' pe ikupʉ auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayer : therefore ye shall receive the greater damnation .
text2: “ Ɨsɨ sɨ , Main pɨ ' enupanin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pari ' si amʉ ' , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon wakʉ pe te ' ku ' san ! Itaan ' pʉ iyeri ' sa ' kon nʉ ' san iwʉ ' ma ' tanʉkʉ auya ' nokon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨwɨpʉrema kon kusan pe , ‘ Wakʉ ton , ’ tato ' pe ɨpɨ ' nokon . Mɨrɨ wenai , ipan pe rɨ Papa uya ɨkota ' mato ' oton kon .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye compass sea and land to make one proselyte , and when he is made , ye make him twofold more the child of hell than yourselves .
text2: “ Ɨsɨ sɨ , Main pɨ ' enupanin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pari ' si amʉ ' , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon wakʉ pe te ' ku ' san ! Siya rɨ tʉutɨsan ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon non poro , parau kau rɨ , tikin nan nɨ konekai ' . Ɨtonpa pe ikonekasa ' auya ' nokon a ' tai , ikupʉ auya ' nokon asa ' ite ' kwa iye ' to ' airɨ akasa ' nokon , iyeri ' sa ' kon utɨto ' ya ' ekota ' mai ' itɨto ' pe .

text: Woe unto you , ye blind guides , which say , Whosoever shall swear by the temple , it is nothing ; but whosoever shall swear by the gold of the temple , he is a debtor !
text2: “ Ɨsɨ sɨ , tenku ' ne esii ' ma ka ' pon esanon ! Ta auya ' nokon , ‘ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ usauro ' sa ' yau , iku ' to ' pe uya tukai ' Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' , ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' tesa ' pɨ ' se uya iku ' to ' kuru pe pʉra rɨ iyesi , e ' tane ɨnʉ ' rɨ usauro ' sa ' pe iyesi yau , iku ' to ' pe tʉuya tukai ' , korʉ tesa ' pɨ ' se Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' , ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' tawon uya kuru nin si iku ' to ' pe iyesi , ’ ta auya ' nokon .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gold , or the temple that sanctifieth the gold ?
text2: Tenu a ' kwarʉkena ' nan pen ! Nai esi eke pe kuru : korʉ , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' katɨ - - - korʉ ku ' nin wakʉ pe ?

text: And , Whosoever shall swear by the altar , it is nothing ; but whosoever sweareth by the gift that is upon it , he is guilty .
text2: Ta auya ' nokon kanan , ‘ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ usauro ' sa ' yau , iku ' to ' pe uya tukai ' Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' apon tesa ' pɨ ' se uya iku ' to ' pe kuru pʉra rɨ iyesi , e ' tane ɨnʉ ' rɨ usauro ' sa ' pe iyesi yau , iku ' to ' pe tʉuya tukai ' tʉntʉrʉnʉ Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' apon tesa ' pɨ ' se ikupʉ uya tukai ' , tʉusaurokʉ ' pʉ ku ' to ' iya pe kuru rɨ iyesi , ’ ta auya ' nokon .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gift , or the altar that sanctifieth the gift ?
text2: Itenu pʉnon ! Nai esi eke pe kuru : tʉtʉsen , use ' man nɨto ' apon katɨ - - - tʉtʉsen ku ' nin wakʉ pe ?

text: Whoso therefore shall swear by the altar , sweareth by it , and by all things thereon .
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai , tʉusauro ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ kupʉ iya pe iyesi Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' apon tesa ' pɨ ' se , mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ iyesi ta tʉuya pe iyesi yau , tʉusauro ' sa ' iku ' to ' pe uya ta tʉuya a ' tai , tanporon nɨ Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' apon tesa ' pɨ ' se .

text: And whoso shall swear by the temple , sweareth by it , and by him that dwelleth therein .
text2: Kʉrɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' tesa ' pɨ ' se ikupʉ uya tukai ' , Papa , itau na ' ne ' ese ' yau isauro ' sa ' na ' ne ' , Papa uya wakʉ nonkato ' tʉmunkɨ amʉ ' pona iwʉ ' , mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ iyesi tʉusauro ' sa ' kupʉ iya pe iyesi yau , Papa ese ' tesa ' pɨ ' se Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' , ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' tawon .

text: And he that shall swear by heaven , sweareth by the throne of God , and by him that sitteth thereon .
text2: Kʉrɨ Epʉn tesa ' pɨ ' se iku ' to ' pe uya tukai ' tʉusauro ' sen , usaurokʉ mɨrɨ Papa apon tesa ' pɨ ' se mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipo te ' sen .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin , and have omitted the weightier matters of the law , judgment , mercy , and faith : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: “ Ɨsɨ sɨ , Main pɨ ' enupanin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pari ' si amʉ ' , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon wakʉ pe te ' ku ' san ! 1 10 e ' to ' airɨ kiyari kɨ ' nʉnpanin — min , tirʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kumin tato ' tʉnin . E ' tane eke ton pe kuru te ' sen Main yau — ɨsi ' kaisa rɨ ka ' pon ku ' to ' , ɨsentu ' ke ' pe e ' nɨto ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ usauro ' nɨ ' pʉ awɨrɨ e ' nɨto ' . Emen iwa pe na ' ne ' kupʉ pɨ ' ɨwesi ' pʉ kon nesii ' no , iwapiyaro ' teno ' mai ' pʉra .

text: Ye blind guides , which strain at a gnat , and swallow a camel .
text2: Tenku ' ne esii ' ma ka ' pon esanon ! Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon esi weruwe eisikai ' ma ɨuku kon apai , ɨikʉn kon eke rɨ kiyamerʉ tato ' enko ' mai ' ma .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye make clean the outside of the cup and of the platter , but within they are full of extortion and excess .
text2: “ Ɨsɨ sɨ , Main pɨ ' enupanin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pari ' si amʉ ' , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon wakʉ pe te ' ku ' san ! Iya ' poi pɨ ' a ' sawʉ kon , aparapii kon korʉka auya ' nokon , e ' tane eke pe rɨ iyau mentai e ' nɨto ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ amʉre ' pe e ' nɨto ' esi .

text: Thou blind Pharisee , cleanse first that which is within the cup and platter , that the outside of them may be clean also .
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon tenku ' na ' nan , Pari ' si amʉ ' ! Wapiya kuru iyau a ' sawʉ kon , aparapii kon ikorʉkaka ' tɨ ' . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , iya ' poi esi mɨrɨ wakʉ pe rɨ nɨrɨ .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are like unto whited sepulchres , which indeed appear beautiful outward , but are within full of dead men ' s bones , and of all uncleanness .
text2: “ Ɨsɨ sɨ , Main pɨ ' enupanin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pari ' si amʉ ' , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon wakʉ pe te ' ku ' san ! Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon esi aimu ' ne ikorʉkasa ' tɨ ' akasa ' uruwai ' pe kasa , wakʉ pe tʉusensen kɨpo ' po , e ' tane eke pe rɨ iyeri ' pɨ ' sa ' kon ɨ ' pʉ rʉ ' san esi iyau , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨri ton nɨ esi .

text: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men , but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ , ɨusene kon ipokena ' pe tʉron kon pona , e ' tane ɨyewan kon yau makoi pe ɨwesi kon wakʉ pe ɨye ' kupʉ kon .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! because ye build the tombs of the prophets , and garnish the sepulchres of the righteous ,
text2: “ Ɨsɨ sɨ , Main pɨ ' enupanin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pari ' si amʉ ' , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon wakʉ pe te ' ku ' san ! Pu ' kena ' amʉ ' uruwasii oton tɨ ' akapɨtʉ ' pʉ auya ' nokon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipokena ' ton uruwasii ipʉrʉ ' tɨpɨtʉ auya ' nokon .

text: And say , If we had been in the days of our fathers , we would not have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets .
text2: ‘ Pena ina tamokori ton a ' tai , ina uko ' mamʉ pe iyesi yau , to ' pika ' tɨ ' pʉ nesii ' no pen nɨ pu ' kena ' amʉ ' tʉ ' ka pɨ ' , ’ ta auya ' nokon .

text: Wherefore ye be witnesses unto yourselves , that ye are the children of them which killed the prophets .
text2: E ' tane ɨiwano ' kon pe ɨusekama kon kamoro pu ' kena ' amʉ ' tʉ ' kanin nʉ ' san payan nʉ ' san pe .

text: Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers .
text2: Iku ' tɨ ' rɨ si atamokori kon amʉ ' nʉsara ' tɨ ' pʉ , Papa uya ɨkota ' mato ' kon pe iwenai ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Ye serpents , ye generation of vipers , how can ye escape the damnation of hell ?
text2: Sises uya kanan ta ' pʉ , “ Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon , ɨkʉi amʉ ' kasa te ' san , ayainʉmʉ kon pe ' Papa uya ɨkota ' mato ' kon ta ' mu kenan pen nɨ ekota ' man nɨto ' yapai ?

text: Wherefore , behold , I send unto you prophets , and wise men , and scribes : and some of them ye shall kill and crucify ; and some of them shall ye scourge in your synagogues , and persecute them from city to city :
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , ɨ ' koro ' ta ' nokon pu ' kena ' amʉ ' , ta ' kwarʉkena ' nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ti ' sa amʉ ' ennoko uya to ' tonpa ton tʉ ' kato ' auya ' nokon oton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉron kon pokapɨ ' to ' auya ' nokon kurusu ' pona mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉron kon nɨ ari ' po ' pɨ ' to ' auya ' nokon oton ɨusenupato ' kon iwʉ ' tau , mɨrɨpan kon nɨ e ' ma ' pʉkapɨ ' to ' auya ' nokon oton tʉron nɨ pata yapai ' ne tʉron nɨ pata ya ' ne .

text: That upon you may come all the righteous blood shed upon the earth , from the blood of righteous Abel unto the blood of Zacharias son of Barachias , whom ye slew between the temple and the altar .
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon pona serɨ e ' moronkato ' oton ipokena ' ton mʉnʉ enno ' sa ' auya ' nokon wenai serɨ non po , ipokena ' Eperʉ mʉnʉ awonsi ' kɨ , Sakaraya , Pere ' kaya mu pe te ' sen mʉnʉ pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ , ɨnwɨnɨ ' pʉ kon ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ use ' man nɨto ' apon ka ' sanau .

text: Verily I say unto you , All these things shall come upon this generation .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; tanporo serɨ e ' moronka mɨrɨ serɨ a ' taino kon pona , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , thou that killest the prophets , and stonest them which are sent unto thee , how often would I have gathered thy children together , even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: “ Aiko sɨ ! Surusiran pon kon , Surusiran pon kon ! Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon pu ' kena ' amʉ ' tʉ ' kanin nʉ ' san , tɨ ' ke ɨpiya ' nokon enno ' sa ' kon wɨpɨ ' nin nʉ ' san . Inke rɨ ɨmunkɨ amʉ ' amʉranʉkʉ i ' se esi ' pʉ , kɨrɨtɨkɨ uya tʉmunkɨ amʉ ' amʉranʉkʉ kasa tapiri o ' koi ' , e ' tane mɨrɨ kupʉ uya i ' se pʉra ɨwesi ' pʉ kon .

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate .
text2: Entɨ ' si ! Ɨiwʉ ' kon e ' nonkasa ' ɨyena ' nokon iyarʉ pʉra !

text: For I say unto you , Ye shall not see me henceforth , till ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Apʉne pʉra ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; uyento ' auya ' nokon oton pen nɨ kanan serɨ enta ' , ‘ Pori ' pe rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ nʉye ' ai ' ne ' Itepuru ese ' yau esi , ’ ta auya ' nokon pʉ ' kʉ pona , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And Jesus went out , and departed from the temple : and his disciples came to him for to shew him the buildings of the temple .
text2: Sises utɨ esi ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' tawonsi ' kɨ , ipoitorʉ ton iya ' kɨron kon uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Apʉne enkɨ , wakʉ pe rɨ amɨsa ' ɨutɨ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And Jesus said unto them , See ye not all these things ? verily I say unto you , There shall not be left here one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: “ Tanporo rɨ pe ' serɨ ton menyatʉu ? I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , tikin nɨ rɨ tɨ ' e ' nonkato ' oton pen nɨ mɨrɨ ɨsipʉro ' po ; tanporon nɨ uta ' po ' to ' oton , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives , the disciples came unto him privately , saying , Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign of thy coming , and of the end of the world ?
text2: Sises ereutasa ' koro ' tau Are ' Wʉpʉ po , ipoitorʉ ton uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' ama ' ai ekama ' pose ' na , “ Ina pɨ ' ekama ' ɨ ' rɨ a ' tai serɨ e ' ku ' to ' oton , ɨ ' rɨ e ' to ' oton ɨuyepʉ ento ' ipɨ ' pe , pata weyu u ' matʉ ekamanin pe ? ” tukai ' .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Take heed that no man deceive you .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Tenu ke e ' tɨ ' ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ɨyenku ' tɨ kon namai ' .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Apʉne pʉra tu ' kan kon nɨ uye ' to ' oton uyese ' yau , ‘ Kʉrai urɨ , ’ tukai ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya tu ' kan kon nɨ enku ' tɨto ' oton .

text: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars : see that ye be not troubled : for all these things must come to pass , but the end is not yet .
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon uya etato ' oton tʉusewa ' nomasan , usewa ' noman man tawon nɨ , e ' tane serɨ ton pɨ ' rɨ ketʉipɨ ' tʉu . Serɨ warai ' nan nɨ e ' ku ' to ' pe iyesi , e ' tane apʉne rɨ pata weyu u ' ma ' to ' uye ' tane rɨ iyesi .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be famines , and pestilences , and earthquakes , in divers places .
text2: Tʉpataron kon uya tʉpataron kon nɨ nɨrɨ ewa ' nomato ' oton , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ esa ' wannɨ pe te ' san esa ' wannɨ pe te ' san nɨ nɨrɨ ewa ' nomato ' oton . Iwankan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉrʉ ' pʉnʉ e ' to ' oton pata ton yau ' ne .

text: All these are the beginning of sorrows .
text2: Tanporo serɨ ton esi mɨrɨ e ' tinkan entun nɨto ' pe kasa .

text: Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted , and shall kill you : and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name ' s sake .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ a ' tai ɨtʉto ' oton kon ɨkota ' mato ' kon pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uma ' tan nɨto ' ya ' . Tanporo tʉpataron kon uya ɨyewaruma ' tɨto ' oton kon urɨ uriya ' .

text: And then shall many be offended , and shall betray one another , and shall hate one another .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai si , tu ' kan kon nɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' uyapurɨ pɨ ' te ' san e ' nonkato ' oton , tu ' kan kon nɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' uya tʉtonpa kon eparankato ' oton , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' ewaruma ' tɨto ' oton .

text: And many false prophets shall rise , and shall deceive many .
text2: Mɨrɨ yau si , tu ' ke rɨ enku ' tɨnin nan pu ' kena ' amʉ ' usenpoikato ' oton , mɨrɨpan kon uya tu ' kan kon nɨ enku ' tɨto ' oton .

text: And because iniquity shall abound , the love of many shall wax cold .
text2: Apʉne pʉra eke pe rɨ ɨri epamʉ uriya ' , tu ' kan kon nɨ usi ' nʉnkato ' e ' nɨ ' panto ' oton .

text: But he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: E ' tane kʉrɨ rɨ pana ' pe te ' sen tʉnapurɨnʉ yau iu ' matʉ pʉ ' kʉ pona , kʉrɨ rɨ si epika ' tɨto ' oton .

text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations ; and then shall the end come .
text2: Serɨ Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe ekareei usekamato ' oton pata emʉ ' kaisa rɨ , ennin nʉ ' san uya ekama tanporo ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' , mɨrɨ a ' tai kuru nin si , iu ' matʉ e ' seporo mɨrɨ .

text: When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , stand in the holy place , ( whoso readeth , let him understand : )
text2: “ ‘ Ɨri Kuru Nuirapanin Uma ' tan Emapu ' tɨnin ’ e ' soto ' kasa ' wakʉ pata yau ene auya ' nokon a ' tai si , pu ' kena ' Taniyerʉ nekama ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ — tɨwɨ serɨ ennin nʉto ' ka ' nʉkʉi —

text: Then let them which be in Judaea flee into the mountains :
text2: tɨwɨ si kamoro Isutiya pon kon nainʉmʉi wʉ ' ton pona ' ne .

text: Let him which is on the housetop not come down to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ tiwʉ ' nakapu po te ' sen kʉu ' tɨnin ɨ ' rɨ rɨ anʉnse ' na tiwʉ ' tapai .

text: Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ tʉmainarʉ yau te ' sen kʉ ' tɨnin tiwʉ ' ta ' tʉpon epose ' na .

text: And woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: Mɨrɨ wʉi a ' tai ' ne , ɨsɨ pe kuru rɨ uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' , mono ' pe te ' san pona iye ' to ' oton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ mana ' pokon kon imunkɨ pona !

text: But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter , neither on the sabbath day :
text2: Ɨpʉrematɨ ' ɨutɨto ' kon esi namai ' komi ' pata weyu a ' tai , mɨrɨ pe pʉra Sapa ' a ' tai .

text: For then shall be great tribulation , such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time , no , nor ever shall be .
text2: Apʉne pʉra mɨrɨ a ' tai eke rɨ usewankaman e ' to ' oton pena pata epiya ' tɨ ' pʉ si ' kɨrɨ iye ' ku ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ kasa pʉra rɨ serɨ pʉ ' kʉ pona , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ mɨrɨ kasa iye ' to ' oton pen nɨ kanan serɨ enta ' .

text: And except those days should be shortened , there should no flesh be saved : but for the elect ' s sake those days shall be shortened .
text2: Mɨrɨ weyu u ' tɨsa ' pʉra iyesi yau inke pʉra , ɨnʉ ' ne ' nonkai ' no pen nɨ moro , e ' tane kamoro , Papa nanʉmʉ ' san pɨkɨrɨ iweyu to ' kena ' mato ' iya oton .

text: Then if any man shall say unto you , Lo , here is Christ , or there ; believe it not .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ta pe iyesi yau ɨpɨ ' nokon , ‘ Kʉrai man serɨ yau , ’ mɨrɨ pe pʉra , ‘ Mɨrɨ yau man , ’ ta a ' tai ɨpɨ ' nokon , kʉsapurɨtʉu .

text: For there shall arise false Christs , and false prophets , and shall shew great signs and wonders ; insomuch that , if it were possible , they shall deceive the very elect .
text2: Apʉne pʉra enku ' tɨnin nan kʉrai amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ enku ' tɨnin nan pu ' kena ' amʉ ' usenpoikato ' oton , eke ton nɨ i ' tuto ' ipɨ ' ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eke Papa tʉrawasooi ton ku ' to ' oton to ' uya , Papa nanʉmʉ ' san enku ' tɨnin pe — ikupʉ tʉuya ' nokon pe iyesi yau .

text: Behold , I have told you before .
text2: Entɨ ' ayauro ' ka uya ' nokon serɨ ton pɨ ' iweyu wapiya .

text: Wherefore if they shall say unto you , Behold , he is in the desert ; go not forth : behold , he is in the secret chambers ; believe it not .
text2: “ Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ta pe iyesi yau , ‘ Mɨrɨ yau man , rɨmono ' tau , ’ ta a ' tai , kʉtɨtʉu ; mɨrɨ pe pʉra , ‘ Serɨ yau man , ɨutɨ a ' mu yau , ’ ta a ' tai , kʉsapurɨtʉu .

text: For as the lightning cometh out of the east , and shineth even unto the west ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Apʉne pʉra kamiri ' nʉye ' ai ' ne ' wʉi enu uyepʉ winɨ nʉsenyai ' ne ' wʉi enu utɨto ' pona rɨ kasa , mɨrɨ kasa kuru Ka ' pon , Papa winon uyepʉ e ' to ' oton mɨrɨ .

text: For wheresoever the carcase is , there will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Eke ' airɨ rɨ anwana amʉ ' amʉrato ' oton , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light , and the stars shall fall from heaven , and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken :
text2: “ Inke pʉra rɨ , usewankaman pata ' pʉ pe , “ ‘ Wʉi enu ewarumanto ' oton , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kapʉi e ' wei ' tɨto ' oton pen ; Sirikɨ amʉ ' uta ' po ' to ' oton ka ' apai , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' po te ' sen ton nɨ e ' tʉkʉukato ' oton . ’

text: And then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven : and then shall all the tribes of the earth mourn , and they shall see the Son of man coming in the clouds of heaven with power and great glory .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Ka ' pon , Papa winon uyepʉ i ' tuto ' ipɨ ' usenpoikato ' oton ka ' yau , mɨrɨpan tanporon kon non pon kon ukaranto ' oton tʉuta ' kwarʉkai ' . To ' uya Ka ' pon , Papa winon uyepʉ kapuru ' po , ka ' yau ento ' oton , tʉmeruntɨrʉ ke mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eke a ' kwa yau .

text: And he shall send his angels with a great sound of a trumpet , and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from one end of heaven to the other .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya tinserʉʉi ton enno ' to ' oton eke wai tʉronpi ' turunpa pe , mɨrɨpan kon uya mɨ a ' setun uye ' to ' yawɨron kon nɨ inanʉmʉ ' san amʉranʉ ' to ' oton , ka ' pʉ ' kʉ awɨron kon nɨ .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When his branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is nigh :
text2: “ Ɨsenupatɨ ' serɨ pi ' e ' pɨ ' : Emenna ' pe ipanta ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyare a ' ta a ' tai , i ' tu auya ' nokon wʉi uye ' kapʉ a ' ko pe tukai ' .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall see all these things , know that it is near , even at the doors .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ tanporo serɨ ton e ' kupʉ ene auya ' nokon a ' tai , i ' tu auya ' nokon a ' ko pe iyesi , mʉra ' ta nau rɨ .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass , till all these things be fulfilled .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , serɨ a ' taino kon kuru rɨ pʉra iyenato ' oton pen nɨ tanporo serɨ ton e ' kupʉ pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away , but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Epʉn mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ non pʉra iyenato ' oton , e ' tane umaimu mɨrɨ tereuta ton pen nɨ .

text: But of that day and hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels of heaven , but my Father only .
text2: “ Ɨnʉ ' uya mɨrɨ wʉi mɨrɨ pe pʉra iwekusi i ' tu pʉra rɨ iyesi ; inserʉ amʉ ' Epʉn pon kon uya rɨ , mɨrɨ pe pʉra imu uya rɨ e ' tane ikʉipʉnʉ uya rɨken serɨ i ' tu .

text: But as the days of Noe were , so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Nowa a ' tai iyesi ' pʉ na ' ne ' kasa , mɨrɨ kasa iye ' to ' oton Ka ' pon , Papa winon uyepʉ a ' tai .

text: For as in the days that were before the flood they were eating and drinking , marrying and giving in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark ,
text2: Apʉne pʉra wʉi ton i ' mʉnpʉ rawɨron yau , ka ' pon amʉ ' esi ' pʉ uta ' re ' tɨn pɨ ' , emari ' man pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ e ' tʉrʉn pɨ ' emari ' man nɨto ' yau , Nowa ewomʉ a ' ya ' weyu pona rɨ .

text: And knew not until the flood came , and took them all away ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ rɨ te ' ku ' ton i ' tu to ' uya pʉra rɨ iyesi ' pʉ i ' mʉnpʉ uyepʉ pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ , mɨrɨpan kon arɨ ' pʉ iya tanporo rɨ . Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ iye ' to ' oton , Ka ' pon , Papa winon uyepʉ a ' tai .

text: Then shall two be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Asa ' ron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' e ' to ' oton umɨ yau ; tikin nɨ itanʉnto ' oton , isakon e ' nɨnto ' oton .

text: Two women shall be grinding at the mill ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Asa ' ron kon uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' e ' to ' oton a ' nai ' e ' pa pɨ ' ; tikin nɨ itanʉnto ' oton , isakon e ' nɨnto ' oton .

text: Watch therefore : for ye know not what hour your Lord doth come .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , enei ' ma e ' tɨ ' , apʉne pʉra i ' tu auya ' nokon kasa pʉra ɨ ' rɨ a ' tai ɨyepuru kon uyepʉ tukai ' .

text: But know this , that if the goodman of the house had known in what watch the thief would come , he would have watched , and would not have suffered his house to be broken up .
text2: E ' tane se ito ' ka ' nʉ ' tɨ ' : Ɨutɨ esa ' uya mɨrɨ a ' tai kuru ewarupɨ nau ama ' uyepʉ tukai ' i ' tusa ' yau , tenu ke iyesi ' pʉ nesii ' no , mɨrɨpan tiwʉ ' ta ' ewon nɨ kuu ' pʉ iya nesii ' no pen .

text: Therefore be ye also ready : for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon kanan tekonekai ' me ' tʉi ' , apʉne pʉra Ka ' pon , Papa winon uye ' to ' oton itenupɨkɨrɨ pʉra rɨ ɨwe ' tane ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Who then is a faithful and wise servant , whom his lord hath made ruler over his household , to give them meat in due season ?
text2: “ Ɨnʉ ' ken usauro ' nɨ ' pʉ awɨron mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ emiya ' pokena ' ipoitorʉ pe nai itesa ' nʉnonka ' pʉ tiwʉ ' tawon kon tʉpoitorʉ ton esa ' pe to ' i ' kiyari ke to ' repanin pe itʉto ' weyu a ' tai ?

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Wakʉ pe rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ ipoitorʉ e ' to ' oton itepuru neporonʉ ikupʉ pɨ ' tenna ' posa ' a ' tai .

text: Verily I say unto you , That he shall make him ruler over all his goods .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; itepuru uya tanporon nɨ tapuruui esa ' pe iku ' to ' oton .

text: But and if that evil servant shall say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ;
text2: E ' tane si , a ' tai pʉra kʉrɨ rɨ ipoitorʉ esi ɨri pe , mɨrɨpan uya , ‘ Uyepuru uko ' mamʉ serɨ sunwa inke rɨ , ’ ta ,

text: And shall begin to smite his fellowservants , and to eat and drink with the drunken ;
text2: mɨrɨpan e ' sara ' tɨ tʉron kon ipoitorʉ ton panta ' ma pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ enta ' nan pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ e ' taripan pɨ ' te ' taripasan pokon pe .

text: The lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for him , and in an hour that he is not aware of ,
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ ipoitorʉ epuru uye ' to ' oton wʉi a ' tai itenupɨkɨrɨ iye ' tane pʉra , mɨrɨ a ' kʉra ' iyepʉ ta tane iya pʉra rɨ .

text: And shall cut him asunder , and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya ipɨrʉkato ' oton , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ inonkato ' iya oton wakʉ pe te ' ku ' san pata ' se ' ya ' . Mɨrɨ yau nin si , ipan pe ukaran nɨ pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉyɨ ton kɨtɨtɨi ' ma pɨ ' iye ' to ' oton , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins , which took their lamps , and went forth to meet the bridegroom .
text2: Miyarɨ rɨ Sises uya tʉpoitorʉ ton auro ' ka ' pʉ . “ Mɨrɨ a ' tai si , Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe e ' to ' oton mɨrɨ se kasa ; moine warawo ' emari ' ma ense ' na 10 kaisaron kon uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' utɨ ' pʉ tʉraan ' puui ke ' ne .

text: And five of them were wise , and five were foolish .
text2: 5 kaisaron kon uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' esi ' pʉ ita ' kwarʉ pʉra , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ 5 kaisaron kon kanan esi ' pʉ ta ' kwarʉ ke .

text: They that were foolish took their lamps , and took no oil with them :
text2: Ita ' kwarʉ pʉ ' nan uya tʉraan ' puui kon arɨ ' pʉ , e ' tane iparu u ' ma ' sa ' a ' taino arɨ ' pʉ to ' uya pen nɨ .

text: But the wise took oil in their vessels with their lamps .
text2: E ' tane ta ' kwarʉkena ' nan uya tʉraan ' puui kon arɨ ' pʉ iparu u ' ma ' sa ' a ' taino a ' kɨrɨ .

text: While the bridegroom tarried , they all slumbered and slept .
text2: Inke rɨ to ' enurikʉ ' pʉ kʉrɨ rɨ temari ' masen uyepʉ i ' se , mɨrɨpan kon ena ' pʉ e ' moronʉ ' pe , mɨrɨpan kon nin si e ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ .

text: And at midnight there was a cry made , Behold , the bridegroom cometh ; go ye out to meet him .
text2: “ Anomʉra ' a ' tai nin si , ka ' pon uya eke pe ekama ' pʉ mɨrɨ , ‘ Temari ' masen si uye ' nɨ pɨ ' man ! Entanʉ ' tɨ ' si ! ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then all those virgins arose , and trimmed their lamps .
text2: “ Kamoro si uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' usenpaka ' pʉ mɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan kon e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ tʉraan ' puui kon po ' tɨse ' na .

text: And the foolish said unto the wise , Give us of your oil ; for our lamps are gone out .
text2: Iya ' kwarʉ pʉ ' nan uya ta ' kwarʉkena ' nan pɨ ' , ‘ Ina raan ' puui paru oton ke ina irepatɨ ' , ina raan ' puui usenkʉ ' nʉ ' nɨ pɨ ' man , ’ ta ' pʉ .

text: But the wise answered , saying , Not so ; lest there be not enough for us and you : but go ye rather to them that sell , and buy for yourselves .
text2: “ E ' tane kamoro uya , ‘ Kane , eke pe pʉra rʉ ' kwɨ iparu man ; ukaisarɨ ' nokon pʉra man , ’ ta ' pʉ to ' uya . ‘ E ' tane ru ' ku , siya ' pu ta ' araan ' puui kon paru ɨne ' matantɨ ' ɨiwano ' kon pe , ’ ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And while they went to buy , the bridegroom came ; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage : and the door was shut .
text2: “ Utɨn pɨ ' rɨ nin si to ' e ' tane tʉraan ' puui kon paru ennai ' , temari ' masen uye ' kaa ' pʉ mɨrɨ . Kamoro nin si iyekonekasa ' kon uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' ewomʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ temari ' masen a ' kɨrɨ ata ' re ' tɨse ' na . Mʉra ' ta nin si uta ' koro ' pʉ mɨrɨ .

text: Afterward came also the other virgins , saying , Lord , Lord , open to us .
text2: “ Emennʉ ' pʉ rɨ kamoro nin si uyee ' pʉ mɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan kon uya ta ' pʉ , ‘ Ina epuru , mʉra ' ta a ' kokakɨ ina iwano ' pe ! ’ ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: But he answered and said , Verily I say unto you , I know you not .
text2: “ E ' tane to ' eikʉ ' pʉ iya , ‘ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , ɨi ' tu uya ' nokon pʉra man , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Watch therefore , for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , enei ' ma e ' tɨ ' ; apʉne pʉra iweyu mɨrɨ pe pʉra iwekusi i ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country , who called his own servants , and delivered unto them his goods .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kanan , ka ' pon tʉutɨsen kasa iye ' to ' oton , tʉpoitorʉ ton kɨ ' manin mɨrɨpan kon ena ' timamin tʉnin .

text: And unto one he gave five talents , to another two , and to another one ; to every man according to his several ability ; and straightway took his journey .
text2: Tikin nan ena ' 5 kaisa rɨ ipaikii pʉrata tʉrʉ ' pʉ iya , tʉron nɨ ena ' asa ' rɨ ipaikii tʉrʉ ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan kon tonpa ena ' tikin nɨ ipaikii pʉrata tʉrʉ ' pʉ iya . To ' repa ' pʉ iya mɨrɨ to ' uya ikupʉ poken iyesi ti ' tui ' , mɨrɨpan nin si utɨ ' pʉ tʉutɨto ' ya ' .

text: Then he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same , and made them other five talents .
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ si 5 kaisaron paiki pʉrata eponin nʉ ' pʉ utɨ ' pʉ inke pʉra rɨ mɨrɨ pʉrata e ' tonpa ' tɨto ' pe itʉrawasomase ' na , emennʉ ' pʉ tʉpoi ' ne rɨ nin si , 5 kaisarɨ rɨ marɨ iye ' tonpa ' tɨsa ' esi ' pʉ .

text: And likewise he that had received two , he also gained other two .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ , asa ' rɨ ipaikii eponin nʉ ' pʉ utɨ ' pʉ inke pʉra rɨ mɨrɨ pʉrata e ' tonpa ' tɨto ' pe itʉrawasomase ' na , mɨrɨpan uya asa ' rɨ rɨ marɨ paikii tonpa ' tɨ ' pʉ .

text: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth , and hid his lord ' s money .
text2: E ' tane nin si , kʉrɨ tikin nɨ paiki eponin nʉ ' pʉ utɨ ' pʉ , non aka ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan uya tepuru pʉrataai onamʉ ' pʉ iya ' .

text: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh , and reckoneth with them .
text2: “ Inke rɨ tʉuko ' mamʉ tʉpo , to ' epuru enna ' po ' pʉ to ' piya ' , mɨrɨpan uya to ' pokon pe tʉpʉrataai eseru koneka ' pʉ .

text: And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents , saying , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me five talents : behold , I have gained beside them five talents more .
text2: 5 kaisa rɨ eponin nʉ ' pʉ uya 5 kaisarɨ rɨ marɨ ipona tʉneporo ' pʉ tʉrʉ ' pʉ itena ' . ‘ Uyepuru , 5 kaisa rɨ ipaikii urepa ' pʉ auya , mɨrɨpan tonpa ' tɨsa ' uya man mɨrɨ rɨ tʉtʉrawasomai ' , 5 kaisarɨ rɨ marɨ ipona , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , thou good and faithful servant : thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: “ ‘ Wakʉ kuru rɨ ku ' sa ' auya man , upoitorʉ , wakʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ usauro ' nɨsa ' awɨron ! Tu ' kan pen nʉ ' kwɨ rɨ pɨ ' yawɨrɨ ɨwe ' sa ' man . Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , tu ' kan nɨ esa ' pe ɨnonka uya . Ɨsi ' kɨ upiya ' pori ' pe e ' tanʉ ' kɨ ɨyepuru pokon pe ! ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: He also that had received two talents came and said , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me two talents : behold , I have gained two other talents beside them .
text2: “ Asa ' rɨ ipaikii pʉrata eponin nʉ ' pʉ uyee ' pʉ tepuru piya ' , ‘ Uyepuru , asa ' rɨ ipaikii pʉrata urepataine ' tonpa ' tɨsa ' uya man mɨrɨ rɨ tʉtʉrawasomai ' , asa ' rɨ rɨ marɨ ipaikii ipona , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , good and faithful servant ; thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: “ Itepuru uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , ‘ Wakʉ kuru rɨ ku ' sa ' auya man , upoitorʉ , wakʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ usauro ' nɨsa ' awɨron ! Tu ' kan pen nʉ ' kwɨ rɨ pɨ ' yawɨrɨ ɨwe ' sa ' man . Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , tu ' kan nɨ esa ' pe ɨnonka uya . Ɨsi ' kɨ , pori ' pe ɨyepuru esi pokon pe e ' tanʉ ' kɨ , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then he which had received the one talent came and said , Lord , I knew thee that thou art an hard man , reaping where thou hast not sown , and gathering where thou hast not strawed :
text2: “ Kʉrɨ rɨ si tikin nɨ pʉrata paikii eponin nʉ ' pʉ uyee ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ tepuru pɨ ' , ‘ Uyepuru , ɨi ' tu uya , sa ' man pe rɨ te ' sen pe ɨwesi . Ɨnpɨmɨ ' pʉ pen nɨ anʉnnin pe ɨwesi , ite ' ɨntʉrʉ ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ pen nɨ amʉranʉ ' nin pe ɨwesi .

text: And I was afraid , and went and hid thy talent in the earth : lo , there thou hast that is thine .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' , enari ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan pɨ ' ɨpʉrataai onanse ' na utɨ ' pʉ non ya ' . Se si ɨiwano ' pe te ' sen , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: His lord answered and said unto him , Thou wicked and slothful servant , thou knewest that I reap where I sowed not , and gather where I have not strawed :
text2: “ Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' ta ' pʉ itepuru uya , ‘ Ɨmɨrɨ , emiya ' ne ' rɨ ipoitorʉ ! I ' tu auya si unpɨmɨ ' pʉ pen nɨ anʉnnin pe esi , ite ' untʉrʉ ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ pen nɨ amʉranʉ ' nin pe esi ?

text: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers , and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury .
text2: Upʉrataai rɨ sa ' ne mʉtʉrʉi ' no pʉrata e ' tonpa ' tɨto ' iwʉ ' ta ' ; enna ' posa ' a ' tai , iye ' tonpa ' tɨsa ' simo ' kai ' no , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Take therefore the talent from him , and give it unto him which hath ten talents .
text2: “ ‘ Mɨrɨ pʉrata paikii imo ' katɨ ' itenapai , mɨrɨpan itʉtɨ ' kʉrɨ 10 kaisaron pʉrata paikii esa ' ena ' .

text: For unto every one that hath shall be given , and he shall have abundance : but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath .
text2: Apʉne pʉra tanporon kon itesa ' pe na ' ne ' nan nɨ repa , miyarɨ ipona rɨ , mɨrɨpan esa ' pe iye ' to ' oton eke pe rɨ . Ɨnʉ ' rɨ kʉrɨ itesa ' pe pʉra na ' ne ' enapai , itenau rʉ ' kwɨ rɨ na ' ne ' emo ' ka mɨrɨ .

text: And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Mɨrɨpan ɨri rɨ poitorʉ eno ' ma pʉroroi pona , ewarupɨ ya ' . Mɨrɨ yau , ukaran nɨ pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉyɨ kɨtɨtɨi ' ka pɨ ' iye ' to ' pe , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: When the Son of man shall come in his glory , and all the holy angels with him , then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory :
text2: “ Ka ' pon , Papa winon uyepʉ a ' tai tʉmeruntɨrʉ yau , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tinserʉʉi amʉ ' pokon pe , iyereutato ' oton tapon po .

text: And before him shall be gathered all nations : and he shall separate them one from another , as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats :
text2: Tanporo rɨ tʉpataron kon amʉrato ' oton irau , mɨrɨpan uya ka ' pon amʉ ' menka , karimeru amʉ ' pa ' simanin uya karimeru amʉ ' menka kasa kapirita amʉ ' piyapai .

text: And he shall set the sheep on his right hand , but the goats on the left .
text2: Karimeru amʉ ' tʉrʉ iya mɨrɨ tenwo ' netʉ winɨkʉi ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kapirita amʉ ' tʉkamisi winɨkʉi ' .

text: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand , Come , ye blessed of my Father , inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world :
text2: “ Mɨrɨ a ' tai si , ta iya mɨrɨ tenwo ' netʉ winɨ te ' san pɨ ' , ‘ Ɨsi ' tɨ ' ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon ukʉipʉnʉ nʉpʉrema ' san . Ananʉmʉnʉ kon anʉntɨ ' , serɨ si ɨyesa ' kon pe e ' nɨto ' yau iyekonekasa ' rʉ ' pʉ pata e ' kaa ' pʉ si ' kɨrɨ rɨ ,

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me drink : I was a stranger , and ye took me in :
text2: apʉne pʉra iwan pe esi a ' tai , urepa ' pʉ auya ' nokon ui ' kiyari ke ; tuna ' kiri ' ke esi a ' tai , uwo ' pa ' pʉ auya ' nokon ; ka ' kʉran pe rɨ e ' tane , ukɨ ' ma ' pʉ auya ' nokon ɨiwʉ ' kon ta ' .

text: Naked , and ye clothed me : I was sick , and ye visited me : I was in prison , and ye came unto me .
text2: Ipon pʉra esi a ' tai , urepa ' pʉ auya ' nokon upon ke ; takuru ' ke esi a ' tai , umainanpa pɨ ' ɨwesi ' pʉ kon ; pariki ' si tau esi a ' tai , uka ' kʉranpase ' na ɨutɨ ' pʉ kon , ’ tato ' iya oton .

text: Then shall the righteous answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , and fed thee ? or thirsty , and gave thee drink ?
text2: “ Mɨrɨ a ' tai si , ipokena ' ton uya ta mɨrɨ ipɨ ' , ‘ Uyepuru , ɨ ' rɨ a ' tai si iwan pe ina uya ɨyene ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan ina uya ɨyewekʉ ' pʉ ; mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tuna ' kiri ' ke , mɨrɨpan o ' pa ' pʉ ina uya ?

text: When saw we thee a stranger , and took thee in ? or naked , and clothed thee ?
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ a ' tai ka ' kʉran pe ina uya ɨyene ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan ɨkɨ ' ma ' pʉ ina uya tiwʉ ' kon ta ' ? Ɨ ' rɨ a ' tai ipon pʉra ina uya ɨyene ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan ɨpontɨ ' pʉ ina uya ?

text: Or when saw we thee sick , or in prison , and came unto thee ?
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ a ' tai rɨ takuru ' ke mɨrɨ pe pʉra pariki ' si tau ɨwe ' tane , ina utɨ ' pʉ aka ' kʉranpai ' ? ’ tato ' oton to ' uya .

text: And the King shall answer and say unto them , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren , ye have done it unto me .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ a ' tai nin si , kin uya ta mɨrɨ to ' pɨ ' , ‘ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , ɨ ' rɨ rɨ ku ' sa ' auya ' nokon na ' ne ' pʉsamoro sepa ' nan nʉ ' kwɨ kuru utonpa ton pe te ' san pɨ ' , urɨ pɨ ' iku ' sa ' auya ' nokon pe iyesi , ’ tato ' iya oton .

text: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand , Depart from me , ye cursed , into everlasting fire , prepared for the devil and his angels :
text2: “ Mɨrɨ a ' tai ta iya mɨrɨ , tʉkamisi winon kon pɨ ' , ‘ Atamatɨ ' upiyapai , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon Papa nʉpa ' nʉkʉ ' san ! Entantɨ ' apo ' ya ' , Papa nʉkoneka ' pʉ makoi mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itinserʉʉi ton iwano ' pe !

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me no meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me no drink :
text2: Apʉne pʉra iwan pe e ' tane , urepasa ' auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi ui ' kiyari ke ; tuna ' kiri ' ke e ' tane , uwo ' pa ' pʉ auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi ;

text: I was a stranger , and ye took me not in : naked , and ye clothed me not : sick , and in prison , and ye visited me not .
text2: ka ' kʉran pe e ' tane , ɨiwʉ ' kon ta ' ukɨ ' masa ' auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi ; upon i ' se e ' tane , upon ke urepasa ' auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi ; takuru ' ke e ' tane , umainanpasa ' auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi ; pariki ' si tau e ' tane , uka ' kʉranpai ' ɨutɨsa ' kon pʉra iyesi , ’ tato ' iya oton to ' pɨ ' .

text: Then shall they also answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , or athirst , or a stranger , or naked , or sick , or in prison , and did not minister unto thee ?
text2: “ Mɨrɨ a ' tai , to ' uya rɨ marɨ ei ' to ' oton , ‘ Ina epuru , ɨ ' rɨ a ' tai rɨ si ina uya ɨyene ' pʉ iwan pe , tuna ' kiri ' ke , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ka ' kʉran pe , mɨrɨpan ina uya asanomasa ' pʉra iyesi ? Ɨ ' rɨ a ' tai rɨ si ɨpon i ' se , takuru ' ke mɨrɨ pe pʉra pariki ' si tau ɨwe ' tane , ina uya ɨpika ' tɨsa ' pʉra iyesi ? ’ tato ' oton .

text: Then shall he answer them , saying , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye did it not to one of the least of these , ye did it not to me .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ a ' tai si , to ' eikʉ iya mɨrɨ , ‘ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , ɨ ' rɨ rɨ ku ' sa ' auya ' nokon pʉra na ' ne ' , pʉsamoro sepa ' nan nʉ ' kwɨ kuru utonpa ton pe te ' san pɨ ' , urɨ pɨ ' iku ' sa ' auya ' nokon pe pʉra rɨ iyesi . ’

text: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment : but the righteous into life eternal .
text2: “ Mɨrɨpan kon utɨto ' oton tɨwɨrɨ rɨ ekota ' man nɨto ' ya ' , e ' tane ipokena ' ton pe iye ' sa ' kon utɨto ' oton tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko ' man nɨto ' ya ' , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had finished all these sayings , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Tanporo si serɨ ton ekama tʉuya tʉpo , Sises uya ta ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' ,

text: Ye know that after two days is the feast of the passover , and the Son of man is betrayed to be crucified .
text2: “ Mi ' tuyatʉi ' ne ' kasa rɨ To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ esi awanapai rɨ ema ' sa ' yau . Ka ' pon , Papa winon tʉto ' oton ipokapɨ ' to ' pe kurusu ' pona , ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: Then assembled together the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders of the people , unto the palace of the high priest , who was called Caiaphas ,
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo si , use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton amʉra ' pʉ . To ' e ' seporo ' pʉ Kaya ' pas pata ' se ' yau , use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru eke pe kuru te ' sen .

text: And consulted that they might take Jesus by subtilty , and kill him .
text2: To ' e ' kama ' pʉ ama ' ai Sises a ' si pɨ ' iwɨto ' pe tʉuya ' nokon .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar among the people .
text2: “ E ' tane iweyu rʉ ' pʉ a ' tai pen . Mɨrɨ ku ' sa ' pe iyesi yau , ka ' pon amʉ ' uya nin urɨ ' nokon ewa ' noma mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Now when Jesus was in Bethany , in the house of Simon the leper ,
text2: Sises esi koro ' tau Pe ' tani po , Saiman , erekʉ ' pan tukai ' ti ' tusen iwʉ ' tau ,

text: There came unto him a woman having an alabaster box of very precious ointment , and poured it on his head , as he sat at meat .
text2: uri ' san uyee ' pʉ po ' toro arapasta yawon po ' piyun epe ' kena ' kuru rɨ esa ' pe , mɨrɨpan uya a ' koka ' pʉ Sises i ' pai pona ima ' pʉ iya , tʉteire ' po tenai ' tepʉrʉ piyau iyesi koro ' tau .

text: But when his disciples saw it , they had indignation , saying , To what purpose is this waste ?
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton uya serɨ ensa ' a ' tai , to ' usakorota ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya , “ Ɨ ' rɨto ' pe ima ' tanʉkʉ iya ? ” ta ' pʉ .

text: For this ointment might have been sold for much , and given to the poor .
text2: “ Serɨ po ' piyun kʉrʉpo ' pomai ' no sa ' ne epe ' kena ' pe , mɨrɨpan epe ' pʉ tʉrʉi ' no entu ' manin nan ena ' ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: When Jesus understood it , he said unto them , Why trouble ye the woman ? for she hath wrought a good work upon me .
text2: Sises uya to ' i ' tusa ' esi ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Ɨ ' rɨ to ' pe pʉse rɨ uri ' san a ' pɨ ' pɨtʉ auya ' nokon ? Wakʉ rɨ ku ' sa ' iya mɨrɨ upɨ ' .

text: For ye have the poor always with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Tɨwɨrɨ rɨ entu ' manin nan esi ɨpiyau ' nokon , e ' tane tɨwɨrɨ rɨ urɨ esi pʉra iyesi ɨpiyau ' nokon .

text: For in that she hath poured this ointment on my body , she did it for my burial .
text2: Serɨ po ' piyun masa ' iya upona iku ' sa ' iya mɨrɨ upun koneka pe uwu ' na ' tɨ e ' ma ta ' .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world , there shall also this , that this woman hath done , be told for a memorial of her .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , itekare nʉsekamayai ' ne ' airɨ rɨ pata emʉ ' kaisa rɨ inkupʉ ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ rɨ marɨ usekama mɨrɨ , en yau ikupʉ pe rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then one of the twelve , called Judas Iscariot , went unto the chief priests ,
text2: 12 kaisaron kon ipoitorʉ ton tonpa , Isutas Eskariya ' tato ' ipɨ ' , utɨ ' pʉ use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru piya ' .

text: And said unto them , What will ye give me , and I will deliver him unto you ? And they covenanted with him for thirty pieces of silver .
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨ ke uye ' ma auya ' nokon ɨyena ' nokon itʉsa ' uya yau ? ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya 30 kaisa rɨ sirʉpa pʉrata pun i ' tu ' pʉ itiwano ' pe .

text: And from that time he sought opportunity to betray him .
text2: Mɨrɨ si ' kɨrɨ Isutas esi ' pʉ itʉto ' tʉuya weyu eporo i ' se .

text: Now the first day of the feast of unleavened bread the disciples came to Jesus , saying unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare for thee to eat the passover ?
text2: A ' sarutanʉ ' sa ' Pen Pʉreti Pɨ ' Enta ' nan Weyu e ' sara ' tɨ a ' tai , Sises poitorʉ ton uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' ekama ' pose ' na , “ Nai yau kuru ina uya To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' ɨyenta ' nato ' koneka ina uya i ' se me ' an ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he said , Go into the city to such a man , and say unto him , The Master saith , My time is at hand ; I will keep the passover at thy house with my disciples .
text2: To ' eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Entantɨ ' eke pata Surusiran pona ka ' pon piya ' , mɨrɨpan pɨ ' , ‘ Ti ' sa uya tasa ' man , “ Papa nʉkoneka ' pʉ uweyu e ' seposa ' man , a ' ko pe . Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , urɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ upoitorʉ ton pokon pe To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ kupʉ uya ɨiwʉ ' tau , ” tukai ' , ’ mekamatʉi ' ipɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And the disciples did as Jesus had appointed them ; and they made ready the passover .
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton uya mɨrɨ kasa rɨ nin si To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' te ' to ' kon koneka ' pʉ , ta ' pʉ iya na ' ne ' awɨrɨ rɨ .

text: Now when the even was come , he sat down with the twelve .
text2: Pata uko ' mansa ' a ' tai , Sises esi ' pʉ tʉteire ' po tenai ' 12 kaisaron kon pokon pe tepʉrʉ piyau .

text: And as they did eat , he said , Verily I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: To ' enta ' na koro ' tau , ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; ɨtonpa kon uya uyeparankato ' oton , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they were exceeding sorrowful , and began every one of them to say unto him , Lord , is it I ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon upokoita ' pʉ , to ' uya tʉkaisarɨ ' nokon , “ I ' napai rɨ , uyepuru , urɨ pen kuru rɨ nin ! ” ta ' pʉ Sises pɨ ' .

text: And he answered and said , He that dippeth his hand with me in the dish , the same shall betray me .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Kʉrɨ tʉyu ki ' ai ' ne ' pʉsau ya ' upokon pe uya uyeparankato ' oton .

text: The Son of man goeth as it is written of him : but woe unto that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! it had been good for that man if he had not been born .
text2: Ka ' pon , Papa winon utɨto ' oton tʉpɨ ' imenukasa ' na ' ne ' kasa rɨ , e ' tane ɨsɨ yau rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ ka ' pon esi Ka ' pon , Papa winon eparankanin . Wakʉ pe nesii ' no iyentusa ' pʉra iyesi yau , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then Judas , which betrayed him , answered and said , Master , is it I ? He said unto him , Thou hast said .
text2: Mɨrɨpan Isutas , eparankanin oton uya nin si ta ' pʉ , “ Rapai , i ' napai rɨ , urɨ pen kuru rɨ nin , ” ta ' pʉ iya . “ Ewai ' , ɨmɨrɨ rɨ , ” tukai ' Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ .

text: And as they were eating , Jesus took bread , and blessed it , and brake it , and gave it to the disciples , and said , Take , eat ; this is my body .
text2: To ' enta ' na koro ' tau rɨ , Sises uya pʉreti anʉmʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya tenki ta ' pʉ Papa pɨ ' . I ' kwɨ ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan ekamʉ ' pʉ iya tʉpoitorʉ ton ena ' , tai ' ma to ' pɨ ' , “ Anʉntɨ ' , mɨrɨpan ɨ ' tɨ ' . Serɨ serɨ upun , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and gave it to them , saying , Drink ye all of it ;
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya ko ' , waain yen anʉmʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya tenki ta ' pʉ Papa pɨ ' . To ' ena ' itʉrʉ ' pʉ iya , tai ' ma to ' pɨ ' , “ Se yawon ensitɨ ' , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon .

text: For this is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many for the remission of sins .
text2: Serɨ serɨ emenna ' ekonekan nɨto ' iwano ' umʉnʉ , tu ' kan kon iwano ' pe rɨ iye ' kwansa ' makoi ton pɨ ' usentu ' man nɨto ' pe .

text: But I say unto you , I will not drink henceforth of this fruit of the vine , until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father ' s kingdom .
text2: Ekama uya serɨ enta ' iteperu euku ensito ' uya oton pen ɨpokon pe ' nokon ukʉipʉnʉ e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe yau emenna ' pe ensi uya pʉ ' kʉ pona , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Eren pɨ ' tʉuserenka kon tʉpo , to ' utɨ ' pʉ Are ' Wʉpʉ pona .

text: Then saith Jesus unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered abroad .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya to ' pana ' tɨ ' pʉ , “ Serɨ ewarupɨɨi tau kuru , tanporo rɨ unɨmɨ auya ' nokon mɨrɨ , te ' ku ' sen upɨ ' wenai , apʉne pʉra iye ' menukasa ' , “ ‘ Karimeru amʉ ' pa ' simanin wɨnɨ uya mɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan karimeru amʉ ' e ' ta ' nʉ ' to ' oton tamʉ ' ke te ' to ' kon apai , ’ tukai ' .

text: But after I am risen again , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: E ' tane e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' tʉpo , utɨ mɨrɨ arawɨrɨ ' nokon Kiyarari pona , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Peter answered and said unto him , Though all men shall be offended because of thee , yet will I never be offended .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Pi ' ta uya , “ Tanporon kon uya ɨnɨntane te ' ku ' sen ɨpɨ ' wenai , urɨ uya nin ɨnonka pen mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Sises pɨ ' .

text: Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this night , before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Sises uya imaimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' , serɨ ewarupɨɨi tau kuru , kɨrɨtɨkɨ uturumʉ rawɨrɨ , osorʉwau ite ' kwa unonkato ' auya oton , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Peter said unto him , Though I should die with thee , yet will I not deny thee . Likewise also said all the disciples .
text2: E ' tane rɨ Pi ' ta uya , “ Uma ' tato ' pe rɨ aya ' kɨrɨ , ɨnonka uya pen nɨ mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ itonpa ton uya ta ' pʉ .

text: Then cometh Jesus with them unto a place called Gethsemane , and saith unto the disciples , Sit ye here , while I go and pray yonder .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises utɨ ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton pokon pe Ke ' semani tukai ' tesa ' sen pata ya ' , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Se airɨ ereutatɨ ' , mɨ airɨ ɨpʉremai ' utɨ tane , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee , and began to be sorrowful and very heavy .
text2: Ta ' kɨrɨ Pi ' ta mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ asa ' rɨ Sepiti munkɨ amʉ ' arɨ ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan ena ' pʉ pokoi pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ika ' nɨ ' pʉra rɨ .

text: Then saith he unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful , even unto death : tarry ye here , and watch with me .
text2: “ Uyewan man ika ' nɨ ' pʉra rɨ , e ' tape ' ne ' pe rɨ iyesi uma ' tanʉkʉ iya rɨ . Serɨ yau e ' tɨ ' , uya ' kɨrɨ tenu ke e ' tɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he went a little further , and fell on his face , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if it be possible , let this cup pass from me : nevertheless not as I will , but as thou wilt .
text2: Itɨ ' pʉ miyarɨ parɨ ɨnnɨ iwa to ' piyapai , mɨrɨpan uta ' mo ' ka ' pʉ non pona temʉ ' po , mɨrɨpan ɨpʉrema ' pʉ , “ Ukʉipʉnʉ , iye ' kupʉ pe iyesi yau tɨwɨ upiyapai ko ' nʉtamai , e ' tane uyeseru awɨrɨ pen , e ' tane ɨyeseru awɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he cometh unto the disciples , and findeth them asleep , and saith unto Peter , What , could ye not watch with me one hour ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan enna ' po ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton piya ' , mɨrɨpan uya to ' e ' nʉmʉ eporo ' pʉ . Pi ' ta ekama ' po ' pʉ iya , “ Uya ' kɨrɨ pe ' ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon warawoti ' si amʉ ' esi poken pʉra iyesi tenu ke mara rʉ ' kwɨ rɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Watch and pray , that ye enter not into temptation : the spirit indeed is willing , but the flesh is weak .
text2: “ Tenu ke esii ' ma ɨpʉrematɨ ' , i ' tupɨ ' nɨto ' ya ' auta ' mo ' ka kon namai ' . Iya ' kwarʉ esi ɨnku ' pai , e ' tane ipun esi ɨ ' sɨ ' mʉra , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: He went away again the second time , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if this cup may not pass away from me , except I drink it , thy will be done .
text2: Sises enna ' pokaa ' pʉ iyakon ite ' kwa pe ɨpʉremase ' na . “ Ukʉipʉnʉ , iye ' kupʉ poken pʉra rɨ iyesi yau , serɨ ko ' utama poken pʉra upiyapai ensi uya a ' tai rɨken , tɨwɨ ɨyeseru ne ' kupʉi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he came and found them asleep again : for their eyes were heavy .
text2: Iyenna ' posa ' a ' tai kanan , to ' rɨ marɨ e ' nʉnpɨ ' sa ' eporo ' pʉ iya , apʉne pʉra e ' tape ' ne ' pe ' ne to ' enu pi ' pɨ ton esi ke ,

text: And he left them , and went away again , and prayed the third time , saying the same words .
text2: mɨrɨpan kon piyapai ɨpʉremaka ' se ' na kanan itɨ ' pʉ itosorʉwano ite ' kwa pe , wapiya tʉwɨpʉrema ' pʉ kasa rɨ marɨ iyepʉrema ' pʉ .

text: Then cometh he to his disciples , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : behold , the hour is at hand , and the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Mɨrɨpan enna ' po ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton piya ' , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Mɨrɨ si e ' nʉn nɨ pɨ ' rɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ umoronka ' nɨ pɨ ' rɨ ɨwesi kon ? Apʉne entɨ ' ! Iweyu e ' seposa ' man ! Ka ' pon , Papa winon eparankasa ' man tʉmakooikena ' nan ena ' !

text: Rise , let us be going : behold , he is at hand that doth betray me .
text2: E ' mʉ ' sa ' katɨ ' ! Utɨnpai ' nokon ! Uyeparankanin si uye ' ka ' nɨ pɨ ' man ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And while he yet spake , lo , Judas , one of the twelve , came , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and elders of the people .
text2: Usauro ' nɨ pɨ ' rɨ marɨ iyesi koro ' tau , Isutas , 12 kaisaron kon tonpa pe te ' sen uyee ' pʉ . Ipokon pe anpisin kuru rɨ usepai ' tɨpɨ ' sa ' supara ke mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wa ' tana ke esi ' pʉ , use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' epuru ton nennoko ' san .

text: Now he that betrayed him gave them a sign , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he : hold him fast .
text2: Eparankanin uya tʉnku ' ton ekamasa ' esi ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' : “ Kʉrɨ sa ' su ' kayai ' ne ' si kʉrɨ rɨ ; ma ' sitʉi ' , ” tasa ' esi ' pʉ .

text: And forthwith he came to Jesus , and said , Hail , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Isutas utɨ ' pʉ Sises piya ' to ' sarɨ rɨ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Miyarɨ , Rapai ! ” mɨrɨpan a ' su ' ka ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Friend , wherefore art thou come ? Then came they , and laid hands on Jesus , and took him .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Utonpa , iku ' se ɨuye ' sa ' na ' ne ' rɨ iku ' kɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ka ' pon amʉ ' utɨ ' pʉ Sises winɨkʉi ' mɨrɨpan kon uya a ' si ' pʉ .

text: And , behold , one of them which were with Jesus stretched out his hand , and drew his sword , and struck a servant of the high priest ' s , and smote off his ear .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' tikin nan nɨ Sises tonpa ton tonpa uya tʉsuparaai mo ' ka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru poitorʉ pana a ' tɨ ' pʉ .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Put up again thy sword into his place : for all they that take the sword shall perish with the sword .
text2: Sises uya nin si ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ɨsuparaai ina ' poka ' kɨ si ipata ' pʉ ya ' ! Kamoro supara apurɨnin nʉ ' san nɨ eri ' to ' oton esi mɨrɨ supara ke rɨ .

text: Thinkest thou that I cannot now pray to my Father , and he shall presently give me more than twelve legions of angels ?
text2: I ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ , ukʉipʉnʉ pɨ ' ɨpʉremato ' , mɨrɨ a ' tai upiya ' 12 kaisa rɨ ite ' kwa anpisin ton kuru rɨ inserʉ amʉ ' enno ' to ' iya upika ' tɨnin nan pe .

text: But how then shall the scriptures be fulfilled , that thus it must be ?
text2: E ' tane mɨrɨ ku ' sa ' uya pe iyesi yau , itekare uya ekamasa ' na ' ne ' uta ' ku ' tɨ pʉra rɨ iyesi , mɨrɨ e ' ku ' to ' oton tasa ' iya na ' ne ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: In that same hour said Jesus to the multitudes , Are ye come out as against a thief with swords and staves for to take me ? I sat daily with you teaching in the temple , and ye laid no hold on me .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya ta ' pʉ anpisin pɨ ' , “ Main awɨron kon pen pe ' esa ' pe esi serɨ , ɨuye ' sa ' kon na ' ne ' supara amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wa ' tana amʉ ' esa ' pe uya ' sise ' na ? Wʉi kaisarɨ rɨ e ' tai ko use ' man nɨto ' , ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' pʉ ' kʉ tau tereutai ' ka ' pon amʉ ' enupa pɨ ' , uya ' si auya ' nokon pʉra rɨ .

text: But all this was done , that the scriptures of the prophets might be fulfilled . Then all the disciples forsook him , and fled .
text2: E ' tane tanporo rɨ serɨ e ' ku ' sa ' pu ' kena ' amʉ ' nʉmenuka ' pʉ uta ' ku ' tɨto ' pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨ a ' tai si , tanporo ipoitorʉ ton uya inonka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon ainʉmʉ ' pʉ .

text: And they that had laid hold on Jesus led him away to Caiaphas the high priest , where the scribes and the elders were assembled .
text2: Kamoro , Sises a ' sinin nʉ ' san uya arɨ ' pʉ Kaya ' pas , use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru piya ' , Main pɨ ' enupanin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton amʉrasa ' airɨ .

text: But Peter followed him afar off unto the high priest ' s palace , and went in , and sat with the servants , to see the end .
text2: E ' tane Pi ' ta uya e ' ma ' pʉka ' pʉ ɨnnonsi ' kɨ rɨ , use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru iwʉ ' pʉrorooi pona , mɨrɨpan ewomʉ ' pʉ , iyereuta ' pʉ erasu ton piya ' te ' ku ' sen ense ' na .

text: Now the chief priests , and elders , and all the council , sought false witness against Jesus , to put him to death ;
text2: Use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporon kon nɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' Konsʉrʉʉi ton esi ' pʉ kasi pe rɨ Sises eseru ' tɨto ' warinpa pɨ ' , iyeri ' to ' ya ' itʉto ' pe tʉuya ' nokon .

text: But found none : yea , though many false witnesses came , yet found they none . At the last came two false witnesses ,
text2: E ' tane to ' uya ɨ ' rɨ rɨ iteseru eporo ' pʉ pen nɨ mɨrɨ rɨ e ' tane tu ' ke rɨ kasi ye ' pe tʉusauro ' san esi ' pʉ . Emennʉ ' pʉ tʉpo rɨ , asa ' ron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uyee ' pʉ ,

text: And said , This fellow said , I am able to destroy the temple of God , and to build it in three days .
text2: mɨrɨpan kon uya si ekama ' pʉ , “ Pʉse rɨ uya ta ' pʉ , ‘ Papa iwano ' use ' man nɨto ' , ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' ma ' tanʉkʉ uya mɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan konekato ' pe uya kanan osorʉwau wʉi yau , ’ ta ' pʉ iya , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And the high priest arose , and said unto him , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai si , use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru e ' soto ' ka ' pʉ Sises pɨ ' tase ' na , “ Eikʉ auya pen nɨ pe ' mɨrɨ ? Ɨ ' rɨ tukai ' pʉsamoro ka ' pon amʉ ' usaurokʉ ɨpɨ ' ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But Jesus held his peace . And the high priest answered and said unto him , I adjure thee by the living God , that thou tell us whether thou be the Christ , the Son of God .
text2: E ' tane Sises enkurumʉ ' pʉ e ' pana rɨ . Use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ayapiyo ' ma uya serɨ Papa tʉuko ' mansen uya eta tane i ' napairon pe ɨusekama pa ina pɨ ' ; Kʉrai pe pe ' ɨwesi , Papa Mumu pe ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thou hast said : nevertheless I say unto you , Hereafter shall ye see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Sises uya imaimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ewai ' , ta auya na ' ne ' kasa rɨ , e ' tane tanporo ɨpɨ ' nokon ta uya ; Serɨ enta ' , Ka ' pon , Papa winon ento ' auya ' nokon oton iyereutasa ' Meruntɨ pe Te ' sen enwo ' netʉ winɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyepʉ Epʉn poi kapuru ' yau , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , saying , He hath spoken blasphemy ; what further need have we of witnesses ? behold , now ye have heard his blasphemy .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru uya tʉpon karaka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ , “ Papa sapema pe isaurokʉ ! Ɨ ' rɨto ' pe miyarɨ rɨ ekamanin nan i ' se e ' nɨ ? Entɨ ' , Papa sapema pe isaurokʉ etasa ' auya ' nokon .

text: What think ye ? They answered and said , He is guilty of death .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ ken tukai ' mɨsenuminkayatʉu ? ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' . “ Ima ' tato ' pe rɨ iyesi ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Then did they spit in his face , and buffeted him ; and others smote him with the palms of their hands ,
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon eta ' tapɨtʉ ' pʉ itemʉ ' pona , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' uya tʉmokorooi kon ke iwɨnɨ ' pʉ . Tʉron kon uya rɨ inta ' mopɨtʉ ' pʉ ,

text: Saying , Prophesy unto us , thou Christ , Who is he that smote thee ?
text2: tai ' ma , “ Kʉrai , pu ' kena ' pe ekamakɨ ina pɨ ' . Ɨnʉ ' ɨwɨnɨi ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' .

text: Now Peter sat without in the palace : and a damsel came unto him , saying , Thou also wast with Jesus of Galilee .
text2: Pi ' ta ereutasa ' esi ' pʉ Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru iwʉ ' pʉrorooi po , mɨrɨpan piya ' to ' poitorʉ , uri ' san uyee ' pʉ . “ Ɨmɨrɨ sa ' ne kʉrɨ rɨ ko Sises , Kiyarari pon a ' kɨron nʉ ' pʉ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But he denied before them all , saying , I know not what thou sayest .
text2: E ' tane i ' tunin pe pʉra iye ' kuu ' pʉ tanporo mɨrɨ yawon kon rau esii ' ma . “ I ' tu uya pʉra rɨ man ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' ausaurokʉ tukai ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when he was gone out into the porch , another maid saw him , and said unto them that were there , This fellow was also with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ pʉroroi mʉra ' taai pona . Mɨrɨ yau , tʉron nɨ uri ' san uya kanan ene ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ka ' pon amʉ ' mɨrɨ yau te ' san pɨ ' , “ Pʉse rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ Sises , Nasare ' pon a ' kɨron nʉ ' pʉ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And again he denied with an oath , I do not know the man .
text2: I ' tunin pe pʉra kanan iye ' ku ' kaa ' pʉ , Papa kuru tesa ' pɨ ' se : “ Kʉrɨ rɨ i ' tu uya pʉra man ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And after a while came unto him they that stood by , and said to Peter , Surely thou also art one of them ; for thy speech bewrayeth thee .
text2: Mara rɨ iyesi ' pʉ tʉpo kamoro mɨrɨ yau te ' soto ' pɨ ' se te ' san utɨ ' pʉ Pi ' ta piya ' , tase ' na ipɨ ' , “ I ' napai rɨ kuru rɨ ɨmɨrɨ kʉrɨ rɨ to ' tonpa , ausaurokʉ eseru uya ɨyekama , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' .

text: Then began he to curse and to swear , saying , I know not the man . And immediately the cock crew .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai si , Pi ' ta e ' pa ' nʉkʉ ' pʉ tiwano ' pe rɨ , mɨrɨpan uya , “ Tɨwɨ Papa ukota ' mai kasi pe usaurokʉ pɨ ' . Kʉrɨ rɨ i ' tu uya pʉra man ! ” ta ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ ta iya a ' tai rɨ , kɨrɨtɨkɨ uturumʉ ' pʉ .

text: And Peter remembered the word of Jesus , which said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice . And he went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai si , Pi ' ta uya Sises maimu rʉ ' pʉ nee ' pʉ tenu ya ' , “ Osorʉwau ite ' kwa , ‘ I ' tu uya pʉra man , ’ tato ' auya oton , kɨrɨtɨkɨ uturumʉ rawɨrɨ ! ” tawon . Mɨrɨpan epa ' ka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan ukaramʉ ' pʉ ipan pe rɨ .

text: When the morning was come , all the chief priests and elders of the people took counsel against Jesus to put him to death :
text2: Awanakʉi ' kuru , tanporo use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton ekoneka ' pʉ Sises uma ' tato ' pe iku ' to ' tʉuya ' nokon pɨ ' .

text: And when they had bound him , they led him away , and delivered him to Pontius Pilate the governor .
text2: To ' uya auronpɨtʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan arɨ ' pʉ to ' uya Paire ' , kopʉna ena ' .

text: Then Judas , which had betrayed him , when he saw that he was condemned , repented himself , and brought again the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders ,
text2: Sises eparankanin nʉ ' pʉ , Isutas uya si ensa ' esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ , to ' uya ikonekasa ' Sises uma ' tato ' pe , ipan pe rɨ ipokoita ' pʉ Sises eparankasa ' tʉuya pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan uya 30 kaisaron sirʉpa pun na ' po ' pʉ use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton ena ' .

text: Saying , I have sinned in that I have betrayed the innocent blood . And they said , What is that to us ? see thou to that .
text2: “ Umakoitasa ' man , imakooi pʉn nɨ mʉnʉ teparankai ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya . “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe ken si mɨrɨ uya ina kupʉ ? Ɨiwano ' sa ' ne mɨrɨ ko ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' .

text: And he cast down the pieces of silver in the temple , and departed , and went and hanged himself .
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai , Isutas uya pʉrata pun eno ' ma ' pʉ use ' man nɨto ' , ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' pʉ ' kʉ ta ' , mɨrɨpan enna ' po ' pʉ tiwano ' pe rɨ e ' sa ' mase ' na .

text: And the chief priests took the silver pieces , and said , It is not lawful for to put them into the treasury , because it is the price of blood .
text2: Use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton uya pʉrata pun amuku ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya ta ' pʉ , “ Main , Mosi ' winon nɨ pʉremekʉ pe iyesi mɨrɨ inonkasa ' a ' tai pʉrata yen ya ' , apʉne pʉra mʉn epe ' pʉ pe iyesi ke , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And they took counsel , and bought with them the potter ' s field , to bury strangers in .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon ekoneka ' pʉ mɨrɨ pʉrata ke ɨinɨ ka ' nin pata ' se ' e ' mato ' pe tukai ' . Mɨrɨ si kupʉ ' pʉ to ' uya ka ' kʉran amʉ ' pe te ' san eri ' sa ' u ' na ' tɨto ' yau pe .

text: Wherefore that field was called , The field of blood , unto this day .
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai , ka ' pon amʉ ' uya mɨrɨ pata esakʉ Mʉn Pata ' se ' tukai ' serɨ pʉ ' kʉ pona .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying , And they took the thirty pieces of silver , the price of him that was valued , whom they of the children of Israel did value ;
text2: Mɨrɨ si pu ' kena ' Iseremaya nekama ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ pena rɨ uta ' ku ' tɨ ' pʉ se tawon : “ To ' uya si 30 kaisa rɨ sirʉpa pun anʉmʉ ' pʉ , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' nʉkupʉ ' pʉ itepe ' pe ,

text: And gave them for the potter ' s field , as the Lord appointed me .
text2: mɨrɨpan kon uya mɨrɨ pʉrata ke ɨinɨ ka ' nin nan pata ' se ' e ' ma ' pʉ , uyepuru uya uyapiyo ' ma ' pʉ awɨrɨ rɨ , ” tawon .

text: And Jesus stood before the governor : and the governor asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And Jesus said unto him , Thou sayest .
text2: Mɨrɨ koro ' tau rɨ Sises e ' soto ' kasa ' esi ' pʉ kopʉna Paire ' piya ' , mɨrɨpan ekama ' po ' pʉ Paire ' uya , “ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' kin pe ' ɨmɨrɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . Sises uya imaimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ewai ' , mʉkayai ' ne ' kasa rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when he was accused of the chief priests and elders , he answered nothing .
text2: Use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton uya ɨri pe , kasi pe rɨ teseru ' tɨ a ' tai eikʉ ' pʉ iya pen .

text: Then said Pilate unto him , Hearest thou not how many things they witness against thee ?
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Paire ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Eta auya pʉra pe ' iyesi ɨri pe to ' usaurokʉ ɨpɨ ' ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he answered him to never a word ; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly .
text2: E ' tane Sises uya tikin nan pɨ ' rɨ to ' eikʉ ' pʉ pen nɨ , ɨri pe to ' uya tʉku ' to ' pɨ ' , kopʉna tewansiukai ' .

text: Now at that feast the governor was wont to release unto the people a prisoner , whom they would .
text2: Kopʉna eseru esi ' pʉ ka ' pon nonkato ' pariki ' si tapai to ' enta ' nato ' weyu a ' tai anpisin ton nanʉmʉ ' pʉ .

text: And they had then a notable prisoner , called Barabbas .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , tese ke te ' sen a ' sisa ' pariki ' si ta ' esi ' pʉ , Parapas tukai ' tesa ' sen .

text: Therefore when they were gathered together , Pilate said unto them , Whom will ye that I release unto you ? Barabbas , or Jesus which is called Christ ?
text2: Tu ' kan kon amʉrasa ' a ' tai , Paire ' uya to ' ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Nai kʉrɨ rupɨ enpa ' ka uya i ' se me ' atʉu ɨiwano ' kon pe ? Parapas , mɨrɨ pe pʉra Sises , Kʉrai tato ' katɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: For he knew that for envy they had delivered him .
text2: Apʉne pʉra tɨkɨnta kon pɨ ' to ' uya itʉsa ' tena ' tukai ' i ' tu tʉuya pɨ ' .

text: When he was set down on the judgment seat , his wife sent unto him , saying , Have thou nothing to do with that just man : for I have suffered many things this day in a dream because of him .
text2: Eseru aimenkato ' apon po Paire ' ereutasa ' koro ' tau rɨ , ino ' pʉ uya se main enno ' sa ' esi ' pʉ ipiya ' : “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe kʉrɨ rɨ , ɨ ' rɨ ku ' nin nʉ ' pʉ pen nɨ ka ' pon kʉ ' kupʉi . Ɨri pe serɨ pe tekota ' mapɨ ' se e ' ne ' pɨ ' sa ' man kʉrɨ rɨ uriya ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But the chief priests and elders persuaded the multitude that they should ask Barabbas , and destroy Jesus .
text2: E ' tane use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton uya ka ' pon amʉ ' pori ' ma ' pʉ to ' uya Parapas ekama ' poto ' pe inonkato ' pe iya , Sises ma ' tanʉkʉi ' ma .

text: The governor answered and said unto them , Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you ? They said , Barabbas .
text2: Kopʉna uya to ' ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Nai kʉrɨ kuru nonka uya i ' se me ' atʉu ɨyena ' nokon ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . “ Parapas , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Pilate saith unto them , What shall I do then with Jesus which is called Christ ? They all say unto him , Let him be crucified .
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe ken si Sises , Kʉrai tato ' ipɨ ' kupʉ uya ? ” tukai ' Paire ' uya to ' ekama ' po ' pʉ . Tanporon kon uya imaimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Kurusu ' pona ipokapɨ ' kɨ ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And the governor said , Why , what evil hath he done ? But they cried out the more , saying , Let him be crucified .
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨto ' pe ? Ɨ ' rɨ ɨri ku ' sa ' iya ? ” ta ' pʉ Paire ' uya . E ' tane eke pe kuru to ' ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉ ' pʉ , “ Kurusu ' pona ipokapɨ ' kɨ ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing , but that rather a tumult was made , he took water , and washed his hands before the multitude , saying , I am innocent of the blood of this just person : see ye to it .
text2: Paire ' uya ene ' pʉ ɨ ' rɨ pe iku ' to ' iya awɨrɨ pʉra rɨ , e ' tane ɨsɨ pe rɨ to ' ena esi ' pʉ . Tuna anʉmʉ ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan isemiyakʉ ' pʉ tu ' kan kon rau esii ' ma . “ Tʉmakooi ke pʉra esi serɨ pʉse rɨ ka ' pon mʉnʉ pɨ ' . Ɨyenau ' nokon nɨ iyesi mɨrɨ ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then answered all the people , and said , His blood be on us , and on our children .
text2: Tanporon kon uya imaimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Tɨwɨ ina mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ina munkɨ amʉ ' iwano ' pe imʉnʉ nesii ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Then released he Barabbas unto them : and when he had scourged Jesus , he delivered him to be crucified .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya Parapas nonka ' pʉ to ' ena ' , e ' tane ari ' po ' pɨ ' to ' pe Sises kupʉ ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itʉrʉ ' pʉ iya kurusu ' pona to ' uya ipokapɨ ' to ' pe .

text: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the common hall , and gathered unto him the whole band of soldiers .
text2: Kopʉna soisaai amʉ ' uya si Sises arɨ ' pʉ kopʉna pe e ' nɨ iwʉ ' ta ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya tu ' kan kon nɨ soisa amʉ ' amʉranʉkʉ ' pʉ Sises woi .

text: And they stripped him , and put on him a scarlet robe .
text2: To ' uya iponka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan tʉtariren pon ke to ' uya ipontɨ ' pʉ ,

text: And when they had platted a crown of thorns , they put it upon his head , and a reed in his right hand : and they bowed the knee before him , and mocked him , saying , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: mɨrɨpan kon uya tikʉ ke te ' sen e ' mepɨtʉ ' pʉ aro ' , kʉron pe , mɨrɨpan ke to ' uya arʉko ' tɨ ' pʉ . To ' uya iyɨɨi ' tɨ ' pʉ itenwo ' netʉ winon itemiyatʉ ya ' , mɨrɨpan kon e ' sekunkapɨtʉ ' pʉ irau , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' uya isapema ' pʉ . “ Miyarɨ , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' kin ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya Sises pɨ ' .

text: And they spit upon him , and took the reed , and smote him on the head .
text2: To ' eta ' tapɨtʉ ' pʉ ipona ; itɨɨi mo ' ka ' pʉ to ' uya , mɨrɨ ke to ' uya i ' pai wɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ .

text: And after that they had mocked him , they took the robe off from him , and put his own raiment on him , and led him away to crucify him .
text2: Isapema tʉpo , to ' uya iponka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan pontɨ ' pʉ to ' uya ipon ya ' , mɨrɨpan arɨ ' pʉ to ' uya kurusu ' pona ipokapɨ ' se ' na .

text: And as they came out , they found a man of Cyrene , Simon by name : him they compelled to bear his cross .
text2: To ' utɨ koro ' tau , ka ' pon Sairini winon , Saiman itese ' eporo ' pʉ to ' uya , mɨrɨpan a ' kwarʉka ' pʉ to ' uya kurusu ' ato ' pe iya .

text: And when they were come unto a place called Golgotha , that is to say , a place of a skull ,
text2: To ' uyee ' pʉ pata Korʉko ' ta tato ' ya ' ( Pu ' pɨ Ɨ ' pʉ Rʉ ' pʉ Pata ta e ' kwa pe ) .

text: They gave him vinegar to drink mingled with gall : and when he had tasted thereof , he would not drink .
text2: Mɨrɨ yau , to ' uya Sises o ' pa ' pʉ i ' ne ' ke waain tisumai ' . Onpasa ' tʉuya a ' tai , ɨnensipai pʉra iyesi ' pʉ .

text: And they crucified him , and parted his garments , casting lots : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , They parted my garments among them , and upon my vesture did they cast lots .
text2: Kurusu ' pona ipokapɨ ' sa ' tʉuya ' nokon a ' tai , ipon nʉ ' pʉ ta ' nʉkʉ ' pʉ to ' uya te ' wapiya ' kapɨ ' se ,

text: And sitting down they watched him there ;
text2: mɨrɨpan kon ereuta ' pʉ enpɨ ' se ' na .

text: And set up over his head his accusation written , THIS IS JESUS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Iwɨto ' iwenai menukasa ' poka ' pʉ to ' uya i ' pai epoi ; sises pʉse rɨ , esuwerʉ amʉ ' kin , tawon .

text: Then were there two thieves crucified with him , one on the right hand , and another on the left .
text2: Asa ' ron kon ama ' rʉ ' san pokapɨtʉ ' pʉ to ' uya ipokon pe ; tikin nɨ itenwo ' netʉ winɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ikamisi winɨ tikin nɨ .

text: And they that passed by reviled him , wagging their heads ,
text2: Kamoro ipiyawɨrɨ tʉutɨsan uya ɨri pe isapema ' pʉ , ti ' pai kon sʉkʉsʉkʉma ' pʉ to ' uya ,

text: And saying , Thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days , save thyself . If thou be the Son of God , come down from the cross .
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ta ' pʉ to ' uya , “ Ɨmɨrɨ , use ' man nɨto ' , ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' a ' morʉkanin , mɨrɨpan amɨ auya osorʉwawon wʉi yau , epika ' tɨ ' ! Ɨu ' tɨkɨ kurusu ' poi , Papa Mumu pe ɨwesi yau ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking him , with the scribes and elders , said ,
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Main pɨ ' enupanin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton uya rɨ isapema ' pʉ .

text: He saved others ; himself he cannot save . If he be the King of Israel , let him now come down from the cross , and we will believe him .
text2: “ Tʉron kon pika ' tɨ ' pʉ iya , e ' tane tiwa rɨ iyepika ' tɨ pʉra iyesi ! Esuwerʉ amʉ ' kin sa ' ne si ! Tɨwɨ si nʉu ' tɨi kurusu ' poi , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ urɨ ' nokon uya apurɨto ' pe .

text: He trusted in God ; let him deliver him now , if he will have him : for he said , I am the Son of God .
text2: Papa apurɨnin kʉrɨ rɨ . Tɨwɨ Papa nʉpika ' tɨi i ' se tesi yau , ‘ Papa Mumu urɨ , ’ tasa ' iya pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: The thieves also , which were crucified with him , cast the same in his teeth .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ iya ' kɨrɨ kurusu ' pona ipokapɨ ' sa ' kon uya isapema ' pʉ .

text: Now from the sixth hour there was darkness over all the land unto the ninth hour .
text2: 12 a ' kʉra ' awonsi ' kɨ 3 a ' kʉra ' pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ , tanporo rɨ pata ewarumamʉ ' pʉ .

text: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eli , Eli , lama sabachthani ? that is to say , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: 3 a ' kʉra ' a ' tai ' ne rɨ , Sises ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ , “ Iroi , Iroi , rama sapa ' tani ? ” ta ' pʉ iya , “ Papa , Papa , ɨ ' rɨto ' pe unonkasa ' auya ? ” ta e ' kwa pe .

text: Some of them that stood there , when they heard that , said , This man calleth for Elias .
text2: Mɨrɨ yau si te ' soto ' pɨ ' se te ' san uya serɨ etasa ' a ' tai , “ Iraisa kɨ ' ma pɨ ' man ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And straightway one of them ran , and took a spunge , and filled it with vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink .
text2: Inke pʉra , tikin nɨ to ' tonpa pe te ' sen si eka ' tumʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ su ' pa epose , waain maku ' pɨ peneka ka ' ikii ' pʉ iya , yʉi pɨ ' tepu ' tɨi ' Sises uya ensito ' pe ikupʉ ' pʉ .

text: The rest said , Let be , let us see whether Elias will come to save him .
text2: E ' tane tʉron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uya , “ Tɨwɨ nesii . Apʉne , Iraisa uyepʉ enpai ' nokon ipika ' tɨi ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Jesus , when he had cried again with a loud voice , yielded up the ghost .
text2: Sises kanan ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnkaa ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' kwarʉ tʉrʉ ' pʉ .

text: And , behold , the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom ; and the earth did quake , and the rocks rent ;
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai rɨ si , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' itau wapu pe te ' sen ekaraka ' pʉ inakapu ponsi ' kɨ non pona a ' sa ' mʉyai . Tʉrʉ ' pʉnʉ amʉ ' esi ' pʉ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tɨ ' amʉ ' uta ' morʉpɨtʉ ' pʉ .

text: And the graves were opened ; and many bodies of the saints which slept arose ,
text2: Uruwai ' amʉ ' uta ' kokapɨtʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan wakʉ ton ka ' pon amʉ ' iyeri ' sa ' kon e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ kanan .

text: And came out of the graves after his resurrection , and went into the holy city , and appeared unto many .
text2: To ' nin si epa ' ka ' pʉ mɨrɨ uruwai ' yapai . Emennʉ ' pʉ po , Sises e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' a ' tai nin si , to ' utɨ ' pʉ mɨrɨ Surusiran pona . Mɨrɨ yau , tu ' kan kon nɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' uya to ' ene ' pʉ .

text: Now when the centurion , and they that were with him , watching Jesus , saw the earthquake , and those things that were done , they feared greatly , saying , Truly this was the Son of God .
text2: Roman amʉ ' soisaai ton epuru mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ita ' kɨrɨ te ' san itonpa ton Sises erasuntɨ pɨ ' te ' san uya tʉrʉ ' pʉnʉ amʉ ' utɨ i ' tu ' pʉ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporon nɨ te ' ku ' sen ene ' pʉ , ipan pe rɨ to ' etʉipɨtʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya , “ I ' napai rɨ kuru rɨ ka ' si , pʉse rɨ esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ wa Papa Mumu pe ! ” ta ' pʉ .

text: And many women were there beholding afar off , which followed Jesus from Galilee , ministering unto him :
text2: Tu ' kan kon nɨ uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' esi ' pʉ enpɨtʉ pɨ ' ɨnnonsi ' kɨ . Sises e ' ma ' pʉkasa ' to ' uya esi ' pʉ Kiyarari poi , ipika ' tɨ pɨ ' to ' esi ' pʉ i ' se iye ' to ' ke .

text: Among which was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James and Joses , and the mother of Zebedee ' s children .
text2: To ' koro ' tau Meri Mataren ; Meri , Isens mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Isose ' san ; mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Sepiti munkɨ amʉ ' san .

text: When the even was come , there came a rich man of Arimathaea , named Joseph , who also himself was Jesus ' disciple :
text2: Pata uko ' mankapʉ koro ' tau , imaminke ' ka ' pon , Arama ' tiya winon uyee ' pʉ . Itese ' esi ' pʉ Isose ' , Sises poitorʉ pe iyenasa ' rʉ ' pʉ .

text: He went to Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus . Then Pilate commanded the body to be delivered .
