text: And he went up unto them into the ship ; and the wind ceased : and they were sore amazed in themselves beyond measure , and wondered .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai rɨ , iyekanwa ' tɨ ' pʉ kanau ya ' to ' piya ' . Mɨrɨ a ' tai rɨ , a ' setun ereuta ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan poitorʉ ton usewansiuka ' pʉ ,

text: For they considered not the miracle of the loaves : for their heart was hardened .
text2: apʉne pʉra to ' uya ito ' ka ' nʉ ' sa ' pʉra iyesi ' pʉ ɨ ' rɨ kuru ta e ' kwa pe pʉreti esi tukai ' ; to ' ewan nɨ usa ' mantasa ' esi ' pʉ .

text: And when they had passed over , they came into the land of Gennesaret , and drew to the shore .
text2: To ' ɨ ' kwɨrɨ ' sa ' a ' tai , to ' e ' te ' ka ' pʉ Kenesare ' airɨ , mɨrɨpan kon uya tʉkanwa kon ewa ' tɨ ' pʉ mɨrɨ yau .

text: And when they were come out of the ship , straightway they knew him ,
text2: To ' ekanwaka pe rɨ , ka ' pon amʉ ' uya Sises i ' tusa ' esi ' pʉ .

text: And ran through that whole region round about , and began to carry about in beds those that were sick , where they heard he was .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon eka ' tunpɨtʉ ' pʉ , tanporo mɨrɨ pata nono yau ' ne , mɨrɨpan kon uya takuru ' kena ' nan epɨrinpɨ ' sa ' te ' kwe ' kon po nee ' pʉ ipiya ' , mɨrɨ airɨ iyesi tukai ' etasa ' tʉuya ' nokon airɨ .

text: And whithersoever he entered , into villages , or cities , or country , they laid the sick in the streets , and besought him that they might touch if it were but the border of his garment : and as many as touched him were made whole .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Sises utɨpɨ ' to ' airɨ ' ne — eke iwa ton pata amʉ ' , umɨ amʉ ' awɨrɨ ' ne rɨ — mɨrɨpan ka ' pon amʉ ' uya takuru ' kena ' nan apɨtʉ ' pʉ kʉrʉpo ' po pɨ ' e ' nɨto ' pata ' se ' ya ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya ipan pe ipawana ' tɨ ' pʉ takuru ' kena ' nan uya ipon e ' pi a ' pɨ ' to ' pe , mɨrɨpan tanporon kon a ' pɨ ' nin nʉ ' san usepi ' tɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ .

text: Then came together unto him the Pharisees , and certain of the scribes , which came from Jerusalem .
text2: Pari ' si amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Main pɨ ' enupanin nan iye ' sa ' kon Surusiran winɨ amʉrasa ' esi ' pʉ Sises woi ,

text: And when they saw some of his disciples eat bread with defiled , that is to say , with unwashen , hands , they found fault .
text2: mɨrɨpan kon uya tʉron kon ipoitorʉ ton enta ' na ene ' pʉ ɨri , ikorʉkasa ' pen temiyatʉ kon ke .

text: For the Pharisees , and all the Jews , except they wash their hands oft , eat not , holding the tradition of the elders .
text2: ( Pari ' si amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' kamoro tenta ' nasan pen temiyatʉ kon korʉkasa ' tʉuya ' nokon pʉra iye ' tane tepuru kon eseru awɨrɨ .

text: And when they come from the market , except they wash , they eat not . And many other things there be , which they have received to hold , as the washing of cups , and pots , brasen vessels , and of tables .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ rɨ kʉrʉpo ' po iwʉ ' tapai ine ' sa ' pɨ ' , to ' enta ' na pen wapiya kuru ikorʉkasa ' tʉuya ' nokon a ' tai rɨken to ' enta ' na , mɨrɨpan kon uya tenupa ' pʉ kon nɨ kupʉ iye ' to ' awɨrɨ Papa enu yau , tʉkokʉ kon , terin kon , ka ' pa konekasa ' tʉ ' sawʉ kon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ te ' kwe ' kon amʉ ' rɨ korʉka . )

text: Then the Pharisees and scribes asked him , Why walk not thy disciples according to the tradition of the elders , but eat bread with unwashen hands ?
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' Pari ' si amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Main pɨ ' enupanin nan uya Sises ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' ɨpoitorʉ ton esi pʉra iyesi uyepuru kon eseru rʉ ' pʉ awɨrɨ , e ' tane ɨri rɨ temiyatʉ kon ke to ' enta ' na ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: He answered and said unto them , Well hath Esaias prophesied of you hypocrites , as it is written , This people honoureth me with their lips , but their heart is far from me .
text2: Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ipoken nɨ Aisaya usaurokʉ ' pʉ ɨpɨ ' nokon , wakʉ pe te ' ku ' san pɨ ' ; iye ' menukasa ' na ' ne ' : “ ‘ Pʉsamoro uya tʉnta kon ke rɨken unama ; e ' tane ɨnnɨ rɨ to ' ewan esi upiyapai .

text: Howbeit in vain do they worship me , teaching for doctines the commandments of men .
text2: To ' ɨpʉrema upɨ ' ɨ ' rɨ epoton kon kasa rɨ ; to ' usenupato ' esi ka ' pon amʉ ' uya to ' enupa ' pʉ iyawɨrɨ to ' e ' to ' . ’ tukai ' .

text: For laying aside the commandment of God , ye hold the tradition of men , as the washing of pots and cups : and many other such like things ye do .
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon uya Papa uya ayapiyontɨto ' kon apurɨ pʉra iyesi , e ' tane ka ' pon uya ɨyenupato ' kon apurɨ auya ' nokon nɨken , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said unto them , Full well ye reject the commandment of God , that ye may keep your own tradition .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Teseru ke kuru ɨwesi kon Papa Maimu nonka kon pa , ɨyeseru kon awɨrɨ ɨwesi kon pa !

text: For Moses said , Honour thy father and thy mother ; and , Whoso curseth father or mother , let him die the death :
text2: Mosi ' uya tasa ' , ‘ Ɨkʉipʉnʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ asan inamakɨ , ’ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ , ‘ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ tʉkʉipʉnʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉsan nɨ pa ' nʉ ' nin wɨto ' pe iyesi . ’

text: But ye say , If a man shall say to his father or mother , It is Corban , that is to say , a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ; he shall be free .
text2: E ' tane ta auya ' nokon , ka ' pon uya tʉkʉipʉnʉ mɨrɨ pe pʉra tʉsan pɨ ' ta pe iyesi yau , ‘ Ɨ ' rɨ rɨ ɨpika ' tɨnin pe uwinɨ ɨneporonʉ pan e ' tane Kapan pe man ’ ( Papa ena ' iye ' tʉka ' sa ' man ta e ' kwa pe ) ,

text: And ye suffer him no more to do ought for his father or his mother ;
text2: mɨrɨ si ɨ ' rɨ rɨ kupʉ iya poken pʉra tʉkʉipʉnʉ mɨrɨ pe pʉra tʉsan iwano ' pe ikupʉ auya ' nokon .

text: Making the word of God of none effect through your tradition , which ye have delivered : and many such like things do ye .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa si ipʉra Papa Maimu kupʉ auya ' nokon ɨyeseru kon mɨn winɨ rɨ iyɨ ' kwɨrɨ ' pɨ ' sa ' ke . Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tu ' ke rɨ ɨnkupʉnʉ kon man serɨ warai ' nan , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when he had called all the people unto him , he said unto them , Hearken unto me every one of you , and understand :
text2: Sises uya anpisin ton nɨ kɨ ' makaa ' pʉ kanan tʉpiya ' , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Apʉne uyetatɨ ' , tanporo ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ se ito ' ka ' nʉ ' tɨ ' .

text: There is nothing from without a man , that entering into him can defile him : but the things which come out of him , those are they that defile the man .
text2: Mɨrɨ yau ɨ ' rɨ rɨ tewonsen pʉra iyesi mɨrɨ ka ' pon ya ' kɨpo ' ponsi ' kɨ ɨri pe iku ' se ' na , e ' tane ka ' pon apai iyepa ' kasa ' uya ɨri pe ikupʉ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when he was entered into the house from the people , his disciples asked him concerning the parable .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya anpisin ton nɨ nɨmɨ ' pʉ , itɨ ' pʉ ɨutɨ ta ' , mɨrɨpan ipoitorʉ ton uya ekama ' po ' pʉ serɨ panton pɨ ' .

text: And he saith unto them , Are ye so without understanding also ? Do ye not perceive , that whatsoever thing from without entereth into the man , it cannot defile him ;
text2: “ Ito ' ka ' nʉ ' nin nan pe pʉra rɨ pe ' ɨwesi kon ? Ene auya ' nokon pʉra pe ' iyesi , ɨ ' rɨ rɨ kɨpo ' ponsi ' kɨ tewonsen ka ' pon ya ' uya , ɨri pe ikupʉ pʉra iyesi ?

text: Because it entereth not into his heart , but into the belly , and goeth out into the draught , purging all meats ?
text2: Apʉne pʉra itɨ pen mɨrɨ itewan ya ' e ' tane itɨ mɨrɨ iwenu ' pɨ ya ' , mɨrɨpan epa ' ka ipun apai , ” ta ' pʉ iya . ( Sises uya serɨ ta ' pʉ , tanporo rɨ sa ' ne kiyari esi mɨrɨ ko enta ' nan nɨto ' ipɨ ' pe , ta tʉuya e ' kwa pe . )

text: And he said , That which cometh out of the man , that defileth the man .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya rɨ ta ' pʉ , “ Nepa ' kayai ' ne ' ka ' pon yapai uya nin ikupʉ mɨrɨ ɨri pe .

text: For from within , out of the heart of men , proceed evil thoughts , adulteries , fornications , murders ,
text2: Apʉne pʉra ka ' pon amʉ ' ewan yapai ɨri isenuminkato ' epa ' ka , tekumasen pe , ama ' e ' pe , te ' wɨsen pe ,

text: Thefts , covetousness , wickedness , deceit , lasciviousness , an evil eye , blasphemy , pride , foolishness :
text2: iyemari ' masa ' ekumankanin pe , mentaino pe , e ' wɨpaino , enku ' tɨnin ye ' pe , ɨri ku ' nin pe rɨ , tɨkɨntai ' , teseru ' tɨi ' ka ' pon pɨ ' tʉusauro ' sen pe , mɨ pe rɨ te ' ku ' sen pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ita ' kwarʉ pʉra te ' sen pe .

text: All these evil things come from within , and defile the man .
text2: Tanporo serɨ ton makoi eseru ton epa ' kasa ' ka ' pon apai uya ɨri pe rɨ ikupʉ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And from thence he arose , and went into the borders of Tyre and Sidon , and entered into an house , and would have no man know it : but he could not be hid .
text2: Sises uya mɨrɨ pata nɨmɨ ' pʉ pata Taya itese ' pʉ ' kʉ pona , mɨrɨpan ewomʉ ' pʉ ɨutɨ ta ' , ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ti ' tu i ' se pʉra rɨ iyesi ' pʉ , mɨrɨ yau iyesi tukai ' , e ' tane iye ' so ' namʉ poken pʉra rɨ iyesi ' pʉ .

text: For a certain woman , whose young daughter had an unclean spirit , heard of him , and came and fell at his feet :
text2: Inke pʉra rɨ etasa ' tʉuya a ' tai , aiko rʉ ' kwɨ makoi a ' kwarʉ yen imʉre uri ' san uyee ' pʉ i ' ta piya ' ata ' mo ' kai ' .

text: The woman was a Greek , a Syrophenician by nation ; and she besought him that he would cast forth the devil out of her daughter .
text2: Pʉse rɨ uri ' san esi ' pʉ ka ' kʉran pe , tʉron nɨ pata winon , iyentusa ' Poni ' siya , Siriya yawon yau , mɨrɨpan uya Sises pawana ' tɨ ' pʉ ɨri a ' kwarʉ enpa ' kato ' pe iya tʉmʉre yapai .

text: But Jesus said unto her , Let the children first be filled : for it is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it unto the dogs .
text2: “ Wapiya mʉre amʉ ' nenta ' nakapʉi tanporo i ' se te ' to ' kon pe , apʉne pʉra ipoken pʉra iyesi mʉre amʉ ' yu pʉreti eno ' ma to ' ikʉn non pero amʉ ' ena ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And she answered and said unto him , Yes , Lord : yet the dogs under the table eat of the children ' s crumbs .
text2: “ Ewai ' , Epuru , e ' tane pero amʉ ' tepʉrʉ o ' non kon nɨ mʉre amʉ ' i ' kiyari punu ' pɨ pɨ ' tenta ' nasan ko , ” ta ' pʉ uri ' san uya .

text: And he said unto her , For this saying go thy way ; the devil is gone out of thy daughter .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Mɨrɨ kasa uyei ' sa ' auya pɨ ' , enna ' pokɨ pata pona ; ɨri a ' kwarʉ utɨkaa ' pʉ man ɨmʉre yapai , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when she was come to her house , she found the devil gone out , and her daughter laid upon the bed .
text2: Mɨrɨpan si enna ' pokaa ' pʉ pata pona , mɨrɨpan uya tʉmʉre e ' pɨrinkasa ' te ' kwe ' po eporo ' pʉ , ɨri a ' kwarʉ rɨ si epa ' kakaa ' pʉ esi ' pʉ iyapai .

text: And again , departing from the coasts of Tyre and Sidon , he came unto the sea of Galilee , through the midst of the coasts of Decapolis .
text2: Sises utɨ ' pʉ pata Taya pʉ ' kʉ poi , mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ Saitan poro parau ku ' pɨri Kiyarari poro , itɨ esi ' pʉ Te ' ka ' pores nono awɨrɨ ' ne rɨ .

text: And they bring unto him one that was deaf , and had an impediment in his speech ; and they beseech him to put his hand upon him .
text2: Tʉron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uya ipana pʉn , tʉusauro ' sen pen ka ' pon nee ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya Sises ekama ' po ' pʉ temiyatʉ tʉto ' pe iya ipona .

text: And he took him aside from the multitude , and put his fingers into his ears , and he spit , and touched his tongue ;
text2: Mɨrɨpan arɨ ' pʉ iya anpisin ton piyapai tikin sarɨ , temiyatʉ muku ' pɨ tʉrʉ ' pʉ iya ipana ya ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyeta ' ta ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya iyani a ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ .

text: And looking up to heaven , he sighed , and saith unto him , Ephphatha , that is , Be opened .
text2: Mɨrɨpan Sises uya tenu tʉrʉ ' pʉ ka ' winɨkʉi ' , mɨrɨpan uya e ' se ' ne ' pe teruparu enpa ' ka pe ta ' pʉ iya ka ' pon pɨ ' , “ E ' pa ' ta ! ” ( “ Ata ' koka ' ! ” ta e ' kwa pe ) .

text: And straightway his ears were opened , and the string of his tongue was loosed , and he spake plain .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai rɨ , ipana uta ' koka ' pʉ , iyani ekoneka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan usaurokʉ ' pʉ ɨ ' rɨ anpokʉmanin pʉra rɨ .

text: And he charged them that they should tell no man : but the more he charged them , so much the more a great deal they published it ;
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon nɨ panama ' pʉ iya , ipɨ ' to ' usauro ' pɨtʉ namai ' ɨnʉ ' yan pokon pe rɨ , e ' tane miyarɨ rɨ to ' apiyo ' ma tane iya , miyarɨ rɨ to ' uya ekama ' pʉ .

text: And were beyond measure astonished , saying , He hath done all things well : he maketh both the deaf to hear , and the dumb to speak .
text2: Mɨrɨpan tanporon kon nɨ etanin nʉ ' san usewansiuka ' pʉ ipan pe rɨ : “ Ɨ ' rɨ kasa wakʉ pe rɨ tanporon nɨ kupʉ iya . Ipana pʉn koneka iya etanin pe ; imaimu pʉn koneka iya tʉusauro ' sen pe ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: In those days the multitude being very great , and having nothing to eat , Jesus called his disciples unto him , and saith unto them ,
text2: Inke kuru pʉra rɨ mɨrɨ tʉpo , tʉron kon kanan anpisin ton amʉrakaa ' pʉ . To ' enta ' nato ' ipɨ ' pʉra iyesi pɨ ' , Sises uya tʉpoitorʉ ton kɨ ' ma ' pʉ tʉpiya ' , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ ,

text: I have compassion on the multitude , because they have now been with me three days , and have nothing to eat :
text2: “ Usentu ' mayai ' pʉsamoro ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' , apʉne pʉra uya ' kɨrɨ to ' e ' sa ' pɨ ' osorʉwau wʉi , mɨrɨpan kon enta ' nato ' ipɨ ' pʉra rɨ si iyesi .

text: And if I send them away fasting to their own houses , they will faint by the way : for divers of them came from far .
text2: To ' enno ' sa ' uya a ' tai to ' tewe ' se pʉra pata pona to ' nin utɨpɨtʉ mɨrɨ yai tʉutɨ kon koro ' tau apʉne pʉra tʉron kon uye ' sa ' ɨnnɨ rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And his disciples answered him , From whence can a man satisfy these men with bread here in the wilderness ?
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Nai yau rɨ tʉ ' kenan yau pʉsamoro ka ' pon amʉ ' ewe ' to ' ike eporo serɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he asked them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven .
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨ kaisa rɨ pʉreti nai ɨpiyau ' nokon ? ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya . To ' uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ 7 kaisa rɨ rɨken , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he commanded the people to sit down on the ground : and he took the seven loaves , and gave thanks , and brake , and gave to his disciples to set before them ; and they did set them before the people .
text2: Anpisin ton apiyo ' ma ' pʉ iya to ' ereutapɨ ' to ' pe non pona , mɨrɨpan 7 kaisaron nʉ ' kwɨ rɨken itekiino pʉreti anʉmʉ ' pʉ iya , tenki ta ' pʉ iya Papa pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan i ' kwɨ ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ iya . Itʉrʉ ' pʉ iya tʉpoitorʉ ton ena ' , to ' uya ekanto ' pe anpisin ton ena ' , mɨrɨpan nɨ kupʉ ' pʉ ipoitorʉ ton uya .

text: And they had a few small fishes : and he blessed , and commanded to set them also before them .
text2: To ' piyau kanan aiko ton nʉ ' kwɨ tu ' kan kon pen moro ' amʉ ' esi ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ pɨ ' tenki ta ' pʉ Sises uya , mɨrɨpan kon ekanto ' pe tʉpoitorʉ ton uya kanan ikupʉ ' pʉ iya .

text: So they did eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets .
text2: Tanporon kon enta ' na ' pʉ ta ' wetapɨ ' se , mɨrɨ yau 4 , 000 kaisa rɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' esi ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan ipoitorʉ ton uya ipʉ ' kʉ rʉ ' san iye ' nonkasa ' rʉ ' pʉ entɨ ' pʉ 7 kaisaron pa ' siki ' ti tʉpe ' ke ' ne . Sises uya nin si ka ' pon amʉ ' ennoko ' pʉ mɨrɨ ,

text: And straightway he entered into a ship with his disciples , and came into the parts of Dalmanutha .
text2: mɨrɨpan ekanwa ' tɨ ' pʉ kanau ya ' mɨrɨ a ' tai rɨ tʉpoitorʉ ton pokon pe , mɨrɨpan kon utɨ ' pʉ Tarʉmanu ' ta nono pʉ ' kʉ pona .

text: And the Pharisees came forth , and began to question with him , seeking of him a sign from heaven , tempting him .
text2: Pari ' si amʉ ' uyee ' pʉ mɨrɨpan kon e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ Sises ekama ' popɨtʉ pɨ ' . I ' tupɨtʉ pe to ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ i ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ Epʉn winon pɨ ' .

text: And he sighed deeply in his spirit , and saith , Why doth this generation seek after a sign ? verily I say unto you , There shall no sign be given unto this generation .
text2: Sises uya e ' se ' ne ' pe teruparu enpa ' ka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' serɨ a ' taino kon uya eke Papa tʉrawasooi , ui ' tuto ' tʉuya ' nokon ipɨkɨrɨ ekama ' po ? I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; mɨrɨ waraino i ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ tʉrʉ pen nɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he left them , and entering into the ship again departed to the other side .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon tʉnɨnse iyenna ' po ' pʉ kanau ya ' , mɨrɨpan e ' kwɨrɨtʉ ' pʉ iratoi pona .

text: Now the disciples had forgotten to take bread , neither had they in the ship with them more than one loaf .
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton upu ' tɨkaa ' pʉ esi ' pʉ tu ' ke pʉreti arɨ to ' uya pʉra , tikin nɨ rɨken to ' piyau iyesi ' pʉ kanau yau .

text: And he charged them , saying , Take heed , beware of the leaven of the Pharisees , and of the leaven of Herod .
text2: “ Ti ' tui ' e ' tɨ ' ; tense e ' tɨ ' Pari ' si amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Era ' uya pʉrowa a ' sarutanʉ ' to ' ike pɨ ' , ” tukai ' to ' panama ' pʉ iya .

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have no bread .
text2: To ' e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ usauro ' nɨ pɨ ' tiwano ' kon pe . “ Apʉne pʉra pʉreti pʉra iyesi pɨ ' isaurokʉ mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And when Jesus knew it , he saith unto them , Why reason ye , because ye have no bread ? perceive ye not yet , neither understand ? have ye your heart yet hardened ?
text2: To ' usauro ' to ' i ' tu tʉuya pɨ ' to ' ekama ' po ' pʉ iya , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' ausaurokʉ kon pʉreti pʉra ɨwesi kon pɨ ' ? Ene auya ' nokon pʉra rɨ pe ' , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ auya ' nokon pʉra rɨ pe ' iyesi ? Ɨyewan kon nɨ usa ' manta ?

text: Having eyes , see ye not ? and having ears , hear ye not ? and do ye not remember ?
text2: Tenu ke rɨ pe ' ɨwe ' tane ' nokon ene auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi ? Tʉpana ke rɨ , e ' tane eta auya ' nokon pʉra rɨ ? Ɨyenu kon yau pʉra nai ?

text: When I brake the five loaves among five thousand , how many baskets full of fragments took ye up ? They say unto him , Twelve .
text2: 5 kaisaron pʉreti si ' kwɨ ' pɨ ' taine ' a ' tai 5 , 000 kaisaron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' iwano ' pe , ɨ ' rɨ kaisa rɨ pa ' siki ' ti amʉ ' tʉpe ' tɨpɨ ' se ipʉ ' kʉ rʉ ' san mentɨta ' tʉi ? ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' . “ 12 kaisa rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And when the seven among four thousand , how many baskets full of fragments took ye up ? And they said , Seven .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ 7 kaisaron pʉreti si ' kwɨ ' pɨ ' taine ' a ' tai 4 , 000 kaisaron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' iwano ' pe , ɨ ' rɨ kaisa rɨ pa ' siki ' ti amʉ ' tʉpe ' tɨpɨ ' se ipʉ ' kʉ rʉ ' san e ' nonkasa ' mentɨta ' tʉi ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . “ 7 kaisa rɨ , ” tukai ' to ' uya eikʉ ' pʉ .

text: And he said unto them , How is it that ye do not understand ?
text2: Ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ Ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ auya ' nokon pʉra rɨ marɨ pe ' iyesi ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he cometh to Bethsaida ; and they bring a blind man unto him , and besought him to touch him .
text2: To ' uyee ' pʉ Pe ' saita pona , mɨrɨ yau ka ' pon amʉ ' uya tenku ' nan ka ' pon nee ' pʉ Sises piya ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya ipawana ' tɨ ' pʉ a ' pɨ ' to ' pe iya .

text: And he took the blind man by the hand , and led him out of the town ; and when he had spit on his eyes , and put his hands upon him , he asked him if he saw ought .
text2: Sises uya tenku ' nan arɨ ' pʉ itemiyatʉ pɨ ' ta ' sii ' eke iwa pata yapai , mɨrɨpan enu ya ' teta ' tapɨtʉ tʉpo , temiyatʉ tʉrʉ ' pʉ iya ipona , mɨrɨpan uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ rɨ pe ' menyan ? ” ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' .

text: And he looked up , and said , I see men as trees , walking .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya tenu tʉrʉ ' pʉ ka ' ta ' , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ , “ Ewai ' , ka ' pon amʉ ' senyai ' , e ' tane to ' usene yʉi amʉ ' usarɨ kasa rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: After that he put his hands again upon his eyes , and made him look up : and he was restored , and saw every man clearly .
text2: Sises uya kanan temiyatʉ tʉkaa ' pʉ itenu pona . Serɨ a ' tai kuru si , wakʉ pe itenu ena ' pʉ mɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan uya tanporon nɨ ene ' pʉ wakʉ pe .

text: And he sent him away to his house , saying , Neither go into the town , nor tell it to any in the town .
text2: Sises uya ennoko ' pʉ ipata ' se ' ya ' , “ Kenna ' poi eke iwa pata pona , ” ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' .

text: And Jesus went out , and his disciples , into the towns of Caesarea Philippi : and by the way he asked his disciples , saying unto them , Whom do men say that I am ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan Sises mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipoitorʉ ton utɨ ' pʉ eke iwa ton pata Sisariya Piri ' pai oino ' nan pona . Asanta tau to ' ekama ' po ' pʉ iya , “ Ɨnʉ ' pe esi tukai ' ka ' pon amʉ ' nʉsauro ' an ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they answered , John the Baptist : but some say , Elias ; and others , One of the prophets .
text2: To ' uya entakanoma ' pʉ , “ Tʉron kon uya Isaan Pa ' tes pe ɨwesi ta ; tʉron kon uya Iraisa pe ɨwesi ta ; tʉron kon uya kuru rɨ kanan pu ' kena ' amʉ ' tonpa ta , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ? And Peter answereth and saith unto him , Thou art the Christ .
text2: “ E ' tane si ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon , ɨnʉ ' pe ken si esi mʉkayatʉu ? ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' . Pi ' ta uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨmɨrɨ kʉrɨ rɨ Kʉrai ! ” tukai ' .

text: And he charged them that they should tell no man of him .
text2: Sises uya to ' panama ' pʉ ɨnʉ ' pɨ ' rɨ to ' uya tekama namai ' .

text: And he began to teach them , that the Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected of the elders , and of the chief priests , and scribes , and be killed , and after three days rise again .
text2: To ' enupa pɨ ' iye ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ , Ka ' pon , Papa winon uya e ' ne ' moronkato ' oton eke pe rɨ , mɨrɨpan ewaruma ' tɨto ' oton Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton uya rɨ , use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton amʉ ' uya rɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Main pɨ ' enupanin nan uya rɨ nɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan wɨto ' oton , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iye ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' oton osorʉwau wʉi tʉpo tukai ' .

text: And he spake that saying openly . And Peter took him , and began to rebuke him .
text2: Serɨ ekama ' pʉ iya wakʉ pe kuru rɨ to ' pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan arɨ ' pʉ Pi ' ta uya esereme ' se ' na .

text: But when he had turned about and looked on his disciples , he rebuked Peter , saying , Get thee behind me , Satan : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but the things that be of men .
text2: E ' tane Sises era ' tɨsa ' a ' tai tʉpoitorʉ ton ense ' na , mɨrɨpan uya Pi ' ta eseremekʉ ' pʉ , “ Upiyapai enta , Se ' tan ! ” ta ' pʉ iya . “ Ɨusenuminkato ' esi ka ' pon usenuminkato ' pe , Papa usenuminkato ' kasa pʉra rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when he had called the people unto him with his disciples also , he said unto them , Whosoever will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya anpisin ton kɨ ' ma ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton pokon pe tʉpiya ' , “ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ uyepʉ pe iyesi yau uye ' ma ' pʉ pe , tɨwɨ tʉpɨ ' rɨ tʉupu ' tɨka ' se , tʉkurusukuui tanʉnse nʉyepʉi upɨkɨrɨ .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it ; but whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel ' s , the same shall save it .
text2: Apʉne pʉra ɨnʉ ' rɨ kʉrɨ tʉuko ' manto ' ɨnnonkapai pʉra na ' ne ' uya tʉuko ' manto ' rɨ nonka mɨrɨ , e ' tane ɨnʉ ' rɨ tʉuko ' manto ' nonka pɨ ' na ' ne ' upɨkɨrɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wakʉ itekare pɨkɨrɨ uya inonka pen mɨrɨ .

text: For what shall it profit a man , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ?
text2: Wakʉ pe pe ' ka ' pon esi tanporo non pon eponin ta ' kwarʉ nonkai ' ma ? Kane ku !

text: Or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: Mɨrɨ pe pʉra , ɨ ' rɨ tʉrʉ iya ta ' kwarʉ entakano ' pe ?

text: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation ; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed , when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ ɨpiyɨtʉ yau upɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ umaimu ton pɨ ' , serɨ iyemari ' masa ' ekumankanin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨri ton serɨ a ' taino kon weyu a ' tai ' ne , Ka ' pon , Papa winon nɨrɨ ɨpiyɨtʉ mɨrɨ ipɨ ' , tʉuyepʉ a ' tai tʉkʉipʉnʉ meruntɨrʉ yau mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wakʉ ton nɨ inserʉ amʉ ' pokon pe , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That there be some of them that stand here , which shall not taste of death , till they have seen the kingdom of God come with power .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , serɨ yau iye ' soto ' pɨ ' sa ' na ' ne ' nan tonpa ton eri ' to ' oton pen nɨ Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe uyepʉ meruntɨ pe ene tʉuya ' nokon rawɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And after six days Jesus taketh with him Peter , and James , and John , and leadeth them up into an high mountain apart by themselves : and he was transfigured before them .
text2: 6 kaisa rɨ wʉi tʉpo , Sises uya Pi ' ta , Isens mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Isaan pokon arɨ ' pʉ ta ' kɨrɨ . To ' arɨ ' pʉ iya ka ' tawon nɨ wʉ ' pona tʉ ' kenan yau to ' e ' to ' pe . Mɨrɨ yau to ' esi koro ' tau , isensima ' pʉ .

text: And his raiment became shining , exceeding white as snow ; so as no fuller on earth can white them .
text2: Ipon ena ' pʉ sirɨn pe aimu ' ne , ipan pe rɨ aimu ' ne ɨnʉ ' rɨ serɨ non pon uya ikorʉkasa ' uya aimu ' nakasa ' entai rɨ .

text: And there appeared unto them Elias with Moses : and they were talking with Jesus .
text2: Mɨrɨpan mɨrɨ yau Iraisa mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Mosi ' pokon usenpoika ' pʉ to ' rakʉi ' , Sises auro ' ka pɨ ' to ' esi ' pʉ .

text: And Peter answered and said to Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Pi ' ta uya ta ' pʉ Sises pɨ ' , “ Rapai , wakʉ rɨ pan pe rɨ serɨ yau ina man . Tɨwɨ osorʉwau ɨiwʉ ' kon oton amɨi ina — tikin nɨ ɨiwʉ ' pe , Mosi ' iwʉ ' pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Iraisa iwʉ ' pe . ”

text: For he wist not what to say ; for they were sore afraid .
text2: ( Mɨrɨ ta tʉuya tukai ' i ' tu iya pʉra rɨ iyesi ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra kʉrɨ rɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉron kon etʉipɨ ' sa ' esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ pɨ ' . )

text: And there was a cloud that overshadowed them : and a voice came out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , kapuru ' usenpoika ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya to ' nɨpontɨ ' pʉ . Main uyee ' pʉ kapuru ' apai , “ Umu pʉse rɨ , Uni ' nʉnkanʉ . Imaimu etatɨ ' ! ” tawon .

text: And suddenly , when they had looked round about , they saw no man any more , save Jesus only with themselves .
text2: Mɨ awɨrɨ tenu kon tʉpɨ ' tane to ' uya , ɨnʉ ' pʉra rɨ iyesi ' pʉ . Sises rɨken esi ' pʉ to ' piyau .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , he charged them that they should tell no man what things they had seen , till the Son of man were risen from the dead .
text2: Wʉ ' ponsi ' kɨ tʉu ' tɨ kon koro ' tau , Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Ɨnʉ ' pɨ ' rɨ ɨnene ' pʉ kon kʉsekamatʉu , Ka ' pon , Papa winon eri ' sa ' e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they kept that saying with themselves , questioning one with another what the rising from the dead should mean .
text2: Imaimu awɨrɨ to ' esi ' pʉ , e ' tane tiwano ' kon pe to ' usekama ' popɨtʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ pɨ ' , ɨ ' rɨ ta e ' kwa pe , “ eri ' nɨsa ' e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ , ” ta esi tukai ' .

text: And they asked him , saying , Why say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe ken iyesi pɨ ' Main pɨ ' enupanin nan uya Iraisa kuru uye ' to ' oton wapiya ta ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he answered and told them , Elias verily cometh first , and restoreth all things ; and how it is written of the Son of man , that he must suffer many things , and be set at nought .
text2: To ' entakanoma ' pʉ iya , “ I ' napairɨ rɨ Iraisa uyepʉ wapiya tanporon nɨ konekai ' iyesi ' pʉ ya ' . Ɨ ' rɨto ' pe iye ' menukasa ' Ka ' pon , Papa winon ekota ' mato ' oton ipan pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ewaruma ' tɨto ' oton ta ?

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is indeed come , and they have done unto him whatsoever they listed , as it is written of him .
text2: E ' tane nin si ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , Iraisa uye ' ka ' sa ' , mɨrɨpan pɨ ' i ' se te ' to ' kon ku ' sa ' to ' uya ipɨ ' iye ' menukasa ' na ' ne ' kasa rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when he came to his disciples , he saw a great multitude about them , and the scribes questioning with them .
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton tonpa ton piya ' to ' uye ' sa ' a ' tai , anpisin ton nɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' ene ' pʉ to ' uya to ' oi . Main pɨ ' enupanin nan e ' sei ' pɨtʉ esi ' pʉ to ' pokon pe .

text: And straightway all the people , when they beheld him , were greatly amazed , and running to him saluted him .
text2: Sises ensa ' tanporon kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uya a ' tai , ipan pe rɨ to ' usewansiuka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon eka ' tumʉ ' pʉ ipiya ' , “ Miyarɨ ” ka ' se ' na ipɨ ' .

text: And he asked the scribes , What question ye with them ?
text2: Tʉpoitorʉ ton ekama ' po ' pʉ Sises uya , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' to ' pokon pe ɨye ' sei ' pɨtʉ kon ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And one of the multitude answered and said , Master , I have brought unto thee my son , which hath a dumb spirit ;
text2: Anpisin ton koro ' tawon ka ' pon uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ti ' sa , umu ne ' sa ' uya ɨpiya ' , apʉne pʉra ɨri a ' kwarʉ esi iyau , mɨrɨpan uya imaimu ' kasa ' .

text: And wheresoever he taketh him , he teareth him : and he foameth , and gnasheth with his teeth , and pineth away : and I spake to thy disciples that they should cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Mɨrɨ ɨri a ' kwarʉ e ' sara ' tɨ a ' tai , eno ' ma iya non pona . Inta a ' koronta , tʉyɨ kɨtɨtɨi ' ma iya , mɨrɨpan e ' sitɨnka . Ɨpoitorʉ ton ekama ' po ' pʉ uya to ' uya enpa ' kato ' pe , e ' tane to ' uya ikupʉ poken pʉra iyesi ' pʉ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: He answereth him , and saith , O faithless generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him unto me .
text2: “ Ɨri sɨ , apurɨnin nan pen nɨ serɨ a ' taino kon ! Ɨ ' rɨ pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ ɨpiyau ' nokon esi ? Ɨ ' rɨ pʉ ' kʉ pona aya ' kɨrɨ ' nokon esi ? Ine ' tɨ ' upiya ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they brought him unto him : and when he saw him , straightway the spirit tare him ; and he fell on the ground , and wallowed foaming .
text2: To ' uya inee ' pʉ ipiya ' . Ɨri a ' kwarʉ uya Sises ensa ' a ' tai , inke pʉra warawo ' mʉre ennoko ' pʉ iya yai . Ita ' mo ' ka ' pʉ non pona , mɨrɨpan e ' rakairakaima ' pʉ , inta a ' koronta ' pʉ .

text: And he asked his father , How long is it ago since this came unto him ? And he said , Of a child .
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨ a ' tai serɨ kasa iyesi e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ ? ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya ikʉipʉnʉ pɨ ' . “ Mʉre pe iyesi ' pʉ si ' kɨrɨ rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And ofttimes it hath cast him into the fire , and into the waters , to destroy him : but if thou canst do any thing , have compassion on us , and help us .
text2: “ Inke rɨ iwɨnɨ i ' se iye ' pɨ ' sa ' mɨrɨ teno ' mapɨ ' se apo ' ya ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tuna ka ' . Ina pɨ ' ɨsentu ' ma ' , ina ipika ' tɨ ' , ikupʉ auya poken iyesi yau , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou canst believe , all things are possible to him that believeth .
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨ ta auya e ' kwa pe iyesi , ‘ Ikupʉ auya poken iyesi yau , ’ mʉkayai ' ne ' ? Tanporon nɨ e ' kupʉ apurɨnin nan pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And straightway the father of the child cried out , and said with tears , Lord , I believe ; help thou mine unbelief .
text2: Inke pʉra warawo ' mʉre kʉipʉnʉ uya tʉukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉmʉ pe , “ Apurɨ uya rɨ ; upika ' tɨkɨ apurɨnin pe pʉra e ' to ' entai enato ' pe ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: When Jesus saw that the people came running together , he rebuked the foul spirit , saying unto him , Thou dumb and deaf spirit , I charge thee , come out of him , and enter no more into him .
text2: Sises uya anpisin uyepʉ a ' ko pe tʉpiya ' ene a ' tai , ɨri a ' kwarʉ eseremekʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Ipana pʉn mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ imaimu pʉn a ' kwarʉ , kʉrɨ rɨ warawo ' mʉre apai epa ' kakɨ . Mɨrɨ tʉpo , iya ' kanan kewomʉi , ” ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' .

text: And the spirit cried , and rent him sore , and came out of him : and he was as one dead ; insomuch that many said , He is dead .
text2: Ɨri a ' kwarʉ upirorʉmʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya warawo ' mʉre ennoko ' pʉ yai ipan pe , mɨrɨpan epa ' ka ' pʉ . Warawo ' mʉre esi ' pʉ eke ' kasa , mɨrɨpan tu ' kan kon uya , “ Iyeri ' sa ' , ” ta ' pʉ .

text: But Jesus took him by the hand , and lifted him up ; and he arose .
text2: E ' tane Sises uya warawo ' mʉre anʉmʉ ' pʉ itemiyatʉ pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ .

text: And when he was come into the house , his disciples asked him privately , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Sises ewomʉ ' pʉ tʉpo , ipoitorʉ ton uya ekama ' po ' pʉ ama ' ai , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe ken si iyesi pɨ ' ina uya enpa ' ka pʉra iyesi ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he said unto them , This kind can come forth by nothing , but by prayer and fasting .
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨ pen nɨ , ɨpʉreman uya rɨken serɨ rupɨ enpa ' ka , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And they departed thence , and passed through Galilee ; and he would not that any man should know it .
text2: Mɨrɨ pata nɨmɨ ' pʉ to ' uya , mɨrɨpan kon utɨ ' pʉ Kiyarari poro . Sises esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ yau tesi tukai ' ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ti ' tu i ' se pʉra ,

text: For he taught his disciples , and said unto them , The Son of man is delivered into the hands of men , and they shall kill him ; and after that he is killed , he shall rise the third day .
text2: apʉne pʉra tʉpoitorʉ ton enupa tʉuya pɨ ' . Ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ Ka ' pon , Papa winon eparankato ' oton ka ' pon amʉ ' ena ' . To ' uya iwɨto ' oton , e ' tane itosorʉwano wʉi pata ' pʉ pe iye ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' oton , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But they understood not that saying , and were afraid to ask him .
text2: E ' tane to ' uya ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ pʉra rɨ iyesi ' pʉ , ɨ ' rɨ ta iya e ' kwa pe iyesi tukai ' , mɨrɨpan kon enari ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ pɨ ' ɨnekama ' popai pʉra .

text: And he came to Capernaum : and being in the house he asked them , What was it that ye disputed among yourselves by the way ?
text2: To ' utɨ ' pʉ Ka ' paneyan pona . Tewomʉ tʉpo , Sises uya tʉpoitorʉ ton ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' me ' sei ' pɨ ' tʉune ' asanta tau ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But they held their peace : for by the way they had disputed among themselves , who should be the greatest .
text2: E ' tane to ' uya eikʉ pʉra iyesi ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra asanta tau ɨnʉ ' esi eke pe kuru tukai ' to ' e ' sei ' pɨtʉ esi ' pʉ .

text: And he sat down , and called the twelve , and saith unto them , If any man desire to be first , the same shall be last of all , and servant of all .
text2: Sises ereuta ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya 12 kaisaron kon tʉpoitorʉ ton kɨ ' ma ' pʉ , “ Wapiya e ' pai na ' ne ' e ' to ' pe iyesi , iu ' matʉ yau mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporon kon poitorʉ pe iye ' to ' pe iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he took a child , and set him in the midst of them : and when he had taken him in his arms , he said unto them ,
text2: Temekon tʉtʉse iwoi mʉre ta ' sii ' isoto ' ka ' pʉ iya to ' koro ' tau , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' ,

text: Whosoever shall receive one of such children in my name , receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me , receiveth not me , but him that sent me .
text2: “ Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ pʉsamoro mʉre amʉ ' tonpa ereutanʉkʉ pe iyesi yau uyese ' yau , urɨ rɨ ereutanʉkʉ iya pe iyesi ; mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ urɨ ereutanʉkʉ pe iyesi yau , urɨ rɨken ereutanʉkʉ iya pen mɨrɨ , kʉrɨ uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ kanan ereutanʉkʉ iya pe iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And John answered him , saying , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name , and he followeth not us : and we forbad him , because he followeth not us .
text2: “ Ti ' sa , ” ta ' pʉ Isaan uya , “ Ka ' pon ene ' pʉ ina uya ɨyese ' yau makoi a ' kwarʉ ton enpa ' kapɨ ' nin . Iyereutato ' pe ina uya ikupʉ ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra urɨ ' nokon tonpa pe pʉra iyesi pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But Jesus said , Forbid him not : for there is no man which shall do a miracle in my name , that can lightly speak evil of me .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Kʉsereutanʉ ' tʉu , apʉne pʉra ɨnʉ ' rɨ eke Papa tʉrawasooi ku ' nin nʉ ' pʉ uyese ' yau usaurokʉ poken pʉra iyesi mɨrɨ tʉpo ɨri pe upɨ ' .

text: For he that is not against us is on our part .
text2: Uyewa ' noma iya ' nokon pʉra na ' ne ' esi mɨrɨ uwenaino ' kon pe rɨ .

text: For whosoever shall give you a cup of water to drink in my name , because ye belong to Christ , verily I say unto you , he shall not lose his reward .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , ɨnʉ ' rɨ tuna ke ɨwo ' payai ' ne ' nokon uyese ' yau apʉne pʉra Kʉrai iwano ' pe ɨwesi kon pɨ ' , tepe ' pʉ nonka iya pen kuru rɨ mɨrɨ .

text: And whosoever shall offend one of these little ones that believe in me , it is better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he were cast into the sea .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ pʉsamoro uyapurɨnin nan aiko ton nʉ ' kwɨ tonpa e ' makoima emapu ' tɨsa ' yau , wakʉ iwa pe rɨ iyesi parau ka ' eno ' ma eke rɨ a ' nai ' e ' pato ' ike ewa ' tɨsa ' i ' mʉ pɨ ' esa ' pe .

text: And if thy hand offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter into life maimed , than having two hands to go into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Ɨyemiyatʉ uya ɨye ' makoima emapu ' tɨ pe iyesi yau , a ' tɨkɨ . Wakʉ iwa pe rɨ iyesi itemiyatʉ pʉra esii ' ma tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko ' man nɨto ' ya ' ɨyepa ' ka a ' tai , tanporo temiyatʉ ke ekota ' man nɨto ' ya ' ɨutɨ entai , apo ' usenkʉ ' to ' pen nɨ ya ' .

text: And if thy foot offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter halt into life , than having two feet to be cast into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ a ' ta uya ɨye ' makoima emapu ' tɨ pe iyesi yau , a ' tɨkɨ . Wakʉ iwa pe rɨ iyesi i ' ta pʉra esii ' ma tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko ' man nɨto ' ya ' ɨyepa ' ka a ' tai , ti ' ta ke ɨyeno ' ma entai ya ' mu pʉn ekota ' man nɨto ' ya ' .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out : it is better for thee to enter into the kingdom of God with one eye , than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire :
text2: Ɨyenu uya ɨye ' makoima emapu ' tɨ pe iyesi yau , imo ' kakɨ . Wakʉ iwa pe rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ tikin nɨ itenu tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko ' man nɨto ' ya ' ɨyepa ' ka a ' tai , asa ' rɨ itenu ɨyeno ' ma entai ya ' mu pʉn ekota ' man nɨto ' ya ' .

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: Mɨrɨ yau , “ ‘ to ' weruweei erikʉ pen nɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ apo ' usenkʉ ' nʉkʉ pen nɨ . ’

text: For every one shall be salted with fire , and every sacrifice shall be salted with salt .
text2: Tanporon kon nɨ e ' ne ' ne ' ma mɨrɨ apo ' ke .

text: Salt is good : but if the salt have lost his saltness , wherewith will ye season it ? Have salt in yourselves , and have peace one with another .
text2: “ Waiyo esi wakʉ , e ' tane ine ' ne ' pe pʉra iyenasa ' yau , nai kasa ken si ine ' ne ' pe kanan iye ' to ' pe iku ' kapʉ auya ? Waiyo iku ' tɨ ' ayau ' nokon , tʉusewankamai ' pʉra ɨko ' mantɨ ' ɨtonpa kon amʉ ' pokon pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he arose from thence , and cometh into the coasts of Judaea by the farther side of Jordan : and the people resort unto him again ; and , as he was wont , he taught them again .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya mɨrɨ pata nɨmɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ Isutiya nono pe te ' sen ya ' tuna Isotan ratoi pon anpisin pe rɨ kanan ka ' pon amʉ ' uye ' kaa ' pʉ ipiya ' , mɨrɨpan kon enupa ' pʉ iya , teseru yau rɨ .

text: And the Pharisees came to him , and asked him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife ? tempting him .
text2: Pari ' si amʉ ' tonpa ton uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya i ' tupɨtʉ ' pʉ ekama ' popɨtʉ tʉuya ' nokon winɨ , “ Main awɨrɨ rɨ e ' nɨ pe rɨ pe ' iyesi ka ' pon uya tʉno ' pʉ nonka a ' tai ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he answered and said unto them , What did Moses command you ?
text2: Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ to ' ekama ' po pe , “ Ɨ ' rɨ tawon ken Main tʉrʉ ' pʉ Mosi ' uya ɨyena ' nokon ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they said , Moses suffered to write a bill of divorcement , and to put her away .
text2: To ' uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Mosi ' uya itʉsa ' ka ' pon uya e ' nonkan nɨto ' karetaai tʉmenukai ' tʉno ' pʉ enno ' to ' pe tasa ' iya , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , For the hardness of your heart he wrote you this precept .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Mosi ' uya serɨ main menuka ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra sa ' man pe rɨ ɨyewan kon esi pɨ ' .

text: But from the beginning of the creation God made them male and female .
text2: E ' tane iye ' kapʉ epiya ' tɨ yau , ‘ Papa uya warawo ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uri ' san kaa ' pʉ , ’ tasa ' iya .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and cleave to his wife ;
text2: ‘ Mɨrɨ wenai , warawo ' uya tʉkʉipʉnʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉsan nɨnto ' esi , mɨrɨpan uta ' sikʉ tʉno ' pʉ ya ' ,

text: And they twain shall be one flesh : so then they are no more twain , but one flesh .
text2: mɨrɨpan asa ' ron kon ena tikin nɨ ipun , ’ tasa ' iya . Asa ' rɨ to ' esi pen , e ' tane tikin nɨ to ' esi .

text: What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , Papa na ' sikʉ ' san ɨsipona mo ' ka ka ' pon uya kʉse ' nin , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And in the house his disciples asked him again of the same matter .
text2: To ' enna ' posa ' a ' tai ɨutɨ ta ' , ipoitorʉ ton uya serɨ pɨ ' ekama ' po ' pʉ .

text: And he saith unto them , Whosoever shall put away his wife , and marry another , committeth adultery against her .
text2: Eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ tʉno ' pʉ nonkayai ' ne ' mɨrɨpan uya tʉron nɨ uri ' san mari ' ma ekuma pe iyesi tʉno ' pʉ piyapai .

text: And if a woman shall put away her husband , and be married to another , she committeth adultery .
text2: Mɨrɨpan tʉtaan ' pʉ nonka iya pe iyesi yau mɨrɨpan uya tʉron nɨ warawo ' mari ' ma yau , iyekuma pe rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they brought young children to him , that he should touch them : and his disciples rebuked those that brought them .
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' uya mʉre amʉ ' nee ' pʉ Sises piya ' to ' a ' pɨ ' to ' pe iya , e ' tane ipoitorʉ ton uya to ' eseremekʉ ' pʉ .

text: But when Jesus saw it , he was much displeased , and said unto them , Suffer the little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Sises uya ensa ' a ' tai , isakorota ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' , “ Tɨwɨ mʉre amʉ ' nʉyepʉi upiya ' . To ' kʉsereutanʉ ' tʉu , apʉne pʉra Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe esi pʉsamoro waraino kon iwano ' pe .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child , he shall not enter therein .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , ɨnʉ ' rɨ kʉrɨ Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe eporo iya pʉra na ' ne ' mʉre kasa te ' se ewonto ' oton pen nɨ ya ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he took them up in his arms , put his hands upon them , and blessed them .
text2: Mʉre amʉ ' anʉmʉ ' pʉ iya temekon pona , mɨrɨpan kon pona temiyatʉ tʉtʉse to ' pʉrema ' pʉ iya .

text: And when he was gone forth into the way , there came one running , and kneeled to him , and asked him , Good Master , what shall I do that I may inherit eternal life ?
text2: Utɨn pɨ ' Sises e ' sara ' tɨ koro ' tau , ka ' pon eka ' tunsa ' uyee ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan e ' sekunka ' pʉ irau , mɨrɨpan uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Wakʉ , Ti ' sa , ɨ ' rɨ kuru ku ' to ' uya esi tɨwɨrɨ uko ' man nɨto ' epoto ' pe uya ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God .
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' Wakʉ tukai ' uyesakʉ auya ? ” tukai ' Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ . “ Ɨnʉ ' wakʉ pʉra rɨ iyesi , e ' tane Papa rɨken .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Defraud not , Honour thy father and mother .
text2: Mosi ' nʉmenuka ' pʉ i ' tu auya : ‘ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ kʉ ' wɨnɨi , iyemari ' masa ' uri ' san kʉsekumankai , ama ' pe kesii , kasi pe ka ' pon pɨ ' kasaurokʉi , enku ' tɨnin pe kesii , ɨkʉipʉnʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ asan inamakɨ , ’ tawon , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he answered and said unto him , Master , all these have I observed from my youth .
text2: “ Ti ' sa , tanporo rɨ serɨ ton awɨrɨ e ' sa ' man mʉre ' esi ' pʉ si ' kɨrɨ rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then Jesus beholding him loved him , and said unto him , One thing thou lackest : go thy way , sell whatsoever thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , take up the cross , and follow me .
text2: Sises uya ene ' pʉ i ' nʉnka pe , “ Tikin nan nɨken e ' nonkasa ' man . Tanporo ɨpiyau na ' ne ' ikʉrʉpo ' pomata , mɨrɨpan epe ' pʉ tʉrʉ pa entu ' manin nan ena ' . Mɨrɨ a ' tai nin si , imaminke ' pe ɨwesi mɨrɨ Epʉn po . Mɨrɨ ku ' sa ' auya tʉpo , upɨkɨrɨ ɨuyepʉ pa , ” ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' .

text: And he was sad at that saying , and went away grieved : for he had great possessions .
text2: Mɨrɨ eta iya a ' tai , ika ' nɨ ' pʉra rɨ itemʉ ' ena ' pʉ . Pokoi pe itɨ ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra eke pe kuru itimamin esi ' pʉ .

text: And Jesus looked round about , and saith unto his disciples , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Sises uya tenu tʉpɨtʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' , “ Sa ' man pe kuru rɨ iyesi , imaminke ' ton epa ' ka poken pʉra Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe ya ' ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And the disciples were astonished at his words . But Jesus answereth again , and saith unto them , Children , how hard is it for them that trust in riches to enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton usewansiuka ' pʉ imaimu pɨ ' . E ' tane Sises uya takaa ' pʉ kanan , “ Mʉre amʉ ' , sa ' man pe kuru rɨ iyesi Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe ya ' epa ' kan poken pʉra .

text: It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Sa ' man pe pʉra rɨ kiyamerʉ epa ' ka akusa enu euta awɨrɨ , imaminke ' epa ' ka Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe ya ' entai , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they were astonished out of measure , saying among themselves , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Ipan pe miyarɨ rɨ mɨrɨ pɨ ' ipoitorʉ ton usewansiuka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon usekama ' popɨtʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨnʉ ' kuru ken si epika ' tɨ ? ” tukai ' .

text: And Jesus looking upon them saith , With men it is impossible , but not with God : for with God all things are possible .
text2: To ' enei ' ma Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Ka ' pon pona sa ' man pe iyesi , e ' tane Papa pona tanporo sa ' man pe pʉra iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then Peter began to say unto him , Lo , we have left all , and have followed thee .
text2: Pi ' ta uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Tanporon nɨ sa ' ne nɨnsa ' ina uya ɨpɨkɨrɨ tʉutɨto ' kon pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my sake , and the gospel ' s ,
text2: “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya , “ ɨnʉ ' rɨ kʉrɨ tʉpata ' se ' , takon non , tʉparusi ton , tʉsan , tʉkʉipʉnʉ , tʉmunkɨ amʉ ' mɨrɨ pe pʉra tʉmainarʉ nɨnsa ' iya na ' ne ' , urɨ pɨkɨrɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wakʉ itekare pɨkɨrɨ , uya

text: But he shall receive an hundredfold now in this time , houses , and brethren , and sisters , and mothers , and children , and lands , with persecutions ; and in the world to come eternal life .
text2: eke pe rɨ tepe ' pʉ eporo mɨrɨ , serɨ pe na ' ne ' entai rɨ — tʉpata ' se ' , takon non , tʉparusi ton , tʉsanon , tʉmunkɨ amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉmainarʉ rɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ewa ' noman nɨ nɨrɨ — mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ serɨ enta ' , tɨwɨ rɨ uko ' man nɨto ' eporo iya .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last first .
text2: Tu ' kan kon nɨ wapiya na ' ne ' nan e ' to ' oton iu ' matʉ pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iu ' matʉ pe iye ' sa ' kon nin si e ' to ' oton wapiya te ' ton kon pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they were in the way going up to Jerusalem ; and Jesus went before them : and they were amazed ; and as they followed , they were afraid . And he took again the twelve , and began to tell them what things should happen unto him ,
text2: To ' utɨ koro ' tau Surusiran pona , Sises to ' rawɨrɨ , ipoitorʉ ton usewansiukasa ' esi ' pʉ , to ' pɨkɨrɨ te ' san enari ' nʉntane . Sises uya kanan tʉpoitorʉ ton pantaka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya tʉpɨ ' te ' ku ' ton ekama ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' .

text: Saying , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be delivered unto the chief priests , and unto the scribes ; and they shall condemn him to death , and shall deliver him to the Gentiles :
text2: “ Utɨ ' nokon serɨ Surusiran pona . Mɨrɨ yau Ka ' pon , Papa winon eparankato ' oton use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Main pɨ ' enupanin nan ena ' , to ' uya eno ' mato ' oton ima ' tato ' ya ' , mɨrɨpan tʉto ' oton to ' uya Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen ena ' .

text: And they shall mock him , and shall scourge him , and shall spit upon him , and shall kill him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Kamoro uya nin si isapema mɨrɨ , to ' eta ' tapɨtʉ ipona , to ' uya ari ' po ' pɨtʉ ; mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' uya iwɨnɨ . Osorʉwau wʉi pata ' pʉ pe , iye ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' oton , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And James and John , the sons of Zebedee , come unto him , saying , Master , we would that thou shouldest do for us whatsoever we shall desire .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Isens mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Isaan , Sepiti munkɨ amʉ ' uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' , “ Ti ' sa , ɨ ' rɨ rɨ ina nekama ' poyai ' ne ' ɨpɨ ' kupʉ auya i ' se ina man ina iwano ' pe , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' .

text: And he said unto them , What would ye that I should do for you ?
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨ ken kupʉ uya i ' se me ' atʉu ɨiwano ' kon pe ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: They said unto him , Grant unto us that we may sit , one on thy right hand , and the other on thy left hand , in thy glory .
text2: “ Tɨwɨ tikin nɨ ɨyenwo ' netʉ winɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ akamisi winɨ ina nereutai ayapon po ɨyereutasa ' a ' tai kʉrore po , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' .

text: But Jesus said unto them , Ye know not what ye ask : can ye drink of the cup that I drink of ? and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ?
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' uyekama ' po auya ' nokon tukai ' i ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra rɨ iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya . “ Sensiyai ' ne ' ken pe ' ensi auya ' nokon , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨyepa ' taisima kon ken pe ' epa ' taisimayai ' ne ' ike ke ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they said unto him , We can . And Jesus said unto them , Ye shall indeed drink of the cup that I drink of ; and with the baptism that I am baptized withal shall ye be baptized :
text2: “ Ina uya rɨ ikupʉ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ I ' napairɨ rɨ unensinʉ rɨ ensi auya ' nokon , ɨyepa ' taisima kon nɨ epa ' taisimayai ' ne ' ke .

text: But to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give ; but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared .
text2: E ' tane ereutapai me ' atʉi ' ne ' uyenwo ' netʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ukamisi winɨ kupʉ uya poken pʉra iyesi . Serɨ esi mɨrɨ kamo to ' ku ' sa ' na ' ne ' nan Papa uya rɨ pata ' se ' pe iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when the ten heard it , they began to be much displeased with James and John .
text2: Kamo 10 kaisaron kon uya serɨ etasa ' a ' tai , Isens mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Isaan pokon pɨ ' to ' usakorota ' pʉ .

text: But Jesus called them to him , and saith unto them , Ye know that they which are accounted to rule over the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and their great ones exercise authority upon them .
text2: Sises uya tanporo to ' amʉranʉkʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ I ' tu auya ' nokon nɨ kamo itepuru pe na ' ne ' nan nɨ esi mɨrɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen epuru pe , mɨrɨpan eke ton uya tʉmerunitɨrʉ kon apurɨ to ' pɨ ' .

text: But so shall it not be among you : but whosoever will be great among you , shall be your minister :
text2: E ' tane mɨrɨ kasa ɨwesi kon pen . E ' tane ru ' ku , ɨnʉ ' rɨ esi yau eke pe enapai ɨ ' koro ' tau ' nokon e ' to ' pe iyesi ɨpoitorʉ kon pe ,

text: And whosoever of you will be the chiefest , shall be servant of all .
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨnʉ ' rɨ esi yau wapiyaro ' e ' pe e ' pai , tɨwɨ nesii tanporon kon apiyo ' pe .

text: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Ka ' pon , Papa winon uye ' sa ' mɨrɨ tapiyo ' pe e ' nɨto ' pe pen , e ' tane apiyo ' pe e ' se ' na , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉuko ' manto ' tʉse ' na tu ' kan kon ka ' pon amʉ ' epe ' pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they came to Jericho : and as he went out of Jericho with his disciples and a great number of people , blind Bartimaeus , the son of Timaeus , sat by the highway side begging .
text2: Iseri ' ko pona to ' uyee ' pʉ . Sises mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipoitorʉ ton mɨrɨ tʉpo anpisin ton ka ' pon amʉ ' uya mɨrɨ eke pata nɨmɨ koro ' tau , tenku ' nan ka ' pon , Pa ' timeyas itese ' ereutasa ' esi ' pʉ asanta ka ' ta po eta ' kwanʉn nɨ pɨ ' ( Timeyas mumu pe te ' sen ) .

text: And when he heard that it was Jesus of Nazareth , he began to cry out , and say , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Sises kʉrɨ rɨ Nasare ' pon tawon etasa ' tʉuya a ' tai , ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨ ' nɨ pɨ ' iye ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ , “ Sises , Tepi ' pa rʉ ' pʉ , upɨ ' ɨsentu ' makɨ ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And many charged him that he should hold his peace : but he cried the more a great deal , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Tu ' kan kon uya rɨ eseremekʉ ' pʉ e ' pana iye ' to ' pe , e ' tane rɨ miyarɨ rɨ ikɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉ ' pʉ , “ Tepi ' pa rʉ ' pʉ , upɨ ' ɨsentu ' makɨ ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus stood still , and commanded him to be called . And they call the blind man , saying unto him , Be of good comfort , rise ; he calleth thee .
text2: Sises e ' takʉ ' ka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya , “ Ikɨ ' matɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ . Mɨrɨpan kon uya nin si ikɨ ' ma ' pʉ , “ Epori ' ma ' ! E ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' ! Ɨkɨ ' ma iya , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' .

text: And he , casting away his garment , rose , and came to Jesus .
text2: Tʉpon pʉro ' pon nin si eno ' ma ' pʉ iya mɨrɨ , te ' sanʉmʉ pe iye ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uyee ' pʉ Sises piya ' .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , What wilt thou that I should do unto thee ? The blind man said unto him , Lord , that I might receive my sight .
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨ kupʉ uya i ' se me ' an ɨiwano ' pe ? ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya ipɨ ' . Tenku ' nan ka ' pon uya , “ Rapai , ennin pe kanan e ' pai e ' ai ' , ” ta ' pʉ .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Go thy way ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And immediately he received his sight , and followed Jesus in the way .
text2: “ Enta , anapurɨnʉ uya ɨyepi ' tɨsa ' man , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya ipɨ ' . Inke pʉra rɨ , ennin pe iyena ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan nin si utɨ ' pʉ mɨrɨ asanta tawɨrɨ Sises pɨkɨrɨ .

text: And when they came nigh to Jerusalem , unto Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount of Olives , he sendeth forth two of his disciples ,
text2: Surusiran eporo to ' uya koro ' tau , Pe ' pake mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pe ' tani ya ' si to ' uye ' ka ' sa ' Are ' Wʉpʉ pon , Sises uya asa ' ron kon tʉpoitorʉ ton ennoko ' pʉ

text: And saith unto them , Go your way into the village over against you : and as soon as ye be entered into it , ye shall find a colt tied , whereon never man sat ; loose him , and bring him .
text2: tai ' ma to ' pɨ ' , “ Entantɨ ' ɨyentau ' nokon na ' ne ' eke iwa pata ya ' , iya ' ɨyepa ' ka kon pe rɨ , mɨrɨ yau eporo auya ' nokon mɨrɨ isa ' ka ' si mʉre ewa ' tɨsa ' , ɨnʉ ' utɨ ' pʉ ipo pen nɨ . Teukai ' mʉne ' tʉi ' serɨ ya ' .

text: And if any man say unto you , Why do ye this ? say ye that the Lord hath need of him ; and straightway he will send him hither .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ɨyekama ' po kon yau , ‘ Ɨ ' rɨto ' pe mɨrɨ kupʉ auya ' nokon ? ’ tukai ' , ‘ Itepuru esi i ' se inke pʉra inna ' poto ' pe tʉuya rɨ , ’ mʉkatʉi ' ipɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they went their way , and found the colt tied by the door without in a place where two ways met ; and they loose him .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon utɨsa ' uya isa ' ka ' si mʉre eporo ' pʉ pʉroroi po asanta tau ewa ' tɨsa ' mʉra ' ta piyau . Euka pɨ ' to ' esi koro ' tau ,

text: And certain of them that stood there said unto them , What do ye , loosing the colt ?
text2: mɨrɨ yau iye ' soto ' pɨ ' sa ' kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uya , “ Ɨ ' rɨ kupʉ auya ' nokon , kʉrɨ rɨ isa ' ka ' si mʉre meukayatʉi ' ne ' ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' .

text: And they said unto them even as Jesus had commanded : and they let them go .
text2: To ' eikʉ ' pʉ to ' uya , Sises uya ta ' pʉ kasa rɨ , mɨrɨpan kon uya to ' uya ato ' pe ikupʉ ' pʉ .

text: And they brought the colt to Jesus , and cast their garments on him ; and he sat upon him .
text2: Isa ' ka ' si mʉre ne ' sa ' to ' uya a ' tai Sises piya ' , tʉpon kon tʉpɨtʉ ' pʉ to ' uya ipʉro ' pona , mɨrɨpan po iyereuta ' pʉ .

text: And many spread their garments in the way : and others cut down branches off the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Tu ' kan kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uya tʉpon kon ta ' nʉkʉ ' pʉ asanta tawɨrɨ , tʉron kon uya mɨrɨ ' tawon yʉi pantarʉ ' pɨ ' sa ' ta ' nʉ ' tane asanta tawɨrɨ .

text: And they that went before , and they that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna ; Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord :
text2: Kamoro to ' rawɨrɨ tʉutɨsan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kamoro to ' e ' ma ' pʉ pe tʉutɨsan ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉ ' pʉ , “ Usana ! ” “ Pori ' rɨ kʉrɨ esi Itepuru ese ' yau nʉye ' ai ' ne ' ! ”

text: Blessed be the kingdom of our father David , that cometh in the name of the Lord : Hosanna in the highest .
text2: “ Pori ' pe rɨ e ' nɨ ukʉipʉnʉ kon Tepi ' e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe uyepʉ pɨ ' ! ” “ Usana ka ' entawon yau ! ” tukai ' .

text: And Jesus entered into Jerusalem , and into the temple : and when he had looked round about upon all things , and now the eventide was come , he went out unto Bethany with the twelve .
text2: Sises epa ' ka ' pʉ Surusiran pona , mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' ta ' , mɨrɨpan uya tanporon nɨ enpɨtʉ ' pʉ . Pata uko ' manka ' sa ' pɨ ' nin si , iyenna ' po ' pʉ mɨrɨ Pe ' tani pona 12 kaisaron kon tʉpoitorʉ ton pokon pe .

text: And on the morrow , when they were come from Bethany , he was hungry :
text2: Mɨrɨ ema ' sa ' yau , Pe ' tani poi to ' enna ' po koro ' tau , Sises esi ' pʉ iwan pe .

text: And seeing a fig tree afar off having leaves , he came , if haply he might find any thing thereon : and when he came to it , he found nothing but leaves ; for the time of figs was not yet .
text2: Ɨnnɨ tare kenan , pi ' e ' ene tʉuya pɨ ' , itɨ ' pʉ teperu ke pe ' iyesi tukai ' ense ' na . Eposa ' iya a ' tai , ɨ ' rɨ eporo ' pʉ iya pen nɨ , iyare ton nɨken , apʉne pʉra pi ' weyu pe pʉra pata esi ' pʉ ,

text: And Jesus answered and said unto it , No man eat fruit of thee hereafter for ever . And his disciples heard it .
text2: mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ pi ' e ' pɨ ' , “ Tɨwɨ si ɨnʉ ' rɨ ɨyeperu na ' nin kanan serɨ enta ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Ipoitorʉ ton uya mɨrɨ ta iya eta ' pʉ .

text: And they come to Jerusalem : and Jesus went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ;
text2: Surusiran eporo pe , Sises ewomʉ ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' pʉ ' kʉ ta ' , mɨrɨpan e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ usennapɨ ' nɨ pɨ ' , kʉrʉpo ' po pɨ ' mɨrɨ yau te ' san enpa ' kapɨtʉ pɨ ' . Pʉrata ensimapɨ ' nin nan tepʉrʉʉi rawoipɨtʉ ' pʉ iya mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wako ' wa amʉ ' kʉrʉpo ' pomanin nan apon ton nɨ ,

text: And would not suffer that any man should carry any vessel through the temple .
text2: ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ tʉkʉrʉpo ' pooi arɨ i ' se pʉra rɨ iyesi ' pʉ mɨrɨ awɨrɨ .

text: And he taught , saying unto them , Is it not written , My house shall be called of all nations the house of prayer ? but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: To ' enupa tʉuya koro ' tau nin si , “ Iye ' menukasa ' pʉra pe ' nai : “ ‘ Uiwʉ ' esa ' to ' oton tanporon kon tʉpataron kon ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' , ’ tukai ' ? E ' tane ‘ ama ' amʉ ' en pe rɨ ’ iku ' sa ' auya ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And the scribes and chief priests heard it , and sought how they might destroy him : for they feared him , because all the people was astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Main pɨ ' enupanin nan uya mɨrɨ eta ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ iwɨto ' tʉuya ' nokon eseru warinpa pɨ ' , ipɨ ' tenari ' nʉmʉ kon pɨ ' , apʉne pʉra anpisin nɨ usewansiukasa ' pɨ ' to ' enupato ' iya pɨ ' .

text: And when even was come , he went out of the city .
text2: Pata uko ' mansa ' a ' tai , Sises mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipoitorʉ ton utɨ ' pʉ pata yapai .

text: And in the morning , as they passed by , they saw the fig tree dried up from the roots .
text2: Awanakʉi ' mɨrɨ ema ' sa ' yau , to ' utɨ koro ' tau asanta tawɨrɨ , to ' uya pi ' e ' ene ' pʉ . Iyeri ' sa ' esi ' pʉ siya rɨ imi ' pona rɨ .

text: And Peter calling to remembrance saith unto him , Master , behold , the fig tree which thou cursedst is withered away .
text2: Pi ' ta enu ya ' iyee ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ Sises pɨ ' , “ Rapai , apʉne enkɨ . Pi ' e ' anpa ' nʉkʉ ' pʉ useketasa ' ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus answering saith unto them , Have faith in God .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Papa apurɨto ' esa ' pe e ' tɨ ' .

text: For verily I say unto you , That whosoever shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; and shall not doubt in his heart , but shall believe that those things which he saith shall come to pass ; he shall have whatsoever he saith .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ se wʉ ' pɨ ' ta pe iyesi yau , ‘ Parau ka ' ɨsennasikata , ’ ikasimai ' ma pʉra tewan yau , e ' tane apurɨi ' ma tʉmaimu awɨrɨ iye ' kupʉ tukai ' , iye ' kupʉ rɨ itiwano ' pe .

text: Therefore I say unto you , What things soever ye desire , when ye pray , believe that ye receive them , and ye shall have them .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , ɨ ' rɨ rɨ ekama ' po auya ' nokon a ' tai ɨwɨpʉremato ' kon yau , apurɨtɨ ' eposa ' auya ' nokon tukai ' , mɨrɨ a ' tai ɨiwano ' kon pe rɨ iyesi .

text: And when ye stand praying , forgive , if ye have ought against any : that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses .
text2: Ɨpʉreman pɨ ' ɨye ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' kon a ' tai , mɨrɨ koro ' tau ekamʉra rɨ ɨnʉ ' pɨ ' rɨ ɨwesi kon yau , ipɨ ' ɨsentu ' matɨ ' , ɨkʉipʉnʉ kon , Epʉn pon usentu ' mato ' pe amakooi kon pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And they come again to Jerusalem : and as he was walking in the temple , there come to him the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders ,
text2: Surusiran pona kanan to ' enna ' pokaa ' pʉ . Sises usarɨ koro ' tau Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' pʉ ' kʉ tau , Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton , Main pɨ ' enupanin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' ,

text: And say unto him , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority to do these things ?
text2: mɨrɨpan kon uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ meruntɨrʉ winɨ serɨ ton kupʉ auya ? Ɨnʉ ' uya serɨ meruntɨ ke ɨrepasa ' serɨ kupʉ pa ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I will also ask of you one question , and answer me , and I will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Sises uya entakanoma ' pʉ , “ Tikin nan pɨ ' rɨ ɨyekama ' po uya ' nokon . Uyei ' tɨ ' ; mɨrɨ a ' tai nin si ekama uya mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ winɨ umeruntɨrʉ tepose , serɨ ton kupʉ uya tukai ' .

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ? answer me .
text2: Isaan uya pa ' taisiman nɨto ' — Epʉn winon pe ' , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ka ' pon amʉ ' winon katɨ ? Ekamatɨ ' ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then did ye not believe him ?
text2: Tiwano ' kon pe to ' usaurokʉ ' pʉ , “ ‘ Epʉn winon , ’ ta pe iyesi yau , ‘ Ɨ ' rɨ pe ken si iyesi pɨ ' apurɨ auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi ' pʉ ? ’ ta iya esi .

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; they feared the people : for all men counted John , that he was a prophet indeed .
text2: E ' tane , ‘ Ka ' pon amʉ ' winon , ’ ta pe iyesi yau , . . . . ” ( To ' enari ' nʉmʉ ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' , apʉne pʉra tanporon kon uya rɨ Isaan esi pu ' kena ' pe ta pɨ ' . )

text: And they answered and said unto Jesus , We cannot tell . And Jesus answering saith unto them , Neither do I tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon uya Sises eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ina uya i ' tu pʉra man , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Apana ' tɨ uya ' nokon pʉra rɨ nɨrɨ iyesi mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ meruntɨrʉ winɨ serɨ ton kupʉ uya tukai ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he began to speak unto them by parables . A certain man planted a vineyard , and set an hedge about it , and digged a place for the winefat , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country .
text2: Panton yai to ' auro ' ka pɨ ' Sises e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ : “ Ka ' pon uya umɨ pɨmɨ ' pʉ kʉre ' itese ' , si ' na ' pe te ' sen kiyari ye ' ke . Iwoi iwekupiri ' tɨ ' pʉ iya , ikasu ' kato ' iyai aka ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipa ' simato ' awonsi ' kɨ ka ' tawon soto ' pan ɨutɨ amɨ ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨpan nin si tʉrʉ ' pʉ iya mɨrɨ umɨ pɨ ' te ' san ena ' , mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ siya rɨ tʉpata ' se ' yapai .

text: And at the season he sent to the husbandmen a servant , that he might receive from the husbandmen of the fruit of the vineyard .
text2: Iyakʉ ' pʉsa ' anʉmʉ weyu si e ' seposa ' a ' tai , tʉpoitorʉ si ennoko ' pʉ iya umɨ tʉrʉ ' pʉ tʉuya itena ' ton piya ' ti ' kiyari epose ' na .

text: And they caught him , and beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: E ' tane kʉrɨ rɨ a ' si ' pʉ to ' uya , ipanta ' ma ' pʉ to ' uya , mɨrɨpan nin si ennoko ' pʉ to ' uya mɨrɨ itemiyatʉ arʉ pʉra rɨ .

text: And again he sent unto them another servant ; and at him they cast stones , and wounded him in the head , and sent him away shamefully handled .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , tʉron nɨ kanan tʉpoitorʉ ennoko ' pʉ iya to ' piya ' ; i ' pai pɨ ' nin si pʉse rɨ wɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ to ' uya mɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan ɨri pe rɨ to ' uya ikupʉ ' pʉ .

text: And again he sent another ; and him they killed , and many others ; beating some , and killing some .
text2: E ' tane rɨ kanan tʉron nɨ ennoko ' pʉ iya . Kʉrɨ rɨ nin si wɨnɨ ' pʉ to ' uya mɨrɨ . Tu ' ke rɨ tʉron kon enno ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ iya ; tʉron kon nɨ panta ' mapɨtʉ ' pʉ to ' uya , tʉron kon nɨ wɨnɨi ' ma .

text: Having yet therefore one son , his wellbeloved , he sent him also last unto them , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: “ Tikin nɨ nin si inennokonʉ e ' nonkasa ' esi ' pʉ , imu rɨ nin si , ini ' nʉnkanʉ . ‘ Pʉse rɨ , umu nin si nama to ' uya mɨrɨ , ’ tai ' ma nin si tanporon kon u ' matʉ pe ennoko ' pʉ iya .

text: But those husbandmen said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and the inheritance shall be ours .
text2: “ E ' tane nin si to ' uya ta ' pʉ mɨrɨ , tiwano ' kon pe , ‘ Pʉse rɨ kuru pʉse rɨ kiyari pata ' se ' anʉnton . Iwɨto ' kon pe ɨsi ' tɨ ' , inanʉmʉnʉ e ' to ' pe uiwano ' kon pe , ’ ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And they took him , and killed him , and cast him out of the vineyard .
text2: To ' uya si a ' si ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan wɨnɨ ' pʉ to ' uya , mɨrɨpan eno ' ma ' pʉ to ' uya kiyari e ' kwa apai .

text: What shall therefore the lord of the vineyard do ? he will come and destroy the husbandmen , and will give the vineyard unto others .
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨ ken si kupʉ kʉrɨ rɨ kiyari e ' kwa esa ' uya ? Iyepʉ kamoro itesa ' pe tʉnnonka ' san wɨse ' na , mɨrɨpan uya nin si mɨrɨ kiyari e ' kwa tʉrʉ mɨrɨ tʉron kon ena ' .

text: And have ye not read this scripture ; The stone which the builders rejected is become the head of the corner :
text2: Itekare pe ' iye ' menukasa ' ennin nan pen ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon : “ ‘ Tɨ ' ɨutɨ amɨnin nan neno ' ma ' pʉ enasa ' itekun airon tɨ ' pe ;

text: This was the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Itepuru uya rɨ serɨ ku ' sa ' , mɨrɨpan esi wakʉ pe kuru uyenu kon yau , ’ tukai ' ? ”

text: And they sought to lay hold on him , but feared the people : for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them : and they left him , and went their way .
text2: A ' sito ' tʉuya ' nokon ipɨkɨrɨ warinpa ' pʉ to ' uya , apʉne pʉra tʉpɨ ' nokon ta iya e ' kwa pe mɨrɨ panton ekamasa ' iya tukai ' to ' uya i ' tu ' pʉ . E ' tane anpisin ton ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' to ' enari ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ ; mɨrɨpan kon uya nin si inɨmɨ ' pʉ mɨrɨ , to ' utɨ ' pʉ ipiyapai .

text: And they send unto him certain of the Pharisees and of the Herodians , to catch him in his words .
text2: Emennʉ ' pʉ po iwa rɨ , Pari ' si amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Era ' pɨkɨron kon ennoko ' pʉ to ' uya Sises eparantɨi ' imaimu winɨ .

text: And when they were come , they say unto him , Master , we know that thou art true , and carest for no man : for thou regardest not the person of men , but teachest the way of God in truth : Is it lawful to give tribute to Caesar , or not ?
text2: To ' uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ti ' sa , ina i ' tu pɨ ' man i ' napairon ye ' pe ɨwesi tukai ' . Ka ' pon amʉ ' rɨ nensimanʉ pe pʉra ɨyeseru esi , apʉne pʉra ɨnʉ ' pe rɨ to ' esi pɨ ' te ' namasen pe pʉra ɨwesi ; e ' tane Papa eseru pɨ ' enupan auya i ' napairon awɨrɨ . Ipoken pe ' iyesi Sisa ena ' pʉrata tʉtʉsen e ' ma a ' tai , kane katɨ ?

text: Shall we give , or shall we not give ? But he , knowing their hypocrisy , said unto them , Why tempt ye me ? bring me a penny , that I may see it .
text2: Ina uya pe ' e ' ma , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ina uya e ' ma pen nɨ katɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . E ' tane wakʉ pe to ' e ' ku ' to ' eseru i ' tusa ' Sises uya esi ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' usa ' mapai ɨwesi kon ? Apʉne pʉrata pun ine ' tɨ ' ento ' pe uya , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they brought it . And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ? And they said unto him , Caesar ' s .
text2: To ' uya pʉrata pun nee ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon ekama ' po ' pʉ iya , “ Ɨnʉ ' nai ipɨ ' ? Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨnʉ ' ese ' nai ipɨ ' ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . “ Sisa , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Render to Caesar the things that are Caesar ' s , and to God the things that are God ' s . And they marvelled at him .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Sisa iwano ' rɨ itʉtɨ ' Sisa ena ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa iwano ' rɨ kanan tʉrʉ auya ' nokon Papa ena ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨpan kon nin si usewansiuka ' pʉ mɨrɨ ipɨ ' .

text: Then come unto him the Sadducees , which say there is no resurrection ; and they asked him , saying ,
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Satu ' si amʉ ' , eri ' nɨ tʉpo e ' mʉ ' sa ' kan pʉra rɨ iyesi tawon nan uyee ' pʉ Sises ekama ' pose ' na .

text: Master , Moses wrote unto us , If a man ' s brother die , and leave his wife behind him , and leave no children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: “ Ti ' sa , Mosi ' uya imenukasa ' uiwano ' kon pe , ka ' pon rui eri ' sa ' yau , tʉno ' pʉ tʉnonkai ' imunkɨ pʉra , iyakon nʉ ' pʉ uya ino ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ mari ' mato ' pe iyesi , mɨrɨpan kon umu ' tato ' pe tʉrui iwano ' pe .

text: Now there were seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and dying left no seed .
text2: Moro 7 kaisaron kon ɨsirunan esi ' pʉ . Wapiyaro ' emari ' ma ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan erikʉ ' pʉ innonkaton kon imunkɨ amʉ ' pʉra rɨ .

text: And the second took her , and died , neither left he any seed : and the third likewise .
text2: Ipɨkɨron nʉ ' pʉ uya nin si ino ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ mari ' ma ' pʉ mɨrɨ , e ' tane iyerikʉ ' pʉ tʉumu ' tai ' pʉra rɨ kanan . Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ to ' osorʉwano pe te ' sen esi ' pʉ .

text: And the seven had her , and left no seed : last of all the woman died also .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ tanporo 7 kaisa rɨ to ' esi ' pʉ imunkɨ amʉ ' pʉra rɨ to ' eri ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ . Kʉrɨ rɨ nin si uri ' san erikʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ to ' e ' ma ' pʉ pe rɨ .

text: In the resurrection therefore , when they shall rise , whose wife shall she be of them ? for the seven had her to wife .
text2: Eri ' nɨ tʉpo e ' mʉ ' sa ' kan nɨsa ' a ' tai , ɨnʉ ' no ' pʉ pe ken si iyesi mɨrɨ , apʉne pʉra sa ' ne 7 kaisaron kon uya imari ' mapɨ ' sa ' ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Do ye not therefore err , because ye know not the scriptures , neither the power of God ?
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Ipoken pʉra pe ' ɨwesi kon pen mɨrɨ iye ' menukasa ' itekare mɨrɨ pe pʉra Papa meruntɨrʉ i ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi pɨ ' ?

text: For when they shall rise from the dead , they neither marry , nor are given in marriage ; but are as the angels which are in heaven .
text2: Iyeri ' sa ' kon e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' a ' tai , to ' emari ' ma pʉra rɨ iyesi , mɨrɨ pe pʉra to ' e ' tʉrʉ pen nɨ emari ' man nɨto ' yau ; Epʉn pon kon , inserʉ amʉ ' kasa to ' e ' to ' oton .

text: And as touching the dead , that they rise : have ye not read in the book of Moses , how in the bush God spake unto him , saying , I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ?
text2: Iyeri ' sa ' kon e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka tawon pɨ ' , Mosi ' karetaai yawon pe ' ensa ' auya ' nokon pʉra rɨ iyesi , yu ' epo ' tɨ ' pʉ tawon ? Mɨrɨ yau , Papa uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , ‘ Urɨ kʉrɨ rɨ Epʉra ' an , Aisi ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Seko ' pokon e ' to ' itese ' pɨ ' . ’

text: He is not the God of the dead , but the God of the living : ye therefore do greatly err .
text2: Papa , iyeri ' sa ' kon e ' to ' itese ' pɨ ' pe iyesi pen , e ' tane nurɨnan kon nɨken . Ipoken pʉra kuru ɨwesi kon mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And one of the scribes came , and having heard them reasoning together , and perceiving that he had answered them well , asked him , Which is the first commandment of all ?
text2: Main pɨ ' enupanin nan tonpa uye ' sa ' uya to ' usaurokʉ etapɨtʉ ' pʉ . Wakʉ pe to ' maimu ei ' sa ' Sises uya pɨ ' , ekama ' po ' pʉ iya , “ Tanporon iyawɨrɨ e ' nɨto ' pe inonkasa ' Main ton koro ' tapai , nai esi eke pe kuru ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus answered him , The first of all the commandments is , Hear , O Israel ; The Lord our God is one Lord :
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Se kuru serɨ eke , ‘ Etatɨ ' Esuwerʉ amʉ ' rʉ ' kwɨ ; Itepuru itese ' pɨ ' e ' nɨto ' esi , tikin nan nɨ Itepuru ;

text: And thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind , and with all thy strength : this is the first commandment .
text2: Itepuru , itese ' pɨ ' ɨwe ' to ' i ' nʉnkakɨ tanporo ɨyewan pokon pe , aya ' kwarʉ pokon pe , ɨusenuminkato ' pokon pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporo ɨmeruntɨrʉ pokon pe , ’ tawon .

text: And the second is like , namely this , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself . There is none other commandment greater than these .
text2: Ipɨkɨron esi se : ‘ Ɨtonpa i ' nʉnkakɨ mɨsi ' nʉnkayai ' ne ' kasa , ’ tawon . Serɨ ton iyawɨrɨ e ' nɨto ' entaino eke pʉra rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya ipɨ ' .

text: And the scribe said unto him , Well , Master , thou hast said the truth : for there is one God ; and there is none other but he :
text2: “ Ti ' sa , wakʉ pe kuru ei ' sa ' auya man , ipoken nɨ mʉkayai ' ne ' esi , Papa esi tikin nan nɨ , ɨnʉ ' pʉra rɨ iyesi e ' tane kʉrɨ rɨ rɨken .

text: And to love him with all the heart , and with all the understanding , and with all the soul , and with all the strength , and to love his neighbour as himself , is more than all whole burnt offerings and sacrifices .
text2: I ' nʉnkato ' tanporo ewan wannɨ pokon pe , ito ' ka ' nʉ ' to ' pokon pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ meruntɨrʉ wannɨ pokon pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tonpa i ' nʉnka usi ' nʉnkan kasa rɨ esi eke pe kuru tʉpo ' tɨse tʉtʉsen mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉron nɨ ton nɨ use ' man nɨto ' entai , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when Jesus saw that he answered discreetly , he said unto him , Thou art not far from the kingdom of God . And no man after that durst ask him any question .
text2: Wakʉ pe teikʉ iya etasa ' Sises uya a ' tai , “ Ɨnnɨ pʉra rɨ me ' ai ' Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe piyapai , ” ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' . Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ nin si mɨrɨ enta ' , ɨnʉ ' rɨ esi ' pʉ ɨnekama ' popɨ ' pai pʉra .

text: And Jesus answered and said , while he taught in the temple , How say the scribes that Christ is the Son of David ?
text2: Sises esi koro ' tau enupan pɨ ' Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' pʉ ' kʉ tau , to ' ekama ' po ' pʉ iya , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' Main pɨ ' enupanin nan uya Kʉrai esi Tepi ' pa rʉ ' pʉ pe ta ?

text: For David himself said by the Holy Ghost , The Lord said to my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: Tepi ' rɨ usaurokʉ ' pʉ Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ uya tʉmaimu ' tɨi ' , “ ‘ Itepuru uya ta ' pʉ uyepuru pɨ ' : “ Ereuta ' enwo ' ne ' uyemiyatʉ winɨ , ɨyeyaton non tʉrʉ uya a ' ta o ' koi ' pʉ ' kʉ pona , ” ta ' pʉ iya . ’

text: David therefore himself calleth him Lord ; and whence is he then his son ? And the common people heard him gladly .
text2: Tepi ' uya tʉmɨrɨ pe rɨ ‘ uyepuru ’ tukai ' esakʉ , nai kasa ken ipa rʉ ' pʉ pe iyesi nesii ' no ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . Anpisin ton Sises etanin nan esi ' pʉ pori ' pe .

text: And he said unto them in his doctrine , Beware of the scribes , which love to go in long clothing , and love salutations in the marketplaces ,
text2: To ' enupa tʉuya koro ' tau , Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Tenu ke e ' tɨ ' Main pɨ ' enupanin nan pɨ ' , ɨpininpaino kon kusan tʉpon kon yau , ‘ Miyarɨ , ’ ta i ' sero ' kon tʉpɨ ' nokon kʉrʉpo ' po pɨ ' e ' nɨ pata ' se ' yau rɨ ,

text: And the chief seats in the synagogues , and the uppermost rooms at feasts :
text2: eke ton apon po kuru te ' san Esuwerʉ amʉ ' usenupato ' iwʉ ' tau , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉnamasan pata ' se ' yau kuru te ' san enta ' nan a ' tai ' ne .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayers : these shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Itaan ' pʉ ima ' tasa ' rʉ ' san iwʉ ' mo ' kanin nan to ' enapai , mɨrɨpan kon ɨpʉrema kusan pe , mɨ pe te ' kupʉ kon pe . Pʉsamoro waraino kon kota ' ma mɨrɨ ɨsɨ pe kuru rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus sat over against the treasury , and beheld how the people cast money into the treasury : and many that were rich cast in much .
text2: Sises ereuta ' pʉ tʉtʉsen nonkato ' to ' uya pata ' se ' ratoi pe , anpisin ton ka ' pon amʉ ' uya tʉpʉrataai kon tʉpɨtʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' pʉrataai yen ya ' enpɨtʉ pɨ ' . Tu ' kan kon nɨ ipʉrataaike ' ton uya eke pe rɨ itʉpɨtʉ ' pʉ .

text: And there came a certain poor widow , and she threw in two mites , which make a farthing .
text2: E ' tane rʉ ' kwɨ nin si entu ' manin itaan ' pʉ ima ' tasa ' rʉ ' pʉ uyee ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya rʉ ' kwɨ asa ' ron pʉrata ka ' pa muku ' pɨ tʉrʉ ' pʉ , peni punu ' pɨ rʉ ' kwɨ rɨ .

text: And he called unto him his disciples , and saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That this poor widow hath cast more in , than all they which have cast into the treasury :
