text2: Tʉpoitorʉ ton tʉkɨ ' mai ' tʉpiya ' , ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , pʉse rɨ entu ' manin itaan ' pʉ ima ' tasa ' rʉ ' pʉ uya eke pe kuru itʉsa ' mɨrɨ pʉrata yen ya ' , tanporo tʉron kon entai kuru .

text: For all they did cast in of their abundance ; but she of her want did cast in all that she had , even all her living .
text2: Tʉpʉrataai kon tonpa rɨ nin tʉsa ' to ' uya , e ' tane kʉrɨ rɨ , tekota ' mato ' apai rʉ ' kwɨ rɨ tanporo rɨ tʉpiyawon tʉrʉ ' pʉ tʉuko ' manto ' ipɨ ' rʉ ' kwɨ rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And as he went out of the temple , one of his disciples saith unto him , Master , see what manner of stones and what buildings are here !
text2: Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' nɨmɨ iya koro ' tau , ipoitorʉ ton tonpa uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ti ' sa , apʉne enkɨ ; ɨ ' rɨ eke ton nɨ tɨ ' amʉ ' ! Ɨ ' rɨ wakʉ pe rɨ amɨsa ' ɨutɨ ton ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Seest thou these great buildings ? there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: “ Tanporo rɨ pe ' serɨ ton eke ton ɨutɨ amɨpɨ ' sa ' menyan ? ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya . “ Tikin nɨ rɨ tɨ ' e ' nonkato ' oton pen mɨrɨ ɨsipʉro ' po ; tanporon nɨ uta ' po ' to ' oton mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple , Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately ,
text2: Sises ereutasa ' koro ' tau Are ' Wʉpʉ po , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' ratoi pe , Pi ' ta , Isens , Isaan , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Anturu pokon uya ekama ' po ' pʉ ama ' ai ,

text: Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled ?
text2: “ Ina pɨ ' ekamakɨ , ɨ ' rɨ a ' tai kuru ken si serɨ ton e ' ku ' to ' oton ? Ɨ ' rɨ kuru ken si esi mɨrɨ ento ' ipɨ ' pe tanporo serɨ ton uta ' ku ' tɨ ekamanin pe ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And Jesus answering them began to say , Take heed lest any man deceive you :
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Tenu ke e ' tɨ ' , ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ɨyenku ' tɨ kon namai ' .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Tu ' kan kon nɨ uye ' to ' oton uyese ' yau , ‘ Urɨ rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ , ’ ka ' se ' na , mɨrɨpan kon uya tu ' kan kon nɨ enku ' tɨto ' oton .

text: And when ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars , be ye not troubled : for such things must needs be ; but the end shall not be yet .
text2: Tʉusewa ' nomasan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ usewa ' noman man tawon eta auya ' nokon a ' tai , ketʉipɨ ' tʉu mɨrɨ pɨ ' . Serɨ warai ' nan nɨ e ' ku ' to ' pe iyesi e ' tane apʉne rɨ non weyu u ' ma ' to ' uye ' tane rɨ iyesi .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be earthquakes in divers places , and there shall be famines and troubles : these are the beginnings of sorrows .
text2: Tʉpataron kon uya tʉpataron kon nɨ nɨrɨ ewa ' nomato ' oton , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ esa ' wannɨ pe rɨ te ' san uya esa ' wannɨ pe te ' san nɨ nɨrɨ ewa ' noma . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , tʉrʉ ' pʉnʉ amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iwankan e ' to ' oton mɨrɨ pata kaisa rɨ . Serɨ ton si esi mɨrɨ e ' tinkan e ' sara ' tɨ pe .

text: But take heed to yourselves : for they shall deliver you up to councils ; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten : and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them .
text2: “ Ɨserasu pe rɨ me ' tʉi ' . Ɨtʉto ' oton kon mɨrɨ pata konsʉrʉʉi amʉ ' ena ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' usenupato ' iwʉ ' tau ayari ' po ' pɨ ' to ' oton kon . Urɨ pɨkɨrɨ ɨye ' soto ' kato ' oton kon kopʉna amʉ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kin amʉ ' rau rɨ to ' pana ya ' urɨ ekama pɨ ' .

text: And the gospel must first be published among all nations .
text2: Mɨrɨpan wapiya kuru wakʉ itekare usekamato ' pe iyesi tanporon kon mɨ yawɨron kon pana ya ' .

text: But when they shall lead you , and deliver you up , take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak , neither do ye premeditate : but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour , that speak ye : for it is not ye that speak , but the Holy Ghost .
text2: To ' uya aya ' sisa ' kon arɨ a ' tai ko ' tʉ ta ' , pena rɨ kɨsewankamatʉu , ‘ Ɨ ' rɨ kuru ta uya ? ’ tukai ' , amaimu ' tɨsa ' kon na ' ne ' ke rɨ ausaurokʉ kon mɨrɨ , ɨiwano ' kon pe ausaurokʉ kon pen e ' tane Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ usaurokʉ .

text: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death , and the father the son ; and children shall rise up against their parents , and shall cause them to be put to death .
text2: “ Eri ' nɨto ' ya ' tʉrui eparankato ' oton iyakon uya , ikʉipʉnʉ uya nɨrɨ tʉmʉre . Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ , mʉre amʉ ' enato ' oton tʉsan kon amʉ ' ewa ' noma pɨ ' to ' eri ' to ' ya ' to ' tʉrʉ pɨ ' .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Urɨ uriya ' tu ' kan kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uya ɨyewaruma ' tɨto ' oton kon , e ' tane kʉrɨ rɨ pana ' pe ne ' mʉ ' sa ' kayai ' ne ' iu ' matʉ pona rɨ epika ' tɨto ' oton mɨrɨ .

text: But when ye shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , standing where it ought not , ( let him that readeth understand , ) then let them that be in Judaea flee to the mountains :
text2: “ ‘ Ɨri Kuru Nuirapanin Uma ' tan Emapu ' tɨnin ’ e ' soto ' kasa ' ene auya ' nokon a ' tai , tʉpata ' se ' pen nɨ yau — tɨwɨ serɨ ennin nʉto ' ka ' nʉkʉi — tɨwɨ kamoro Isutiya po na ' ne ' nan nainʉmʉi wʉ ' ton pona ' ne .

text: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house , neither enter therein , to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Tɨwɨ tiwʉ ' nakapu po te ' sen kʉu ' tɨnin mɨrɨ pe pʉra kʉsewonnin nɨ ɨutɨ ta ' ɨ ' rɨ rɨ mo ' kai ' .

text: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment .
text2: Tɨwɨ ɨnʉ ' rɨ umɨ yau na ' ne ' kʉsenna ' ponin tʉpon epose ' na .

text: But woe to them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: Mɨrɨ wʉi a ' tai ' ne ɨsɨ pe kuru rɨ uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' mono ' pe te ' san pona iye ' to ' oton mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ mana ' pokon kon imunkɨ pona .

text: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter .
text2: Ɨpʉrematɨ ' serɨ e ' kupʉ namai ' komi ' pe pata e ' to ' weyu a ' tai ,

text: For in those days shall be affliction , such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time , neither shall be .
text2: apʉne pʉra mɨrɨ waraino ewankamanin e ' ku ' sa ' pʉra rɨ iyesi iyepiya ' tɨ ' pʉ si ' kɨrɨ , Papa uya non kaa ' pʉ si ' kɨrɨ serɨ pʉ ' kʉ pona , mɨrɨ waraino kanan e ' ku ' to ' oton pen nɨ .

text: And except that the Lord had shortened those days , no flesh should be saved : but for the elect ' s sake , whom he hath chosen , he hath shortened the days .
text2: “ Itepuru uya serɨ iweyu ton nu ' tɨsa ' pʉra iyesi yau , ɨnʉ ' ne ' nonkai ' no pen nɨ . E ' tane anʉnsa ' kon , tʉnanʉmʉ ' san pɨkɨrɨ nin ito ' kena ' masa ' iya mɨrɨ .

text: And then if any man shall say to you , Lo , here is Christ ; or , lo , he is there ; believe him not :
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ta pe iyesi yau ɨpɨ ' nokon , ‘ Apʉne entɨ ' , serɨ airɨ Kʉrai man ! ’ mɨrɨ pe pʉra , ‘ Apʉne entɨ ' ! Mɨ airɨ man ! ’ ta pe iyesi yau , kʉsapurɨtʉu .

text: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise , and shall shew signs and wonders , to seduce , if it were possible , even the elect .
text2: Apʉne pʉra enku ' tɨnin nan kʉrai amʉ ' , enku ' tɨnin nan pu ' kena ' amʉ ' usenpoikato ' oton , mɨrɨpan kon uya i ' tuto ' ipɨ ' ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eke Papa tʉrawasooi ton ku ' to ' oton anʉnsa ' kon enku ' tɨ pe , ikupʉ tʉuya ' nokon poken iyesi yau .

text: But take ye heed : behold , I have foretold you all things .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' ɨiwano ' kon pe rɨ ɨserasu kon pe e ' tɨ ' ; tanporon nɨ ekamasa ' uya mɨrɨ ɨpɨ ' nokon iweyu wapiya .

text: But in those days , after that tribulation , the sun shall be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light ,
text2: “ E ' tane mɨrɨ a ' tai ' ne , usewankaman pata ' pʉ pe , “ ‘ Wʉi enu ewarumanto ' oton , kapʉi e ' wei ' tɨto ' oton pen ;

text: And the stars of heaven shall fall , and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken .
text2: sirikɨ amʉ ' uta ' po ' to ' oton ka ' apai , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' yau rɨ te ' san usi ' ki ' mato ' oton . ’

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ a ' tai si , ka ' pon amʉ ' uya Ka ' pon , Papa winon uyepʉ ento ' oton mɨrɨ kapuru ' yau eke tʉmeruntɨrʉ ke mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ a ' kwa yau ,

text: And then shall he send his angels , and shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven .
text2: mɨrɨpan uya tinserʉʉi ton ennoko tʉnanʉmʉ ' san amʉranʉ ' se asakɨrɨ ' nan a ' setun uye ' to ' yawɨron kon nɨ , non pʉ ' kʉ u ' matʉ apai ' ne , ka ' u ' matʉ pʉ ' kʉ ponsi ' kɨ ' ne .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When her branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is near :
text2: “ Ɨsenupatɨ ' se pi ' e ' pɨ ' : Iyepanta ' tɨ are ton atu ' ta a ' tai , a ' ko pe wʉi a ' ne ' pe pata e ' to ' weyu e ' seporo tukai ' i ' tu auya ' nokon .

text: So ye in like manner , when ye shall see these things come to pass , know that it is nigh , even at the doors .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ , serɨ ton e ' kupʉ ene auya ' nokon a ' tai , a ' ko pe iyesi mʉra ' ta nau rɨ tukai ' i ' tu auya ' nokon .

text: Verily I say unto you , that this generation shall not pass , till all these things be done .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; serɨ a ' taino kon kuru rɨ pʉra iyenato ' oton pen nɨ serɨ ton e ' kupʉ pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Epʉn mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ non pʉra iyenato ' oton , e ' tane umaimu mɨrɨ tereutaton pen nɨ .

text: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels which are in heaven , neither the Son , but the Father .
text2: “ Ɨnʉ ' uya mɨrɨ wʉi mɨrɨ pe pʉra iwekusi i ' tu pʉra rɨ iyesi , inserʉ amʉ ' Epʉn pon kon uya rɨ mɨrɨ pe pʉra imu uya rɨ , e ' tane ikʉipʉnʉ uya rɨken i ' tu .

text: Take ye heed , watch and pray : for ye know not when the time is .
text2: Ɨiwano ' kon pe rɨ ɨserasu kon pe e ' tɨ ' ! Tenu ke e ' tɨ ' ! I ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi ɨ ' rɨ a ' tai mɨrɨ weyu e ' seporo tukai ' .

text: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey , who left his house , and gave authority to his servants , and to every man his work , and commanded the porter to watch .
text2: Ɨnnɨ ka ' pon utɨ kasa iyesi : Tʉpoitorʉ ton enau tiwʉ ' nɨmɨ iya , to ' tʉrawasooi ke to ' tʉrepapɨ ' se , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ mʉra ' tanawon pɨ ' tenu ke e ' kɨ tai ' ma .

text: Watch ye therefore : for ye know not when the master of the house cometh , at even , or at midnight , or at the cockcrowing , or in the morning :
text2: “ Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , enei ' ma e ' tɨ ' , apʉne pʉra i ' tu auya ' nokon kasa pʉra ɨ ' rɨ a ' tai ɨutɨ esa ' enna ' poto ' oton tukai ' — ko ' mamʉ pe rɨ , mɨrɨ pe pʉra anomʉra ' rɨ , mɨrɨ pe pʉra rɨ kɨrɨtɨkɨ uturumʉ a ' tai rɨ , mɨrɨ pe pʉra pata emakʉ a ' tai .

text: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping .
text2: Ite ' kwanau pʉra rɨ iyepʉ ɨyepotɨ ' nin , ɨye ' nʉmʉ kon eponin .

text: And what I say unto you I say unto all , Watch .
text2: Ukayai ' ne ' rɨ ɨpɨ ' nokon nɨ marɨ ta uya tanporon kon pɨ ' : ‘ Tenu ke e ' tɨ ' ! ’ ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: After two days was the feast of the passover , and of unleavened bread : and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft , and put him to death .
text2: Asa ' rɨ rɨken wʉi e ' ku ' ka ' sa ' esi ' pʉ To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ A ' sarutanʉ ' sa ' Pen Pʉreti Pɨ ' Enta ' nan Weyu e ' seporo rawɨrɨ , mɨrɨ pɨ ' Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Main pɨ ' enupanin nan esi ' pʉ ama ' ai Sises a ' sito ' tʉuya ' nokon ipɨkɨrɨ warinpa pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iwɨto ' pe tʉuya ' nokon .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar of the people .
text2: “ E ' tane Iweyu Rʉ ' pʉ a ' tai pen , ka ' pon amʉ ' nin e ' sara ' tɨ esi usewa ' noman pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And being in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper , as he sat at meat , there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of spikenard very precious ; and she brake the box , and poured it on his head .
text2: Pe ' tani po iyesi koro ' tau , tʉteire ' po tenai ' tepʉrʉ piyau , ka ' pon , Saiman , erekʉ ' pan tukai ' ti ' tusen iwʉ ' tau , uri ' san uyee ' pʉ po ' toro arapasta yawon , epe ' kena ' po ' piyun esukenan natʉ konekasa ' esa ' pe . Tʉputurʉkai ' i ' pai pona po ' piyun ma ' pʉ iya .

text: And there were some that had indignation within themselves , and said , Why was this waste of the ointment made ?
text2: Mɨrɨ yau te ' san tonpa ton usakorota usaurokʉ ' pʉ tiwano ' kon pe , “ Ɨ ' rɨto ' pe rɨ si po ' piyun ma ' tanʉkʉ ko ?

text: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence , and have been given to the poor . And they murmured against her .
text2: Ikʉrʉpo ' pomapaino rɨ tikin nɨ wʉipiya iye ' tʉrawasomasa ' e ' mato ' epe ' entai rɨ , itepe ' pʉ tʉto ' pe entu ' manin nan ena ' ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . Ɨsɨ pe rɨ to ' uya eseremekʉ ' pʉ .

text: And Jesus said , Let her alone ; why trouble ye her ? she hath wrought a good work on me .
text2: “ Tɨwɨ nesii , ɨ ' rɨ pe ikupʉ i ' se ɨwesi kon ? Wakʉ rɨ ku ' sa ' iya mɨrɨ upɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya to ' pɨ ' .

text: For ye have the poor with you always , and whensoever ye will ye may do them good : but me ye have not always .
text2: “ Entu ' manin nan kamoro ɨpiyawon kon nɨ i ' se ɨwe ' to ' kon a ' tai rɨ ɨnpika ' tɨnʉ kon , e ' tane inke urɨ pʉra iyesi ɨpiyau ' nokon .

text: She hath done what she could : she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying .
text2: Tʉnkupʉnʉ pokena ' rɨ ku ' sa ' iya mɨrɨ , po ' piyun masa ' iya upona ukoneka pe uruwai ' ya ' utʉrʉ e ' ma ta ' .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached throughout the whole world , this also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , mɨ awɨrɨ rɨ itekare nʉsekamayai ' ne ' non emʉ ' kaisa rɨ , inkupʉ ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ rɨ marɨ usekama mɨrɨ en yau ikupʉ pe rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve , went unto the chief priests , to betray him unto them .
text2: Isutas Eskariya ' , 12 kaisaron kon ipoitorʉ ton tonpa utɨ ' pʉ use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton piya ' , Sises eparankase ' na to ' ena ' .

text: And when they heard it , they were glad , and promised to give him money . And he sought how he might conveniently betray him .
text2: To ' epori ' ma ' pʉ mɨrɨ tetai ' , mɨrɨpan kon usaurokʉ ' pʉ pʉrata ke irepato ' tʉuya ' nokon pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan esi ' pʉ itʉto ' tʉuya weyu eporo i ' se .

text: And the first day of unleavened bread , when they killed the passover , his disciples said unto him , Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover ?
text2: A ' sarutanʉ ' sa ' Pen Pʉreti Pɨ ' Enta ' nan Weyu e ' sara ' tɨ a ' tai , iteseru pe To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' karimeru mʉre wɨto ' a ' tai , Sises poitorʉ ton uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Nai ya ' ina utɨ i ' se me ' an To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' ɨyenta ' nato ' konekase ' na ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he sendeth forth two of his disciples , and saith unto them , Go ye into the city , and there shall meet you a man bearing a pitcher of water : follow him .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya asa ' rɨ tʉpoitorʉ ton ennoko ' pʉ . To ' pɨ ' ta ' pʉ iya , “ Entantɨ ' eke pata pona , mɨrɨpan yau , tuna anin ka ' pon uya ɨyeporo kon mɨrɨ . Ipɨkɨrɨ mʉtɨtʉi ' .

text: And wheresoever he shall go in , say ye to the goodman of the house , The Master saith , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Iyewonsa ' na ' ne ' ita ' ɨutɨ esa ' mekama ' potʉi ' , ‘ Ti ' sa man : Nai airɨ uiwʉ ' oton nai To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' upoitorʉ ton pokon pe enta ' nato ' itau ? ta pɨ ' , ’ mʉkatʉi ' .

text: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared : there make ready for us .
text2: Ekama iya rɨ mɨrɨ ɨpɨ ' nokon eke rɨ ka ' tawon ɨutɨ tapurui ' tɨse ikonekasa ' . Mɨrɨ yau si enta ' nan nɨto ' mʉkonekatʉi ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And his disciples went forth , and came into the city , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton si utɨ ' pʉ eke pata pona , mɨrɨpan kon uya si eporo ' pʉ Sises uya tauro ' ka ' pʉ kon kasa rɨ , mɨrɨpan kon uya si To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' te ' to ' kon koneka ' pʉ .

text: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve .
text2: Pata uko ' mansa ' a ' tai , Sises uyee ' pʉ 12 kaisaron kon pokon pe .

text: And as they sat and did eat , Jesus said , Verily I say unto you , One of you which eateth with me shall betray me .
text2: Tepʉrʉ piyau tʉteire ' kon po tenai ' enta ' nan pɨ ' to ' esi koro ' tau , ta ' pʉ iya , “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , ɨtonpa kon uya uyeparankato ' oton — kʉrɨ upokon pe enta ' nan pɨ ' na ' ne ' rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they began to be sorrowful , and to say unto him one by one , Is it I ? and another said , Is it I ?
text2: To ' si upokoita ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan tikin pa ' ne ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' , “ I ' napai rɨ urɨ pen kuru rɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he answered and said unto them , It is one of the twelve , that dippeth with me in the dish .
text2: “ Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon 12 kaisaron kon tonpa , tʉyu kipʉ pɨ ' na ' ne ' pʉsau ya ' upokon pe .

text: The Son of man indeed goeth , as it is written of him : but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! good were it for that man if he had never been born .
text2: Ka ' pon , Papa winon utɨto ' oton iye ' menukasa ' tʉpɨ ' na ' ne ' kasa rɨ , e ' tane ɨsɨ yau rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ ka ' pon esi Ka ' pon , Papa winon eparankanin ! Wakʉ pe rɨ nesii ' no iyentusa ' pʉra iyesi yau , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And as they did eat , Jesus took bread , and blessed , and brake it , and gave to them , and said , Take , eat : this is my body .
text2: To ' enta ' na koro ' tau , Sises uya pʉreti anʉmʉ ' pʉ , tenki ta ' pʉ iya Papa pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan uya i ' kwɨ ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan ekamʉ ' pʉ iya tʉpoitorʉ ton ena ' , “ Anʉntɨ ' , serɨ serɨ upun , ” tai ' ma .

text: And he took the cup , and when he had given thanks , he gave it to them : and they all drank of it .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ko ' anʉmʉ ' pʉ iya , tenki ta ' pʉ iya Papa pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan uya to ' o ' pa ' pʉ , tanporon kon uya iyawon ensi ' pʉ .

text: And he said unto them , This is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many .
text2: “ Serɨ serɨ umʉnʉ , emenna ' ekonekan nɨto ' iwano ' , tu ' kan kon iwano ' pe iye ' kwansa ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: Verily I say unto you , I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine , until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God .
text2: “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , iteperu euku ensito ' uya oton pen ɨpokon pe ' nokon Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe yau emenna ' pe ensi uya pʉ ' kʉ pona , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Eren pɨ ' tʉuserenkasa ' kon tʉpo , to ' utɨ ' pʉ Are ' Wʉpʉ pona .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep shall be scattered .
text2: “ Tanporo rɨ unɨmɨ auya ' nokon mɨrɨ , ” tukai ' Sises uya to ' pana ' tɨ ' pʉ , “ apʉne pʉra iye ' menukasa ' : “ ‘ Karimeru amʉ ' pa ' simanin wɨnɨ uya , mɨrɨpan karimeru amʉ ' si e ' ta ' nʉ ' to ' oton , ’ tawon .

text: But after that I am risen , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: E ' tane erikʉ tʉpo , e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' a ' tai , utɨ mɨrɨ arawɨrɨ ' nokon Kiyarari pona , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But Peter said unto him , Although all shall be offended , yet will not I .
text2: Pi ' ta uya ta ' pʉ , “ Tanporon kon uya ɨnɨntane , ɨnɨmɨ uya pen nɨ nin mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this day , even in this night , before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' , serɨ pe — i ' nai rɨ sa ' ne , serɨ ewarupɨɨi tau — kɨrɨtɨkɨ uturumʉ asa ' ite ' kwa rawɨrɨ , unonkato ' auya oton osorʉwau ite ' kwa , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: But he spake the more vehemently , If I should die with thee , I will not deny thee in any wise . Likewise also said they all .
text2: E ' tane miyarɨ parɨ e ' se ' ne ' pe parɨ Pi ' ta uya ta ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe pʉra rɨ aya ' kɨrɨ uma ' ta pe iyesi yau , ɨnonka uya pen nɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporon kon uya rɨ mɨrɨ rɨ marɨ ta ' pʉ .

text: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane : and he saith to his disciples , Sit ye here , while I shall pray .
text2: To ' utɨ ' pʉ Ke ' semani tukai ' tesa ' sen pata ya ' . Mɨrɨ yau , Sises uya ta ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' , “ Ereutapɨ ' tɨ ' se airɨ ɨpʉrema tane , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John , and began to be sore amazed , and to be very heavy ;
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya Pi ' ta , Isens mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Isaan arɨ ' pʉ ta ' kɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan usewankama ena ' pʉ ika ' nɨ ' pʉra ipan pe rɨ .

text: And saith unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death : tarry ye here , and watch .
text2: “ Uya ' kwarʉ man pokoi pe , uma ' tan poken nɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' . “ Serɨ yau e ' tɨ ' tenu ke , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he went forward a little , and fell on the ground , and prayed that , if it were possible , the hour might pass from him .
text2: Itɨ ' pʉ miyarɨ parɨ ɨnnɨ iwa ita ' mo ' ka ' pʉ non pona ɨpʉremase ' na tʉpɨ ' te ' ku ' sen si usentakato ' pe .

text: And he said , Abba , Father , all things are possible unto thee ; take away this cup from me : nevertheless not what I will , but what thou wilt .
text2: “ Apa , Papai , tanporon nɨ e ' ku ' to ' pe iku ' nin pe ɨwesi , serɨ ko ' imo ' kakɨ uyenapai . E ' tane i ' se ɨwe ' to ' rɨken e ' ku ' to ' , i ' se e ' to ' pen , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he cometh , and findeth them sleeping , and saith unto Peter , Simon , sleepest thou ? couldest not thou watch one hour ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan enna ' po ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton piya ' , mɨrɨpan uya to ' e ' nʉmʉ eporo ' pʉ . “ Saiman , ” ta ' pʉ iya Pi ' ta pɨ ' , “ ɨye ' nʉnsa ' si mɨrɨ ? Tenu ke pe ' ɨwesi poken pʉra iyesi mara rʉ ' kwɨ rɨ ?

text: Watch ye and pray , lest ye enter into temptation . The spirit truly is ready , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Tenu ke esii ' ma ɨpʉrematɨ ' , i ' tupɨ ' nɨto ' ya ' auta ' mo ' ka kon namai ' . Iya ' kwarʉ esi ɨnku ' pai , e ' tane ipun esi ɨ ' sɨ ' mʉra , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And again he went away , and prayed , and spake the same words .
text2: Itɨkaa ' pʉ ɨpʉremase ' na mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ kanan .

text: And when he returned , he found them asleep again , ( for their eyes were heavy , ) neither wist they what to answer him .
text2: Iyenna ' posa ' a ' tai kanan , to ' rɨ marɨ e ' nʉnsa ' eporo ' pʉ iya , apʉne pʉra e ' tape ' ne ' pe ' ne to ' enu pi ' pɨ ton esi ke . Ɨ ' rɨ rɨ ta tʉuya ' nokon ipɨ ' tukai ' to ' uya i ' tu pʉra rɨ iyesi ' pʉ .

text: And he cometh the third time , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : it is enough , the hour is come ; behold , the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Itosorʉwano ite ' kwa tenna ' poi ' , ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ Mɨrɨ si e ' nʉn nɨ pɨ ' rɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ umoronka ' nɨ pɨ ' rɨ ɨwesi kon ? Eke pe man ! Iweyu si e ' seposa ' man . Ka ' pon , Papa winon eparankasa ' man tʉmakooikena ' nan ena ' .

text: Rise up , let us go ; lo , he that betrayeth me is at hand .
text2: E ' mʉ ' sa ' katɨ ' . Utɨnpai ' nokon ! Uyeparankanin si uye ' ka ' nɨ pɨ ' man ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And immediately , while he yet spake , cometh Judas , one of the twelve , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders .
text2: Usauro ' nɨ pɨ ' kuru rɨ iyesi koro ' tau , Isutas , 12 kaisaron kon tonpa pe te ' sen usenpoika ' pʉ . Ipokon pe anpisin usepai ' tɨpɨ ' sa ' supara ke mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wa ' tana ke esi ' pʉ use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru , Main pɨ ' enupanin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton nennoko ' san .

text: And he that betrayed him had given them a token , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he ; take him , and lead him away safely .
text2: Eparankanin uya tʉnku ' ton ekamasa ' esi ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Kʉrɨ sa ' su ' kayai ' ne ' si kʉrɨ rɨ , ma ' sitʉi ' , matʉi ' terasu ke , ” tasa ' esi ' pʉ .

text: And as soon as he was come , he goeth straightway to him , and saith , Master , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Isutas utɨ ' pʉ Sises piya ' to ' sarɨ rɨ , mɨrɨpan uya , “ Rapai , ” ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , mɨrɨpan a ' su ' ka ' pʉ iya .

text: And they laid their hands on him , and took him .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon uya Sises a ' si ' pʉ .

text: And one of them that stood by drew a sword , and smote a servant of the high priest , and cut off his ear .
text2: Mɨrɨ yau , a ' ko pe iye ' soto ' pɨ ' sa ' kon tonpa uya tʉsuparaai mo ' ka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru poitorʉ pana a ' tɨ ' pʉ .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Are ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and with staves to take me ?
text2: Sises uya , “ Main awɨron kon pen pe ' esa ' pe esi serɨ , ɨuye ' sa ' kon na ' ne ' supara amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wa ' tana amʉ ' esa ' pe uya ' sise ' na ?

text: I was daily with you in the temple teaching , and ye took me not : but the scriptures must be fulfilled .
text2: Wʉi kaisarɨ rɨ ɨpiyau ' nokon esi ' pʉ , enupan pɨ ' Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' pʉ ' kʉ tau , uya ' si auya ' nokon pʉra rɨ . E ' tane imenukasa ' itekare uta ' ku ' tɨto ' pe rɨ iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they all forsook him , and fled .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , tanporon kon ipoitorʉ ton uya inonka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon ainʉmʉ ' pʉ .

text: And there followed him a certain young man , having a linen cloth cast about his naked body ; and the young men laid hold on him :
text2: Moine e ' wontɨsa ' epe ' kena ' pon renen tato ' atʉ ke tʉpon ke pʉra esii ' ma utɨ esi ' pʉ Sises pɨkɨrɨ . Mɨrɨpan a ' si i ' se to ' e ' tane ,

text: And he left the linen cloth , and fled from them naked .
text2: to ' enapai temo ' kai ' iyeka ' tumʉ ' pʉ iwon pʉra .

text: And they led Jesus away to the high priest : and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes .
text2: To ' uya si Sises arɨ ' pʉ use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru piya ' , mɨrɨpan tanporo use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton nɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Main pɨ ' enupanin nan nɨ amʉra ' pʉ .

text: And Peter followed him afar off , even into the palace of the high priest : and he sat with the servants , and warmed himself at the fire .
text2: Pi ' ta uya e ' ma ' pʉka ' pʉ ɨnnonsi ' kɨ rɨ , use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru iwʉ ' pʉrorooi pona . Mɨrɨ yau iyereutasa ' esi ' pʉ erasu amʉ ' pokon pe a ' non pɨ ' apo ' piyau .

text: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death ; and found none .
text2: Use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporon kon nɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' Konsʉrʉʉi ton esi ' pʉ Sises ewa ' nomato ' tʉuya ' nokon ipɨkɨrɨ eporo i ' se itʉto ' pe tʉuya ' nokon ima ' tato ' ya ' , e ' tane to ' uya ɨ ' rɨ rɨ eporo ' pʉ pen nɨ .

text: For many bare false witness against him , but their witness agreed not together .
text2: Tu ' kan kon nɨ usaurokʉ ' pʉ ipɨ ' kasi ye ' pe rɨ , e ' tane ɨsi ' kaisa rɨ pʉra to ' maimu esi ' pʉ .

text: And there arose certain , and bare false witness against him , saying ,
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , tʉron kon e ' soto ' pɨ ' sa ' usaurokʉ ' pʉ kasi ye ' pe rɨ ipɨ ' se tukai ' :

text: We heard him say , I will destroy this temple that is made with hands , and within three days I will build another made without hands .
text2: “ Ina uya eta ' pʉ , ‘ Serɨ ka ' pon nʉkoneka ' pʉ use ' man nɨto ' , ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' ma ' tanʉkʉ uya mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ osorʉwau wʉi yau , tʉron nɨ kanan amɨ uya , ka ' pon nʉkoneka ' pʉ pe pʉra nin si , ’ ta iya , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: But neither so did their witness agree together .
text2: Mɨrɨ rɨ e ' tane , ɨsi ' kaisa rɨ pʉra to ' maimu esi ' pʉ .

text: And the high priest stood up in the midst , and asked Jesus , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru e ' soto ' ka ' pʉ to ' rau , mɨrɨpan uya Sises ekama ' popɨtʉ ' pʉ , “ Eikʉ auya pen nɨ pe ' mɨrɨ ? Ɨ ' rɨ tukai ' pʉsamoro ka ' pon amʉ ' usaurokʉ ɨpɨ ' ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But he held his peace , and answered nothing . Again the high priest asked him , and said unto him , Art thou the Christ , the Son of the Blessed ?
text2: E ' tane Sises esi ' pʉ e ' pana rɨ to ' eikʉ iya pʉra rɨ . Use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru uya ekama ' pokaa ' pʉ kanan , “ Ɨmɨrɨ pe ' kʉrɨ rɨ Kʉrai , Iyɨpʉremasa ' pe Te ' sen Mu ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus said , I am : and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' , “ Urɨ rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya . “ Ka ' pon , Papa winon ereutasa ' Meruntɨ pe te ' sen emiya enwo ' netʉ winɨ ento ' auya ' nokon oton , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyepʉ kapuru ' yau Epʉn poi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , and saith , What need we any further witnesses ?
text2: Use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru uya tʉpon karaka ' pʉ . “ Ɨ ' rɨto ' pe miyarɨ rɨ ekamanin nan i ' se e ' nɨ ?

text: Ye have heard the blasphemy : what think ye ? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death .
text2: Metatʉu rɨ sa ' ne ko isaurokʉ Papa sapema pe . Ɨ ' rɨ tukai ' ken mɨsenuminkayatʉu ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . Tanporon kon uya rɨ eno ' ma ' pʉ ima ' tato ' pe .

text: And some began to spit on him , and to cover his face , and to buffet him , and to say unto him , Prophesy : and the servants did strike him with the palms of their hands .
text2: Mɨrɨpan tʉron kon nɨ eta ' tapɨtʉ ' pʉ ipona ; to ' uya itenu auromʉ ' pʉ , tʉmokorooi kon ke to ' uya iwɨnɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan , “ Pu ' kena ' pe ekamakɨ ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' , mɨrɨpan mo ' ka ' pʉ erasu ton uya , mɨrɨpan wɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace , there cometh one of the maids of the high priest :
text2: Pi ' ta esi koro ' tau non po , ɨutɨ pʉrorooi po , uri ' san , use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin poitorʉ uyee ' pʉ .

text: And when she saw Peter warming himself , she looked upon him , and said , And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Pi ' ta a ' no ensa ' tʉuya a ' tai , enpɨtʉ ' pʉ iya a ' ko pe esii ' ma , “ Ɨmɨrɨ rɨ nɨrɨ Nasare ' pon Sises a ' kɨron nʉ ' pʉ , ” ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' .

text: But he denied , saying , I know not , neither understand I what thou sayest . And he went out into the porch ; and the cock crew .
text2: E ' tane i ' tunin pe pʉra iye ' kuu ' pʉ , “ I ' tu uya pʉra man ; ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ uya pʉra man ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' ausaurokʉ tukai ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ utɨn nɨto ' e ' ma ta ' , mɨrɨ a ' tai kɨrɨtɨkɨ uturumʉ ' pʉ .

text: And a maid saw him again , and began to say to them that stood by , This is one of them .
text2: To ' poitorʉ uri ' san uya ensa ' a ' tai mɨrɨ yau , takaa ' pʉ iya kanan te ' soto ' pɨ ' se iwoi te ' san pɨ ' , “ Pʉse rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ to ' tonpa , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he denied it again . And a little after , they that stood by said again to Peter , Surely thou art one of them : for thou art a Galilaean , and thy speech agreeth thereto .
text2: I ' tunin pe pʉra kanan iye ' ku ' kaa ' pʉ . Mara rɨ iyesi tʉpo , kamoro a ' ko pe iye ' soto ' pɨ ' sa ' kon uya ta ' pʉ Pi ' ta pɨ ' , “ I ' napai rɨ kuru rɨ ɨmɨrɨ kʉrɨ rɨ to ' tonpa , apʉne pʉra Kiyarari pon pe ɨwesi , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: But he began to curse and to swear , saying , I know not this man of whom ye speak .
text2: Tiwano ' pe rɨ iye ' pa ' nʉkʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Pʉse rɨ ka ' pon ipɨ ' masauro ' atʉi ' ne ' i ' tu uya pʉra man ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And the second time the cock crew . And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him , Before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice . And when he thought thereon , he wept .
text2: Inke pʉra rɨ , iyakon ite ' kwa pe kɨrɨtɨkɨ uturumʉ ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Pi ' ta uya Sises maimu rʉ ' pʉ nee ' pʉ tenu ya ' tʉpɨ ' isauro ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ , “ Kɨrɨtɨkɨ uturumʉ rawɨrɨ iyakon ite ' kwa pe , ‘ I ' tu uya pʉra man , ’ tato ' auya oton osorʉwau ite ' kwa , ” ta ' pʉ iya rʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan ukaramʉ ' pʉ .

text: And straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council , and bound Jesus , and carried him away , and delivered him to Pilate .
text2: Ipan pe awanakʉi ' kuru , use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton pokon pe , Main pɨ ' enupanin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporo Konsʉrʉ amʉ ' ekoneka ' pʉ . To ' uya Sises auronpɨtʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan arɨ ' pʉ to ' uya Paire ' ena ' .

text: And Pilate asked him , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answering said unto him , Thou sayest it .
text2: “ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' kin pe ' ɨmɨrɨ ? ” tukai ' Paire ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ . “ Ewai ' , mʉkayai ' ne ' kasa rɨ , ” tukai ' Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ .

text: And the chief priests accused him of many things : but he answered nothing .
text2: Tu ' kan ke rɨ use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru uya eseru ' tɨ ' pʉ .

text: And Pilate asked him again , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? behold how many things they witness against thee .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' Paire ' uya kanan ekama ' pokaa ' pʉ , “ Eikʉ auya pen nɨ pe ' mɨrɨ ? Menyan pe ' tu ' kan pɨ ' rɨ to ' uya ɨyeseru ' tɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But Jesus yet answered nothing ; so that Pilate marvelled .
text2: E ' tane Sises uya entakanoma ' pʉ pen nɨ ; mɨrɨ uya Paire ' ewansiuka ' pʉ .

text: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner , whomsoever they desired .
text2: Iteseru si esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ , to ' enta ' nato ' weyu a ' tai a ' sisa ' nonkato ' ka ' pon amʉ ' nekama ' po ' pʉ .

text: And there was one named Barabbas , which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him , who had committed murder in the insurrection .
text2: Ka ' pon , Parapas tukai ' tesa ' sen esi ' pʉ pariki ' si tau , pata esanon pokon pe ɨsewa ' nomapai te ' san koro ' tau , ka ' pon wɨnin nʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ a ' tai .

text: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them .
text2: Anpisin uyee ' pʉ Paire ' piya ' tʉnku ' se ' e ' ku ' se ' na iye ' to ' pe tiwano ' kon pe .

text: But Pilate answered them , saying , Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: “ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' kin pe ' nonka uya i ' se me ' atʉu ɨiwano ' kon pe ? ” ta ' pʉ Paire ' uya to ' pɨ ' ,

text: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy .
text2: tɨkɨnta kon wenai rɨ use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru uya Sises tʉsa ' tena ' i ' tui ' ma rɨ .

text: But the chief priests moved the people , that he should rather release Barabbas unto them .
text2: E ' tane use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru uya ka ' pon amʉ ' tʉrʉnka ' pʉ Paire ' uya Parapas ru ' ku nonkato ' pe tiwano ' kon pe tawon nan pe .

text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them , What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews ?
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe ken si Esuwerʉ amʉ ' kin tato ' kupʉ uya ? ” ta ' pʉ Paire ' uya to ' pɨ ' .

text: And they cried out again , Crucify him .
text2: “ Kurusu ' pona ipokapɨ ' kɨ ! ” tukai ' to ' ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉ ' pʉ .

text: Then Pilate said unto them , Why , what evil hath he done ? And they cried out the more exceedingly , Crucify him .
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨto ' pe ? Ɨ ' rɨ ɨri ku ' sa ' iya ? ” tukai ' Paire ' uya to ' ekama ' po ' pʉ . E ' tane miyarɨ rɨ eke pe to ' ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉ ' pʉ , “ Kurusu ' pona ipokapɨ ' kɨ ! ” tukai ' .

text: And so Pilate , willing to content the people , released Barabbas unto them , and delivered Jesus , when he had scourged him , to be crucified .
text2: Pori ' pe anpisin ɨnku ' pai tesi pɨ ' , Paire ' uya Parapas nonka ' pʉ to ' iwano ' pe . Sises ari ' po ' pɨ ' to ' pe to ' uya ikupʉ ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan nonka ' pʉ iya to ' ena ' kurusu ' pona to ' uya ipokapɨ ' to ' pe .

text: And the soldiers led him away into the hall , called Praetorium ; and they call together the whole band .
text2: Sises ewonnʉkʉ ' pʉ soisa amʉ ' uya kopʉna iwʉ ' ta ' ( kopʉna pe e ' nɨ iwʉ ' , Pʉre ' toriun itese ' ) , mɨrɨpan kon uya tanporo tʉtonpa kon soisa amʉ ' kɨ ' ma ' pʉ .

text: And they clothed him with purple , and platted a crown of thorns , and put it about his head ,
text2: To ' uya tʉtariren pon ya ' ipontɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya tikʉ ke te ' sen e ' mepɨtʉ ' pʉ aro ' , kʉron pe , mɨrɨpan ke to ' uya arʉko ' tɨ ' pʉ .

text: And began to salute him , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon uya esa ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ , “ Miyarɨ , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' kin ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And they smote him on the head with a reed , and did spit upon him , and bowing their knees worshipped him .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon uya kanan iwɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ i ' pai pɨ ' yʉi ke , mɨrɨpan kon eta ' tapɨtʉ ' pʉ ipona . To ' uta ' mo ' kapɨtʉ ' pʉ tese ' mu kon pona ' ne inama pe itese ' .

text: And when they had mocked him , they took off the purple from him , and put his own clothes on him , and led him out to crucify him .
text2: Isapema ' pʉ tʉuya ' nokon nonka tʉpo , to ' uya tʉtariren pon mo ' ka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya ipontɨ ' pʉ ipon nɨ nin si ya ' . Mɨrɨpan arɨ ' pʉ to ' uya kurusu ' pona ipokapɨ ' se ' na .

text: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian , who passed by , coming out of the country , the father of Alexander and Rufus , to bear his cross .
text2: Ka ' pon Sairini winon , Saiman itese ' , Arisanta mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Ru ' pos kʉipʉnʉ uyepʉ esi ' pʉ eke pata ya ' sunwapai , mɨrɨpan a ' kwarʉka ' pʉ to ' uya kurusu ' ato ' pe iya .

text: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha , which is , being interpreted , The place of a skull .
text2: Sises nee ' pʉ to ' uya pata Korʉko ' ta tato ' ya ' , pu ' pɨ ɨ ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ pata ta e ' kwa pe .

text: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh : but he received it not .
text2: Mɨrɨpan o ' pa ' pʉ to ' uya waain sumasa ' i ' ne ' mɨrʉ itese ' ke , e ' tane ensi iya pʉra iyesi ' pʉ .

text: And when they had crucified him , they parted his garments , casting lots upon them , what every man should take .
text2: Mɨrɨpan pokapɨtʉ ' pʉ to ' uya kurusu ' pona . Ipon nʉ ' pʉ ta ' nʉkʉ ' pʉ to ' uya , i ' tuto ' ipɨ ' ke te ' wapiya ' kapɨ ' se , epopɨtʉ ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And it was the third hour , and they crucified him .
text2: To ' uya kurusu ' pona ipokapɨtʉ ' pʉ 9 a ' kʉra ' .

text: And the superscription of his accusation was written over , THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Iwɨto ' iwenai ento ' ipɨ ' menukasa ' uya , ta esi ' pʉ : esuwerʉ amʉ ' kin , tukai ' .

text: And with him they crucify two thieves ; the one on his right hand , and the other on his left .
text2: To ' uya ipokon pe asa ' ron kon ama ' amʉ ' pokapɨ ' sa ' kurusu ' pona esi ' pʉ , tikin nɨ itenwo ' netʉ winɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tikin nɨ ikamisi winɨ .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled , which saith , And he was numbered with the transgressors .
text2: Serɨ kasa kuru si iye ' menukasa ' itekare uta ' ku ' tɨ ' pʉ , “ Ɨri ku ' nin nʉ ' san pokon pe iyesi ' pʉ , ” tawon .

text: And they that passed by railed on him , wagging their heads , and saying , Ah , thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days ,
text2: Kamoro ipiyawɨrɨ tʉutɨsan uya ɨri pe rɨ isapema ' pʉ . Ti ' pai kon sʉkʉsʉkʉma ' pʉ to ' uya , “ Ɨmɨrɨ si , ‘ use ' man nɨto ' , ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' ma ' tanʉkʉ uya , mɨrɨpan kanan amɨkapʉ uya osorʉwau wʉi yau , ’ tawon nʉ ' pʉ ,

text: Save thyself , and come down from the cross .
text2: ɨu ' tɨkɨ si kurusu ' poi , epika ' tɨkɨ ɨiwano ' pe ! ” tai ' ma .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes , He saved others ; himself he cannot save .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Main pɨ ' enupanin nan uya isapema ' pʉ tʉmɨrɨ ' nokon pe . “ Tʉron kon pika ' tɨ ' pʉ iya , e ' tane tiwano ' pe iyepika ' tɨ pʉra iyesi !

text: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross , that we may see and believe . And they that were crucified with him reviled him .
text2: Tɨwɨ pʉse rɨ Kʉrai , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' kin nʉu ' tɨi serɨ pe kurusu ' poi ento ' pe , mɨrɨpan apurɨto ' pe , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . Kamoro iya ' kɨrɨ kurusu ' pona ipokapɨ ' sa ' kon uya rɨ nɨrɨ isapema ' pʉ .

text: And when the sixth hour was come , there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour .
text2: 12 a ' kʉra ' a ' tai , pata ewarumamʉ ' pʉ 3 a ' kʉra ' pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ .

text: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? which is , being interpreted , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: 3 a ' kʉra ' iye ' tane Sises ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉ ' pʉ eke pe rɨ , “ Iroi , Iroi , rama sapa ' tani ? ” ta ' pʉ iya , “ Papa , Papa , ɨ ' rɨto ' pe unonkasa ' auya ? ” ta e ' kwa pe .

text: And some of them that stood by , when they heard it , said , Behold , he calleth Elias .
text2: Kamoro a ' ko pe iye ' soto ' pɨ ' sa ' kon uya serɨ etasa ' a ' tai , “ Apʉne etatɨ ' , Iraisa kɨ ' ma pɨ ' man , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And one ran and filled a spunge full of vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink , saying , Let alone ; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down .
text2: Tikin nan ka ' pon eka ' tumʉ ' pʉ su ' pa ki ' se ' na waain peneka ka ' , yʉi pɨ ' tepu ' tɨi ' Sises uya ensito ' pe itʉrʉ ' pʉ iya . “ Tɨwɨ nesii ; apʉne Iraisa uyepʉ imo ' kase ' na enpai ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus cried with a loud voice , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Sises ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ eke pe rɨ , mɨrɨpan erikʉ ' pʉ .

text: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom .
text2: Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' itau wapu ekaraka ' pʉ a ' sa ' mʉyai inakapu awonsi ' kɨ non pona .

text: And when the centurion , which stood over against him , saw that he so cried out , and gave up the ghost , he said , Truly this man was the Son of God .
text2: Eke soisa amʉ ' epuru pe te ' sen iye ' soto ' kasa ' rʉ ' pʉ Sises rau uya Sises ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉmʉ eta ' pʉ , iyerikʉ rɨ ene ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya , “ I ' napai rɨ kuru rɨ ka ' si , pʉse rɨ esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ wa Papa Mumu pe ! ” ta ' pʉ .

text: There were also women looking on afar off : among whom was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses , and Salome ;
text2: Tʉron kon uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' uya enpɨtʉ ' pʉ ɨnnonsi ' kɨ , mɨrɨpan kon koro ' tau Meri Mataren , Meri kanan aiko Isens mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Isoses san , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Saromi esi ' pʉ .

text: ( Who also , when he was in Galilee , followed him , and ministered unto him ; ) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem .
text2: Kiyarari ponsi ' kɨ pʉsamoro uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' uyee ' pʉ iya ' kɨrɨ , i ' se iye ' to ' ke to ' uya imainanpa ' pʉ . Tu ' kan kon tʉron kon uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' iya ' kɨrɨ iye ' sa ' kon nʉ ' san Surusiran pona rɨ nɨrɨ esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ yau .

text: And now when the even was come , because it was the preparation , that is , the day before the sabbath ,
text2: Ekonekan Weyu pe iyesi ' pʉ , Sapa ' e ' ma ta ' . Pata uko ' mamʉ koro ' tau ,

text: Joseph of Arimathaea , and honourable counseller , which also waited for the kingdom of God , came , and went in boldly unto Pilate , and craved the body of Jesus .
text2: Isose ' , Arama ' tiya pon to ' nʉnamanʉ pe kuru te ' sen Konsʉrʉ amʉ ' tonpa , Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe uyepʉ enupɨkɨrɨ nɨrɨ te ' sen utɨ ' pʉ enari ' mʉra rɨ Paire ' piya ' , Sises ekepu ekama ' pose ' na .

text: And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead : and calling unto him the centurion , he asked him whether he had been any while dead .
text2: Paire ' usewansiuka ' pʉ iyeri ' ka ' sa ' ta tetai ' . Soisa amʉ ' epuru tʉkɨ ' mai ' , ekama ' po ' pʉ iya , “ Sises pe ' eri ' ka ' sa ' ? ” tukai ' .

text: And when he knew it of the centurion , he gave the body to Joseph .
text2: Soisa amʉ ' epuru uya nin si tʉpana ' tɨsa ' a ' tai , “ Iyeri ' ka ' sa ' rɨ , ” tukai ' , itekepu nin si nonka ' pʉ iya mɨrɨ Isose ' ena ' .

text: And he bought fine linen , and took him down , and wrapped him in the linen , and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock , and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre .
text2: Isose ' uya nin si epe ' kena ' pon renen tato ' atʉ enna ' pʉ mɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan uya Sises ekepu mo ' ka ' pʉ kurusu ' poi , iwontɨ ' pʉ iya pon atʉ ke , mɨrɨpan emaika ' pʉ iya uruwai ' pe tɨ ' akasa ' ya ' . Mɨrɨpan mʉra ' taai pona tɨ ' tɨrinka ' pʉ iya .

text: And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses beheld where he was laid .
text2: Meri Mataren mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Meri , Isoses san uya mɨrɨ airɨ itʉrʉ ene ' pʉ .

text: And when the sabbath was past , Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James , and Salome , had bought sweet spices , that they might come and anoint him .
text2: Sapa ' pata ' pʉ pe , Meri Mataren , Meri , Isens san , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Saromi uya a ' po ' nan enna ' pʉ Sises ekepu karapaimai ' tʉutɨto ' kon pe .

text: And very early in the morning the first day of the week , they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun .
text2: Awanakʉi ' kuru suntaaka epiya ' tɨ pe wʉi enu enu ' tane , to ' utɨ esi ' pʉ tɨ ' akasa ' uruwai ' pona ,

text: And they said among themselves , Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre ?
text2: “ Ɨnʉ ' uya tɨ ' uruwai ' mʉra ' ta pon tɨrinkato ' pe uiwano ' kon pe ? ” tukai ' to ' usekama ' po ' pʉ .

text: And when they looked , they saw that the stone was rolled away : for it was very great .
text2: E ' tane , tenu kon tʉsa ' to ' uya a ' tai , to ' uya eke kuru rɨ tɨ ' e ' tɨrinkasa ' ene ' pʉ .

text: And entering into the sepulchre , they saw a young man sitting on the right side , clothed in a long white garment ; and they were affrighted .
text2: Tɨ ' akasa ' uruwai ' pe ya ' to ' ewomʉ koro ' tau , moine , aimu ' nan ipon ereutasa ' enwo ' ne ' winɨ ene ' pʉ to ' uya , mɨrɨpan pɨ ' to ' etʉipɨtʉ ' pʉ .

text: And he saith unto them , Be not affrighted : Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth , which was crucified : he is risen ; he is not here : behold the place where they laid him .
text2: “ Ketʉipɨ ' tʉu , ” ta ' pʉ iya . “ Si ' tuyai ' Sises , Nasare ' pon warinpa auya ' nokon kurusu ' pona ipokapɨ ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ . Serɨ yau pʉra man , iye ' mʉ ' sa ' kakaa ' pʉ man ! Apʉne entɨ ' , to ' uya itʉrʉ ' pʉ pata ' pʉ .

text: But go your way , tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee : there shall ye see him , as he said unto you .
text2: E ' tane entantɨ ' ipoitorʉ ton nʉ ' san ipana ' tɨtantɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pi ' ta rɨ , ‘ Itɨ mɨrɨ Kiyarari pona arawɨrɨ ' nokon . Mɨrɨ yau ene auya ' nokon , ta ' pʉ tʉuya kasa rɨ , ’ ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they went out quickly , and fled from the sepulchre ; for they trembled and were amazed : neither said they any thing to any man ; for they were afraid .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon epa ' ka ' pʉ to ' eka ' tumʉ ' pʉ uruwai ' piyapai e ' tɨtɨtɨ ' kai ' ma , apʉne pʉra ipan pe rɨ to ' etʉipɨ ' sa ' esi ' pʉ . Ɨ ' rɨ ta ' pʉ to ' uya pen nɨ ɨnʉ ' pɨ ' rɨ , apʉne pʉra enari ' ke ' pe tesi kon pɨ ' .

text: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week , he appeared first to Mary Magdalene , out of whom he had cast seven devils .
text2: Uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' utɨ ' pʉ Pi ' ta mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itonpa ton piya ' to ' ken nɨ tʉpana ' tɨ ' pʉ kon ekamase ' na to ' pɨ ' .

text: And she went and told them that had been with him , as they mourned and wept .
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo , tʉpoitorʉ ton poro , Sises uya tʉmɨrɨ pe , wʉi enu uye ' to ' winɨpai , wʉi enu utɨto ' pʉ ' kʉ pona wakʉ , to ' panʉ ' nin tɨwɨro ' epika ' tɨn nɨto ' ekareei ennoko ' pʉ . Amen .

text: And they , when they had heard that he was alive , and had been seen of her , believed not .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya , “ Sises man nurɨne . Ene ' pʉ uya , ” ta tane iya , to ' uya apurɨ pʉra rɨ iyesi ' pʉ .

text: After that he appeared in another form unto two of them , as they walked , and went into the country .
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo , Sises usenpoika ' pʉ tʉron nɨ pe tenai ' asa ' ron kon utɨ koro ' tau pata ya ' .

text: And they went and told it unto the residue : neither believed they them .
text2: Pʉsamoro si enna ' po ' pʉ tʉron kon pɨ ' ekamase ' na , e ' tane to ' apurɨ to ' uya pʉra rɨ iyesi ' pʉ .

text: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat , and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart , because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen .
text2: Emennʉ ' pʉ rɨ , Sises usenpoika ' pʉ 11 kaisaron kon piya ' to ' enta ' na tane . To ' eseremekʉ ' pʉ iya to ' napurɨnʉ pʉra iyesi pɨ ' , sa ' man pe rɨ iye ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' ennin nʉ ' san anapurɨpai pʉra to ' esi pɨ ' .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye into all the world , and preach the gospel to every creature .
text2: Ta ' pʉ iya si to ' pɨ ' , “ Entantɨ ' tanporo rɨ non poro pata awɨrɨ wakʉ itekare ekamatantɨ ' Papa nʉkapʉ ' san pɨ ' .

text: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved ; but he that believeth not shall be damned .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ apurɨnin nɨ epa ' taisimasa ' rɨ epika ' tɨ , e ' tane ɨnʉ ' rɨ kʉrɨ apurɨnin pen nɨ eno ' ma rɨ .

text: And these signs shall follow them that believe ; In my name shall they cast out devils ; they shall speak with new tongues ;
text2: Pʉsamoro uyese ' apurɨnin nan uya si i ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ meruntɨ eporo mɨrɨ makoi amʉ ' enpa ' kapɨtʉ mɨrɨ uyese ' yau to ' si usaurokʉ mɨrɨ emenna ' main , siran yau .

text: They shall take up serpents ; and if they drink any deadly thing , it shall not hurt them ; they shall lay hands on the sick , and they shall recover .
text2: To ' uya ɨkʉi anʉmʉ mɨrɨ temiyatʉ kon ke , mɨrɨpan kon uya ɨsɨ rɨ paisin ensi , e ' tane e ' ne ' pe to ' kupʉ iya pen nɨ , mɨrɨpan kon uya temiyatʉ kon nonka takuru ' kena ' nan ka ' pon amʉ ' pona ' ne , mɨrɨpan kon usepi ' tɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them , he was received up into heaven , and sat on the right hand of God .
text2: Itepuru Sises usaurokʉ ' pʉ tʉpo to ' pokon pe , itanʉmʉ ' pʉ Epʉn pona , mɨrɨpan ereuta ' pʉ enwo ' ne ' Papa emiyatʉ winɨ .

text: And they went forth , and preached everywhere , the Lord working with them , and confirming the word with signs following . Amen .
text2: Mɨrɨpan ipoitorʉ ton utɨ ' pʉ itekare ekamase ' na mɨ awɨrɨ rɨ , mɨrɨpan Itepuru e ' tʉrawasoma ' pʉ to ' a ' kɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan i ' napai rɨ tʉmaimu to ' nekamanʉ esi ekamanin pe i ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ eke ton tʉrawaso kupʉ ' pʉ iya .

text: Forasmuch as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us ,
text2: Imenuka uya ɨyena ' , eke Tiyo ' peras , tu ' kan kon nɨ uya imenukasa ' iye ' ku ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ Sises pɨ ' ina koro ' tau .

text: Even as they delivered them unto us , which from the beginning were eyewitnesses , and ministers of the word ;
text2: Ina pɨ ' tʉron kon nekama ' pʉ menuka ' pʉ to ' uya . Kamo ina pana ' tɨsa ' iya na ' ne ' nan uya tanporo iye ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ si ' kɨrɨ ene ' pʉ . Kamoro si kamoro Papa apiyo ' pe te ' san tʉron kon enupa tʉuya ' nokon winɨ imaimu pɨ ' .

text: It seemed good to me also , having had perfect understanding of all things from the very first , to write unto thee in order , most excellent Theophilus ,
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai , urɨ uya rɨ nɨrɨ si a ' tomasa ' pɨ ' tanporon nɨ , iye ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ si ' kɨrɨ , urɨ pona nɨrɨ kanan si wakʉ pe iyesi ɨiwano ' pe imenukato ' pe uya , ɨmɨrɨ , eke tʉnamasen Tiyo ' peras ,

text: That thou mightest know the certainty of those things , wherein thou hast been instructed .
text2: i ' tu pa i ' napairon ɨyenupasa ' na ' ne ' ipɨ ' .

text: There was in the days of Herod , the king of Judaea , a certain priest named Zacharias , of the course of Abia : and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron , and her name was Elisabeth .
text2: Kin pe Era ' esi a ' tai Isutiya po , moro Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin esi ' pʉ Sakaraya itese ' , Apisa o ' noron kon tonpa . Ino ' pʉ , Resipe ' itese ' esi ' pʉ kanan , Eran pa rʉ ' pʉ pe .

text: And they were both righteous before God , walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless .
text2: Asa ' rɨ rɨ marɨ Papa Maimu awɨron kon pe to ' esi ' pʉ , tanporon nɨ Papa Maimu awɨrɨ te ' san pe to ' esi ' pʉ tʉpʉreme ' se pʉra .

text: And they had no child , because that Elisabeth was barren , and they both were now well stricken in years .
text2: E ' tane to ' munkɨ pʉra iyesi ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra Resipe ' esi ' pʉ tʉumu ' tasen pe pʉra . Asa ' rɨ rɨ marɨ to ' ukɨɨi ' pansa ' esi ' pʉ .

text: And it came to pass , that while he executed the priest ' s office before God in the order of his course ,
text2: Tʉron nɨ a ' tai nin si , tʉweyu kon e ' seposa ' a ' tai , tamʉtʉ ton pokon pe Sakaraya e ' tʉrawasoma esi ' pʉ , use ' man nɨto ' Papa ena ' tʉrawasoma pɨ ' Surusiran po , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' tau .

text: According to the custom of the priest ' s office , his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord .
text2: Itonpa ton uya anʉnsa ' esi ' pʉ tʉutanʉnto ' kon eseru yau iyewonto ' pe Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' ta ' a ' po ' nan kɨrɨi ' nʉnpase ' na .

text: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense .
text2: Sakaraya ewonsa ' a ' tai Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' ta ' a ' po ' nan kɨrɨi ' nʉnpase ' na , pʉroroi po tanporo iyamʉrasa ' kon ɨpʉremase ' na esi ' pʉ ɨpʉreman pɨ ' .

text: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense .
text2: Mɨrɨ koro ' tau , Papa inserʉʉi usenpoika ' pʉ itenu ya ' . Mɨrɨpan e ' soto ' kasa ' esi ' pʉ a ' po ' nan kɨrɨi ' nʉnpato ' apon enwo ' netʉ winɨ .

text: And when Zacharias saw him , he was troubled , and fear fell upon him .
text2: Sakaraya uya ensa ' a ' tai , iyetʉipɨtʉ ' pʉ ipɨ ' .

text: But the angel said unto him , Fear not , Zacharias : for thy prayer is heard ; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son , and thou shalt call his name John .
text2: E ' tane , “ Ketʉipɨtʉi ! ” ta ' pʉ inserʉ uya ipɨ ' . “ Ɨwɨpʉremato ' etasa ' Papa uya man . Ɨno ' pʉ , Resipe ' uya ɨmʉre epoto ' oton , mɨrɨpan mese ' tɨi ' Isaan tukai ' .

text: And thou shalt have joy and gladness ; and many shall rejoice at his birth .
text2: Pori ' pe kuru ɨku ' to ' iya oton mɨrɨ . Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tu ' kan kon nɨ epori ' mato ' oton iyentusa ' a ' tai ,

text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord , and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink ; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost , even from his mother ' s womb .
text2: apʉne pʉra Papa enu yau eke pe kuru iye ' to ' oton . Ɨ ' rɨ rɨ kata ' pan ensinin pe kʉse ' nin , Papa A ' kwarʉ yen pe iye ' to ' oton iyentu ' pʉ si ' kɨrɨ .

text: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God .
text2: Tu ' kan kon nɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' na ' poto ' iya oton Papa winɨkʉi ' ,

text: And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias , to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children , and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just ; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord .
text2: mɨrɨpan utɨto ' oton Itepuru rawɨrɨ meruntɨ pe , Iraisa esi ' pʉ kasa , tʉmunkɨ kon i ' nʉnkanin nan pe ikʉipʉnʉ ton e ' to ' pe to ' ewan ensimato ' iya oton , main awɨron kon pen nɨrɨ ipokena ' pu ' ketʉ yau te ' ton kon pe . Ka ' pon amʉ ' konekanin pe itepuru e ' ma ta ' , ” ta ' pʉ inserʉ uya .

text: And Zacharias said unto the angel , Whereby shall I know this ? for I am an old man , and my wife well stricken in years .
text2: Sakaraya uya inserʉ ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Nai kasa i ' tu uya i ' napai rɨ serɨ esi tukai ' ? Intomi ' si pe esi , uno ' pʉ nɨrɨ esi no ' sami ' si pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And the angel answering said unto him , I am Gabriel , that stand in the presence of God ; and am sent to speak unto thee , and to shew thee these glad tidings .
text2: Inserʉ uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Kepʉrerʉ urɨ , Papa piyawon urɨ , enno ' sa ' urɨ ayauro ' kase ' na , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wakʉ itekare ekamase ' na ɨpɨ ' .

text: And , behold , thou shalt be dumb , and not able to speak , until the day that these things shall be performed , because thou believest not my words , which shall be fulfilled in their season .
text2: Umaimu apurɨ auya pʉra iyesi pɨ ' , ɨye ' maimu ' ka nin mɨrɨ , ausauro ' to ' oton pen unekama ' pʉ e ' kupʉ pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ inserʉ uya .

text: And the people waited for Zacharias , and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple .
text2: Mɨrɨ koro ' tau , ka ' pon amʉ ' enurikʉ ' pʉ Sakaraya enupɨkɨrɨ , usenuminkan pɨ ' to ' esi ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' inke kuru rɨ iko ' mamʉ tepa ' kai ' pʉra ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And when he came out , he could not speak unto them : and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple : for he beckoned unto them , and remained speechless .
text2: Mɨrɨpan epa ' kasa ' a ' tai , isaurokʉ pʉra iyesi ' pʉ . To ' uya i ' tu ' pʉ Papa uya itenu a ' kwakasa ' uya ɨ ' rɨ rɨ ensa ' tukai ' , apʉne pʉra temiyatʉ ke tauro ' ka iya ' nokon pɨ ' , asaurokʉi ' ma pʉra .

text: And it came to pass , that , as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished , he departed to his own house .
text2: Te ' tʉrawasomato ' weyu u ' ma ' sa ' a ' tai , itunta ' pʉ tiwʉ ' ta ' .

text: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived , and hid herself five months , saying ,
text2: Serɨ pata ' pʉ pe , ino ' pʉ Resipe ' umono ' ta ' pʉ . Mɨrɨpan uko ' mamʉ ' pʉ tepa ' kai ' pʉra 5 kaisa rɨ kapʉi tiwʉ ' tau .

text: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me , to take away my reproach among men .
text2: “ Papa uya kuru serɨ ku ' sa ' serɨ uiwano ' pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya . “ Serɨ a ' tai kuru si piyɨ ' nʉ ' imʉre pʉra ka ' pon amʉ ' koro ' tau e ' to ' mo ' kasa ' iya man upiyapai , ” ta ' pʉ Resipe ' uya .

text: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee , named Nazareth ,
text2: 6 kaisa rɨ kapʉi Resipe ' esi koro ' tau mono ' pe , inserʉ Kepʉrerʉ ennoko ' pʉ Papa uya Kiyarari awon pata Nasare ' itese ' pona .

text: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph , of the house of David ; and the virgin ' s name was Mary .
text2: A ' pɨ ' pʉn uri ' san , Meri itese ' , auro ' kato ' iya ike esi ' pʉ , Isose ' , Tepi ' pa rʉ ' pʉ , no ' pʉ oton pe te ' ton .

text: And the angel came in unto her , and said , Hail , thou that art highly favoured , the Lord is with thee : blessed art thou among women .
text2: Inserʉ uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' . Mɨrɨpan a ' tai , “ Miyarɨ , Papa Nanʉmʉ ' pʉ ! Itepuru man ɨpiyau , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when she saw him , she was troubled at his saying , and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be .
text2: Inserʉ maimu pɨ ' , ipan pe kuru Meri usenuminka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan , “ Ɨ ' rɨ rɨ si ta iya ko ? ” tukai ' .

text: And the angel said unto her , Fear not , Mary : for thou hast found favour with God .
text2: “ Kɨsi ' nʉkʉi , Meri . Wakʉ pe Papa enu yau ɨwesi .

text: And , behold , thou shalt conceive in thy womb , and bring forth a son , and shalt call his name JESUS .
text2: Ɨumono ' tato ' oton , mɨrɨpan entuto ' oton warawo ' pe , mɨrɨpan mese ' tɨi ' Sises tukai ' .

text: He shall be great , and shall be called the Son of the Highest : and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David :
text2: Eke pe kuru iye ' to ' oton . Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eke kuru Papa Mumu Kʉrɨ rɨ tukai ' , esa ' to ' oton . Itepuru Papa uya Kin pe iku ' to ' oton itamokori Tepi ' esi ' pʉ kasa ,

text: And he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever ; and of his kingdom there shall be no end .
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Seko ' payan nʉ ' san epuru pe iye ' to ' oton inke rɨ . Kin pe iye ' to ' e ' nonkato ' oton pen , ” ta ' pʉ inserʉ uya .

text: Then said Mary unto the angel , How shall this be , seeing I know not a man ?
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨ kasa si serɨ e ' kupʉ , a ' pɨ ' pʉn urɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ Meri uya inserʉ pɨ ' .

text: And the angel answered and said unto her , The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee , and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee : therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God .
text2: “ Iye ' kupʉ rɨ Papa A ' kwarʉ rɨ uyepʉ ɨpona , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa meruntɨrʉ ereuta ɨpiyau . Mɨrɨ pɨ ' wakʉ mʉre esa ' to ' oton Papa Mumu , tukai ' , ” ta ' pʉ inserʉ uya .

text: And , behold , thy cousin Elisabeth , she hath also conceived a son in her old age : and this is the sixth month with her , who was called barren .
text2: “ Ɨtonpa pe ' Resipe ' mi ' tuyan tʉumu ' tasen pen nɨ tato ' ipɨ ' e ' tane , 6 kaisa rɨ kapʉi mono ' pe iyesi mɨrɨ , no ' sami ' si pe kuru iye ' tane ,

text: For with God nothing shall be impossible .
text2: apʉne pʉra tanporon nɨ ku ' nin pe Papa esi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Mary said , Behold the handmaid of the Lord ; be it unto me according to thy word . And the angel departed from her .
text2: “ Itepuru apiyo ' rɨ urɨ . Tɨwɨ si serɨ ne ' kupʉi upɨ ' mekamayai ' ne ' awɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Meri uya . Mɨrɨ ta iya tʉpo , inserʉ uya inɨmɨ ' pʉ .

text: And Mary arose in those days , and went into the hill country with haste , into a city of Juda ;
text2: Mɨrɨ pata ' pʉ pe , inke pʉra Meri ekoneka ' pʉ tʉutɨto ' pe i ' kʉrʉ po te ' sen pata Isutiya pon ya ' .

text: And entered into the house of Zacharias , and saluted Elisabeth .
text2: Pata eposa ' tʉuya a ' tai , Sakaraya iwʉ ' ta ' iyewomʉ ' pʉ . Mɨrɨpan uya , “ Miyarɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Resipe ' pɨ ' .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary , the babe leaped in her womb ; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost :
text2: Resipe ' uya Meri maimu etasa ' a ' tai , imʉre utama ' pʉ itewan yau . Resipe ' nin si uta ' kwarʉ ' tɨ ' pʉ , Papa A ' kwarʉ ke ,

text: And she spake out with a loud voice , and said , Blessed art thou among women , and blessed is the fruit of thy womb .
text2: mɨrɨpan usaurokʉ ' pʉ eke pe , “ Ɨmɨrɨ kuru rɨ si kʉrɨ rɨ wakʉ rɨ uri ' san Papa uya wakʉ ku ' sa ' man ɨpɨ ' tu ' kan kon koro ' tapai ayanʉnsa ' iya , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨmʉre nɨrɨ kanan iten pe me ' ai ' ne ' .

text: And whence is this to me , that the mother of my Lord should come to me ?
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ wenai kuru rɨ uyepuru san uya uka ' kʉranpasa ' ko ?

text: For , lo , as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears , the babe leaped in my womb for joy .
text2: Amaimu etasa ' uya a ' tai , uyau umʉre e ' sanʉmʉ ' pʉ tepori ' ma ke .

text: And blessed is she that believed : for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord .
text2: Wakʉ pe kuru ɨwesi mɨrɨ apurɨ auya pɨ ' Papa Maimu ɨpiya ' iye ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ uta ' ku ' tɨ a ' tai , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Mary said , My soul doth magnify the Lord ,
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Meri uya se kasa ta ' pʉ : “ Uyewan uya kuru Papa apurɨpɨtʉ .

text: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour .
text2: Uya ' kwarʉ esi pori ' pe kuru tʉpika ' tɨnin Papa pɨ ' .

text: For he hath regarded the low estate of his handmaiden : for , behold , from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed .
text2: Sepan nɨ tapiyo ' ku ' sa ' iya pɨ ' tenu yau . Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , serɨ si ' kɨrɨ , tanporon kon serɨ entakanon kon uya uyapurɨpɨ ' to ' oton Papa uya pori ' pe uku ' sa ' pɨ ' .

text: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things ; and holy is his name .
text2: Apʉne pʉra eke rɨ , wakʉ eseru ku ' sa ' Papa uya pɨ ' , upɨ ' ; wakʉ rɨ itese ' .

text: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation .
text2: Tʉnamanin nan pɨ ' , tʉusentu ' masen Kʉrɨ rɨ , to ' epamʉ kaisarɨ rɨ .

text: He hath shewed strength with his arm ; he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts .
text2: Meruntɨ pe tesi ke , wakʉ ton , eke ton ku ' sa ' iya ; mɨ pe te ' ku ' san aimʉrʉnpasa ' iya to ' eseru pokon pe .

text: He hath put down the mighty from their seats , and exalted them of low degree .
text2: Eke ton pe te ' san , itepuru ton nu ' tɨsa ' iya to ' apon poi , sepan kon nʉ ' kwɨ rɨ anʉmʉi ' ma .

text: He hath filled the hungry with good things ; and the rich he hath sent empty away .
text2: Iwan pe te ' san a ' re ' tɨsa ' iya wakʉ ke , imaminkena ' ton ennokoi ' ma itemiyatʉ arʉ pʉra .

text: He hath holpen his servant Israel , in remembrance of his mercy ;
text2: Epʉra ' an , utamokori kon mɨrɨ tʉpo ipayan amʉ ' auro ' ka ' pʉ tʉuya kasa , ɨsentu ' kena ' pe tesi wenai , tapiyo ' Esuwerʉ pika ' tɨsa ' iya , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ imunkɨ amʉ ' miyarɨ rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Meri uya .

text: And Mary abode with her about three months , and returned to her own house .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uko ' mamʉ ' pʉ Resipe ' piyau osorʉwau kapʉi , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyenna ' po ' pʉ tʉpata ya ' .

text: Now Elisabeth ' s full time came that she should be delivered ; and she brought forth a son .
text2: Resipe ' entuto ' weyu e ' seposa ' a ' tai , iyentu ' pʉ warawo ' pe .

text: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her ; and they rejoiced with her .
text2: Itonpa ton akontawon kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itonpa ton kuru uya etasa ' esi ' pʉ , eke pe kuru Papa usentu ' masa ' ipɨ ' tawon . Mɨrɨpan kon esi ' pʉ pori ' pe ipokon pe .

text: And it came to pass , that on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child ; and they called him Zacharias , after the name of his father .
text2: Tikin nɨ suntaaka iyenasa ' a ' tai , itun pi ' pɨ puturʉkato ' e ' seporo ' pʉ . Mɨrɨpan ese ' tɨ to ' uya esi ' pʉ Sakaraya tukai ' , ikʉipʉnʉ ese ' yau .

text: And his mother answered and said , Not so ; but he shall be called John .
text2: E ' tane isan uya , “ Kane , Isaan itese ' kʉrɨ rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ .

text: And they said unto her , There is none of thy kindred that is called by this name .
text2: Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' ta ' pʉ to ' uya , “ E ' tane sa ' ne mɨrɨ tukai ' ɨnʉ ' rɨ ɨtonpa ese ' pʉra iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And they made signs to his father , how he would have him called .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ikʉipʉnʉ auro ' ka ' pʉ to ' uya temiyatʉ kon ke ɨnʉ ' tukai ' ese ' tɨ iya tukai ' .

text: And he asked for a writing table , and wrote , saying , His name is John . And they marvelled all .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , imenukato ' tʉuya ipɨ ' ekama ' po ' pʉ iya . Ka ' pon amʉ ' tewansiukai ' nin si imenuka ' pʉ iya mɨrɨ , “ Itese ' mɨrɨ Isaan , ” tukai ' .

text: And his mouth was opened immediately , and his tongue loosed , and he spake , and praised God .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai rɨ , imaimu epa ' ka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan nin si usaurokʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ Papa apurɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ iya nin si .

text: And fear came on all that dwelt round about them : and all these sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Judaea .
text2: Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' rɨ itonpa ton akontawon kon usewansiuka ' pʉ , mɨrɨ ton pɨ ' usauro ' nɨ pɨ ' to ' esi ' pʉ siya rɨ Isutiya i ' kʉrʉ poro ' ne rɨ .

text: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts , saying , What manner of child shall this be ! And the hand of the Lord was with him .
text2: Tanporon kon etanin nʉ ' san usenuminka ' pʉ serɨ pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan kon usekama ' popɨtʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨnʉ ' pe rɨ si pʉse rɨ mʉre e ' to ' oton ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya , apʉne pʉra Papa meruntɨrʉ yau iyesi pɨ ' .

text: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost , and prophesied , saying ,
text2: Ikʉipʉnʉ Sakaraya uta ' kwarʉ ' tɨ ' pʉ Papa A ' kwarʉ ke . Mɨrɨpan usaurokʉ ' pʉ , Papa uya tauro ' ka ' pʉ ike pɨ ' :

text: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel ; for he hath visited and redeemed his people ,
text2: “ Papa apurɨpɨ ' pai ' nokon , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' e ' to ' itese ' pɨ ' , apʉne pʉra iye ' sa ' pɨ ' tʉpoitorʉ ton mo ' kase ' na .

text: And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David ;
text2: Meruntɨ rɨ , pika ' tɨnin wannɨ ke urepasa ' iya ' nokon pɨ ' , tʉpoitorʉ pe te ' sen , Tepi ' pa rʉ ' pʉ .

text: As he spake by the mouth of his holy prophets , which have been since the world began :
text2: Ta ' pʉ tʉuya awɨrɨ rɨ pena pu ' kena ' amʉ ' poro rɨ .

text: That we should be saved from our enemies , and from the hand of all that hate us ;
text2: Pika ' tɨnin wannɨ uyeyaton kon piyapai uyewaruma ' tɨnin kon enapai .

text: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers , and to remember his holy covenant ;
text2: Utamokori kon pɨ ' isentu ' mato ' pokon pe , wakʉ tʉusaurokʉ ' pʉ kupʉ iya tenu yau .

text: The oath which he sware to our father Abraham ,
text2: Utamokori kon Epʉra ' an pɨ ' , ‘ ikupʉ uya kuru , ’ ta ' pʉ tʉuya ku ' sa ' iya tenu yau .

text: That he would grant unto us , that we being delivered out of the hand of our enemies might serve him without fear ,
text2: Papa uya ta ' pʉ uyeyaton kon enapai umo ' ka kon tʉuya pɨ ' , tʉmaimu awɨrɨ e ' nɨto ' pe tenari ' nʉnse pʉra .

text: In holiness and righteousness before him , all the days of our life .
text2: Wakʉ pe , ipoken e ' nɨto ' pe itenu awɨrɨ uko ' man nɨ kaisa rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And thou , child , shalt be called the prophet of the Highest : for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways ;
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ tʉmu pɨ ' , “ Ɨmɨrɨ , umʉre usesa ' to ' oton pu ' kena ' Papa iwano ' tukai ' , apʉne pʉra ɨutɨto ' oton uyepuru kon rawɨrɨ ite ' ma ta ' ka ' pon amʉ ' koneka pe ,

text: To give knowledge of salvation unto his people by the remission of their sins ,
text2: imunkɨ amʉ ' enupa pɨ ' ɨwe ' to ' oton epika ' tɨn nɨto ' pɨ ' , to ' pɨ ' Papa usentu ' ma winɨ ,

text: Through the tender mercy of our God ; whereby the dayspring from on high hath visited us ,
text2: apʉne pʉra Papa esi pɨ ' ɨsentu ' kena ' pe upɨ ' nokon wʉi enu enuku uya Epʉn poi , uwei ' tɨ kon na ' ne ' kasa , Papa uya Kʉrai tʉnanʉmʉ ' pʉ enno ' to ' oton upiya ' nokon ,

text: To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death , to guide our feet into the way of peace .
text2: to ' wei ' tɨnin pe kamo ewarupɨ yau tʉuko ' mansan uma ' tan nɨto ' pɨ ' tenari ' nʉnsan . Uyanin kon pe usewankaman nɨto ' pen e ' ma tawɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Sakaraya uya tʉmu pɨ ' .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel .
text2: Mɨrɨpan si ' kɨrɨ rɨ , mʉre usemo ' ka ' pʉ pana ' pe ta ' kwarʉ ke . Mɨrɨpan uko ' mamʉ ' pʉ rɨmono ' tau . Mɨrɨ tʉpo , iyepa ' ka ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' enupai ' Papa eseru pɨ ' .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that there went out a decree from Caesar Augustus , that all the world should be taxed .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai itepuru Akosʉ ' tas uya main ennoko ' pʉ tanporon kon pata yawon kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uya tese ' kon menukato ' , ti ' tuto ' kon pe .

text: ( And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria . )
text2: Wapiyaro ' ka ' pon amʉ ' i ' tuto ' pe serɨ esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ Kiriniyas esi Siriya esa ' pe a ' tai .

text: And all went to be taxed , every one into his own city .
text2: Tanporon kon si utɨ ' pʉ mɨrɨ tese ' kon menukai ' tʉtɨpiya kon pata ' pʉ ya ' .

text: And Joseph also went up from Galilee , out of the city of Nazareth , into Judaea , unto the city of David , which is called Bethlehem ; ( because he was of the house and lineage of David : )
text2: Isose ' nɨrɨ si utɨ ' pʉ mɨrɨ Nasare ' , Kiyarari pon ponsi ' kɨ , Isutiya pona Tepi ' pata ' se ' Pe ' teri ' en itese ' pona , apʉne pʉra Tepi ' pa rʉ ' pʉ pe tesi pɨ ' .

text: To be taxed with Mary his espoused wife , being great with child .
text2: Meri , tʉno ' pʉ oton pokon pe rɨ to ' utɨ ' pʉ tese ' kon menukai ' . Mono ' pe iyesi ' pʉ ( Papa A ' kwarʉ mʉre yen pe ) .

text: And so it was , that , while they were there , the days were accomplished that she should be delivered .
text2: Pe ' teri ' en po si to ' esi koro ' tau , iyentuto ' weyu e ' seporo ' pʉ mɨrɨ .

text: And she brought forth her firstborn son , and wrapped him in swaddling clothes , and laid him in a manger ; because there was no room for them in the inn .
text2: Warawo ' pe iyɨmʉrewato ' entu ' pʉ . Mɨrɨpan ontɨ ' pʉ iya kareku saai ' pɨ ' sa ' ke , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ inonka ' pʉ iya paka amʉ ' yu yen ya ' , ɨutɨ ton tau to ' pata ' se ' pʉra iyesi ke .

text: And there were in the same country shepherds abiding in the field , keeping watch over their flock by night .
text2: Karimeru amʉ ' pa ' simanin nan esi ' pʉ ewarupɨ nau itʉi po tikʉn kon pa ' sima pɨ ' .

text: And , lo , the angel of the Lord came upon them , and the glory of the Lord shone round about them : and they were sore afraid .
text2: Mɨrɨ ya ' , Itepuru inserʉʉi uyee ' pʉ to ' piya ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa winɨpaino a ' kwa uya to ' wei ' tɨ ' pʉ . Ipan pe rɨ to ' usi ' nʉkʉ ' pʉ .

text: And the angel said unto them , Fear not : for , behold , I bring you good tidings of great joy , which shall be to all people .
text2: E ' tane inserʉ uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Kɨsi ' nʉ ' tʉu ! Wakʉ itekare ne ' sa ' uya serɨ ɨiwano ' kon pe , tanporon kon nɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' pori ' ma pɨ ' te ' ton .

text: For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour , which is Christ the Lord .
text2: Serɨ ewarupɨɨi tau Tepi ' pata ' se ' yau ɨpika ' tɨnin kon entusa ' man , Kʉrai , Itepuru .

text: And this shall be a sign unto you ; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes , lying in a manger .
text2: Se esi mɨrɨ ento ' auya ' nokon ipɨ ' pe . Se kasa eporo auya ' nokon mɨrɨ . Iwontɨsa ' pe mʉre esi kareku saai ' pɨ ' sa ' ke , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ paka amʉ ' yu yen yau iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God , and saying ,
text2: Mɨrɨ koro ' tau , kʉrɨ rɨ inserʉ piyau tu ' kan kon inserʉ amʉ ' esi ' pʉ userenkan pɨ ' , “ Eke kuru Papa esi ka ' tawon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ non po nɨrɨ tʉusewankamai ' pʉra ka ' pon amʉ ' e ' to ' pe ikupʉ iya , kamo wakʉ tato ' tʉuya ton nɨ pɨ ' , ” tukai ' to ' userenka ' pʉ .

text: And it came to pass , as the angels were gone away from them into heaven , the shepherds said one to another , Let us now go even unto Bethlehem , and see this thing which is come to pass , which the Lord hath made known unto us .
text2: Pʉsamoro si inserʉ amʉ ' enna ' po ' pʉ Epʉn pona a ' tai , kamoro karimeru pa ' simanin nan usaurokʉ ' pʉ , “ Pe ' teri ' en pona utɨnpai ' nokon man , serɨ Itepuru nekama ' pʉ upɨ ' nokon ense ' na , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And they came with haste , and found Mary , and Joseph , and the babe lying in a manger .
text2: Tʉusenutɨi ' to ' utɨ ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ a ' tai Meri mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Isose ' eporo ' pʉ to ' uya , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ mʉre esi ' pʉ paka amʉ ' yu yen yau .

text: And when they had seen it , they made known abroad the saying which was told them concerning this child .
text2: Ene tʉpo , inserʉ nekama ' pʉ ekama ' pʉ to ' uya tu ' kan kon ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' pʉse rɨ mʉre pɨ ' isaurokʉ ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' .

text: And all they that heard it wondered at those things which were told them by the shepherds .
text2: Tanporon kon etanin nʉ ' san usewansiuka ' pʉ karimeru pa ' simanin nan nekama ' pʉ pɨ ' .

text: But Mary kept all these things , and pondered them in her heart .
text2: Meri uya tanporo serɨ pu ' tɨka ' nʉkʉ pʉra iyesi ' pʉ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ isenuminka ' pʉ ipan pe ipɨ ' .

text: And the shepherds returned , glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen , as it was told unto them .
text2: Karimeru pa ' simanin nan enna ' po ' pʉ tʉuserenka kon pe eke pe Papa esi pɨ ' . Tanporo tʉneta ' pʉ kon pɨ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉnene ' pʉ kon pɨ ' nɨrɨ , inserʉ uya ekama ' pʉ kasa .

text: And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child , his name was called JESUS , which was so named of the angel before he was conceived in the womb .
text2: Tikin nɨ suntaaka pata ' pʉ pe , mʉre yun pi ' pɨ puturʉkato ' e ' seposa ' a ' tai , to ' uya ese ' tɨ ' pʉ Sises tukai ' , inserʉ nekama ' pʉ ke isan umono ' ta rawɨrɨ .

text: And when the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were accomplished , they brought him to Jerusalem , to present him to the Lord ;
text2: Isose ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Meri uya Main , Mosi ' winon awɨrɨ ekorʉkan eseru entun nɨ tʉpo tʉku ' sen kupʉ ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ tʉpo , tʉmʉre kon arɨ ' pʉ to ' uya Surusiran pona itʉse ' na Itepuru ena ' .

text: ( As it is written in the law of the Lord , Every male that openeth the womb shall be called holy to the Lord ; )
text2: Iye ' menukasa ' na ' ne ' kasa Itepuru winon Maimu awɨrɨ , “ Tanporon kon wapiya iyentusa ' warawo ' pe te ' san tʉto ' pe Papa ena ' , ” tawon .

text: And to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord , A pair of turtledoves , or two young pigeons .
text2: Ɨse ' mai ' to ' utɨ ' pʉ : “ asa ' rɨ toron amʉ ' , wako ' wa waraino kon ke , ” Itepuru winon Main uya tasa ' awɨrɨ .

text: And , behold , there was a man in Jerusalem , whose name was Simeon ; and the same man was just and devout , waiting for the consolation of Israel : and the Holy Ghost was upon him .
text2: Mɨrɨ yau si , ka ' pon esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ tɨ Surusiran po Simiyan itese ' . Ipokena ' pe te ' sen mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iye ' tʉsa ' pe itekare ya ' te ' sen , tenuri ' sen Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epika ' tɨ enupɨkɨrɨ , Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ esi ' pʉ ipiyau .

text: And it was revealed unto him by the Holy Ghost , that he should not see death , before he had seen the Lord ' s Christ .
text2: Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ uya tasa ' esi ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ɨyerikʉ pen unekama ' pʉ Kʉrai entu rawɨrɨ , ” tukai ' .

text: And he came by the Spirit into the temple : and when the parents brought in the child Jesus , to do for him after the custom of the law ,
text2: Iya ' kwarʉ uya Simiyan arɨ ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' ta ' . Isanon uya asa ' a ' tai pʉse rɨ si mʉre Sises , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' ta ' si Main , Mosi ' winon awɨrɨ ,

text: Then took he him up in his arms , and blessed God , and said ,
text2: Simiyan uya anʉmʉ ' pʉ tena ' , mɨrɨpan uya Papa apurɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ se tukai ' :

text: Lord , now lettest thou thy servant depart in peace , according to thy word :
text2: “ Papa , ausaurokʉ ' pʉ ku ' sa ' auya si man , tɨwɨ si urɨ , ɨpoitorʉ eri ' to ' pe iku ' kɨ ewankamanin pʉra .

text: For mine eyes have seen thy salvation ,
text2: Ensa ' uya si man pʉse ina pika ' tɨnin pe ɨnennoko ' pʉ .

text: Which thou hast prepared before the face of all people ;
text2: Enno ' sa ' auya si , tu ' kan kon nenton pe .

text: A light to lighten the Gentiles , and the glory of thy people Israel .
