text2: Kamo tɨ ' pon kon kamoro main anʉnnin nan pori ' pe eta tʉuya ' nokon a ' tai , e ' tane to ' mi ' pʉra rɨ to ' esi . Aka ' ne ' pe rɨ to ' uya apurɨ , e ' tane ekamʉn uya teposa ' kon a ' tai , to ' uya inonka .

text: And that which fell among thorns are they , which , when they have heard , go forth , and are choked with cares and riches and pleasures of this life , and bring no fruit to perfection .
text2: Ite ' tikʉkenan nʉ ' ta ' ita ' po ' sa ' na ' ne ' mɨrɨ kamoro etanin nan , e ' tane to ' uko ' mamʉ koro ' tau , non eseru uya to ' anpokʉma tʉuko ' mamʉ kon yau tu ' kan pɨ ' rɨ to ' usenuminka , imaminke ' pe te ' to ' kon pɨ ' rɨ , wakʉ pe tʉuko ' manto ' kon pɨ ' rɨ . Mɨrɨpan kon akʉ ' pʉ pʉra iyesi .

text: But that on the good ground are they , which in an honest and good heart , having heard the word , keep it , and bring forth fruit with patience .
text2: E ' tane si wakʉ non po na ' ne ' ite ' kamoro wakʉ pe te ' san , wakʉ itewan ton . Main etanin nan , anʉnnin nan , mɨrɨpan ko ' manʉkʉ to ' uya epeta .

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , covereth it with a vessel , or putteth it under a bed ; but setteth it on a candlestick , that they which enter in may see the light .
text2: “ Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ raan ' pu po ' tɨ pʉra iyesi onanto ' pe tʉuya wai ya ' mɨrɨ pe pʉra te ' nʉnto ' apon o ' koi ' rɨ itʉrʉ iya . E ' tane ru ' ku , itapon pona itʉrʉ iya kamo tewonsan uya iweyu ento ' pe .

text: For nothing is secret , that shall not be made manifest ; neither any thing hid , that shall not be known and come abroad .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ a ' tai nin si tɨ , tanporon nɨ usene ; ama ' ai na ' ne ' serɨ pe usenpoikato ' oton kɨpo ' pona .

text: Take heed therefore how ye hear : for whosoever hath , to him shall be given ; and whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he seemeth to have .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , wakʉ pe tʉusenuminkai ' e ' tɨ ' etato ' auya ' nokon pɨ ' . Ɨnʉ ' rɨ itesa ' pe te ' sen repa mɨrɨ miyarɨ rɨ ; ɨnʉ ' rɨ ɨ ' rɨ esa ' pen nɨ enapai imo ' ka mɨrɨ itesa ' pe tesi tukai ' rɨ iye ' ku ' to ' , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: Then came to him his mother and his brethren , and could not come at him for the press .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai Sises san mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyakon non uyee ' pʉ ense ' na , e ' tane a ' ko pe ipiya ' to ' utɨ poken pʉra rɨ iyesi ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra anpisin esi wenai .

text: And it was told him by certain which said , Thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to see thee .
text2: Ka ' pon uya ipana ' tɨ ' pʉ , “ Asan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ayakon non e ' soto ' pɨ ' sa ' man pʉroroi po , ɨyenpai to ' esi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he answered and said unto them , My mother and my brethren are these which hear the word of God , and do it .
text2: Eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Usan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uyakon non kamoro Papa Maimu eta pɨ ' te ' san , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ikupʉ pɨ ' te ' san , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Now it came to pass on a certain day , that he went into a ship with his disciples : and he said unto them , Let us go over unto the other side of the lake . And they launched forth .
text2: Tʉron nɨ a ' tai , Sises uya tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' , “ Parau ku ' pɨri ratoi pona e ' kwɨrɨ ' nɨpai ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ . Mɨrɨpan kon ekanwa ' tɨsa ' utɨ ' pʉ .

text: But as they sailed he fell asleep : and there came down a storm of wind on the lake ; and they were filled with water , and were in jeopardy .
text2: To ' e ' kwɨrɨtʉ koro ' tau , Sises e ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ɨsɨ pe a ' setun uyepʉ parau ku ' pɨri ka ' uya , to ' kanwa rawoirawoima ' pʉ to ' kuruuka poken .

text: And they came to him , and awoke him , saying , Master , master , we perish . Then he arose , and rebuked the wind and the raging of the water : and they ceased , and there was a calm .
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton uya enpaka ' pʉ , “ Uyepuru , uyepuru ! Aputan pe man ! ” tai ' ma . Mɨrɨpan upakasa ' uya e ' se ' ne ' pe a ' setun pɨ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ sipa ' sipa pɨ ' , “ E ' tʉ ' nɨkɨ ! ” ta ' pʉ . Mɨrɨpan ton si e ' tʉ ' nɨ ' pʉ , imaimu awɨrɨ .

text: And he said unto them , Where is your faith ? And they being afraid wondered , saying one to another , What manner of man is this ! for he commandeth even the winds and water , and they obey him .
text2: “ Nai apurɨto ' auya ' nokon ike ? ” ta ' pʉ iya tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' . Tetʉipɨtʉ kon pe rɨ , tʉusewansiuka kon pe rɨ to ' usekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨnʉ ' si pʉse ? A ' setun mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tuna esereme ' nin , mɨrɨpan ton esi imaimu awɨrɨ ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And they arrived at the country of the Gadarenes , which is over against Galilee .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon si utɨ ' pʉ Kerasa nono pona serɨ si parau ku ' pɨri Kiyarari ratoi pona .

text: And when he went forth to land , there met him out of the city a certain man , which had devils long time , and ware no clothes , neither abode in any house , but in the tombs .
text2: Sises ekanwaka koro ' tau , ka ' pon , makoi a ' kwarʉ yen uya eporo ' pʉ pata winɨpai . Inke pʉse rɨ uko ' mamʉ ' pʉ tʉpon ke pʉra , ɨutɨ tau pʉra rɨ , e ' tane uruwai ' yau ' ne rɨken .

text: When he saw Jesus , he cried out , and fell down before him , and with a loud voice said , What have I to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of God most high ? I beseech thee , torment me not .
text2: Sises ensa ' tʉuya a ' tai , ipirorʉmʉ ' pʉ eke pe , mɨrɨpan useremuruku ' pʉ Sises rau . Mɨrɨpan ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ eke pe , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe ukupʉ i ' se ɨwesi , Sises , Papa Mumu ? Apʉne , ukota ' makapʉi ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: ( For he had commanded the unclean spirit to come out of the man . For oftentimes it had caught him : and he was kept bound with chains and in fetters ; and he brake the bands , and was driven of the devil into the wilderness . )
text2: Serɨ ta ' pʉ iya , apʉne pʉra Sises uya epa ' kakɨ iyapai taka ' sa ' pɨ ' tʉpɨ ' . Sises uya eporo rawɨrɨ , inke rɨ sa ' ne makoi a ' kwarʉ uya a ' sisa ' ko ' manʉ ' sa ' esi ' pʉ . To ' uya rɨ temiyatʉ , ti ' ta rɨ auronpɨ ' sa ' e ' tane i ' sen ke , tʉpa ' simanin ke rɨ te ' tane , i ' kɨrɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ iya rɨ , mɨrɨpan apɨtʉ ' pʉ makoi a ' kwarʉ ton uya tʉ ' kena ' pɨ ya ' .

text: And Jesus asked him , saying , What is thy name ? And he said , Legion : because many devils were entered into him .
text2: Sises uya si ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨnʉ ' ɨyese ' ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . “ Anpisin , ” ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' , apʉne pʉra anpisin yen pe rɨ tesi pɨ ' .

text: And they besought him that he would not command them to go out into the deep .
text2: Mɨrɨpan a ' tai , ipan pe rɨ Sises pawana ' tɨ ' pʉ to ' uya , “ Ina kʉsennokoi ta ' mu kenan pen nɨ ya ' ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And there was there an herd of many swine feeding on the mountain : and they besought him that he would suffer them to enter into them . And he suffered them .
text2: Tu ' kan kon peiruku amʉ ' esi ' pʉ enta ' nan pɨ ' i ' kʉrʉ po a ' ko pe rɨ . Makoi a ' kwarʉ ton uya Sises pawana ' tɨ ' pʉ tenno ' to ' kon pe iya peiruku amʉ ' ya ' . “ Ewai ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: Then went the devils out of the man , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the lake , and were choked .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon utɨ ' pʉ si peiruku amʉ ' ya ' ɨsentɨi ' . Mɨrɨpan kon si e ' tʉrʉ ' kwa ' pʉ parau ku ' pɨri ka ' , mɨrɨpan kon aputa ' pʉ .

text: When they that fed them saw what was done , they fled , and went and told it in the city and in the country .
text2: To ' esanon uya serɨ ensa ' a ' tai , to ' utɨ ' pʉ pata pona ekare ' tɨse ' na siya rɨ pata kaisarɨ rɨ .

text: Then they went out to see what was done ; and came to Jesus , and found the man , out of whom the devils were departed , sitting at the feet of Jesus , clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' uyee ' pʉ iye ' ku ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ ense ' na . To ' uye ' sa ' a ' tai Sises piya ' , to ' uya kʉrɨ rɨ ka ' pon eporo ' pʉ , makoi a ' kwarʉ enpʉ ' pʉ . Sises piyau iyereutasa ' esi ' pʉ iyepontɨsa ' , wakʉ pe nin si iya ' kwarʉ , mɨrɨpan pɨ ' to ' enari ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ .

text: They also which saw it told them by what means he that was possessed of the devils was healed .
text2: Kamoro ennin nʉ ' san uya ekama ' pʉ ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' , “ Makoi a ' kwarʉ yen pe te ' sen epi ' tɨ ' pʉ Sises uya , ” tukai ' .

text: Then the whole multitude of the country of the Gadarenes round about besought him to depart from them ; for they were taken with great fear : and he went up into the ship , and returned back again .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , tanporo Kerasa nono pon kon uya Sises ennoko ' pʉ tʉpiyapai ' nokon , apʉne pʉra enari ' ke ' pe tenasa ' kon pɨ ' . Mɨrɨpan ekanwa ' tɨsa ' utɨ ' pʉ .

text: Now the man out of whom the devils were departed besought him that he might be with him : but Jesus sent him away , saying ,
text2: Itɨ koro ' tau , kʉrɨ rɨ ka ' pon uya Sises pawana ' tɨ ' pʉ iya ' kɨrɨ tʉutɨto ' pe , e ' tane Sises uya ta ' pʉ ,

text: Return to thine own house , and shew how great things God hath done unto thee . And he went his way , and published throughout the whole city how great things Jesus had done unto him .
text2: “ Ɨtunta ' apata ' se ' ya ' Papa nʉkupʉ ' pʉ ɨpɨ ' ekamata ɨtonpa ton pana ya ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨpan si utɨ ' pʉ mɨrɨ , Sises nʉkupʉ ' pʉ tʉpɨ ' ekamase ' na mɨ awɨrɨ rɨ .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Jesus was returned , the people gladly received him : for they were all waiting for him .
text2: Sises enna ' posa ' a ' tai , anpisin ka ' pon amʉ ' epori ' ma ' pʉ ipɨ ' . Iyenna ' po enupɨkɨrɨ te ' sa ' kon pɨ ' .

text: And , behold , there came a man named Jairus , and he was a ruler of the synagogue : and he fell down at Jesus ' feet , and besought him that he would come into his house :
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai si , ka ' pon Isairas itese ' , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' usenupato ' iwʉ ' epuru pe te ' sen uyee ' pʉ Sises piya ' . Mɨrɨpan useremuruku ' pʉ Sises pʉta piyau inama tʉuya ekamanin pe , ipawana ' tɨ ' pʉ iya tiwʉ ' ta ' iye ' to ' pe ,

text: For he had one only daughter , about twelve years of age , and she lay a dying . But as he went the people thronged him .
text2: apʉne pʉra tikin nan nʉ ' kwɨ tensi 12 kaisaron iwʉipiyaai erikʉ pɨ ' . Sises utɨ koro ' tau Isairas iwʉ ' winɨkʉi ' , anpisin ka ' pon amʉ ' uya iwontɨ ' pʉ , i ' ta pata ' se ' pʉra rɨ .

text: And a woman having an issue of blood twelve years , which had spent all her living upon physicians , neither could be healed of any ,
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon koro ' tau , uri ' san esi ' pʉ mʉn pɨ ' tʉutɨsen , iko ' mansa ' 12 kaisa rɨ wʉipiya mɨrɨ pɨ ' , e ' tane ɨnʉ ' uya epi ' tɨ pʉra rɨ iyesi ' pʉ .

text: Came behind him , and touched the border of his garment : and immediately her issue of blood stanched .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uyee ' pʉ Sises a ' poi winɨ ipon e ' pi pɨ ' a ' pɨ ' se ' na . Mɨrɨ a ' tai rɨ , imʉnʉ utɨ ereuta ' pʉ .

text: And Jesus said , Who touched me ? When all denied , Peter and they that were with him said , Master , the multitude throng thee and press thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: “ Ɨnʉ ' uya ' pɨtʉi ? ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya . Ka ' pon amʉ ' e ' wapu ' tɨ pɨ ' , Pi ' ta uya ta ' pʉ , “ Uyepuru , anpisin nɨ ne ' ka ' pon amʉ ' aya ' pɨ ' pɨtʉ pɨ ' ko , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus said , Somebody hath touched me : for I perceive that virtue is gone out of me .
text2: E ' tane Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Ka ' pon uya kuru sa ' ne uya ' pɨ ' sa ' i ' tu uya , meruntɨ epa ' kasa ' pɨ ' upiyapai , ” ta ' pʉ .

text: And when the woman saw that she was not hid , she came trembling , and falling down before him , she declared unto him before all the people for what cause she had touched him and how she was healed immediately .
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ si uri ' san uya ti ' tusa ' iya i ' tusa ' a ' tai , iyee ' pʉ ɨsi ' nʉkʉi ' ma rɨ , mɨrɨpan tetʉipɨtʉ pe rɨ iseremuruku ' pʉ Sises pʉta piyau . Tu ' kan kon koro ' tau , isekama ' pʉ , mɨrɨ wenai , “ Aya ' pɨ ' sa ' uya tukai ' , mɨrɨpan usepi ' tɨsa ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , be of good comfort : thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace .
text2: Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Ma ' non , Papa apurɨ auya uya rɨ ɨyepi ' tɨsa ' man . Enta tʉusewankamai ' pʉra , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: While he yet spake , there cometh one from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house , saying to him , Thy daughter is dead ; trouble not the Master .
text2: Sises usaurokʉ koro ' tau , ka ' pon uyee ' pʉ , Isairas iwʉ ' tapai , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ɨyensi eri ' ka ' sa ' man . Tɨwɨ nesii ti ' sa kʉsanpokʉmai , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But when Jesus heard it , he answered him , saying , Fear not : believe only , and she shall be made whole .
text2: Serɨ eta tʉuya a ' tai , Sises uya ta ' pʉ Isairas pɨ ' , “ Kɨsewankamai . Uyapurɨkɨ rɨken , mɨrɨ a ' tai Papa uya ito ' panʉkʉ rɨ mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when he came into the house , he suffered no man to go in , save Peter , and James , and John , and the father and the mother of the maiden .
text2: Isairas iwʉ ' ta ' tʉuye ' sa ' a ' tai , ɨnʉ ' rɨ ewomʉ i ' se pʉra iyesi ' pʉ ta ' kɨrɨ , Pi ' ta , Isens , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Isaan nɨken mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kʉrɨ rɨ si mʉre sanon .

text: And all wept , and bewailed her : but he said , Weep not ; she is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Mɨrɨ koro ' tau , tanporo ka ' pon amʉ ' ukaramʉ esi ' pʉ tʉuta ' kwarʉkai ' iwenai . “ E ' pana e ' tɨ ' . Iyeri ' sa ' pen mɨrɨ , e ' tane iye ' nʉmʉ rɨ nin , ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: And they laughed him to scorn , knowing that she was dead .
text2: To ' uta ' kɨrɨ ' pʉ ipɨ ' , iyeri ' sa ' tukai ' i ' tu tʉuya ' nokon pɨ ' .

text: And he put them all out , and took her by the hand , and called , saying , Maid , arise .
text2: Mɨrɨpan iwʉ ' ta ' iyewomʉ ' pʉ , itemiyatʉ pɨ ' nin si ta ' sii ' , “ Uri ' san mʉre , e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' ! ” ta ' pʉ iya mɨrɨ .

text: And her spirit came again , and she arose straightway : and he commanded to give her meat .
text2: Ita ' kwarʉ si uyee ' pʉ mɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ mɨrɨ a ' tai rɨ . Mɨrɨpan Sises uya to ' pɨ ' ta ' pʉ , “ Ewe ' tɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And her parents were astonished : but he charged them that they should tell no man what was done .
text2: Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' isanon usewansiuka ' pʉ , e ' tane si tɨ , “ Kʉsekamatʉu ɨnʉ ' pana ya ' rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: Then he called his twelve disciples together , and gave them power and authority over all devils , and to cure diseases .
text2: Sises uya 12 kaisaron kon tʉpoitorʉ ton amʉranʉ ' sa ' a ' tai , to ' repa ' pʉ iya to ' meruntɨrʉ ke , to ' pana ' pano ke tanporo ɨri a ' kwarʉ a ' tu ' manin pe to ' e ' to ' pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ paran epi ' tɨnin pe to ' e ' to ' pe .

text: And he sent them to preach the kingdom of God , and to heal the sick .
text2: To ' ennoko ' pʉ iya , Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe ekareei ekamai ' , e ' ne ' ton nɨ nɨrɨ epi ' tɨi ' .

text: And he said unto them , Take nothing for your journey , neither staves , nor scrip , neither bread , neither money ; neither have two coats apiece .
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨ rɨ kʉsatʉu , ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' . “ Teke ' sen , paiki , wenamʉ ' , pʉrata , asa ' rɨ ɨpon kon kʉsatʉu .

text: And whatsoever house ye enter into , there abide , and thence depart .
text2: Ɨyereutanʉ ' nin kon nʉ ' pʉ piyau me ' tʉi ' , tʉron nɨ pata nɨmɨ auya ' nokon pona rɨ ,

text: And whosoever will not receive you , when ye go out of that city , shake off the very dust from your feet for a testimony against them .
text2: ka ' pon amʉ ' uya ɨyereutanʉkʉ kon pʉra iyesi yau , a ' ta kon mʉtɨutɨpɨ ' tʉi ' to ' pata nɨmɨ auya ' nokon a ' tai , Papa uya to ' kota ' mato ' oton ekamanin pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they departed , and went through the towns , preaching the gospel , and healing every where .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon utɨ ' pʉ eke iwa ton pata kaisa rɨ ' ne , wakʉ itekare ekama pɨ ' , e ' ne ' ton nɨ nɨrɨ epi ' tɨ pɨ ' .

text: Now Herod the tetrarch heard of all that was done by him : and he was perplexed , because that it was said of some , that John was risen from the dead ;
text2: Kopʉna Era ' uya etasa ' a ' tai tanporo te ' ku ' sen , i ' pai utaka ' ma ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra tʉron kon uya Sises esi Isaan e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' pe terikʉ ' pʉ apai ta pɨ ' ,

text: And of some , that Elias had appeared ; and of others , that one of the old prophets was risen again .
text2: tʉron kon uya kanan pu ' kena ' Iraisa usenpoikasa ' ta wenai , tʉron kon uya rɨ marɨ penaro ' kon eke ton pu ' kena ' amʉ ' tonpa e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' ta pɨ ' .

text: And Herod said , John have I beheaded : but who is this , of whom I hear such things ? And he desired to see him .
text2: E ' tane si Era ' uya ta ' pʉ , “ Isaan ne si ' pairʉkatai ko . Ɨnʉ ' nɨrɨ ken si ekareei eta uya serɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨpan esi ' pʉ Sises ɨnenpai .

text: And the apostles , when they were returned , told him all that they had done . And he took them , and went aside privately into a desert place belonging to the city called Bethsaida .
text2: Sises nennoko ' san enna ' posa ' a ' tai , tʉnkupʉ ' pʉ kon ekama ' pʉ to ' uya Sises pɨ ' . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya to ' arɨ ' pʉ anpisin a ' kɨrɨ pʉra Pe ' saita pata pona .

text: And the people , when they knew it , followed him : and he received them , and spake unto them of the kingdom of God , and healed them that had need of healing .
text2: Tu ' kan kon uya eta ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon utɨ ' pʉ Sises pɨkɨrɨ . To ' ereutanʉkʉ ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan kon auro ' ka ' pʉ iya , Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe ekareei pɨ ' . Ɨsepi ' tɨpaino kon , e ' ne ' ton epi ' tɨ ' pʉ iya .

text: And when the day began to wear away , then came the twelve , and said unto him , Send the multitude away , that they may go into the towns and country round about , and lodge , and get victuals : for we are here in a desert place .
text2: Pata uko ' mansa ' a ' tai , 12 kaisaron kon ipoitorʉ ton uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' , “ To ' enno ' kɨ eke iwa ton pata pona ' ne mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ umɨ awɨrɨ ' ne ti ' kiyari kon epoto ' pe to ' uya , pata tʉto ' tʉuya ' nokon nɨ epoto ' pe to ' uya . Ɨnnon pata yau e ' nɨ pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: But he said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they said , We have no more but five loaves and two fishes ; except we should go and buy meat for all this people .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ To ' ewe ' tɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' ta ' pʉ to ' uya , “ 5 kaisa rɨ rʉ ' kwɨ itekiino pʉreti esi , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ asa ' ron kon nʉ ' kwɨ moro ' amʉ ' . Kiyari rɨ nin ennase utɨn nɨsa ' a ' tai , to ' ewe ' to ' pan , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: For they were about five thousand men . And he said to his disciples , Make them sit down by fifties in a company .
text2: ( 5 , 000 kaisa rɨ iwa rɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ yau . ) E ' tane rɨ tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' ta ' pʉ iya , “ To ' ereutanʉ ' pɨ ' tɨ ' tamu ' kuru ' ke ' ne 50 kaisa rɨ ' ne , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they did so , and made them all sit down .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kuu ' pʉ ipoitorʉ ton uya , tanporon kon ereutapɨtʉ ' pʉ .

text: Then he took the five loaves and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed them , and brake , and gave to the disciples to set before the multitude .
text2: 5 kaisaron itekiino pʉreti anʉmʉ ' pʉ iya , asa ' ron kon moro ' amʉ ' rʉ ' kwɨ nɨrɨ mɨrɨ esa ' pe esii ' ma , tenu tʉrʉ ' pʉ iya ka ' takʉi ' . Tenki ta pe rɨ Papa pɨ ' i ' kwɨ ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ iya si . Mɨrɨpan uya itʉrʉ ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton ena ' to ' uya ekanto ' pe .

text: And they did eat , and were all filled : and there was taken up of fragments that remained to them twelve baskets .
text2: To ' enta ' na ' pʉ ta ' weta kon pona rɨ . Mɨrɨpan tonpa ' pʉ amʉranʉkʉ ' pʉ ipoitorʉ ton uya , 12 kaisa rɨ pa ' siki ' ti .

text: And it came to pass , as he was alone praying , his disciples were with him : and he asked them , saying , Whom say the people that I am ?
text2: Tʉron nɨ a ' tai , Sises ɨpʉrema koro ' tau , tʉpoitorʉ ton pokon pe rɨken , to ' ekama ' po ' pʉ iya , “ Ɨnʉ ' pe rɨ esi tukai ' anpisin ka ' pon amʉ ' nʉsauro ' an ? ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: They answering said , John the Baptist ; but some say , Elias ; and others say , that one of the old prophets is risen again .
text2: To ' uya entakanoma ' pʉ , “ Tʉron kon uya Isaan Pa ' tes ta ; tʉron kon uya kanan pu ' kena ' Iraisa ta ; tʉron kon uya rɨ marɨ penaro ' kon eke ton pu ' kena ' amʉ ' tonpa e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' ta ɨpɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: He said unto them , But whom say ye that I am ? Peter answering said , The Christ of God .
text2: “ E ' tane si ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon , ɨnʉ ' pe ken si esi tukai ' mʉkayatʉu ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . Pi ' ta uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨmɨrɨ kʉrɨ rɨ Kʉrai , Papa iwano ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he straitly charged them , and commanded them to tell no man that thing ;
text2: Sises uya ipan pe to ' panama ' pʉ ɨnʉ ' pɨ ' rɨ to ' uya serɨ ekama namai ' .

text: Saying , The Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be slain , and be raised the third day .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ , “ Ka ' pon , Papa winon uya e ' ne ' moronkato ' oton eke pe rɨ , mɨrɨpan ewaruma ' tɨto ' oton Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton uya , use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton uya , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ main pɨ ' enupanin nan uya , mɨrɨpan wɨto ' oton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iye ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' oton itosorʉwano wʉi a ' tai uko ' man nɨto ' ya ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said to them all , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross daily , and follow me .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ tanporo to ' pɨ ' , “ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ uyepʉ pe iyesi yau uye ' ma ' pʉ pe , tʉpɨ ' rɨ tʉupu ' tɨka ' se tʉkurusukuui tanʉnse wʉi kaisa rɨ nʉyepʉi upɨkɨrɨ .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : but whosoever will lose his life for my sake , the same shall save it .
text2: Apʉne pʉra ɨnʉ ' rɨ kʉrɨ tʉuko ' manto ' ɨnnonkapai pʉra na ' ne ' uya tʉuko ' manto ' rɨ nonka mɨrɨ . E ' tane ɨnʉ ' rɨ kʉrɨ tʉuko ' manto ' nonkanin upɨkɨrɨ uya innonka pen nɨ mɨrɨ .

text: For what is a man advantaged , if he gain the whole world , and lose himself , or be cast away ?
text2: Wakʉ pe pe ' ka ' pon esi tanporo non pon eponin tʉmɨrɨ rɨ nonkai ' ma , mɨrɨ pe pʉra eno ' mai ' ma te ' sen ?

text: For whosoever shall be ashamed of me and of my words , of him shall the Son of man be ashamed , when he shall come in his own glory , and in his Father ' s , and of the holy angels .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ ɨpiyɨtʉ yau upɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ umaimu ton pɨ ' , Ka ' pon , Papa winon nɨ nɨrɨ ɨpiyɨtʉ mɨrɨ ipɨ ' tʉmeruntɨrʉ yau tʉuyepʉ a ' tai mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ikʉipʉnʉ meruntɨrʉ yau , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ inserʉ amʉ ' meruntɨrʉ yau .

text: But I tell you of a truth , there be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the kingdom of God .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , serɨ yau iye ' soto ' pɨ ' sa ' na ' ne ' nan tonpa ton eri ' to ' oton pen Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe ene tʉuya ' nokon rawɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And it came to pass about an eight days after these sayings , he took Peter and John and James , and went up into a mountain to pray .
text2: 8 pe wʉi pata ' pʉ pe iwa rɨ serɨ ta iya tʉpo , Pi ' ta , Isaan , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Isens arɨ ' pʉ iya ta ' kɨrɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wʉ ' pona to ' enuku ' pʉ ɨpʉremai ' .

text: And as he prayed , the fashion of his countenance was altered , and his raiment was white and glistering .
text2: Iyɨpʉrema koro ' tau , tʉron nɨ pe itemʉ ' ena ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan pon ena ' pʉ aimu ' ne sirɨn pe kamiri ' e ' wei ' tɨ kasa .

text: And , behold , there talked with him two men , which were Moses and Elias :
text2: Asa ' ron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' usenpoika ' pʉ a ' kwa pe kuru , Mosi ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Iraisa ,

text: Who appeared in glory , and spake of his decease which he should accomplish at Jerusalem .
text2: mɨrɨpan kon uya Sises auro ' ka ' pʉ . To ' usaurokʉ ' pʉ itɨto ' pɨ ' , iye ' ku ' to ' pe ta ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ Papa uya uta ' ku ' tɨto ' pe iyerikʉ winɨ Surusiran po .

text: But Peter and they that were with him were heavy with sleep : and when they were awake , they saw his glory , and the two men that stood with him .
text2: Ipan pe e ' moronʉ ' pe Pi ' ta mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itonpa ton ena ' pʉ e ' tane , to ' upakasa ' a ' tai , to ' uya ene ' pʉ ita ' kwarii mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ asa ' ron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' e ' soto ' pɨ ' sa ' esi ' pʉ ipiyau .

text: And it came to pass , as they departed from him , Peter said unto Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias : not knowing what he said .
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' uya Sises nɨmɨ koro ' tau , Pi ' ta uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Wakʉ rɨ pan pe serɨ yau ina man , uyepuru . Tɨwɨ ina osorʉwau ɨiwʉ ' kon amɨi ; tikin nɨ ɨiwʉ ' pe , tikin nɨ Mosi ' iwʉ ' pe , Iraisa iwʉ ' pe nɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya . ( Mɨrɨ ta tʉuya tukai ' i ' tu iya pʉra iyesi ' pʉ . )

text: While he thus spake , there came a cloud , and overshadowed them : and they feared as they entered into the cloud .
text2: Isaurokʉ koro ' tau , kapuru ' usenpoika ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya to ' nɨpontɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon usi ' nʉkʉ ' pʉ kapuru ' ya ' ewomʉi ' ma .

text: And there came a voice out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: Main uyee ' pʉ kapuru ' apai , “ Umu pʉse rɨ , Unanʉmʉ ' pʉ . Imaimu etatɨ ' , ” tawon .

text: And when the voice was past , Jesus was found alone . And they kept it close , and told no man in those days any of those things which they had seen .
text2: Main useta tʉpo , to ' uya Sises ene ' pʉ tikin sarɨ . Ipoitorʉ ton uya serɨ enkurunpa ' pʉ tʉpiyau ' nokon , mɨrɨ a ' tai ɨnʉ ' pɨ ' rɨ to ' uya tʉnene ' pʉ kon ekama ' pʉ pen nɨ .

text: And it came to pass , that on the next day , when they were come down from the hill , much people met him .
text2: Mɨrɨ ema ' sa ' yau wʉ ' poi to ' u ' tɨsa ' a ' tai , anpisin nɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' uya to ' eporo ' pʉ .

text: And , behold , a man of the company cried out , saying , Master , I beseech thee , look upon my son : for he is mine only child .
text2: Warawo ' to ' koro ' tawon ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ , “ Ti ' sa ! ” ta ' pʉ iya . “ Ɨyekama ' po uya umu ene pa , tikin nan nʉ ' kwɨ .

text: And , lo , a spirit taketh him , and he suddenly crieth out ; and it teareth him that he foameth again , and bruising him hardly departeth from him .
text2: Ɨri a ' kwarʉ uya a ' sipɨ ' pɨtʉ , mɨrɨ uya ipirorʉnpapɨtʉ , iyai enno ' pɨtʉ iya , mɨrɨpan mʉta a ' koronta . Inonka iya pʉra iyesi , ima ' tanʉkʉ iya rɨ .

text: And I besought thy disciples to cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Ɨpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' , ‘ Enpa ' katɨ ' , ’ ta ' pʉ uya e ' tane , to ' uya ikupʉ poken pʉra iyesi ' pʉ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus answering said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you , and suffer you ? Bring thy son hither .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Ɨri sɨ ! Ɨri ton nɨ , apurɨnin nan pen nɨ serɨ a ' taino kon ! Ɨ ' rɨ pʉ ' kʉ pona ɨpiyau ' nokon uko ' mamʉ ? Ɨ ' rɨ pʉ ' kʉ pona aya ' kɨrɨ ' nokon esi ? Ɨmu ine ' kɨ se ya ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And as he was yet a coming , the devil threw him down , and tare him . And Jesus rebuked the unclean spirit , and healed the child , and delivered him again to his father .
text2: Warawo ' mʉre uyepʉ koro ' tau rɨ , makoi a ' kwarʉ uya eno ' ma ' pʉ non pona iyai ennoko pe . E ' tane Sises uya e ' se ' ne ' pe ɨri a ' kwarʉ eseremekʉ ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya warawo ' mʉre epi ' tɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan tʉrʉ ' pʉ iya ikʉipʉnʉ ena ' .

text: And they were all amazed at the mighty power of God . But while they wondered every one at all things which Jesus did , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon usewansiuka ' pʉ Papa meruntɨrʉ ke Sises e ' tʉrawasoma pɨ ' . Tʉusewansiuka ' pʉ kon si ' kɨrɨ rɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' esi koro ' tau Sises nʉkupʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' , ta ' pʉ iya tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' ,

text: Let these sayings sink down into your ears : for the Son of man shall be delivered into the hands of men .
text2: “ Wakʉ pe etatɨ ' kanyauro ' kayatʉi ' ne ' , Ka ' pon , Papa winon eparankato ' oton ka ' pon amʉ ' ena ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But they understood not this saying , and it was hid from them , that they perceived it not : and they feared to ask him of that saying .
text2: E ' tane to ' uya ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ pʉra iyesi ' pʉ ɨ ' rɨ ta e ' kwa pe serɨ esi tukai ' . To ' piyapai iye ' so ' nansa ' esi ' pʉ to ' uya a ' si poken pʉra , mɨrɨpan kon enari ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ pɨ ' ɨnekama ' popai pʉra .

text: Then there arose a reasoning among them , which of them should be greatest .
text2: E ' sei ' pɨ ' nɨ pɨ ' ipoitorʉ ton e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ , ɨnʉ ' kuru e ' to ' oton eke pe tukai ' .

text: And Jesus , perceiving the thought of their heart , took a child , and set him by him ,
text2: Sises uya nin si to ' usenuminkato ' i ' tu tʉuya pɨ ' , mʉre rʉ ' kwɨ nee ' pʉ mɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan soto ' ka ' pʉ iya tʉpiyau .

text: And said unto them , Whosoever shall receive this child in my name receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me receiveth him that sent me : for he that is least among you all , the same shall be great .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ pʉse rɨ mʉre ereutanʉkʉ a ' tai uyese ' yau , uyereutanʉkʉ iya pe rɨ iyesi . Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ uyereutanʉkʉ a ' tai , uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ rɨ ereutanʉkʉ iya pe iyesi . Apʉne pʉra kʉrɨ rɨ aiko pe rʉ ' kwɨ na ' ne ' ɨ ' koro ' tau ' nokon , kʉrɨ rɨ kuru esi eke pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And John answered and said , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name ; and we forbad him , because he followeth not with us .
text2: “ Uyepuru , ” ta ' pʉ Isaan uya , “ ka ' pon ene ' pʉ ina uya ɨyese ' yau ɨri a ' kwarʉ ton enpa ' kapɨ ' nin . Mɨrɨpan ereutanʉkʉ i ' se ina esi ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra utonpa kon pe pʉra iyesi pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Forbid him not : for he that is not against us is for us .
text2: “ Kʉsereutanʉ ' tʉu , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya , “ apʉne pʉra ɨnʉ ' rɨ ɨyewa ' nomanin pen esi ɨwenaino ' pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And it came to pass , when the time was come that he should be received up , he stedfastly set his face to go to Jerusalem ,
text2: Epʉn pona tʉutɨto ' weyu e ' seporo koro ' tau , Sises e ' kama ' pʉ utɨn pɨ ' Surusiran pona

text: And sent messengers before his face : and they went , and entered into a village of the Samaritans , to make ready for him .
text2: tʉmaimu anin nan ennoko ' pʉ iya tʉrawɨrɨ . Mɨrɨpan kon utɨ ' pʉ eke iwa Sameriya pon pata pona ite ' ma ta ' ekonekase ' na ,

text: And they did not receive him , because his face was as though he would go to Jerusalem .
text2: e ' tane mɨrɨ yawon kon uya ereutanʉkʉ ' pʉ pen , apʉne pʉra Surusiran pona itɨ pɨ ' .

text: And when his disciples James and John saw this , they said , Lord , wilt thou that we command fire to come down from heaven , and consume them , even as Elias did ?
text2: Serɨ ensa ' ipoitorʉ ton , Isens mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Isaan uya a ' tai , to ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Uyepuru , apo ' pe ' nu ' tɨ uya ' nokon i ' se me ' an Epʉn poi to ' ma ' tanʉ ' nin pe ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: But he turned , and rebuked them , and said , Ye know not what manner of spirit ye are of .
text2: E ' tane , Sises era ' tɨ ' pʉ to ' esereme ' se ' na ,

text: For the Son of man is not come to destroy men ' s lives , but to save them . And they went to another village .
text2: mɨrɨpan kon utɨ ' pʉ tʉron nɨ eke iwa pata ya ' .

text: And it came to pass , that , as they went in the way , a certain man said unto him , Lord , I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest .
text2: Utɨn pɨ ' rɨ to ' esi koro ' tau asanta tawɨrɨ , ka ' pon uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Aya ' kɨrɨ utɨ serɨ mʉtɨyai ' ne ' ya ' rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Foxes have holes , and birds of the air have nests ; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Maikan amʉ ' kamoro tenkena ' nan , toron amʉ ' nɨrɨ tʉponkena ' nan , e ' tane Ka ' pon , Papa winon e ' sapontɨto ' yau pʉn nɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said unto another , Follow me . But he said , Lord , suffer me first to go and bury my father .
text2: Tʉron nɨ pɨ ' nin si ta ' pʉ iya mɨrɨ , “ Ɨisirɨ uya ' kɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya . E ' tane eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Uyepuru , apʉne wapiya ukʉipʉnʉ siu ' na ' tɨka ' tai ' ya , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus said unto him , Let the dead bury their dead : but go thou and preach the kingdom of God .
text2: Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' ta ' pʉ iya , “ Tɨwɨ kamoro Papa ese ' pokon kon pen tekepu kon u ' na ' tɨi , e ' tane enta Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe ekareei ekamai ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And another also said , Lord , I will follow thee ; but let me first go bid them farewell , which are at home at my house .
text2: Mɨrɨ rɨ e ' tane , tʉron nɨ uya kanan , “ Uyepuru , aya ' kɨrɨ utɨ , e ' tane wapiya kuru utonpa ton piya ' utɨi ' ya , ‘ Ɨisirɨ utɨyai ' , ’ ka ' se ' na , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus said unto him , No man , having put his hand to the plough , and looking back , is fit for the kingdom of God .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ upɨkɨrɨ te ' sara ' tɨ tʉpo tenu tʉpɨ ' nin te ' ma ' pʉ ta ' esi mɨrɨ Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe tʉrawasomanin ye ' pe pʉra rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: After these things the Lord appointed other seventy also , and sent them two and two before his face into every city and place , whither he himself would come .
text2: Serɨ pata ' pʉ pe , Sises uya tʉron kon 72 kaisaron kon tʉnanʉmʉ ' san ennoko ' pʉ asa ' rɨ ' ne tʉrawɨrɨ to ' utɨto ' pe pata kaisa rɨ ' ne tʉutɨto ' ya ' ne to ' enupai ' tʉpɨ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' enna ' poto ' pe .

text: Therefore said he unto them , The harvest truly is great , but the labourers are few : pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he would send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: To ' ennoko tʉuya rawɨrɨ , ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ Eke pe kiyari akʉ ' pʉka ' sa ' tanʉnsen man , e ' tane tu ' ke pʉra tʉrawaso amʉ ' esi . Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , kiyari akʉ ' pʉsa ' anʉmʉ Epuru ekama ' potɨ ' , tʉrawaso amʉ ' enno ' to ' pe iya kiyari akʉ ' pʉsa ' anʉmʉ e ' kwa na ' .

text: Go your ways : behold , I send you forth as lambs among wolves .
text2: Entantɨ ' ! Ɨyennoko uya ' nokon serɨ karimeru munkɨ kasa ɨsɨ ton ene amʉ ' koro ' tau .

text: Carry neither purse , nor scrip , nor shoes : and salute no man by the way .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ rɨ kʉsatʉu ; ɨpʉrataai kon yen nɨ , apaikii kon nɨ , asapatooi kon nɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ asanta tawon kon pɨ ' , ‘ Miyarɨ , ’ ta ' pʉ auya ' nokon si ' kɨrɨ rɨ kereutatʉu .

text: And into whatsoever house ye enter , first say , Peace be to this house .
text2: “ Ɨutɨ ta ' ɨyewomʉ kon rawɨrɨ , ‘ Tɨwɨ tʉusewankamai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' nesii serɨ ɨutɨ tau , ’ mʉkatʉi ' .

text: And if the son of peace be there , your peace shall rest upon it : if not , it shall turn to you again .
text2: Tʉusewankamai ' pʉra e ' nɨ ku ' nin ka ' pon esi yau mɨrɨ yau , tɨwɨ tʉusewankamai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' nesii ipiyau . Mɨrɨ pe pʉra iyesi yau , tɨwɨ ɨpona ' nokon nenna ' poi .

text: And in the same house remain , eating and drinking such things as they give : for the labourer is worthy of his hire . Go not from house to house .
text2: Mɨrɨ si ɨutɨ tau me ' tʉi ' , uta ' re ' tɨn pɨ ' to ' uya ɨrepato ' kon ike pɨ ' , apʉne pʉra tʉrawaso kʉrɨ rɨ tepe ' pʉ warinpanin . Ɨutɨ kaisa rɨ ke ' kwɨrɨ ' pɨ ' tʉu .

text: And into whatsoever city ye enter , and they receive you , eat such things as are set before you :
text2: “ Pata ya ' ɨyewonsa ' kon ereutanʉ ' sa ' a ' tai , anta ' napasa ' kon pɨ ' menta ' natʉi ' .

text: And heal the sick that are therein , and say unto them , The kingdom of God is come nigh unto you .
text2: Mɨrɨ yawon kon e ' ne ' ton mepi ' tɨtʉi ' , ‘ Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe man a ' ko pe ɨpiyau ' nokon , ’ mʉkatʉi ' to ' pɨ ' .

text: But into whatsoever city ye enter , and they receive you not , go your ways out into the streets of the same , and say ,
text2: E ' tane pata ya ' ɨyewonsa ' kon ereutanʉ ' sa ' to ' uya pʉra iyesi a ' tai , asanta ta ' mʉtɨtʉi ' ,

text: Even the very dust of your city , which cleaveth on us , we do wipe off against you : notwithstanding be ye sure of this , that the kingdom of God is come nigh unto you .
text2: ‘ Non nɨ apata kon yawon uta ' si ' sa ' ina pʉta pɨ ' tɨutɨ ina uya apa ' nʉkʉ kon pe . E ' tane se kuru i ' tutɨ ' : Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe man a ' ko pe , ’ mʉkatʉi ' to ' pɨ ' .

text: But I say unto you , that it shall be more tolerable in that day for Sodom , than for that city .
text2: Apana ' tɨ uya ' nokon , Satan uya imoronka poken pa rɨ iye ' to ' oton mɨrɨ wʉi a ' tai , mɨrɨ pata uya imoronka entai iye ' tane , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works had been done in Tyre and Sidon , which have been done in you , they had a great while ago repented , sitting in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Ɨsɨ sɨ , Korasin pon kon ! Ɨsɨ sɨ , Pe ' saita pon kon ! Apʉne pʉra eke Papa tʉrawasooi e ' ku ' sa ' na ' ne ' apata ' se ' kon yau , e ' ku ' sa ' yau , Taya mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Saitan pon kon koro ' tau , pena rɨ to ' era ' tɨ ' pʉ nesii ' no tʉmakooi kon apai isa ' ka ' si ya ' tepontɨi ' to ' ereutasa ' nesii ' no urumɨrʉ ' pʉ yau .

text: But it shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the judgment , than for you .
text2: E ' tane Taya mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Saitan pon kon uya pa rɨ imoronkato ' oton eseru aimenka weyu e ' seposa ' a ' tai ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon entai .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted to heaven , shalt be thrust down to hell .
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon , Ka ' paneyan pon kon , autanʉnto ' oton kon pe ' ka ' takʉi ' ? Kane , auta ' mo ' kato ' oton kon mɨrɨ ta ' mu kenan pen nɨ ya ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: He that heareth you heareth me ; and he that despiseth you despiseth me ; and he that despiseth me despiseth him that sent me .
text2: ( Tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' ta ' pʉ iya , ) “ Kʉrɨ amaimu kon etayai ' ne ' uya umaimu rɨ etakapʉ mɨrɨ ; kʉrɨ ɨyewaruma ' tɨyai ' ne ' nokon uya rɨ kanan uyewaruma ' tɨ mɨrɨ ; kʉrɨ uyewaruma ' tɨyai ' ne ' uya rɨ nɨrɨ kʉrɨ uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ ewaruma ' tɨ mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And the seventy returned again with joy , saying , Lord , even the devils are subject unto us through thy name .
text2: 72 kaisaron kon inennoko ' san nʉ ' pʉ enna ' po ' pʉ pori ' pe , mɨrɨpan kon uya ta ' pʉ , “ Uyepuru , ɨri ton a ' kwarʉ rɨ esi ' pʉ ina maimu awɨrɨ , ɨyese ' yau ina uya tenpa ' ka kon a ' tai ka ' pon amʉ ' apai , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he said unto them , I beheld Satan as lightning fall from heaven .
text2: Eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Se ' tan uta ' mo ' ka senei kamiri ' kasa ka ' apai .

text: Behold , I give unto you power to tread on serpents and scorpions , and over all the power of the enemy : and nothing shall by any means hurt you .
text2: Ɨmeruntɨrʉ kon ke ɨrepasa ' uya ' nokon ɨkʉi amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ mɨnɨ ' amʉ ' wasa ' pɨ ' nin pe , tanporo ɨyeyaton kon Makoi meruntɨrʉ entai ɨwesi kon pa , ɨ ' rɨ uya rɨ ama ' tanʉkʉ kon pen .

text: Notwithstanding in this rejoice not , that the spirits are subject unto you ; but rather rejoice , because your names are written in heaven .
text2: E ' tane pʉra , ɨri a ' kwarʉ amʉ ' e ' sa ' pɨ ' amaimu kon awɨrɨ kepori ' matʉu , e ' tane epori ' matɨ ' ɨyese ' kon e ' menukasa ' pɨ ' Epʉn po , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: In that hour Jesus rejoiced in spirit , and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , that thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes : even so , Father ; for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uta ' kwarʉ ' tɨsa ' Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ ke esi pori ' pe uya ta ' pʉ , “ Ayapurɨpɨtʉ uya , Papai , Epʉn mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ non Epuru , apʉne pʉra serɨ ton onansa ' auya pɨ ' pu ' kena ' ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ isenupasa ' kon piyapai , mɨrɨpan enpoikasa ' auya pɨ ' aiko ton mʉre amʉ ' ena ' . Ewai ' , Papai , serɨ ku ' sa ' auya i ' se ɨwe ' to ' awɨrɨ pori ' pe ɨku ' nin pe iyesi pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: All things are delivered to me of my Father : and no man knoweth who the Son is , but the Father ; and who the Father is , but the Son , and he to whom the Son will reveal him .
text2: ( Mɨrɨ ta tʉpo Papa pɨ ' , ka ' pon amʉ ' kanan auro ' kakapʉ pɨ ' iye ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ , ) “ Tanporon nɨ esi ukʉipʉnʉ nʉnonka ' pʉ pe uyena ' . Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ , imu i ' tu pʉra iyesi , e ' tane ikʉipʉnʉ uya rɨken i ' tu . Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ikʉipʉnʉ i ' tu pʉra iyesi , e ' tane imu uya rɨken i ' tu , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kamo , imu na ' ne ' e ' to ' ɨnenpoikapai itena ' ton , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he turned him unto his disciples , and said privately , Blessed are the eyes which see the things that ye see :
text2: Mɨrɨpan era ' tɨ ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton winɨkʉi ' , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' ama ' ai , “ Pori ' pe en ton esi , menyatʉi ' ne ' ene pɨ ' na ' ne ' .

text: For I tell you , that many prophets and kings have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , tu ' kan kon nɨ pu ' kena ' amʉ ' , kin amʉ ' esi ' pʉ menyatʉi ' ne ' ɨnenpai , e ' tane to ' uya ene ' pʉ pen , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ metayatʉi ' ne ' ɨnetapai , e ' tane to ' uya eta ' pʉ pen , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And , behold , a certain lawyer stood up , and tempted him , saying , Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: Ipan pe Main i ' tunin e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ Sises i ' tupɨ ' se . “ Ti ' sa , ɨ ' rɨ kupʉ uya tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko ' manto ' epoto ' pe uya ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: He said unto him , What is written in the law ? how readest thou ?
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨ tukai ' ken iye ' menukasa ' mɨrɨ pɨ ' Main yau ekamanin ɨmɨrɨ ? Nai kasa ken menyan ? ” tukai ' Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ .

text: And he answering said , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy strength , and with all thy mind ; and thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Sises eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ ‘ Papa i ' nʉnkakɨ tanporo ɨyewan pokon pe , aya ' kwarʉ pokon pe , ɨmeruntɨrʉ pokon pe , ɨusenuminkato ' pokon pe , ’ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ , ‘ Ɨtonpa nɨrɨ , mɨsi ' nʉnkayai ' ne ' kasa , ’ tasa ' iya , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said unto him , Thou hast answered right : this do , and thou shalt live .
text2: “ Iye ' to ' pe kuru ei ' sa ' auya man , ” tukai ' Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ . “ Serɨ si iku ' kɨ , mɨrɨ a ' tai ɨuko ' mamʉ rɨ tɨwɨrɨ rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But he , willing to justify himself , said unto Jesus , And who is my neighbour ?
text2: E ' tane , wakʉ pe e ' ku ' pai tesi pɨ ' , Sises ekama ' po ' pʉ iya , “ Ɨnʉ ' ken si esi utonpa pe ? ” tukai ' .

text: And Jesus answering said , A certain man went down from Jerusalem to Jericho , and fell among thieves , which stripped him of his raiment , and wounded him , and departed , leaving him half dead .
text2: Eikʉ pe , Sises uya ta ' pʉ : “ Ka ' pon utɨ ' pʉ Surusiran poi Iseri ' ko pona , mɨrɨpan uya ama ' amʉ ' eporo ' pʉ . Mɨrɨpan kon uya a ' si ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya iponkapɨtʉ ' pʉ , to ' uya iwɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan akamasa ' nɨmɨ ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And by chance there came down a certain priest that way : and when he saw him , he passed by on the other side .
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo , use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin utɨ ' pʉ mɨrɨ asanta tawɨrɨ . Ensa ' tʉuya a ' tai , entaka ' pʉ iya iratoi poro .

text: And likewise a Levite , when he was at the place , came and looked on him , and passed by on the other side .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ , ite ' ma ' pʉ pe te ' sen , itesen o ' non esi ' pʉ ensa ' tʉuya a ' tai , iratoi poro rɨ marɨ itɨ ' pʉ .

text: But a certain Samaritan , as he journeyed , came where he was : and when he saw him , he had compassion on him ,
text2: E ' tane , Sameriya pon ka ' pon uyee ' pʉ iporo . Ensa ' tʉuya a ' tai , ipɨ ' isentu ' ma ' pʉ .

text: And went to him , and bound up his wounds , pouring in oil and wine , and set him on his own beast , and brought him to an inn , and took care of him .
text2: Ipiya ' itɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya iwɨpɨ ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ aku ' nɨ ' pʉ waain ke , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ karapa ke , mɨrɨpan ontɨ ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨpan anʉmʉ ' pʉ iya tikʉn isa ' ka ' si pona , arɨ ' pʉ iya patatʉse ' ya ' , ipa ' simato ' pe tʉuya .

text: And on the morrow when he departed , he took out two pence , and gave them to the host , and said unto him , Take care of him ; and whatsoever thou spendest more , when I come again , I will repay thee .
text2: Mɨrɨ ema ' sa ' yau , asa ' rɨ pʉrata pun tʉrʉ ' pʉ iya patatʉse ' esa ' ena ' . ‘ Pʉse rɨ mʉpa ' simai ' se pʉrata ke . Enna ' posa ' a ' tai , ipɨ ' ɨnennoko ' pʉ ɨpʉrataai na ' po uya mɨrɨ , ’ ta ' pʉ iya , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya ipɨ ' .

text: Which now of these three , thinkest thou , was neighbour unto him that fell among the thieves ?
text2: Mɨrɨ ekama tʉpo , Sises uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Nai kʉrɨ ken si esi osorʉwawon kon apai ama ' amʉ ' eponin nʉ ' pʉ tonpa pe tukai ' mi ' tuyan ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said , He that shewed mercy on him . Then said Jesus unto him , Go , and do thou likewise .
text2: Mɨrɨpan eikʉ ' pʉ Main pɨ ' enupanin uya , “ Kʉrɨ ipɨ ' isentu ' masa ' rʉ ' pʉ , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Sises uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Iku ' ta si kʉrɨ rɨ kasa , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Now it came to pass , as they went , that he entered into a certain village : and a certain woman named Martha received him into her house .
text2: Sises mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipoitorʉ ton utɨ koro ' tau , to ' uyee ' pʉ eke iwa pata ya ' . Mɨrɨ pata yau , uri ' san , Mata itese ' uya Sises kɨ ' ma ' pʉ tiwʉ ' ta ' .

text: And she had a sister called Mary , which also sat at Jesus ' feet , and heard his word .
text2: Iyakon ese ' esi ' pʉ Meri . Mɨrɨpan ereutasa ' esi ' pʉ Sises piyau , tauro ' kato ' eta pɨ ' iyesi ' pʉ .

text: But Martha was cumbered about much serving , and came to him , and said , Lord , dost thou not care that my sister hath left me to serve alone ? bid her therefore that she help me .
text2: E ' tane Mata usewankamato ' esi ' pʉ tanporon tʉnkupʉnʉ pɨ ' . Iyee ' pʉ Sises piya ' ekama ' pose , “ Uyepuru , upɨ ' pe ' ɨusentu ' ma pʉra rɨ iyesi , uyakon uya unɨnsa ' pɨ ' tikin sarɨ e ' tʉrawasomato ' pe ? ‘ Ipika ' tɨta ! ’ ka ' kɨ ipɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto her , Martha , Martha , thou art careful and troubled about many things :
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Mata , tu ' kan pɨ ' rɨ sa ' ne ɨusewankama ,

text: But one thing is needful : and Mary hath chosen that good part , which shall not be taken away from her .
text2: e ' tane tikin nan nɨ esi i ' se e ' nɨto ' . Meri uya nin wakʉ kuru anʉnsa ' mɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan emo ' kato ' oton pen ipiyapai , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And it came to pass , that , as he was praying in a certain place , when he ceased , one of his disciples said unto him , Lord , teach us to pray , as John also taught his disciples .
text2: Sises esi ' pʉ ɨpʉreman pɨ ' . Mɨrɨpan e ' nonkasa ' a ' tai , tikin nan ipoitorʉ uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ina Epuru , ɨpʉreman eseru pɨ ' ina enupakɨ , Isaan uya tʉpoitorʉ ton enupa ' pʉ kasa , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said unto them , When ye pray , say , Our Father which art in heaven , Hallowed be thy name . Thy kingdom come . Thy will be done , as in heaven , so in earth .
text2: Ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ Ɨwɨpʉrema kon a ' tai , se kasa mʉkatʉi ' : “ ‘ Papai , tʉnamasen pe ɨyese ' nesii . Ina esa ' pe ɨwe ' to ' nʉyepʉi .

text: Give us day by day our daily bread .
text2: Wʉi kaisa rɨ ina irepakɨ wʉi kaisa rɨ te ' sen ina i ' kiyari ke .

text: And forgive us our sins ; for we also forgive every one that is indebted to us . And lead us not into temptation ; but deliver us from evil .
text2: Ina makooi pɨ ' ɨsentu ' makɨ , apʉne pʉra ina nɨrɨ usentu ' ma pɨ ' ina pɨ ' imakoitasa ' kon pɨ ' . Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ina kʉsarɨi i ' tupɨ ' nɨto ' ya ' . ’ ”

text: And he said unto them , Which of you shall have a friend , and shall go unto him at midnight , and say unto him , Friend , lend me three loaves ;
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo , ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ Iya ' tai pʉra tʉtonpa ke ɨwesi a ' tai , anomʉra ' a ' tai ɨutɨ itiwʉ ' ta ' . Ta auya ipɨ ' , ‘ Osorʉwau pʉreti ke urepa ' ,

text: For a friend of mine in his journey is come to me , and I have nothing to set before him ?
text2: apʉne pʉra utonpa pe te ' sen uye ' sa ' , e ' tane inta ' napato ' uya ike pʉra iyesi . ’

text: And he from within shall answer and say , Trouble me not : the door is now shut , and my children are with me in bed ; I cannot rise and give thee .
text2: Ɨutɨ tawon uya si amaimu eikʉ , ‘ Uyanpokʉmai , mʉra ' ta uta ' kopɨ ' ka ' sa ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ umunkɨ amʉ ' e ' nʉnsa ' nɨrɨ . Ɨrepase ' na e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka poken pʉra man , ’ ta iya yau .

text: I say unto you , Though he will not rise and give him , because he is his friend , yet because of his importunity he will rise and give him as many as he needeth .
text2: Ekama uya etatɨ ' , tʉtonpa pe ɨwesi pɨ ' ɨrepase ' na iye ' mʉ ' sa ' ka pen e ' tane , ɨyepiyɨtʉ pʉra ekama ' popɨtʉ auya pɨ ' ɨrepase ' na iye ' mʉ ' sa ' ka i ' se ɨwe ' to ' ke .

text: And I say unto you , Ask , and it shall be given you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened unto you .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ pɨ ' ta uya ɨpɨ ' nokon : Ekama ' potɨ ' , mɨrɨ a ' tai ɨyena ' nokon nɨ iye ' tʉrʉ ; iwarinpatɨ ' , mɨrɨ a ' tai eporo auya ' nokon ; mʉra ' ta iwɨpɨ ' tɨ ' , mɨrɨpan uta ' kokato ' pe ɨyena ' nokon .

text: For every one that asketh receiveth ; and he that seeketh findeth ; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened .
text2: Apʉne pʉra tanporon kon ekama ' po pɨ ' na ' ne ' nan uya eporo ; kʉrɨ iwarinpa pɨ ' na ' ne ' uya rɨ eporo ; mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kʉrɨ iwɨpɨtʉ pɨ ' na ' ne ' ena ' rɨ mʉra ' ta uta ' koka .

text: If a son shall ask bread of any of you that is a father , will he give him a stone ? or if he ask a fish , will he for a fish give him a serpent ?
text2: Nai kʉrɨ warai ikʉipʉnʉ ton uya ɨmu uya moro ' pɨ ' ɨyekama ' po yau , e ' tane irepa ɨkʉi ke ?

text: Or if he shall ask an egg , will he offer him a scorpion ?
text2: Mɨrɨ pe pʉra , mɨnɨ ' ke rɨ katɨ irepa iya kɨrɨtɨkɨ pʉmooi ekama ' po tane iya ?

text: If ye then , being evil , know how to give good gifts unto your children : how much more shall your heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to them that ask him ?
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon nin si ɨri ton uya i ' tu yau wakʉ ton e ' repan nɨto ' ike ke ɨmunkɨ kon repa auya ' nokon , mɨrɨ entai kuru ɨkʉipʉnʉ kon , Epʉn pon uya Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ tʉrʉ kamoro ekama ' ponin nan ena ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he was casting out a devil , and it was dumb . And it came to pass , when the devil was gone out , the dumb spake ; and the people wondered .
text2: Sises esi ' pʉ ɨri a ' kwarʉ enpa ' ka pɨ ' tʉusauro ' sen pen ka ' pon apai . Ɨri a ' kwarʉ epa ' ka ' pʉ a ' tai , tʉusauro ' sen pe iyena ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ pɨ ' ka ' pon amʉ ' usewansiuka ' pʉ

text: But some of them said , He casteth out devils through Beelzebub the chief of the devils .
text2: e ' tane , tʉron kon uya ta ' pʉ , “ Pirɨsipupʉ , makoi amʉ ' epuru winɨ makoi amʉ ' enpa ' kapɨtʉ iya mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And others , tempting him , sought of him a sign from heaven .
text2: Tʉron kon uya i ' tupɨtʉ ' pʉ tekama ' popɨ ' se i ' tuto ' Epʉn winon ku ' to ' pe iya .

text: But he , knowing their thoughts , said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and a house divided against a house falleth .
text2: Sises uya to ' usenuminkato ' i ' tusa ' esi ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Ti ' tui ' pʉra rɨ esa ' wannɨ pe te ' san epantakapɨ ' sa ' ɨsewa ' nomai ' uma ' ta rɨ mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tiwʉ ' tawon kon epantakapɨ ' sa ' ɨsewa ' nomai ' rɨ uta ' mo ' ka mɨrɨ .

text: If Satan also be divided against himself , how shall his kingdom stand ? because ye say that I cast out devils through Beelzebub .
text2: Se ' tan epantakapɨtʉ pe iyesi yau tʉpokon pe rɨ ɨsewa ' nomai ' , nai kasa esa ' wannɨ pe iye ' to ' esi moro ? Serɨ ta uya apʉne pʉra makoi a ' kwarʉ ton enpa ' kapɨtʉ uya Pirɨsipupʉ winɨ tukai ' ɨye ' kupʉ kon pɨ ' .

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your sons cast them out ? therefore shall they be your judges .
text2: Serɨ si makoi amʉ ' enpa ' ka uya pe iyesi yau Pirɨsipupʉ winɨ , ɨnʉ ' winɨ ken si ɨpɨkɨron kon uya to ' enpa ' ka ? Mɨrɨ wenai si ɨyeseru kon aimenkanin pe to ' esi mɨrɨ .

text: But if I with the finger of God cast out devils , no doubt the kingdom of God is come upon you .
text2: E ' tane , makoi amʉ ' enpa ' ka uya pe iyesi yau Papa meruntɨrʉ ke , mɨrɨ nin si Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe uye ' sa ' ɨpiya ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: When a strong man armed keepeth his palace , his goods are in peace :
text2: Miyarɨ rɨ nin si Sises esi ' pʉ to ' enupa pɨ ' , “ Pana ' pan ka ' pon esi a ' tai tepaai ton ke esii ' ma tiwʉ ' erasu pe , itapuruui ton esi mɨrɨ wakʉ pe rɨ .

text: But when a stronger than he shall come upon him , and overcome him , he taketh from him all his armour wherein he trusted , and divideth his spoils .
text2: E ' tane , itentaino pana ' pan ka ' pon uye ' sa ' a ' tai , itentai iyena mɨrɨ . Mɨrɨpan uya itamataai ton inapurɨnʉ pe te ' sen mo ' ka , mɨrɨpan uya itapuruui ton tʉneporo ' pʉ pantakapɨtʉ tʉtonpa ton ena ' .

text: He that is not with me is against me : and he that gathereth not with me scattereth .
text2: “ Kʉrɨ uya ' kɨrɨ pʉra na ' ne ' esi uyewa ' noma pɨ ' , kʉrɨ rɨ upokon pe amʉranʉkʉ iya pʉra na ' ne ' uya ai ' pika .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest ; and finding none , he saith , I will return unto my house whence I came out .
text2: “ Ɨri a ' kwarʉ epa ' kasa ' a ' tai ka ' pon apai , itɨ siya rɨ a ' mun pata yau tereutato ' yau warinpa pɨ ' . Mɨrɨpan eporo iya pʉra iyesi , mɨrɨ a ' tai , ‘ Enna ' po serɨ ɨutɨ unnɨmɨ ' pʉ ta ' , ’ ta iya .

text: And when he cometh , he findeth it swept and garnished .
text2: Iye ' sa ' a ' tai , ɨutɨ eporo iya wakʉ pe akorokasa ' pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ikonekasa ' pe .

text: Then goeth he , and taketh to him seven other spirits more wicked than himself ; and they enter in , and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , itɨ 7 kaisaron kon ɨri ton kuru tentaino kon nepʉ iya . To ' ewomʉ mɨrɨ yau ɨko ' manse ' na . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ipan pe , ɨri pe ka ' pon esi wapiya tesi ' pʉ entai , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And it came to pass , as he spake these things , a certain woman of the company lifted up her voice , and said unto him , Blessed is the womb that bare thee , and the paps which thou hast sucked .
text2: Sises usaurokʉ koro ' tau , uri ' san uya ta ' pʉ anpisin koro ' tapai , “ Pori ' pe kuru asan man ɨpɨ ' ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But he said , Yea rather , blessed are they that hear the word of God , and keep it .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Mɨrɨ entai kuru kamoro Papa Maimu etanin nan , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ apurɨnin nan esi mɨrɨ pori ' pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when the people were gathered thick together , he began to say , This is an evil generation : they seek a sign ; and there shall no sign be given it , but the sign of Jonas the prophet .
text2: Anpisin pe ka ' pon amʉ ' epirikʉ koro ' tau , Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Ɨri ton nɨ serɨ a ' taino kon ! Eke Papa tʉrawasooi i ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ ekama ' ponin nan e ' tane , ikupʉ uya pen . Isona pɨ ' , i ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ rʉ ' pʉ rɨken kupʉ uya .

text: For as Jonas was a sign unto the Ninevites , so shall also the Son of man be to this generation .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Isona esi ' pʉ i ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ pe Ninipa pon kon pona , mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ Ka ' pon , Papa winon esi mɨrɨ serɨ a ' taino kon pona .

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with the men of this generation , and condemn them : for she came from the utmost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Kwin , wʉi enu uye ' to ' kamisi winon e ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' oton eseru aimenka weyu a ' tai serɨ a ' taino kon pokon pe to ' eno ' ma pe ; apʉne pʉra iye ' sa ' wenai non u ' matʉ apai Saraman pu ' ketʉ etase ' na . Serɨ pe eke Saraman entaino man serɨ yau .

text: The men of Nineve shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' Ninipa pon kon e ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' oton eseru aimenka weyu a ' tai serɨ a ' taino kon pokon pe to ' eno ' ma pe ; apʉne pʉra to ' era ' tɨ ' pʉ tʉmakooi kon apai Isona uya itekare ekama pɨ ' . Serɨ pe eke Isona entaino man serɨ yau .

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , putteth it in a secret place , neither under a bushel , but on a candlestick , that they which come in may see the light .
text2: “ Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ raan ' pu po ' tɨ pʉra iyesi onansa ' pe iye ' to ' ya ' itʉto ' pe tʉuya , mɨrɨ pe pʉra pʉsau o ' koi ' . E ' tane ru ' ku , itapon pona itʉrʉ iya kamo tewonsan uya iweyu ene poken .

text: The light of the body is the eye : therefore when thine eye is single , thy whole body also is full of light ; but when thine eye is evil , thy body also is full of darkness .
text2: Ɨyenu kon esi ɨpun kon raan ' puui pe . Wakʉ pe ɨyenu kon esi a ' tai , tanporo ɨpun kon esi a ' kwa pe . E ' tane ɨri pe iyesi a ' tai , ɨpun kon nɨ nɨrɨ esi ewarupɨ pe .

text: Take heed therefore that the light which is in thee be not darkness .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' tense , ka ' pon e ' to ' ka ' nʉ ' to ' pe iyesi wakʉ pe pe ' tesi tukai ' , ɨri pe katɨ tukai ' .

text: If thy whole body therefore be full of light , having no part dark , the whole shall be full of light , as when the bright shining of a candle doth give thee light .
text2: Wakʉ pe te ' sen to ' ka ' nʉ ' sa ' ka ' pon uya a ' tai , ɨri kupʉ iya pen . Mɨrɨ na ' ne ' kasa nin si , wakʉ pe ɨnkupʉnʉ kon , weyu uya ɨwei ' tɨ kon kasa rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And as he spake , a certain Pharisee besought him to dine with him : and he went in , and sat down to meat .
text2: Sises usaurokʉ e ' nonka tʉpo , tikin nan Pari ' si uya ikɨ ' ma ' pʉ ata ' re ' tɨi ' . Mɨrɨpan ewomʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan ena ' pʉ tʉteire ' po tepʉrʉ piyau .

text: And when the Pharisee saw it , he marvelled that he had not first washed before dinner .
text2: E ' tane Pari ' si usewansiuka ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra temiyatʉ korʉkasa ' Sises uya pʉra iyesi pɨ ' tʉuta ' re ' tɨ wapiya , teseru kon yau .

text: And the Lord said unto him , Now do ye Pharisees make clean the outside of the cup and the platter ; but your inward part is full of ravening and wickedness .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Itepuru uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon Pari ' si amʉ ' uya a ' sawʉ kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ aparapii kon korʉka iya ' poi pɨ ' rɨken , e ' tane iyau eke pe rɨ mentai e ' nɨto ' ɨri pe e ' nɨto ' esi ayau ' nokon .

text: Ye fools , did not he that made that which is without make that which is within also ?
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon iya ' kwarʉ pʉnon ka ' pon amʉ ' ! Kʉrɨ pe ' iya ' poi pɨ ' ika ' nin nʉ ' pʉ uya rɨ marɨ pe ' iyawon kapʉ pen ?

text: But rather give alms of such things as ye have ; and , behold , all things are clean unto you .
text2: E ' tane nin aparapii kon yawon itʉtɨ ' entu ' manin nan ena ' , mɨrɨpan tanporon nɨ nin si esi mɨrɨ wakʉ pe ɨiwano ' kon pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But woe unto you , Pharisees ! for ye tithe mint and rue and all manner of herbs , and pass over judgment and the love of God : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: “ Ɨsɨ sɨ , Pari ' si amʉ ' , apʉne pʉra Papa ena ' 1 10 kaisa rɨ min , ru mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ti ' tui ' pʉra rɨ amainarʉ kon yawon ɨi ' kiyari kon isu tʉrʉ auya ' nokon , e ' tane ɨsi ' kaisa rɨ ka ' pon ku ' to ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa uya i ' nʉnkan nɨto ' eno ' ma auya ' nokon . Emen iwa pe na ' ne ' kupʉ pɨ ' ɨwesi ' pʉ kon nesii ' no iwapiyaro ' tʉnonkai ' pʉra ikupʉ pʉra .

text: Woe unto you , Pharisees ! for ye love the uppermost seats in the synagogues , and greetings in the markets .
text2: “ Papa uya ɨkota ' ma kon mɨrɨ ipan pe rɨ , Pari ' si amʉ ' , apʉne pʉra eke ton apon po ɨyereutapɨ ' pɨtʉ kon i ' nʉnka auya ' nokon pɨ ' Esuwerʉ amʉ ' usenupato ' iwʉ ' tau , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' uya , ‘ Miyarɨ , ’ ta i ' se ɨwesi kon ɨpɨ ' nokon kʉrʉpo ' po pɨ ' e ' nɨ pata ' se ' yau .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are as graves which appear not , and the men that walk over them are not aware of them .
text2: “ Ɨsɨ sɨ , apʉne pʉra ima ' kʉmasa ' pen uruwai ' kasa ɨwesi kon , ka ' pon amʉ ' usato ' ipʉro ' poro i ' tui ' ma pʉra , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then answered one of the lawyers , and said unto him , Master , thus saying thou reproachest us also .
text2: Main pɨ ' enupanin nan tonpa uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ti ' sa , serɨ tasa ' auya a ' tai , ina piyɨ ' nʉ ' pɨ ' pɨtʉ auya , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said , Woe unto you also , ye lawyers ! for ye lade men with burdens grievous to be borne , and ye yourselves touch not the burdens with one of your fingers .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon , Main pɨ ' enupanin nan , Papa uya ɨkota ' ma kon mɨrɨ ipan pe , apʉne pʉra ka ' pon amʉ ' apiyo ' masa ' auya ' nokon sa ' man nɨ ku ' to ' pe to ' uya Papa Maimu serɨ tukai ' , mɨrɨpan kon pika ' tɨ auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi ikupʉ pɨ ' .

text: Woe unto you ! for ye build the sepulchres of the prophets , and your fathers killed them .
text2: “ Ɨsɨ sɨ , apʉne pʉra pu ' kena ' amʉ ' uruwasii oton tɨ ' akapɨtʉ ' pʉ auya ' nokon , mɨrɨpan atamokori kon amʉ ' uya to ' tʉ ' ka ' pʉ .

text: Truly ye bear witness that ye allow the deeds of your fathers : for they indeed killed them , and ye build their sepulchres .
text2: Ɨusekama kon atamokori kon nʉkupʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' i ' napairon ta auya ' nokon ; pu ' kena ' amʉ ' tʉ ' ka ' pʉ to ' uya , mɨrɨpan to ' uruwasii oton tɨ ' akapɨtʉ ' pʉ auya ' nokon .

text: Therefore also said the wisdom of God , I will send them prophets and apostles , and some of them they shall slay and persecute :
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai , pena rɨ Papa uya tʉpu ' ketʉ yau ta ' pʉ , ‘ Pu ' kena ' amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itekare ekamanin nan ennoko uya mɨrɨ . Tʉron kon tʉ ' kato ' oton to ' uya , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉron kon kota ' mato ' oton to ' uya . ’

text: That the blood of all the prophets , which was shed from the foundation of the world , may be required of this generation ;
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , serɨ a ' taino kon e ' to ' oton pu ' kena ' amʉ ' mʉnʉ esa ' pe itɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ orʉ epiya ' tɨ ' pʉ si ' kɨrɨ ,

text: From the blood of Abel unto the blood of Zacharias , which perished between the altar and the temple : verily I say unto you , It shall be required of this generation .
text2: Eperʉ mʉnʉ awonsi ' kɨ Sakaraya mʉnʉ pʉ ' kʉ pona iwɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' apon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' ka ' sanau . Ewai ' , ekama uya , serɨ a ' taino kon e ' to ' oton tanporo serɨ esa ' pe .

text: Woe unto you , lawyers ! for ye have taken away the key of knowledge : ye entered not in yourselves , and them that were entering in ye hindered .
text2: “ Ɨsɨ sɨ , ipan pe main i ' tunin nan , apʉne pʉra i ' tunin pe e ' nɨto ' kii mo ' kasa ' auya ' nokon pɨ ' . Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon nɨ epa ' kasa ' pʉra iyesi , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tepa ' kasan wa ' kʉ ' pɨtʉ auya ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And as he said these things unto them , the scribes and the Pharisees began to urge him vehemently , and to provoke him to speak of many things :
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo , Pari ' si pata ' se ' apai Sises enna ' po ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ si ' kɨrɨ rɨ , Pari ' si amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Main pɨ ' enupanin nan ena ' pʉ iteyaton pe . Mɨrɨpan ekama ' popɨtʉ ' pʉ to ' uya sa ' man ton pɨ ' rɨ ,

text: Laying wait for him , and seeking to catch something out of his mouth , that they might accuse him .
text2: a ' sito ' tʉuya ' nokon ipɨkɨrɨ oton nɨ imaimu eta i ' se to ' esi ' pʉ .

text: In the mean time , when there were gathered together an innumerable multitude of people , insomuch that they trode one upon another , he began to say unto his disciples first of all , Beware ye of the leaven of the Pharisees , which is hypocrisy .
text2: Mɨrɨ koro ' tau , anpisin pe ka ' pon amʉ ' amʉra ' pʉ . Tu ' ke ka ' pon amʉ ' esi ' pʉ , tʉtonpa kon nɨ tʉwasa ' pɨ ' se . Wapiya tʉpoitorʉ ton auro ' kapɨ ' Sises e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ : “ Te ' mainanpai ' e ' tɨ ' , Pari ' si amʉ ' uya pʉrowa a ' sarutanʉ ' to ' ike namai ' , wakʉ pe to ' e ' ku ' to ' .

text: For there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; neither hid , that shall not be known .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ pʉra rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ iwapu ' tɨsa ' te ' nɨponkasen pen , mɨrɨ pe pʉra onansa ' i ' tu pʉra te ' sen .

text: Therefore whatsoever ye have spoken in darkness shall be heard in the light ; and that which ye have spoken in the ear in closets shall be proclaimed upon the housetops .
text2: Ewarupɨ yau ausaurokʉ ' pʉ usetato ' oton wʉi nai , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pana ya ' ɨyetarerumʉ ' pʉ i ' nau ɨiwʉ ' tau usekamato ' oton ɨutɨ nakapu ponsi ' kɨ .

text: And I say unto you my friends , Be not afraid of them that kill the body , and after that have no more that they can do .
text2: “ Apana ' tɨ uya ' nokon , utonpa ton , ɨpun kon wɨnin nan pɨ ' kenari ' nʉntʉu , mɨrɨ tʉpo ɨ ' rɨ kupʉ to ' uya pʉra iyesi .

text: But I will forewarn you whom ye shall fear : Fear him , which after he hath killed hath power to cast into hell ; yea , I say unto you , Fear him .
text2: E ' tane ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon kʉrɨ rɨ ɨyenari ' nʉnto ' kon ipɨ ' . Kʉrɨ rɨ pɨ ' rɨken enari ' nʉntɨ ' , ama ' tanʉkʉ tʉpo , a ' kwarʉ wannɨ kuru rɨ eno ' manin kʉrɨ rɨ , ekota ' man nɨto ' ya ' . Ewai ' , apana ' tɨ uya ' nokon , kʉrɨ rɨ rɨken pɨ ' enari ' nʉntɨ ' .

text: Are not five sparrows sold for two farthings , and not one of them is forgotten before God ?
text2: “ 5 kaisaron kon pe ' toron amʉ ' tʉkʉrʉpo ' pomasan pen asa ' ron pʉrata pun kaisa rɨ ? E ' tane tikin nan nɨ to ' tonpa pu ' tɨka ' nʉkʉ Papa uya pʉra iyesi .

text: But even the very hairs of your head are all numbered . Fear not therefore : ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: I ' napai rɨ , a ' pai kon i ' po ' rɨ esi tanporo i ' tusa ' pe . Kenari ' nʉntʉu , i ' nʉnkena ' ton ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon tu ' kan kon toron amʉ ' entaino kon , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: Also I say unto you , Whosoever shall confess me before men , him shall the Son of man also confess before the angels of God :
text2: “ Apana ' tɨ uya ' nokon , ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ uyekama a ' tai , i ' nai rɨ iyesi tukai ' ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' , Ka ' pon , Papa winon uya ekamato ' oton i ' nai rɨ iyesi tukai ' Papa inserʉʉi ton pɨ ' .

text: But he that denieth me before men shall be denied before the angels of God .
text2: E ' tane ɨnʉ ' rɨ unurunpayai ' ne ' ka ' pon amʉ ' rau nurunpato ' oton Papa inserʉʉi ton rau .

text: And whosoever shall speak a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but unto him that blasphemeth against the Holy Ghost it shall not be forgiven .
text2: “ Tanporon kon tʉusauro ' san isapema pe Ka ' pon , Papa winon pɨ ' rɨ usentu ' man , e ' tane ɨnʉ ' rɨ tʉusauro ' sen esi a ' tai , Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ sapema pe pɨ ' , Papa usentu ' man pen nɨ .

text: And when they bring you unto the synagogues , and unto magistrates , and powers , take ye no thought how or what thing ye shall answer , or what ye shall say :
text2: “ Usenupan nɨto ' iwʉ ' , esa ' wannɨ ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eke ton rakʉi ' to ' uya ɨne ' sa ' kon a ' tai , kɨsewankamatʉu , nai kasa e ' wapu ' tɨ mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨ ' rɨ ta uya , tukai ' .

text: For the Holy Ghost shall teach you in the same hour what ye ought to say .
text2: Papa A ' kwarʉ uya amaimu ke ɨrepa mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ a ' tai , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And one of the company said unto him , Master , speak to my brother , that he divide the inheritance with me .
text2: Tu ' kan kon ka ' pon amʉ ' koro ' tawon uya ta ' pʉ Sises pɨ ' , “ Ti ' sa , urui pɨ ' ekamakɨ urepato ' pe iya a ' sa ' mʉyai ina kʉipʉnʉ apuruui rʉ ' pʉ ke , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said unto him , Man , who made me a judge or a divider over you ?
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Utʉrawasooi pen nɨ mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said unto them , Take heed , and beware of covetousness : for a man ' s life consisteth not in the abundance of the things which he possesseth .
text2: Mɨrɨpan a ' tai , ta ' pʉ iya tu ' kan kon pɨ ' , “ Ti ' tui ' e ' tɨ ' ! Mentai pʉra e ' tɨ ' ! Ka ' pon uko ' mamʉ pʉra rɨ iyesi serɨ non po inke pori ' pe tanporon esa ' pe tesi pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he spake a parable unto them , saying , The ground of a certain rich man brought forth plentifully :
text2: Sises uya panton ke to ' auro ' ka ' pʉ to ' enupanin pe , “ Tapiyara ka ' pon esi ' pʉ , eke imainarʉ .

text: And he thought within himself , saying , What shall I do , because I have no room where to bestow my fruits ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan usenuminka ' pʉ , ‘ Ɨ ' rɨ kupʉ uya serɨ ? ’ tukai ' . ‘ Ui ' kiyari amʉranʉ ' to ' uya ya ' pʉra iyesi . ’

text: And he said , This will I do : I will pull down my barns , and build greater ; and there will I bestow all my fruits and my goods .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai ta ' pʉ iya , ‘ Serɨ kupʉ uya ; uyapuruui iwʉ ' tʉrʉ ' kwa uya serɨ . Eke pe parɨ amɨto ' pe uya . Mɨrɨ yau si ui ' kiyari mɨrɨ tʉpo uyapuruui amʉranʉ ' to ' pe uya .

text: And I will say to my soul , Soul , thou hast much goods laid up for many years ; take thine ease , eat , drink , and be merry .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai si ta uya mɨrɨ , Tu ' kan nɨ amʉranʉ ' sa ' uya mɨrɨ uko ' manʉ ' nin pe . E ' tʉrawasoma pen nin si serɨ tʉpo . Enta ' na , ensi uya , pori ' pe uko ' mamʉ ! ’

text: But God said unto him , Thou fool , this night thy soul shall be required of thee : then whose shall those things be , which thou hast provided ?
text2: “ E ' tane , Papa uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , ‘ Pu ' pʉn ! Serɨ ewarupɨ nau auma ' tato ' oton . E ' tane si tiwano ' pe , ɨiwano ' pe ɨnkupʉ ' pʉ epoto ' oton tʉron nɨ uya , ’ ta ' pʉ Papa uya ipɨ ' .

text: So is he that layeth up treasure for himself , and is not rich toward God .
text2: “ Serɨ na ' ne ' kasa si te ' ton kon ka ' pon amʉ ' mentaino kon pe to ' esi a ' tai , apʉne pʉra Papa e ' to ' i ' se kupʉ to ' uya pʉra iyesi pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And he said unto his disciples , Therefore I say unto you , Take no thought for your life , what ye shall eat ; neither for the body , what ye shall put on .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai Sises uya ta ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' , “ Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' ekama uya serɨ ɨpɨ ' nokon , ɨuko ' manto ' kon pɨ ' rɨ kɨsewankamatʉu , ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' enta ' nato ' pe , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨpun kon pɨ ' rɨ , ɨ ' rɨ esi upon pe , tukai ' .

text: The life is more than meat , and the body is more than raiment .
text2: Uko ' man nɨto ' esi kiyari entai , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pun wannɨ , pon entai .

text: Consider the ravens : for they neither sow nor reap ; which neither have storehouse nor barn ; and God feedeth them : how much more are ye better than the fowls ?
text2: Toron amʉ ' pɨ ' ɨsenupatɨ ' : Te ' pɨnsan pen , kiyari akʉ ' pʉsa ' amʉranʉ ' nin nan pen , to ' i ' kiyari pata ' se ' pʉnon kon nɨ ; e ' tane Papa uya to ' ewekʉ . Mɨrɨ entai i ' nʉnkena ' pe ɨwesi kon mɨrɨ toron amʉ ' entai !

text: And which of you with taking thought can add to his stature one cubit ?
text2: Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ tʉuko ' manto ' ɨnka miyarɨ parɨ , ipɨ ' tʉusewankamai ' ?

text: If ye then be not able to do that thing which is least , why take ye thought for the rest ?
text2: Sepa ' nan kupʉ auya ' nokon poken pʉra iye ' tane , ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' ken si tʉron nɨ ton pɨ ' ɨusewankama kon ?

text: Consider the lilies how they grow : they toil not , they spin not ; and yet I say unto you , that Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
text2: “ Pata ipʉrʉ ton a ' ta pɨ ' ɨsenupatɨ ' : Te ' tʉrawasomasan pen , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨ ' pɨ ' nin nan pen . Mɨrɨ rɨ e ' tane , ekama uya serɨ ɨpɨ ' nokon , Saraman imaminkena ' epontɨsa ' pʉra iyesi ' pʉ mɨrɨ ton kasa .

text: If then God so clothe the grass , which is to day in the field , and to morrow is cast into the oven ; how much more will he clothe you , O ye of little faith ?
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa Papa uya wana ' rɨ pontɨ pe iyesi yau , wana ' serɨ pe na ' ne ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ awanapairɨ eno ' ma apo ' ya ' , mɨrɨ entai rɨ ɨpontɨ iya ' nokon . Aiko sɨ , aiko pe rʉ ' kwɨ apurɨto ' auya ' nokon esi !

text: And seek not ye what ye shall eat , or what ye shall drink , neither be ye of doubtful mind .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨyewan kon tʉnonkai ' pʉra e ' tɨ ' ɨnɨkunʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨnensinʉ kon pɨ ' ; ipɨ ' kɨsewankamatʉu .

text: For all these things do the nations of the world seek after : and your Father knoweth that ye have need of these things .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Papa i ' tunin nan pen e ' to ' ipɨkɨrɨ pe tanporo serɨ warai ' nan esi , mɨrɨpan ɨkʉipʉnʉ kon uya i ' tu serɨ ton i ' se ɨwesi kon .

text: But rather seek ye the kingdom of God ; and all these things shall be added unto you .
text2: E ' tane , esa ' wannɨ pe iye ' to ' iwarinpatɨ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ serɨ ton nɨ nin si e ' tʉrʉ mɨrɨ ɨyena ' nokon nɨ nɨrɨ .

text: Fear not , little flock ; for it is your Father ' s good pleasure to give you the kingdom .
text2: “ Tu ' ke pʉra rɨ esii ' ma , enari ' ke ' pe pʉra e ' tɨ ' , apʉne pʉra ɨkʉipʉnʉ kon man pori ' pe itesa ' pe rɨ marɨ ɨwesi kon pa ɨrepa kon tʉuya pɨ ' .

text: Sell that ye have , and give alms ; provide yourselves bags which wax not old , a treasure in the heavens that faileth not , where no thief approacheth , neither moth corrupteth .
text2: Ayapuruui kon ikʉrʉpo ' pomatɨ ' , entu ' manin nan repa kon pa . Ɨpʉrataai kon yen ɨnepotɨ ' ipooi ' pɨ pe tenasen pen , mamin , Epʉn po na ' ne ' tʉu ' ma ' sen pen . Mɨrɨ yau ama ' uyepʉ pʉra iyesi a ' ko pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨrʉkanin uya ima ' tanʉkʉ pʉra rɨ iyesi .

text: For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
text2: Apʉne pʉra , ɨimamin kon e ' to ' airɨ , mɨrɨ yau ɨyewan kon nɨ nɨrɨ e ' to ' oton , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: Let your loins be girded about , and your lights burning ;
text2: Miyarɨ rɨ to ' enupa ' pʉ iya se kasa , “ Iyekonekasa ' pe e ' tɨ ' , Papa tʉrawasooi ku ' nin pe inke rɨ .

text: And ye yourselves like unto men that wait for their lord , when he will return from the wedding ; that when he cometh and knocketh , they may open unto him immediately .
text2: Iyapiyo ' ton esi tepuru kon enupɨkɨrɨ kasa e ' tɨ ' . Iye ' sa ' a ' tai , mʉra ' ta wɨpɨtʉ iya a ' tai , inke pʉra to ' uya a ' koka iyewonto ' pe .

text: Blessed are those servants , whom the lord when he cometh shall find watching : verily I say unto you , that he shall gird himself , and make them to sit down to meat , and will come forth and serve them .
text2: Pori ' pe to ' esi mɨrɨ itenupɨkɨrɨ te ' san . I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , iyepontɨ mɨrɨ to ' mʉta ' napato ' pe tʉuya , tepʉrʉ piyau tʉteire ' kon po to ' enato ' pe to ' kupʉ iya , mɨrɨpan kon enta ' na enupɨkɨrɨ iyesi .

text: And if he shall come in the second watch , or come in the third watch , and find them so , blessed are those servants .
text2: Wakʉ pe kuru iyesi mɨrɨ kamoro iyapiyo ' ton itenupɨkɨrɨ te ' san , ɨ ' rɨ pe pʉra rɨ ewarupɨ nau rɨ iye ' tane .

text: And this know , that if the goodman of the house had known what hour the thief would come , he would have watched , and not have suffered his house to be broken through .
text2: E ' tane , se ito ' ka ' nʉ ' tɨ ' : Ɨutɨ esa ' uya ama ' uyepʉ i ' tusa ' yau , tiwʉ ' ta ' ewon nɨ kuu ' pʉ iya nesii ' no pen .

text: Be ye therefore ready also : for the Son of man cometh at an hour when ye think not .
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon nɨrɨ , tekonekai ' me ' tʉi ' , apʉne pʉra Ka ' pon , Papa winon uye ' to ' oton itenupɨkɨrɨ pʉra rɨ ɨwe ' tane ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then Peter said unto him , Lord , speakest thou this parable unto us , or even to all ?
text2: Pi ' ta uya Sises ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Uyepuru , ina rɨken pe ' pana ya ' serɨ panton ekama auya , mɨrɨ pe pʉra tanporon kon pɨ ' rɨ katɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And the Lord said , Who then is that faithful and wise steward , whom his lord shall make ruler over his household , to give them their portion of meat in due season ?
text2: Itepuru uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨnʉ ' ken usauro ' nɨ ' pʉ awɨron mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ emiya ' pokena ' tʉtonpa esa ' e ' pe nai ? Itesa ' nʉnonkanʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton esa ' pe to ' i ' kiyari epe ' ke to ' repanin pe itʉto ' weyu a ' tai ?

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Wakʉ pe rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ ipoitorʉ e ' to ' oton itepuru neporonʉ mɨrɨ kupʉ pɨ ' tenna ' po a ' tai .

text: Of a truth I say unto you , that he will make him ruler over all that he hath .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , itepuru uya tanporon tapuruui esa ' pe iku ' to ' oton .

text: But and if that servant say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ; and shall begin to beat the menservants and maidens , and to eat and drink , and to be drunken ;
text2: E ' tane si iya ' tai pʉra kʉrɨ rɨ ipoitorʉ uya ta pe iyesi yau , ‘ Uyepuru nʉko ' manyan inke rɨ , iyepʉ pʉra , ’ ta iya yau , mɨrɨpan e ' sara ' tɨ warawo ' amʉ ' , uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' ipoitorʉ ton panta ' ma pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ enta ' nan pɨ ' , ensi pɨ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ e ' taripan pɨ ' .

text: The lord of that servant will come in a day when he looketh not for him , and at an hour when he is not aware , and will cut him in sunder , and will appoint him his portion with the unbelievers .
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ ipoitorʉ epuru uye ' to ' oton wʉi a ' tai itenupɨkɨrɨ iye ' tane pʉra , mɨrɨ a ' kʉra ' iyepʉ ta tane iya pʉra rɨ , mɨrɨpan uya ipɨrʉkato ' oton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ inonkato ' iya oton apurɨnin nan pen pata ' se ' ya ' .

text: And that servant , which knew his lord ' s will , and prepared not himself , neither did according to his will , shall be beaten with many stripes .
text2: “ Kʉrɨ rɨ ipoitorʉ epuru e ' to ' i ' se i ' tunin e ' tane tekonekasen pen , tepuru tʉrawasooi ku ' nin pen nɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan kota ' mato ' oton itepuru uya ipan pe kuru .

text: But he that knew not , and did commit things worthy of stripes , shall be beaten with few stripes . For unto whomsoever much is given , of him shall be much required : and to whom men have committed much , of him they will ask the more .
text2: E ' tane kʉrɨ rɨ i ' tunin pen tepuru e ' to ' i ' se , mɨrɨpan uya ɨri kupʉ , mara rʉ ' kwɨ itepuru uya ikota ' mato ' oton . Kʉrɨ rɨ eke pe Papa uya irepasa ' na ' ne ' winɨ eke pe iwarinpa iya . Kʉrɨ rɨ nɨrɨ Papa uya irepasa ' na ' ne ' itemiya ' porʉ ke , eke pe kuru tʉrawaso ku ' to ' iya ike ke winɨ , ekama ' poto ' oton eke pe kuru itʉrawasooi rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: I am come to send fire on the earth ; and what will I if it be already kindled ?
text2: Miyarɨ rɨ marɨ Sises esi ' pʉ to ' enupa pɨ ' se kasa : “ Apo ' ne ' sa ' uya serɨ non pona , epo ' tɨn pɨ ' iye ' sara ' tɨka ' sa ' i ' se e ' ai ' .

text: But I have a baptism to be baptized with ; and how am I straitened till it be accomplished !
text2: Uma ' tanʉ ' to ' ya ' utɨ pe man , e ' tane e ' ne ' pe kuru ukupʉ iya serɨ iu ' matʉ pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ .

text: Suppose ye that I am come to give peace on earth ? I tell you , Nay ; but rather division :
text2: Tʉusewankamai ' pʉra pe ' e ' nɨto ' ne ' sa ' uya pe ekama auya ' nokon serɨ non pona ? Tʉusewankamai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' ne ' sa ' uya pen , e ' tane epantakapɨ ' nɨto ' nin .
