text: For from henceforth there shall be five in one house divided , three against two , and two against three .
text2: Serɨ awonsi ' kɨ , 5 kaisaron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' e ' to ' oton ɨsitonpa pe usewa ' noman pɨ ' ; osorʉwawon kon asa ' ron kon ewa ' noma pɨ ' , asa ' ron kon osorʉwawon kon ewa ' noma pɨ ' nɨrɨ .

text: The father shall be divided against the son , and the son against the father ; the mother against the daughter , and the daughter against the mother ; the mother in law against her daughter in law , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: To ' epantakapɨ ' sa ' e ' to ' oton ; ikʉipʉnʉ tʉmu ewa ' noma pɨ ' , imu tʉkʉipʉnʉ ewa ' noma pɨ ' , isan uri ' san tʉmʉre ewa ' noma pɨ ' , imʉre uri ' san tʉsan ewa ' noma pɨ ' , itewo ' pʉ tʉpa ' se ewa ' noma pɨ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipa ' se tewo ' pʉ ewa ' noma pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said also to the people , When ye see a cloud rise out of the west , straightway ye say , There cometh a shower ; and so it is .
text2: Anpisin pɨ ' ta ' pʉ iya , “ Kapuru ' enuku ene auya ' nokon a ' tai , wʉi enu utɨ winɨ , inke pʉra , tuna uyepʉ tukai ' i ' tu auya ' nokon , mɨrɨ koro ' tau iye ' kapʉ rɨ .

text: And when ye see the south wind blow , ye say , There will be heat ; and it cometh to pass .
text2: Wʉi enu enuku kamisi winɨ pese ' tɨ uyepʉ a ' tai , i ' tu auya ' nokon , a ' ne ' pe wʉi uyepʉ tukai ' , mɨrɨpan esi a ' ne ' pe rɨ .

text: Ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky and of the earth ; but how is it that ye do not discern this time ?
text2: Wakʉ pe te ' ku ' san ! I ' tu auya ' nokon non mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' winɨ rɨ ɨ ' rɨ rɨ enpoikanin pe ɨwesi kon . Ɨ ' rɨ pe ken si iyesi pɨ ' serɨ pe iweyu na ' ne ' enpoika i ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi ?

text: Yea , and why even of yourselves judge ye not what is right ?
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' wakʉ eseru ɨnto ' ka ' nʉ ' pai pʉra ɨwesi kon ɨiwano ' kon pe ?

text: When thou goest with thine adversary to the magistrate , as thou art in the way , give diligence that thou mayest be delivered from him ; lest he hale thee to the judge , and the judge deliver thee to the officer , and the officer cast thee into prison .
text2: Ɨutɨ kon koro ' tau ɨyeyaton a ' kɨrɨ a ' sinin itepuru piya ' , ipan pe ɨsi ' tukɨ ekoneka i ' se ipokon pe , aya ' kwarʉka iya rawɨrɨ a ' sinin itepuru ena ' , ɨtʉrʉ iya mɨrɨ pʉresiman ena ' , mɨrɨpan uya ɨyeno ' ma pariki ' si ta ' .

text: I tell thee , thou shalt not depart thence , till thou hast paid the very last mite .
text2: Ekama uya , ɨyepa ' kato ' oton kon pen nɨ tanporo ɨne ' manʉ kon i ' ma ' ka auya ' nokon pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: There were present at that season some that told him of the Galilaeans , whose blood Pilate had mingled with their sacrifices .
text2: Moron kon uya Sises pana ' tɨ ' pʉ Kiyarari pon kon pɨ ' Paire ' nʉsuma ' san imʉnʉ pɨ ' to ' use ' mato ' pokon pe .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Suppose ye that these Galilaeans were sinners above all the Galilaeans , because they suffered such things ?
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Serɨ kasa to ' uma ' tasa ' pɨ ' ɨri ton pe kuru to ' esi ' pʉ pe kʉsekamatʉu .

text: I tell you , Nay : but , except ye repent , ye shall all likewise perish .
text2: Kane , ta uya , ɨyera ' tɨ kon pʉra iyesi yau amakooi kon apai , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon nɨ nɨrɨ uma ' ta mɨrɨ to ' kasa rɨ marɨ ɨwesi kon pɨ ' .

text: Or those eighteen , upon whom the tower in Siloam fell , and slew them , think ye that they were sinners above all men that dwelt in Jerusalem ?
text2: Mɨrɨ pe pʉra 18 kaisaron kon iyeri ' sa ' kon Sairon pon ka ' ta ' amɨsa ' ɨutɨ uta ' mo ' kasa ' a ' tai tʉpona ' nokon . Surusiran pon kon entai kuru pe ' ɨri pe to ' esi ' pʉ pe ekama auya ' nokon , mɨrɨ wenai to ' e ' wɨnɨ ' pʉ na ' ne ' ?

text: I tell you , Nay : but , except ye repent , ye shall all likewise perish .
text2: Kane , ta uya , ɨyera ' tɨ kon pʉra iyesi yau amakooi kon apai , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon nɨ nɨrɨ uma ' ta mɨrɨ to ' kasa rɨ marɨ ɨwesi kon pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: He spake also this parable ; A certain man had a fig tree planted in his vineyard ; and he came and sought fruit thereon , and found none .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya se panton ekama ' pʉ , “ Ka ' pon esi ' pʉ pi ' e ' esa ' . Mɨrɨpan utɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ iteperu ense e ' tane , eporo iya pʉra iyesi ' pʉ .

text: Then said he unto the dresser of his vineyard , Behold , these three years I come seeking fruit on this fig tree , and find none : cut it down ; why cumbereth it the ground ?
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ta ' pʉ iya tʉmainarʉ esa ' pɨ ' , ‘ Osorʉwau wʉipiya e ' to ' airɨ utɨpɨ ' sa ' man ui ' kiyari epetasa ' ene i ' se e ' tane , eporo uya pʉra rɨ iye ' sa ' . A ' tɨkɨ ! Ɨ ' rɨto ' pe non iwanʉ ' ka iya nesii ' no ? ’

text: And he answering said unto him , Lord , let it alone this year also , till I shall dig about it , and dung it :
text2: Mɨrɨpan eikʉ ' pʉ imainarʉ esa ' uya , ‘ Tɨwɨ tikin nɨ rɨken wʉipiya isi ' tuka ' to ' pe nesii . Iwoi aka uya , mɨrɨpan epetanʉ ' nin ke iu ' na ' tɨto ' pe uya .

text: And if it bear fruit , well : and if not , then after that thou shalt cut it down .
text2: Iyepetasa ' pe iyesi yau , wakʉ pe nin si iyesi mɨrɨ ; mɨrɨ pʉra iyesi yau , a ' tɨto ' pe rɨ nin si , ’ ta ' pʉ iya , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And he was teaching in one of the synagogues on the sabbath .
text2: Sapa ' a ' tai , Sises esi ' pʉ ka ' pon amʉ ' enupa pɨ ' Esuwerʉ amʉ ' usenupato ' iwʉ ' tau .

text: And , behold , there was a woman which had a spirit of infirmity eighteen years , and was bowed together , and could in no wise lift up herself .
text2: Mɨrɨpan yau uri ' san esi ' pʉ tɨmuipan , ɨri a ' kwarʉ nʉtɨmuika ' pʉ 18 kaisa rɨ wʉipiya iko ' mansa ' . Ipan pe iye ' tɨmuikasa ' to ' sa rɨ iyena pʉra .

text: And when Jesus saw her , he called her to him , and said unto her , Woman , thou art loosed from thine infirmity .
text2: Sises uya ensa ' a ' tai , ikɨ ' ma ' pʉ iya tʉpiya ' . Mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ma ' non , ɨyeparan apai ɨmo ' ka uya serɨ . ”

text: And he laid his hands on her : and immediately she was made straight , and glorified God .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , temiyatʉ tʉrʉ ' pʉ iya ipona , mɨrɨ a ' tai rɨ nin si , to ' sa rɨ iyena ' pʉ mɨrɨ . Mɨrɨpan uya Papa apurɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ .

text: And the ruler of the synagogue answered with indignation , because that Jesus had healed on the sabbath day , and said unto the people , There are six days in which men ought to work : in them therefore come and be healed , and not on the sabbath day .
text2: Sises uya ka ' pon epi ' tɨsa ' pɨ ' Sapa ' a ' tai , tʉusakorota pe Esuwerʉ amʉ ' usenupato ' iwʉ ' epuru uya ta ' pʉ ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' , “ 6 kaisa rɨ moro wʉi esi mɨrɨ e ' tʉrawasoman weyu . Mɨrɨ ton weyu a ' tai , ɨsepi ' tɨi ' ɨsi ' tɨ ' , Sapa ' a ' tai pen , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: The Lord then answered him , and said , Thou hypocrite , doth not each one of you on the sabbath loose his ox or his ass from the stall , and lead him away to watering ?
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon wakʉ pe te ' ku ' san ! Sapa ' a ' tai pe ' ɨikʉn kon paka , isa ' ka ' si rɨ eukanin nan pen ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon iten apai tuna ensise ' na arɨ kon pa ?

text: And ought not this woman , being a daughter of Abraham , whom Satan hath bound , lo , these eighteen years , be loosed from this bond on the sabbath day ?
text2: Pʉse rɨ ken pe ' si uri ' san Epʉra ' an pa rʉ ' pʉ , Se ' tan newa ' tɨ ' pʉ 18 kaisa rɨ wʉipiya euka pen ken pe ' si Sapa ' a ' tai ? ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And when he had said these things , all his adversaries were ashamed : and all the people rejoiced for all the glorious things that were done by him .
text2: Serɨ ta iya a ' tai , tanporo iteyaton non ɨpiyɨtʉ ' pʉ , e ' tane ka ' pon amʉ ' epori ' ma ' pʉ tanporon wakʉ ton inkupʉnʉ pɨ ' .

text: Then said he , Unto what is the kingdom of God like ? and whereunto shall I resemble it ?
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ kasa Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe esi ? Ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' mɨrɨ kasa iyesi tukai ' ekama uya ?

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and cast into his garden ; and it grew , and waxed a great tree ; and the fowls of the air lodged in the branches of it .
text2: Mosta ' ena ' pɨ kasa iyesi , ka ' pon nʉpɨmɨnʉ tʉmainarʉ yau . Iya ' ta , mɨrɨpan ena eke pe , mɨrɨpan panta po toron amʉ ' esi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And again he said , Whereunto shall I liken the kingdom of God ?
text2: Ekama ' pokaa ' pʉ iya kanan , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' mɨrɨ kasa Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe esi ta uya ?

text: It is like leaven , which a woman took and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Pʉrowa a ' sarutanʉ ' nin kasa iyesi , uri ' san nanʉmʉnʉ , mɨrɨpan uya pʉrowa pokon pe eke pe iki ' ma tanporo ipun yau iyena pʉ ' kʉ pona , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he went through the cities and villages , teaching , and journeying toward Jerusalem .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises utɨ esi ' pʉ eke iwa ton pata awɨrɨ ' ne rɨ , Surusiran pona tʉutɨi ' ma rɨ , ka ' pon amʉ ' enupa pɨ ' iyesi ' pʉ .

text: Then said one unto him , Lord , are there few that be saved ? And he said unto them ,
text2: Ka ' pon uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Uyepuru , tu ' kan kon pen nɨ si ka ' pon amʉ ' pika ' tɨto ' oton Papa uya to ' ato ' pe tʉuya Epʉn pona ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' ,

text: Strive to enter in at the strait gate : for many , I say unto you , will seek to enter in , and shall not be able .
text2: “ Ɨsi ' tutɨ ' kuru rɨ aiko rʉ ' kwɨ mʉra ' ta awɨrɨ ewon nɨ pɨ ' , ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , apʉne pʉra tu ' kan kon usi ' tuto ' oton ewomʉ i ' se , e ' tane to ' ewonto ' oton pen .

text: When once the master of the house is risen up , and hath shut to the door , and ye begin to stand without , and to knock at the door , saying , Lord , Lord , open unto us ; and he shall answer and say unto you , I know you not whence ye are :
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai si , ɨutɨ esa ' e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka , mɨrɨpan uya mʉra ' ta a ' koro , pʉroroi po ɨye ' soto ' kasa ' esii ' ma mʉra ' ta wɨpɨtʉ auya ' nokon ipan pe ekama ' po pe , ‘ Ina epuru , mʉra ' ta a ' kokakɨ ina iwano ' pe , ’ mɨrɨ e ' tane , ɨyeikʉ iya ' nokon , ‘ Ɨi ' tu uya ' nokon pʉra man , mɨrɨ pe pʉra mɨrɨ winɨ ɨuye ' sa ' kon ta uya pʉra rɨ iyesi , ’ tukai ' .

text: Then shall ye begin to say , We have eaten and drunk in thy presence , and thou hast taught in our streets .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai nin si , ‘ Ɨpokon pe sa ' ne ina nʉta ' re ' tɨtai ko , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' menupatai ko ina e ' ma tau ' ne . ’

text: But he shall say , I tell you , I know you not whence ye are ; depart from me , all ye workers of iniquity .
text2: Mɨrɨpan e ' tane , ɨyeikʉ iya ' nokon , ‘ Ɨi ' tu uya ' nokon pʉra man , mɨrɨ pe pʉra mɨrɨ winon kon uye ' sa ' ta uya pʉra rɨ iyesi . Entantɨ ' upiyapai , tanporo ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon ɨri ku ' nin nan ! ’ tato ' iya oton .

text: There shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth , when ye shall see Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob , and all the prophets , in the kingdom of God , and you yourselves thrust out .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ yau , ukaran nɨto ' oton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨ e ' kɨtɨtɨi ' mato ' oton , Epʉra ' an , Aisi ' , Seko ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pu ' kena ' amʉ ' ene auya ' nokon a ' tai , Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe yau , ɨyeno ' masa ' kon e ' tane .

text: And they shall come from the east , and from the west , and from the north , and from the south , and shall sit down in the kingdom of God .
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' uye ' to ' oton wʉi enu uyepʉ winɨ , wʉi enu utɨ winɨ , wʉi enu enwo ' netʉ winɨ , wʉi enu kamisi winɨ , mɨrɨpan kon ereutato ' oton enta ' nan pɨ ' Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe yau .

text: And , behold , there are last which shall be first , and there are first which shall be last .
text2: I ' napai rɨ , kamoro iu ' matʉ pe na ' ne ' nan wapiya te ' ton kon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wapiya na ' ne ' nan iu ' matʉ pe te ' ton kon , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: The same day there came certain of the Pharisees , saying unto him , Get thee out , and depart hence : for Herod will kill thee .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Pari ' si amʉ ' uyee ' pʉ Sises piya ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Serɨ apai tʉron nɨ airɨ enta , Era ' e ' kaman pɨ ' man ɨwɨnɨ pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye , and tell that fox , Behold , I cast out devils , and I do cures to day and to morrow , and the third day I shall be perfected .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Kʉrɨ rɨ pata ennakanin ipana ' tɨtantɨ ' unkupʉnʉ pɨ ' : ‘ Ɨri a ' kwarʉ ton enpa ' ka pɨ ' esi , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' epi ' tɨ pɨ ' esi , serɨ pe , awanapai rɨ nɨrɨ , mɨrɨ ema ' sa ' yau ' ne rɨ nin si utʉrawasooi u ' ma ' sa ' pe iyesi mɨrɨ . ’

text: Nevertheless I must walk to day , and to morrow , and the day following : for it cannot be that a prophet perish out of Jerusalem .
text2: Mɨrɨ koro ' tau rɨ nin si , utɨ rɨ , serɨ pe , awanapai rɨ , mɨrɨ ema ' sa ' yau , Surusiran pona . I ' napai rɨ iyesi , ɨnʉ ' rɨ pu ' kena ' wɨto ' pʉra iyesi mɨrɨ mɨ airɨ rɨ e ' tane Surusiran po rɨken .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , which killest the prophets , and stonest them that are sent unto thee ; how often would I have gathered thy children together , as a hen doth gather her brood under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: “ Aiko sɨ , Surusiran pon kon , Surusiran pon kon ! Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon , pu ' kena ' amʉ ' tʉ ' kanin nʉ ' san , ɨpiya ' nokon Papa nennoko ' san wɨpɨ ' nin nʉ ' san tɨ ' ke . Inke rɨ sa ' ne ɨmunkɨ amʉ ' amʉranʉkʉ i ' se esi ' pʉ , kɨrɨtɨkɨ uya tʉmunkɨ amʉranʉkʉ kasa tapiri o ' koi ' , e ' tane ikupʉ uya i ' se pʉra ɨwesi ' pʉ kon .

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate : and verily I say unto you , Ye shall not see me , until the time come when ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Apʉne si entɨ ' , ɨiwʉ ' kon e ' nonkasa ' ɨyena ' nokon yawon pʉra . Ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , uyento ' auya ' nokon oton pen nɨ kanan serɨ enta ' , ‘ Pori ' pe rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ nʉye ' ai ' ne ' Itepuru ese ' yau esi , ’ ta auya ' nokon pʉ ' kʉ pona , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And it came to pass , as he went into the house of one of the chief Pharisees to eat bread on the sabbath day , that they watched him .
text2: Sapa ' a ' tai , Sises utɨ ' pʉ Pari ' si amʉ ' epuru iwʉ ' ta ' enta ' nai ' . Ipan pe rɨ to ' esi ' pʉ enpɨtʉ pɨ ' .

text: And , behold , there was a certain man before him which had the dropsy .
text2: Mɨrɨ yau si , takuru ' kenan esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ itemekon ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' si ton a ' sarutapɨ ' sa ' .

text: And Jesus answering spake unto the lawyers and Pharisees , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath day ?
text2: Sises uya Pari ' si amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Main pɨ ' enupanin nan ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Main awɨrɨ pe ' e ' nɨ pe iyesi Sapa ' a ' tai takuru ' kenan ka ' pon epi ' tɨ yau , mɨrɨ pe pʉra kane katɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they held their peace . And he took him , and healed him , and let him go ;
text2: E ' tane to ' uya rɨ etapɨtʉ ' pʉ . Mɨrɨpan uya temiyatʉ tʉrʉ ' pʉ takuru ' kenan pona , epi ' tɨ ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan ennoko ' pʉ iya .

text: And answered them , saying , Which of you shall have an ass or an ox fallen into a pit , and will not straightway pull him out on the sabbath day ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan a ' tai , to ' ekama ' po ' pʉ iya , “ Ɨ ' rɨ ken kupʉ auya ɨmʉre , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨikʉn paka uta ' mo ' kasa ' pe iyesi yau non akasa ' ya ' Sapa ' a ' tai ? Imo ' ka auya pen pe ' inke pʉra ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they could not answer him again to these things .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ nin si tato ' to ' uya pʉra rɨ iyesi ' pʉ mɨrɨ .

text: And he put forth a parable to those which were bidden , when he marked how they chose out the chief rooms ; saying unto them ,
text2: Tʉron nɨ a ' tai , Sises uya ikɨ ' masa ' kon ereutasa ' ene ' pʉ eke ton pe te ' san apon po . Mɨrɨpan kon pana ya ' se panton ekama ' pʉ iya :

text: When thou art bidden of any man to a wedding , sit not down in the highest room ; lest a more honourable man than thou be bidden of him ;
text2: “ Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ɨkɨ ' masa ' pe iyesi yau , temari ' masan uta ' re ' tɨ koro ' ta ' , eke ton pata ' se ' airɨ kereutai . Iya ' tai pʉra , eke ɨyentaino kɨ ' masa ' iya esi .

text: And he that bade thee and him come and say to thee , Give this man place ; and thou begin with shame to take the lowest room .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi yau , apatawono ɨkɨ ' manin nʉ ' pʉ uya ta ɨpɨ ' , ‘ Pʉse irepakɨ ayapon ke . ’ Mɨrɨ a ' tai nin si , ɨyepiyɨ ' sa ' ereuta mɨrɨ sepan pona rʉ ' kwɨ nin si .

text: But when thou art bidden , go and sit down in the lowest room ; that when he that bade thee cometh , he may say unto thee , Friend , go up higher : then shalt thou have worship in the presence of them that sit at meat with thee .
text2: E ' tane ɨkɨ ' masa ' a ' tai , sepan airɨ rʉ ' kwɨ mereutai ' . Apatawono uye ' sa ' a ' tai , ‘ Se ya ' parɨ wakʉ ya ' atamakɨ , ’ tato ' pe iya ɨpɨ ' . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , eke pe ɨkupʉ iya ɨpokon pe ikɨ ' masa ' kon enu airɨ .

text: For whosoever exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: Apʉne pʉra , eke pe te ' ku ' san tiwano ' kon pe ena mɨrɨ se pe rɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ se pe te ' ku ' san ena mɨrɨ eke pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then said he also to him that bade him , When thou makest a dinner or a supper , call not thy friends , nor thy brethren , neither thy kinsmen , nor thy rich neighbours ; lest they also bid thee again , and a recompence be made thee .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya ta ' pʉ tʉpatawono pɨ ' , “ Ɨye ' kɨ ' ma a ' tai , ɨtonpa ton nɨken kʉ ' kɨ ' mai , tapiyara ton kʉ ' kɨ ' mai , apʉne pʉra to ' use ' ma esi ɨmɨrɨ tʉkɨ ' mai ' .

text: But when thou makest a feast , call the poor , the maimed , the lame , the blind :
text2: E ' tane enta ' nai ' ka ' pon amʉ ' kɨ ' ma auya pe iyesi yau , entu ' manin nan , ipu ' tɨka ' sa ' ton , wasesenpa ' nan , tenku ' na ' nan nɨken mʉkɨ ' mai ' .

text: And thou shalt be blessed ; for they cannot recompense thee : for thou shalt be recompensed at the resurrection of the just .
text2: Pori ' pe ɨwesi mɨrɨ , to ' uya ɨye ' ma tane pʉra rɨ . Ɨyepe ' pʉ eporo auya , ipokena ' ton eri ' sa ' e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka a ' tai , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And when one of them that sat at meat with him heard these things , he said unto him , Blessed is he that shall eat bread in the kingdom of God .
text2: Serɨ etasa ' mɨrɨ yau te ' san tonpa uya a ' tai , ta ' pʉ iya Sises pɨ ' , “ Pori ' pe kuru kamoro esi mɨrɨ enta ' nan pɨ ' te ' ton kon Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe yau , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then said he unto him , A certain man made a great supper , and bade many :
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ panton ekama pe , “ Ka ' pon uya eke kuru enta ' nan nɨto ' koneka esi ' pʉ . Mɨrɨpan uya tu ' kan kon nɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' kɨ ' ma ' pʉ .

text: And sent his servant at supper time to say to them that were bidden , Come ; for all things are now ready .
text2: Tenta ' nakapʉ a ' tai nin si , tʉpoitorʉ ennoko ' pʉ iya tʉnkɨ ' ma ' san pana ' tɨse ' na , ‘ Ɨsi ' tɨ ' si , tanporon nɨ si ekonekasa ' man , ’ tukai ' .

text: And they all with one consent began to make excuse . The first said unto him , I have bought a piece of ground , and I must needs go and see it : I pray thee have me excused .
text2: E ' tane , tanporo tʉwapu kon eporo ' pʉ to ' uya . Wapiyaro ' uya ta ' pʉ , ‘ Serɨ pe kuru umɨ ennasa ' uya man , mɨrɨpan ense ' na utɨ . Ɨri pe mɨrɨ pɨ ' ke ' kupʉi . ’

text: And another said , I have bought five yoke of oxen , and I go to prove them : I pray thee have me excused .
text2: “ Tʉron nɨ uya ta ' pʉ , ‘ Serɨ pe kuru 5 kaisa rɨ asa ' rɨ ' ne i ' mʉkansa ' kon paka amʉ ' waraino kon ennasa ' uya man , mɨrɨpan kon i ' tuse ' na utɨ serɨ . Ɨri pe mɨrɨ pɨ ' ke ' kupʉi . ’

text: And another said , I have married a wife , and therefore I cannot come .
text2: Tʉron nɨ uya rɨ marɨ kanan ta ' pʉ , ‘ Serɨ pe kuru emari ' masa ' man . Mɨrɨ wenai , utɨ poken pʉra man , ’ tukai ' to ' usekama ' pʉ .

text: So that servant came , and shewed his lord these things . Then the master of the house being angry said to his servant , Go out quickly into the streets and lanes of the city , and bring in hither the poor , and the maimed , and the halt , and the blind .
text2: “ Serɨ si ekamase ' na ipoitorʉ enna ' po ' pʉ mɨrɨ tepuru pɨ ' . Mɨrɨ pɨ ' itepuru usakorota ' pʉ ipan pe , mɨrɨpan uya tʉpoitorʉ apiyo ' ma ' pʉ , ‘ Inke pʉra enta pata ya ' ne , eke ton asanta tawɨrɨ ' ne , aiko ton tawɨrɨ ' ne entu ' manin nan ine ' ta , ipu ' tɨka ' sa ' kon , tenku ' na ' nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wasesenpa ' nan , ’ ta ' pʉ itepuru uya .

text: And the servant said , Lord , it is done as thou hast commanded , and yet there is room .
text2: “ Mɨrɨpan poitorʉ uye ' sa ' uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , ‘ Uyapiyo ' ma ' pʉ auya siku ' kapʉi , e ' tane moro rɨ marɨ ɨutɨ man , iyarʉ pʉra , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And the lord said unto the servant , Go out into the highways and hedges , and compel them to come in , that my house may be filled .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ a ' tai , itepuru uya kanan takaa ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ pɨ ' , ‘ Enta asanta ta ' ne ɨnnɨ ' nan pata ya ' ne mɨrɨ yawon kon pɨ ' ɨsi ' tɨ ' kuru mʉkai ' , uiwʉ ' utarʉ ' tɨka ' to ' pe .

text: For I say unto you , That none of those men which were bidden shall taste of my supper .
text2: Ta uya ɨpɨ ' , kamoro unkɨ ' ma ' san wapiya uya ui ' kiyari onpato ' oton pen , ’ ta ' pʉ itepuru uya tapiyo ' pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And there went great multitudes with him : and he turned , and said unto them ,
text2: Anpisin nɨ utɨ esi ' pʉ Sises a ' kɨrɨ . To ' winɨkʉi ' tera ' tɨi ' ta ' pʉ iya ,

text: If any man come to me , and hate not his father , and mother , and wife , and children , and brethren , and sisters , yea , and his own life also , he cannot be my disciple .
text2: “ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ esi pʉra iyesi upoitorʉ pe tʉkʉipʉnʉ , tʉsan i ' nʉnkai ' ma , tʉno ' pʉ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉmunkɨ amʉ ' , takon non mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉparusi ton , tʉuko ' mamʉ eseru rɨ nɨrɨ i ' nʉnkai ' ma rɨ urɨ i ' nʉnkato ' tʉuya entai .

text: And whosoever doth not bear his cross , and come after me , cannot be my disciple .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨnʉ ' rɨ tʉkurusukuui anapai pʉra na ' ne ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ upɨkɨrɨ ɨtɨpai pʉra na ' ne ' esi upoitorʉ poken pʉra rɨ .

text: For which of you , intending to build a tower , sitteth not down first , and counteth the cost , whether he have sufficient to finish it ?
text2: “ Ka ' tawon ɨutɨ anamɨpai ɨtonpa kon esi yau , iyereuta pen pe ' wapiya eke pe pe ' tʉpʉrataai esi amɨ poken nɨ tukai ' ense ' na ?

text: Lest haply , after he hath laid the foundation , and is not able to finish it , all that behold it begin to mock him ,
text2: Isara ' tɨsa ' iya e ' tane , i ' ma ' ka iya pʉra iyesi yau , tanporon kon ennin nan uta ' kɨrɨ mɨrɨ ipɨ ' ,

text: Saying , This man began to build , and was not able to finish .
text2: ‘ Pʉse rɨ rʉ ' kwɨ e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ amɨ pɨ ' e ' tane , i ' ma ' ka iya pʉra iye ' sa ' , ’ tukai ' .

text: Or what king , going to make war against another king , sitteth not down first , and consulteth whether he be able with ten thousand to meet him that cometh against him with twenty thousand ?
text2: “ Iya ' tai pʉra si , kin ekoneka serɨ ko tʉutɨto ' pe tʉron nɨ kin ewa ' nomai ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itentai enai ' . Iyereuta pen pe ' ɨsenuminkase ' na 10 , 000 kaisaron kon tʉsoisaai amʉ ' pe ' esi pana ' pe tukai ' teyaton non uyepʉ pe iyesi yau 20 , 000 kaisa rɨ tewa ' nomai ' ?

text: Or else , while the other is yet a great way off , he sendeth an ambassage , and desireth conditions of peace .
text2: Ikupʉ tʉuya poken pʉra iyesi pɨ ' , tʉpoitorʉ ton ennoko iya kin piya ' ɨnnɨ rɨ marɨ esii ' ma ekama ' pose ' na tʉuko ' manto ' kon pe tʉusewa ' nomai ' pʉra .

text: So likewise , whosoever he be of you that forsaketh not all that he hath , he cannot be my disciple .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , upoitorʉ pe e ' pai ɨwesi yau , tanporon nɨ tʉnonkai ' ɨwe ' to ' pe iyesi .

text: Salt is good : but if the salt have lost his savour , wherewith shall it be seasoned ?
text2: “ Waiyo esi wakʉ , e ' tane ine ' ne ' pe pʉra iyenasa ' yau , nai kasa ine ' ne ' pe kanan ikupʉ ?

text: It is neither fit for the land , nor yet for the dunghill ; but men cast it out . He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Wakʉ pe pʉra rɨ iyesi non iwano ' pe mɨrɨ pe pʉra non isu pe ; eno ' masa ' pe iyesi . “ Kʉrɨ tʉpana ke na ' ne ' etanin pe , tɨwɨ netai , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: Then drew near unto him all the publicans and sinners for to hear him .
text2: Tʉron nɨ a ' tai , pʉrata amʉranʉ ' nin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉmakooikena ' nan amʉra esi ' pʉ Sises woi imaimu etase ' na .

text: And the Pharisees and scribes murmured , saying , This man receiveth sinners , and eateth with them .
text2: E ' tane Pari ' si amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Main pɨ ' enupanin nan etarerumʉ ' pʉ , “ Pʉse rɨ ka ' pon uya tʉmakooikena ' nan kupʉ tʉtonpa pe , to ' pokon pe rɨ iyenta ' na ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he spake this parable unto them , saying ,
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai nin si , Sises uya serɨ ton panton amʉ ' ekama ' pʉ mɨrɨ to ' pɨ ' ,

text: What man of you , having an hundred sheep , if he lose one of them , doth not leave the ninety and nine in the wilderness , and go after that which is lost , until he find it ?
text2: “ Iya ' tai pʉra , 100 kaisa rɨ karimeru amʉ ' itikʉn ton ɨtonpa kon esi yau , mɨrɨpan kon tonpa utano ' masa ' pe iyesi yau , 99 pan kon pe ' nɨnnin pen ayupon pata yau itano ' masa ' e ' ma ' pʉ tau tʉutɨto ' pe eporo tʉuya pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ ?

text: And when he hath found it , he layeth it on his shoulders , rejoicing .
text2: Eposa ' tʉuya a ' tai , pori ' pe esii ' ma ti ' mʉye ' pɨ pona anʉmʉ iya .

text: And when he cometh home , he calleth together his friends and neighbours , saying unto them , Rejoice with me ; for I have found my sheep which was lost .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , tʉtonpa ton kɨ ' ma iya , mɨrɨpan uya ta to ' pɨ ' , ‘ Epori ' manpai ' nokon . Uikʉn karimeru itano ' masa ' rʉ ' pʉ eposa ' uya man ! ’

text: I say unto you , that likewise joy shall be in heaven over one sinner that repenteth , more than over ninety and nine just persons , which need no repentance .
text2: Mɨrɨ ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , mɨrɨ kasa kuru si iyesi epori ' man esi eke pe Epʉn po tikin nan tʉmakooikenan era ' tɨsa ' a ' tai , kamo 99 kaisaron kon ipokena ' ton ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' pori ' pe e ' nɨ entai .

text: Either what woman having ten pieces of silver , if she lose one piece , doth not light a candle , and sweep the house , and seek diligently till she find it ?
text2: “ Mɨrɨ pe pʉra , uri ' san uya 10 kaisaron pʉrata pun tonpa ano ' ma ' pʉ pe iyesi yau tikin nɨ , ɨ ' rɨ ken si kupʉ iya ? Tʉraan ' puui po ' tɨ iya , tiwʉ ' akorokato ' pe tʉuya , iwarinpa iya , eporo tʉuya pʉ ' kʉ pona .

text: And when she hath found it , she calleth her friends and her neighbours together , saying , Rejoice with me ; for I have found the piece which I had lost .
text2: Eposa ' tʉuya a ' tai , tʉtonpa ton kɨ ' ma iya , mɨrɨpan uya ta to ' pɨ ' , ‘ Epori ' manpai ' nokon , itano ' masa ' rʉ ' pʉ upʉrataai eposa ' uya man ! ’

text: Likewise , I say unto you , there is joy in the presence of the angels of God over one sinner that repenteth .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ iyesi ta uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , Papa inserʉʉi amʉ ' epori ' ma tikin nan nɨ tʉmakooikenan era ' tɨsa ' a ' tai , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And he said , A certain man had two sons :
text2: Miyarɨ rɨ Sises usaurokʉ ' pʉ , “ Moro ka ' pon esi ' pʉ asa ' ron kon imunkɨ .

text: And the younger of them said to his father , Father , give me the portion of goods that falleth to me . And he divided unto them his living .
text2: Iyakon uya ta ' pʉ tʉkʉipʉnʉ pɨ ' , ‘ Papai , uyena ' ɨntʉrʉnʉ pe te ' sen ɨimamin itʉka ' kɨ , ’ ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' . Mɨrɨpan uya timamin ratoika ' pʉ to ' kaisa rɨ .

text: And not many days after the younger son gathered all together , and took his journey into a far country , and there wasted his substance with riotous living .
text2: Inke kuru pʉra rɨ mɨrɨ pata ' pʉ pe , imu akon si uya tanporo tiwano ' pe iye ' nonkasa ' amʉranʉkʉ ' pʉ . Mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ ɨnnon pata ya ' . Mɨrɨ yau nin si tʉpʉrataai ma ' tanʉkʉ ' pʉ iya mɨrɨ .

text: And when he had spent all , there arose a mighty famine in that land ; and he began to be in want .
text2: Tanporon nɨ nin si ma ' tanʉkʉ ' pʉ iya pata ' pʉ pe , iwankan uta ' mo ' ka ' pʉ mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ pata yau , mɨrɨpan ekota ' ma ' pʉ .

text: And he went and joined himself to a citizen of that country ; and he sent him into his fields to feed swine .
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo , itɨ ' pʉ patawon piya ' tʉtʉrawasooi epose . Mɨrɨpan uya tikʉn non peiruku amʉ ' ewe ' se ' na ennoko ' pʉ .

text: And he would fain have filled his belly with the husks that the swine did eat : and no man gave unto him .
text2: Mɨrɨpan nʉ ' kwɨ esi ' pʉ peiruku amʉ ' i ' kiyari pɨ ' enta ' napai . E ' tane ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ irepa ' pʉ pen iti ' kiyari ke .

text: And when he came to himself , he said , How many hired servants of my father ' s have bread enough and to spare , and I perish with hunger !
text2: Isenuminkato ' uya nin si eporo ' pʉ mɨrɨ . Mɨrɨpan uya , ‘ Ukʉipʉnʉ apiyo ' ton i ' kiyari esi serɨ eke pe rɨ to ' entai rɨ , ’ ta ' pʉ iya . ‘ E ' tane si , serɨ yau apʉ ' ka ' nɨ pɨ ' esi .

text: I will arise and go to my father , and will say unto him , Father , I have sinned against heaven , and before thee ,
text2: Enna ' po serɨ , tase ' na ukʉipʉnʉ pɨ ' ; Papai , e ' makoimasa ' man Papa winɨkʉi ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨwinɨkʉi ' nɨrɨ .

text: And am no more worthy to be called thy son : make me as one of thy hired servants .
text2: Ɨmu tukai ' uyesakʉi , e ' tane pʉra ayapiyo ' ton tonpa pe uku ' kɨ . ’

text: And he arose , and came to his father . But when he was yet a great way off , his father saw him , and had compassion , and ran , and fell on his neck , and kissed him .
text2: Mɨrɨpan enna ' po ' pʉ tʉkʉipʉnʉ piya ' . “ Ɨnnɨ rɨ marɨ iye ' tane , ikʉipʉnʉ uya ensa ' esi ' pʉ . Mɨrɨpan tense isentu ' ma ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan eka ' tumʉ ' pʉ a ' sise ' na . Mɨrɨ tʉpo , ereutanʉkʉ ' pʉ iya , a ' su ' kapɨtʉ ' pʉ iya etupa pe .

text: And the son said unto him , Father , I have sinned against heaven , and in thy sight , and am no more worthy to be called thy son .
text2: Imu uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , ‘ Papai , e ' makoimasa ' man Papa winɨkʉi ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨwinɨkʉi ' nɨrɨ . Ɨmu tukai ' uyesakʉi . ’

text: But the father said to his servants , Bring forth the best robe , and put it on him ; and put a ring on his hand , and shoes on his feet :
text2: Mɨrɨpan e ' tane ikʉipʉnʉ uya ta ' pʉ tapiyo ' ton pɨ ' , ‘ Inke pʉra wakʉ ipon ine ' tɨ ' ipontɨ kon pa , irimuui ɨntʉtɨ ' itemiyatʉ pɨ ' . Wakʉ ke kuru isapatooi ' tɨtɨ ' .

text: And bring hither the fatted calf , and kill it ; and let us eat , and be merry :
text2: Eka ' nʉ ' sa ' paka ine ' tɨ ' iwɨnɨ kon pa . Enta ' nanpai ' nokon umu uye ' sa ' pɨ ' !

text: For this my son was dead , and is alive again ; he was lost , and is found . And they began to be merry .
text2: Pʉse rɨ si umʉre ima ' tasa ' kasa , iye ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' pe rɨ upona iyesi pɨ ' . Itano ' masa ' rʉ ' pʉ e ' seposa ' , ’ ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' . Mɨrɨpan kon e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ enta ' nan pɨ ' .

text: Now his elder son was in the field : and as he came and drew nigh to the house , he heard musick and dancing .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ koro ' tau si , eke imu esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ umɨ yau . Ɨutɨ piya ' a ' ko pe iye ' sa ' a ' tai , wai uturumʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉumanunsan eta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he called one of the servants , and asked what these things meant .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya tapiyo ' ton tonpa kɨ ' ma ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan ekama ' po ' pʉ iya , ‘ Ɨ ' rɨ ne ' ku ' an ? ’ tukai ' .

text: And he said unto him , Thy brother is come ; and thy father hath killed the fatted calf , because he hath received him safe and sound .
text2: Mɨrɨpan eikʉ ' pʉ iya , ‘ Ayakon enna ' posa ' . Mɨrɨ pɨ ' eka ' nʉ ' sa ' paka wɨsa ' ɨkʉipʉnʉ uya , atu ' pe rɨ iyenna ' posa ' pɨ ' , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he was angry , and would not go in : therefore came his father out , and intreated him .
text2: Ewonpai pʉra irui usakorotasa ' esi ' pʉ . “ ‘ Ewonkɨ , ’ ka ' se ' na ikʉipʉnʉ epa ' ka ' pʉ .

text: And he answering said to his father , Lo , these many years do I serve thee , neither transgressed I at any time thy commandment : and yet thou never gavest me a kid , that I might make merry with my friends :
text2: “ Mɨrɨpan uya tʉkʉipʉnʉ eikʉ ' pʉ , ‘ Apʉne uyeta ' , amaimu pʉreme ' nin pen sa ' ne urɨ ko ; ayapiyo ' pe tʉuko ' mansen inke rɨ wʉipiya ton kaisarɨ rɨ , e ' tane utonpa ton pokon pe epori ' mato ' pe urepanin pen nɨ ɨmɨrɨ .

text: But as soon as this thy son was come , which hath devoured thy living with harlots , thou hast killed for him the fatted calf .
text2: E ' tane si pʉse rɨ ɨmu ayapuruui , ɨpʉrataai ma ' tanʉ ' nin nʉ ' pʉ ekuman pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan enna ' posa ' yo ' pe , eka ' nʉ ' sa ' paka mʉre wɨsa ' auya , ’ ta ' pʉ iya . “ Mɨrɨpan eikʉ ' pʉ ikʉipʉnʉ uya ,

text: And he said unto him , Son , thou art ever with me , and all that I have is thine .
text2: ‘ Upiyau te ' sen ɨmɨrɨ tɨwɨrɨ rɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporon nɨ upiyau na ' ne ' mɨrɨ ɨiwano ' , ’ ta ' pʉ ikʉipʉnʉ uya ipɨ ' .

text: It was meet that we should make merry , and be glad : for this thy brother was dead , and is alive again ; and was lost , and is found .
text2: ‘ E ' tane pʉse rɨ ayakon enna ' posa ' pɨ ' , itano ' masa ' rʉ ' pʉ pe iyesi pɨ ' , ima ' tasa ' kasa rɨ iko ' mansa ' pɨ ' epori ' man , ’ ta ' pʉ ikʉipʉnʉ uya ipɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said also unto his disciples , There was a certain rich man , which had a steward ; and the same was accused unto him that he had wasted his goods .
text2: Panton ekama ' pʉ Sises uya tʉpoitorʉ ton pana ya ' , se tawon : “ Mɨrɨ yau ka ' pon esi ' pʉ ipʉrataaike ' , mɨrɨpan esi ' pʉ timamin esa ' ke . Tʉron nɨ a ' tai , itepuru piya ' ka ' pon utɨ ' pʉ tepuru pʉrataai mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itimamin ma ' tanʉkʉ iya ekamai ' .

text: And he called him , and said unto him , How is it that I hear this of thee ? give an account of thy stewardship ; for thou mayest be no longer steward .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ikɨ ' ma ' pʉ iya ekama ' poto ' pe tʉuya , ‘ Ka ' pon amʉ ' uya upana ' tɨsa ' man ɨyeseru ke , mɨrɨpan apurɨsa ' uya man . Ɨyenau iye ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ pʉrata mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uimamin apon nʉ ' pʉ kareta ikonekaka ' kɨ . Mɨrɨ enta ' uimamin esa ' pe ɨwe ' to ' oton pen mɨrɨ , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then the steward said within himself , What shall I do ? for my lord taketh away from me the stewardship : I cannot dig ; to beg I am ashamed .
text2: “ Mɨrɨpan apiyo ' usenuminka ' pʉ , ‘ Uyepuru uya , “ Mɨrɨ enta ' uimamin esa ' pe ɨwe ' to ' oton pen mɨrɨ , ” tasa ' upɨ ' . Ɨ ' rɨ rɨ ku ' to ' pe uya ko ? Pana ' pe pʉra e ' ai ' sa ' man tʉrawaso kupʉ uya poken pʉra , ɨpiyɨtʉ rɨ enkuui pe enasa ' yau .

text: I am resolved what to do , that , when I am put out of the stewardship , they may receive me into their houses .
text2: Si ' tuyai ' , uyepuru imamin anʉnnin nʉ ' san pika ' tɨ uya mɨrɨ , to ' uya nɨrɨ upika ' tɨto ' pe , tiwʉ ' kon ta ' to ' uya uyereutanʉ ' to ' pe rɨ , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: So he called every one of his lord ' s debtors unto him , and said unto the first , How much owest thou unto my lord ?
text2: “ Mɨrɨpan uya te ' mai ' pʉra tepuru imamin e ' ma ' tɨnin nʉ ' san kɨ ' ma ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uyee ' pʉ tikin pa ' ne . Wapiya iye ' sa ' ekama ' po ' pʉ iya , ‘ Ɨ ' rɨ kaisa rɨ te ' mai ' pʉra uyepuru imamin arɨ ' pʉ auya nai ? ’ ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' .

text: And he said , An hundred measures of oil . And he said unto him , Take thy bill , and sit down quickly , and write fifty .
text2: ‘ 800 kiyaran e ' to ' airɨ are ' kasi ' , ’ ta ' pʉ iya nin si mɨrɨ . “ Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' ta ' pʉ iya , ‘ Se si imenuka ' 400 kaisaron iten karapa , are ' kasi ' tukai ' , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then said he to another , And how much owest thou ? And he said , An hundred measures of wheat . And he said unto him , Take thy bill , and write fourscore .
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo , ite ' ma ' pʉ pe iye ' sa ' ekama ' po ' pʉ iya , ‘ Ɨ ' rɨ kaisa rɨ te ' mai ' pʉra uyepuru imamin arɨ ' pʉ auya nai ? ’ ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' . “ ‘ 1 , 000 kaisa rɨ pʉrowa paikii , ’ ta ' pʉ iya . “ Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' ta ' pʉ iya , ‘ Se si imenuka ' 80 kaisa rɨ pʉrowa paikii tukai ' , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And the lord commended the unjust steward , because he had done wisely : for the children of this world are in their generation wiser than the children of light .
text2: “ Mɨrɨpan etasa ' itepuru uya a ' tai , apurɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ iya , ɨri ku ' sa ' iya rɨ e ' tane , tʉuko ' manto ' e ' ma konekasa ' iya pɨ ' . Serɨ ta uya apʉne pʉra serɨ non pon kon esi emiya ' poke ' ton non eseru wenai uta ' kwarʉkan pɨ ' te ' san , Papa munkɨ uta ' kwarʉka non eseru pɨ ' pʉra rɨ nin iyesi mɨrɨ .

text: And I say unto you , Make to yourselves friends of the mammon of unrighteousness ; that , when ye fail , they may receive you into everlasting habitations .
text2: “ Ta uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , ɨpʉrataai kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨimamin kon ke entu ' manin nan ipika ' tɨtɨ ' tʉtonpa ke ɨwesi kon pa , mɨrɨpan ɨpʉrataai kon u ' ma ' sa ' a ' tai , Papa uya ɨrepato ' kon pe apata kon ke Epʉn po .

text: He that is faithful in that which is least is faithful also in much : and he that is unjust in the least is unjust also in much .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ aiko pe irepasa ' uya wakʉ pe ikupʉ yau , eke ke irepa rɨ mɨrɨ wakʉ pe ikupʉ iya pɨ ' , e ' tane ɨnʉ ' rɨ kʉrɨ tʉrepasa ' ma ' tanʉ ' nin nʉ ' pʉ repa pʉra rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ eke ke .

text: If therefore ye have not been faithful in the unrighteous mammon , who will commit to your trust the true riches ?
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa si serɨ non pon pʉrata mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ mamin ma ' tanʉ ' nin pe ɨwesi yau , Papa uya wakʉ nin si ɨimamin ke Epʉn pon ke ɨrepa pʉra rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ .

text: And if ye have not been faithful in that which is another man ' s , who shall give you that which is your own ?
text2: Ka ' pon imamin ma ' tanʉ ' sa ' auya yau , ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ɨrepa ɨimamin ke kupʉ auya ?

text: No servant can serve two masters : for either he will hate the one , and love the other ; or else he will hold to the one , and despise the other . Ye cannot serve God and mammon .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ iyapiyo ' pe te ' sen esi pʉra iyesi asa ' ron kon tepuru ton apiyo ' pe . Tikin nan ewaruma ' tɨ iya , isakon i ' nʉnka iya ; tikin nan pɨ ' ita ' si , isakon sanoma iya pʉra . Asa ' rɨ rɨ marɨ Papa mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pʉrata apiyo ' pe ɨwesi kon pʉra iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And the Pharisees also , who were covetous , heard all these things : and they derided him .
text2: Serɨ ta Sises uya etasa ' tʉuya ' nokon a ' tai , Pari ' si amʉ ' uya isapema ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra pʉrata i ' nʉnkanin nan pe tesi kon pɨ ' .

text: And he said unto them , Ye are they which justify yourselves before men ; but God knoweth your hearts : for that which is highly esteemed among men is abomination in the sight of God .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon kuru sa ' ne si kamoro ko wakʉ pe te ' ku ' san ka ' pon amʉ ' enu airɨ , e ' tane Papa uya ɨi ' tu kon pʉrata i ' nʉnka auya ' nokon ti ' nʉnka auya ' nokon entai , tukai ' . Ka ' pon uya wakʉ tato ' ipɨ ' pɨ ' , Papa uya ɨri ta .

text: The law and the prophets were until John : since that time the kingdom of God is preached , and every man presseth into it .
text2: “ Main Mosi ' winon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pu ' kena ' amʉ ' Maimu esi ' pʉ meruntɨ pe , Isaan Pa ' tes uyepʉ pʉ ' kʉ pona ; mɨrɨ si ' kɨrɨ Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe ekareei usekamasa ' serɨ , mɨrɨpan pɨkɨrɨ e ' pai tu ' kan kon nɨ uta ' kwarʉkan pɨ ' man .

text: And it is easier for heaven and earth to pass , than one tittle of the law to fail .
text2: Sa ' man pe pʉra rɨ iyesi Epʉn mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ non pʉra iyena aiko pe rɨ na ' ne ' pen nʉwarai ' ka ' pʉ uta ' mo ' ka pen Main apai .

text: Whosoever putteth away his wife , and marrieth another , committeth adultery : and whosoever marrieth her that is put away from her husband committeth adultery .
text2: “ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ tʉno ' pʉ nonkayai ' ne ' mɨrɨpan uya tʉron nɨ uri ' san mari ' ma , ekuma pe iyesi , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' pon inonkasa ' rʉ ' pʉ mari ' mayai ' ne ' , ekuma pe iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: There was a certain rich man , which was clothed in purple and fine linen , and fared sumptuously every day :
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Ka ' pon esi ' pʉ moro imaminke ' , tʉtariren mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wakʉ rɨ ipon renen tato ' , epe ' kena ' ton nɨ . Eke pe rɨ iti ' kiyari esi ' pʉ .

text: And there was a certain beggar named Lazarus , which was laid at his gate , full of sores ,
text2: Moro kanan si entu ' manin esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ , ipon pʉn , itimamin pʉn , iti ' kiyari pʉn , erekʉ ' pan , Ʉrasaras itese ' . Mɨrɨpan nin si tase to ' uya inɨnpɨtʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ , imaminkena ' mʉra ' ta nau .

text: And desiring to be fed with the crumbs which fell from the rich man ' s table : moreover the dogs came and licked his sores .
text2: Enta ' napai iyesi ' pʉ ipʉrataaikena ' ka ' pon i ' kiyari punu ' pɨ pɨ ' . Pero amʉ ' uye ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ iterekʉʉi ami ' kai ' .

text: And it came to pass , that the beggar died , and was carried by the angels into Abraham ' s bosom : the rich man also died , and was buried ;
text2: Mɨrɨ koro ' tau , iyeri ' kaa ' pʉ . Mɨrɨpan nin si arɨ ' pʉ inserʉ amʉ ' uya , Papa apurɨnin nan eri ' sa ' utɨse ' ya ' . Mɨrɨ yau nin si , Ʉrasaras uya Epʉra ' an tʉtɨpiya eporo ' pʉ mɨrɨ pena ima ' tasa ' rʉ ' pʉ . Imaminkena ' rɨ nɨrɨ eri ' kaa ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan ekepu u ' na ' tɨ ' pʉ to ' uya ,

text: And in hell he lift up his eyes , being in torments , and seeth Abraham afar off , and Lazarus in his bosom .
text2: mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ apo ' ya ' , ɨsɨ pata ya ' . Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ si tenu tʉrʉ ' pʉ iya mɨrɨ . Mɨrɨpan uya Epʉra ' an piyau Ʉrasaras ene ' pʉ ɨnnɨ kuru tʉpiyapai .

text: And he cried and said , Father Abraham , have mercy on me , and send Lazarus , that he may dip the tip of his finger in water , and cool my tongue ; for I am tormented in this flame .
text2: ‘ Papai , Epʉra ' an , upɨ ' ɨsentu ' makɨ ! Ʉrasaras enno ' kɨ tuna ka ' temiyatʉ tʉki ' se uyesen amankai ' iye ' to ' pe . Ɨsɨ yau e ' ai ' a ' ne ' yau , ’ ta ' pʉ iya nin si mɨrɨ .

text: But Abraham said , Son , remember that thou in thy lifetime receivedst thy good things , and likewise Lazarus evil things : but now he is comforted , and thou art tormented .
text2: “ ‘ Mooi , mi ' tuyan pe ' nurɨne ɨwesi a ' tai , pori ' pe rɨ ɨuko ' mamʉ ' pʉ , Ʉrasaras kanan ɨri rɨ moronka pɨ ' . Mɨrɨpan e ' tane nin si , serɨ yau wakʉ pe rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ , ɨmɨrɨ kanan si ɨsɨ yau .

text: And beside all this , between us and you there is a great gulf fixed : so that they which would pass from hence to you cannot ; neither can they pass to us , that would come from thence .
text2: Mɨrɨ pona ɨpiya ' utɨn poken pʉra e ' nɨ serɨ awonsi ' kɨ , yaranta uya uwa ' kʉ ' sa ' kon , uya ' sanau ' nokon iyesi . Ɨnʉ ' rɨ utɨ poken pʉra miyarɨ . Mɨrɨ apai nɨrɨ serɨ ya ' ɨnʉ ' rɨ uyepʉ poken pʉra , ’ ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' .

text: Then he said , I pray thee therefore , father , that thou wouldest send him to my father ' s house :
text2: “ Mɨrɨ pɨ ' ita ' kwarʉka ' pʉ ipan pe , ‘ Warai yau ken si , Ʉrasaras enno ' kɨ ukʉipʉnʉ iwʉ ' ta '

text: For I have five brethren ; that he may testify unto them , lest they also come into this place of torment .
text2: 5 kaisaron kon uyakon non panamase ' na , serɨ ya ' to ' uyepʉ namai ' . Wakʉ pe to ' uko ' manto ' pe , Papa Maimu awɨrɨ , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Abraham saith unto him , They have Moses and the prophets ; let them hear them .
text2: “ Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' Epʉra ' an uya ta ' pʉ , ‘ Moro rɨ Mosi ' maimu rʉ ' pʉ esi mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pu ' kena ' amʉ ' maimu rʉ ' pʉ esi mɨrɨ , tɨwɨ to ' netai , iyawɨrɨ te ' to ' kon pe , ’ ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' .

text: And he said , Nay , father Abraham : but if one went unto them from the dead , they will repent .
text2: “ ‘ Kane , Papai Epʉra ' an , mɨrɨ apurɨ to ' uya pʉra rɨ iyesi , serɨ awon kuru nin tɨ , ima ' tasa ' rʉ ' pʉ e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' uya tauro ' ka kon a ' tai , to ' uya kuru rɨ nin apurɨ mɨrɨ tʉmakooi kon apai rɨ nin si to ' era ' tɨ , ’ ta ' pʉ iya nin si mɨrɨ .

text: And he said unto him , If they hear not Moses and the prophets , neither will they be persuaded , though one rose from the dead .
text2: “ Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' Epʉra ' an uya ta ' pʉ , ‘ Mosi ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pu ' kena ' amʉ ' auro ' ka ' pʉ Papa uya , to ' uya imenukato ' pe , mɨrɨ awɨrɨ pʉra to ' esi a ' tai , uruwai ' awon nɨ e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' e ' tane to ' uya nɨrɨ imaimu etato ' oton pen nɨ , ’ ta ' pʉ iya nin si mɨrɨ ipɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya to ' pɨ ' .

text: Then said he unto the disciples , It is impossible but that offences will come : but woe unto him , through whom they come !
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' , “ Makoi ya ' ka ' pon uta ' mo ' kato ' rɨ e ' ku ' to ' pe iyesi , e ' tane nin si ɨsɨ yau kʉrɨ man tɨ iye ' kupʉ emapu ' tɨnin nʉ ' pʉ .

text: It were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he cast into the sea , than that he should offend one of these little ones .
text2: Wakʉ iwa pe rɨ iyesi eno ' ma a ' tai parau ka ' tɨ ' a ' nai ' e ' pato ' yai tewa ' tɨi ' i ' mʉ pɨ ' pʉsamoro aiko ton nʉ ' kwɨ tonpa e ' makoima emapu ' tɨ iya entai .

text: Take heed to yourselves : If thy brother trespass against thee , rebuke him ; and if he repent , forgive him .
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai , ti ' tui ' e ' tɨ ' . “ Ɨtonpa e ' makoimasa ' a ' tai , auro ' kakɨ mɨrɨ enta ' ikupʉ iya namai ' ; tʉmakooi apai iyera ' tɨsa ' a ' tai , ipɨ ' ɨsentu ' makɨ .

text: And if he trespass against thee seven times in a day , and seven times in a day turn again to thee , saying , I repent ; thou shalt forgive him .
text2: Tikin nan wʉi yau inke rɨ ɨpɨ ' iye ' makoimapɨtʉ a ' tai , mɨrɨpan enna ' popɨtʉ ɨpiya ' a ' tai , ‘ Umakooi apai era ' tɨsa ' man , ’ tase ' na ipɨ ' ɨsentu ' makɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And the apostles said unto the Lord , Increase our faith .
text2: Itekare ekamanin nan pe enno ' sa ' kon uya ta ' pʉ , “ Ina Epuru , ina uya apurɨto ' iku ' kɨ eke pe , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And the Lord said , If ye had faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye might say unto this sycamine tree , Be thou plucked up by the root , and be thou planted in the sea ; and it should obey you .
text2: To ' eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Apurɨto ' auya ' nokon esi yau , aiko rʉ ' kwɨ mosta ' ena ' pɨ kasa , ta auya ' nokon nɨ mɨrɨ yʉi , morʉperi tato ' ye ' pɨ ' , ‘ Ekuru ' ka ' , parau ka ' ɨye ' pɨmɨ pa , ’ ta auya a ' tai , amaimu awɨrɨ rɨ iyesi .

text: But which of you , having a servant plowing or feeding cattle , will say unto him by and by , when he is come from the field , Go and sit down to meat ?
text2: “ Iya ' tai pʉra , tʉpoitorʉ ke ɨtonpa e ' sa ' yau non anɨnin mɨrɨ pe pʉra karimeru amʉ ' pa ' simanin . Iyenna ' posa ' a ' tai umɨ apai , ‘ Ɨsi ' kɨ ereutakɨ enta ' nai ' , ’ tawon pe ' ɨmɨrɨ ? Kane .

text: And will not rather say unto him , Make ready wherewith I may sup , and gird thyself , and serve me , till I have eaten and drunken ; and afterward thou shalt eat and drink ?
text2: Ta auya ipɨ ' , ‘ Ui ' kiyari ikoneka ' unta ' napa pa , mɨrɨ tʉpo rɨ nin si , ɨyenta ' na parɨ , ’ tawon ɨmɨrɨ .

text: Doth he thank that servant because he did the things that were commanded him ? I trow not .
text2: Tenki tato ' auya pʉra rɨ iyesi ɨpoitorʉ pɨ ' amaimu awɨrɨ iye ' sa ' pɨ ' .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall have done all those things which are commanded you , say , We are unprofitable servants : we have done that which was our duty to do .
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon kanan mɨrɨ kasa rɨ ɨwe ' to ' oton kon mɨrɨ Papa uya ɨnkupʉnʉ kon ke ɨrepasa ' kon i ' ma ' kasa ' auya ' nokon yau , ta auya ' nokon nin si mɨrɨ , ‘ Sepa ' nan nʉ ' kwɨ rɨ nin sa ' ne ina , ina uya tʉtʉrawasooi kon i ' ma ' kasa ' man , ’ ta auya ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And it came to pass , as he went to Jerusalem , that he passed through the midst of Samaria and Galilee .
text2: Sises utɨ koro ' tau Surusiran pona , Sameriya mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Kiyarari a ' sanawɨrɨ ,

text: And as he entered into a certain village , there met him ten men that were lepers , which stood afar off :
text2: eke iwa pata eporo iya koro ' tau , 10 kaisaron kon erekʉ ' pa ' nan uya eporo ' pʉ . Ɨnnɨ Sises piyapai to ' e ' soto ' ka ' pʉ ,

text: And they lifted up their voices , and said , Jesus , Master , have mercy on us .
text2: mɨrɨpan kon ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ , “ Sises , ina epuru , ina pɨ ' ɨsentu ' ma ' ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And when he saw them , he said unto them , Go shew yourselves unto the priests . And it came to pass , that , as they went , they were cleansed .
text2: To ' ensa ' iya a ' tai , ta ' pʉ iya , “ Entantɨ ' , ɨsekamatantɨ ' use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan piya ' ɨusepi ' tɨsa ' kon nɨ man tato ' pe to ' uya , ” ta ' pʉ iya . To ' utɨ koro ' tau , to ' usepi ' tɨ ' pʉ .

text: And one of them , when he saw that he was healed , turned back , and with a loud voice glorified God ,
text2: Tikin nan nin si enna ' po ' pʉ Sises piya ' tʉusepi ' tɨsa ' tense , ipan pe kuru rɨ Papa apurɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ iya .

text: And fell down on his face at his feet , giving him thanks : and he was a Samaritan .
text2: Sises pʉta piya ' ita ' mo ' ka ' pʉ tenki ta tʉuya ekamanin pe , pʉse rɨ esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ Sameriya pon pe .

text: And Jesus answering said , Were there not ten cleansed ? but where are the nine ?
text2: Sises uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ 10 kaisaron kon pen pe ' ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon nʉsepi ' tɨi ? Nai kamo ken si ɨtonpa ton ?

text: There are not found that returned to give glory to God , save this stranger .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' Esuwerʉ amʉ ' enna ' po tane pʉra rɨ ɨmɨrɨ rɨken Esuwerʉ pen nɨ nin enna ' posa ' Papa apurɨpɨ ' se ' na ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said unto him , Arise , go thy way : thy faith hath made thee whole .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' , “ E ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' , enta . Papa apurɨ auya uya rɨ ɨyepi ' tɨsa ' man , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya ipɨ ' .

text: And when he was demanded of the Pharisees , when the kingdom of God should come , he answered them and said , The kingdom of God cometh not with observation :
text2: Tʉron nɨ a ' tai kanan , Pari ' si amʉ ' uya Sises ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ a ' tai Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe uyepʉ ? ” tukai ' . Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Enton pʉra rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ Papa ena a ' tai esa ' wannɨ pe ,

text: Neither shall they say , Lo here ! or , lo there ! for , behold , the kingdom of God is within you .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ , ‘ Serɨ ne ' ko , ’ mɨrɨ pe pʉra , ‘ Mɨrɨ ne ' ko , ’ ta pʉra rɨ iyesi , apʉne pʉra , Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe esi ɨyewan kon yau rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said unto the disciples , The days will come , when ye shall desire to see one of the days of the Son of man , and ye shall not see it .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' , “ Iweyu uye ' nɨ pɨ ' man Ka ' pon , Papa winon ɨnenpai ɨwe ' to ' oton kon , e ' tane ento ' auya ' nokon oton pen nɨ .

text: And they shall say to you , See here ; or , see there : go not after them , nor follow them .
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' uya tato ' oton , ‘ Mɨ airɨ man , ’ mɨrɨ pe pʉra , ‘ Se airɨ man , ’ e ' tane ta to ' uya pɨkɨrɨ rɨ kɨtɨpɨ ' tʉu .

text: For as the lightning , that lighteneth out of the one part under heaven , shineth unto the other part under heaven ; so shall also the Son of man be in his day .
text2: Ka ' pon , Papa winon weyu e ' seposa ' a ' tai , kamiri ' e ' wei ' tɨ uya ka ' a ' kwaka ipʉ ' kʉ pona ' ne kasa kuru iyesi mɨrɨ .

text: But first must he suffer many things , and be rejected of this generation .
text2: E ' tane wapiya tanporon nɨ e ' ne ' moronkato ' iya esi , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ serɨ a ' taino kon uya ewaruma ' tɨto ' pe rɨ iyesi .

text: And as it was in the days of Noe , so shall it be also in the days of the Son of man .
text2: “ Nowa a ' tai iyesi ' pʉ na ' ne ' kasa kuru , mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ iye ' to ' oton Ka ' pon , Papa winon weyu a ' tai .

text: They did eat , they drank , they married wives , they were given in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark , and the flood came , and destroyed them all .
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' esi ' pʉ uta ' re ' tɨn pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ emari ' man pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ e ' tʉrʉn pɨ ' emari ' man nɨto ' yau Nowa ewomʉ a ' ya ' weyu pona rɨ . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , eke pe i ' mʉnpʉ uyee ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya tanporo to ' ma ' tanʉkʉ ' pʉ .

text: Likewise also as it was in the days of Lot ; they did eat , they drank , they bought , they sold , they planted , they builded ;
text2: “ Iyepʉ rawɨrɨ Ra ' a ' tai iyesi ' pʉ kasa rɨ marɨ iye ' to ' oton . Ka ' pon amʉ ' esi ' pʉ uta ' re ' tɨn pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kʉrʉpo ' po pɨ ' , e ' pɨn nɨ pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨutɨ amɨpɨtʉ pɨ ' .

text: But the same day that Lot went out of Sodom it rained fire and brimstone from heaven , and destroyed them all .
text2: E ' tane Ra ' uya Satan nɨmɨ ' pʉ tʉpo , apo ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ sorʉ ' pa uyee ' pʉ Epʉn poi mɨrɨ to ' ma ' tanʉ ' se ' na .

text: Even thus shall it be in the day when the Son of man is revealed .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ kasa kuru iye ' to ' oton Ka ' pon , Papa winon usenpoika weyu a ' tai .

text: In that day , he which shall be upon the housetop , and his stuff in the house , let him not come down to take it away : and he that is in the field , let him likewise not return back .
text2: Mɨrɨ wʉi a ' tai , ɨnʉ ' rɨ tiwʉ ' nakapu po na ' ne ' kʉu ' tɨnin tiwʉ ' tawon timamin kan . Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ kanan , ɨnʉ ' rɨ tʉmainarʉ yau na ' ne ' nɨrɨ kʉsenna ' ponin pata pona ɨ ' rɨ kan nɨ .

text: Remember Lot ' s wife .
text2: Ra ' no ' pʉ esi ' pʉ na ' ne ' kuru nesii ɨyenu kon yau , timamin pɨ ' iyera ' tɨpɨ ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ .

text: Whosoever shall seek to save his life shall lose it ; and whosoever shall lose his life shall preserve it .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ tʉuko ' manto ' ɨnko ' manʉ ' paino uya inonkato ' oton , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨnʉ ' rɨ tʉuko ' manto ' nonkanin uya ikoneka mɨrɨ .

text: I tell you , in that night there shall be two men in one bed ; the one shall be taken , and the other shall be left .
text2: Ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon : Mɨrɨ ewarupɨɨi tau , asa ' ron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' e ' to ' oton te ' nʉnto ' kon apon po ; tikin nɨ anʉnto ' oton , isakon e ' nɨnto ' oton .

text: Two women shall be grinding together ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Asa ' ron kon uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' e ' to ' oton a ' nai ' e ' pa pɨ ' ; tikin nɨ anʉnto ' oton , isakon e ' nɨnto ' oton .

text: Two men shall be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: ( Asa ' ron kon kanan ka ' pon amʉ ' e ' to ' oton tʉmainarʉ kon yau . Tikin nɨ anʉnto ' oton , isakon e ' nɨnto ' oton , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya . )

text: And they answered and said unto him , Where , Lord ? And he said unto them , Wheresoever the body is , thither will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: “ Nai airɨ , Itepuru ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . To ' eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Eke ' airɨ rɨ anwana amʉ ' amʉrato ' oton , ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: And he spake a parable unto them to this end , that men ought always to pray , and not to faint ;
text2: Sises uya nin si panton ekama ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton enupanin pe tɨwɨrɨ rɨ tʉwɨpʉremasan pe to ' e ' to ' pe tʉuseta ' kai ' pʉra rɨ .

text: Saying , There was in a city a judge , which feared not God , neither regarded man :
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Moro eseru aimenkanin esi ' pʉ pata yau , Papa Maimu apurɨnin pen nɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' tʉusentu ' masen pen nɨ .

text: And there was a widow in that city ; and she came unto him , saying , Avenge me of mine adversary .
text2: Mɨrɨ yau , itaan ' pʉ ima ' tasa ' rʉ ' pʉ esi ' pʉ tɨwɨrɨ rɨ ata ' kwarʉkai ' tʉuye ' pɨ ' sen ipiya ' , ‘ Upika ' tɨkɨ uma ' tanʉkʉ i ' se na ' ne ' uyeyaton enapai , ’ tapɨ ' se ' na .

text: And he would not for a while : but afterward he said within himself , Though I fear not God , nor regard man ;
text2: “ Inke rɨ ipika ' tɨ iya pʉra iyesi ' pʉ , e ' tane nin si isenuminka ' pʉ mɨrɨ , ‘ Apʉne pʉra tɨwɨrɨ rɨ itaan ' pʉ ima ' tasa ' rʉ ' pʉ uye ' pɨtʉ pɨ ' uyewana ' tɨse ' na , mɨrɨ enta ' nin si uyewana ' tɨ iya pen mɨrɨ . Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , ipika ' tɨkapʉ uya serɨ i ' se iye ' to ' ke , Papa namanin pe pʉra rɨ e ' tane , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' tʉusentu ' masen pe pʉra rɨ e ' tane , ’ ta ' pʉ iya , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And the Lord said , Hear what the unjust judge saith .
text2: Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Ɨsenupatɨ ' ɨri , eseru aimenkanin pɨ ' .

text: And shall not God avenge his own elect , which cry day and night unto him , though he bear long with them ?
text2: Mɨrɨ ku ' sa ' iya pɨ ' itaan ' pʉ ima ' tasa ' rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' , Papa nin si wakʉ eseru aimenkanin kamo ka ' pon amʉ ' tʉnanʉmʉ ' san iwano ' pe , tɨwɨrɨ rɨ tʉpika ' tɨto ' kon ekama ' ponin nan . Tɨnɨn pɨ ' iyesi pen nin kʉrɨ eseru aimenkanin kasa .

text: I tell you that he will avenge them speedily . Nevertheless when the Son of man cometh , shall he find faith on the earth ?
text2: Ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , Papa uya inke pʉra rɨ nin wakʉ kupʉ to ' iwano ' pe . E ' tane , Ka ' pon , Papa winon uyepʉ a ' tai ken pe ' si , ka ' pon amʉ ' rɨ pe ' eporo iya tapurɨ pɨ ' , ɨpʉreman pɨ ' serɨ non po ? ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And he spake this parable unto certain which trusted in themselves that they were righteous , and despised others :
text2: Sises uya panton ekama ' pʉ wakʉ pe Papa enu yau tesi kon pe ekamanin nan pɨ ' , tʉron kon eno ' mai ' ma ɨri pe , se tawon ,

text: Two men went up into the temple to pray ; the one a Pharisee , and the other a publican .
text2: “ Ɨpʉremai ' asa ' ron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' utɨ ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' ta ' , tikin nan esi ' pʉ Pari ' si pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ isakon esi ' pʉ pʉrata amʉranʉ ' nin pe .

text: The Pharisee stood and prayed thus with himself , God , I thank thee , that I am not as other men are , extortioners , unjust , adulterers , or even as this publican .
text2: Pari ' si e ' soto ' ka ' pʉ tʉpɨ ' rɨ asauro ' se tʉwɨpʉrema itese ' , ‘ Papa , tenki ta uya serɨ ɨpɨ ' tanporon kon entai rɨ wakʉ pe esi pɨ ' . Tʉron kon man ɨri ton nɨ , makoi ku ' nin nan nɨ , e ' tane urɨ esi mentaino pe pʉra , kasi ye ' pe pʉra , tekumasen pe pʉra , kʉrɨ rɨ pʉrata amʉranʉ ' nin kasa pʉra rɨ esi .

text: I fast twice in the week , I give tithes of all that I possess .
text2: Tʉuserumasen urɨ tenta ' nai ' pʉra asa ' rɨ wʉi suntaaka a ' sanau ' ne , mɨrɨpan ɨrepato ' tʉnin urɨ tasa ' auya awɨrɨ uneporo ' pʉ apai , ’ tukai ' iyɨpʉrema ' pʉ .

text: And the publican , standing afar off , would not lift up so much as his eyes unto heaven , but smote upon his breast , saying , God be merciful to me a sinner .
text2: “ E ' tane pʉrata amʉranʉ ' nin e ' soto ' kasa ' esi ' pʉ ɨnnɨ rɨ Pari ' si piyapai , Epʉn winɨkʉi ' tenu tʉrʉ ' pʉ iya pen nɨ , e ' tane tʉpʉropo wɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ iya tʉupokoita tʉmakooi ke tesi pɨ ' ekamanin pe , ‘ Papa , upɨ ' ɨsentu ' makɨ , urɨ sa ' ne tʉmakooikenan , ’ ta ' pʉ iya . ”

text: I tell you , this man went down to his house justified rather than the other : for every one that exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , pʉse rɨ , isakon pen , ekonekasa ' Papa pokon pe enna ' po ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra mɨ pe te ' ku ' sen ena mɨrɨ se pe rɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ se pe rɨ te ' ku ' sen ena mɨrɨ eke pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they brought unto him also infants , that he would touch them : but when his disciples saw it , they rebuked them .
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' uya tʉmunkɨ kon nee ' pʉ Sises uya to ' a ' pɨ ' to ' pe . Ipoitorʉ ton uya serɨ ensa ' a ' tai , to ' sanon ton eseremekʉ ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Suffer little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: E ' tane rɨ , Sises uya mʉre amʉ ' kɨ ' ma ' pʉ tʉpiya ' , “ Tɨwɨ mʉre amʉ ' nʉyepʉi upiya ' ; to ' kʉsereutanʉ ' tʉu , apʉne pʉra Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe kuru esi pʉsamoro waraino ' nan iwano ' pe .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child shall in no wise enter therein .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , ɨnʉ ' rɨ Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe eporo iya pʉra na ' ne ' mʉre kasa te ' se , epa ' kato ' oton pen nɨ ya ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And a certain ruler asked him , saying , Good Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: Tikin nan itepuru uya Sises ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Wakʉ ti ' sa , ɨ ' rɨ kuru ku ' to ' uya esi wakʉ uko ' man nɨto ' tɨwɨrɨ rɨ , epoto ' pe uya ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? none is good , save one , that is , God .
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' wakʉ tukai ' uyesakʉ auya ? ” tukai ' Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ . “ Ɨnʉ ' pʉra rɨ iyesi wakʉ e ' tane Papa rɨken .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Honour thy father and thy mother .
text2: Mosi ' nʉmenuka ' pʉ i ' tu auya : ‘ Iyemari ' masa ' uri ' san kʉsekumankai , ɨnʉ ' rɨ kʉ ' wɨnɨi , ama ' pe kesii , kasi pe ka ' pon pɨ ' kasaurokʉi , ɨkʉipʉnʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ asan nɨrɨ inamakɨ , ’ tawon , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And he said , All these have I kept from my youth up .
text2: “ Mʉre ' esi ' pʉ si ' kɨrɨ rɨ tanporo serɨ ton awɨrɨ rɨ uko ' mansa ' man , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Now when Jesus heard these things , he said unto him , Yet lackest thou one thing : sell all that thou hast , and distribute unto the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , follow me .
text2: Serɨ etasa ' Sises uya a ' tai , ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' , “ Tikin nan nɨken iyawɨrɨ ɨwe ' to ' e ' ku ' sa ' man ; tanporo ɨimamin pe na ' ne ' ikʉrʉpo ' pomakɨ , mɨrɨpan itepe ' pʉ tʉrʉ pa entu ' manin nan ena ' , mɨrɨpan epe ' pʉ pe wakʉ eporo pa Epʉn po . Mɨrɨ ku ' sa ' auya tʉpo , upɨkɨrɨ si ɨsi ' kɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when he heard this , he was very sorrowful : for he was very rich .
text2: Serɨ etasa ' iya a ' tai , ipan pe ika ' nɨ ' pʉra iyena ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra imaminke ' pe kuru iyesi ' pʉ .

text: And when Jesus saw that he was very sorrowful , he said , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Sises uya ene ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ , “ Sa ' man pe kuru rɨ iyesi imaminke ' ton epa ' ka poken pʉra Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe ya ' !

text: For it is easier for a camel to go through a needle ' s eye , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: I ' nai rɨ iyesi , sa ' man pe pʉra rɨ kiyamerʉ epa ' ka akusa enu euta awɨrɨ imaminke ' epa ' ka Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe ya ' entai , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And they that heard it said , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Serɨ etanin nʉ ' san uya nin si ekama ' po ' pʉ mɨrɨ , “ Ɨnʉ ' kuru ken si epika ' tɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he said , The things which are impossible with men are possible with God .
text2: Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ka ' pon pona sa ' man pe na ' ne ' esi sa ' man pe pʉra Papa pona , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya to ' pɨ ' .

text: Then Peter said , Lo , we have left all , and followed thee .
text2: Pi ' ta uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Tanporon nɨ sa ' ne nɨnsa ' ina uya ɨpɨkɨrɨ tʉutɨto ' kon pe ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or parents , or brethren , or wife , or children , for the kingdom of God ' s sake ,
text2: “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , ɨnʉ ' rɨ tʉpata ' se ' mɨrɨ pe pʉra tʉno ' pʉ mɨrɨ pe pʉra takon non mɨrɨ pe pʉra tʉsanon mɨrɨ pe pʉra tʉmunkɨ ton nɨnnin nʉ ' pʉ Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe wenai ,

text: Who shall not receive manifold more in this present time , and in the world to come life everlasting .
text2: uya tu ' ke ite ' kwa rɨ serɨ a ' tai teposen mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ serɨ enta ' te ' ton a ' tai teposen tɨwɨrɨ uko ' man nɨto ' eporo pʉra iyesi ta pen nɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then he took unto him the twelve , and said unto them , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem , and all things that are written by the prophets concerning the Son of man shall be accomplished .
text2: Sises uya 12 kaisaron kon tʉpoitorʉ ton tʉpantakai ' ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Utɨ ' nokon serɨ Surusiran pona . Mɨrɨpan tanporon nɨ pu ' kena ' amʉ ' nʉmenuka ' pʉ Ka ' pon , Papa winon pɨ ' uta ' ku ' tɨto ' oton mɨrɨ yau .

text: For he shall be delivered unto the Gentiles , and shall be mocked , and spitefully entreated , and spitted on :
text2: To ' uya itʉto ' oton Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen ena ' , isapemato ' oton to ' uya , to ' eta ' tapɨ ' to ' oton ipona , to ' uya ari ' po ' pɨ ' to ' oton , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' uya rɨ iwɨto ' oton .

text: And they shall scourge him , and put him to death : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Itosorʉwano wʉi a ' tai , iye ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' oton kanan , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they understood none of these things : and this saying was hid from them , neither knew they the things which were spoken .
text2: E ' tane ipoitorʉ ton uya serɨ to ' ka ' nʉkʉ pʉra rɨ iyesi ' pʉ . Ɨ ' rɨ kuru ta iya e ' kwa pe mɨrɨ pɨ ' isaurokʉ tukai ' .

text: And it came to pass , that as he was come nigh unto Jericho , a certain blind man sat by the way side begging :
text2: Sises uya Iseri ' ko eporo koro ' tau , tenku ' nan esi ' pʉ asanta ka ' ta po eta ' kwanʉn nɨ pɨ ' .

text: And hearing the multitude pass by , he asked what it meant .
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' utɨ eta tʉuya a ' tai , “ Ɨ ' rɨ ne ' ku ' an ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they told him , that Jesus of Nazareth passeth by .
text2: Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' , “ Sises Nasare ' pon utɨ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he cried , saying , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Mɨrɨpan ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ , “ Sises , Tepi ' pa rʉ ' pʉ , upɨ ' ɨsentu ' ma ' ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they which went before rebuked him , that he should hold his peace : but he cried so much the more , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Sises rawɨrɨ tʉutɨsan uya , “ E ' pana e ' kɨ ! Ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' ɨukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉ ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' . Mɨrɨ rɨ e ' tane ikɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉ ' pʉ , “ Upɨ ' ɨsentu ' makɨ ta uya , Kin Tepi ' pa rʉ ' pʉ ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus stood , and commanded him to be brought unto him : and when he was come near , he asked him ,
text2: Sises e ' takʉ ' ka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya , “ Kʉrɨ rɨ ka ' pon ine ' tɨ ' upiya ' , ” ta ' pʉ . Iye ' sa ' a ' tai , Sises uya ekama ' po ' pʉ ,

text: Saying , What wilt thou that I shall do unto thee ? And he said , Lord , that I may receive my sight .
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨ kupʉ uya i ' se me ' an ɨiwano ' pe ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . “ Uyepuru , ennin pe e ' pai e ' ai ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Receive thy sight : thy faith hath saved thee .
text2: Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' , “ Enkɨ si , Papa apurɨ auya uya rɨ ɨyepi ' tɨsa ' man , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya ipɨ ' .

text: And immediately he received his sight , and followed him , glorifying God : and all the people , when they saw it , gave praise unto God .
text2: Mɨrɨ ta iya a ' tai rɨ , ennin pe iyena ' pʉ . Sises a ' kɨrɨ itɨ ' pʉ Papa apurɨpɨtʉi ' ma . Kamo ka ' pon amʉ ' mɨrɨ ennin nʉ ' san uya Papa kanan apurɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ .

text: And Jesus entered and passed through Jericho .
text2: Sises si epa ' kakaa ' pʉ Iseri ' ko pona , mɨrɨpan utɨ esi ' pʉ iyawɨrɨ .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Zacchaeus , which was the chief among the publicans , and he was rich .
text2: Mɨrɨ yau , ka ' pon esi ' pʉ , Sa ' kiyas itese ' . Kʉrɨ rɨ esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ pʉrata amʉranʉ ' nin nan epuru pe , mɨrɨpan esi ' pʉ ipʉrataaikena ' pe .

text: And he sought to see Jesus who he was ; and could not for the press , because he was little of stature .
text2: Sises ɨnenpai iyesi ' pʉ , e ' tane to ' ken nʉ ' kwɨ iyesi ' pʉ tu ' kan kon ka ' pon amʉ ' koro ' tau . To ' ken nʉ ' kwɨ iyesi wenai , ene iya poken pʉra iyesi ' pʉ .

text: And he ran before , and climbed up into a sycomore tree to see him : for he was to pass that way .
text2: Mɨrɨpan nin si eka ' tumʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ to ' rawɨrɨ eke yʉi , si ' kamorʉ itese ' poi ekainʉnse ' na mɨrɨ ponsi ' kɨ ense ' na . Mɨrɨ awɨrɨ rɨ Sises utɨ tukai ' i ' tu tʉuya ke .

text: And when Jesus came to the place , he looked up , and saw him , and said unto him , Zacchaeus , make haste , and come down ; for to day I must abide at thy house .
text2: Sises uya mɨrɨ eposa ' a ' tai , tenu tʉrʉ ' pʉ iya ka ' takʉi ' , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Sa ' kiyas , inke pʉra ɨu ' tɨkɨ . Serɨ pe ɨiwʉ ' ta ' utɨ serɨ aka ' kʉranpai ' , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya ipɨ ' .

text: And he made haste , and came down , and received him joyfully .
text2: Mɨrɨpan u ' tɨ ' pʉ imaimu awɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan uya pori ' pe esii ' ma tiwʉ ' ta ' ereutanʉkʉ ' pʉ .

text: And when they saw it , they all murmured , saying , That he was gone to be guest with a man that is a sinner .
text2: Tanporo ka ' pon amʉ ' serɨ ennin nʉ ' san etarerumʉ ' pʉ , “ Sises utɨsa ' tʉmakooikenan iwʉ ' ta ' ika ' kʉranpase ' na , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And Zacchaeus stood , and said unto the Lord ; Behold , Lord , the half of my goods I give to the poor ; and if I have taken any thing from any man by false accusation , I restore him fourfold .
text2: Sises uya si tiwʉ ' epoka ' sa ' a ' tai , Sa ' kiyas e ' soto ' ka ' pʉ tase ' na ipɨ ' , “ Apʉne enkɨ , Uyepuru , serɨ awonsi ' kɨ a ' sa ' mʉyai uimamin tʉku ' se entu ' manin nan repa uya mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨnʉ ' rɨ rapumasa ' uya pe iyesi yau , inna ' po uya mɨrɨ asakɨrɨ ' ne ite ' kwa , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus said unto him , This day is salvation come to this house , forsomuch as he also is a son of Abraham .
text2: Sises uya nin si ta ' pʉ mɨrɨ ipɨ ' , “ Serɨ ɨutɨ tawon pika ' tɨsa ' Papa uya man serɨ pe , apʉne pʉra apurɨnin pe ɨwesi pɨ ' Epʉra ' an esi ' pʉ kasa .

text: For the Son of man is come to seek and to save that which was lost .
text2: Ka ' pon , Papa winon , uye ' sa ' tʉmakooikenan kon warinpase ' na mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' pika ' tɨse ' na , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And as they heard these things , he added and spake a parable , because he was nigh to Jerusalem , and because they thought that the kingdom of God should immediately appear .
text2: Tʉusaurokʉ etanin nʉ ' san esi koro ' tau , panton ekama pɨ ' rɨ Sises esi ' pʉ , a ' ko pe Surusiran epokapʉ to ' uya rɨ esi ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan ka ' pon amʉ ' usenuminka ' pʉ Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe rɨ na ' kɨ e ' sara ' tɨkapʉ serɨ pe rɨ ko tukai ' .

text: He said therefore , A certain nobleman went into a far country to receive for himself a kingdom , and to return .
text2: Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' panton ekama ' pʉ iya se tawon : “ Ka ' pon eke ton mʉre pe iyentusa ' rʉ ' pʉ utɨ ' pʉ ɨnnon nɨ pata ya ' kin pe tanʉnto ' pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tenna ' poto ' pe .

text: And he called his ten servants , and delivered them ten pounds , and said unto them , Occupy till I come .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya 10 kaisa rɨ tʉpoitorʉ ton kɨ ' ma ' pʉ mɨrɨpan kon repa ' pʉ iya 10 kaisa rɨ maina . ‘ Serɨ pʉrata itʉrawasomatɨ ' enna ' po pʉ ' kʉ pona , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But his citizens hated him , and sent a message after him , saying , We will not have this man to reign over us .
text2: E ' tane moro i ' sero ' kon pen esi ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya tʉtonpa kon amʉ ' ennoko ' pʉ ite ' ma ' pʉ tau . ‘ Pʉse rɨ ka ' pon i ' se pʉra ina man kin , tepuru kon pe , ’ ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And it came to pass , that when he was returned , having received the kingdom , then he commanded these servants to be called unto him , to whom he had given the money , that he might know how much every man had gained by trading .
text2: “ Kin pe iyenaka ' sa ' enna ' po ' pʉ tʉpata ya ' . Mɨrɨpan uya tʉpoitorʉ ton tʉnrepa ' san pʉrata ke kɨ ' ma ' pʉ , ɨ ' rɨ kaisa rɨ to ' uya ipiri ' sa ' tukai ' ɨni ' tupai iyesi ' pʉ .

text: Then came the first , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained ten pounds .
text2: “ Wapiyaro ' uye ' sa ' uya , ‘ Uyepuru , tikin nɨ urepa ' pʉ auya ike piri ' sa ' uya man , 10 kaisa rɨ nin si maina esi , ’ ta ' pʉ .

text: And he said unto him , Well , thou good servant : because thou hast been faithful in a very little , have thou authority over ten cities .
text2: “ ‘ Wakʉ kuru rɨ ku ' sa ' auya man , wakʉ upoitorʉ , ’ ta ' pʉ itepuru uya , ‘ apʉne pʉra aiko rʉ ' kwɨ ɨrepa ' pʉ uya piri ' sa ' auya pɨ ' , 10 kaisaron pata esa ' pe e ' kɨ , ’ ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' .

text: And the second came , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained five pounds .
text2: “ Tʉron nɨ kanan ipoitorʉ uyee ' pʉ tase ' na ipɨ ' , ‘ Uyepuru , tikin nɨ urepa ' pʉ auya ike piri ' sa ' uya man , 5 kaisa rɨ ipona , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said likewise to him , Be thou also over five cities .
text2: “ Itepuru uya ipɨ ' , ‘ Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , 5 kaisaron pata esa ' pe e ' kɨ , ’ ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' .

text: And another came , saying , Lord , behold , here is thy pound , which I have kept laid up in a napkin :
text2: “ Tʉron nɨ rʉ ' pʉ kanan ipoitorʉ uye ' kaa ' pʉ tase ' na ipɨ ' , ‘ Uyepuru , serɨ si ɨiwano ' maina ; iko ' manʉ ' sa ' uya tonanse , pon piya ' pɨ po .

text: For I feared thee , because thou art an austere man : thou takest up that thou layedst not down , and reapest that thou didst not sow .
text2: Ɨpɨ ' enari ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra sa ' man pe rɨ ɨwesi pɨ ' . Anpata ' tɨ ' pʉ pen nɨ mo ' kanin mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨnpɨmɨ ' pʉ pen nɨ anʉnnin , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he saith unto him , Out of thine own mouth will I judge thee , thou wicked servant . Thou knewest that I was an austere man , taking up that I laid not down , and reaping that I did not sow :
text2: “ Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' itepuru uya ta ' pʉ , ‘ Amaimu ke rɨ ɨyeseru aimenka uya mɨrɨ , ɨmɨrɨ ɨri rɨ ipoitorʉ ! I ' tu auya si sa ' man pe esi , unpata ' tɨ ' pʉ pen nɨ mo ' kanin pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ unpɨmɨ ' pʉ pen nɨ anʉnnin pe ?

text: Wherefore then gavest not thou my money into the bank , that at my coming I might have required mine own with usury ?
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ pe ken iyesi pɨ ' upʉrataai tʉtʉse tʉnonkai ' pʉra ɨwesi ' pʉ pʉrata epiri ' to ' iwʉ ' ta ' , uye ' sa ' a ' tai nin si iyepiri ' sa ' simo ' kai ' no ? ’ ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' .

text: And he said unto them that stood by , Take from him the pound , and give it to him that hath ten pounds .
text2: “ Mɨrɨpan uya nin si mɨrɨ yau iye ' soto ' kasa ' kon pɨ ' ta ' pʉ , ‘ Mɨrɨ itenau na ' ne ' maina imo ' katɨ ' itʉrʉ kon pa kʉrɨ 10 kaisaron maina esa ' pe na ' ne ' ena ' , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: ( And they said unto him , Lord , he hath ten pounds . )
text2: “ ‘ Ina epuru , eke pe sa ' ne epoka ' sa ' iya man ko , ’ ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' .

text: For I say unto you , That unto every one which hath shall be given ; and from him that hath not , even that he hath shall be taken away from him .
text2: “ To ' eikʉ ' pʉ iya , ‘ Ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , tanporon kon itesa ' pe te ' san repa mɨrɨ miyarɨ rɨ ipona , e ' tane kʉrɨ ɨ ' rɨ esa ' pen nɨ enapai imo ' ka mɨrɨ itenawon nʉ ' kwɨ rɨ .

text: But those mine enemies , which would not that I should reign over them , bring hither , and slay them before me .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kamoro ui ' se pʉra iye ' sa ' kon nʉ ' san kin pe , uyeyaton non , kota ' ma uya mɨrɨ . To ' ine ' tɨ ' , mɨrɨpan kon tʉ ' ka kon pa uyenu airɨ , ’ ta ' pʉ iya , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he went before , ascending up to Jerusalem .
text2: Mɨrɨ panton ekama iya tʉpo , to ' pokon pe Sises utɨ ' pʉ Surusiran pona .

text: And it came to pass , when he was come nigh to Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount called the mount of Olives , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Pe ' pake mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pe ' tani eporo iya koro ' tau i ' kʉrʉ Are ' Wʉpʉ tato ' airɨ , asa ' rɨ tʉpoitorʉ ton ennoko ' pʉ iya , tai ' ma to ' pɨ ' ,

text: Saying , Go ye into the village over against you ; in the which at your entering ye shall find a colt tied , whereon yet never man sat : loose him , and bring him hither .
text2: “ Entantɨ ' ɨyentau ' nokon na ' ne ' eke iwa pata ya ' . Mɨrɨ yau ɨyepa ' ka kon pe rɨ isa ' ka ' si mʉre ewa ' tɨsa ' eporo auya ' nokon mɨrɨ , ɨnʉ ' rɨ utɨ ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ pen ipo . Teukai ' mʉne ' tʉi ' serɨ ya ' .

text: And if any man ask you , Why do ye loose him ? thus shall ye say unto him , Because the Lord hath need of him .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ɨyekama ' po kon yau , ‘ Ɨ ' rɨto ' pe euka auya ' nokon ? ’ tukai ' , ‘ Itepuru esi i ' se , ’ mʉkatʉi ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they that were sent went their way , and found even as he had said unto them .
text2: Kamoro si enno ' sa ' kon uya eporo ' pʉ mɨrɨ tasa ' iya rʉ ' pʉ awɨrɨ .

text: And as they were loosing the colt , the owners thereof said unto them , Why loose ye the colt ?
text2: To ' uya euka tane , itesanon uya to ' ene ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya , “ Ɨ ' rɨto ' pe euka auya ' nokon ? ” ta ' pʉ .

text: And they said , The Lord hath need of him .
text2: “ Itepuru esi i ' se , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And they brought him to Jesus : and they cast their garments upon the colt , and they set Jesus thereon .
text2: To ' uya ine ' kaa ' pʉ Sises piya ' , tʉpon kon tʉpɨtʉ ' pʉ to ' uya isa ' ka ' si a ' poi pona , mɨrɨpan pona Sises tʉrʉ ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And as he went , they spread their clothes in the way .
text2: Itɨ koro ' tau , ka ' pon amʉ ' uya tʉpon kon ta ' nʉkʉ ' pʉ asanta tawɨrɨ .

text: And when he was come nigh , even now at the descent of the mount of Olives , the whole multitude of the disciples began to rejoice and praise God with a loud voice for all the mighty works that they had seen ;
text2: A ' ko pe si Are ' Wʉpʉ piyapai , tʉutɨsen asanta epokapʉ iya a ' tai , anpisin pe te ' san ipoitorʉ ton e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ Papa apurɨpɨtʉ pɨ ' , tʉukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨ ' se eke pe , pori ' pe tesi kon pɨ ' , apʉne pʉra tanporon nɨ eke Papa tʉrawasooi rɨ ku ' pɨ ' sa ' Sises uya ensa ' tʉuya ' nokon pɨ ' .

text: Saying , Blessed be the King that cometh in the name of the Lord : peace in heaven , and glory in the highest .
text2: “ Pori ' pe kin esi Itepuru ese ' yau nʉye ' ai ' ne ' ! ” “ Tʉusewankamai ' pʉra Epʉn yau nesii , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eke pe iku ' to ' nesii ka ' tau ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And some of the Pharisees from among the multitude said unto him , Master , rebuke thy disciples .
text2: Tʉron kon si Pari ' si amʉ ' anpisin koro ' tau te ' san uya ta ' pʉ Sises pɨ ' , “ Ti ' sa , ɨpoitorʉ ton e ' paka ' to ' pe to ' esereme ' kɨ ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he answered and said unto them , I tell you that , if these should hold their peace , the stones would immediately cry out .
text2: E ' tane Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ To ' e ' paka ' sa ' a ' tai , tɨ ' amʉ ' rɨ nɨrɨ e ' sara ' tɨ mɨrɨ ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨ ' nɨ pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when he was come near , he beheld the city , and wept over it ,
text2: Sises uya si Surusiran enkapʉ esi ' pʉ , Are ' Wʉpʉ ponsi ' kɨ , mɨrɨ pata awonsi ' kɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' wenai ikaramʉ e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ ,

text: Saying , If thou hadst known , even thou , at least in this thy day , the things which belong unto thy peace ! but now they are hid from thine eyes .
text2: “ Serɨ pe rɨ ito ' ka ' nʉ ' sa ' auya ' nokon a ' tai , ɨ ' rɨ uya usewankaman pʉra na ' ne ' kupʉ tukai ' , Papa uya rɨ ɨusewankama kon pʉra rɨ ikupʉ , e ' tane serɨ pe Papa uya ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ auya ' nokon namai ' onansa ' man .
