text: For the days shall come upon thee , that thine enemies shall cast a trench about thee , and compass thee round , and keep thee in on every side ,
text2: Iweyu uye ' nɨ pɨ ' man ɨsɨ rɨ e ' ku ' to ' oton ɨpɨ ' nokon , ɨyeyaton kon amʉ ' uya tɨ ' amʉ ' ka ' to ' oton apata ' se ' kon woi tekainʉnto ' kon ipoi pe ɨwɨse ' na ' nokon . Sen winɨ ' ne rɨ to ' uya awa ' kʉ ' pɨ ' to ' oton kon ayainʉmʉ kon poken pʉra rɨ .

text: And shall lay thee even with the ground , and thy children within thee ; and they shall not leave in thee one stone upon another ; because thou knewest not the time of thy visitation .
text2: To ' uya ama ' tanʉkʉ kon apata ' se ' kon pokon pe rɨ , ipʉra rɨ to ' uya ima ' tanʉ ' to ' oton enpɨ ' ton pʉra rɨ , apʉne pʉra Papa uye ' to ' ɨpika ' tɨi ' nokon to ' ka ' nʉ ' sa ' auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold therein , and them that bought ;
text2: Mɨrɨpan ewomʉ ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' pʉ ' kʉ ta ' , mɨrɨpan e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ kʉrʉpo ' po pɨ ' te ' san enpa ' kapɨtʉ pɨ ' .

text: Saying unto them , It is written , My house is the house of prayer : but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: “ Iye ' menukasa ' , ‘ Uiwʉ ' e ' to ' esi ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' pe , ’ tawon ; e ' tane ‘ ama ' amʉ ' en pe rɨ ’ iku ' sa ' auya ' nokon man ! ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: And he taught daily in the temple . But the chief priests and the scribes and the chief of the people sought to destroy him ,
text2: Wʉi kaisarɨ rɨ , enupan pɨ ' iyesi ' pʉ use ' man nɨto ' , ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' tau . E ' tane Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton , Main pɨ ' enupanin nan , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' koro ' tau te ' san itepuru ton esi ' pʉ ɨnwɨpai ,

text: And could not find what they might do : for all the people were very attentive to hear him .
text2: mɨrɨpan e ' tane ama ' ai iwɨto ' tʉuya ' nokon eporo i ' se to ' e ' tane , to ' uya eporo pʉra iyesi ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra ka ' pon amʉ ' esi ' pʉ ipan pe rɨ imaimu eta pɨ ' .

text: And it came to pass , that on one of those days , as he taught the people in the temple , and preached the gospel , the chief priests and the scribes came upon him with the elders ,
text2: Tʉron nɨ wʉi a ' tai kanan , ka ' pon amʉ ' enupa pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wakʉ itekare ekama pɨ ' Sises esi koro ' tau use ' man nɨto ' , ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' pʉ ' kʉ tau . Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton , Main pɨ ' enupanin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' ,

text: And spake unto him , saying , Tell us , by what authority doest thou these things ? or who is he that gave thee this authority ?
text2: mɨrɨpan kon uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ meruntɨrʉ winɨ serɨ ton kupʉ auya ; ɨnʉ ' uya serɨ meruntɨ ke ɨrepa ' pʉ ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he answered and said unto them , I will also ask you one thing ; and answer me :
text2: Entakanoma ' pʉ iya , “ Ɨyekama ' po uya ' nokon nɨ marɨ . Ekamatɨ ' upɨ ' ,

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ?
text2: Isaan uya pa ' taisiman nɨto ' — Epʉn winon pe pe ' iyesi ' pʉ , ka ' pon winon pe katɨ iyesi ' pʉ ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then believed ye him not ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon usaurokʉ ' pʉ tiwano ' kon pe , “ ‘ Epʉn winon ’ ta pe iyesi yau , ekama ' pon nɨ iya , ‘ Ɨ ' rɨ pe ken iyesi pɨ ' apurɨ auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi ' pʉ ? ’ tukai ' .

text: But and if we say , Of men ; all the people will stone us : for they be persuaded that John was a prophet .
text2: E ' tane , ‘ Ka ' pon amʉ ' winɨ ’ ta pe iyesi yau , ka ' pon amʉ ' uya nin si uwɨnɨ ' nokon mɨrɨ tɨ ' ke , apʉne pʉra Isaan apurɨ to ' uya pu ' kena ' Papa winon tukai ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And they answered , that they could not tell whence it was .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon uya nin si Sises maimu eikʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ , “ Ewai ' nawon , ina uya i ' tu pʉra rɨ man nai winon pe iyesi ' pʉ tukai ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Mɨrɨpan Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Ekamasa ' auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi ke , ekama uya pʉra rɨ kanan iyesi ɨpɨ ' nokon ɨ ' rɨ meruntɨrʉ winɨ serɨ ton kupʉ uya tukai ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then began he to speak to the people this parable ; A certain man planted a vineyard , and let it forth to husbandmen , and went into a far country for a long time .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon pɨ ' panton ekama ' pʉ iya , “ Ka ' pon uya kʉre ' itese ' si ' na ' pe te ' sen kiyari ye ' patama ' pʉ tʉmainarʉ yau , mɨrɨpan tʉrʉ ' pʉ iya umɨ pɨ ' te ' san ena ' . Mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ tʉron nɨ pata ya ' ɨko ' manse ' na inke rɨ .

text: And at the season he sent a servant to the husbandmen , that they should give him of the fruit of the vineyard : but the husbandmen beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Iyakʉ ' pʉsa ' anʉmʉ weyu e ' seposa ' a ' tai nin si , tʉpoitorʉ enno ' kaa ' pʉ iya umɨ tʉrʉ ' pʉ tʉuya itena ' ton piya ' tʉrepato ' pe to ' uya tʉmainarʉ yawon ke , e ' tane si kamoro uya ipanta ' ma ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan ennoko ' pʉ to ' uya itemiyatʉ arʉ pʉra rɨ .

text: And again he sent another servant : and they beat him also , and entreated him shamefully , and sent him away empty .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kanan tʉron nɨ tʉpoitorʉ enno ' kaa ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan kanan panta ' ma ' pʉ to ' uya , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨri pe rɨ to ' uya ikupʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan enna ' po ' pʉ itemiyatʉ arʉ pʉra rɨ marɨ .

text: And again he sent a third : and they wounded him also , and cast him out .
text2: Mɨrɨ rɨ e ' tane , to ' osorʉwano pe tʉron nɨ kanan tʉpoitorʉ enno ' kaa ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan nɨ marɨ panta ' makaa ' pʉ to ' uya ɨsɨ pe kuru rɨ , mɨrɨpan enpa ' ka ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Then said the lord of the vineyard , What shall I do ? I will send my beloved son : it may be they will reverence him when they see him .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ a ' tai kiyari e ' kwa esa ' uya ta ' pʉ , ‘ Ɨ ' rɨ ken si kupʉ uya serɨ ? Uni ' nʉnkanʉ rɨ nin si umu ennoko uya serɨ ; to ' uya nin si inama mɨrɨ , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But when the husbandmen saw him , they reasoned among themselves , saying , This is the heir : come , let us kill him , that the inheritance may be ours .
text2: E ' tane si to ' uya ensa ' a ' tai , ipɨ ' to ' usaurokʉ ' pʉ . ‘ Pʉse rɨ kuru pʉse rɨ inonka ' pʉ anʉnton . Iwɨpai ' nokon , inanʉmʉnʉ kiyari pata ' se ' anʉnto ' kon pe uiwano ' kon pe , ’ ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: So they cast him out of the vineyard , and killed him . What therefore shall the lord of the vineyard do unto them ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan nin si eno ' ma ' pʉ to ' uya kiyari e ' kwa yapai , mɨrɨpan wɨnɨ ' pʉ to ' uya . “ Ɨ ' rɨ ken si kupʉ kiyari e ' kwa esa ' uya mɨrɨ to ' pɨ ' :

text: He shall come and destroy these husbandmen , and shall give the vineyard to others . And when they heard it , they said , God forbid .
text2: Iye ' to ' oton si , kamoro itesa ' pe tʉnnonka ' san tʉ ' kase ' na , mɨrɨpan uya tʉron kon ena ' kiyari e ' kwa nonkato ' oton , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya . Ka ' pon amʉ ' uya serɨ etasa ' a ' tai , “ Serɨ e ' pai pʉra rɨ man ! ” ta ' pʉ .

text: And he beheld them , and said , What is this then that is written , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner ?
text2: Sises uya to ' ene ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon ekama ' po ' pʉ iya , “ Ɨ ' rɨ ken si ta e ' kwa pe iye ' menukasa ' esi : “ ‘ Ɨutɨ amɨnin nan neno ' ma ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ tɨ ' enasa ' itekun airɨ te ' sen tɨ ' pe , ’ tawon ?

text: Whosoever shall fall upon that stone shall be broken ; but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Tanporon kon mɨrɨ tɨ ' pona nʉta ' mo ' kayai ' ne ' nan utakiti ' kwa mɨrɨ , e ' tane ipona tɨ ' nʉta ' mo ' kayai ' ne ' uta ' si ' kɨrɨ mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And the chief priests and the scribes the same hour sought to lay hands on him ; and they feared the people : for they perceived that he had spoken this parable against them .
text2: Main pɨ ' enupanin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton esi ' pʉ inke pʉra a ' sito ' tʉuya ' nokon ipɨkɨrɨ warinpa pɨ ' , apʉne pʉra serɨ panton ekamasa ' iya tʉpɨ ' nokon ta iya e ' kwa pe tukai ' , e ' tane to ' enari ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' .

text: And they watched him , and sent forth spies , which should feign themselves just men , that they might take hold of his words , that so they might deliver him unto the power and authority of the governor .
text2: A ' ko pe ipa ' sima pɨ ' to ' esi ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya wakʉ ton pe itese ' ka ' pon amʉ ' ennoko ' pʉ ama ' ai Sises maimu etase . Mɨrɨ wenai eparankato ' pe tʉuya ' nokon Roman amʉ ' kopʉnaai ena ' a ' sito ' pe iya .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , we know that thou sayest and teachest rightly , neither acceptest thou the person of any , but teachest the way of God truly :
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon uya Sises ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ti ' sa , ina uya i ' tu ausaurokʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ enupan auya ipokenan pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' menkanin pen ɨmɨrɨ , e ' tane Papa eseru pɨ ' enupan auya i ' napairon awɨrɨ .

text: Is it lawful for us to give tribute unto Caesar , or no ?
text2: Ipoken pe ' iyesi Sisa ena ' pʉrata tʉtʉsen e ' ma ina uya a ' tai , kane katɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: But he perceived their craftiness , and said unto them , Why tempt ye me ?
text2: Tenku ' tɨpai to ' esi poro tense to ' pɨ ' ta ' pʉ iya ,

text: Shew me a penny . Whose image and superscription hath it ? They answered and said , Caesar ' s .
text2: “ Apʉne , pʉrata pun enpoikatɨ ' uyena ' . Ɨnʉ ' nai , ɨnʉ ' ese ' nai ipɨ ' ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which be Caesar ' s , and unto God the things which be God ' s .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Sisa , ” tukai ' . Mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Mɨrɨ wenai , itʉtɨ ' ken si Sisa ena ' itiwano ' pe rɨ te ' sen , Papa ena ' kanan itiwano ' pe rɨ nɨrɨ te ' sen tʉrʉi ' ma , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they could not take hold of his words before the people : and they marvelled at his answer , and held their peace .
text2: Mɨrɨ yau , annau isauro ' to ' winɨ to ' uya isa ' mato ' pʉra rɨ iyesi ' pʉ . Mɨrɨpan kon usewansiuka ' pʉ ei ' pɨtʉ iya pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan kon e ' pakaa ' pʉ .

text: Then came to him certain of the Sadducees , which deny that there is any resurrection ; and they asked him ,
text2: Satu ' si amʉ ' tonpa ton eri ' nɨ tʉpo e ' mʉ ' sa ' kan pʉra iyesi tawon nan uyee ' pʉ Sises piya ' ekama ' pose ' na .

text: Saying , Master , Moses wrote unto us , If any man ' s brother die , having a wife , and he die without children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ti ' sa , Mosi ' uya imenukasa ' uiwano ' kon pe , ka ' pon rui eri ' sa ' yau , tʉno ' pʉ tʉnonkai ' imunkɨ pʉra , iyakon nʉ ' pʉ uya tʉrui no ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ mari ' mato ' pe iyesi imu ' tanʉ ' to ' pe tʉuya tʉrui iwano ' pe .

text: There were therefore seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and died without children .
text2: Moro si 7 kaisaron kon ɨsirunan esi ' pʉ . Wapiyaro ' emari ' ma ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan erikʉ ' pʉ imʉre pʉra .

text: And the second took her to wife , and he died childless .
text2: Mɨrɨpan akon nʉ ' pʉ uya ino ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ mari ' ma ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kanan erikʉ ' pʉ .

text: And the third took her ; and in like manner the seven also : and they left no children , and died .
text2: To ' osorʉwano rʉ ' pʉ uya kanan imari ' ma ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kanan erikʉ ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ kasa tanporo 7 pan kon uya imari ' mapɨtʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan 7 pe rɨ to ' erikʉ ' pʉ tʉmunkɨ ke pʉra rɨ .

text: Last of all the woman died also .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon e ' ma ' pʉ pe , to ' no ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ rɨ marɨ eri ' kaa ' pʉ .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them is she ? for seven had her to wife .
text2: Eri ' nɨ tʉpo e ' mʉ ' sa ' kan nɨsa ' a ' tai , ɨnʉ ' kuru no ' pʉ pe ken si iyesi , tanporo 7 kaisaron kon uya imari ' masa ' pɨ ' ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , The children of this world marry , and are given in marriage :
text2: Sises uya to ' entakanoma ' pʉ , “ Serɨ a ' taino kon emari ' ma , mɨrɨpan kon e ' tʉrʉ emari ' man nɨto ' yau .

text: But they which shall be accounted worthy to obtain that world , and the resurrection from the dead , neither marry , nor are given in marriage :
text2: E ' tane nin si tɨ , kamo emenna ' pe uko ' man nɨto ' yau te ' san , wakʉ tato ' kon Papa uya ipɨ ' , terikʉ kon tʉpo iye ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' kon emari ' ma pen nɨ nin , mɨrɨ pe pʉra to ' e ' tʉrʉ pen nɨ nin emari ' man nɨto ' yau ,

text: Neither can they die any more : for they are equal unto the angels ; and are the children of God , being the children of the resurrection .
text2: apʉne pʉra mɨrɨ enta ' to ' erikʉ pen , inserʉ amʉ ' kasa rɨ nin si to ' esi . Papa munkɨ pe to ' esi , eri ' nɨ tʉpo e ' mʉ ' sa ' kan nɨsa ' munkɨ pe to ' esi pɨ ' .

text: Now that the dead are raised , even Moses shewed at the bush , when he calleth the Lord the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob .
text2: E ' tane yu ' epo ' tɨ ekareei yau , Mosi ' uya rɨ enpoikasa ' iyeri ' sa ' kon e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka , apʉne pʉra Itepuru esakʉ iya , ‘ Papa , Epʉra ' an e ' to ' itese ' pɨ ' , Aisi ' e ' to ' itese ' pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Seko ' e ' to ' itese ' pɨ ' tukai ' , ’ ta ' pʉ .

text: For he is not a God of the dead , but of the living : for all live unto him .
text2: Papa , iyeri ' sa ' kon e ' to ' itese ' pɨ ' pen , e ' tane nurɨnan kon , apʉne pʉra tanporo ipona nurɨne to ' esi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then certain of the scribes answering said , Master , thou hast well said .
text2: Tʉron kon Main pɨ ' enupanin nan uya ta ' pʉ Sises pɨ ' , “ Ti ' sa , wakʉ pe kuru ei ' sa ' auya man , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And after that they durst not ask him any question at all .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨnʉ ' rɨ esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ enta ' ɨnekama ' popɨ ' pai pʉra .

text: And he said unto them , How say they that Christ is David ' s son ?
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' to ' uya Kʉrai esi Tepi ' pa rʉ ' pʉ pe ta ?

text: And David himself saith in the book of Psalms , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Tepi ' uya rɨ ekamasa ' Eren apon yau : “ ‘ Itepuru uya ta ' pʉ uyepuru pɨ ' : “ Ereutakɨ uyenwo ' netʉ winɨ ,

text: Till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: ɨyeyaton non ku ' tane uya a ' ta apon pe , ” ’ tasa ' .

text: David therefore calleth him Lord , how is he then his son ?
text2: Tepi ' uya esakʉ ‘ uyepuru ’ tukai ' ; nai kasa ken si Tepi ' pa rʉ ' pʉ pe iyesi ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then in the audience of all the people he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya ta ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' tanporon kon uya rɨ eta tane ,

text: Beware of the scribes , which desire to walk in long robes , and love greetings in the markets , and the highest seats in the synagogues , and the chief rooms at feasts ;
text2: “ Ti ' tui ' e ' tɨ ' Main pɨ ' enupanin nan pɨ ' . Ɨpininpaino kon kusan tʉpon kon yau mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ , ‘ Miyarɨ , ’ ta i ' sero ' kon tʉpɨ ' nokon kʉrʉpo ' po pɨ ' e ' nɨ pata ' se ' yau , eke ton apon po te ' san Esuwerʉ amʉ ' usenupato ' iwʉ ' tau mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉnamasan pata ' se ' yau kuru te ' san enta ' nan a ' tai ' ne .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a shew make long prayers : the same shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Itaan ' pʉ ima ' tasa ' kon nʉ ' san iwʉ ' ma ' tanʉkʉ to ' uya , mɨrɨpan kon ɨpʉrema kusan pe rɨ wakʉ ton tato ' pe tʉpɨ ' nokon . Ipan pe rɨ mɨrɨ waraino kon ekota ' mato ' oton , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And he looked up , and saw the rich men casting their gifts into the treasury .
text2: Sises uya tenu tʉsa ' koro ' tau , ipʉrataaike ' ton uya pʉrata tʉrʉ ene ' pʉ iya Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' pʉrataai yen ya ' .

text: And he saw also a certain poor widow casting in thither two mites .
text2: Entu ' manin nʉ ' kwɨ kanan itaan ' pʉ ima ' tasa ' rʉ ' pʉ uya asa ' ron nʉ ' kwɨ aiko ton pʉrata , ka ' pa pun tʉrʉ ene ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said , Of a truth I say unto you , that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all :
text2: “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; pʉse rɨ entu ' manin nʉ ' kwɨ itaan ' pʉ ima ' tasa ' rʉ ' pʉ uya itʉsa ' eke pe tanporon kon nʉtʉrʉ ' pʉ entai rɨ .

text: For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God : but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had .
text2: Tanporo pʉsamoro uya itʉsa ' eke rɨ nin tʉpʉrataai kon tonpa ; e ' tane kʉrɨ rɨ tekota ' mato ' apai rʉ ' kwɨ rɨ tanporo rɨ tʉpiyawon tʉrʉ ' pʉ tʉuko ' manto ' ipɨ ' rʉ ' kwɨ rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And as some spake of the temple , how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts , he said ,
text2: Sises poitorʉ tonpa ton usaurokʉ ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' pɨ ' wakʉ pe rɨ isene pɨ ' tɨ ' ke itamɨsa ' , Papa ena ' use ' man nɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ ike ton nɨ usene wakʉ pe . E ' tane Sises uya ta ' pʉ ,

text: As for these things which ye behold , the days will come , in the which there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: “ Serɨ yau menyatʉi ' ne ' pɨ ' nin si ta uya , iweyu e ' seporo mɨrɨ mɨ pe rɨ tikin nɨ tɨ ' e ' nonkato ' oton pen nɨ ɨsipʉro ' po , tanporon nɨ uta ' po ' to ' oton , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , but when shall these things be ? and what sign will there be when these things shall come to pass ?
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , to ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ti ' sa , ɨ ' rɨ a ' tai serɨ ton e ' ku ' to ' oton ? Ɨ ' rɨ kuru ken si esi ento ' ipɨ ' pe e ' ku ' ka ' nɨ pɨ ' iyesi ekamanin pe ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he said , Take heed that ye be not deceived : for many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and the time draweth near : go ye not therefore after them .
text2: To ' eikʉ ' pʉ iya : “ Tenu ke e ' tɨ ' ɨyenku ' tɨ kon namai ' . Apʉne pʉra tu ' kan kon nɨ uye ' to ' oton uyese ' yau , ‘ Urɨ rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ , ’ ka ' se ' na , mɨrɨpan , ‘ Iweyu man a ' ko pe , ’ ta to ' uya . To ' pɨkɨrɨ ke ' tʉu .

text: But when ye shall hear of wars and commotions , be not terrified : for these things must first come to pass ; but the end is not by and by .
text2: Usewa ' noman mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tepuru kon ɨneno ' mapaino kon eta auya ' nokon a ' tai , kenari ' nʉntʉu . Serɨ ton nɨ e ' kupʉ mɨrɨ wapiya , e ' tane inke pʉra pata weyu u ' matʉ uyepʉ pen nɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then said he unto them , Nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom :
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ Tʉpataron kon uya tʉpataron kon nɨ nɨrɨ ewa ' nomato ' oton , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ esa ' wannɨ pe te ' san uya esa ' wannɨ pe te ' san nɨ nɨrɨ ewa ' nomato ' oton .

text: And great earthquakes shall be in divers places , and famines , and pestilences ; and fearful sights and great signs shall there be from heaven .
text2: Eke pe kuru rɨ tʉrʉ ' pʉnʉ amʉ ' iwankan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ paran amʉ ' e ' to ' oton pata ton yau ' ne ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ nari ' panin nɨ e ' ku ' to ' oton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eke rɨ ento ' ipɨ ' ton Epʉn apai e ' to ' oton .

text: But before all these , they shall lay their hands on you , and persecute you , delivering you up to the synagogues , and into prisons , being brought before kings and rulers for my name ' s sake .
text2: “ E ' tane serɨ rawɨrɨ , to ' uya aya ' sito ' oton kon , ɨkota ' mato ' oton kon to ' uya . Usenupan nɨto ' iwʉ ' ta ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pariki ' si ta ' , kin amʉ ' , kopʉna amʉ ' rakʉi ' nɨrɨ to ' uya ɨtʉto ' oton kon , tanporo serɨ esi uyese ' uriya ' .

text: And it shall turn to you for a testimony .
text2: Uyekareei ekamato ' auya ' nokon oton to ' pɨ ' serɨ moron nʉ ' pʉ pe .

text: Settle it therefore in your hearts , not to meditate before what ye shall answer :
text2: E ' tane ekonekatɨ ' rɨken pena rɨ ɨusewankama kon namai ' , nai kasa kuru si e ' wapu ' tɨ ta auya ' nokon namai ' .

text: For I will give you a mouth and wisdom , which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist .
text2: Apʉne pʉra amaimu ' tɨto ' uya ' nokon oton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨyemeporʉ ' tɨ uya ' nokon ausauro ' to ' kon ike ke ɨyeyaton kon uya , ‘ Kasi pe ɨwesi , ’ ta namai ' ɨpɨ ' nokon .

text: And ye shall be betrayed both by parents , and brethren , and kinsfolks , and friends ; and some of you shall they cause to be put to death .
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon nɨ eparankato ' oton asanon kon uya rɨ , ɨtonpa kon amʉ ' uya rɨ . To ' uya ɨtonpa kon tʉto ' oton eri ' nɨto ' ya ' .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake .
text2: Tanporon kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uya rɨ ɨyewaruma ' tɨto ' oton kon urɨ uriya ' .

text: But there shall not an hair of your head perish .
text2: To ' uya rɨ ɨwɨsa ' kon e ' tane , aya ' kwarʉ kon nɨ mainanpa uya .

text: In your patience possess ye your souls .
text2: Pana ' pe ɨye ' mʉ ' sa ' ka kon winɨ ɨuko ' manto ' kon eporo auya ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies , then know that the desolation thereof is nigh .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Soisa amʉ ' amʉrasa ' ene auya ' nokon a ' tai Surusiran woi , i ' tu auya ' nokon mɨrɨ to ' uya ima ' tanʉkʉ tukai ' .

text: Then let them which are in Judaea flee to the mountains ; and let them which are in the midst of it depart out ; and let not them that are in the countries enter thereinto .
text2: Tɨwɨ kamoro Isutiya po na ' ne ' nan nainʉmʉi wʉ ' ton pona ' ne ; tɨwɨ kamoro eke pata yawon kon nepa ' kai , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kamoro pata yau na ' ne ' nan kʉsepa ' kanin eke pata pona .

text: For these be the days of vengeance , that all things which are written may be fulfilled .
text2: Serɨ ta uya , apʉne pʉra mɨrɨ si e ' to ' oton , Papa uya Surusiran yawon kon kota ' ma weyu pe , serɨ e ' kupʉ mɨrɨ pu ' kena ' amʉ ' nʉmenuka ' pʉ a ' ku ' tɨ pe .

text: But woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck , in those days ! for there shall be great distress in the land , and wrath upon this people .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai ' ne ɨsɨ pe kuru rɨ uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' mono ' pe te ' san pona iye ' to ' oton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ mana ' pokon kon imunkɨ pona . Ipan pe rɨ usewankaman e ' to ' oton non po , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ekota ' man nɨto ' e ' to ' oton pʉsamoro ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' .

text: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword , and shall be led away captive into all nations : and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles , until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled .
text2: Soisa amʉ ' uya tu ' kan kon nɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' tʉ ' kato ' oton , mɨrɨpan tʉron kon a ' sisa ' kon Esuwerʉ amʉ ' ato ' oton to ' uya pata amʉ ' kaisarɨ rɨ . Ka ' pon amʉ ' , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen uya Surusiran ma ' tanʉ ' to ' oton ipan pe rɨ . To ' uya ikupʉ weyu pe Papa nʉkupʉ ' pʉ u ' matʉ pʉ ' kʉ pona , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And there shall be signs in the sun , and in the moon , and in the stars ; and upon the earth distress of nations , with perplexity ; the sea and the waves roaring ;
text2: “ I ' tuto ' ipɨ ' ton e ' ku ' to ' oton wʉi enu yau , kapʉi yau mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ sirikɨ amʉ ' yau . Non po tʉpataron kon e ' to ' oton ɨsɨ rɨ i ' tu pɨ ' , etʉipɨ ' nɨ pɨ ' parau a ' merumʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyenu ' pɨtʉ pɨ ' .

text: Men ' s hearts failing them for fear , and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth : for the powers of heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' enato ' oton ɨ ' sɨ ' mʉra tetʉipɨtʉ kon ke , tʉuye ' sen non pona i ' tu tʉuya ' nokon pɨ ' , apʉne pʉra ka ' yawon kon nɨ usi ' ki ' mato ' oton pɨ ' .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai si , to ' uya Ka ' pon , Papa winon ento ' oton uyepʉ kapuru ' yau tʉmeruntɨrʉ ke , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eke rɨ a ' kwarʉ pokon pe .

text: And when these things begin to come to pass , then look up , and lift up your heads ; for your redemption draweth nigh .
text2: Serɨ e ' kupʉ e ' sara ' tɨ ene ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon upoitorʉ ton uya a ' tai , mepori ' matʉi ' si , itenupɨkɨrɨ esii ' ma , apʉne pʉra serɨ esi a ' ko pe rɨ Papa uya ɨpika ' tɨto ' kon esi ekamanin pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he spake to them a parable ; Behold the fig tree , and all the trees ;
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' panton ekama ' pʉ iya , “ Apʉne kiyari ye ' ito ' ka ' nʉ ' tɨ ' ; tanporon nɨ sa ' ne yʉi amʉ ' .

text: When they now shoot forth , ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand .
text2: Itare ' kasa ' rʉ ' pʉ atu ' ta a ' tai , tanporon kon uya i ' tu iyepetato ' oton tukai ' .

text: So likewise ye , when ye see these things come to pass , know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ si tɨ , serɨ ɨsɨ ton e ' kupʉ ene auya ' nokon a ' tai , i ' tu auya ' nokon kuru rɨ a ' ko pe rɨ Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe weyu e ' seporo .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass away , till all be fulfilled .
text2: “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , serɨ a ' taino kon kuru rɨ pʉra iyenato ' oton pen nɨ serɨ ton e ' kupʉ pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Tanporon nɨ ka ' po na ' ne ' , non po na ' ne ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ non nɨ nɨrɨ pʉra iyenato ' oton , e ' tane umaimu mɨrɨ tereutaton pen nɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And take heed to yourselves , lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting , and drunkenness , and cares of this life , and so that day come upon you unawares .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' , “ Ti ' tui ' e ' tɨ ' , wakʉ pɨ ' ɨusenuminkato ' kon piyapai ayano ' manin kon pɨ ' . Ke ' taripatʉu , e ' tari ton nʉkupʉnʉ kʉ ' ku ' tʉu , serɨ non pon pɨ ' rɨ aya ' kwarʉ kon kʉsainʉnpatʉu . Mɨrɨ ku ' sa ' auya ' nokon yau , iyekonekasa ' pe pʉra rɨ ɨwesi kon koro ' tau ɨyeporo uya ' nokon mɨrɨ ite ' kwanau pʉra rɨ .

text: For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth .
text2: Ɨpɨ ' nokon iye ' kupʉ pe pʉra kʉsekamatʉu , apʉne pʉra tanporon kon , mɨ yawɨron kon pɨ ' rɨ iye ' ku ' to ' oton mɨrɨ .

text: Watch ye therefore , and pray always , that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass , and to stand before the Son of man .
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai , ti ' tui ' rɨ tenu ke rɨ e ' tɨ ' , ɨpʉrematɨ ' Papa uya ɨpika ' tɨto ' kon pe ɨsɨ ton te ' ku ' sen awɨrɨ wakʉ pe ɨyepa ' ka kon pa . Ɨpʉrematɨ ' rɨ kanan wakʉ pe te ' mʉ ' sa ' kasen pe ɨwesi kon pa Ka ' pon , Papa winon rau , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And in the day time he was teaching in the temple ; and at night he went out , and abode in the mount that is called the mount of Olives .
text2: Wʉi kaisarɨ rɨ , ka ' pon amʉ ' enupa pɨ ' Sises esi ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' pʉ ' kʉ tau . Ko ' mamʉ pe ' ne nin si tɨ , itɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ Are ' Wʉpʉ pona e ' nʉnse ' na .

text: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple , for to hear him .
text2: Awanakʉi ' kuru rɨ kanan , tanporon kon tenupa iya ' nokon etanin nʉ ' san uye ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' pʉ ' kʉ ta ' tenupato ' kon iya etase ' na .

text: Now the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh , which is called the Passover .
text2: A ' ko pe si A ' sarutanʉ ' sa ' Pen Pʉreti Pɨ ' Enta ' nan Weyu , To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ tato ' pɨ ' enta ' nan weyu e ' seporo esi ' pʉ .

text: And the chief priests and scribes sought how they might kill him ; for they feared the people .
text2: Use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Main pɨ ' enupanin nan esi ' pʉ Sises ma ' tanʉ ' to ' tʉuya ' nokon winɨ eporo i ' se , ama ' ai , apʉne pʉra ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' tenari ' nʉmʉ kon pɨ ' .

text: Then entered Satan into Judas surnamed Iscariot , being of the number of the twelve .
text2: Mɨrɨpan a ' tai , Se ' tan ewomʉ ' pʉ Isutas , Eskariya ' tato ' ipɨ ' ya ' , 12 kaisaron kon ipoitorʉ ton tonpa pe te ' sen .

text: And he went his way , and communed with the chief priests and captains , how he might betray him unto them .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai si , Isutas utɨ ' pʉ use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' pa ' simanin nan piya ' . Mɨrɨpan kon a ' kɨrɨ usauro ' nɨ pɨ ' iyesi ' pʉ Sises eparankato ' tʉuya pɨ ' to ' uya a ' sito ' pe .

text: And they were glad , and covenanted to give him money .
text2: To ' epori ' ma ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan pʉrata ke irepa pɨ ' to ' e ' kama ' pʉ .

text: And he promised , and sought opportunity to betray him unto them in the absence of the multitude .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya , “ Ewai ' , ” ta ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan esi ' pʉ Sises tʉto ' tʉuya weyu eporo i ' se , anpisin pe ka ' pon amʉ ' esi a ' tai pʉra .

text: Then came the day of unleavened bread , when the passover must be killed .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai A ' sarutanʉ ' sa ' Pen Pʉreti Pɨ ' Enta ' nan Weyu e ' seporo ' pʉ karimeru mʉre wɨto ' Itepoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ iwano ' pe .

text: And he sent Peter and John , saying , Go and prepare us the passover , that we may eat .
text2: Sises uya Pi ' ta mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Isaan ennoko ' pʉ , tai ' ma to ' pɨ ' , “ Entantɨ ' enta ' nan nɨto ' To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' ikonekatantɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they said unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare ?
text2: “ Nai yau ken si ina uya ikoneka i ' se ɨwesi ite ' ma ta ' ? ” tukai ' to ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ .

text: And he said unto them , Behold , when ye are entered into the city , there shall a man meet you , bearing a pitcher of water ; follow him into the house where he entereth in .
text2: To ' eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Eke pata pona ɨyepa ' kasa ' kon a ' tai , ka ' pon tuna yen anin uya ɨyeporo kon mɨrɨ . Mɨrɨpan pɨkɨrɨ ɨutɨ newonyai ' ne ' ta ' mʉtɨtʉi ' .

text: And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house , The Master saith unto thee , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan ɨutɨ esa ' pɨ ' mɨkatʉi ' , ‘ Ti ' sa man , nai yau tʉpoitorʉ ton pokon pe To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' tenta ' na kon tukai ' ɨni ' tupai . ’

text: And he shall shew you a large upper room furnished : there make ready .
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ ka ' pon uya ka ' tawon eke ɨutɨ ekama mɨrɨ tanporon nɨ e ' to ' itau . Mɨrɨ yau si tanporon nɨ mʉkonekatʉi ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they went , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon utɨ ' pʉ nin si mɨrɨ , to ' uya eporo ' pʉ Sises uya ekama ' pʉ poro rɨ . Mɨrɨpan kon uya si To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' te ' to ' kon koneka ' pʉ .

text: And when the hour was come , he sat down , and the twelve apostles with him .
text2: Iweyu e ' sepoka ' sa ' a ' tai , Sises mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipoitorʉ ton enapɨtʉ ' pʉ tʉteire ' kon po tepʉrʉ piyau .

text: And he said unto them , With desire I have desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer :
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Aya ' kɨrɨ ' nokon kuru rɨ enta ' napai e ' sa ' serɨ To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ i ' kiyari pɨ ' , ukota ' ma to ' uya rawɨrɨ .

text: For I say unto you , I will not any more eat thereof , until it be fulfilled in the kingdom of God .
text2: Ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , enta ' nato ' oton pen ipɨ ' kanan , Papa na ' ne ' esa ' wannɨ pe yau e ' seposa ' a ' tai rɨken kanan enta ' nan , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and said , Take this , and divide it among yourselves :
text2: Sises uya ko ' , waain yen anʉmʉ ' pʉ temiyatʉ ya ' , mɨrɨpan uya tenki ta ' pʉ Papa pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan tʉpo tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' ta ' pʉ , “ Akaisarɨ ' ne ' nokon se waain , ko ' yawon ensitɨ ' .

text: For I say unto you , I will not drink of the fruit of the vine , until the kingdom of God shall come .
text2: Apʉne pʉra ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , iteperu euku ensito ' uya oton pen , Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe uyepʉ pʉ ' kʉ pona , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he took bread , and gave thanks , and brake it , and gave unto them , saying , This is my body which is given for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya pʉreti anʉmʉ ' pʉ , tenki ta ' pʉ iya Papa pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan i ' kwɨ ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan ekamʉ ' pʉ iya to ' ena ' , tai ' ma to ' pɨ ' , “ Serɨ serɨ upun iye ' tʉsa ' ɨiwano ' kon pe ; serɨ iku ' tɨ ' ɨyenu kon yau ukupʉ auya ' nokon ekamanin pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Likewise also the cup after supper , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood , which is shed for you .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ tenta ' na tʉpo , ko ' anʉmʉ ' pʉ iya . To ' pɨ ' ta ' pʉ iya , “ Serɨ ko ' esi emenna ' pe ekonekan nɨto ' umʉnʉ yau , ɨiwano ' kon pe iye ' kwansa ' .

text: But , behold , the hand of him that betrayeth me is with me on the table .
text2: E ' tane kʉrɨ rɨ uyeparanka ton emiya esi uyemiya pokon pe rɨ tepʉrʉ po .

text: And truly the Son of man goeth , as it was determined : but woe unto that man by whom he is betrayed !
text2: Ka ' pon , Papa winon utɨto ' oton tʉpɨ ' isekamasa ' na ' ne ' kasa rɨ , e ' tane ɨsɨ yau rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ ka ' pon esi eparankanin , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they began to inquire among themselves , which of them it was that should do this thing .
text2: Mɨrɨpan ipoitorʉ ton usekama ' popɨtʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨnʉ ' kuru rɨ si u ' koro ' tawon kon uya serɨ ku ' to ' oton ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And there was also a strife among them , which of them should be accounted the greatest .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon si e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ tiwano ' kon pe rɨ e ' sei ' pɨ ' nɨ pɨ ' ɨnʉ ' kuru e ' to ' oton eke pe tukai ' .

text: And he said unto them , The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Kin amʉ ' Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen esanon esi to ' esa ' pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kamo tʉmeruntɨrʉ kon apurɨnin nan to ' pɨ ' e ' sesakʉ ‘ ka ' pon amʉ ' pika ' tɨnin nan ’ tukai ' .

text: But ye shall not be so : but he that is greatest among you , let him be as the younger ; and he that is chief , as he that doth serve .
text2: E ' tane mɨrɨ kasa ɨwe ' to ' kon pe pʉra iyesi . E ' tane ru ' ku , eke pe na ' ne ' ɨ ' koro ' tau ' nokon e ' to ' pe iyesi a ' mi ' pɨ wannɨ kasa , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ esa ' wannɨ , apiyo ' wannɨ kasa .

text: For whether is greater , he that sitteth at meat , or he that serveth ? is not he that sitteth at meat ? but I am among you as he that serveth .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rupɨ esi eke pe , iyereutasa ' na ' ne ' enta ' nan pɨ ' , mɨrɨ pe pʉra apiyo ' wannɨ katɨ ? Enta ' nan pɨ ' iyereutasa ' na ' ne ' esi eke pe ɨpona , tʉusekansen entai , e ' tane urɨ esi ɨpiyau ' nokon tʉusekansen kasa .

text: Ye are they which have continued with me in my temptations .
text2: “ Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon kamoro uya ' kɨrɨ iye ' sa ' kon ui ' tupɨ ' to ' yau ' ne rɨ ,

text: And I appoint unto you a kingdom , as my Father hath appointed unto me ;
text2: mɨrɨpan uya rɨ ɨkupʉ kon kin pe ɨwesi kon pa ukʉipʉnʉ uya rɨ uku ' sa ' na ' ne ' kasa itesa ' pe e ' to ' pe ,

text: That ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom , and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: ɨyenta ' na kon pa mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ensi kon pa utepʉrʉʉi po esa ' wannɨ pe e ' to ' yau mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨyereuta kon pa apono ' po 12 kaisaron kon Esuwerʉ pon kon eseru aimenka pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And the Lord said , Simon , Simon , behold , Satan hath desired to have you , that he may sift you as wheat :
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai si , Sises uya Pi ' ta pɨ ' , “ Saiman , Saiman , ” ta ' pʉ , “ apʉne uyetakɨ . Se ' tan uya Papa ekama ' posa ' man ɨi ' tupɨ ' to ' kon pe tʉuya , ka ' pon uya ta ' nasi eisika kasa ,

text: But I have prayed for thee , that thy faith fail not : and when thou art converted , strengthen thy brethren .
text2: e ' tane ɨpʉremasa ' man ɨpona , Saiman , anapurɨnʉ apai ɨyemo ' ka namai ' . Ɨyenna ' posa ' pe iyesi a ' tai , ɨtonpa ton mʉmeruntɨtanʉkʉi ' to ' tauro ' kai ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said unto him , Lord , I am ready to go with thee , both into prison , and to death .
text2: E ' tane Pi ' ta uya ta ' pʉ , “ Uyepuru , e ' kamasa ' rɨ serɨ aya ' kɨrɨ rɨ pariki ' si ta ' utɨto ' pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uma ' tato ' pe rɨ aya ' kɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said , I tell thee , Peter , the cock shall not crow this day , before that thou shalt thrice deny that thou knowest me .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ekama uya serɨ ɨpɨ ' , Pi ' ta , kɨrɨtɨkɨ uturumʉ rawɨrɨ serɨ pe , osorʉwau ite ' kwa ui ' tunin pe pʉra ɨye ' ku ' to ' oton , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said unto them , When I sent you without purse , and scrip , and shoes , lacked ye any thing ? And they said , Nothing .
text2: Sises uya to ' ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨyenno ' sa ' uya ' nokon a ' tai , itekare ekamai ' , ɨpʉrataai kon pʉra , apaikii kon pʉra mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ asapatooi kon pʉra , ɨ ' rɨ rɨ na ' kɨ i ' se ɨwe ' to ' kon mʉwarinpata ' tʉi ' nokon ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . “ Kane , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Then said he unto them , But now , he that hath a purse , let him take it , and likewise his scrip : and he that hath no sword , let him sell his garment , and buy one .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon pɨ ' nin si ta ' pʉ iya , “ Serɨ pe nin si tʉpʉrataai ke ɨwesi kon a ' tai , atɨ ' rɨ si aya ' kɨrɨ ' nokon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ apaikii kon nɨ kanan . Ɨsuparaai kon pʉra iyesi yau , ɨpon kon tʉkʉrʉpo ' pomai ' ɨsuparaai kon me ' matʉi ' .

text: For I say unto you , that this that is written must yet be accomplished in me , And he was reckoned among the transgressors : for the things concerning me have an end .
text2: Ekama uya , iye ' menukasa ' na ' ne ' upɨ ' uta ' ku ' tɨto ' pe rɨ iyesi , ‘ Ka ' pon amʉ ' uya ɨri ton main awɨron kon pen tonpa pe iyesi ' pʉ tato ' oton , ’ tawon . Serɨ iye ' menukasa ' rʉ ' pʉ urɨ pɨ ' rɨ uta ' ku ' tɨ mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they said , Lord , behold , here are two swords . And he said unto them , It is enough .
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Apʉne enkɨ , asa ' rɨ rɨ supara man ina piyau , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . “ Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ si e ' paka ' tɨ ' , tʉron nɨ enna pɨ ' kasauro ' tʉu , ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: And he came out , and went , as he was wont , to the mount of Olives ; and his disciples also followed him .
text2: Sises utɨ ' pʉ Are ' Wʉpʉ airɨ ' ne te ' pɨ ' to ' kasa rɨ ipoitorʉ ton uya e ' ma ' pʉka ' pʉ .

text: And when he was at the place , he said unto them , Pray that ye enter not into temptation .
text2: Pata eposa ' tʉuya ' nokon a ' tai , ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ Ɨpʉrematɨ ' , i ' tupɨ ' nɨto ' ya ' auta ' mo ' ka kon namai ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone ' s cast , and kneeled down , and prayed ,
text2: Tɨ ' eno ' mato ' enta ' rɨ itɨ ' pʉ , iye ' sekunka ' pʉ ɨpʉremase ' na .

text: Saying , Father , if thou be willing , remove this cup from me : nevertheless not my will , but thine , be done .
text2: “ Papai , ɨnku ' pai ɨwesi yau , serɨ ko ' imo ' kakɨ uyenapai , e ' tane i ' se ɨwe ' to ' awɨrɨ iku ' kɨ , i ' se e ' to ' awɨrɨ pen , ” ta ' pʉ iya . [

text: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven , strengthening him .
text2: Mɨrɨ ta iya koro ' tau , Papa inserʉʉi uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' imeruntɨrʉ ' tɨi ' .

text: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly : and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground .
text2: Mɨrɨpan Sises ɨpʉrema ' pʉ ipan pe , tʉuta ' kwarʉkai ' , apʉne pʉra pokoi pe tesi pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan eramu ' ta usee ' kwa esi ' pʉ non pona mʉn kasa . ]

text: And when he rose up from prayer , and was come to his disciples , he found them sleeping for sorrow ,
text2: Tʉwɨpʉrema tʉpo , iye ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' utɨ ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton piya ' . To ' e ' nʉnpɨ ' sa ' eporo ' pʉ iya , pokoi uya to ' eketu ' kasa ' .

text: And said unto them , Why sleep ye ? rise and pray , lest ye enter into temptation .
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨto ' pe ɨye ' nʉmʉ kon ? Te ' mʉ ' sa ' kai ' ɨpʉrematɨ ' , i ' tupɨ ' nɨto ' ya ' auta ' mo ' ka kon namai ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: And while he yet spake , behold a multitude , and he that was called Judas , one of the twelve , went before them , and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him .
text2: Usauro ' nɨ pɨ ' rɨ marɨ iyesi koro ' tau , anpisin uyee ' pʉ to ' piya ' , ka ' pon , Isutas tukai ' tesa ' sen , 12 kaisaron kon tonpa pe te ' sen esi ' pʉ to ' esa ' pe . Sises piya ' a ' ko pe iyee ' pʉ a ' su ' kase .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Judas , betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss ?
text2: E ' tane Sises uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Isutas , Ka ' pon , Papa winon pe ' eparanka auya mɨrɨ uta ' su ' kan ke ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: When they which were about him saw what would follow , they said unto him , Lord , shall we smite with the sword ?
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton uya te ' ku ' sen ensa ' a ' tai , Sises pɨ ' ta ' pʉ to ' uya , “ Ina epuru , ina uya pe ' si to ' panta ' ma serɨ tʉsuparaai kon amʉ ' ke ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And one of them smote the servant of the high priest , and cut off his right ear .
text2: To ' tonpa uya use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru poitorʉ pana enwo ' ne ' winon a ' tɨ ' pʉ .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Suffer ye thus far . And he touched his ear , and healed him .
text2: E ' tane Sises uya ta ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' , “ Tɨwɨ nesii ! ” ta ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨpan uya a ' pɨtʉ ke rɨ ipana epi ' tɨ ' pʉ .

text: Then Jesus said unto the chief priests , and captains of the temple , and the elders , which were come to him , Be ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and staves ?
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru pɨ ' , use ' man nɨto ' , ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' pa ' simanin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itepuru ton tʉkan iye ' sa ' kon pɨ ' ta ' pʉ iya , “ Main awɨron kon pen pe ' esa ' pe esi serɨ , ɨuye ' sa ' kon na ' ne ' supara amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wa ' tana amʉ ' esa ' pe ?

text: When I was daily with you in the temple , ye stretched forth no hands against me : but this is your hour , and the power of darkness .
text2: Wʉi kaisarɨ rɨ ɨpiyau ' nokon esi ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' pʉ ' kʉ tau . Upɨ ' ɨyemiyatʉ kon tʉsa ' auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi . E ' tane serɨ pe ɨweyu kon pe iyesi — ewarupɨ esi pana ' pe ɨyesa ' kon pe koro ' tau , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then took they him , and led him , and brought him into the high priest ' s house . And Peter followed afar off .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ta ' sise to ' uya arɨ ' pʉ use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru iwʉ ' ta ' . Pi ' ta uya e ' ma ' pʉka ' pʉ ɨnnonsi ' kɨ rɨ .

text: And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall , and were set down together , Peter sat down among them .
text2: E ' tane apo ' po ' tɨsa ' to ' uya a ' tai pʉroroi aporo ' po , mɨrɨpan kon ereutasa ' esi ' pʉ a ' samʉtʉ yau , Pi ' ta ereuta ' pʉ to ' piyau .

text: But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire , and earnestly looked upon him , and said , This man was also with him .
text2: To ' poitorʉ uri ' san uya iyereutasa ' ene ' pʉ apo ' weyu ya ' . Enpɨtʉ ' pʉ iya a ' ko pe esii ' ma , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ , “ Pʉse rɨ ka ' pon ne ' tai Sises a ' kɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he denied him , saying , Woman , I know him not .
text2: E ' tane i ' tunin pe pʉra iye ' kuu ' pʉ . “ Ma ' non , kʉrɨ rɨ i ' tunin pen urɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And after a little while another saw him , and said , Thou art also of them . And Peter said , Man , I am not .
text2: Emennʉ ' pʉ iwa rɨ , tʉron nɨ uya kanan ensa ' esi ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ɨmɨrɨ sa ' ne kʉrɨ rɨ ko to ' tonpa , ” ta ' pʉ iya . “ Mooi , kʉrɨ rɨ pen nɨ urɨ ! ” ta ' pʉ Pi ' ta uya .

text: And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed , saying , Of a truth this fellow also was with him : for he is a Galilaean .
text2: Tikin ite ' kwa kʉra ' emiya era ' tɨ ' pʉ tʉpo ' ne rɨ , tʉron nɨ ka ' pon uya e ' se ' ne ' pe ipɨ ' , “ I ' napai rɨ sa ' ne pʉse rɨ esi ' pʉ iya ' kɨrɨ ; apʉne pʉra Kiyarari pon pe iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Peter said , Man , I know not what thou sayest . And immediately , while he yet spake , the cock crew .
text2: Pi ' ta uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Mooi , ipɨ ' masauro ' atʉi ' ne ' i ' tu uya pʉra rɨ man ! ” ta ' pʉ iya . Usauro ' nɨ pɨ ' iyesi koro ' tau , kɨrɨtɨkɨ uturumʉ ' pʉ .

text: And the Lord turned , and looked upon Peter . And Peter remembered the word of the Lord , how he had said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Itepuru era ' tɨ ' pʉ to ' sa rɨ Pi ' ta ense ' na . Mɨrɨ a ' tai si , Pi ' ta uya Itepuru uya tauro ' ka ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ nee ' pʉ tenu ya ' , “ Kɨrɨtɨkɨ uturumʉ rawɨrɨ serɨ pe , osorʉwau ite ' kwa unonkato ' auya oton , ” tawon .

text: And Peter went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Mɨrɨpan epa ' ka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan ukaramʉ ' pʉ ipan pe .

text: And the men that held Jesus mocked him , and smote him .
text2: Sises erasu pe te ' san e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ isapema pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iwɨpɨtʉ pɨ ' .

text: And when they had blindfolded him , they struck him on the face , and asked him , saying , Prophesy , who is it that smote thee ?
text2: To ' uya itenu auromʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Pu ' kena ' pe ekamakɨ ! Ɨnʉ ' ɨwɨnɨi ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And many other things blasphemously spake they against him .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon usaurokʉ ' pʉ eke pe rɨ ɨri pe rɨ tʉsapemai ' .

text: And as soon as it was day , the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together , and led him into their council , saying ,
text2: Pata ema ' sa ' a ' tai , ka ' pon amʉ ' epuru ton — asa ' rɨ rɨ use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Main pɨ ' enupanin nan amʉra ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon rakʉi ' Sises arɨ ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Art thou the Christ ? tell us . And he said unto them , If I tell you , ye will not believe :
text2: “ Ina pɨ ' ɨsekamakɨ , Kʉrai pe ɨwesi yau , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Usekamasa ' yau , uyapurɨ auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi ;

text: And if I also ask you , ye will not answer me , nor let me go .
text2: ɨyekama ' posa ' uya ' nokon yau , uyeikʉ auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi .

text: Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God .
text2: E ' tane serɨ awonsi ' kɨ Ka ' pon , Papa winon ereutato ' oton meruntɨ pe te ' sen Papa enwo ' netʉ winɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then said they all , Art thou then the Son of God ? And he said unto them , Ye say that I am .
text2: Tanporo esii ' ma to ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Papa Mumu pe ken pe ' si ɨwesi ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . To ' eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Ipoken me ' atʉi ' kʉrɨ rɨ pe esi mʉkayatʉi ' ne ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they said , What need we any further witness ? for we ourselves have heard of his own mouth .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ta ' pʉ to ' uya , “ Ɨ ' rɨto ' pe miyarɨ ekamanin i ' se e ' nɨ ? Etaka ' sa ' sa ' ne mɨrɨ ko inta apai , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And the whole multitude of them arose , and led him unto Pilate .
text2: Kamoro si asauro ' se iyamʉrasa ' kon nʉ ' san uya Sises arɨ ' pʉ Paire ' Isutiya kopʉnaai piya ' .

text: And they began to accuse him , saying , We found this fellow perverting the nation , and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar , saying that he himself is Christ a King .
text2: Mɨrɨ yau , eseru ' tɨ pɨ ' to ' esi ' pʉ , “ Pʉse rɨ uya ka ' pon amʉ ' ano ' ma , ‘ Pʉrata kʉ ' nonkatʉu pata esa ' ena ' , urɨ kʉrɨ rɨ Kʉrai pata esa ' , ’ ta iya , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And Pilate asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answered him and said , Thou sayest it .
text2: Sises ekama ' po ' pʉ Paire ' uya , “ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' kin pe ' ɨmɨrɨ ? ” tukai ' . Mɨrɨpan eikʉ ' pʉ Sises uya , “ Ewai ' , mʉkayai ' ne ' kasa rɨ , ” tukai ' .

text: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people , I find no fault in this man .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Paire ' uya ta ' pʉ use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' , “ Ɨ ' rɨ rɨ pʉse rɨ wɨto ' ipɨkɨrɨ eposa ' uya pʉra man , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they were the more fierce , saying , He stirreth up the people , teaching throughout all Jewry , beginning from Galilee to this place .
text2: E ' tane Sises pɨ ' rɨ usauro ' nɨ pɨ ' to ' esi ' pʉ , “ Eke pe rɨ usewa ' noman emapu ' tɨ iya pata Isutiya poro rɨ to ' enupa ke . Pata Kiyarari po iye ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uye ' ka ' sa ' serɨ ya ' , mɨrɨ pɨ ' rɨ to ' enupa pɨ ' iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: When Pilate heard of Galilee , he asked whether the man were a Galilaean .
text2: To ' ekama ' po ' pʉ iya , “ Sises pe ' esi Kiyarari ko ' pe ? ” tukai ' ,

text: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod ' s jurisdiction , he sent him to Herod , who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time .
text2: “ Ewai ' , ” tasa ' to ' uya pɨ ' . Sises ennoko ' pʉ iya kin Era ' piya ' , apʉne pʉra itesa ' pe iye ' to ' winon pe iyesi pɨ ' , mɨrɨ koro ' tau si Surusiran po Era ' esi ' pʉ .

text: And when Herod saw Jesus , he was exceeding glad : for he was desirous to see him of a long season , because he had heard many things of him ; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him .
text2: Mɨrɨpan epori ' ma ' pʉ ipan pe Sises tense , apʉne pʉra inke rɨ Sises ɨnenpai te ' sen pe iye ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra eke Papa tʉrawasooi kupʉ iya tawon etasa ' tʉuya pɨ ' . Mɨrɨpan nin si kupʉ iya ɨnenpai iyesi ' pʉ mɨrɨ .

text: Then he questioned with him in many words ; but he answered him nothing .
text2: Tu ' kan pɨ ' rɨ Sises ekama ' popɨtʉ ' pʉ iya , e ' tane eikʉ ' pʉ iya pen .

text: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him .
text2: Use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Main pɨ ' enupanin nan e ' soto ' pɨ ' sa ' esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ yau Sises eseru ' tɨ pɨ ' .

text: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought , and mocked him , and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe , and sent him again to Pilate .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Era ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ isoisaai amʉ ' uya Sises sapema ' pʉ . E ' neimapɨtʉ pe to ' usennaka ' pʉ ipɨ ' , mɨrɨpan pontɨ ' pʉ to ' uya epe ' kena ' kuru pon ya ' , mɨrɨpan na ' po ' pʉ to ' uya Paire ' piya ' .

text: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together : for before they were at enmity between themselves .
text2: Mɨrɨ wapiya Era ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Paire ' pokon esi ' pʉ ɨ ' seyaton pe , mɨrɨpan kon ena ' pʉ ɨsitonpa pe mɨrɨ wʉi a ' tai rɨ .

text: And Pilate , when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people ,
text2: Paire ' uya use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru , ka ' pon amʉ ' epuru ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' rɨ nɨrɨ amʉranʉkʉ ' pʉ .

text: Said unto them , Ye have brought this man unto me , as one that perverteth the people : and , behold , I , having examined him before you , have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him :
text2: To ' uye ' sa ' a ' tai , ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ Pʉse rɨ ka ' pon ne ' sa ' auya ' nokon upiya ' , kopʉna ewa ' nomanin pe ka ' pon amʉ ' kupʉ iya ta auya ' nokon . Ekama ' popɨ ' sa ' uya man apana airɨ ' nokon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨ ' rɨ rɨ eposa ' uya pʉra man meseru ' tɨyatʉi ' ne ' ipɨ ' , pɨ ' .

text: No , nor yet Herod : for I sent you to him ; and , lo , nothing worthy of death is done unto him .
text2: Era ' uya rɨ nɨrɨ ɨri pe man tasa ' pʉra man , apʉne pʉra inna ' posa ' iya man upiya ' nokon . Menyatʉi ' ne ' rɨ , ɨ ' rɨ rɨ ku ' sa ' iya pʉra iyesi tʉwɨto ' ipɨkɨrɨ .

text: I will therefore chastise him , and release him .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' , usoisaai amʉ ' uya rɨ nin ari ' po ' pɨ ' to ' pe ta uya , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ inonkato ' pe uya rɨ nin , ” ta ' pʉ Paire ' uya . [

text: ( For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast . )
text2: To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ a ' tai , iteseru esi ' pʉ Paire ' uya tikin nɨ a ' sisa ' pe te ' sen nonkato ' pe iyesi Esuwerʉ amʉ ' iwano ' pe . ]

text: And they cried out all at once , saying , Away with this man , and release unto us Barabbas :
text2: Tikin nɨ imaimu esii ' ma to ' ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ , “ Pʉse rɨ ka ' pon atɨ ' iwɨnɨ kon pa ! Parapas nonkai ' ma ina iwano ' pe , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: ( Who for a certain sedition made in the city , and for murder , was cast into prison . )
text2: Parapas esi ' pʉ a ' sisa ' pe , apʉne pʉra usewa ' noman emapu ' tɨsa ' iya pɨ ' Surusiran po mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' pon nɨrɨ wɨsa ' iya pɨ ' .

text: Pilate therefore , willing to release Jesus , spake again to them .
text2: Sises ɨnnonkapai tesi pɨ ' , Paire ' uya kanan to ' ekama ' pokaa ' pʉ .

text: But they cried , saying , Crucify him , crucify him .
text2: E ' tane to ' ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉ ' pʉ , “ Kurusu ' pona ipokapɨ ' kɨ ! Kurusu ' pona ipokapɨ ' kɨ ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he said unto them the third time , Why , what evil hath he done ? I have found no cause of death in him : I will therefore chastise him , and let him go .
text2: Itosorʉwano ite ' kwa pe to ' auro ' ka ' pʉ iya , “ Ɨ ' rɨto ' pe ? Ɨ ' rɨ ɨri ku ' sa ' pʉse rɨ ka ' pon uya ? Ɨ ' rɨ rɨ ima ' tato ' ipɨkɨrɨ eposa ' uya pʉra man . Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , ikota ' mato ' pe ikupʉ uya , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ inonkato ' pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they were instant with loud voices , requiring that he might be crucified . And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed .
text2: E ' tane eke pe to ' ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉ ' pʉ , tɨwɨ kurusu ' pona ipokapɨtʉ nesii , tukai ' , mɨrɨpan kon nin si ena ' pʉ imaimu entai .

text: And Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they required .
text2: Paire ' nin si ekoneka ' pʉ mɨrɨ to ' nesakʉ ' pʉ ke to ' repa pɨ ' .

text: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison , whom they had desired ; but he delivered Jesus to their will .
text2: Ka ' pon nonka ' pʉ iya usewa ' noman ku ' sa ' iya pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' pon nɨrɨ wɨsa ' iya pɨ ' a ' sisa ' rʉ ' pʉ , to ' nekama ' po ' pʉ , Sises nonkai ' ma i ' se to ' e ' to ' ya ' .

text: And as they led him away , they laid hold upon one Simon , a Cyrenian , coming out of the country , and on him they laid the cross , that he might bear it after Jesus .
text2: To ' uya arɨ koro ' tau , ka ' pon , Sairini pon Saiman itese ' , a ' si ' pʉ to ' uya , Surusiran pona tʉutɨsen tʉmainarʉ awonsi ' kɨ . Mɨrɨpan ena ' kurusu ' nonka ' pʉ to ' uya ato ' pe iya Sises e ' ma ' pʉ pe .

text: And there followed him a great company of people , and of women , which also bewailed and lamented him .
text2: Tu ' kan kon nɨ utɨ ' pʉ Sises pɨkɨrɨ kurusu ' pona soisa amʉ ' uya ipokapɨ ' to ' ya ' . Uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' rɨ tʉuta ' kwarʉkai ' tʉukaransan iwenai .

text: But Jesus turning unto them said , Daughters of Jerusalem , weep not for me , but weep for yourselves , and for your children .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon winɨkʉi ' Sises era ' tɨ ' pʉ , “ Surusiran pon kon uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' , uwenai kakarantʉu ; ɨwenai ' nokon nɨ , ɨmunkɨ kon wenai rɨ akarantɨ ' , apʉne pʉra ɨsɨ rɨ e ' ku ' to ' oton pɨ ' ɨpɨ ' nokon .

text: For , behold , the days are coming , in the which they shall say , Blessed are the barren , and the wombs that never bare , and the paps which never gave suck .
text2: Apʉne pʉra tato ' oton to ' uya iweyu e ' seposa ' a ' tai , ‘ Wakʉ ton kuru rɨ kamoro uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' mʉre a ' sinin nan pen , mʉre yen pe itewan e ' sa ' kon pen , mʉre na ' su ' ka ' pʉ pen imanatʉ ton . ’

text: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains , Fall on us ; and to the hills , Cover us .
text2: Mɨrɨpan tʉron kon uya tato ' oton wʉ ' ton pɨ ' , ‘ Ina iwasa ' kakɨ , ’ i ' kʉrʉ ton pɨ ' , ‘ Ina iu ' na ' tɨkɨ , ’ tato ' oton to ' uya .

text: For if they do these things in a green tree , what shall be done in the dry ?
text2: Serɨ kupʉ ka ' pon amʉ ' uya pe iyesi yau isenan pe yʉi esi koro ' tau , ɨ ' rɨ pe ken si iyesi mɨrɨ iyaipʉtasa ' pe iyesi a ' tai ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And there were also two other , malefactors , led with him to be put to death .
text2: Asa ' rɨ rɨ marɨ ɨri ku ' nin nʉ ' san ka ' pon amʉ ' enpa ' ka ' pʉ soisa amʉ ' uya pata apai Sises pokon pe kurusu ' pona to ' pokapɨ ' to ' pe .

text: And when they were come to the place , which is called Calvary , there they crucified him , and the malefactors , one on the right hand , and the other on the left .
text2: Pata , Pu ' pɨ Ɨ ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ tato ' eposa ' to ' uya a ' tai , to ' uya si kurusu ' pona ipokapɨtʉ ' pʉ ɨri ton pokon pe , tikin nɨ itenwo ' netʉ winɨ , isakon ikamisi winɨ .

text: Then said Jesus , Father , forgive them ; for they know not what they do . And they parted his raiment , and cast lots .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Papai , to ' pɨ ' ɨsentu ' makɨ , apʉne pʉra to ' uya i ' tu pʉra rɨ iyesi ɨri kupʉ tʉuya ' nokon tukai ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Ipon nʉ ' pʉ ta ' nʉkʉ ' pʉ to ' uya te ' wapiya ' kapɨ ' se .

text: And the people stood beholding . And the rulers also with them derided him , saying , He saved others ; let him save himself , if he be Christ , the chosen of God .
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' e ' soto ' pɨ ' sa ' esi ' pʉ enpɨtʉ pɨ ' , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton uya Sises sapema ' pʉ , “ Tʉron kon sa ' ne si pika ' tɨ ' pʉ iya , tɨwɨ si nepika ' tɨi tiwano ' pe , i ' napai rɨ Kʉrai pe tesi yau , Papa Nanʉmʉ ' pʉ pe , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And the soldiers also mocked him , coming to him , and offering him vinegar ,
text2: Te ' neimapɨ ' se soisa amʉ ' usennaka ' pʉ ipɨ ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya waain peneka ke iwo ' pa ' pʉ

text: And saying , If thou be the king of the Jews , save thyself .
text2: tai ' ma , “ Apʉne si Esuwerʉ amʉ ' iwano ' kin pe ɨwesi yau , ɨu ' tɨkɨ kurusu ' poi epika ' tɨkɨ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' .

text: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek , and Latin , and Hebrew , THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Mɨrɨpan i ' pai epoi tʉnmenuka ' pʉ kon tʉsa ' to ' uya esi ' pʉ : Pʉse rɨ si pʉse rɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' iwano ' kin , tawon .

text: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him , saying , If thou be Christ , save thyself and us .
text2: Ɨri ka ' pon , ipokapɨ ' sa ' ipiyau uya rɨ isapema ' pʉ , “ Kʉrai pen nɨ pe ' ɨmɨrɨ , epika ' tɨkɨ , ina nɨrɨ ipika ' tɨkɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But the other answering rebuked him , saying , Dost not thou fear God , seeing thou art in the same condemnation ?
text2: E ' tane isakon uya e ' se ' ne ' pe eseremekʉ ' pʉ , “ Sises kasa rɨ pe ' ama ' tai ' ma Papa nama auya pʉra iyesi ?

text: And we indeed justly ; for we receive the due reward of our deeds : but this man hath done nothing amiss .
text2: Iye ' to ' pe rɨ nin kurusu ' pona to ' uya upokapɨ ' sa ' kon serɨ ɨri ku ' sa ' wenai rɨ nin , e ' tane pʉse rɨ uya ɨri ku ' sa ' pʉra rɨ iyesi , iwenai pʉra rɨ nin kurusu ' pona to ' uya ipokapɨ ' sa ' na ' ne ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he said unto Jesus , Lord , remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ Sises pɨ ' , “ Sises , ɨyenu yau rʉ ' kwɨ ukupʉi ' kin pe ɨyenasa ' a ' tai , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , To day shalt thou be with me in paradise .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨpɨ ' ta uya serɨ , serɨ pe upiyau ɨwesi mɨrɨ wakʉ upata yau , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya ipɨ ' .

text: And it was about the sixth hour , and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour .
text2: 12 a ' kʉra ' e ' to ' airɨ ' ne rɨ , pata si ewarumamʉ ' pʉ 3 a ' kʉra ' pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ ,

text: And the sun was darkened , and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst .
text2: wʉi enu uya pata wei ' tɨ pʉra iyesi ' pʉ to ' e ' to ' airɨ . Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' wapu ekaraka ' pʉ a ' sa ' mʉyai .

text: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice , he said , Father , into thy hands I commend my spirit : and having said thus , he gave up the ghost .
text2: Mɨrɨpan Sises ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ , “ Papai , ɨyena ' si uya ' kwarʉ sitʉyai ' ! ” ta ' pʉ iya . Serɨ ta tʉpo si , iyerikʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ .

text: Now when the centurion saw what was done , he glorified God , saying , Certainly this was a righteous man .
text2: Roman amʉ ' soisaai ton epuru uya ensa ' a ' tai , Papa apurɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ iya , “ I ' napai rɨ kuru rɨ ka ' si , pʉse rɨ esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ wa ipokena ' e ' pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And all the people that came together to that sight , beholding the things which were done , smote their breasts , and returned .
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' iyamʉrasa ' kon uya tanporo serɨ e ' kupʉ ene ' pʉ mɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan kon utɨ ' pʉ ipan pe pokoi pe esii ' ma .

text: And all his acquaintance , and the women that followed him from Galilee , stood afar off , beholding these things .
text2: Tanporo kamoro Sises i ' tunin nan e ' soto ' pɨ ' sa ' esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ te ' ku ' sen enpɨtʉ pɨ ' ɨnnonsi ' kɨ , uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' rɨ esi ' pʉ , iya ' kɨrɨ iye ' sa ' kon nʉ ' san Kiyarari poi .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Joseph , a counseller ; and he was a good man , and a just :
text2: Moro ka ' pon esi ' pʉ Isose ' itese ' , Konsʉrʉ pe te ' sen , wakʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipoken te ' sen awɨron ,

text: ( The same had not consented to the counsel and deed of them ; ) he was of Arimathaea , a city of the Jews : who also himself waited for the kingdom of God .
text2: Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe e ' seporo enupɨkɨrɨ te ' sen . Kʉrɨ rɨ esi ' pʉ asauro ' se ' na iyamʉrasa ' kon tonpa pe rɨ , e ' tane to ' eseru pɨ ' , “ Ewai ' , ” tasa ' iya pʉra iyesi ' pʉ .

text: This man went unto Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus .
text2: Itɨ ' pʉ Roman amʉ ' kopʉnaai , Paire ' piya ' Sises ekepu ekama ' pose ' na iu ' na ' tɨto ' pe tʉuya . Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' , “ Ewai ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he took it down , and wrapped it in linen , and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone , wherein never man before was laid .
text2: Mɨrɨpan mo ' ka ' pʉ iya , iwontɨ ' pʉ iya epe ' kena ' pon renen tato ' atʉ ke . Mɨrɨpan tʉrʉ ' pʉ iya emenna ' pe tɨ ' akasa ' uruwai ' pe ya ' .

text: And that day was the preparation , and the sabbath drew on .
text2: Ekonekan weyu pe iyesi ' pʉ , Sapa ' nin si epiya ' tɨkapʉ esi ' pʉ .

text: And the women also , which came with him from Galilee , followed after , and beheld the sepulchre , and how his body was laid .
text2: Uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' Sises a ' kɨrɨ iye ' sa ' kon nʉ ' san Kiyarari poi utɨ ' pʉ Isose ' a ' kɨrɨ . Mɨrɨpan kon uya Sises ekepu emaika ene ' pʉ .

text: And they returned , and prepared spices and ointments ; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment .
text2: To ' enna ' po ' pʉ patatʉse ' tʉuya ' nokon ya ' . Mɨrɨpan kon uya a ' po ' na ' nan karapa konepɨtʉ ' pʉ Sises ekepu karapaimato ' tʉuya ' nokon ike pe . To ' nin si ereuta ' pʉ mɨrɨ Sapa ' weyu a ' tai , Main uya tasa ' na ' ne ' awɨrɨ .

text: Now upon the first day of the week , very early in the morning , they came unto the sepulchre , bringing the spices which they had prepared , and certain others with them .
text2: Awanakʉi ' kuru nin si suntaaka epiya ' tɨ pe uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' uya tʉnkoneka ' pʉ kon a ' po ' na ' nan arɨ esi ' pʉ tɨ ' akasa ' uruwai ' pe pona .

text: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre .
text2: To ' uya tɨ ' e ' tɨrinkasa ' , tɨ ' akasa ' uruwai ' pe apai eporo ' pʉ ,

text: And they entered in , and found not the body of the Lord Jesus .
text2: e ' tane to ' ewonsa ' a ' tai Sises ekepu pʉra iyesi ' pʉ mɨrɨ yau .

text: And it came to pass , as they were much perplexed thereabout , behold , two men stood by them in shining garments :
text2: Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' to ' usenuminka koro ' tau , ite ' kwanau pʉra rɨ , asa ' ron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' e ' soto ' ka ' pʉ to ' piyau , to ' pon ton e ' wei ' tɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ a ' kwa pe , kamiri ' kasa .

text: And as they were afraid , and bowed down their faces to the earth , they said unto them , Why seek ye the living among the dead ?
text2: Tetʉipɨtʉ kon pɨ ' uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' epeima ' pʉ non pona , e ' tane to ' pɨ ' ta ' pʉ to ' uya , “ Ɨ ' rɨto ' pe eke ' amʉ ' koro ' tau nurɨnan warinpa auya ' nokon ?

text: He is not here , but is risen : remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee ,
text2: Ipʉra man serɨ yau , iye ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ man . Ɨyenu kon yau iku ' tɨ ' inekama ' pʉ ɨpiyau ' nokon tesi koro ' tau Kiyarari po ,

text: Saying , The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men , and be crucified , and the third day rise again .
text2: ‘ Ka ' pon , Papa winon tʉto ' oton ka ' pon amʉ ' uya tʉmakooikenan kon ena ' to ' uya ipokapɨ ' to ' pe kurusu ' pona , e ' tane iye ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' oton itosorʉwano wʉi a ' tai , ’ tawon , ” ta ' pʉ to ' iya .

text: And they remembered his words ,
text2: Mɨrɨ eta tʉuya ' nokon a ' tai , to ' enu ya ' si iyena ' pʉ Sises maimu rʉ ' pʉ .

text: And returned from the sepulchre , and told all these things unto the eleven , and to all the rest .
text2: Tenna ' posa ' kon a ' tai , tɨ ' akasa ' uruwai ' apai , 11 pan kon ipoitorʉ ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉron kon ipoitorʉ ton pana ' tɨ ' pʉ to ' uya tanporon nɨ iye ' ku ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ ke .

text: It was Mary Magdalene , and Joanna , and Mary the mother of James , and other women that were with them , which told these things unto the apostles .
text2: Pʉsamoro uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ , Meri Mataren , Isowana , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Isens san , Meri rɨ marɨ itese ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉron kon uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' esi ' pʉ to ' a ' kɨrɨ .

text: And their words seemed to them as idle tales , and they believed them not .
text2: E ' tane uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' uya tʉpana ' tɨto ' kon , apurɨ to ' uya pʉra iyesi ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra kasi poken iseta pɨ ' .

text: Then arose Peter , and ran unto the sepulchre ; and stooping down , he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves , and departed , wondering in himself at that which was come to pass .
text2: Mɨrɨ rɨ e ' tane , Pi ' ta e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' nin si eka ' tumʉ ' pʉ tɨ ' akasa ' uruwai ' pona . Te ' tɨmuikai ' Sises ekepu ontɨto ' ike pe isaai ' pɨ ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ renen tato ' atʉ ene ' pʉ iya tʉpona rɨ . Mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe rɨ si iyesi ' pʉ ko ? ” tai ' ma .

text: And , behold , two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus , which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs .
text2: Mɨrɨ rɨ suntaaka e ' sara ' tɨ a ' tai , asa ' ron kon Sises poitorʉ ton utɨ esi ' pʉ , eke iwa pata Emeyas tato ' ka ' pon amʉ ' uya ya ' . Serɨ pata esi ' pʉ 7 mayirʉ e ' to ' airɨ rɨ Surusiran poi .

text: And they talked together of all these things which had happened .
text2: Asaurokʉi ' ma to ' utɨ esi ' pʉ tanporo iye ' ku ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' Surusiran po .

text: And it came to pass , that , while they communed together and reasoned , Jesus himself drew near , and went with them .
text2: Mɨrɨ ton pɨ ' usauro ' nɨ pɨ ' to ' esi koro ' tau , Sises uyee ' pʉ a ' ko pe to ' piya ' , mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ to ' a ' kɨrɨ ,

text: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him .
text2: e ' tane Papa uya to ' uya ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ namai ' Sises ku ' sa ' esi ' pʉ .

text: And he said unto them , What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another , as ye walk , and are sad ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon ekama ' po ' pʉ Sises uya , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' asaurokʉi ' ma ɨutɨ kon ? ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' . Mɨrɨpan kon e ' takʉ ' kasa ' umaintapɨtʉ ' pʉ ,

text: And the one of them , whose name was Cleopas , answering said unto him , Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem , and hast not known the things which are come to pass therein these days ?
text2: mɨrɨpan isakon Kiriyo ' pas itese ' uya ta ' pʉ Sises pɨ ' , “ Ɨmɨrɨ rɨken na ' kɨ si nai serɨ ton , Surusiran po iye ' ku ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ i ' tunin pe pʉra , ” ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' .

text: And he said unto them , What things ? And they said unto him , Concerning Jesus of Nazareth , which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people :
text2: “ Ɨ ' rɨ ton si e ' kupʉ ' pʉ ? ” ta ' pʉ nin si Sises uya mɨrɨ ipɨ ' . “ Mɨ ton sa ' ne , Sises , Nasare ' pon pɨ ' iye ' ku ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ . Pu ' kena ' pe sa ' ne iyesi tukai ' , Papa ni ' tunʉ , ka ' pon amʉ ' rɨ nɨrɨ ni ' tunʉ , meruntɨ pe tʉusauro ' sen , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨ ' rɨ rɨ ku ' nin meruntɨ pe .

text: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death , and have crucified him .
text2: Use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uyepuru kon amʉ ' uya itʉrʉ ' pʉ Roman amʉ ' kopʉnaai ena ' to ' uya iwɨto ' pe iku ' to ' pe iya . Mɨrɨpan pokapɨ ' sa ' to ' uya kurusu ' pona erikʉ ' pʉ .

text: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel : and beside all this , to day is the third day since these things were done .
text2: Ina sa ' ne si Esuwerʉ amʉ ' mo ' ka iya ina eyaton non enapai tukai ' ina e ' ku ' sa ' e ' tane . Mɨrɨ rɨken pe ekama tane , serɨ si osorʉwau wʉi iko ' mankapʉ to ' uya iwɨnɨ ' pʉ si ' kɨrɨ .

text: Yea , and certain women also of our company made us astonished , which were early at the sepulchre ;
text2: Mɨrɨ pona ina koro ' tau te ' san uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' uya ina ewansiukapɨ ' an ko . Awanakʉi ' kuru to ' utɨ ' pʉ tɨ ' akasa ' uruwai ' pe pona , e ' tane itekepu pʉra iyesi ' pʉ mɨrɨ yau . Mɨrɨpan kon uye ' sa ' uya ina pana ' tɨ ' pʉ inserʉ amʉ ' ene ' pʉ tʉuya ' nokon tukai ' . Mɨrɨpan kon uya , ‘ Sises e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ man , ’ ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' .

text: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre , and found it even so as the women had said : but him they saw not .
text2: Mɨrɨpan ina tonpa ton kanan utɨkaa ' pʉ tɨ ' akasa ' uruwai ' pe pona , mɨrɨpan kon uya si eporo ' pʉ uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' uya ekama ' pʉ kasa rɨ , Sises ene ' pʉ to ' uya pen nɨ kanan , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then he said unto them , O fools , and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken :
text2: Mɨrɨpan a ' tai , Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Nai pan kon ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon iya ' kwarʉ pʉnon kon nɨ , apurɨ auya ' nokon pʉra kuru rɨ iyesi pu ' kena ' amʉ ' nekama ' pʉ te ' ku ' ton tukai ' .

text: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things , and to enter into his glory ?
text2: Papa uya rɨ sa ' ne iku ' sa ' esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ ko pʉse rɨ tʉnanʉmʉ ' pʉ ekota ' mato ' pe rɨ . Mɨrɨpan i ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' tʉuya e ' to ' pe tapurɨpɨ ' sen pe Epʉn po , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets , he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya to ' pɨ ' ekama ' pʉ tʉpɨ ' itekare usauro ' sa ' Mosi ' nʉmenuka ' pʉ si ' kɨrɨ te ' sara ' tɨi ' , siya rɨ pu ' kena ' amʉ ' nʉmenuka ' pʉ rɨ tʉpɨ ' .

text: And they drew nigh unto the village , whither they went : and he made as though he would have gone further .
text2: To ' uya si a ' ko pe eke iwa pata epokapʉ esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ tʉutɨto ' kon ya ' , e ' tane Sises e ' kupʉ ' pʉ to ' entawon ya ' parɨ tʉutɨ pe itese ' .

text: But they constrained him , saying , Abide with us : for it is toward evening , and the day is far spent . And he went in to tarry with them .
text2: Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' ta ' pʉ to ' uya , “ Pata itʉkɨ ina piyau , apʉne pʉra pata newarumanka ' an , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . Mɨrɨpan kon piya ' iyewomʉ ' pʉ .

text: And it came to pass , as he sat at meat with them , he took bread , and blessed it , and brake , and gave to them .
text2: Iyereuta ' pʉ to ' pokon pe enta ' nase ' na , mɨrɨpan uya tenki ta pe Papa pɨ ' pʉreti anʉmʉ ' pʉ , i ' kwɨtʉ ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan tʉrʉ ' pʉ iya to ' ena ' . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Papa uya to ' enu a ' koka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan to ' ka ' nʉkʉ ' pʉ to ' uya , mɨrɨpan kon enu apai ' ka ' pʉ iya .

text: And they said one to another , Did not our heart burn within us , while he talked with us by the way , and while he opened to us the scriptures ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon uya ta ' pʉ , “ Uyewan kon sa ' ne a ' pɨ ' pɨtʉi ko asanta tau uyauro ' ka iya ' nokon koro ' tau pu ' kena ' amʉ ' nekama ' pʉ iye ' menukasa ' itekare pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And they rose up the same hour , and returned to Jerusalem , and found the eleven gathered together , and them that were with them ,
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' utɨ ' pʉ oko pe pʉra rɨ , Surusiran pona . Mɨrɨ yau , 11 pan kon Sises poitorʉ ton amʉrasa ' eporo ' pʉ to ' uya tʉron kon ipoitorʉ ton pokon pe .

text: Saying , The Lord is risen indeed , and hath appeared to Simon .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon uya pʉsamoro asa ' ron kon pɨ ' ta ' pʉ , “ I ' napairɨ rɨ kenʉ ' Sises e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' man ! Mɨrɨpan ene ' pʉ Pi ' ta uya ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And they told what things were done in the way , and how he was known of them in breaking of bread .
text2: Mɨrɨpan pʉsamoro asa ' ron kon uya Emeas e ' ma tau iye ' ku ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ ekama ' pʉ kanan to ' pɨ ' , ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ ' pʉ tʉuya ' nokon pʉreti i ' kwɨtʉ iya a ' tai .

text: And as they thus spake , Jesus himself stood in the midst of them , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Pʉsamoro rɨ si usaurokʉ koro ' tau mɨrɨ pɨ ' , Sises e ' soto ' ka ' pʉ to ' koro ' ta ' . Mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Miyarɨ ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But they were terrified and affrighted , and supposed that they had seen a spirit .
text2: Ipan pe to ' etʉipɨtʉ ' pʉ , a ' kwarʉ ' pʉ ensa ' tʉuya ' nokon pe tekamai ' .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye troubled ? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon pɨ ' ta ' pʉ iya , “ Tetʉipɨ ' se pʉra e ' tɨ ' , tʉkasimai ' pʉra , e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' apurɨtɨ ' ,

text: Behold my hands and my feet , that it is I myself : handle me , and see ; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones , as ye see me have .
text2: apʉne upokapɨtʉ ' pʉ iyɨ rʉ ' pʉ entɨ ' , uyemiyatʉ pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ u ' ta pɨ ' . Urɨ rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ , uya ' kwarʉ ' pʉ ensa ' auya ' nokon pen , uya ' pɨ ' tɨ ' , urɨ rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ . Urɨ kasa pe ' tʉpun ke a ' kwarʉ ' pʉ esi pe ekama auya ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he shewed them his hands and his feet .
text2: Serɨ ta tʉuya a ' tai , tʉpokapɨtʉ ' pʉ ɨ rʉ ' pʉ enpoika ' pʉ iya mɨrɨ to ' ena ' .

text: And while they yet believed not for joy , and wondered , he said unto them , Have ye here any meat ?
text2: Pori ' pe kuru tesi kon ke , “ I ' napai rɨ se esi pen nɨ serɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . Mɨrɨpan kon pɨ ' ta ' pʉ iya , “ Kiyari pe ' moro nai enta ' nan nɨto ' ipɨ ' ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish , and of an honeycomb .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon uya irepa ' pʉ akuse pe ikanpʉ ' tɨsa ' moro ' ke .

text: And he took it , and did eat before them .
text2: Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' iyenta ' na ' pʉ to ' enu airɨ .

text: And he said unto them , These are the words which I spake unto you , while I was yet with you , that all things must be fulfilled , which were written in the law of Moses , and in the prophets , and in the psalms , concerning me .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon pɨ ' ta ' pʉ Sises uya , “ Ɨ ' koro ' tau ' nokon sa ' ne esi a ' tai , erikʉ rawɨrɨ , sekamatai ɨpɨ ' nokon ko tanporon nɨ Mosi ' Maimu , pu ' kena ' amʉ ' Maimu rɨ , Eren yau ' ne isauro ' sa ' na ' ne ' upɨ ' uta ' ku ' tɨto ' pe iyesi ukatai ko , ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: Then opened he their understanding , that they might understand the scriptures ,
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon uya tʉpɨ ' iye ' menukasa ' itekare to ' ka ' nʉ ' to ' pe to ' uya ikupʉ ' pʉ ,

text: And said unto them , Thus it is written , and thus it behoved Christ to suffer , and to rise from the dead the third day :
text2: To ' pɨ ' ekama ' pʉ iya , “ Serɨ serɨ iye ' menukasa ' rʉ ' pʉ : Kʉrai uya e ' ne ' moronkato ' oton , mɨrɨpan eri ' to ' oton , te ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ton pe itosorʉwano wʉi a ' tai .

text: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations , beginning at Jerusalem .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporon kon tʉpataron kon pɨ ' itekare usekamato ' oton itese ' yau , makoi apai era ' tɨn nɨto ' pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ makoi pɨ ' usentu ' man nɨto ' pɨ ' , Surusiran po te ' sara ' tɨi ' .

text: And ye are witnesses of these things .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , entantɨ ' tʉron kon kanan ipana ' tɨtantɨ ' ɨnene ' pʉ kon pɨ ' .

text: And , behold , I send the promise of my Father upon you : but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem , until ye be endued with power from on high .
text2: Serɨ pe iwa rɨ , ukʉipʉnʉ usaurokʉ ' pʉ ennoko uya ta ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ iya ' kwarʉ ennoko uya mɨrɨ ɨpiya ' nokon . Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , serɨ yau Surusiran po e ' tɨ ' Papa winon ɨmeruntɨrʉ kon eporo auya ' nokon pʉ ' kʉ pona , ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: And he led them out as far as to Bethany , and he lifted up his hands , and blessed them .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya to ' arɨ ' pʉ Surusiran poi a ' ko pe rɨ pata Pe ' tani piya ' . To ' uya eposa ' a ' tai , temiyatʉ tanʉnse to ' pʉrema ' pʉ iya .

text: And it came to pass , while he blessed them , he was parted from them , and carried up into heaven .
text2: To ' pʉrema pɨ ' iyesi koro ' tau , to ' nɨmɨ ' pʉ iya , itanʉmʉ ' pʉ Epʉn pona .

text: And they worshipped him , and returned to Jerusalem with great joy :
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton e ' sekunka ' pʉ apurɨpɨ ' se ' na . Mɨrɨpan kon enna ' po ' pʉ ipan pe rɨ pori ' pe esii ' ma Surusiran pona .

text: And were continually in the temple , praising and blessing God . Amen .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon esi ' pʉ Papa apurɨpɨtʉ pɨ ' , inke rɨ wʉi kaisa rɨ use ' man nɨto ' , ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' pʉ ' kʉ tau .

text: In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and the Word was God .
text2: Iyepiya ' tɨ yau Main esi ' pʉ , Papa piyau Main esi ' pʉ , Papa pe rɨ Main esi ' pʉ .

text: The same was in the beginning with God .
text2: Mɨrɨ rɨ esi ' pʉ iyepiya ' tɨ pe Papa piyau .

text: All things were made by him ; and without him was not any thing made that was made .
text2: Tanporon nɨ ekoneka ' pʉ iporo ; ɨ ' rɨ rɨ ekonekasa ' pʉra iyesi ipʉra iye ' tane .

text: In him was life ; and the life was the light of men .
text2: Uko ' man nɨto ' esi iyau , uko ' man nɨto ' esi ka ' pon amʉ ' weyu pe .

text: And the light shineth in darkness ; and the darkness comprehended it not .
text2: Mɨrɨ iweyu e ' wei ' tɨ ' pʉ ewarupɨ yau , e ' tane ewarupɨ uya ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ ' pʉ pen .

text: There was a man sent from God , whose name was John .
text2: Moro ka ' pon esi ' pʉ Papa nennoko ' pʉ , Isaan itese ' .

text: The same came for a witness , to bear witness of the Light , that all men through him might believe .
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ uyee ' pʉ iweyu enpoikai ' tanporon kon uya apurɨto ' pe tʉporo .

text: He was not that Light , but was sent to bear witness of that Light .
text2: Iweyu pe iyesi ' pʉ pen , e ' tane iweyu ekamanin pe enno ' sa ' pe iyesi ' pʉ .

text: That was the true Light , which lighteth every man that cometh into the world .
text2: Mɨrɨ esi ' pʉ i ' napairon iweyu , tanporon kon ka ' pon amʉ ' non pon kon wei ' tɨnin pe iyepʉ esi ' pʉ .

text: He was in the world , and the world was made by him , and the world knew him not .
text2: Non po iyesi ' pʉ , non nɨ ekonekasa ' e ' tane iporo , e ' tane non pon kon uya i ' tu pʉra iyesi ' pʉ .

text: He came unto his own , and his own received him not .
text2: Tʉtonpa ton piya ' iyee ' pʉ , e ' tane itonpa ton uya isanoma ' pʉ pen .

text: But as many as received him , to them gave he power to become the sons of God , even to them that believe on his name :
