text2: E ' tane kamoro tʉsanomanin nʉ ' san , tapurɨnin nʉ ' san repasa ' iya meruntɨ ke , Papa munkɨ pe to ' enato ' pe .

text: Which were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
text2: Mʉre amʉ ' , entu eseru yau iyentusa ' kon pen , ipun eseru awɨrɨ pen , warawo ' eseru awɨrɨ pen nɨ nɨrɨ , e ' tane Papa iwano ' pe kuru .

text: And the Word was made flesh , and dwelt among us , ( and we beheld his glory , the glory as of the only begotten of the Father , ) full of grace and truth .
text2: Mɨrɨ Main enasa ' esi ' pʉ ka ' pon pe , mɨrɨpan uko ' mamʉ ' pʉ ina piyau . Ina uya a ' kwa ene ' pʉ , tikin nan nʉ ' kwɨ kuru rɨ imu a ' kwarii , Ikʉipʉnʉ winɨ iye ' sa ' , eke pe rɨ wakʉ nonkasa ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' napairon esa ' pe .

text: John bare witness of him , and cried , saying , This was he of whom I spake , He that cometh after me is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Isaan uya ekama ' pʉ eke pe tʉukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnse , “ Pʉse rɨ si kʉrɨ rɨ unekama ' pʉ , ‘ Kʉrɨ rɨ si uye ' ma ' pʉ tau tʉuye ' ton esi mɨrɨ eke uyentaino , penaro ' uwapiyaro ' rʉ ' pʉ rɨ , ’ ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And of his fulness have all we received , and grace for grace .
text2: Eke pe wakʉ nonkasa ' esa ' pe e ' nɨ winɨ wakʉ ke upʉremasa ' iya ' nokon eporo ɨse ' ma ' pʉ tau ' ne rɨ .

text: For the law was given by Moses , but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ .
text2: Main e ' tʉrʉ ' pʉ Mosi ' poro , e ' tane wakʉ nonkasa ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' napairon uyee ' pʉ Sises Kʉrai poro .

text: No man hath seen God at any time ; the only begotten Son , which is in the bosom of the Father , he hath declared him .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' uya Papa ensa ' pʉra iyesi ; tikin nan kuru rɨ Papa Mumu , tʉkʉipʉnʉ enau te ' sen kʉrɨ rɨ uya rɨken enpoikasa ' i ' tuto ' pe .

text: And this is the record of John , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , Who art thou ?
text2: Serɨ esi Isaan maimu rʉ ' pʉ , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton Surusiran pon kon uya Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' tʉrawasomanin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Ripai amʉ ' enno ' sa ' Isaan ekama ' pose ' na a ' taino , ɨnʉ ' pe ɨwesi tukai ' .

text: And he confessed , and denied not ; but confessed , I am not the Christ .
text2: Iye ' wapu ' tɨ ' pʉ pen , e ' tane isekama ' pʉ , “ Kʉrai pen urɨ , ” tukai ' .

text: And they asked him , What then ? Art thou Elias ? And he saith , I am not . Art thou that prophet ? And he answered , No .
text2: To ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨnʉ ' pe ken ɨwesi ? Iraisa pe ' ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . “ Kane , ” ta ' pʉ iya . “ Pu ' kena ' katɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . “ Kane , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? that we may give an answer to them that sent us . What sayest thou of thyself ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ɨnʉ ' pe ken ɨwesi , ina enno ' nin nʉ ' san pɨ ' ina uya ekamato ' pe . Ɨnʉ ' pe ɨwesi ta auya ken ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: He said , I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness , Make straight the way of the Lord , as said the prophet Esaias .
text2: Isaan uya eikʉ ' pʉ pu ' kena ' Aisaya maimu yai , “ Urɨ kʉrɨ rɨ rɨmono ' tau ka ' pon ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉ , ‘ To ' sa rɨ Itepuru e ' ma ikonekatɨ ' , ’ tawon , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And they which were sent were of the Pharisees .
text2: Kamoro esi ' pʉ tʉtonpa kon enno ' sa ' Pari ' si amʉ ' uya pe .

text: And they asked him , and said unto him , Why baptizest thou then , if thou be not that Christ , nor Elias , neither that prophet ?
text2: To ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe ken iyesi pɨ ' ɨmɨrɨ uya to ' pa ' taisima , Kʉrai pe pʉra rɨ , Iraisa pe pʉra rɨ , pu ' kena ' pe pʉra rɨ ɨwe ' tane ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: John answered them , saying , I baptize with water : but there standeth one among you , whom ye know not ;
text2: Isaan uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Urɨ uya to ' pa ' taisima tuna ke . E ' tane moro man ɨ ' koro ' tau ' nokon , ɨni ' tunʉ kon pen .

text: He it is , who coming after me is preferred before me , whose shoe ' s latchet I am not worthy to unloose .
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ esi tʉuye ' sen uye ' ma ' pʉ pe , isapatooi euka uya pokena ' pen nɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan , where John was baptizing .
text2: Serɨ ton e ' kupʉ ' pʉ Pe ' tani pata yau , Isotan tuna ratoi po , Isaan uya ka ' pon amʉ ' pa ' taisimato ' airɨ .

text: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him , and saith , Behold the Lamb of God , which taketh away the sin of the world .
text2: Mɨrɨ ema ' sa ' yau , Isaan uya Sises uyepʉ tekare pɨ ' ene ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ , “ Pʉse rɨ si Papa iwano ' karimeru mʉre , non makooi mo ' kanin !

text: This is he of whom I said , After me cometh a man which is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Pʉse rɨ si kʉrɨ rɨ unekama ' pʉ , ‘ Uye ' ma ' pʉ tau ka ' pon uyepʉ eke kuru uyentaino , penaro ' uwapiyaro ' rʉ ' pʉ rɨ , ’ ukataine ' .

text: And I knew him not : but that he should be made manifest to Israel , therefore am I come baptizing with water .
text2: Urɨ uya rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ i ' tusa ' pʉra iyesi , ɨnʉ ' pe iyesi tukai ' , e ' tane uye ' sa ' na ' ne ' esi pa ' taisiman nɨse ' na tuna ke Esuwerʉ amʉ ' ena ' enpoika pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And John bare record , saying , I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove , and it abode upon him .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai Isaan uya se ekama ' pʉ : “ Iya ' kwarʉ u ' tɨ ene ' pʉ uya Epʉn poi wako ' wa kasa , mɨrɨpan uta ' si ' pʉ ipona .

text: And I knew him not : but he that sent me to baptize with water , the same said unto me , Upon whom thou shalt see the Spirit descending , and remaining on him , the same is he which baptizeth with the Holy Ghost .
text2: I ' tu uya pʉra rɨ marɨ iyesi ' pʉ . E ' tane uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ pa ' taisimanin pe tuna ke uya uyauro ' kasa ' esi ' pʉ , ‘ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ pona Iya ' kwarʉ uyepʉ ene auya a ' tai , uta ' si rɨ nɨrɨ ipo te ' ton pe , kʉrɨ rɨ si kʉrɨ rɨ Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ ke pa ' taisimanin , ’ ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And I saw , and bare record that this is the Son of God .
text2: Unene ' pʉ si ekama uya , pʉse rɨ si esi Papa Mumu pe , ” ta ' pʉ Isaan uya .

text: Again the next day after John stood , and two of his disciples ;
text2: Mɨrɨ ema ' sa ' yau , mɨrɨ yau rɨ marɨ Isaan esi ' pʉ , asa ' ron kon tʉpoitorʉ ton pokon pe .

text: And looking upon Jesus as he walked , he saith , Behold the Lamb of God !
text2: Sises usarɨ uya tentaka kon ensa ' tʉuya a ' tai , “ Pʉse rɨ si Papa iwano ' karimeru mʉre ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And the two disciples heard him speak , and they followed Jesus .
text2: Asa ' ron kon ipoitorʉ ton uya isaurokʉ etasa ' a ' tai , to ' uya Sises e ' ma ' pʉka ' pʉ .

text: Then Jesus turned , and saw them following , and saith unto them , What seek ye ? They said unto him , Rabbi , ( which is to say , being interpreted , Master , ) where dwellest thou ?
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises era ' tɨsa ' uya te ' ma ' pʉka to ' uya ene ' pʉ . “ Ɨ ' rɨ warinpa auya ' nokon ? ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' . “ Rapai ( Ti ' sa ta e ' kwa pe ) , nai airɨ apata ' se ' esi ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: He saith unto them , Come and see . They came and saw where he dwelt , and abode with him that day : for it was about the tenth hour .
text2: “ Entanʉ ' tɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' . To ' utɨ ' pʉ ipata ' se ' ense ' na . Ipiyau to ' uko ' mamʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ wʉi a ' tai , apʉne pʉra pata uko ' mansa ' esi ' pʉ ( 4 a ' kʉra ' e ' to ' airɨ pata esi ' pʉ ) .

text: One of the two which heard John speak , and followed him , was Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother .
text2: Isakon , Isaan usaurokʉ etanin nʉ ' pʉ , Sises e ' ma ' pʉkanin nʉ ' pʉ esi ' pʉ Anturu , Saiman Pi ' ta akon .

text: He first findeth his own brother Simon , and saith unto him , We have found the Messias , which is , being interpreted , the Christ .
text2: Wapiya kuru tʉrui Saiman warinpai ' itɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ina uya Me ' saya eposa ' man , Kʉrai tato ' ipɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And he brought him to Jesus . And when Jesus beheld him , he said , Thou art Simon the son of Jona : thou shalt be called Cephas , which is by interpretation , A stone .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya Sises piya ' inee ' pʉ . Sises uya ene ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ɨmɨrɨ kʉrɨ rɨ Saiman , Isaan mu , Ke ' pas pe ɨyesa ' to ' oton ( Tɨ ' ta e ' kwa pe ) , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee , and findeth Philip , and saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Mɨrɨ ema ' sa ' yau , Sises ekoneka ' pʉ Kiyarari pona tʉutɨto ' pe . Piri ' eporo ' pʉ iya , ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' , “ Upɨkɨrɨ ɨsi ' kɨ . ”

text: Now Philip was of Bethsaida , the city of Andrew and Peter .
text2: Piri ' esi ' pʉ Pe ' saita winon , Anturu mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pi ' ta pata ' se ' winon pe .

text: Philip findeth Nathanael , and saith unto him , We have found him , of whom Moses in the law , and the prophets , did write , Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph .
text2: Piri ' uya Na ' taniyerʉ eporo ' pʉ , ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' , “ Mosi ' nʉmenuka ' pʉ Main yau , pu ' kena ' ton nɨ nɨrɨ nʉmenuka ' pʉ ipɨ ' , Sises , Nasare ' winon , Isose ' mumu eposa ' ina uya man , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Nathanael said unto him , Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth ? Philip saith unto him , Come and see .
text2: Na ' taniyerʉ uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Wakʉ pe ' epa ' ka mɨ Nasare ' poi ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . “ Apʉne entanʉ ' kɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Piri ' uya ipɨ ' .

text: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him , and saith of him , Behold an Israelite indeed , in whom is no guile !
text2: Sises uya Na ' taniyerʉ uyepʉ tekare pɨ ' ensa ' a ' tai , ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' , “ Apʉne enkɨ , Esuwerʉ kuru rɨ , enku ' tɨnin pen nɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Nathanael saith unto him , Whence knowest thou me ? Jesus answered and said unto him , Before that Philip called thee , when thou wast under the fig tree , I saw thee .
text2: Na ' taniyerʉ uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ɨ ' rɨ kasa ui ' tu auya ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . Sises uya imaimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Piri ' uya ɨkɨ ' ma wapiya , pi ' e ' o ' no ɨwesi a ' tai , ɨyene ' pʉ uya , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Nathanael answered and saith unto him , Rabbi , thou art the Son of God ; thou art the King of Israel .
text2: Na ' taniyerʉ uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Rapai , ɨmɨrɨ esi Papa Mumu pe , ɨmɨrɨ esi Esuwerʉ amʉ ' Kin pe ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Because I said unto thee , I saw thee under the fig tree , believest thou ? thou shalt see greater things than these .
text2: Sises uya imaimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Pi ' e ' o ' no ɨyene ' pʉ uya tasa ' uya ɨpɨ ' pɨ ' rɨ pe ' uyapurɨ auya ? Mɨrɨ entaino kuru ento ' auya oton mɨrɨ .

text: And he saith unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Hereafter ye shall see heaven open , and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , serɨ tʉpo Epʉn uta ' koka ento ' auya ' nokon oton , Papa inserʉʉi ton u ' tɨpɨtʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ enu ' pɨtʉ Ka ' pon , Papa winon pona , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee ; and the mother of Jesus was there :
text2: Asa ' rɨ wʉi tʉpo moro temari ' masan esi ' pʉ Kena po , Kiyarari airɨ . Mɨrɨ yau , Sises san esi ' pʉ .

text: And both Jesus was called , and his disciples , to the marriage .
text2: Sises mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipoitorʉ ton kɨ ' masa ' to ' uya esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ pona .

text: And when they wanted wine , the mother of Jesus saith unto him , They have no wine .
text2: To ' yuku , waain u ' ma ' sa ' a ' tai , isan uya , “ To ' yuku , waain u ' matʉ ' pʉ man , ” ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , what have I to do with thee ? mine hour is not yet come .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Mɨrɨ iku ' kɨ kʉkai upɨ ' , ma ' non . Uweyu e ' seposa ' pʉra rɨ marɨ man , ” tukai ' .

text: His mother saith unto the servants , Whatsoever he saith unto you , do it .
text2: Isan uya nin si ta ' pʉ mɨrɨ to ' poitorʉ ton pɨ ' , “ Mɨrɨ iku ' tɨ ' ta iya mʉku ' tʉi ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone , after the manner of the purifying of the Jews , containing two or three firkins apiece .
text2: Esuwerʉ amʉ ' eseru esi ' pʉ ekorʉkan tawon , mɨrɨ to ' nin si 6 kaisaron tuna yen ton tɨ ' ka ' pɨ ' sa ' wai amʉ ' esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ , eke ton kuru rɨ , 20 , 30 kiyaran e ' to ' airɨ tuna a ' sinin .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Fill the waterpots with water . And they filled them up to the brim .
text2: Sises uya nin si , “ Se ton wai amʉ ' ipe ' tɨpɨ ' tɨ ' tuna ke , ” ta ' pʉ mɨrɨ to ' poitorʉ ton pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan pe ' tɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ to ' uya ite ' pi ton tepopɨ ' se .

text: And he saith unto them , Draw out now , and bear unto the governor of the feast . And they bare it .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ nin si , “ Imatɨ ' si , arɨ kon pa uta ' re ' tɨn epuru piya ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya arɨ ' pʉ itena ' .

text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine , and knew not whence it was : ( but the servants which drew the water knew ; ) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom ,
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya onpa ' pʉ , tuna si enasa ' waain pe . I ' tu iya pʉra iyesi ' pʉ nai winɨ iye ' seposa ' tukai ' ( e ' tane to ' poitorʉ ton uya rɨken i ' tu ' pʉ ) . Mɨrɨpan uya warawo ' , temari ' masen kɨ ' ma ' pʉ ,

text: And saith unto him , Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine ; and when men have well drunk , then that which is worse : but thou hast kept the good wine until now .
text2: mɨrɨpan uya , “ Tanporon kon nɨ sa ' ne wapiya wakʉ kuru waain ekannin nan ko , tanporo ikɨ ' masa ' kon uya nin si ; ensika ' sa ' a ' tai te ' sen nʉ ' kwɨ rɨ nin si ekamʉ to ' uya mɨrɨ . E ' tane wakʉ kuru rɨ enkurunpasa ' auya man ko serɨ pʉ ' kʉ pona ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee , and manifested forth his glory ; and his disciples believed on him .
text2: Serɨ si mɨrɨ ti ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ ku ' pɨtʉ tʉuya sara ' tɨ ' pʉ Sises uya Kena po , Kiyarari airɨ . Mɨrɨ si tʉmeruntɨrʉ enpoika ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan apurɨ ' pʉ ipoitorʉ ton uya .

text: After this he went down to Capernaum , he , and his mother , and his brethren , and his disciples : and they continued there not many days .
text2: Serɨ pata ' pʉ pe , iu ' tɨ ' pʉ Ka ' paneyan pona , tʉsan , takon non mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉpoitorʉ ton pokon pe . Mɨrɨ yau to ' uko ' mamʉ ' pʉ aka ' ne ' pe rɨ .

text: And the Jews ' passover was at hand , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem ,
text2: Esuwerʉ amʉ ' uya Itepoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ ku ' to ' weyu e ' seporo esi ' pʉ , mɨrɨ pɨ ' Sises utɨ ' pʉ Surusiran pona .

text: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves , and the changers of money sitting :
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' pʉ ' kʉ tau , ka ' pon amʉ ' uya paka amʉ ' , karimeru amʉ ' , wako ' wa amʉ ' kʉrʉpo ' poma eporo ' pʉ , pʉrata ensimapɨ ' nin nan nɨ ereutapɨ ' sa ' esi ' pʉ tʉtepʉrʉʉi kon piyau ' ne .

text: And when he had made a scourge of small cords , he drove them all out of the temple , and the sheep , and the oxen ; and poured out the changers ' money , and overthrew the tables ;
text2: Si ' na ' amʉ ' tʉkonekai ' to ' ari ' po ' pɨ ' to ' tʉuya ike pe , paka amʉ ' , karimeru amʉ ' enpa ' kanʉkʉ ' pʉ iya ; pʉrata ensimanin nan tepʉrʉʉi rawoipɨtʉ ' pʉ iya , to ' pʉrataai tʉrʉ ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ iya .

text: And said unto them that sold doves , Take these things hence ; make not my Father ' s house an house of merchandise .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' wako ' wa amʉ ' kʉrʉpo ' pomanin nan pɨ ' , “ To ' akanʉ ' tɨ ' serɨ tapai , ukʉipʉnʉ iwʉ ' kʉ ' ku ' tʉu kʉrʉpo ' po pɨ ' e ' nɨ iwʉ ' pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And his disciples remembered that it was written , The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up .
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton enu ya ' iyee ' pʉ iye ' menukasa ' itekare , “ Papa , ɨiwʉ ' kuru wenai uta ' kwarʉka ukɨrɨ ' nʉkʉ pɨ ' man , ” tawon .

text: Then answered the Jews and said unto him , What sign shewest thou unto us , seeing that thou doest these things ?
text2: Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton uyee ' pʉ ekama ' poi ' , “ Ɨ ' rɨ ɨi ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ kupʉ auya , serɨ ku ' to ' auya ekamanin pe ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up .
text2: Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Se Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' , ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' a ' morʉkatɨ ' , amɨto ' pe uya osorʉwau wʉi yau , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then said the Jews , Forty and six years was this temple in building , and wilt thou rear it up in three days ?
text2: “ Osorʉwau wʉi yau si serɨ amɨ auya kanan ? ” tukai ' to ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ . “ 46 kaisa rɨ sa ' ne wʉipiya amɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ serɨ ko , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: But he spake of the temple of his body .
text2: E ' tane use ' man nɨto ' , ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' Sises nʉsauro ' ai ' ne ' ipɨ ' esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ tʉmɨrɨ pun pɨ ' rɨ nin .

text: When therefore he was risen from the dead , his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them ; and they believed the scripture , and the word which Jesus had said .
text2: Mɨrɨpan nin si e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' a ' tai terikʉ tʉpo , ipoitorʉ ton enu ya ' iyee ' pʉ mɨrɨ , serɨ ta ' pʉ iya rʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya pena iye ' menukasa ' rʉ ' pʉ itekare apurɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Sises maimu rʉ ' pʉ .

text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover , in the feast day , many believed in his name , when they saw the miracles which he did .
text2: Sises esi koro ' tau Surusiran po , To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ kupʉ to ' uya a ' tai , tu ' kan kon uya rɨ apurɨ ' pʉ , eke Papa tʉrawasooi ti ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ kupʉ iya ene tʉuya ' nokon pɨ ' .

text: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them , because he knew all men ,
text2: E ' tane Sises uya to ' apurɨ ' pʉ pen , apʉne pʉra mɨrɨ waraino kon tukai ' to ' i ' tu tʉuya wenai .

text: And needed not that any should testify of man : for he knew what was in man .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ipana ' tɨto ' pʉra iyesi ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' , apʉne pʉra to ' ewan nɨ i ' tu iya wenai .

text: There was a man of the Pharisees , named Nicodemus , a ruler of the Jews :
text2: Moro ka ' pon esi ' pʉ Nekutimas itese ' , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru , Pari ' si amʉ ' tonpa pe te ' sen .

text: The same came to Jesus by night , and said unto him , Rabbi , we know that thou art a teacher come from God : for no man can do these miracles that thou doest , except God be with him .
text2: Itɨ ' pʉ ewarupɨ nau Sises piya ' , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ina uya ɨi ' tu , Rapai , Papa nennoko ' pʉ pe . Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ i ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ kupʉ pʉra rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ mʉku ' ai ' ne ' , Papa pʉra iye ' tane tʉpiyau , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born again , he cannot see the kingdom of God .
text2: Entakanoma pe Sises uya ekama ' pʉ , “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' , ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe ene pʉra rɨ iyesi iyakon ite ' kwa pe iyentuka ' sa ' pʉra te ' tane , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Nicodemus saith unto him , How can a man be born when he is old ? can he enter the second time into his mother ' s womb , and be born ?
text2: “ Nai kasa si isemo ' kaka ' sa ' rɨ ka ' pon entukapʉ kanan iyakon ite ' kwa pe ? ” tukai ' Sises ekama ' po ' pʉ iya . “ Iyewonkapʉ poken pʉra rɨ sa ' ne iyesi tʉsan ewan ya ' tentuka ' to ' pe iyakon ite ' kwa pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus answered , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit , he cannot enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' , ɨnʉ ' rɨ epa ' ka Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe ya ' pʉra iyesi mɨrɨ tentusa ' a ' tai rɨken , tuna mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iya ' kwarʉ ke iyepa ' ka .

text: That which is born of the flesh is flesh ; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit .
text2: Ka ' pon entusa ' mɨrɨ tʉpun ke tʉsanon winɨ , e ' tane iyentuka ' sa ' kanan iya ' kwarʉ yau esi mɨrɨ iya ' kwarʉ winon pe rɨ .

text: Marvel not that I said unto thee , Ye must be born again .
text2: Kɨsewansiukai , ‘ Tanporo ɨyentukapʉ kon kanan mɨrɨ , ’ ta uya pɨ ' ɨpɨ ' .

text: The wind bloweth where it listeth , and thou hearest the sound thereof , but canst not tell whence it cometh , and whither it goeth : so is every one that is born of the Spirit .
text2: A ' setun utɨ mɨrɨ i ' se te ' to ' awɨrɨ rɨ . Imaimu eta auya , e ' tane mɨrɨ winɨ iyepʉ , miyarɨ itɨ tukai ' i ' tu auya pʉra rɨ iyesi . Mɨrɨ kasa tanporon kon esi mɨrɨ iyentusa ' kon iya ' kwarʉ winɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Nicodemus answered and said unto him , How can these things be ?
text2: “ Nai kasa si serɨ esi ? ” ta ' pʉ Nekutimas uya mɨrɨ pɨ ' .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Art thou a master of Israel , and knowest not these things ?
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Eke sa ' ne Esuwerʉ amʉ ' ti ' saai ɨmɨrɨ ko , mɨrɨ pe ' e ' tane serɨ i ' tu auya pʉra iyesi ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , We speak that we do know , and testify that we have seen ; and ye receive not our witness .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' , ina usaurokʉ serɨ ina ni ' tunʉ pɨ ' , tʉnene ' pʉ kon ekama ina uya , e ' tane ina maimu ananʉnpai pʉra ɨnʉ ' rɨ esi .

text: If I have told you earthly things , and ye believe not , how shall ye believe , if I tell you of heavenly things ?
text2: Uyapurɨ auya pʉra iyesi serɨ non pon pɨ ' ayauro ' ka tane uya , nai kasa ken si uyapurɨ auya Epʉn pon pɨ ' ayauro ' ka uya yau ?

text: And no man hath ascended up to heaven , but he that came down from heaven , even the Son of man which is in heaven .
text2: “ Mɨrɨpan , ɨnʉ ' rɨ kanan enu ' sa ' pʉra iyesi Epʉn pona , Ka ' pon , Papa winon nɨken Epʉn winon .

text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the Son of man be lifted up :
text2: Mosi ' uya karukuri ka ' sa ' ɨkʉi pe i ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ yʉi pɨ ' rɨmono ' tau kasa rɨ marɨ , Ka ' pon , Papa winon i ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' pe iyesi ,

text: That whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have eternal life .
text2: tanporon kon si apurɨnin nan uya tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko ' man nɨto ' epoto ' pe .

text: For God so loved the world , that he gave his only begotten Son , that whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have everlasting life .
text2: “ Ipan pe serɨ non pon kon i ' nʉnka tʉuya wenai , Papa uya tikin nan kuru tʉmu tʉrʉ ' pʉ tanporo apurɨnin nan pe te ' san uma ' ta namai ' , e ' tane tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko ' man nɨto ' epoto ' pe to ' uya .

text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world ; but that the world through him might be saved .
text2: Papa uya tʉmu enno ' sa ' pʉra iyesi serɨ non pon kon eseru aimenkanin pe , e ' tane to ' epika ' tɨto ' pe iporo .

text: He that believeth on him is not condemned : but he that believeth not is condemned already , because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ imu apurɨnin eseru aimenka pen , apurɨnin pen eseru aimenkaka ' sa ' rɨ nin mɨrɨ , apʉne pʉra tikin nan kuru rɨ Papa Mumu apurɨsa ' iya kasa pʉra .

text: And this is the condemnation , that light is come into the world , and men loved darkness rather than light , because their deeds were evil .
text2: “ Serɨ kasa si Papa uya eseru aimenka mɨrɨ : Iweyu uye ' sa ' non pona , e ' tane ka ' pon amʉ ' uya ewarupɨ i ' nʉnka iweyu entai , ɨri pe teseru kon esi ke .

text: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light , neither cometh to the light , lest his deeds should be reproved .
text2: Tanporon kon ɨri kupʉ pɨ ' te ' san uya iweyu ewaruma ' tɨ . Iweyu winɨkʉi ' to ' uyepʉ pʉra iyesi , teseru kon usenpoika namai ' .

text: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light , that his deeds may be made manifest , that they are wrought in God .
text2: E ' tane kʉrɨ rɨ i ' napairon ku ' nin uyepʉ iweyu ya ' , wakʉ teseru usento ' pe Papa eseru awɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea ; and there he tarried with them , and baptized .
text2: Serɨ ton tʉpo , tʉpoitorʉ ton pokon pe Sises utɨ ' pʉ Isutiya pona . Mɨrɨ yau iko ' mamʉ ' pʉ epa ' taisiman nɨto ' kupʉ pɨ ' .

text: And John also was baptizing in Aenon near to Salim , because there was much water there : and they came , and were baptized .
text2: Isaan nɨrɨ esi ' pʉ pa ' taisiman pɨ ' Inon yau , Sarin piyau , apʉne pʉra eke pe tuna esi pɨ ' mɨrɨ yau . Ka ' pon amʉ ' utɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ ipiya ' inke rɨ epa ' taisimai ' .

text: For John was not yet cast into prison .
text2: ( Serɨ esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ Isaan tʉrʉ rawɨrɨ pariki ' si ta ' . )

text: Then there arose a question between some of John ' s disciples and the Jews about purifying .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , e ' sei ' pɨ ' nɨto ' esi ' pʉ Isaan poitorʉ ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Esuwerʉ pokon pe ekorʉkan nɨto ' pɨ ' .

text: And they came unto John , and said unto him , Rabbi , he that was with thee beyond Jordan , to whom thou barest witness , behold , the same baptizeth , and all men come to him .
text2: To ' uyee ' pʉ Isaan piya ' , ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' , “ Rapai , kʉrɨ rɨ ɨpiyau ne ' taine ' Isotan ratoi po mekamataine ' , kʉrɨ rɨ si man epa ' taisiman nɨto ' kupʉ pɨ ' , tanporon kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uyepʉ ipiya ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: John answered and said , A man can receive nothing , except it be given him from heaven .
text2: Isaan uya to ' maimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ rɨ eporo ka ' pon uya pʉra iyesi , Epʉn winɨ rɨken tʉrepasa ' a ' tai eporo iya pe iyesi .

text: Ye yourselves bear me witness , that I said , I am not the Christ , but that I am sent before him .
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon uya eta ' pʉ , ‘ Kʉrai pen urɨ ; iwapiya enno ' sa ' pe esi , ’ ta ' pʉ uya .

text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom : but the friend of the bridegroom , which standeth and heareth him , rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom ' s voice : this my joy therefore is fulfilled .
text2: “ Temari ' masen uri ' san esi mɨrɨ temari ' masen warawo ' iwano ' pe rɨ . E ' tane si tɨ , temari ' masen warawo ' tonpa esi ipiyau imaimu eta pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan esi pori ' pe imaimu eta tʉuya a ' tai . Mɨrɨ kasa si pori ' pe e ' to ' e ' seposa ' serɨ , mararon pe pʉra .

text: He must increase , but I must decrease .
text2: Eke pe iyena , aiko pe ena tane .

text: He that cometh from above is above all : he that is of the earth is earthly , and speaketh of the earth : he that cometh from heaven is above all .
text2: “ Kʉrɨ rɨ ka ' tapai tʉuye ' sen esi mɨrɨ tanporon kon entai rɨ ; kʉrɨ rɨ non winon esi mɨrɨ non pon pe rɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ non pɨ ' nɨrɨ isaurokʉ . Kʉrɨ rɨ ka ' tapai tʉuye ' sen esi tanporon kon entai .

text: And what he hath seen and heard , that he testifieth ; and no man receiveth his testimony .
text2: Tʉnene ' pʉ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉneta ' pʉ ekama iya , e ' tane ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ imaimu apurɨ pʉra iyesi .

text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ i ' napai rɨ imaimu anʉmʉ pɨ ' na ' ne ' , i ' napai rɨ Papa esi tukai ' ekama iya mɨrɨ .

text: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God : for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him .
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ Papa nennoko ' pʉ usaurokʉ Papa maimu pɨ ' , Papa uya eke pe ta ' kwarʉ tʉrʉ ipona tʉpʉ ' kʉ ke pʉra .

text: The Father loveth the Son , and hath given all things into his hand .
text2: Ikʉipʉnʉ uya tʉmu i ' nʉnka , tanporon nɨ nɨrɨ tʉsa ' iya itena ' .

text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life : and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life ; but the wrath of God abideth on him .
text2: Kʉrɨ imu apurɨto ' esa ' pe na ' ne ' uya tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko ' man nɨto ' eporo , e ' tane imu apurɨnin pen uya uko ' man nɨto ' ento ' oton pen , apʉne pʉra Papa uya kota ' man nɨto ' uko ' mamʉ ipo , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John ,
text2: Pari ' si amʉ ' uya eta ' pʉ Sises uya tu ' ke kuru tʉpoitorʉ ton eporo mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' pa ' taisimapɨtʉ iya Isaan entai kuru tawon .

text: ( Though Jesus himself baptized not , but his disciples , )
text2: Sises uya kuru ɨnʉ ' rɨ pa ' taisimasa ' pʉra rɨ iye ' tane , ipoitorʉ ton uya rɨken nɨ nin tɨ .

text: He left Judaea , and departed again into Galilee .
text2: Sises uya mɨrɨ tawon etasa ' a ' tai , iyenna ' po ' pʉ Isutiya poi Kiyarari pona .

text: And he must needs go through Samaria .
text2: Sameriya poro itɨto ' e ' ma esi ' pʉ .

text: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria , which is called Sychar , near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
text2: Iyee ' pʉ pata pona Sameriya pon Si ' karʉ itese ' , ɨnnon kuru pen nɨ non Seko ' nʉtʉrʉ ' pʉ tʉmu Isose ' ena ' piyapai .

text: Now Jacob ' s well was there . Jesus therefore , being wearied with his journey , sat thus on the well : and it was about the sixth hour .
text2: Mɨrɨ yau , Seko ' tuna ' kwaai yen esi ' pʉ , Sises nin si useta ' kasa ' tʉutɨ ke rɨ , ereuta ' pʉ mɨrɨ tuna yen piyau . 12 a ' kʉra ' pata esi ' pʉ .

text: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water : Jesus saith unto her , Give me to drink .
text2: Sameriya pon uri ' san uyee ' pʉ tuna kan , mɨrɨpan pɨ ' , “ Uyuku tuna ɨntʉkɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: ( For his disciples were gone away unto the city to buy meat . )
text2: ( Ipoitorʉ ton utɨ ' pʉ esi ' pʉ pata pona kiyari ennai ' . )

text: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him , How is it that thou , being a Jew , askest drink of me , which am a woman of Samaria ? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans .
text2: Mɨrɨpan eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Esuwerʉ pon sa ' ne ɨmɨrɨ ko ; urɨ esi Sameriya pon pe . Nai kasa mairɨ uyekama ' po auya ɨuku pɨ ' ? ” ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' . ( Esuwerʉ amʉ ' esi ' pʉ ɨsipʉsawʉ pokon kon pe pʉra . )

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , If thou knewest the gift of God , and who it is that saith to thee , Give me to drink ; thou wouldest have asked of him , and he would have given thee living water .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ I ' tunin pe ɨwesi yau Papa e ' repato ' ike mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨnʉ ' uya ɨyekama ' po tukai ' , mekama ' poi ' no , mɨrɨpan uya ɨwo ' pa ' pʉ nesii ' no to ' panʉ ' nin tuna ke , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , thou hast nothing to draw with , and the well is deep : from whence then hast thou that living water ?
text2: “ Itepuru , ɨpo ' ki ' tii pʉra iyesi ; i ' nau ya ' mu tuna yen esi . Nai yawon to ' panʉ ' nin tuna eporo auya ?

text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob , which gave us the well , and drank thereof himself , and his children , and his cattle ?
text2: Utamokori kon Seko ' uya repan nʉ ' pʉ ike serɨ tuna yen , kʉrɨ rɨ , imunkɨ amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itikʉn non nɨ uya tuna ensipɨtʉ ' pʉ iyapai . Kʉrɨ rɨ entai kuru rɨ katɨ eke pe ɨwesi ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ serɨ tuna ensinin nʉ ' pʉ e ' tuna ' kiripakapʉ kanan mɨrɨ ,

text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst ; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life .
text2: e ' tane ɨnʉ ' rɨ tʉwo ' pa ' pʉ uya ensinin nʉ ' pʉ e ' tuna ' kiripa pen nɨ nin mɨrɨ . Tuna iwo ' pa ' pʉ uya ike ena i ' napaino rɨ i ' tuna ' kwaai pe rɨ , mɨrɨpan uya to ' panʉ ' nin tuna ke irepa , iko ' manto ' ike ke tɨwɨrɨ rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , give me this water , that I thirst not , neither come hither to draw .
text2: “ Itepuru , uwo ' paka ' kɨ ken si mɨrɨ tuna ke , tuna ' kiri ' ke esi namai ' , mɨrɨ enta ' tuna kan nɨ uyepʉ namai ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Go , call thy husband , and come hither .
text2: “ Ataan ' pʉ ikɨ ' mata ɨuye ' kapʉ pa kanan serɨ ya ' , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: The woman answered and said , I have no husband . Jesus said unto her , Thou hast well said , I have no husband :
text2: “ Tʉtaan ' pʉ kenan pen urɨ , ” ta ' pʉ uri ' san uya ipɨ ' . Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ipoken nɨ ausaurokʉ , ‘ Tʉtaan ' pʉ kenan pen urɨ , ’ ta auya a ' tai .

text: For thou hast had five husbands ; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband : in that saidst thou truly .
text2: 5 kaisaron kon ya ' ɨyemari ' mapɨ ' sa ' man , kʉrɨ rɨ kanan si ipiyau me ' ai ' ne ' ataan ' pʉ kuru pen nɨ kanan . I ' napairɨ rɨ ɨusekamasa ' mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , I perceive that thou art a prophet .
text2: “ Itepuru , pu ' kena ' pe kɨnyi ' tuyai ' .

text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain ; and ye say , that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship .
text2: Utamokori kon ɨpʉremapɨtʉ ' pʉ serɨ wʉ ' po , e ' tane si serɨ pe ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon Esuwerʉ amʉ ' uya Surusiran kuru mɨrɨ Papa pɨ ' ɨpʉreman pata ta auya ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , believe me , the hour cometh , when ye shall neither in this mountain , nor yet at Jerusalem , worship the Father .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Uyapurɨkɨ uri ' san , iweyu uye ' nɨ pɨ ' man ikʉipʉnʉ pɨ ' ka ' pon amʉ ' ɨpʉremato ' oton pen serɨ wʉ ' po mɨrɨ pe pʉra Surusiran po rɨ .

text: Ye worship ye know not what : we know what we worship : for salvation is of the Jews .
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon Sameriya pon kon uya i ' tu pʉra rɨ iyesi ɨwɨpʉremato ' kon ipɨ ' ; e ' tane ina ɨpʉrema tʉni ' tunʉ kon pɨ ' , apʉne pʉra epika ' tɨn nɨto ' uyepʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' winɨ .

text: But the hour cometh , and now is , when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth : for the Father seeketh such to worship him .
text2: E ' tane iweyu uyepʉ , iye ' ka ' sa ' rɨ , i ' napai rɨ tʉwɨpʉremasan ɨpʉremato ' oton ikʉipʉnʉ pɨ ' , a ' kwarʉ yau mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' napairon yau . Pʉsamoro waraino kon tʉpɨ ' tʉwɨpʉremasan warinpa ikʉipʉnʉ uya mɨrɨ .

text: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
text2: Papa esi a ' kwarʉ pe ; kamoro ipɨ ' tʉwɨpʉremasan ɨpʉremato ' pe iyesi a ' kwarʉ yau mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' napairon yau , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: The woman saith unto him , I know that Messias cometh , which is called Christ : when he is come , he will tell us all things .
text2: Uri ' san uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Si ' tuyai ' , Me ' saya ” ( Kʉrai tato ' ) “ uye ' to ' oton . Iye ' sa ' a ' tai , tanporon nɨ ekamato ' iya oton mɨrɨ upɨ ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus saith unto her , I that speak unto thee am he .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Kʉrɨ rɨ rɨ urɨ , kʉrɨ rɨ rɨ usauro ' nɨ pɨ ' na ' ne ' ɨpokon pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And upon this came his disciples , and marvelled that he talked with the woman : yet no man said , What seekest thou ? or , Why talkest thou with her ?
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai rɨ , Sises poitorʉ ton enna ' posa ' uyee ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon usewansiuka ' pʉ ipan pe rɨ , uri ' san pokon pe isaurokʉ tepose . E ' tane ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ i ' se ɨwesi pɨ ' auro ' ka auya ? ” ta ' pʉ pen nɨ ipɨ ' , mɨrɨ pe pʉra , “ Ɨ ' rɨto ' pe ipokon pe ausaurokʉ ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya pen nɨ Sises pɨ ' .

text: The woman then left her waterpot , and went her way into the city , and saith to the men ,
text2: Mɨrɨpan uri ' san uya tʉ ' tuna ' kwaai yen nɨmɨ ' pʉ , iyenna ' po ' pʉ pata pona , mɨrɨpan uya ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' ta ' pʉ mɨrɨ yau ,

text: Come , see a man , which told me all things that ever I did : is not this the Christ ?
text2: “ Ka ' pon entanʉ ' tɨ ' tanporon nɨ unku ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ ekamasa ' iya upɨ ' . Kʉrai pe pe ' si pʉse rɨ esi serɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then they went out of the city , and came unto him .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon utɨ ' pʉ pata apai Sises piya ' .

text: In the mean while his disciples prayed him , saying , Master , eat .
text2: Mɨrɨ koro ' tau , ipoitorʉ ton uya Sises pɨ ' , “ Rapai , enta ' nakɨ , ” ta ' pʉ .

text: But he said unto them , I have meat to eat that ye know not of .
text2: E ' tane to ' eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Ui ' kiyari esi mɨrɨ moro ɨni ' tunʉ kon pen nɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Therefore said the disciples one to another , Hath any man brought him ought to eat ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' ipoitorʉ ton usekama ' popɨtʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ pe ' iti ' kiyari nee ' pʉ pe iyesi ? ” tukai ' .

text: Jesus saith unto them , My meat is to do the will of him that sent me , and to finish his work .
text2: “ Ui ' kiyari esi , uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ maimu awɨrɨ e ' to ' pe iyesi , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itʉrawasooi i ' ma ' kato ' uya pe iyesi intʉrʉ ' pʉ iku ' to ' pe uya .

text: Say not ye , There are yet four months , and then cometh harvest ? behold , I say unto you , Lift up your eyes , and look on the fields ; for they are white already to harvest .
text2: Tato ' sa ' ne ko , ‘ Asakɨrɨ ' ne rɨken kapʉi e ' ku ' ka ' sa ' kiyari akʉ ' pʉ rawɨrɨ . ’ Ta uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , apʉne wakʉ pe umɨ amʉ ' enpɨ ' tɨ ' . Kiyari akʉ ' pʉka ' sa ' , tanʉnsen pe iyenaka ' sa ' .

text: And he that reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal : that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together .
text2: Ka ' pon , anʉmʉ pɨ ' te ' sen e ' ma mɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan uya kiyari amʉranʉkʉ tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko ' man nɨto ' ya ' . Mɨrɨpan nin si , kʉrɨ rɨ ipɨnnin nʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ anʉnnin nʉ ' pʉ epori ' mato ' pe ɨsi ' kaisa rɨ .

text: And herein is that saying true , One soweth , and another reapeth .
text2: I ' napairɨ rɨ main esi mɨrɨ , ‘ Tikin nan uya ipɨmɨ ; tʉron nɨ uya anʉmʉ , ’ tawon .

text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour : other men laboured , and ye are entered into their labours .
text2: Ɨyenno ' sa ' uya ' nokon kiyari akʉ ' pʉsa ' anʉnse ' na , umɨ ɨye ' tʉrawasoma ' pʉ kon pen nɨ yawon ya ' . Tʉron kon e ' tʉrawasoma ' pʉ mɨrɨ yau , mɨrɨpan kon tʉrawasooi otori ' pɨ nin si eporo auya ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman , which testified , He told me all that ever I did .
text2: Tu ' kan kon nɨ Sameriya pon kon mɨrɨ pata yawon kon uya Sises apurɨ ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra uri ' san uya , “ Tanporon nɨ unku ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ ekamasa ' iya upɨ ' , ” tasa ' pɨ ' .

text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him , they besought him that he would tarry with them : and he abode there two days .
text2: Mɨrɨpan nin si , Sameriya pon kon uye ' sa ' a ' tai nin si ipiya ' , to ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ ipan pe tʉpiyau ' nokon iko ' manto ' pe ; mɨrɨ yau , Sises uko ' mamʉ ' pʉ asa ' rɨ wʉi to ' piyau .

text: And many more believed because of his own word ;
text2: Tu ' kan kon uya rɨ nin si apurɨ ' pʉ mɨrɨ imaimu etasa ' tʉuya ' nokon pɨ ' .

text: And said unto the woman , Now we believe , not because of thy saying : for we have heard him ourselves , and know that this is indeed the Christ , the Saviour of the world .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon uya ta ' pʉ uri ' san pɨ ' , “ Ina si napurɨyan , tasa ' auya pɨ ' rɨken pen , e ' tane tiwano ' kon pe rɨ etasa ' tʉuya ' nokon pɨ ' , ina uya si i ' tu i ' napai rɨ kuru rɨ pata pika ' tɨnin pe iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Now after two days he departed thence , and went into Galilee .
text2: Asa ' rɨ wʉi ennoko tʉpo mɨrɨ yau , mɨrɨ tʉnɨnse Sises utɨ ' pʉ Kiyarari pona .

text: For Jesus himself testified , that a prophet hath no honour in his own country .
text2: ( Sises uya rɨ , “ Pu ' kena ' namanin pʉn nɨ ipata ' se ' yau , ” tasa ' esi ' pʉ . )

text: Then when he was come into Galilee , the Galilaeans received him , having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast : for they also went unto the feast .
text2: Kiyarari pona itɨsa ' a ' tai , mɨrɨ yawon kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uya wakʉ pe kuru ereutanʉkʉ ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra itɨsa ' kon nʉ ' san pe to ' esi ' pʉ To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' Surusiran pona , mɨrɨpan kon uya tanporon nɨ inkupʉnʉ ensa ' esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ a ' tai .

text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee , where he made the water wine . And there was a certain nobleman , whose son was sick at Capernaum .
text2: Serɨ rɨken pe Sises uya Kena , Kiyarari airon ka ' kʉranpa ' pʉ , tuna koneka ' pʉ tʉuya yau waain pe . Mɨrɨ yau , ka ' pon , kin poitorʉ pe te ' sen esi ' pʉ , takuru ' kenan imu Ka ' paneyan po .

text: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee , he went unto him , and besought him that he would come down , and heal his son : for he was at the point of death .
text2: Pʉse rɨ ka ' pon uya Sises uye ' sa ' Isutiya poi Kiyarari pona ta etasa ' a ' tai , itɨ ' pʉ ipiya ' ekama ' poi ' itɨto ' pe Ka ' paneyan pona tʉmu epi ' tɨi ' , teri ' ka ' sen nɨ .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Except ye see signs and wonders , ye will not believe .
text2: Sises uya , “ Ɨnʉ ' uya apurɨ pʉra rɨ iyesi eke Papa tʉrawasooi i ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ a ' kwarʉpɨ ' nin nɨken e ' kupʉ a ' tai apurɨ auya ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ .

text: The nobleman saith unto him , Sir , come down ere my child die .
text2: Kin poitorʉ uya , “ Itepuru , uya ' kɨrɨ utɨnpai umʉre erikʉ rawɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Go thy way ; thy son liveth . And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him , and he went his way .
text2: Sises uya , “ Enta , ɨmu rɨ uto ' pamʉ mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' . Sises maimu tapurɨi ' itɨ ' pʉ .

text: And as he was now going down , his servants met him , and told him , saying , Thy son liveth .
text2: Ite ' matai tʉuye ' se , itekare ke ipoitorʉ ton uya eporo ' pʉ . “ Ɨmu uto ' pan nɨ pɨ ' rɨ man ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Then inquired he of them the hour when he began to amend . And they said unto him , Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him .
text2: To ' ekama ' po ' pʉ iya , ɨ ' rɨ a ' kʉra ' kuru tʉmu uto ' pamʉ ' pʉ tukai ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya , “ Ko ' mamiyau , 1 a ' kʉra ' ko ' mamʉ pe iye ' kɨɨi ' mato ' ereuta ' pʉ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' .

text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour , in the which Jesus said unto him , Thy son liveth : and himself believed , and his whole house .
text2: Ikʉipʉnʉ uya i ' tu ' pʉ mɨrɨ a ' kʉra ' kuru rɨ Sises uya , “ Ɨmu rɨ uto ' pamʉ mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ pɨ ' kʉrɨ rɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporo itonpa ton ena ' pʉ apurɨnin nan pe .

text: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did , when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee .
text2: Serɨ serɨ iyakon ite ' kwa pe eke Papa tʉrawasooi ti ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ kupʉ ' pʉ Sises uya tʉuyepʉ tʉpo Isutiya poi Kiyarari pona .

text: After this there was a feast of the Jews ; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' enta ' nato ' weyu pɨ ' Sises utɨ ' pʉ Surusiran pona .

text: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool , which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda , having five porches .
text2: Moro iyesi Surusiran po karimeru mʉra ' ta airɨ , iku ' pɨ mʉre ' pʉ 5 kaisaron enkurun nɨto ' itau ton esa ' ; Ipuru amʉ ' maimu yau Pe ' sata tato ' ipɨ ' .

text: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk , of blind , halt , withered , waiting for the moving of the water .
text2: Anpisin ton kuru rɨ takuru ' kena ' nan ɨpɨrinpɨ ' sa ' esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ tau ' ne , tenku ' na ' nan , sekentei ' pa ' nan ipu ' tɨka ' sa ' kon nɨ . ( Tuna e ' tʉkʉi ' tʉkʉi ' ma enupɨkɨrɨ to ' enurikʉ ,

text: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool , and troubled the water : whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had .
text2: apʉne pʉra ɨsipɨkɨrɨ Papa inserʉʉi u ' tɨ iku ' pɨ mʉre ' pʉ ka ' , mɨrɨpan uya tuna sokousokouma . Takuru ' kenan si wapiya tʉutɨsen iku ' pɨ mʉre ' pʉ ka ' iyesokousokouma ' pʉ tʉpo usepi ' tɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ ti ' tui ' pʉra rɨ teparan kon pe te ' sen apai . )

text: And a certain man was there , which had an infirmity thirty and eight years .
text2: Mɨrɨ yau si ka ' pon esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ takuru ' ke iko ' mansa ' 38 kaisa rɨ wʉipiya .

text: When Jesus saw him lie , and knew that he had been now a long time in that case , he saith unto him , Wilt thou be made whole ?
text2: Sises uya iyɨpɨrinkasa ' ene ' pʉ mɨrɨ yau , i ' tu ' pʉ iya inke rɨ takuru ' ke iko ' mansa ' , mɨrɨpan uya , “ Ɨsepi ' tɨpai pe ' me ' an ? ” ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' .

text: The impotent man answered him , Sir , I have no man , when the water is troubled , to put me into the pool : but while I am coming , another steppeth down before me .
text2: Takuru ' kenan uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Itepuru , ɨnʉ ' pʉra rɨ iyesi serɨ yau utʉnin iku ' pɨ ka ' tuna e ' sokousokouma a ' tai , ɨtɨ i ' se rʉ ' kwɨ e ' tane ika ' , tʉron nɨ utɨkapʉ uwapiya , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Rise , take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Sises uya , “ E ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' , ayapon tanʉnse enta ! ” ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' .

text: And immediately the man was made whole , and took up his bed , and walked : and on the same day was the sabbath .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai rɨ isepi ' tɨ ' pʉ ; tapon tanʉnse itɨ ' pʉ . Serɨ e ' kupʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ Sapa ' a ' tai .

text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured , It is the sabbath day : it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton uya , “ Sapa ' serɨ ; wakʉ pe pʉra iyesi Main , Mosi ' winon pona ayapon arɨ pɨ ' me ' ai ' ne ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' .

text: He answered them , He that made me whole , the same said unto me , Take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: To ' eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Kʉrɨ uyepi ' tɨnin nʉ ' pʉ uya , ‘ Ayapon tanʉnse enta , ’ tasa ' upɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: Then asked they him , What man is that which said unto thee , Take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: To ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨnʉ ' pe si kʉrɨ rɨ esi , ‘ Ayapon tanʉnse enta , ’ tawon ɨpɨ ' ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' .

text: And he that was healed wist not who it was : for Jesus had conveyed himself away , a multitude being in that place .
text2: E ' tane kʉrɨ rɨ isepi ' tɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ uya i ' tu pʉra iyesi ' pʉ ɨnʉ ' pe iyesi tukai ' , apʉne pʉra anpisin pe mɨrɨ yau to ' esi ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon koro ' tawɨrɨ Sises utɨ ' pʉ esi ' pʉ .

text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple , and said unto him , Behold , thou art made whole : sin no more , lest a worse thing come unto thee .
text2: Mɨrɨ pata ' pʉ pe , Sises uya eporo ' pʉ use ' man nɨto ' , ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' tau , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Apʉne enkɨ , wakʉ pe si ɨyenasa ' mɨrɨ . Amakooi inonkakɨ , ɨsɨ kuru rɨ e ' kupʉ namai ' ɨpɨ ' inonka auya pʉra iyesi yau , ” ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' .

text: The man departed , and told the Jews that it was Jesus , which had made him whole .
text2: Mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton pana ' tɨi ' Sises uya kenʉ ' tepi ' tɨsa ' ka ' se ' na .

text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus , and sought to slay him , because he had done these things on the sabbath day .
text2: Serɨ wenai , Sises ewa ' noma pɨ ' to ' e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra usepi ' tɨn ku ' sa ' iya pɨ ' Sapa ' a ' tai .

text: But Jesus answered them , My Father worketh hitherto , and I work .
text2: Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ukʉipʉnʉ esi te ' tʉrawasomasen inke rɨ ; urɨ nɨrɨ e ' tʉrawasomato ' pe iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him , because he not only had broken the sabbath , but said also that God was his Father , making himself equal with God .
text2: Serɨ tawon uya rɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton kupʉ ' pʉ miyarɨ rɨ ɨnwɨpai ; Main nɨken Sapa ' pɨ ' enupanin i ' kwɨ ' sa ' iya pen , e ' tane Papa esi tʉkʉipʉnʉ pe kuru tasa ' iya pɨ ' , serɨ winɨ si Papa kaisarɨ rɨ iye ' ku ' sa ' pɨ ' .

text: Then answered Jesus and said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , The Son can do nothing of himself , but what he seeth the Father do : for what things soever he doeth , these also doeth the Son likewise .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon : tiwano ' pe ɨ ' rɨ rɨ kupʉ imu uya pen , tʉkʉipʉnʉ nʉkupʉnʉ rɨken ensa ' tʉuya kupʉ iya , apʉne pʉra ɨ ' rɨ rɨ kupʉ ikʉipʉnʉ uya a ' tai , imu uya rɨ nɨrɨ ikupʉ .

text: For the Father loveth the Son , and sheweth him all things that himself doeth : and he will shew him greater works than these , that ye may marvel .
text2: Ikʉipʉnʉ uya imu i ' nʉnka , mɨrɨpan uya tanporon nɨ tʉnkupʉnʉ enpoika itena ' . Serɨ entaino kuru rɨ enpoika iya mɨrɨ iku ' to ' pe iya , mɨrɨ uya ɨyewansiukato ' oton kon .

text: For as the Father raiseth up the dead , and quickeneth them ; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will .
text2: Ikʉipʉnʉ iyeri ' sa ' kon i ' mʉ ' sa ' kayai ' ne ' nurɨne to ' ku ' ai ' ne ' kasa rɨ marɨ , imu uya nurɨne rɨ to ' e ' to ' pe to ' kupʉ , i ' se te ' to ' ton nɨ kupʉ iya nurɨne .

text: For the Father judgeth no man , but hath committed all judgment unto the Son :
text2: Mɨrɨ rɨken pe pʉra , ɨnʉ ' rɨ eseru aimenka ikʉipʉnʉ uya pen . Tʉmu ena ' eseru aimenkato ' ike nonkasa ' iya ,

text: That all men should honour the Son , even as they honour the Father . He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him .
text2: tanporon kon uya tʉmu namato ' pe ikʉipʉnʉ nama tʉuya ' nokon kasa rɨ marɨ . Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ imu nama pʉra iyesi yau , ikʉipʉnʉ nama iya pʉra rɨ marɨ iyesi mɨrɨ enno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that heareth my word , and believeth on him that sent me , hath everlasting life , and shall not come into condemnation ; but is passed from death unto life .
text2: “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon : Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ umaimu eta a ' tai , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ apurɨ a ' tai , kʉrɨ rɨ uya tɨwɨrɨ uko ' man nɨto ' eposa ' mɨrɨ . Iteseru aimenkato ' oton pen nɨ , iye ' kwɨrɨ ' ka ' sa ' pe rɨ iyesi uma ' tan nɨto ' apai uko ' man nɨto ' ya ' .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The hour is coming , and now is , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God : and they that hear shall live .
text2: “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon : Iweyu uye ' nɨ pɨ ' man , iye ' ka ' sa ' rɨ , iyeri ' sa ' kon uya Papa Mumu maimu eta weyu , kamoro nin si etanin nan uko ' manto ' oton .

text: For as the Father hath life in himself ; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself ;
text2: Ikʉipʉnʉ esi na ' ne ' kasa uko ' man nɨto ' esa ' pe , mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ tʉmu konekasa ' iya uko ' man nɨto ' esa ' pe .

text: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also , because he is the Son of man .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉmu repasa ' iya eseru aimenka meruntɨrʉ ke , apʉne pʉra Ka ' pon , Papa winon pe iyesi pɨ ' .

text: Marvel not at this : for the hour is coming , in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice ,
text2: “ Serɨ pɨ ' kɨsewansiukatʉu ; iweyu uye ' nɨ pɨ ' man tanporon kon iyeri ' sa ' kon uruwai ' yawon kon uya imaimu eta weyu ,

text: And shall come forth ; they that have done good , unto the resurrection of life ; and they that have done evil , unto the resurrection of damnation .
text2: mɨrɨpan kon epa ' kato ' oton tʉuruwasii kon apai : kamoro wakʉ ku ' nin nʉ ' san e ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' oton tʉuko ' manto ' kon pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kamoro ɨri ku ' nin nʉ ' san e ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' oton teno ' mato ' kon ya ' .

text: I can of mine own self do nothing : as I hear , I judge : and my judgment is just ; because I seek not mine own will , but the will of the Father which hath sent me .
text2: “ Uiwano ' pe ɨ ' rɨ rɨ kupʉ uya pʉra iyesi . Ka ' pon eseru aimenka uya Papa uya uyauro ' kasa ' awɨrɨ . Mɨrɨ wenai iye ' to ' awɨrɨ ka ' pon eseru aimenka uya , apʉne pʉra i ' se e ' to ' kupʉ uya kasa pʉra , e ' tane kʉrɨ uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ e ' to ' i ' se rɨken .

text: If I bear witness of myself , my witness is not true .
text2: “ Urɨ pe rɨ uyeseru ekama uya a ' tai , unekamanʉ esi tapurɨsen pe pʉra rɨ .

text: There is another that beareth witness of me ; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true .
text2: Mɨrɨ yau , tʉron nɨ esi uyekamanin i ' napai rɨ uyekama iya tukai ' i ' tu uya .

text: Ye sent unto John , and he bare witness unto the truth .
text2: Isaan piya ' amaimu kon esanon ennoko ' pʉ auya ' nokon , mɨrɨpan uya i ' napairon enpoika ' pʉ .

text: But I receive not testimony from man : but these things I say , that ye might be saved .
text2: Ka ' pon uya uyekama i ' se e ' tane pʉra rɨ , e ' tane serɨ ta uya ɨpɨ ' nokon iyepika ' tɨsa ' pe ɨwesi kon pa .

text: He was a burning and a shining light : and ye were willing for a season to rejoice in his light .
text2: Isaan esi ' pʉ raan ' pu tepo ' tɨsen pata weyu pe kasa , mɨrɨpan weyu yau e ' pai ɨwesi ' pʉ kon aka ' ne ' pe rɨ .

text: But I have greater witness than that of John : for the works which the Father hath given me to finish , the same works that I do , bear witness of me , that the Father hath sent me .
text2: “ E ' tane upiyau uiwano ' pe rɨ usekamato ' esi Isaan uya ekama ' pʉ na ' ne ' entaino . Tʉrawaso unkupʉnʉ i ' ma ' kato ' pe uya ukʉipʉnʉ nʉtʉrʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨ ton uya rɨ ekama ikʉipʉnʉ uya uyenno ' sa ' tukai ' .

text: And the Father himself , which hath sent me , hath borne witness of me . Ye have neither heard his voice at any time , nor seen his shape .
text2: Ikʉipʉnʉ uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ usauro ' sa ' upɨ ' , imaimu etasa ' auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi , itemʉ ' nɨrɨ ensa ' auya ' nokon pʉra rɨ nɨrɨ iyesi .

text: And ye have not his word abiding in you : for whom he hath sent , him ye believe not .
text2: Imaimu ko ' manʉkʉ auya ' nokon pʉra nɨrɨ iyesi ɨyewan kon yau , apʉne pʉra inennoko ' pʉ apurɨ auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi ke .

text: Search the scriptures ; for in them ye think ye have eternal life : and they are they which testify of me .
text2: Iye ' menukasa ' itekare pɨ ' ɨusenupa kon ; tɨwɨrɨ uko ' man nɨto ' esi iyau tukai ' ɨusenuminka kon pɨ ' , upɨ ' rɨ si tʉusauro ' sen .

text: And ye will not come to me , that ye might have life .
text2: E ' tane rɨ , upiya ' ɨsi ' pai pʉra ɨwesi kon ɨuko ' manto ' kon epose ' na .

text: I receive not honour from men .
text2: “ Ka ' pon amʉ ' uya rɨ uyapurɨpɨ ' to ' i ' se esi pen .

text: But I know you , that ye have not the love of God in you .
text2: E ' tane ɨi ' tu uya ' nokon Papa i ' nʉnkato ' auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi ɨyewan kon yau .

text: I am come in my Father ' s name , and ye receive me not : if another shall come in his own name , him ye will receive .
text2: “ Ukʉipʉnʉ ese ' yau uye ' sa ' e ' tane uyereutanʉ ' sa ' auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi . E ' tane tʉron nɨ uye ' sa ' a ' tai tese ' yau , kʉrɨ rɨ ereutanʉkʉ auya ' nokon mɨrɨ .

text: How can ye believe , which receive honour one of another , and seek not the honour that cometh from God only ?
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ tukai ' apurɨ auya ' nokon ɨtonpa kon winɨ ayapurɨpɨ ' to ' kon eponin nan pe esii ' ma , e ' tane ɨ ' rɨ rɨ kupʉ auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi ayapurɨpɨ ' to ' kon eporo kon pa tikin nan nɨ Papa winɨ tʉuye ' sen ?

text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father : there is one that accuseth you , even Moses , in whom ye trust .
text2: “ Kɨsenuminkatʉu urɨ uya ikʉipʉnʉ ena ' ɨyeseru ' tɨ kon tukai ' , Mosi ' rɨken kʉrɨ rɨ ɨyeseru ' tɨnin kon , kʉrɨ rɨ anapurɨ ' pʉ kon .

text: For had ye believed Moses , ye would have believed me : for he wrote of me .
text2: Mosi ' apurɨsa ' auya ' nokon pe iyesi yau , uyapurɨsa ' auya ' nokon nɨrɨ nesii ' no , apʉne pʉra urɨ pɨ ' imenukasa ' iya .

text: But if ye believe not his writings , how shall ye believe my words ?
text2: E ' tane inmenuka ' pʉ apurɨ auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi pɨ ' , ɨ ' rɨ tukai ' umaimu apurɨ auya ' nokon ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee , which is the sea of Tiberias .
text2: Serɨ pata ' pʉ pe , Sises enna ' po ' pʉ parau ku ' pɨri Kiyarari ( parau ku ' pɨri Taipiriyas tato ' rɨ marɨ ) ratoi pona .

text: And a great multitude followed him , because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased .
text2: Anpisin uya kuru rɨ e ' ma ' pʉka ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra ti ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ ku ' sa ' iya pɨ ' takuru ' kena ' nan pɨ ' .

text: And Jesus went up into a mountain , and there he sat with his disciples .
text2: Sises enuku ' pʉ i ' kʉrʉ pona , mɨrɨpan ereuta ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton pokon pe .

text: And the passover , a feast of the Jews , was nigh .
text2: To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' nʉkupʉnʉ e ' seporo esi ' pʉ .

text: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes , and saw a great company come unto him , he saith unto Philip , Whence shall we buy bread , that these may eat ?
text2: Sises uya tenu tʉsa ' a ' tai , anpisin pe kuru rɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' uyepʉ ene ' pʉ iya tekare pɨ ' , ta ' pʉ iya Piri ' pɨ ' , “ Nai yau pʉreti enna pʉsamoro ka ' pon amʉ ' nɨ ' ton ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And this he said to prove him : for he himself knew what he would do .
text2: ( Serɨ ta ' pʉ iya Piri ' i ' tupɨtʉ pe rɨ ; tʉnkupʉnʉ pe te ' sen i ' tukapʉi ' ma rɨ . )

text: Philip answered him , Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them , that every one of them may take a little .
text2: Piri ' uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ 8 kaisaron kapʉi yau e ' tʉrawasoman nɨsa ' epe ' pʉ uya eke pe kiyari enna pʉra rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ to ' nonpa ton nʉ ' kwɨ rɨ mara rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: One of his disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother , saith unto him ,
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton tonpa pe te ' sen , Anturu , Saiman Pi ' ta akon uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' ,

text: There is a lad here , which hath five barley loaves , and two small fishes : but what are they among so many ?
text2: “ Mɨrɨ yau warawo ' mʉre man , 5 kaisa rɨ pʉreti mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ asa ' ron kon aiko ton moro ' amʉ ' esi ipiyau . Mɨrɨ e ' tane ɨ ' rɨ pʉ ' kʉ pona itɨ tu ' kan kon ewekʉ pɨ ' ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus said , Make the men sit down . Now there was much grass in the place . So the men sat down , in number about five thousand .
text2: “ Ka ' pon amʉ ' ereutato ' pe iku ' tɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya . ( Mɨrɨ yau , wana ' e ' kwa pe pata esi ' pʉ . ) 5 , 000 kaisaron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' ereutapɨtʉ ' pʉ .

text: And Jesus took the loaves ; and when he had given thanks , he distributed to the disciples , and the disciples to them that were set down ; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would .
text2: Sises uya pʉreti anʉmʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tenki ta ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itʉpɨtʉ ' pʉ iya iyereutasa ' kon ka ' pon amʉ ' ena ' . Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ moro ' amʉ ' kupʉ ' pʉ iya .

text: When they were filled , he said unto his disciples , Gather up the fragments that remain , that nothing be lost .
text2: To ' a ' wetapɨ ' sa ' a ' tai , Sises uya ta ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' , “ Ipʉ ' kʉ rʉ ' pʉ ton amʉranʉ ' tɨ ' , itonpa ' pʉ uma ' ta namai ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Therefore they gathered them together , and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves , which remained over and above unto them that had eaten .
text2: Mɨrɨ , to ' uta ' re ' tɨ ' pʉ tonpa ' pʉ amʉranʉkʉ ' pʉ to ' uya 12 kaisa rɨ pa ' siki ' ti amʉ ' tʉpe ' ke ' ne .

text: Then those men , when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did , said , This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ka ' pon amʉ ' serɨ eke Papa tʉrawasooi i ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ e ' kupʉ ennin nʉ ' san uya ta ' pʉ , “ I ' napai rɨ kuru rɨ pʉse rɨ esi Pu ' kena ' tʉuye ' ton ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' pe , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force , to make him a king , he departed again into a mountain himself alone .
text2: Sises uya to ' uya tanʉmʉ tʉmɨrɨ ta ' kwarʉkai ' kin pe , tukai ' i ' tusa ' a ' tai , itɨ ' pʉ tikin sarɨ i ' kʉrʉ pona .

text: And when even was now come , his disciples went down unto the sea ,
text2: Pata uko ' mansa ' a ' tai , ipoitorʉ ton utɨ ' pʉ parau ku ' pɨri ka ' ,

text: And entered into a ship , and went over the sea toward Capernaum . And it was now dark , and Jesus was not come to them .
text2: mɨrɨpan kon ekanwa ' tɨsa ' utɨ ' pʉ parau ku ' pɨri ratoi pona Ka ' paneyan winɨkʉi ' . Pata ewarumankaa ' pʉ , Sises uye ' sa ' pʉra rɨ marɨ iye ' tane to ' piya ' .

text: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew .
text2: Pana ' pe a ' setun uyee ' pʉ ɨsɨ pe sipa ' sipa pe tuna tʉku ' se .

text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs , they see Jesus walking on the sea , and drawing nigh unto the ship : and they were afraid .
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton utɨka ' sa ' esi ' pʉ kanau yau 3 mayirʉ , 4 mayirʉ e ' to ' airɨ rɨ , mɨrɨ a ' tai Sises uyepʉ ene ' pʉ to ' uya tuna pʉro ' po . A ' ko pe kanau piya ' iyepʉ a ' tai , to ' etʉipɨtʉ ' pʉ .

text: But he saith unto them , It is I ; be not afraid .
text2: E ' tane , “ Ketʉipɨ ' tʉu ; urɨ rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya to ' pɨ ' .

text: Then they willingly received him into the ship : and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , to ' uya ikanwa ' tɨ ' pʉ kanau ya ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya pata tʉutɨto ' kon ya ' eporo ' pʉ inke pʉra rɨ .

text: The day following , when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there , save that one whereinto his disciples were entered , and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat , but that his disciples were gone away alone ;
text2: Mɨrɨ ema ' sa ' yau , anpisin ton parau ku ' pɨri ratoi po iye ' nɨnsa ' kon uya tikin nan nɨken kanau utɨ ' pʉ i ' tu ' pʉ . To ' uya i ' tu ' pʉ Sises utɨ pʉra iyesi ' pʉ kanau yau tʉpoitorʉ ton a ' kɨrɨ , ipokon pe pʉra to ' utɨ ' pʉ .

text: ( Howbeit there came other boats from Tiberias nigh unto the place where they did eat bread , after that the Lord had given thanks : )
text2: Tʉron nɨ ton kanau amʉ ' uyee ' pʉ Taipiriyas winɨpai ' ne , mɨrɨpan e ' te ' kapɨtʉ ' pʉ a ' ko pe ka ' pon amʉ ' anpisin ton uya pʉreti ɨku ' pʉ airɨ , Sises uya tenki ta tʉpo .

text: When the people therefore saw that Jesus was not there , neither his disciples , they also took shipping , and came to Capernaum , seeking for Jesus .
text2: Sises mɨrɨ pe pʉra ipoitorʉ ton ene tʉuya ' nokon kasa pʉra , ka ' pon amʉ ' anpisin ton ekanwa ' tɨpɨ ' sa ' kanau ton ya ' utɨ ' pʉ Ka ' paneyan pona , iwarinpa pɨ ' .

text: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea , they said unto him , Rabbi , when camest thou hither ?
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' uya Sises eposa ' a ' tai parau ku ' pɨri ratoi po , ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' , “ Rapai , ɨ ' rɨ a ' tai serɨ ya ' ɨuyee ' pʉ ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Jesus answered them and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Ye seek me , not because ye saw the miracles , but because ye did eat of the loaves , and were filled .
text2: Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; uwarinpa auya ' nokon , apʉne pʉra eke pe rɨ pʉreti ɨ ' sa ' auya ' nokon pɨ ' i ' se ɨwe ' to ' kon awɨrɨ rɨ , ui ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ ku ' sa ' uya to ' ka ' nʉ ' sa ' auya ' nokon pɨ ' pen nɨ .

text: Labour not for the meat which perisheth , but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life , which the Son of man shall give unto you : for him hath God the Father sealed .
text2: Aka ' nero ' rɨ kiyari pɨ ' ke ' tʉrawasomatʉu ; e ' tʉrawasomatɨ ' tɨwɨrɨ rɨ ɨuko ' manto ' kon pe ɨku ' nin kon kiyari pɨ ' . Serɨ kiyari ke Ka ' pon , Papa winon uya ɨrepa kon mɨrɨ . Papa , ikʉipʉnʉ uya enpoikasa ' ɨyena ' nokon urɨ piyau meruntɨ esi , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: Then said they unto him , What shall we do , that we might work the works of God ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ kuru ken kupʉ ina uya , Papa tʉrawasooi kupʉ pe ta auya ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , This is the work of God , that ye believe on him whom he hath sent .
text2: Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Se serɨ Papa tʉrawasooi ikupʉ auya ' nokon i ' se iye ' to ' ; inennoko ' pʉ apurɨtɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: They said therefore unto him , What sign shewest thou then , that we may see , and believe thee ? what dost thou work ?
text2: To ' uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ eke Papa tʉrawasooi ɨi ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ kupʉ auya ina nenton , ina uya ayapurɨto ' pe ? Ɨ ' rɨ kupʉ auya ?

text: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert ; as it is written , He gave them bread from heaven to eat .
text2: Utamokori kon uya mana tato ' ɨ ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ rɨmono ' tau , itekare iye ' menukasa ' nekamayai ' ne ' , ‘ To ' nɨ ' ton pʉreti ke to ' repapɨtʉ ' pʉ iya Epʉn poi , ’ tukai ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Moses gave you not that bread from heaven ; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven .
text2: “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; Mosi ' uya ɨrepa ' pʉ kon na ' ne ' ike esi ' pʉ Epʉn poino pen nɨ ; ukʉipʉnʉ nin kʉrɨ rɨ i ' napairon Epʉn poino pʉreti ke ɨrepanin kon .

text: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven , and giveth life unto the world .
text2: Pʉreti , Papa nʉtʉrʉnʉ nin kʉrɨ rɨ Epʉn poi iu ' tɨsa ' pata repanin uko ' man nɨto ' ke , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: Then said they unto him , Lord , evermore give us this bread .
text2: “ Itepuru , tɨwɨrɨ rɨ ken si serɨ pʉreti ke ina irepapɨ ' kɨ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' .

text: And Jesus said unto them , I am the bread of life : he that cometh to me shall never hunger ; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst .
text2: “ Urɨ rɨ esi uko ' man nɨto ' a ' re ' pe ; kʉrɨ upiya ' nʉye ' ai ' ne ' e ' to ' oton pen nɨ iwan pe ; kʉrɨ uyapurɨ pɨ ' na ' ne ' e ' to ' oton pen nɨ tuna ' kiri ' ke .

text: But I said unto you , That ye also have seen me , and believe not .
text2: Sekamai ko ɨpɨ ' nokon ; uyenka ' sa ' auya ' nokon e ' tane uyapurɨ auya ' nokon pen nɨ .

text: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me ; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out .
text2: Tanporon kon ukʉipʉnʉ urepayai ' ne ' ike ton uyepʉ mɨrɨ upiya ' ; ɨnʉ ' rɨ upiya ' tʉuye ' sen nurunpa uya pʉra rɨ iyesi ,

text: For I came down from heaven , not to do mine own will , but the will of him that sent me .
text2: apʉne pʉra uye ' sa ' serɨ Epʉn poi uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ eseru ku ' se ' na , uyeseru ku ' se ' na pen .

text: And this is the Father ' s will which hath sent me , that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing , but should raise it up again at the last day .
text2: Kʉrɨ uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ esi se kupʉ uya i ' se ; kamo urepa ' pʉ iya ike ton nonka uya i ' se pʉra iyesi , e ' tane tanporo to ' i ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' pe uya pata weyu u ' ma ' sa ' a ' tai .

text: And this is the will of him that sent me , that every one which seeth the Son , and believeth on him , may have everlasting life : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Ukʉipʉnʉ eseru esi tanporon kon imu ennin nʉ ' san mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ apurɨnin nʉ ' san uya tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko ' man nɨto ' epoto ' pe ; to ' i ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' pe uya pata weyu u ' ma ' sa ' a ' tai , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: The Jews then murmured at him , because he said , I am the bread which came down from heaven .
text2: Esuwerʉ amʉ ' e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ ipɨ ' entarun nɨ pɨ ' , apʉne pʉra , “ Urɨ kʉrɨ rɨ pʉreti Epʉn poi iu ' tɨsa ' , ” ta iya pɨ ' .

text: And they said , Is not this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? how is it then that he saith , I came down from heaven ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon uya , “ Sises sa ' ne pʉse rɨ ko , Isose ' mu , pen pe ' ? Ikʉipʉnʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ isan uni ' tunʉ kon . Nai kasa , ‘ Epʉn poi u ' tɨsa ' , ’ ta iya nin si ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them , Murmur not among yourselves .
text2: Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨyentarunto ' kon e ' paka ' nʉ ' tɨ ' .

text: No man can come to me , except the Father which hath sent me draw him : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ uyepʉ pʉra iyesi mɨrɨ upiya ' ikʉipʉnʉ , uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ uya rɨken ikɨ ' ma a ' tai upiya ' iyepʉ rɨ ; mɨrɨpan i ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' uya oton pata weyu u ' ma ' sa ' a ' tai .

text: It is written in the prophets , And they shall be all taught of God . Every man therefore that hath heard , and hath learned of the Father , cometh unto me .
text2: Pu ' kena ' amʉ ' uya imenukasa ' , ‘ Tanporon kon nɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' enupato ' oton Papa uya , ’ tawon . Mɨrɨ pɨ ' , tanporon kon ikʉipʉnʉ maimu etanin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iwinɨ tʉusenupasan uyepʉ upiya ' .

text: Not that any man hath seen the Father , save he which is of God , he hath seen the Father .
text2: Serɨ uya , ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ikʉipʉnʉ ene ' pʉ ta pen ; kʉrɨ Papa winon uya rɨken ikʉipʉnʉ ene ' pʉ .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me hath everlasting life .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; kʉrɨ apurɨpɨ ' na ' ne ' uya tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko ' man nɨto ' eposa ' .

text: I am that bread of life .
text2: Uko ' man nɨto ' a ' re ' pʉreti pe esi .

text: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness , and are dead .
text2: Atamokori kon amʉ ' uya mana tato ' ɨ ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ rɨmono ' tau , e ' tane to ' eri ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ .

text: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven , that a man may eat thereof , and not die .
text2: E ' tane serɨ nin si pʉreti Epʉn poi iu ' tɨsa ' ; ɨnʉ ' rɨ ɨ ' nin nʉ ' pʉ erikʉ pen nɨ nin .

text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven : if any man eat of this bread , he shall live for ever : and the bread that I will give is my flesh , which I will give for the life of the world .
text2: To ' panʉ ' nin pʉreti pe esi , Epʉn poi iu ' tɨsa ' . Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ serɨ pʉreti ɨ ' sa ' yau , iko ' manto ' oton nɨ tɨwɨrɨ rɨ . Pʉreti serɨ upun , untʉton pata uya uko ' man nɨto ' epoto ' pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: The Jews therefore strove among themselves , saying , How can this man give us his flesh to eat ?
text2: Serɨ uya ɨsɨ pe Esuwerʉ amʉ ' e ' sei ' pɨtʉ tiwano ' kon pe sara ' tɨ ' pʉ . “ Nai kasa tʉpun ke uya ' re ' tɨ iya ' nokon ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man , and drink his blood , ye have no life in you .
text2: Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; Ka ' pon , Papa winon pun pɨ ' auta ' re ' tɨsa ' kon pʉra iyesi yau , imʉnʉ rɨ ensisa ' auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi yau , uko ' man nɨto ' pʉra rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ ayau ' nokon .

text: Whoso eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , hath eternal life ; and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ upun pɨ ' tʉuta ' re ' tɨsen , umʉnʉ ensinin uya tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko ' man nɨto ' eposa ' mɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan i ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' uya oton pata weyu u ' ma ' sa ' a ' tai .

text: For my flesh is meat indeed , and my blood is drink indeed .
text2: Upun esi pɨ ' i ' napairon kuru kiyari pe , umʉnʉ nɨrɨ i ' napairon tensisen pe .

text: He that eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , dwelleth in me , and I in him .
text2: Upun pɨ ' tʉuta ' re ' tɨsen nɨ , umʉnʉ ensinin nɨ uko ' mamʉ mɨrɨ uyau , iyau nɨrɨ uko ' mamʉ .

text: As the living Father hath sent me , and I live by the Father : so he that eateth me , even he shall live by me .
text2: Tʉuko ' mansen ikʉipʉnʉ uya uyenno ' sa ' , kʉrɨ rɨ uriya ' uko ' mamʉ rɨ marɨ . Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ , upɨ ' tʉuta ' re ' tɨsen uko ' mamʉ mɨrɨ urɨ uriya ' .

text: This is that bread which came down from heaven : not as your fathers did eat manna , and are dead : he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever .
text2: Se si esi pʉreti Epʉn poi iu ' tɨsa ' . Ɨku tʉpo atamokori kon amʉ ' erikʉ ' pʉ na ' ne ' waraino pen . Kʉrɨ serɨ ɨ ' nin uko ' manto ' oton tɨwɨrɨ rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: These things said he in the synagogue , as he taught in Capernaum .
text2: Sises uya serɨ ta ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' usenupato ' iwʉ ' tau to ' enupa tʉuya a ' tai Ka ' paneyan po .

text: Many therefore of his disciples , when they had heard this , said , This is an hard saying ; who can hear it ?
text2: Serɨ etasa ' tʉuya ' nokon a ' tai , tu ' kan kon ipoitorʉ ton uya , “ Sa ' man pe kuru se usenupan nɨto ' man . Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ serɨ anʉmʉ ? ” ta ' pʉ .

text: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it , he said unto them , Doth this offend you ?
text2: Ɨnʉ ' uya tʉpana ' tɨi ' pʉra rɨ , Sises uya tʉpoitorʉ ton entarumʉ serɨ pɨ ' i ' tusa ' esi ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ E ' nonkapai na ' kɨ serɨ ɨku ' atʉu ?

text: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before ?
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi Ka ' pon , Papa winon enuku ene auya ' nokon a ' tai wapiya tesi ' pʉ ya ' ?

text: It is the spirit that quickeneth ; the flesh profiteth nothing : the words that I speak unto you , they are spirit , and they are life .
text2: Papa A ' kwarʉ uya uko ' man nɨto ' tʉrʉ ; se pe rɨ nin ka ' pon meruntɨrʉ esi mɨrɨ . Main ton ayauro ' kasa ' uya ' nokon na ' ne ' ike esi , a ' kwarʉ wannɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uko ' man nɨto ' ku ' nin .

text: But there are some of you that believe not . For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not , and who should betray him .
text2: Mɨrɨ e ' tane moro man ɨtonpa kon amʉ ' apurɨnin nan pen , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Sises uya i ' tusa ' esi ' pʉ iyepiya ' tɨ ' pʉ si ' kɨrɨ , apurɨnin nan pen mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ teparanka ton .

text: And he said , Therefore said I unto you , that no man can come unto me , except it were given unto him of my Father .
text2: Mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ , “ Serɨ pɨ ' sa ' ne si kanyauro ' kata ' tʉi ko : ɨnʉ ' rɨ uyepʉ pʉra iyesi upiya ' ikʉipʉnʉ uya rɨken iye ' ku ' to ' pe iku ' sa ' a ' tai iyepʉ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: From that time many of his disciples went back , and walked no more with him .
text2: Mɨrɨ wʉi awonsi ' kɨ , tu ' kan kon nɨ ipɨkɨrɨ tʉutɨsan enna ' po ' pʉ , iya ' kɨrɨ to ' utɨ pʉra .

text: Then said Jesus unto the twelve , Will ye also go away ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' Sises uya ta ' pʉ 12 kaisaron kon tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' , “ Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon si , e ' nonkapai rɨ marɨ na ' kɨ me ' atʉu ? ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: Then Simon Peter answered him , Lord , to whom shall we go ? thou hast the words of eternal life .
text2: Saiman Pi ' ta uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Uyepuru , ɨnʉ ' piya ' nɨrɨ ina utɨ ? Ɨpiyau sa ' ne Main esi mɨrɨ ko , tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko ' man nɨto ' pe ku ' nin .

text: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Ina uya i ' tu mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ina uya apurɨ ɨmɨrɨ esi Wakʉ , Papa iwano ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus answered them , Have not I chosen you twelve , and one of you is a devil ?
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ 12 kaisaron kon pe ' ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon anʉnnin nʉ ' pʉ pen urɨ ? Mɨrɨ e ' tane , ɨtonpa kon esi makoi pe ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon : for he it was that should betray him , being one of the twelve .
text2: ( Isutas pɨ ' isaurokʉ ' pʉ , Saiman Eskariya ' mu pɨ ' . 12 kaisaron kon tonpa pe rɨ esii ' ma , Isutas uya teparankato ' oton pɨ ' . )

text: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee : for he would not walk in Jewry , because the Jews sought to kill him .
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo , Sises esi ' pʉ upinin nɨ pɨ ' Kiyarari awɨrɨ . Isutiya pona ɨtɨpai pʉra iyesi ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton esi pɨ ' tʉwɨnɨ i ' se mɨrɨ yau .

text: Now the Jews ' feast of tabernacles was at hand .
text2: Tʉusiwʉtʉntɨpɨ ' se Esuwerʉ amʉ ' nʉkupʉnʉ weyu e ' seporo esi ' pʉ .

text: His brethren therefore said unto him , Depart hence , and go into Judaea , that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' si , iyakon non uya ta ' pʉ Sises pɨ ' , “ Serɨ tʉnɨnse , Isutiya pona enta , ɨpoitorʉ ton uya eke Papa tʉrawasooi kupʉ auya ento ' pe .

text: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret , and he himself seeketh to be known openly . If thou do these things , shew thyself to the world .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ tʉnkupʉnʉ tʉtʉrawasooi onamʉ pʉra rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ ti ' tu i ' se e ' nɨ yau . Serɨ ton amʉ ' kupʉ auya pɨ ' , tɨwɨ tanporon pata ɨi ' tui ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: For neither did his brethren believe in him .
text2: Iyakon non uya rɨ nɨrɨ apurɨ pʉra iyesi ' pʉ .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , My time is not yet come : but your time is alway ready .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Uweyu pe kuru te ' sen e ' seposa ' pʉra iyesi . Ɨweyu kon nin esi mɨrɨ ti ' tui ' pʉra rɨ .

text: The world cannot hate you ; but me it hateth , because I testify of it , that the works thereof are evil .
text2: Pata uya ɨyewaruma ' tɨ kon pʉra iyesi , e ' tane uyewaruma ' tɨ iya , apʉne pʉra ɨri pe ɨyeseru man ta uya pɨ ' tʉpɨ ' .

text: Go ye up unto this feast : I go not up yet unto this feast ; for my time is not yet full come .
text2: Entantɨ ' tʉku ' sen ya ' . Mɨrɨ ya ' nin utɨ pʉra man , apʉne pʉra uweyu pe kuru te ' sen e ' seposa ' pʉra iyesi pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: When he had said these words unto them , he abode still in Galilee .
text2: Serɨ ta tʉpo , Kiyarari po iye ' nɨmɨ ' pʉ .

text: But when his brethren were gone up , then went he also up unto the feast , not openly , but as it were in secret .
text2: Takon non utɨ ' pʉ tʉku ' sen ya ' tʉpo , Sises rɨ nɨrɨ si utɨkaa ' pʉ , e ' tane ama ' ai rɨ nin itɨ ' pʉ , eke pe ti ' tui ' pen .

text: Then the Jews sought him at the feast , and said , Where is he ?
text2: Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton uya iwarinpa esi ' pʉ tʉku ' sen yau . “ Nai kʉrɨ si ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him : for some said , He is a good man : others said , Nay ; but he deceiveth the people .
text2: Mɨ awɨrɨ rɨ anpisin koro ' tawɨrɨ etarerun nɨ pɨ ' to ' esi ' pʉ ipɨ ' . “ Wakʉ kuru sa ' ne , ” ta ' pʉ tʉron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uya . “ Kane , ” ta ' pʉ tʉron kon uya , “ Ka ' pon amʉ ' rɨ enku ' tɨ iya , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews .
text2: E ' tane eke pe annau to ' usaurokʉ ' pʉ pen ipɨ ' , apʉne pʉra Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton pɨ ' tenari ' nʉmʉ kon pɨ ' .

text: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple , and taught .
text2: To ' nʉkupʉnʉ e ' nonkakapʉ iwa koro ' tau rɨ , Sises ewomʉ ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' ta ' , mɨrɨpan e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ to ' enupa pɨ ' .

text: And the Jews marvelled , saying , How knoweth this man letters , having never learned ?
text2: Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton usewansiuka ' pʉ ipan pe rɨ , mɨrɨpan kon uya ta ' pʉ , “ Nai kasa pʉse rɨ uya eke pe rɨ i ' tu , urɨ ' nokon kasa enupasa ' kasa rɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Jesus answered them , and said , My doctrine is not mine , but his that sent me .
text2: Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨyenupato ' kon uya ike esi uwinon pen nɨ , e ' tane Papa , uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ winɨ iyepʉ .

text: If any man will do his will , he shall know of the doctrine , whether it be of God , or whether I speak of myself .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ Papa e ' to ' i ' se ɨnku ' pai na ' ne ' uya i ' tuto ' oton kɨnyenupayatʉi ' ne ' esi Papa winon pe mɨrɨ pe pʉra uiwano ' pe rɨ tukai ' .

text: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory : but he that seeketh his glory that sent him , the same is true , and no unrighteousness is in him .
text2: Ka ' pon tiwano ' pe rɨ nʉsauro ' ai ' ne ' esi tapurɨto ' ipɨkɨrɨ rɨ i ' se , kʉrɨ tenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ apurɨto ' ipɨkɨrɨ i ' se te ' sen esi mɨrɨ , usenku ' tɨn ipɨ ' pen nɨ .

text: Did not Moses give you the law , and yet none of you keepeth the law ? Why go ye about to kill me ?
text2: Mosi ' uya Main ke ɨrepa ' pʉ kon , pen nɨ katɨ ? E ' tane tikin nan nɨ iyawɨron pʉra rɨ iyesi . Ɨ ' rɨ wenai uwɨpai ɨwesi kon ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: The people answered and said , Thou hast a devil : who goeth about to kill thee ?
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' anpisin ton uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ene rɨ esi mɨrɨ ayau ! Ɨnʉ ' nai ɨwɨnɨ i ' se ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , I have done one work , and ye all marvel .
