text2: Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Tikin nɨ eke Papa tʉrawasooi kupʉ ' pʉ uya , mɨrɨpan pɨ ' ɨusewansiuka ' pʉ kon .

text: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision ; ( not because it is of Moses , but of the fathers ; ) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man .
text2: Mosi ' uya ayapiyontɨ ' pʉ kon ɨmunkɨ kon yun pi ' pɨ puturʉkapɨtʉ kon pa ( Mosi ' pen nɨ e ' tane atamokori kon amʉ ' uya isara ' tɨ ' pʉ ) , Sapa ' a ' tai si warawo ' mʉre yun pi ' pɨ puturʉka auya ' nokon .

text: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision , that the law of Moses should not be broken ; are ye angry at me , because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day ?
text2: Warawo ' mʉre yun pi ' pɨ si puturʉka yau Sapa ' a ' tai , Mosi ' maimu si e ' kwɨtʉ namai ' , ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' ken si upɨ ' ausakorota kon ka ' pon epi ' tɨsa ' uya pɨ ' Sapa ' a ' tai ?

text: Judge not according to the appearance , but judge righteous judgment .
text2: Kɨpo ' po rɨ ka ' pon eseru aimenkato ' auya ' nokon ereutanʉ ' tɨ ' , i ' napairon yai eseru aimenkato ' iku ' tɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then said some of them of Jerusalem , Is not this he , whom they seek to kill ?
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , tʉron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' Surusiran pon kon usekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Pʉse rɨ pen pe ' iwɨnɨ i ' se to ' na ' ne ' ?

text: But , lo , he speaketh boldly , and they say nothing unto him . Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ ?
text2: Apʉne entɨ ' , iye ' nama pʉra rɨ annau isaurokʉ , ɨnʉ ' uya ɨ ' rɨ ta pʉra rɨ ipɨ ' . Pata epuru ton uya pe ' , Kʉrai rɨ ta pe iyesi ipɨ ' ?

text: Howbeit we know this man whence he is : but when Christ cometh , no man knoweth whence he is .
text2: E ' tane sa ' ne , Kʉrai uye ' sa ' a ' tai , ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ mɨrɨ winon tukai ' i ' tuto ' pʉra rɨ nin iyesi . E ' tane i ' tu ' nokon mɨrɨ winon pe tukai ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught , saying , Ye both know me , and ye know whence I am : and I am not come of myself , but he that sent me is true , whom ye know not .
text2: Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' tau ka ' pon amʉ ' enupai ' ma eke pe tʉmaimu tʉku ' se Sises uya , “ Ui ' tu auya ' nokon kuru rɨ si , mɨrɨ winon tukai ' kuru rɨ nɨrɨ . E ' tane sa ' ne uiwano ' pe uye ' sa ' pen , e ' tane rɨ uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ esi ikasima auya ' nokon pokena ' pen nɨ . Ɨni ' tunʉ kon pen nɨ ,

text: But I know him : for I am from him , and he hath sent me .
text2: e ' tane uni ' tunʉ , apʉne pʉra iwinon pe esi , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ inennoko ' pʉ pe esi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then they sought to take him : but no man laid hands on him , because his hour was not yet come .
text2: Mɨrɨpan a ' si i ' se to ' esi ' pʉ , mɨrɨ e ' tane ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ a ' pɨ ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ pen nɨ , apʉne pʉra iweyu e ' seposa ' pʉra rɨ marɨ iyesi ' pʉ .

text: And many of the people believed on him , and said , When Christ cometh , will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done ?
text2: E ' tane tu ' kan kon anpisin tonpa ton uya rɨ apurɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya , “ Kʉrai uye ' sa ' a ' tai , pʉse rɨ nʉku ' ai ' ne ' entai kuru nɨrɨ ken pe ' eke Papa tʉrawasooi ti ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ ku ' to ' iya oton ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him ; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him .
text2: Pari ' si amʉ ' uya serɨ ton pɨ ' ka ' pon amʉ ' etarerumʉ eta ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pari ' si amʉ ' uya use ' man nɨto ' , ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' erasu ton ennoko ' pʉ Sises a ' sise ' na .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Yet a little while am I with you , and then I go unto him that sent me .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Ɨpiyau ' nokon esi serɨ mara rʉ ' kwɨ parɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ nin si utɨ mɨrɨ uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ piya ' .

text: Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come .
text2: Uwarinpato ' auya ' nokon oton e ' tane uyepoto ' auya ' nokon oton pen , apʉne pʉra iyau e ' ai ' ne ' ya ' ɨutɨ kon pʉra iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then said the Jews among themselves , Whither will he go , that we shall not find him ? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles , and teach the Gentiles ?
text2: Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton usekama ' po ' pʉ tʉtonpa kon amʉ ' pokon pe esii ' ma , “ Nai ya ' mairɨ itɨ eporo poken pʉra ? Kiri ' amʉ ' pata ' se ' airɨ katɨ itɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' na ' ne ' airɨ , Kiri ' amʉ ' enupai ' ?

text: What manner of saying is this that he said , Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come ?
text2: ‘ Uwarinpato ' auya ' nokon oton e ' tane uyepoto ' auya ' nokon oton pen , ’ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ , ‘ Iyau e ' ai ' ne ' ya ' ɨutɨ kon pʉra iyesi , ’ ta iya pɨ ' sa ' ne . Ɨ ' rɨ ta iya e ' kwa pe iyesi ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: In the last day , that great day of the feast , Jesus stood and cried , saying , If any man thirst , let him come unto me , and drink .
text2: Tʉku ' sen weyu u ' matʉ esi ' pʉ ipan pe , eke pe kuru te ' sen pe . Mɨrɨ wʉi a ' tai , Sises e ' soto ' kasa ' uya ta ' pʉ eke pe tʉmaimu tʉku ' se , “ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ tuna ' kiri ' ke te ' sen nʉyepʉi upiya ' tʉyuku epose .

text: He that believeth on me , as the scripture hath said , out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ uyapurɨ pe iyesi a ' tai , iye ' menukasa ' itekare nɨkayai ' ne ' kasa rɨ , ‘ I ' napaino rɨ to ' panʉ ' nin tuna epa ' ka mɨrɨ iyapai , ’ ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: ( But this spake he of the Spirit , which they that believe on him should receive : for the Holy Ghost was not yet given ; because that Jesus was not yet glorified . )
text2: Serɨ ta ' pʉ Sises uya mɨrɨ , A ' kwarʉ pɨ ' kamoro tapurɨnin nan pe te ' san nepoton pɨ ' . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , A ' kwarʉ e ' tʉsa ' pʉra rɨ marɨ iyesi ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra Sises enasa ' pʉra iyesi ' pʉ tapurɨpɨ ' to ' ya ' .

text: Many of the people therefore , when they heard this saying , said , Of a truth this is the Prophet .
text2: Tu ' kan kon ka ' pon amʉ ' anpisin koro ' tawon kon uya serɨ ta iya eta ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan kon uya , “ Pʉserɨ rɨ esi serɨ Pu ' kena ' pe , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Others said , This is the Christ . But some said , Shall Christ come out of Galilee ?
text2: Tʉron kon uya , “ Kʉrai pʉse rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ e ' tane tʉron kon uya , “ Kʉrai uye ' to ' pʉra rɨ iyesi Kiyarari winɨpai .

text: Hath not the scripture said , That Christ cometh of the seed of David , and out of the town of Bethlehem , where David was ?
text2: Iye ' menukasa ' itekare uya ta , Kʉrai e ' to ' pe iyesi kin Tepi ' pa rʉ ' pʉ pe , Pe ' teri ' en po iyentu , Tepi ' uko ' mamʉ ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ yau , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: So there was a division among the people because of him .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' si ka ' pon amʉ ' epantakapɨtʉ ' pʉ kʉrɨ rɨ uriya ' .

text: And some of them would have taken him ; but no man laid hands on him .
text2: Tʉron kon esi ' pʉ a ' si i ' se , e ' tane ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ temiyatʉ tʉrʉ ' pʉ pen ipɨ ' .

text: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees ; and they said unto them , Why have ye not brought him ?
text2: Erasu ton enna ' po ' pʉ use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pari ' si amʉ ' piya ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' tʉne ' se pʉra ɨwesi ' pʉ kon ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: The officers answered , Never man spake like this man .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' erasu ton uya , “ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ usaurokʉ pʉra iyesi pʉse rɨ kasa , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Then answered them the Pharisees , Are ye also deceived ?
text2: “ Ɨyenku ' tɨsa ' iya ' nokon kanan na ' kɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ Pari ' si amʉ ' uya to ' pɨ ' .

text: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him ?
text2: “ Itepuru tonpa ton nɨ mɨrɨ pe pʉra Pari ' si amʉ ' tonpa ton nɨ uya pe ' apurɨ tukai ' mi ' tuyatʉu ?

text: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed .
text2: Pʉsamoro uya main , Mosi ' winon i ' tu pʉra iyesi mɨrɨ ; mɨrɨ wenai , Papa nʉpa ' nʉkʉ ' san pe to ' esi mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Nicodemus saith unto them , ( he that came to Jesus by night , being one of them , )
text2: Nekutimas esi ' pʉ to ' tonpa pe , wapiya ewarupɨ nau itɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ Sises piya ' ,

text: Doth our law judge any man , before it hear him , and know what he doeth ?
text2: mɨrɨpan uya , “ Main uya , ‘ Ka ' pon pɨ ' ɨri ta pʉra iyesi eta tʉpo pʉra rɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ inkupʉ ' pʉ eposa ' pen nɨ e ' tane , ’ tasa ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: They answered and said unto him , Art thou also of Galilee ? Search , and look : for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet .
text2: “ Kiyarari pon nɨ marɨ pe ' ɨmɨrɨ ? Iye ' menukasa ' itekare pɨ ' ɨsenupa ' ; mɨrɨ a ' tai , i ' tu auya mɨrɨ Pu ' kena ' uye ' to ' pʉra rɨ iyesi Kiyarari winɨ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And every man went unto his own house .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , tanporon kon utunta ' pʉ .

text: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives .
text2: E ' tane Sises utɨ ' pʉ Are ' Wʉpʉ pona .

text: And early in the morning he came again into the temple , and all the people came unto him ; and he sat down , and taught them .
text2: Mɨrɨ ema ' sa ' yau awanakʉi ' iyenna ' po ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' pʉ ' kʉ ta ' . Anpisin pe ka ' pon amʉ ' amʉra ' pʉ iwoi , mɨrɨpan ereuta ' pʉ to ' enupase ' na .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery ; and when they had set her in the midst ,
text2: Main pɨ ' enupanin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pari ' si amʉ ' uya uri ' san nee ' pʉ , iyekuma koro ' tau tʉneporo ' pʉ kon , mɨrɨpan soto ' ka ' pʉ to ' uya tu ' kan kon annau ,

text: They say unto him , Master , this woman was taken in adultery , in the very act .
text2: mɨrɨpan kon uya ta ' pʉ Sises pɨ ' , “ Ti ' sa , pʉse rɨ uri ' san eposa ' ina uya ekuman pɨ ' .

text: Now Moses in the law commanded us , that such should be stoned : but what sayest thou ?
text2: Main yau Mosi ' uya ina pɨ ' tasa ' kamoro waraino kon uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' tʉwɨsan tɨ ' ke , tasa ' iya . Ɨ ' rɨ ken mʉkayan ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: This they said , tempting him , that they might have to accuse him . But Jesus stooped down , and with his finger wrote on the ground , as though he heard them not .
text2: Serɨ tukai ' to ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ tʉmusunu kon pe eseru ' tɨto ' tʉuya ' nokon ipɨkɨrɨ pe . E ' tane Sises e ' tɨmuika ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ non menuka pɨ ' temiyatʉ ke .

text: So when they continued asking him , he lifted up himself , and said unto them , He that is without sin among you , let him first cast a stone at her .
text2: Tekama ' popɨtʉ pɨ ' rɨ to ' e ' tane , iye ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ ɨ ' koro ' tawon kon esi yau imakooi pʉra , tɨwɨ si asara ' tɨi ' nokon tɨ ' ke iwɨnɨ pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And again he stooped down , and wrote on the ground .
text2: Mɨrɨpan e ' tɨmuikakaa ' pʉ kanan non menukai ' .

text: And they which heard it , being convicted by their own conscience , went out one by one , beginning at the eldest , even unto the last : and Jesus was left alone , and the woman standing in the midst .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' , kamoro etanin nʉ ' san e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ utɨpɨ ' nɨ pɨ ' tikin pa ' ne , kɨɨyi ' amʉ ' wapiya , Sises rɨken tʉnonkai ' , uri ' san nɨken si e ' soto ' kasa ' mɨrɨ yau pokon pe .

text: When Jesus had lifted up himself , and saw none but the woman , he said unto her , Woman , where are those thine accusers ? hath no man condemned thee ?
text2: Sises e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ma ' non , nai kamo si ? Ɨnʉ ' uya ɨri ta uya uya ɨyeno ' masa ' pʉra rɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: She said , No man , Lord . And Jesus said unto her , Neither do I condemn thee : go , and sin no more .
text2: “ Itepuru , ɨnʉ ' pʉra rɨ man , ” ta ' pʉ iya . “ Urɨ uya rɨ nɨrɨ si ɨri ta pe ɨyeno ' mato ' pʉra man . Enta si , makoi yau ɨuko ' manto ' tʉnonkai ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then spake Jesus again unto them , saying , I am the light of the world : he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness , but shall have the light of life .
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' auro ' kakapʉ tʉuya a ' tai kanan , Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Pata weyu pe esi . Ɨnʉ ' rɨ upɨkɨrɨ tʉuye ' sen uya , uko ' man nɨto ' weyu eporo mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ewarupɨ yau isato ' oton pen nɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: The Pharisees therefore said unto him , Thou bearest record of thyself ; thy record is not true .
text2: Pari ' si amʉ ' uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Mɨrɨ si ɨiwano ' pe ɨusekama , mʉkayai ' ne ' esi mɨrɨ i ' napai rɨ pʉra rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Though I bear record of myself , yet my record is true : for I know whence I came , and whither I go ; but ye cannot tell whence I come , and whither I go .
text2: Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Uiwano ' pe rɨ si usekama pe iyesi yau , ukayai ' ne ' nin si esi i ' napairɨ rɨ , apʉne pʉra iwinɨ uye ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ utɨto ' ya ' i ' tu uya . E ' tane nai winɨ uye ' sa ' , nai ya ' utɨ tukai ' i ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi .

text: Ye judge after the flesh ; I judge no man .
text2: Ka ' pon pe kuru rɨ eseru aimenka auya ' nokon ; ɨnʉ ' eseru aimenka uya pʉra nin man .

text: And yet if I judge , my judgment is true : for I am not alone , but I and the Father that sent me .
text2: E ' tane ɨnʉ ' rɨ eseru aimenka uya pe iyesi yau , iyawɨrɨ kuru iku ' sa ' uya mɨrɨ , apʉne pʉra tikin sarɨ esi kasa pʉra , ikʉipʉnʉ , uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ pokon pe esi .

text: It is also written in your law , that the testimony of two men is true .
text2: Ɨiwano ' kon nɨ Main , Mosi ' winon yau iye ' menukasa ' , asa ' ron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uya ekama a ' tai i ' napai rɨ iyesi tasa ' .

text: I am one that bear witness of myself , and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me .
text2: Uiwano ' pe rɨ si usekama , tʉron nɨ uyekamanin kanan esi ikʉipʉnʉ , uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is thy Father ? Jesus answered , Ye neither know me , nor my Father : if ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , to ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Nai kʉrɨ ken si ɨkʉipʉnʉ ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . “ Ui ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi , ukʉipʉnʉ rɨ nɨrɨ i ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi . Ui ' tu auya ' nokon yau , ukʉipʉnʉ rɨ nɨrɨ mi ' tutʉi ' no , ” tukai ' to ' eikʉ ' pʉ iya .

text: These words spake Jesus in the treasury , as he taught in the temple : and no man laid hands on him ; for his hour was not yet come .
text2: Serɨ ta pɨ ' Sises esi ' pʉ to ' enupai ' ma Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' pʉ ' kʉ tau , to ' use ' mato ' en ton pata piyau iwa esii ' ma . E ' tane ɨnʉ ' uya a ' si ' pʉ pen nɨ , apʉne pʉra iweyu e ' seposa ' pʉra iyesi pɨ ' .

text: Then said Jesus again unto them , I go my way , and ye shall seek me , and shall die in your sins : whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Sises uya kanan takaa ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Utɨto ' oton mɨrɨ . Uwarinpato ' auya ' nokon oton , e ' tane amakooi kon yau rɨ auma ' tato ' oton kon . Ɨutɨ kon pʉra iyesi utɨyai ' ne ' ya ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then said the Jews , Will he kill himself ? because he saith , Whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Serɨ uya Esuwerʉ amʉ ' usekama ' po emapu ' tɨ ' pʉ , “ Tiwano ' pe pe ' iye ' wɨnɨ ? Mɨrɨ pɨ ' pe ' , ‘ Ɨutɨ kon pʉra iyesi utɨyai ' ne ' ya ' , ’ ta iya ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And he said unto them , Ye are from beneath ; I am from above : ye are of this world ; I am not of this world .
text2: E ' tane miyarɨ rɨ ta ' pʉ iya , “ Iyo ' non winon pe ɨwesi kon , itepoino winon pe e ' tane . Serɨ non pon kon pe ɨwesi kon , serɨ non pon pe pʉra e ' tane .

text: I said therefore unto you , that ye shall die in your sins : for if ye believe not that I am he , ye shall die in your sins .
text2: Auma ' tato ' oton kon amakooi kon yau ta ' pʉ uya , kʉrɨ rɨ urɨ , ukayai ' ne ' apurɨ auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi yau , auma ' ta kon kuru rɨ amakooi kon yau , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? And Jesus saith unto them , Even the same that I said unto you from the beginning .
text2: “ Ɨnʉ ' pe ken ɨwesi ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' . “ Mɨsi ' kɨrɨ rɨ sa ' ne kʉrɨ rɨ ukayai ' ne ' rɨ , ” tukai ' Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ .

text: I have many things to say and to judge of you : but he that sent me is true ; and I speak to the world those things which I have heard of him .
text2: “ Eke pe rɨ tato ' uya man ɨyeseru kon aimenka pe . E ' tane uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ kuru esi i ' napairon pe ; kʉrɨ rɨ winɨ uneta ' pʉ nin ekama uya non pon kon pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: They understood not that he spake to them of the Father .
text2: To ' uya ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ pʉra iyesi ' pʉ tʉkʉipʉnʉ pɨ ' tauro ' ka tane iya ' nokon .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , When ye have lifted up the Son of man , then shall ye know that I am he , and that I do nothing of myself ; but as my Father hath taught me , I speak these things .
text2: Mɨrɨpan pɨ ' Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Ka ' pon , Papa winon , anʉnsa ' auya ' nokon a ' tai ka ' takʉi ' , mɨrɨ a ' tai ui ' tuto ' auya ' nokon oton ɨnʉ ' pe esi tukai ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨ ' rɨ rɨ kupʉ uya pʉra iyesi uiwano ' pe , e ' tane ikʉipʉnʉ uya rɨken uyenupa ' pʉ pɨ ' usaurokʉ .

text: And he that sent me is with me : the Father hath not left me alone ; for I do always those things that please him .
text2: Uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ rɨ pokon pe esi ; tikin sarɨ unonkasa ' iya pen , apʉne pʉra ipori ' manin ku ' nin pe esi ke , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: As he spake these words , many believed on him .
text2: Isauro ' tane rɨ marɨ , tu ' kan kon uya rɨ apurɨto ' tʉuya ' nokon tʉrʉ ' pʉ ipɨ ' .

text: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him , If ye continue in my word , then are ye my disciples indeed ;
text2: Esuwerʉ amʉ ' tapurɨnin nan pɨ ' ta ' pʉ Sises uya , “ Ɨyenupato ' kon uya pɨ ' auta ' sisa ' kon yau , upoitorʉ ton pe kuru rɨ ɨwesi kon mɨrɨ .

text: And ye shall know the truth , and the truth shall make you free .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai i ' napairon i ' tuto ' auya ' nokon oton , mɨrɨpan uya imo ' kasa ' pe ɨkupʉ kon mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: They answered him , We be Abraham ' s seed , and were never in bondage to any man : how sayest thou , Ye shall be made free ?
text2: To ' uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ina kamoro Epʉra ' an payan ton ; ɨnʉ ' rɨ enawon kon ye ' pen nɨ . Nai kasa imo ' kasa ' pe ɨwe ' to ' oton kon ta auya ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Jesus answered them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin .
text2: Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; tanporon kon nʉmakoitayai ' ne ' nan esi makoi poitorʉ ton pe .

text: And the servant abideth not in the house for ever : but the Son abideth ever .
text2: Ipoitorʉ pe te ' sen esi mɨrɨ tʉtonpa ton koro ' tawon pen nɨ , e ' tane imu rɨken esi mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ yawon tɨwɨro ' e ' pe rɨ .

text: If the Son therefore shall make you free , ye shall be free indeed .
text2: Imu uya ɨmo ' kasa ' kon pe iyesi yau , imo ' kasa ' pe kuru rɨ ɨwesi kon mɨrɨ .

text: I know that ye are Abraham ' s seed ; but ye seek to kill me , because my word hath no place in you .
text2: Epʉra ' an payan pe ɨwesi kon tukai ' si ' tuyai ' , mɨrɨ rɨ e ' tane uwɨnɨ pɨ ' ɨye ' kamasa ' kon , apʉne pʉra umaimu pata pʉra rɨ ɨwesi kon wenai ayau ' nokon .

text: I speak that which I have seen with my Father : and ye do that which ye have seen with your father .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; unene ' pʉ ikʉipʉnʉ piyau ; ɨkʉipʉnʉ kon winɨ ɨneta ' pʉ kon kupʉ auya ' nokon nɨ nɨrɨ mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: They answered and said unto him , Abraham is our father . Jesus saith unto them , If ye were Abraham ' s children , ye would do the works of Abraham .
text2: “ Epʉra ' an kʉrɨ rɨ ina kʉipʉnʉ , ” tukai ' to ' uya eikʉ ' pʉ . “ Epʉra ' an munkɨ pe rɨ rʉ ' san pe ɨwesi kon yau , inkupʉ ' pʉ mʉku ' tʉi ' no .

text: But now ye seek to kill me , a man that hath told you the truth , which I have heard of God : this did not Abraham .
text2: Na ' ne ' rɨ si , uwɨnɨ pɨ ' ɨye ' kupʉ kon , ka ' pon sa ' ne i ' napairon ekamanin nɨ ɨpɨ ' nokon tʉneta ' pʉ Papa winon . Epʉra ' an uya mʉku ' atʉi ' ne ' waraino ku ' sa ' pʉra rɨ iyesi .

text: Ye do the deeds of your father . Then said they to him , We be not born of fornication ; we have one Father , even God .
text2: Ɨkʉipʉnʉ kon nʉkupʉnʉ rɨ nin kupʉ auya ' nokon mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya . “ Pʉrau amʉ ' ton pen nɨ ina , Papa rɨken kʉrɨ rɨ ina kʉipʉnʉ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Jesus said unto them , If God were your Father , ye would love me : for I proceeded forth and came from God ; neither came I of myself , but he sent me .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Papa esi yau ɨkʉipʉnʉ kon pe , ui ' nʉnkatʉi ' no , Papa winɨpai uye ' sa ' pɨ ' serɨ ya ' . Uiwano ' pe uye ' sa ' pen , e ' tane uyenno ' sa ' iya .

text: Why do ye not understand my speech ? even because ye cannot hear my word .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' sa ' man pe rɨ umaimu esi ɨpona ' nokon ? Umaimu ɨnetapai pʉra ɨwesi kon pɨ ' iyesi .

text: Ye are of your father the devil , and the lusts of your father ye will do . He was a murderer from the beginning , and abode not in the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he speaketh a lie , he speaketh of his own : for he is a liar , and the father of it .
text2: Ɨkʉipʉnʉ kon , Makoi munkɨ pe ɨwesi kon , ɨkʉipʉnʉ kon maimu awɨrɨ e ' pai ɨwesi kon . Te ' wɨsen ye ' kʉrɨ rɨ iyepiya ' tɨ ' pʉ si ' kɨrɨ rɨ , tʉuta ' sisen pen nɨ i ' napairon pɨ ' , i ' napairon ye ' pe pʉra tesi pɨ ' . Kasi pe iyesi a ' tai , teseru pe rɨ te ' sen kupʉ iya mɨrɨ , kasi ye ' pe tesi pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kasi ye ' ton kʉipʉnʉ pe tesi pɨ ' .

text: And because I tell you the truth , ye believe me not .
text2: I ' napairon ekama tane uya , uyapurɨ auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi .

text: Which of you convinceth me of sin ? And if I say the truth , why do ye not believe me ?
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ uya tʉmakooi ke ui ' tu ? I ' napai rɨ usaurokʉ pe iyesi yau , ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' uyapurɨpai pʉra ɨwesi kon ?

text: He that is of God heareth God ' s words : ye therefore hear them not , because ye are not of God .
text2: Papa iwano ' uya rɨ , Papa maimu eta mɨrɨ . Eta auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi , apʉne pʉra Papa iwano ' pe pʉra ɨwesi kon pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then answered the Jews , and said unto him , Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan , and hast a devil ?
text2: Esuwerʉ amʉ ' uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ina uya pe ' ta pʉn Sameriya pon pe ɨwesi , ɨri a ' kwarʉ yen pe ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Jesus answered , I have not a devil ; but I honour my Father , and ye do dishonour me .
text2: “ Ɨri a ' kwarʉ yen pen nɨ urɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya , “ ukʉipʉnʉ nama uya , e ' tane unama auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi .

text: And I seek not mine own glory : there is one that seeketh and judgeth .
text2: Uyapurɨpɨ ' to ' warinpa uya pen , e ' tane moro iyesi mɨrɨ iwarinpanin ; kʉrɨ rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ eseru aimenkanin .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , If a man keep my saying , he shall never see death .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; umaimu awɨron esi yau , iyeri ' to ' oton pen nɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Now we know that thou hast a devil . Abraham is dead , and the prophets ; and thou sayest , If a man keep my saying , he shall never taste of death .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' Esuwerʉ amʉ ' uya , “ Serɨ si ina uya i ' tu ɨri a ' kwarʉ yen pe ɨwesi tukai ' ! Epʉra ' an erikʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pu ' kena ' amʉ ' rɨ nɨrɨ erikʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨ e ' tane si ɨnʉ ' rɨ esi yau umaimu awɨrɨ iyeri ' to ' oton pen nɨ ta auya .

text: Art thou greater than our father Abraham , which is dead ? and the prophets are dead : whom makest thou thyself ?
text2: Eke pe kuru pe ' ina kʉipʉnʉ Epʉra ' an entai ɨwesi ? Iyerikʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pu ' kena ' amʉ ' rɨ nɨrɨ erikʉ ' pʉ . Ɨnʉ ' pe kuru ɨye ' kupʉ ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Jesus answered , If I honour myself , my honour is nothing : it is my Father that honoureth me ; of whom ye say , that he is your God :
text2: Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Uiwano ' pe utapurɨpɨtʉ yau , utapurɨ pe pʉra rɨ iyesi . Ukʉipʉnʉ , ina e ' to ' itese ' pɨ ' mʉkayatʉi ' ne ' uya nin uyapurɨpɨtʉ mɨrɨ .

text: Yet ye have not known him ; but I know him : and if I should say , I know him not , I shall be a liar like unto you : but I know him , and keep his saying .
text2: I ' tu tane auya ' nokon pʉra rɨ , i ' tu uya nin . I ' tunin pen urɨ ta uya yau , kasi pe esi , akasa ' nokon , e ' tane i ' tu uya , imaimu awɨrɨ nɨrɨ esi .

text: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day : and he saw it , and was glad .
text2: Ɨkʉipʉnʉ kon , Epʉra ' an esi ' pʉ pori ' pe uweyu ento ' oton tʉuya pɨ ' ; mɨrɨpan uya ensa ' epori ' ma ' pʉ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Thou art not yet fifty years old , and hast thou seen Abraham ?
text2: “ 50 kaisa rɨ pʉra rɨ ɨwʉipiyaai man , mɨrɨ pe ' e ' tane Epʉra ' an ene ' pʉ auya ? ” ta ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' uya ipɨ ' .

text: Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Before Abraham was , I am .
text2: “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; Epʉra ' an entu rawɨrɨ rɨ , urɨ esi ! ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: Then took they up stones to cast at him : but Jesus hid himself , and went out of the temple , going through the midst of them , and so passed by .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' , tɨ ' amuku ' pʉ to ' uya ipona eno ' mapɨ ' to ' pe tʉuya ' nokon , e ' tane Sises e ' so ' namʉ ' pʉ , itɨ ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' nono apai .

text: And as Jesus passed by , he saw a man which was blind from his birth .
text2: Sises usarɨ koro ' tau , tentu ' pʉ si ' kɨrɨ tenku ' ne te ' sen ka ' pon ene ' pʉ iya .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Master , who did sin , this man , or his parents , that he was born blind ?
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Rapai , ɨnʉ ' uya makoi kupʉ ' pʉ - - - pʉse rɨ ka ' pon uya pe ' , isanon uya katɨ , tenku ' ne iyentu temapu ' tɨi ' ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Jesus answered , Neither hath this man sinned , nor his parents : but that the works of God should be made manifest in him .
text2: Sises uya to ' maimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Pʉse rɨ ka ' pon e ' makoimasa ' pʉra iyesi , isanon nɨrɨ , e ' tane Papa tʉrawasooi usenpoikato ' pe iyawɨrɨ iye ' ku ' sa ' pe iyesi .

text: I must work the works of him that sent me , while it is day : the night cometh , when no man can work .
text2: Wʉi nai pata esi koro ' tau , uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ tʉrawasooi ku ' pai ' nokon . Ewarupɨ nʉye ' an , ɨnʉ ' rɨ e ' tʉrawasoma weyu pen .

text: As long as I am in the world , I am the light of the world .
text2: Serɨ non po esi koro ' tau , urɨ esi non weyu pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: When he had thus spoken , he spat on the ground , and made clay of the spittle , and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay ,
text2: Serɨ kasa tʉusaurokʉ ' pʉ tʉpo , non pona iyeta ' ta ' pʉ . Tawa koneka ' pʉ iya eta ' namanka ' pʉ ke , mɨrɨpan tʉrʉ ' pʉ iya ka ' pon enu pona .

text: And said unto him , Go , wash in the pool of Siloam , ( which is by interpretation , Sent . ) He went his way therefore , and washed , and came seeing .
text2: Ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' , “ Ekumi ' ta , Sairon ku ' pɨri ka ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya . ( Sairon tawon main esi mɨrɨ Enno ' sa ' ta e ' kwa pe . ) Mɨrɨ a ' tai , itɨ ' pʉ , iyekumisi ' pʉ , iyee ' pʉ ennin pe tenai ' .

text: The neighbours therefore , and they which before had seen him that he was blind , said , Is not this he that sat and begged ?
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , itonpa ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wapiya tenku ' ne ennin nʉ ' san uya ta ' pʉ , “ Pʉse rɨ pen pe ' tereutai ' eta ' kwanʉn nɨ pɨ ' nʉko ' manpɨ ' taine ' pen ? ” ta ' pʉ .

text: Some said , This is he : others said , He is like him : but he said , I am he .
text2: Tʉron kon uya , “ Pʉse rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ . Tʉron kon uya , “ Kʉrɨ rɨ kasa rɨ marɨ isene , ” ta ' pʉ . E ' tane , “ Urɨ rɨ kʉrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Therefore said they unto him , How were thine eyes opened ?
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , “ Ɨ ' rɨ tukai ' ɨyenu uta ' kokasa ' ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' .

text: He answered and said , A man that is called Jesus made clay , and anointed mine eyes , and said unto me , Go to the pool of Siloam , and wash : and I went and washed , and I received sight .
text2: To ' maimu eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Sises tukai ' tesa ' sen uya tawa koneka ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ tʉpo , uyenu pona itʉrʉ ' pʉ iya . Ta ' pʉ iya upɨ ' , ‘ Ekumi ' ta Sairon ku ' pɨri ka ' . ’ Utɨ ' pʉ ekumi ' se ' na , mɨrɨ tʉpo ene ' pʉ uya , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is he ? He said , I know not .
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' , “ Nai kʉrɨ ken si ? ” “ I ' tu uya pʉra iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind .
text2: Tenku ' ne iko ' mansa ' rʉ ' pʉ nepʉ ' pʉ to ' uya Pari ' si amʉ ' piya ' .

text: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay , and opened his eyes .
text2: Sapa ' a ' tai Sises uya tawa koneka ' pʉ , itenu nɨrɨ a ' koka ' pʉ iya esi ' pʉ .

text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight . He said unto them , He put clay upon mine eyes , and I washed , and do see .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Pari ' si amʉ ' uya kanan ekama ' po ' pʉ nai kasa ennin pe iyenasa ' tukai ' . Ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ Tawa nonka ' pʉ iya uyenu pona , ikumisi ' pʉ uya , ennin pe nin si esi serɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Therefore said some of the Pharisees , This man is not of God , because he keepeth not the sabbath day . Others said , How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles ? And there was a division among them .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , tʉron kon Pari ' si amʉ ' uya ta ' pʉ , “ Papa winon pe pʉra pʉse rɨ ka ' pon esi , apʉne pʉra Sapa ' apurɨ iya pʉra iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . “ Ɨ ' rɨ tukai ' i ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ kupʉ tʉmakooikenan nɨ ka ' pon uya ? ” ta ' pʉ tʉron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uya , mɨrɨpan kon epantakapɨtʉ ' pʉ .

text: They say unto the blind man again , What sayest thou of him , that he hath opened thine eyes ? He said , He is a prophet .
text2: Tenku ' nan pɨ ' kanan tera ' tɨi ' , “ Ɨ ' rɨ ta auya kʉrɨ ɨyenu a ' kokanin nʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . “ Pu ' kena ' pe iyesi ! ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: But the Jews did not believe concerning him , that he had been blind , and received his sight , until they called the parents of him that had received his sight .
text2: E ' tane Pari ' si amʉ ' uya apurɨ ' pʉ pen tenku ' ne iyesi ' pʉ tukai ' , mɨrɨpan enasa ' ennin pe tukai ' , tenku ' nan sanon kɨ ' ma tʉuya ' nokon pona rɨ .

text: And they asked them , saying , Is this your son , who ye say was born blind ? how then doth he now see ?
text2: To ' uya to ' ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Pʉse rɨ pe ' esi ɨmʉre kon pe ? Tenku ' ne iyentusa ' rʉ ' pʉ tato ' auya ' nokon ipɨ ' ? Nai kasa ken si ennin pe iyenasa ' ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: His parents answered them and said , We know that this is our son , and that he was born blind :
text2: Isanon uya to ' maimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ina uya i ' tu pʉse rɨ esi ina mʉre pe , iyentusa ' rʉ ' pʉ tenku ' ne .

text: But by what means he now seeth , we know not ; or who hath opened his eyes , we know not : he is of age ; ask him : he shall speak for himself .
text2: E ' tane ɨ ' rɨ tukai ' ennin pe iyenasa ' tukai ' ina uya i ' tu pʉra iyesi . Ɨnʉ ' uya itenu a ' kokasa ' tukai ' nɨrɨ ina uya i ' tu pʉra iyesi . Ekama ' potɨ ' . Eke pe iyesi ; tiwano ' pe tʉusauro ' sen pe iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: These words spake his parents , because they feared the Jews : for the Jews had agreed already , that if any man did confess that he was Christ , he should be put out of the synagogue .
text2: Serɨ ta ' pʉ isanon uya , apʉne pʉra enari ' ke ' to ' esi ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pɨ ' , apʉne pʉra Esuwerʉ amʉ ' e ' ku ' sa ' esi ' pʉ ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ Kʉrai pe Sises esi tukai ' ekamasa ' a ' tai , ipa ' kato ' pe iyesi usenupan nɨto ' iwʉ ' tapai tukai ' .

text: Therefore said his parents , He is of age ; ask him .
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai , “ Eke pe iyesi ; tiwano ' pe tʉusauro ' sen pe , ” ta ' pʉ isanon uya .

text: Then again called they the man that was blind , and said unto him , Give God the praise : we know that this man is a sinner .
text2: Iyakon ite ' kwa pe tenku ' nan nʉ ' pʉ ka ' pon kɨ ' makaa ' pʉ to ' uya kanan . Ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' , “ Papa apurɨpɨ ' kɨ ; pʉse rɨ nin i ' tu pɨ ' ina man tʉmakooikenan pe , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: He answered and said , Whether he be a sinner or no , I know not : one thing I know , that , whereas I was blind , now I see .
text2: To ' maimu eikʉ ' pʉ iya tai ' ma , “ Tʉmakooi ke iyesi , mɨrɨ pe pʉra imakooi pʉra iyesi , i ' tu uya pʉra iyesi , e ' tane tikin nan nɨ i ' tu uya ; tenku ' ne esi ' pʉ , e ' tane serɨ pe ene uya ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then said they to him again , What did he to thee ? how opened he thine eyes ?
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo kanan to ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ kupʉ ' pʉ iya ɨpɨ ' ? Ɨ ' rɨ tukai ' ɨyenu a ' koka ' pʉ iya ? ”

text: He answered them , I have told you already , and ye did not hear : wherefore would ye hear it again ? will ye also be his disciples ?
text2: To ' maimu eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Ayauro ' kakaa ' pʉ uya ' nokon , etasa ' auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi . Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' ɨnetapai kanan ɨwesi kon ? Ipoitorʉ ton pe nɨrɨ pe ' e ' pai ɨwesi kon ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then they reviled him , and said , Thou art his disciple ; but we are Moses ' disciples .
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo to ' uya ipa ' nʉkʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨmɨrɨ esi mɨrɨ ipoitorʉ pe ! Ina nin Mosi ' poitorʉ ton , ” tai ' ma .

text: We know that God spake unto Moses : as for this fellow , we know not from whence he is .
text2: “ Papa uya Mosi ' auro ' ka ' pʉ tukai ' ina uya i ' tu , e ' tane nai winɨ kʉrɨ rɨ uye ' sa ' tukai ' ina uya i ' tu pʉra iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: The man answered and said unto them , Why herein is a marvellous thing , that ye know not from whence he is , and yet he hath opened mine eyes .
text2: Ka ' pon uya to ' maimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pan si ti ' tupɨ ' sen pen nɨ ! Nai winɨ iye ' sa ' tukai ' i ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi , e ' tane uyenu ton a ' koka ' pʉ iya .

text: Now we know that God heareth not sinners : but if any man be a worshipper of God , and doeth his will , him he heareth .
text2: Papa uya tʉmakooikena ' nan eta pʉra iyesi , tukai ' i ' tu ' nokon , e ' tane Papa uya tasa ' kasa te ' sen , iteseru nɨrɨ kupʉi ' ma eta iya .

text: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind .
text2: Non e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ si ' kɨrɨ , isetasa ' pʉra iyesi ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ tenku ' ne iyentusa ' rʉ ' pʉ enu a ' kokasa ' tawon .

text: If this man were not of God , he could do nothing .
text2: Papa winon pe pʉra pʉse rɨ ka ' pon uye ' sa ' a ' tai , ɨ ' rɨ kupʉ iya pen , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: They answered and said unto him , Thou wast altogether born in sins , and dost thou teach us ? And they cast him out .
text2: To ' uya imaimu eikʉ ' pʉ tai ' ma ipɨ ' , “ Makoi yau ɨyentu ' pʉ ! Nai kasa rʉ ' kwɨ ina enupa i ' se ɨwesi ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . Mɨrɨ tʉpo , to ' uya enpa ' ka ' pʉ usenupan nɨto ' iwʉ ' tapai .

text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out ; and when he had found him , he said unto him , Dost thou believe on the Son of God ?
text2: Sises uya to ' uya enpa ' ka ' pʉ eta ' pʉ . Eposa ' tʉuya a ' tai , ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' , “ Ka ' pon , Papa winon pe ' mapurɨyan ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: He answered and said , Who is he , Lord , that I might believe on him ?
text2: Imaimu eikʉ ' pʉ iya , “ Itepuru , ɨnʉ ' pe iyesi ? ” tukai ' , ekama ' po ' pʉ iya . “ Ekamakɨ , apurɨnin pe e ' to ' pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Thou hast both seen him , and it is he that talketh with thee .
text2: Sises uya , “ Ensa ' auya mɨrɨ ; kʉrɨ rɨ ipokon pe masauro ' ai ' ne ' , ” ta ' pʉ .

text: And he said , Lord , I believe . And he worshipped him .
text2: Ta ' pʉ iya , “ Uyepuru , ayapurɨ uya , ” tai ' ma iyepʉrema ' pʉ ipɨ ' .

text: And Jesus said , For judgment I am come into this world , that they which see not might see ; and that they which see might be made blind .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Eseru aimenkato ' wenai serɨ non pona uye ' sa ' kamoro tenku ' ne te ' san uya ento ' pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kamoro ennin nan enato ' pe tenku ' ne , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words , and said unto him , Are we blind also ?
text2: Pari ' si amʉ ' iya ' kɨrɨ te ' san kon uya serɨ ta iya eta ' pʉ . Ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' , “ Ɨ ' rɨ ? Tenku ' ne nɨrɨ ina esi ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Jesus said unto them , If ye were blind , ye should have no sin : but now ye say , We see ; therefore your sin remaineth .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Tenku ' ne ɨwesi kon yau , imakooi pʉra ɨwesi kon , e ' tane ennin pe ɨye ' kupʉ kon pɨ ' , amakooi kon yau rɨ ɨwesi kon .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that entereth not by the door into the sheepfold , but climbeth up some other way , the same is a thief and a robber .
text2: “ I ' napai rɨ ta uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; kʉrɨ rɨ mʉra ' ta awɨrɨ pʉra tewonsen karimeru amʉ ' iwʉ ' ta ' e ' tane tʉron nɨ winɨ tewonsen esi mɨrɨ ama ' e ' , rapumanin nɨ .

text: But he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
text2: E ' tane kʉrɨ rɨ mʉra ' ta awɨrɨ tewonsen esi mɨrɨ karimeru amʉ ' esa ' pe .

text: To him the porter openeth ; and the sheep hear his voice : and he calleth his own sheep by name , and leadeth them out .
text2: Itena ' mʉra ' ta tʉrawasomanin uya mʉra ' ta a ' koka , karimeru amʉ ' uya imaimu eta . To ' ese ' ton yai karimeru amʉ ' kɨ ' ma iya , mɨrɨpan kon pa ' ka iya .

text: And when he putteth forth his own sheep , he goeth before them , and the sheep follow him : for they know his voice .
text2: Tikʉn non karimeru amʉ ' pa ' kasa ' iya a ' tai , to ' wapiya itɨ , karimeru amʉ ' uya nɨrɨ e ' ma ' pʉka , imaimu i ' tu to ' uya wenai .

text: And a stranger will they not follow , but will flee from him : for they know not the voice of strangers .
text2: Ka ' kʉran e ' ma ' pʉka to ' uya pʉra iyesi , e ' tane to ' apʉrʉmʉ ipiyapai , apʉne pʉra ka ' kʉran maimu i ' tu to ' uya pʉra iyesi . ”

text: This parable spake Jesus unto them : but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them .
text2: Sises uya serɨ panton ekama ' pʉ , e ' tane to ' uya ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ pʉra iyesi ' pʉ ɨ ' rɨ ton pɨ ' isaurokʉ tukai ' .

text: Then said Jesus unto them again , Verily , verily , I say unto you , I am the door of the sheep .
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo , Sises uya kanan ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon ; urɨ esi karimeru amʉ ' mʉra ' taai pe .

text: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers : but the sheep did not hear them .
text2: Tanporo kamoro wapiya iye ' sa ' kon esi ama ' e ' ton , rapumanin nan pe nɨrɨ , e ' tane karimeru amʉ ' uya to ' maimu eta pʉra iyesi ' pʉ .

text: I am the door : by me if any man enter in , he shall be saved , and shall go in and out , and find pasture .
text2: Urɨ esi mʉra ' ta pe , urɨ poro ɨnʉ ' rɨ ewomʉ a ' tai , iyepika ' tɨ . Iyewomʉ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyepa ' ka nɨrɨ ti ' kiyari pata ' se ' epose ' na .

text: The thief cometh not , but for to steal , and to kill , and to destroy : I am come that they might have life , and that they might have it more abundantly .
text2: Ama ' e ' uyepʉ ama ' mase ' na rɨken , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iwɨse ' na , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ima ' tanʉ ' se ' na . Urɨ uye ' sa ' uko ' man nɨto ' epoto ' pe to ' uya , eke pe kuru nɨrɨ to ' uya epoto ' pe .

text: I am the good shepherd : the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep .
text2: “ Urɨ esi wakʉ karimeru amʉ ' pa ' simanin . Wakʉ karimeru pa ' simanin pe te ' sen uya tʉuko ' manto ' nonka karimeru amʉ ' iwano ' pe .

text: But he that is an hireling , and not the shepherd , whose own the sheep are not , seeth the wolf coming , and leaveth the sheep , and fleeth : and the wolf catcheth them , and scattereth the sheep .
text2: E ' tane kʉrɨ rɨ te ' masen pe iye ' to ' pe ekama ' posa ' , karimeru amʉ ' esa ' pen , karimeru amʉ ' esi itikʉn non pe pʉra . Ene kaikusi uyepʉ ene iya a ' tai , karimeru amʉ ' nɨmɨ iya . Iyainʉmʉ , ene kaikusi uya to ' a ' si , karimeru amʉ ' nɨrɨ e ' tʉrʉ ' kwa .

text: The hireling fleeth , because he is an hireling , and careth not for the sheep .
text2: Ka ' pon ainʉmʉ , apʉne pʉra te ' masen pe iye ' to ' pe ekama ' posa ' pe tesi ke , aiko tawon pe pʉra iyesi karimeru amʉ ' pɨ ' .

text: I am the good shepherd , and know my sheep , and am known of mine .
text2: “ Urɨ esi wakʉ karimeru amʉ ' pa ' simanin . Uikʉn non karimeru amʉ ' i ' tu uya ; to ' uya nɨrɨ ui ' tu —

text: As the Father knoweth me , even so know I the Father : and I lay down my life for the sheep .
text2: ukʉipʉnʉ uya ui ' tu na ' ne ' kasa , mɨrɨ kasa ukʉipʉnʉ i ' tu uya — mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uko ' manto ' nonka uya karimeru amʉ ' iwano ' pe .

text: And other sheep I have , which are not of this fold : them also I must bring , and they shall hear my voice ; and there shall be one fold , and one shepherd .
text2: Moro tʉron kon karimeru amʉ ' esi mɨrɨ , serɨ yau pʉra rɨ marɨ . Kamoro nɨrɨ nepʉ uya . To ' uya nɨrɨ umaimu eta , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tikin nɨ iten to ' esi , tikin nɨ nɨrɨ to ' pa ' simanin esi .

text: Therefore doth my Father love me , because I lay down my life , that I might take it again .
text2: Ukʉipʉnʉ uya ui ' nʉnka , apʉne pʉra uko ' manto ' nonkasa ' uya pɨ ' , anʉnka ' to ' pe uya kanan .

text: No man taketh it from me , but I lay it down of myself . I have power to lay it down , and I have power to take it again . This commandment have I received of my Father .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ uya imo ' ka pʉra iyesi upiyapai , e ' tane urɨ pe rɨ inonkasa ' uya . Inonkato ' meruntɨ esi upiyau , anʉnka ' to ' uya rɨ kanan . Serɨ uyapiyo ' mato ' eposa ' uya ukʉipʉnʉ winɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: There was a division therefore again among the Jews for these sayings .
text2: Serɨ ton main pɨkɨrɨ , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' kanan epantakapɨtʉ ' pʉ .

text: And many of them said , He hath a devil , and is mad ; why hear ye him ?
text2: Tu ' kan kon uya , “ Makoi esi ipiyau , iya ' kwarʉ pʉra iyesi . Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' imaimu eta auya ' nokon ? ” ta ' pʉ .

text: Others said , These are not the words of him that hath a devil . Can a devil open the eyes of the blind ?
text2: Tʉron kon uya ta ' pʉ , “ Makoi esa ' maimu ton pen nɨ serɨ . Makoi uya pe ' tenku ' nan enu a ' koka poken nai ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And it was at Jerusalem the feast of the dedication , and it was winter .
text2: Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' uta ' koka ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ e ' seporo ' pʉ Surusiran po . Ikomi ' pe pata esi weyu pe iyesi ' pʉ .

text: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Sises usarɨ koro ' tau Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' iwʉ ' pʉ ' kʉ tau , Saraman Epa ' kato ' Iya ' tawɨrɨ ,

text: Then came the Jews round about him , and said unto him , How long dost thou make us to doubt ? If thou be the Christ , tell us plainly .
text2: mɨrɨ a ' tai , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' uyee ' pʉ iwoi . Ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pʉ ' kʉ pona ina ko ' manʉkʉ auya usenuminkan pɨ ' ? Kʉrai pe ɨwesi a ' tai , wakʉ pe ina pɨ ' ɨsekamakɨ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Jesus answered them , I told you , and ye believed not : the works that I do in my Father ' s name , they bear witness of me .
text2: Sises uya to ' maimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ayauro ' kakaa ' pʉ uya ' nokon , e ' tane apurɨ auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi . Serɨ eke tʉrawaso siku ' ai ' ne ' ukʉipʉnʉ ese ' yau usaurokʉ uiwano ' pe .

text: But ye believe not , because ye are not of my sheep , as I said unto you .
text2: E ' tane apurɨ auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi , apʉne pʉra uikʉn non karimeru amʉ ' tonpa pe pʉra ɨwesi kon .

text: My sheep hear my voice , and I know them , and they follow me :
text2: Uikʉn non karimeru amʉ ' uya umaimu eta ; to ' i ' tu uya , to ' uya nɨrɨ uye ' ma ' pʉka .

text: And I give unto them eternal life ; and they shall never perish , neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand .
text2: Tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko ' man nɨto ' ike ke to ' repa uya , to ' uma ' tato ' oton pen nɨ ; ɨnʉ ' uya to ' mo ' kato ' oton pen uyemiyatʉ apai .

text: My Father , which gave them me , is greater than all ; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father ' s hand .
text2: Ukʉipʉnʉ urepanin nʉ ' pʉ kamoro ke esi eke pe tanporon kon entai rɨ . Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ to ' mo ' ka pʉra iyesi ukʉipʉnʉ piyapai .

text: I and my Father are one .
text2: Ikʉipʉnʉ ya ' tikin nɨ ina esi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him .
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' uya tɨ ' ton amuku ' pʉ iwɨto ' pe tʉuya ' nokon ,

text: Jesus answered them , Many good works have I shewed you from my Father ; for which of those works do ye stone me ?
text2: e ' tane Sises uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Ikʉipʉnʉ winon tu ' kan nɨ eke tʉrawaso enpoika ' pʉ uya ɨyena ' nokon . Nai wenai kuru tɨ ' ke uwɨnɨ i ' se ɨwesi kon ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: The Jews answered him , saying , For a good work we stone thee not ; but for blasphemy ; and because that thou , being a man , makest thyself God .
text2: Esuwerʉ amʉ ' uya imaimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Serɨ ton wenai tɨ ' ke ɨwɨnɨ i ' se ina esi pen , e ' tane isapema auya wenai . Ka ' pon pe rɨ esii ' ma Papa pe ɨye ' kupʉ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Jesus answered them , Is it not written in your law , I said , Ye are gods ?
text2: Sises uya to ' maimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Iye ' menukasa ' pʉra pe ' nai Main yau , ‘ Ta uya ɨpɨ ' nokon papa pe ' ne ɨwesi kon , ’ tawon ?

text: If he called them gods , unto whom the word of God came , and the scripture cannot be broken ;
text2: Papa pe ' ne to ' esa ' sa ' iya yau , Papa maimu uyee ' pʉ na ' ne ' ipiya ' ton , Papa Maimu i ' kwɨtʉ poken pʉra nɨrɨ iyesi .

text: Say ye of him , whom the Father hath sanctified , and sent into the world , Thou blasphemest ; because I said , I am the Son of God ?
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ pe ken si kʉrɨ nai , ikʉipʉnʉ nanʉmʉ ' pʉ tiwano ' pe kuru , mɨrɨpan enno ' sa ' iya orʉ pona ? Ɨ ' rɨto ' pe ken ɨri pe isapema pe tʉusauro ' sen ta auya ' nokon , ‘ Papa Mumu urɨ , ’ ta uya pɨ ' ?

text: If I do not the works of my Father , believe me not .
text2: Urɨ kʉsapurɨtʉu , ukʉipʉnʉ tʉrawasooi ku ' tane uya pʉra rɨ .

text: But if I do , though ye believe not me , believe the works : that ye may know , and believe , that the Father is in me , and I in him .
text2: E ' tane ikupʉ uya a ' tai , uyapurɨ auya ' nokon pʉra iye ' tane , eke tʉrawaso amʉ ' kupʉ uya apurɨtɨ ' , i ' tu kon pa apurɨ kon pa nɨrɨ ukʉipʉnʉ esi uyau , urɨ nɨrɨ esi iyau tukai ' . ”

text: Therefore they sought again to take him : but he escaped out of their hand ,
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai kanan a ' si i ' se to ' esi ' pʉ , e ' tane to ' enapai iyemo ' ka ' pʉ .

text: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized ; and there he abode .
text2: Itɨ ' pʉ Isotan ratoi pona , Isaan uya epa ' taisiman kupʉ ' pʉ pena iwa ' ne pata piya ' . Mɨrɨ yau , iko ' mamʉ ' pʉ .

text: And many resorted unto him , and said , John did no miracle : but all things that John spake of this man were true .
text2: Tu ' kan kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uyee ' pʉ ipiya ' . Ta ' pʉ to ' uya , “ Isaan uya i ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ kupʉ ' pʉ pen , e ' tane tanporon Isaan usaurokʉ ' pʉ pʉse pɨ ' esi i ' napai rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And many believed on him there .
text2: Tu ' kan kon uya Sises maimu apurɨ ' pʉ mɨrɨ yau .

text: Now a certain man was sick , named Lazarus , of Bethany , the town of Mary and her sister Martha .
text2: Moro takuru ' kenan ka ' pon esi ' pʉ Ʉrasaras itese ' , Pe ' tani eke iwa pata pon , Meri mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Mata pata ' se ' .

text: ( It was that Mary which anointed the Lord with ointment , and wiped his feet with her hair , whose brother Lazarus was sick . )
text2: Pʉse rɨ Meri , ipi na ' ne ' esi ' pʉ takuru ' ke , kʉrɨ rɨ esi ' pʉ Sises karapaimanin nʉ ' pʉ , i ' ta nɨrɨ a ' munakanin nʉ ' pʉ tʉnse ' ke .

text: Therefore his sisters sent unto him , saying , Lord , behold , he whom thou lovest is sick .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ipasi ton uya ikɨ ' mai ' tʉmaimu kon ennoko ' pʉ , “ Itepuru , ipan pe ɨni ' nʉnkanʉ man takuru ' ke , ” tukai ' .

text: When Jesus heard that , he said , This sickness is not unto death , but for the glory of God , that the Son of God might be glorified thereby .
text2: Sises uya mɨrɨ etasa ' a ' tai , ta ' pʉ iya , “ Serɨ paran uya eri ' nʉ ' ka pen nɨ , e ' tane Papa meruntɨrʉ usenpoikato ' pe , Papa Mumu apurɨto ' pe ipɨkɨrɨ iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Now Jesus loved Martha , and her sister , and Lazarus .
text2: Sises uya Mata , itakon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Ʉrasaras i ' nʉnka esi ' pʉ .

text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick , he abode two days still in the same place where he was .
text2: Takuru ' ke iyesi tukai ' etasa ' tʉuya a ' tai , asa ' rɨ wʉi iko ' mamʉ ' pʉ tesi ' pʉ yau rɨ .

text: Then after that saith he to his disciples , Let us go into Judaea again .
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo , tʉpoitorʉ ton pɨ ' , “ Isutiya pona kanan utɨnpai ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: His disciples say unto him , Master , the Jews of late sought to stone thee ; and goest thou thither again ?
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Rapai , pena kuru pʉra rɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' esi ' pʉ ɨwɨnɨ i ' se tɨ ' ke . Mɨrɨ pe ' e ' tane mɨrɨ ya ' ɨutɨkapʉ kanan ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Jesus answered , Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If any man walk in the day , he stumbleth not , because he seeth the light of this world .
text2: Sises uya to ' maimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ 12 kaisa rɨ wʉi yau pata weyu pʉra pe ' nai ? Ɨnʉ ' usarɨ a ' tai wʉi nai ita ' mo ' ka pen , apʉne pʉra a ' kwa pe non esi wenai .

text: But if a man walk in the night , he stumbleth , because there is no light in him .
text2: E ' tane ewarupɨ yau ka ' pon usarɨ a ' tai , ita ' mo ' ka , apʉne pʉra a ' kwa pe pʉra iyesi ke , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: These things said he : and after that he saith unto them , Our friend Lazarus sleepeth ; but I go , that I may awake him out of sleep .
text2: Serɨ ton ta tʉpo , ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ Utonpa kon Ʉrasaras e ' nʉmʉ , e ' tane utɨ enpakase ' na iye ' nʉnto ' apai , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then said his disciples , Lord , if he sleep , he shall do well .
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo ipoitorʉ ton uya ta ' pʉ , “ Itepuru , iye ' nʉnsa ' pe iyesi yau , ito ' pamʉ rɨ mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death : but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep .
text2: Sises usaurokʉ esi ' pʉ iyeri ' sa ' pɨ ' , e ' tane iye ' nʉmʉ pɨ ' isaurokʉ pe to ' uya ekama ' pʉ .

text: Then said Jesus unto them plainly , Lazarus is dead .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai nin si to ' pana ' tɨkaa ' pʉ iya mɨrɨ wakʉ pe , “ Ʉrasaras eri ' sa ' kuru rɨ mɨrɨ , tukai ' .

text: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there , to the intent ye may believe ; nevertheless let us go unto him .
text2: Pori ' pe e ' ai ' , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon pɨ ' , mɨrɨ yau e ' sa ' pʉra iyesi pɨ ' , apurɨ kon pa . E ' tane pʉra utɨnpai ' nokon ipiya ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then said Thomas , which is called Didymus , unto his fellowdisciples , Let us also go , that we may die with him .
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo , Tamas ( Titimas tukai ' tesa ' sen ) uya ta ' pʉ tʉtonpa ton , ipoitorʉ ton pɨ ' , “ Utɨnpai ' nokon nɨ nɨrɨ uma ' tan nɨto ' pe ipokon pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then when Jesus came , he found that he had lain in the grave four days already .
text2: Sises uye ' sa ' a ' tai , asakɨrɨ ' ne wʉi uruwai ' yau iko ' manka ' sa ' eporo ' pʉ iya .

text: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem , about fifteen furlongs off :
text2: Pe ' tani esi ' pʉ ɨnnɨ pʉra Surusiran piyapai , 2 mayirʉ e ' to ' airɨ rɨ .

text: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary , to comfort them concerning their brother .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , tu ' kan kon Esuwerʉ amʉ ' uyee ' pʉ Meri mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Mata pokon a ' kwarʉ ne ' pɨ ' se ' na to ' pi pata ' pʉ yau .

text: Then Martha , as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming , went and met him : but Mary sat still in the house .
text2: Mata uya Sises uyepʉ eta pe rɨ , itɨ ' pʉ ite ' matai , e ' tane Meri esi ' pʉ ɨutɨ tau moro rɨ .

text: Then said Martha unto Jesus , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Mata uya ta ' pʉ Sises pɨ ' , “ Itepuru , serɨ yau ɨwesi yau , upi nʉma ' tai ' no pen .

text: But I know , that even now , whatsoever thou wilt ask of God , God will give it thee .
text2: E ' tane i ' tu uya ɨ ' rɨ rɨ ekama ' po auya a ' tai Papa pɨ ' , Papa uya ɨrepa , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Thy brother shall rise again .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ɨpi kanan e ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' oton , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Martha saith unto him , I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day .
text2: Mata uya imaimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Si ' tuyai ' iye ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' oton kanan e ' mʉ ' sa ' kan weyu a ' tai , pata weyu u ' ma ' sa ' a ' tai , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus said unto her , I am the resurrection , and the life : he that believeth in me , though he were dead , yet shall he live :
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Urɨ esi i ' mʉ ' sa ' kanin pe , uko ' man nɨto ' ku ' nin pe rɨ nɨrɨ esi . Urɨ yau apurɨnin esi a ' tai , iyeri ' sa ' pe rɨ iye ' tane , iko ' manto ' oton nɨ .

text: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die . Believest thou this ?
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ tʉuko ' mansen uyapurɨ pɨ ' uma ' tato ' oton pen . Serɨ pe ' mapurɨyan ? ” ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' .

text: She saith unto him , Yea , Lord : I believe that thou art the Christ , the Son of God , which should come into the world .
text2: “ Ewai ' , uyepuru , sapurɨyai ' Kʉrai pe ɨwesi , Papa Mumu pe tʉuye ' ton serɨ non pona , tasa ' rʉ ' pʉ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when she had so said , she went her way , and called Mary her sister secretly , saying , The Master is come , and calleth for thee .
text2: Serɨ ta tʉuya tʉpo , itɨ ' pʉ ama ' ai takon kɨ ' mase ' na . “ Ti ' sa uye ' sa ' man , ɨkɨ ' ma iya , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: As soon as she heard that , she arose quickly , and came unto him .
text2: Mɨrɨ eta tʉuya pe rɨ , iye ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ , iyee ' pʉ inke pʉra ipiya ' .

text: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town , but was in that place where Martha met him .
text2: Sises uye ' sa ' pʉra rɨ marɨ iyesi ' pʉ eke iwa pata pona , e ' tane Mata uya teporo ' pʉ yau rɨ marɨ iyesi ' pʉ .

text: The Jews then which were with her in the house , and comforted her , when they saw Mary , that she rose up hastily and went out , followed her , saying , She goeth unto the grave to weep there .
text2: Esuwerʉ amʉ ' Meri piyau iye ' sa ' kon ɨutɨ tau iya ' kwarʉ nepʉ pɨ ' uya iye ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ensa ' inke pʉra , mɨrɨpan epa ' ka a ' tai , to ' uya e ' ma ' pʉka ' pʉ , tʉuta ' kwarʉkai ' akaranse tɨ ' akasa ' uruwai ' pe ya ' itɨ pe tekamai ' .

text: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was , and saw him , she fell down at his feet , saying unto him , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Meri uya Sises pata eposa ' a ' tai , ensa ' tʉuya a ' tai , i ' ta piyau ita ' mo ' ka ' pʉ , “ Itepuru , serɨ yau ɨwe ' sa ' yau , upi nʉma ' tai ' no pen nɨ , ” tai ' ma .

text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping , and the Jews also weeping which came with her , he groaned in the spirit , and was troubled ,
text2: Ikaramʉ ensa ' tʉuya a ' tai , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' nɨrɨ iya ' kɨrɨ iye ' sa ' kon ukaramʉ , ipan pe ipokoita ' pʉ tewan temo ' kai ' .

text: And said , Where have ye laid him ? They said unto him , Lord , come and see .
text2: “ Nai yau inonkasa ' auya ' nokon ? ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' . “ Itepuru , entanʉ ' kɨ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Jesus wept .
text2: Sises ukaramʉ ' pʉ .

text: Then said the Jews , Behold how he loved him !
text2: Esuwerʉ amʉ ' uya , “ Ipan pe i ' nʉnka iya ! ” ta ' pʉ .

text: And some of them said , Could not this man , which opened the eyes of the blind , have caused that even this man should not have died ?
text2: E ' tane tʉron kon uya , “ Tenku ' nan enu a ' kokanin nʉ ' pʉ uya rɨ pe ' pʉse rɨ ka ' pon erikʉ namai ' ikupʉ pʉra iyesi ' pʉ ? ” ta ' pʉ .

text: Jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the grave . It was a cave , and a stone lay upon it .
text2: Pokoi pe kuru rɨ marɨ esii ' ma , Sises utɨ ' pʉ uruwai ' piya ' . Tɨ ' euta pe iyesi ' pʉ eke tɨ ' tʉsa ' imʉra ' taai po .

text: Jesus said , Take ye away the stone . Martha , the sister of him that was dead , saith unto him , Lord , by this time he stinketh : for he hath been dead four days .
text2: “ Tɨ ' amatɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya . E ' tane Mata , eke ' pasi uya , “ Uyepuru , ikɨ pe ikɨtaka ' sa ' serɨ , asakɨrɨ ' ne wʉi iko ' manka ' sa ' mɨrɨ yau , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Said I not unto thee , that , if thou wouldest believe , thou shouldest see the glory of God ?
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya , “ Apurɨ auya yau , Papa meruntɨrʉ ene auya tukai ' pe ' apana ' tɨ uya pʉn ? ” ta ' pʉ .

text: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid . And Jesus lifted up his eyes , and said , Father , I thank thee that thou hast heard me .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon uya tɨ ' ama ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , kakʉi ' tenu tʉtʉse Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Papai , tenki ukayai ' umaimu etasa ' auya pɨ ' .

text: And I knew that thou hearest me always : but because of the people which stand by I said it , that they may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: I ' tu uya umaimu etanin pe rɨ ɨwesi tɨwɨrɨ rɨ , e ' tane ta uya rɨ nin pʉsamoro iye ' soto ' pɨ ' sa ' kon na ' ne ' uya rɨ nin apurɨto ' pe uyenno ' sa ' auya tukai ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when he thus had spoken , he cried with a loud voice , Lazarus , come forth .
text2: Serɨ ta tʉpo , eke pe ikɨ ' pɨ ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ , “ Ʉrasaras , epa ' ka ' ! ” tukai ' .

text: And he that was dead came forth , bound hand and foot with graveclothes : and his face was bound about with a napkin . Jesus saith unto them , Loose him , and let him go .
text2: Iyeri ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ epa ' ka ' pʉ , auronpɨ ' sa ' pe itemiyatʉ ton i ' ta ton , pon saai ' pɨ ' sa ' kusan ton pe epe ' kena ' pon renen tato ' atʉ ke , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pon atʉ itemʉ ' woi . Sises uya , “ Iponkatɨ ' uruwai ' pon apai , tɨwɨ itɨto ' pe , ” ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' .

text: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary , and had seen the things which Jesus did , believed on him .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' si tu ' kan kon ka ' pon amʉ ' Meri piya ' iye ' sa ' kon , Sises nʉkupʉnʉ ennin nʉ ' san uya apurɨ ' pʉ .

text: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees , and told them what things Jesus had done .
text2: E ' tane tʉron kon utɨ ' pʉ Pari ' si amʉ ' piya ' Sises nʉkupʉ ' pʉ ekamai ' to ' pana ya ' .

text: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council , and said , What do we ? for this man doeth many miracles .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pari ' si amʉ ' uya tʉkonsʉrʉʉi kon mitimu kupʉ ' pʉ . “ Ɨ ' rɨ kupʉ ' nokon nai ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . “ Pʉse rɨ ka ' pon uya tu ' ke rɨ eke Papa tʉrawasooi i ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ kupʉ .

text: If we let him thus alone , all men will believe on him : and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation .
text2: Serɨ ku ' tane iya enpɨ ' sa ' yau , tanporon kon uya rɨ apurɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Roman amʉ ' uya use ' man nɨto ' , ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ upata kon mo ' ka mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And one of them , named Caiaphas , being the high priest that same year , said unto them , Ye know nothing at all ,
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , to ' tonpa , Kaya ' pas itese ' , use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru pe te ' sen mɨrɨ wʉipiya yau , usaurokʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨni ' tunʉ kon pʉra rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ !

text: Nor consider that it is expedient for us , that one man should die for the people , and that the whole nation perish not .
text2: Ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi wakʉ iwa pe iyesi ɨpona ' nokon tikin nɨ ka ' pon eri ' to ' pe ka ' pon amʉ ' iwano ' pe , tanporon kon ka ' pon amʉ ' ekota ' ma entai , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And this spake he not of himself : but being high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation ;
text2: Tʉmɨrɨ pe serɨ ta ' pʉ iya pen nɨ , e ' tane use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru pe rɨ nin tesi pɨ ' mɨrɨ wʉipiya yau , Sises eri ' to ' oton nɨ nin ekama ' pʉ iya ka ' pon amʉ ' iwano ' pe .

text: And not for that nation only , but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad .
text2: Kamoro iwano ' pe rɨken pen e ' tane iye ' ta ' nʉ ' sa ' kon Papa munkɨ amʉ ' iwano ' pe rɨ nɨrɨ , to ' amʉranʉ ' nin pe tikin nɨ to ' tʉkonekai ' .

text: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' nin si , iwɨnɨ pɨ ' to ' e ' kama ' pʉ mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ wʉi awonsi ' kɨ .

text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews ; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness , into a city called Ephraim , and there continued with his disciples .
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai , Sises si usarɨ pʉra iyesi ' pʉ mɨrɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' annawɨrɨ . E ' tane ru ' ku iyemo ' ka ' pʉ rɨmono ' ta nono winɨkʉi ' , eke iwa pata E ' pʉren tato ' ya ' , mɨrɨ yau iyesi ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton pokon pe .

text: And the Jews ' passover was nigh at hand : and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover , to purify themselves .
text2: Esuwerʉ Amʉ ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ e ' sepokapʉ rɨ a ' tai , tu ' kan kon nɨ utɨ ' pʉ mɨrɨ pata yapai Surusiran pona , ekorʉkase ' na mɨrɨ Weyu wapiya .

text: Then sought they for Jesus , and spake among themselves , as they stood in the temple , What think ye , that he will not come to the feast ?
text2: Sises ene i ' se to ' esi ' pʉ , use ' man nɨto ' , ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' airɨ te ' soto ' pɨ ' se ' to ' usekama ' popɨtʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨ ' rɨ tukai ' mi ' tuyatʉu ? Iyepʉ pen nɨ pe ' serɨ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment , that , if any man knew where he were , he should shew it , that they might take him .
text2: Use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pari ' si amʉ ' uya tasa ' esi ' pʉ , ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ Sises esi mɨrɨ yau tukai ' i ' tusa ' yau , ekamato ' pe iya , a ' sito ' pe tʉuya ' nokon .

text: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany , where Lazarus was which had been dead , whom he raised from the dead .
text2: 6 kaisa rɨ wʉi To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ rawɨrɨ , Sises utɨ ' pʉ Pe ' tani pona , Ʉrasaras , Sises nʉ ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ iyerikʉ ' pʉ apai pata ' se ' ya ' .

text: There they made him a supper ; and Martha served : but Lazarus was one of them that sat at the table with him .
text2: Iyenta ' nato ' koneka ' pʉ to ' uya mɨrɨ yau , Mata esi ' pʉ ekamʉ pɨ ' , Ʉrasaras e ' tane Sises piyawon kon tʉteire ' kon po tepʉrʉ piyau te ' san koro ' tau .

text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard , very costly , and anointed the feet of Jesus , and wiped his feet with her hair : and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Meri uya ten yau rɨ esukenan natʉ , epe ' kena ' po ' piyun nee ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan ma ' pʉ iya Sises pʉta pona , ikuka ' pʉ iya tʉnse ' ke , mɨrɨpan po ' piyun kɨtun uya a ' po ' ne ɨutɨ kɨ ' nʉnpasa ' esi ' pʉ .

text: Then saith one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , which should betray him ,
text2: E ' tane Sises poitorʉ ton tonpa , Isutas Eskariya ' , eparanka ton si pona ipoken pʉra iyesi ' pʉ ,

text: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence , and given to the poor ?
text2: mɨrɨpan uya , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' serɨ po ' piyun kʉrʉpo ' pomasa ' pʉra rɨ iyesi , itepe ' pʉ ke entu ' manin nan repato ' pe ? Tikin nɨ wʉipiya yau e ' tʉrawasoman nɨsa ' epe ' pʉ e ' to ' airɨ rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: This he said , not that he cared for the poor ; but because he was a thief , and had the bag , and bare what was put therein .
text2: Aiko tawon pe tesi pɨ ' entu ' manin nan pɨ ' serɨ ta ' pʉ iya pen nɨ , e ' tane ama ' e ' pe tesi pɨ ' . Pʉrata paikii esa ' pe tesi koro ' tau , iyawon enno ' nin pe iye ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ i ' se te ' to ' pɨ ' .

text: Then said Jesus , Let her alone : against the day of my burying hath she kept this .
text2: “ Tɨwɨ nesii , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya . “ Inenkurunpa ' pʉ mɨrɨ po ' piyun uwu ' na ' tɨ weyu iwano ' pe , tasa ' iya rʉ ' pʉ .

text: For the poor always ye have with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Inke rɨ ɨ ' koro ' tau ' nokon te ' san kamoro entu ' manin nan , e ' tane inke ɨpiyau ' nokon esi pen nin , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there : and they came not for Jesus ' sake only , but that they might see Lazarus also , whom he had raised from the dead .
text2: Mɨrɨ koro ' tau anpisin ton kuru rɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' uya etasa ' esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ yau Sises esi tukai ' , mɨrɨpan kon uyee ' pʉ , kʉrɨ rɨ pɨkɨrɨ rɨken pen e ' tane Ʉrasaras rɨ nɨrɨ ense ' na , ini ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ iyerikʉ ' pʉ yapai .

text: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death ;
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' nin si use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton e ' kama ' pʉ Ʉrasaras rɨ nɨrɨ wɨnɨ pɨ ' ,

text: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away , and believed on Jesus .
text2: kʉrɨ rɨ uriya ' tu ' kan kon nɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' uya tʉnonka kon pɨ ' Sises piya ' tʉutɨto ' kon pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' uya rɨ apurɨ pɨ ' .

text: On the next day much people that were come to the feast , when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem ,
text2: Mɨrɨ ema ' sa ' yau , anpisin ton kuru rɨ iye ' sa ' kon nʉ ' san Iweyu Rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' uya Surusiran pona Sises utɨ etasa ' esi ' pʉ .

text: Took branches of palm trees , and went forth to meet him , and cried , Hosanna : Blessed is the King of Israel that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kon utɨ ' pʉ ite ' matai patawa ye ' apɨmu ton itenau ' ne , ɨkɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉi ' ma , “ Usana ! ” “ Pori ' pe kʉrɨ esi mɨrɨ Itepuru ese ' yau nʉye ' ai ' ne ' ! ” “ Pori ' kʉrɨ rɨ kin Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And Jesus , when he had found a young ass , sat thereon ; as it is written ,
text2: Sises uya isa ' ka ' si mʉre eporo ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan ereuta ' pʉ ipo , iye ' menukasa ' itekare uya ta awɨrɨ rɨ ,

text: Fear not , daughter of Sion : behold , thy King cometh , sitting on an ass ' s colt .
text2: “ Kenari ' nʉmʉi , Sayan ensi rʉ ' kwɨ ; enkɨ , ɨyepuru , kin uye ' nɨ pɨ ' man , iyereutasa ' isa ' ka ' si mʉre po , ” tawon .

text: These things understood not his disciples at the first : but when Jesus was glorified , then remembered they that these things were written of him , and that they had done these things unto him .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ipoitorʉ ton uya tanporo serɨ ton to ' ka ' nʉkʉ ' pʉ pen . Sises rɨ nin enasa ' tapurɨpɨ ' to ' ya ' tʉpo - - - iyeri ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ , e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' tʉpo rɨ nin - - - to ' uya i ' tu ' pʉ serɨ ton e ' menukasa ' esi ' pʉ ipɨ ' , serɨ ton nɨ kenʉ ' si ku ' sa ' to ' uya esi ' pʉ itiwano ' pe .

text: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave , and raised him from the dead , bare record .
text2: Anpisin ton si iya ' kɨrɨ iye ' sa ' kon nʉ ' san nɨ esi ' pʉ ekama pɨ ' Ʉrasaras kɨ ' ma ' pʉ iya uruwai ' apai , iyeri ' sa ' apai i ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ iya rɨ ekama pɨ ' .

text: For this cause the people also met him , for that they heard that he had done this miracle .
text2: Tu ' kan kon nɨ utɨ ' pʉ serɨ eke Papa tʉrawasooi i ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ e ' ku ' sa ' tetai ' ite ' matai .

text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves , Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing ? behold , the world is gone after him .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' si Pari ' si amʉ ' uya ta ' pʉ mɨrɨ tʉtonpa kon pɨ ' , “ Menyatʉu , ɨ ' rɨ kupʉ poken pʉra rɨ iyesi . Entɨ ' , tanporo pata yawon kon utɨ ipɨkɨrɨ ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast :
text2: Moro Kiri ' amʉ ' tonpa ton esi ' pʉ to ' koro ' tau ɨpʉremai ' itɨsa ' kon nʉ ' san Iweyu Rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' .

text: The same came therefore to Philip , which was of Bethsaida of Galilee , and desired him , saying , Sir , we would see Jesus .
text2: To ' uyee ' pʉ Piri ' , Pe ' saita , Kiyarari airon winon piya ' , i ' se te ' to ' kon ekama ' poi ' ipɨ ' , “ Itepuru , Sises ɨnenpai ina man , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Philip cometh and telleth Andrew : and again Andrew and Philip tell Jesus .
text2: Piri ' utɨ ' pʉ Anturu pana ' tɨi ' ; Anturu mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Piri ' uya nin si Sises pana ' tɨ ' pʉ mɨrɨ .

text: And Jesus answered them , saying , The hour is come , that the Son of man should be glorified .
text2: Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Iweyu si e ' seposa ' man Ka ' pon , Papa winon apurɨpɨ ' to ' weyu .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die , it abideth alone : but if it die , it bringeth forth much fruit .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , a ' nai ' ena ' pɨ uta ' mo ' kasa ' non pona eri ' sa ' pʉra iyesi yau , tikin nɨ rɨ iko ' mamʉ mɨrɨ , e ' tane iyeri ' sa ' yau , tu ' ke rɨ nin itena ' pɨ epamʉ mɨrɨ .

text: He that loveth his life shall lose it ; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal .
text2: Ka ' pon tʉuko ' manto ' i ' nʉnkanin uya inonka mɨrɨ , kʉrɨ tʉuko ' manto ' ewaruma ' tɨnin serɨ non po uya rɨ nin iko ' manʉkʉ mɨrɨ tɨwɨrɨ uko ' man nɨto ' iwano ' pe .

text: If any man serve me , let him follow me ; and where I am , there shall also my servant be : if any man serve me , him will my Father honour .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ uyapiyo ' pe na ' ne ' uya uye ' ma ' pʉkato ' pe iyesi ; e ' ai ' ne ' yau rɨ upoitorʉ rɨ kanan e ' to ' pe iyesi . Ukʉipʉnʉ uya rɨ uyapiyo ' pe na ' ne ' nama mɨrɨ .

text: Now is my soul troubled ; and what shall I say ? Father , save me from this hour : but for this cause came I unto this hour .
text2: “ Ekamʉra uyewan enasa ' man , ɨ ' rɨ ken si ta uya ? ‘ Papai , upika ' tɨkɨ serɨ iweyu apai , ’ ta uya ? Kane , serɨ pɨkɨrɨ sa ' ne serɨ iweyu pʉ ' kʉ pona uye ' sa ' serɨ ko .

text: Father , glorify thy name . Then came there a voice from heaven , saying , I have both glorified it , and will glorify it again .
text2: Papai , eke pe ɨyese ' e ' to ' enpoikakɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨ a ' tai main uyee ' pʉ Epʉn poi , “ Enpoikaka ' sa ' uya rɨ man , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ enpoikakapʉ uya rɨ kanan mɨrɨ , ” tawon .

text: The people therefore , that stood by , and heard it , said that it thundered : others said , An angel spake to him .
text2: Anpisin mɨrɨ yau te ' san uya etasa ' uya , “ Korʉme e ' tʉrʉnka , ” ta ' pʉ ; tʉron kon uya , “ Inserʉ uya auro ' ka , ” ta ' pʉ .

text: Jesus answered and said , This voice came not because of me , but for your sakes .
text2: Sises uya , “ Ɨiwano ' kon pe serɨ main esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ , urɨ iwano ' pe pen , ” ta ' pʉ .

text: Now is the judgment of this world : now shall the prince of this world be cast out .
text2: “ Serɨ si iweyu orʉ eseru aimenkato ' yai . Serɨ orʉ epuru pe si te ' sen ainʉnpato ' .

text: And I , if I be lifted up from the earth , will draw all men unto me .
text2: E ' tane , urɨ utanʉnsa ' a ' tai non apai , tanporon kon nɨ kɨ ' mato ' uya oton upiya ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: This he said , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Serɨ ta ' pʉ iya , se kasa uma ' tato ' oton ta tʉuya ekama pe rɨ .

text: The people answered him , We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever : and how sayest thou , The Son of man must be lifted up ? who is this Son of man ?
text2: Anpisin uya ta ' pʉ , “ Ina uya etasa ' man Main , Mosi ' winon winɨ , Kʉrai uko ' manto ' oton tɨwɨrɨ rɨ , mɨrɨ ken pe ' e ' tane , ‘ Ka ' pon , Papa winon utanʉnto ' oton , ’ ta auya ? Ɨnʉ ' pʉse rɨ Ka ' pon , Papa winon ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Yet a little while is the light with you . Walk while ye have the light , lest darkness come upon you : for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Iweyu e ' to ' oton mɨrɨ ɨpiyau ' nokon inke rʉ ' kwɨ rɨ mara rɨ . Ɨpinintɨ ' iweyu esi koro ' tau , ewarupɨ uya ɨyeporo kon rawɨrɨ . Ka ' pon ewarupɨ yau tʉutɨsen uya tʉutɨto ' ya ' i ' tu pʉra rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ .

text: While ye have light , believe in the light , that ye may be the children of light . These things spake Jesus , and departed , and did hide himself from them .
text2: Iweyu apurɨtɨ ' moro ɨpiyau ' nokon iyesi koro ' tau , iweyu munkɨ amʉ ' pe ɨyena kon pa , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Tʉusauro ' to ' nonkasa ' tʉuya a ' tai , Sises utɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan e ' so ' namʉ ' pʉ to ' piyapai .

text: But though he had done so many miracles before them , yet they believed not on him :
text2: Serɨ ton eke ton Papa tʉrawasooi ti ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ ku ' sa ' Sises uya e ' tane tʉ ' koro ' tau ' nokon , to ' uya apurɨ pʉra rɨ marɨ iyesi ' pʉ .

text: That the saying of Esaias the prophet might be fulfilled , which he spake , Lord , who hath believed our report ? and to whom hath the arm of the Lord been revealed ?
text2: Serɨ esi ' pʉ pu ' kena ' Aisaya maimu a ' ku ' tɨnin pe : “ Itepuru , ɨnʉ ' uya ina nekamanʉ etasa ' ; ɨnʉ ' ena ' Itepuru meruntɨrʉ usenpoikasa ' ? ” tawon .

text: Therefore they could not believe , because that Esaias said again ,
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai , to ' uya apurɨ pʉra rɨ iyesi , Aisaya uya tasa ' na ' ne ' awɨrɨ rɨ :

text: He hath blinded their eyes , and hardened their heart ; that they should not see with their eyes , nor understand with their heart , and be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: “ To ' enu rɨ a ' kopɨ ' sa ' iya mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' ewan nɨ sa ' mantanʉ ' pɨ ' sa ' iya , to ' uya ene namai ' tenu kon ke , to ' uya ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ namai ' tewan kon ke , to ' era ' tɨ namai ' to ' epi ' tɨto ' pe uya , ” tawon .

text: These things said Esaias , when he saw his glory , and spake of him .
text2: Aisaya uya serɨ tasa ' apʉne pʉra Sises apurɨpɨ ' to ' ipɨkɨrɨ ensa ' tʉuya pɨ ' , ipɨ ' isaurokʉ ' pʉ .

text: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him ; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him , lest they should be put out of the synagogue :
text2: Mɨrɨ rɨ e ' tane mɨrɨ koro ' tau rɨ tu ' kan kon nɨ itepuru ton uya apurɨ ' pʉ rɨ . E ' tane Pari ' si amʉ ' esi pɨ ' , tʉnapurɨnʉ kon ɨnekamapai pʉra to ' esi ' pʉ . To ' uya tenpa ' ka kon tʉusenupato ' kon iwʉ ' tapai tukai ' to ' enari ' nʉmʉ ' pʉ ;

text: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God .
text2: ka ' pon amʉ ' uya tapurɨpɨtʉ kon i ' se te ' san pe tesi kon pɨ ' Papa uya tapurɨpɨtʉ kon i ' se tesi kon entai .

text: Jesus cried and said , He that believeth on me , believeth not on me , but on him that sent me .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises usaurokʉ ' pʉ eke pe , “ Ka ' pon uya uyapurɨ a ' tai , urɨ rɨken apurɨ iya pe iyesi pen , e ' tane kʉrɨ uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ .

text: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me .
text2: Uyene iya a ' tai , uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ ene iya mɨrɨ .

text: I am come a light into the world , that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness .
text2: Uye ' sa ' serɨ pata weyu pe , ɨnʉ ' rɨ uyapurɨnin pe na ' ne ' enkurumʉ namai ' moro ewarupɨ yau .

text: And if any man hear my words , and believe not , I judge him not : for I came not to judge the world , but to save the world .
text2: “ Kʉrɨ nin ka ' pon umaimu eta pɨ ' na ' ne ' e ' tane , ikupʉ iya pʉra na ' ne ' , iteseru aimenka uya pen nɨ , apʉne pʉra pata eseru aimenkai ' uye ' sa ' pen , e ' tane ipika ' tɨi ' .

text: He that rejecteth me , and receiveth not my words , hath one that judgeth him : the word that I have spoken , the same shall judge him in the last day .
text2: Moro unurunpanin mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ umaimu ananʉnpaino pen eseru aimenkanin esi mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ rɨ main usauro ' ai ' ne ' uya eno ' mato ' oton pata weyu u ' ma ' sa ' a ' tai .

text: For I have not spoken of myself ; but the Father which sent me , he gave me a commandment , what I should say , and what I should speak .
text2: Uiwano ' pe usauro ' sa ' kasa pʉra , e ' tane ikʉipʉnʉ uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ uya uyapiyo ' masa ' usauro ' to ' pe umaimu ' tɨsa ' iya rɨ .

text: And I know that his commandment is life everlasting : whatsoever I speak therefore , even as the Father said unto me , so I speak .
text2: I ' tu uya , serɨ uya arɨn tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko ' man nɨto ' ya ' . Mɨrɨ pɨ ' si usauro ' ai ' ne ' ikʉipʉnʉ uya upana ' tɨ ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ ekama uya , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Now before the feast of the passover , when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father , having loved his own which were in the world , he loved them unto the end .
text2: To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' e ' nɨto ' rawɨrɨ kuru rɨ , Sises uya i ' tusa ' esi ' pʉ serɨ non nɨnto ' tʉuya weyu e ' seposa ' , ikʉipʉnʉ piya ' si tʉutɨto ' . Tiwano ' ton pe te ' san i ' nʉnkakapʉ tʉpo , non po te ' san , mɨrɨpan kon ena ' nin si ipan pe to ' i ' nʉnkato ' tʉuya enpoikakaa ' pʉ iya .

text: And supper being ended , the devil having now put into the heart of Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , to betray him ;
text2: Ko ' maan pe enta ' nan nɨto ' utanʉnkaa ' pʉ , Makoi uya Isutas Eskariya ' , Saiman mu ku ' sa ' esi ' pʉ isenuminkato ' pe Sises eparanka pɨ ' .

text: Jesus knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands , and that he was come from God , and went to God ;
text2: Sises uya tanporon nɨ nonkasa ' ikʉipʉnʉ uya tena ' tukai ' i ' tu ' pʉ ; tʉuye ' sa ' Papa winɨ , mɨrɨpan enna ' po Papa piya ' tukai ' rɨ .

text: He riseth from supper , and laid aside his garments ; and took a towel , and girded himself .
text2: Mɨrɨpan e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ tepʉrʉ piyapai , tʉpon pʉro ' pon mo ' ka ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan uya towerʉ e ' me ' pʉ tʉworo ' pai pɨ ' .

text: After that he poureth water into a bason , and began to wash the disciples ' feet , and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded .
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo , tuna ma ' pʉ iya pesʉn ya ' , mɨrɨpan uya tʉpoitorʉ ton pʉta korʉkapɨtʉ ' pʉ a ' munakapɨtʉi ' ma tʉworo ' pai pokon towerʉ ke .

text: Then cometh he to Simon Peter : and Peter saith unto him , Lord , dost thou wash my feet ?
text2: Mɨrɨpan uye ' kaa ' pʉ Saiman Pi ' ta poi rɨ , tekama ' po ton , “ Uyepuru , u ' ta si korʉka auya ? ” tukai ' .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , What I do thou knowest not now ; but thou shalt know hereafter .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ auya pʉra iyesi mɨrɨ siku ' ai ' ne ' , e ' tane emennʉ ' pʉ ito ' ka ' nʉ ' to ' auya oton , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Peter saith unto him , Thou shalt never wash my feet . Jesus answered him , If I wash thee not , thou hast no part with me .
text2: “ Kane , u ' ta korʉkato ' auya pʉra rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Pi ' ta uya ipɨ ' . Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨkorʉkasa ' uya pʉra iyesi a ' tai , upʉ ' kʉ pe ɨwesi pen , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Simon Peter saith unto him , Lord , not my feet only , but also my hands and my head .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Saiman Pi ' ta uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Uyepuru , u ' ta rɨken pen ken si e ' tane , uyemiyatʉ ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ u ' pai rɨ nɨrɨ ken ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus saith to him , He that is washed needeth not save to wash his feet , but is clean every whit : and ye are clean , but not all .
