text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ka ' pon iyeku ' pɨsa ' esi ti ' ta rɨken korʉkato ' iya pe ; tanporon nin ipun esi mɨrɨ wakʉ pe . Wakʉ pe nin ɨwesi kon mɨrɨ , tanporo kuru ɨwe ' tane ' nokon pʉra rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: For he knew who should betray him ; therefore said he , Ye are not all clean .
text2: I ' tu tʉuya wenai teparanka ton ; mɨrɨ pɨ ' nin si , tanporo wakʉ pe ɨwesi kon pen , ta ' pʉ iya na ' ne ' .

text: So after he had washed their feet , and had taken his garments , and was set down again , he said unto them , Know ye what I have done to you ?
text2: To ' pʉta korʉka nonka tʉuya tʉpo , iyepontɨkaa ' pʉ kanan , mɨrɨpan enna ' po ' pʉ tʉpata ' pʉ ya ' . Mɨrɨpan uya , “ Mʉto ' ka ' nʉ ' atʉu pe ' ɨpɨ ' nokon siku ' ai ' ne ' ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' .

text: Ye call me Master and Lord : and ye say well ; for so I am .
text2: “ ‘ Ti ' sa , ’ ‘ Uyepuru , ’ tukai ' uyesakʉ auya ' nokon , mɨrɨ esi ipoken nɨ , kʉrɨ rɨ rɨ urɨ .

text: If I then , your Lord and Master , have washed your feet ; ye also ought to wash one another ' s feet .
text2: Mɨrɨ si urɨ , ɨyepuru kon , ɨti ' saai kon uya a ' ta kon korʉkasa ' , ɨtonpa kon pʉta si tʉkorʉkase e ' tɨ ' .

text: For I have given you an example , that ye should do as I have done to you .
text2: Ene kon pa iku ' sa ' uya mɨrɨ , ikupʉ kon pa ɨpɨ ' nokon iku ' sa ' uya na ' ne ' .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord ; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , ipoitorʉ esi pʉra rɨ iyesi eke pe tesa ' entai , mɨrɨ pe pʉra main anin nɨ esi pʉra iyesi eke pe tenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ entai .

text: If ye know these things , happy are ye if ye do them .
text2: Serɨ ton i ' tu auya ' nokon pe iyesi pɨ ' , ɨpʉrema ' nokon mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ ton kupʉ auya ' nokon yau .

text: I speak not of you all : I know whom I have chosen : but that the scripture may be fulfilled , He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me .
text2: “ Tanporon kon ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon pɨ ' ta uya pen nɨ ; i ' tu uya kamo unanʉmʉ ' san , e ' tane serɨ esi iye ' menukasa ' itekare a ' ku ' tɨnin pe : ‘ Upokon pe rɨ iyenta ' nasa ' rʉ ' pʉ enasa ' uyewa ' nomanin pe , ’ tawon .

text: Now I tell you before it come , that , when it is come to pass , ye may believe that I am he .
text2: Ekama uya serɨ ɨpɨ ' nokon iye ' kupʉ wapiya , iye ' kupʉ a ' tai apurɨ kon pa kʉrɨ rɨ pe esi tukai ' .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that receiveth whomsoever I send receiveth me ; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ɨnʉ ' rɨ unennokonʉ anʉmʉ uya uyanʉmʉ rɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ uyanʉmʉ uya kʉrɨ uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ anʉmʉ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: When Jesus had thus said , he was troubled in spirit , and testified , and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Serɨ ta ' pʉ iya tʉpo , ipan pe ipokoita ' pʉ ta ' kwarʉ yau , mɨrɨpan uya ekama ' pʉ , “ I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , ɨtonpa kon uya uyeparankato ' oton , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then the disciples looked one on another , doubting of whom he spake .
text2: Mɨrɨpan poitorʉ ton usenpɨtʉ ' pʉ , ɨnʉ ' pɨ ' ta iya ta pe .

text: Now there was leaning on Jesus ' bosom one of his disciples , whom Jesus loved .
text2: To ' tonpa Sises ni ' nʉnkanʉ ipoitorʉ esi ' pʉ ipiyau tʉteire ' po .

text: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him , that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake .
text2: Saiman Pi ' ta uya kʉrɨ rɨ wʉi ' ka ' pʉ ekama ' poto ' pe iya , “ Ekama ' po ' ɨnʉ ' pɨ ' ta iya tukai ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: He then lying on Jesus ' breast saith unto him , Lord , who is it ?
text2: Sises pona nin si te ' tʉnkai ' ekama ' po ' pʉ iya mɨrɨ , “ Uyepuru , ɨnʉ ' si ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus answered , He it is , to whom I shall give a sop , when I have dipped it . And when he had dipped the sop , he gave it to Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Kʉrɨ sa ' ne pʉreti piya ' pɨ tʉki ' se itena ' sitʉyai ' ne ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨpan uya pʉreti piya ' pɨ kii ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan tʉrʉ ' pʉ iya Isutas Eskariya ' , Saiman mu ena ' .

text: And after the sop Satan entered into him . Then said Jesus unto him , That thou doest , do quickly .
text2: Pʉreti a ' si iya pe rɨ , Se ' tan ewomʉ ' pʉ iya ' . “ Ɨnkupʉnʉ pe te ' sen iku ' kɨ inke pʉra , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya ipɨ ' ,

text: Now no man at the table knew for what intent he spake this unto him .
text2: e ' tane ɨnʉ ' rɨ enta ' nan pɨ ' te ' sen uya ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ ' pʉ pen ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' serɨ ta Sises uya ipɨ ' tukai ' .

text: For some of them thought , because Judas had the bag , that Jesus had said unto him , Buy those things that we have need of against the feast ; or , that he should give something to the poor .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Isutas esi ' pʉ pʉrata esa ' pe , tʉron kon nɨ nin si usenuminka ' pʉ mɨrɨ , i ' se te ' to ' kon Iweyu Rʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' e ' nɨ iwano ' pe rɨ na ' kɨ ennato ' pe iya , mɨrɨ pe pʉra entu ' manin nan irepakɨ ta iya rɨ na ' kɨ ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: He then having received the sop went immediately out : and it was night .
text2: Isutas uya pʉreti a ' si pe rɨ , iyepa ' ka ' pʉ nin si . Ewarupɨ nau serɨ esi ' pʉ .

text: Therefore , when he was gone out , Jesus said , Now is the Son of man glorified , and God is glorified in him .
text2: Iyepa ' ka ' pʉ pata ' pʉ yau , Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Serɨ si Ka ' pon , Papa winon apurɨpɨ ' to ' ipɨ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa apurɨpɨ ' to ' si rɨ man iyau .

text: If God be glorified in him , God shall also glorify him in himself , and shall straightway glorify him .
text2: Papa apurɨpɨ ' to ' esi yau , iyau , Papa uya rɨ nɨrɨ tʉmu apurɨpɨtʉ mɨrɨ tʉyau , inke pʉra apurɨpɨtʉ iya mɨrɨ .

text: Little children , yet a little while I am with you . Ye shall seek me : and as I said unto the Jews , Whither I go , ye cannot come ; so now I say to you .
text2: “ Umunkɨ amʉ ' , mara rʉ ' kwɨ kuru inke rʉ ' kwɨ esi serɨ ɨpiyau ' nokon , uwarinpato ' auya ' nokon oton , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pɨ ' ukataine ' kasa rɨ ta uya ɨpɨ ' nokon : Utɨyai ' ne ' ya ' ɨuyepʉ kon poken pʉra iyesi .

text: A new commandment I give unto you , That ye love one another ; as I have loved you , that ye also love one another .
text2: “ Emenna ' main ke ɨrepa uya ' nokon : Ɨtonpa kon i ' nʉnkatɨ ' . Ɨi ' nʉnkasa ' uya ' nokon na ' ne ' kasa , mɨrɨ kasa ɨtonpa kon i ' nʉnkatɨ ' .

text: By this shall all men know that ye are my disciples , if ye have love one to another .
text2: Tanporo ka ' pon amʉ ' uya i ' tu mɨrɨ upoitorʉ ton pe ɨwesi kon tukai ' ɨtonpa kon i ' nʉnka auya ' nokon yau , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Simon Peter said unto him , Lord , whither goest thou ? Jesus answered him , Whither I go , thou canst not follow me now ; but thou shalt follow me afterwards .
text2: Saiman Pi ' ta uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Uyepuru , nai ya ' ɨutɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Utɨyai ' ne ' ya ' upɨkɨrɨ ɨuyepʉ pʉra iyesi , e ' tane emennʉ ' pʉ rɨ upɨkɨrɨ ɨuye ' to ' oton , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Peter said unto him , Lord , why cannot I follow thee now ? I will lay down my life for thy sake .
text2: Pi ' ta uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Uyepuru , ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' serɨ pe utɨ pʉra iyesi ɨpɨkɨrɨ ? Ɨwenai rɨ uma ' ta mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus answered him , Wilt thou lay down thy life for my sake ? Verily , verily , I say unto thee , The cock shall not crow , till thou hast denied me thrice .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Uwenai kuru pe ' auma ' ta ? I ' napairon ekama uya serɨ ɨpɨ ' , kɨrɨtɨkɨ uturumʉ rawɨrɨ , osorʉwau ite ' kwa kuru ui ' tunin pe pʉra ɨye ' ku ' to ' oton ! ” ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' .

text: Let not your heart be troubled : ye believe in God , believe also in me .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Kɨsewankamatʉu ! Papa apurɨtɨ ' ; urɨ rɨ nɨrɨ apurɨtɨ ' .

text: In my Father ' s house are many mansions : if it were not so , I would have told you . I go to prepare a place for you .
text2: Tu ' ke rɨ pata wannɨ man ukʉipʉnʉ iwʉ ' tau ; sekamai ' no mɨrɨ pe pʉra iyesi yau . Mɨrɨ ya ' utɨ serɨ apata ' se ' kon oton konekai ' .

text: And if I go and prepare a place for you , I will come again , and receive you unto myself ; that where I am , there ye may be also .
text2: Utɨsa ' pe iyesi yau apata ' se ' kon konekai ' , uye ' kapʉ kanan ayase ' na ' nokon upiyau ɨwesi kon pa , e ' ai ' ne ' yau ɨwesi kon pa .

text: And whither I go ye know , and the way ye know .
text2: Ite ' ma i ' tu auya ' nokon mɨrɨ utɨn nɨto ' ya ' utɨyai ' ne ' ya ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Thomas saith unto him , Lord , we know not whither thou goest ; and how can we know the way ?
text2: Tamas uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Uyepuru , ina uya sa ' ne i ' tu pʉra iyesi nai ya ' ɨutɨ tukai ' ; nai kasa ken ina uya ite ' ma i ' tu ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus saith unto him , I am the way , the truth , and the life : no man cometh unto the Father , but by me .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Urɨ rɨ esi ite ' ma pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' napairon nɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uko ' man nɨto ' rɨ . Ɨnʉ ' rɨ utɨ pʉra iyesi ukʉipʉnʉ piya ' urɨ poro rɨken itɨto ' esi .

text: If ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also : and from henceforth ye know him , and have seen him .
text2: I ' napai rɨ kuru ui ' tu auya ' nokon pe iyesi yau , ukʉipʉnʉ rɨ nɨrɨ i ' tu auya ' nokon mɨrɨ . Serɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' tu auya ' nokon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ensa ' auya ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Philip saith unto him , Lord , shew us the Father , and it sufficeth us .
text2: Piri ' uya ta ' pʉ , “ Uyepuru , ikʉipʉnʉ enpoikaka ' kɨ ina ena ' ; mɨrɨ rɨken i ' se ina esi mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Have I been so long time with you , and yet hast thou not known me , Philip ? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father ; and how sayest thou then , Shew us the Father ?
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ui ' tu auya pʉra pe ' iyesi , Piri ' , ɨpiyau ' nokon nɨ inke rɨ uko ' manka ' sa ' e ' tane ? Ɨnʉ ' rɨ kʉrɨ uyennin pe na ' ne ' uya rɨ ukʉipʉnʉ ensa ' pe iyesi . Nai pe mairɨ , ‘ Ikʉipʉnʉ enpoikakɨ ina ena ' , ’ ta auya ?

text: Believest thou not that I am in the Father , and the Father in me ? the words that I speak unto you I speak not of myself : but the Father that dwelleth in me , he doeth the works .
text2: Apurɨ auya pʉra pe ' iyesi urɨ esi ikʉipʉnʉ yau , ikʉipʉnʉ nɨrɨ esi uyau ? Main sekamayai ' ne ' ɨpɨ ' nokon esi uiwano ' pen e ' tane ikʉipʉnʉ , uyau nʉko ' manyai ' ne ' uya tʉtʉrawasooi kupʉ mɨrɨ .

text: Believe me that I am in the Father , and the Father in me : or else believe me for the very works ' sake .
text2: Uyapurɨtɨ ' , urɨ esi ikʉipʉnʉ yau , ikʉipʉnʉ esi uyau ta uya a ' tai ; mɨrɨ pe pʉra , eke Papa tʉrawasooi amʉ ' kupʉ uya rɨ apurɨtɨ ' .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me , the works that I do shall he do also ; and greater works than these shall he do ; because I go unto my Father .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , ɨnʉ ' rɨ uyapurɨnin esi pe iyesi yau , kʉrɨ rɨ uya iku ' to ' oton mɨrɨ siku ' ai ' ne ' rɨ . Mɨrɨ entaino kuru rɨ ku ' to ' iya oton siku ' ai ' ne ' entai kuru rɨ , apʉne pʉra utɨ wenai ikʉipʉnʉ piya ' .

text: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name , that will I do , that the Father may be glorified in the Son .
text2: Ikupʉ uya rɨ ɨnekama ' ponʉ kon uyese ' yau , imu uya ikʉipʉnʉ apurɨpɨ ' to ' ipɨkɨrɨ enpoikato ' pe .

text: If ye shall ask any thing in my name , I will do it .
text2: Uyekama ' po auya ' nokon nɨ mɨrɨ ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' rɨ uyese ' yau , ikupʉ uya rɨ mɨrɨ .

text: If ye love me , keep my commandments .
text2: “ Ui ' nʉnka auya ' nokon pe iyesi yau , umaimu awɨrɨ rɨ ɨwesi kon mɨrɨ .

text: And I will pray the Father , and he shall give you another Comforter , that he may abide with you for ever ;
text2: Ikʉipʉnʉ ekama ' po uya mɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan uya Ɨpika ' tɨnin kon tʉron nɨ enno ' to ' pe , ɨpiyau ' nokon te ' ton tɨwɨrɨ rɨ .

text: Even the Spirit of truth ; whom the world cannot receive , because it seeth him not , neither knoweth him : but ye know him ; for he dwelleth with you , and shall be in you .
text2: Pʉse rɨ I ' napairon A ' kwarʉ , serɨ non pon kon nanʉmʉnʉ pen nɨ , apʉne pʉra ene to ' uya pʉra iyesi , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' tu to ' uya pʉra rɨ iyesi , e ' tane i ' tu auya ' nokon apʉne pʉra ɨpiyau ' nokon iyesi , ayau ' nokon nɨ nɨrɨ iye ' to ' oton .

text: I will not leave you comfortless : I will come to you .
text2: Piyapaino pe ɨnɨmɨ uya ' nokon pen ; ɨpiyau ' nokon uyepʉ rɨ .

text: Yet a little while , and the world seeth me no more ; but ye see me : because I live , ye shall live also .
text2: Serɨ pe rɨ , serɨ non pon kon uya uyene pʉra iyena , mɨrɨ e ' tane uyento ' auya ' nokon oton . Apʉne pʉra uko ' mamʉ pɨ ' , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon nɨ marɨ uko ' manto ' oton .

text: At that day ye shall know that I am in my Father , and ye in me , and I in you .
text2: Uto ' ka ' nʉ ' atʉi ' ne ' a ' tai i ' tuto ' auya ' nokon oton ukʉipʉnʉ yau esi , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon esi uyau , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ urɨ esi ayau ' nokon .

text: He that hath my commandments , and keepeth them , he it is that loveth me : and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father , and I will love him , and will manifest myself to him .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ umaimu esa ' pe na ' ne ' esi mɨrɨ iyawɨrɨ rɨ , kʉrɨ rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ ui ' nʉnkanin ye ' rɨ . Kʉrɨ rɨ ui ' nʉnkanin i ' nʉnka ukʉipʉnʉ uya mɨrɨ , urɨ uya rɨ nɨrɨ i ' nʉnka kanan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ usenpoika rɨ itena ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Judas saith unto him , not Iscariot , Lord , how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us , and not unto the world ?
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Isutas ( Isutas Eskariya ' pen ) uya ta ' pʉ , “ E ' tane sa ' ne Uyepuru , ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' ina enu ya ' ɨusenpoika , serɨ non pon kon enu ya ' pʉra rɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , If a man love me , he will keep my words : and my Father will love him , and we will come unto him , and make our abode with him .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ui ' nʉnka pe iyesi yau , tenupato ' uya awɨrɨ rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ . Ukʉipʉnʉ uya i ' nʉnkato ' oton , mɨrɨpan piya ' ina uye ' to ' oton , iyau tʉpata kon koneka ina uya .

text: He that loveth me not keepeth not my sayings : and the word which ye hear is not mine , but the Father ' s which sent me .
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ ui ' nʉnka iya pʉra na ' ne ' esi mɨrɨ tenupato ' uya awɨrɨ pʉra rɨ . Serɨ ton main amʉ ' metayatʉi ' ne ' esi uiwano ' pen ; uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ ikʉipʉnʉ iwano ' pe iyesi .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , being yet present with you .
text2: “ Serɨ ton pɨ ' usaurokʉ mɨrɨ ɨpiyau ' nokon esi koro ' tau .

text: But the Comforter , which is the Holy Ghost , whom the Father will send in my name , he shall teach you all things , and bring all things to your remembrance , whatsoever I have said unto you .
text2: E ' tane kʉrɨ Ɨpika ' tɨnin kon , Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ , ikʉipʉnʉ , uyese ' yau nenno ' ai ' ne ' uya ɨyenupato ' oton kon tanporon pɨ ' rɨ , ɨyemiya ' pontɨ iya ' nokon nɨ kanyauro ' kapɨ ' ta ' tʉine ' pɨ ' .

text: Peace I leave with you , my peace I give unto you : not as the world giveth , give I unto you . Let not your heart be troubled , neither let it be afraid .
text2: Tʉusewankamai ' pʉra ɨwe ' to ' kon nɨmɨ uya serɨ ɨpiyau ' nokon ; uiwano ' pe te ' sen tʉrʉ uya ɨyena ' nokon . Serɨ non nʉtʉyai ' ne ' kasa itʉrʉ uya pen . Kɨsewankamatʉu , kenari ' nʉntʉu .

text: Ye have heard how I said unto you , I go away , and come again unto you . If ye loved me , ye would rejoice , because I said , I go unto the Father : for my Father is greater than I .
text2: “ Ta uya etasa ' auya ' nokon , ‘ Utɨ serɨ , uye ' kapʉ rɨ marɨ ɨpiya ' nokon . ’ Ui ' nʉnka auya ' nokon yau , pori ' pe rɨ ɨwesi kon mɨrɨ utɨ pɨ ' ikʉipʉnʉ piya ' , apʉne pʉra ikʉipʉnʉ esi eke pe uyentai .

text: And now I have told you before it come to pass , that , when it is come to pass , ye might believe .
text2: Serɨ ekamasa ' uya serɨ ɨpɨ ' nokon iye ' kupʉ rawɨrɨ , iye ' kupʉ a ' tai si tɨ apurɨ kon pa .

text: Hereafter I will not talk much with you : for the prince of this world cometh , and hath nothing in me .
text2: Inke kuru ayauro ' ka uya ' nokon pen , apʉne pʉra serɨ pata epuru uye ' nɨ pɨ ' man . Ɨ ' rɨ pe uku ' nin pen nɨ ,

text: But that the world may know that I love the Father ; and as the Father gave me commandment , even so I do . Arise , let us go hence .
text2: e ' tane serɨ non pon kon uya i ' tuto ' pe iyesi ikʉipʉnʉ i ' nʉnka uya , mɨrɨpan uyapiyo ' ma ' pʉ iya rʉ ' pʉ kupʉ uya iyawɨrɨ kuru . “ Ɨsi ' tɨ ' , utɨnpai ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: I am the true vine , and my Father is the husbandman .
text2: “ Urɨ esi i ' napairon ite ' pe ; ukʉipʉnʉ nin si esi mɨrɨ imainanpanin pe .

text: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away : and every branch that beareth fruit , he purgeth it , that it may bring forth more fruit .
text2: Upanta tepetasen pen a ' tɨpɨtʉ iya , tepetasen pu ' kuima iya ikaima pe , miyarɨ rɨ iyepetato ' pe .

text: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you .
text2: Ikaimaka ' sa ' pe ɨwesi kon mɨrɨ main kanyauro ' kayatʉi ' ne ' ike uriya ' .

text: Abide in me , and I in you . As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself , except it abide in the vine ; no more can ye , except ye abide in me .
text2: Moro uyau ɨko ' mantɨ ' , moro ayau ' nokon nɨrɨ uko ' manto ' pe . Ipanta epeta pʉra iyesi tiwa rɨ ; moro tʉye ' pɨ ' iko ' manto ' pe iyesi . Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon nɨ nɨrɨ epeta pʉra iyesi mɨrɨ moro uyau ɨuko ' mamʉ kon pʉra iye ' tane .

text: I am the vine , ye are the branches : He that abideth in me , and I in him , the same bringeth forth much fruit : for without me ye can do nothing .
text2: “ Ite ' pe esi ; ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon esi ipanta ton pe . Moro ka ' pon esi yau uyau mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ urɨ nɨrɨ iyau , tu ' ke rɨ iyepeta mɨrɨ ; urɨ pʉra iye ' tane ɨ ' rɨ kupʉ auya ' nokon pʉra rɨ iyesi .

text: If a man abide not in me , he is cast forth as a branch , and is withered ; and men gather them , and cast them into the fire , and they are burned .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ esi pʉra iyesi yau moro uyau , iyesi mɨrɨ eno ' masa ' , useketasa ' ipanta kasa ; mɨrɨ waraino ipanta ton amuku mɨrɨ eno ' mato ' pe apo ' ya ' , iyepo ' tɨto ' pe .

text: If ye abide in me , and my words abide in you , ye shall ask what ye will , and it shall be done unto you .
text2: Moro uyau ɨwesi kon pe iyesi yau , umaimu rɨ nɨrɨ esi moro ayau ' nokon , i ' se ɨwe ' to ' kon ekama ' potɨ ' , ɨrepa kon nɨ mɨrɨ ike .

text: Herein is my Father glorified , that ye bear much fruit ; so shall ye be my disciples .
text2: Se uya ukʉipʉnʉ apurɨpɨ ' to ' enpoika , tu ' ke ɨyepeta kon , upoitorʉ ton pe ɨwesi kon ekamanin pe .

text: As the Father hath loved me , so have I loved you : continue ye in my love .
text2: “ Ikʉipʉnʉ uya ui ' nʉnkasa ' na ' ne ' kasa , mɨrɨ kasa ɨi ' nʉnkasa ' uya ' nokon . Moro si usi ' nʉnkato ' yau e ' tɨ ' .

text: If ye keep my commandments , ye shall abide in my love ; even as I have kept my Father ' s commandments , and abide in his love .
text2: Umaimu awɨrɨ ɨwesi kon yau , usi ' nʉnkato ' yau moro ɨwesi kon mɨrɨ , ukʉipʉnʉ maimu awɨrɨ e ' sa ' na ' ne ' kasa kuru mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ moro isi ' nʉnkato ' yau e ' ai ' ne ' kasa .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that my joy might remain in you , and that your joy might be full .
text2: Serɨ ke apana ' tɨsa ' uya ' nokon mɨrɨ pori ' pe e ' to ' pe ɨpɨ ' nokon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pori ' pe ɨwe ' to ' kon e ' to ' pe mararon pe pʉra .

text: This is my commandment , That ye love one another , as I have loved you .
text2: Se serɨ apiyontɨn nɨto ' uya : Ɨtonpa kon i ' nʉnkatɨ ' , ɨi ' nʉnkasa ' uya ' nokon na ' ne ' kasa .

text: Greater love hath no man than this , that a man lay down his life for his friends .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ usi ' nʉnkato ' pʉra rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ eke pe , kʉrɨ tʉtonpa ton iwano ' pe tʉuko ' manto ' tʉnin entai .

text: Ye are my friends , if ye do whatsoever I command you .
text2: Utonpa ton pe ɨwesi kon mɨrɨ ayapiyo ' ma ' pʉ uya ' nokon kupʉ auya ' nokon yau .

text: Henceforth I call you not servants ; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth : but I have called you friends ; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you .
text2: Upoitorʉ tukai ' si ɨyesakʉ uya ' nokon pen serɨ enta ' , apʉne pʉra ipoitorʉ kʉrɨ rɨ tepuru tʉrawasooi i ' tunin pen . E ' tane ru ' ku , ɨyesakʉ uya ' nokon utonpa ton tukai ' , apʉne pʉra tanporon nɨ usenupa ' pʉ ipɨ ' ukʉipʉnʉ winɨ i ' tu kon pa iku ' sa ' uya pɨ ' .

text: Ye have not chosen me , but I have chosen you , and ordained you , that ye should go and bring forth fruit , and that your fruit should remain : that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name , he may give it you .
text2: Uyanʉnsa ' auya ' nokon pen , e ' tane ayanʉnsa ' uya ' nokon ɨutɨ kon pa epetai ' , iteperu moro tʉuko ' mansen ye ' pe . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ikʉipʉnʉ uya ɨrepa kon ɨ ' rɨ rɨ uyese ' yau ɨnekama ' ponʉ kon ke .

text: These things I command you , that ye love one another .
text2: Serɨ serɨ apiyontɨn nɨto ' uya : Ɨtonpa kon i ' nʉnkatɨ ' .

text: If the world hate you , ye know that it hated me before it hated you .
text2: “ Orʉ uya ɨyewaruma ' tɨ kon yau , ɨyenu kon yau mʉku ' tʉi ' wapiya urɨ ewaruma ' tɨ ' pʉ iya .

text: If ye were of the world , the world would love his own : but because ye are not of the world , but I have chosen you out of the world , therefore the world hateth you .
text2: Orʉ iwano ' pe ɨwesi kon yau , ɨi ' nʉnka iya ' nokon mɨrɨ tiwano ' pe ɨwesi kon pɨ ' . Na ' ne ' rɨ nin si , orʉ iwano ' pe ɨwesi kon pen , e ' tane ayanʉnsa ' uya ' nokon orʉ apai . Mɨrɨ wenai , orʉ uya ɨyewaruma ' tɨ kon .

text: Remember the word that I said unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord . If they have persecuted me , they will also persecute you ; if they have kept my saying , they will keep yours also .
text2: Ɨyenu kon yau main usaurokʉ ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ mʉku ' tʉi ' : ‘ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ ipoitorʉ esi pʉra iyesi eke pe tesa ' entai , ’ tawon . To ' uya ukota ' masa ' yau , to ' uya rɨ marɨ ɨkota ' ma kon mɨrɨ . Urɨ uya tenupato ' kon awɨrɨ to ' esi yau , to ' rɨ esi mɨrɨ ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon uya to ' enupa ' pʉ awɨrɨ rɨ marɨ .

text: But all these things will they do unto you for my name ' s sake , because they know not him that sent me .
text2: Serɨ kasa to ' uya ɨkupʉ kon mɨrɨ uyese ' pɨ ' ɨwesi kon pɨ ' , apʉne pʉra to ' uya i ' tu pʉra iyesi kʉrɨ uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ .

text: If I had not come and spoken unto them , they had not had sin : but now they have no cloke for their sin .
text2: Uye ' sa ' pʉra iyesi yau to ' auro ' kase ' na , tʉmakooi ke to ' esi pɨ ' ɨri pe to ' nesii ' no pen nɨ . E ' tane nin si , mɨrɨ pɨ ' , tʉmakooi kon wapu ' tɨto ' uya poken pʉra iyesi .

text: He that hateth me hateth my Father also .
text2: Kʉrɨ uyewaruma ' tɨnin uya ukʉipʉnʉ rɨ marɨ ewaruma ' tɨ mɨrɨ .

text: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did , they had not had sin : but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' nʉkupʉ ' pʉ pen nɨ ku ' sa ' uya pʉra iyesi yau to ' koro ' tau , tʉmakooi ke tesi kon pɨ ' ɨri pe to ' nesii ' no pen nɨ . E ' tane si serɨ eke tʉrawaso amʉ ' kupʉ uya ensa ' to ' uya , e ' tane si asa ' rɨ rɨ marɨ urɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ukʉipʉnʉ ewaruma ' tɨsa ' to ' uya .

text: But this cometh to pass , that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law , They hated me without a cause .
text2: E ' tane serɨ iye ' menukasa ' Main uta ' ku ' tɨto ' pe iyesi : ‘ Iwenai pʉra rɨ to ' uya uyewaruma ' tɨ ' pʉ , ’ tawon .

text: But when the Comforter is come , whom I will send unto you from the Father , even the Spirit of truth , which proceedeth from the Father , he shall testify of me :
text2: “ Ɨpika ' tɨnin kon uye ' sa ' a ' tai , unennoko ' pʉ ikʉipʉnʉ winɨpaino , i ' napairon A ' kwarʉ , ikʉipʉnʉ yapai tepa ' kasen uya uyekamato ' oton ɨpɨ ' nokon .

text: And ye also shall bear witness , because ye have been with me from the beginning .
text2: Mekamatʉi ' rɨ nɨrɨ ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon upiyau ɨwe ' sa ' kon mɨrɨ iyepiya ' tɨ ' pʉ si ' kɨrɨ .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that ye should not be offended .
text2: “ Tanporo serɨ ke apana ' tɨsa ' uya ' nokon serɨ autano ' ma kon namai ' .

text: They shall put you out of the synagogues : yea , the time cometh , that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service .
text2: To ' uya ɨyenpa ' kato ' oton kon usenupan nɨto ' iwʉ ' tapai ; i ' napai rɨ iweyu uye ' kapʉ , ɨwɨnin e ' ku ' to ' oton wakʉ kupʉ tʉuya pe tekamai ' Papa iwano ' pe .

text: And these things will they do unto you , because they have not known the Father , nor me .
text2: Serɨ rupɨ ton kupʉ to ' uya mɨrɨ , apʉne pʉra to ' uya ikʉipʉnʉ mɨrɨ pe pʉra urɨ i ' tu pʉra iyesi pɨ ' .

text: But these things have I told you , that when the time shall come , ye may remember that I told you of them . And these things I said not unto you at the beginning , because I was with you .
text2: Serɨ ke apana ' tɨsa ' uya ' nokon , iweyu uye ' sa ' a ' tai , apana ' tɨ ' pʉ uya ' nokon e ' to ' pe ɨyenu kon yau . Serɨ ke apana ' tɨ uya ' nokon pʉn wapiya , apʉne pʉra ɨpiyau ' nokon esi pɨ ' .

text: But now I go my way to him that sent me ; and none of you asketh me , Whither goest thou ?
text2: “ Utɨyai ' si uyenno ' nin nʉ ' pʉ piya ' , e ' tane ɨnʉ ' uya uyekama ' po pʉra man , ‘ Nai ya ' ɨutɨ ? ’ tukai ' .

text: But because I have said these things unto you , sorrow hath filled your heart .
text2: Apʉne pʉra si serɨ ton ekamasa ' uya pɨ ' ɨupokoitasa ' kon nin si .

text: Nevertheless I tell you the truth ; It is expedient for you that I go away : for if I go not away , the Comforter will not come unto you ; but if I depart , I will send him unto you .
text2: E ' tane i ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon : Wakʉ pe ɨwesi kon pa utɨ serɨ . Utɨsa ' pʉra iyesi yau , Ɨpika ' tɨnin kon uyepʉ pʉra iyesi ɨpiya ' nokon ; e ' tane utɨsa ' yau , ennoko uya mɨrɨ ɨpiya ' nokon .

text: And when he is come , he will reprove the world of sin , and of righteousness , and of judgment :
text2: Iye ' sa ' a ' tai , orʉ pɨ ' enpoika iya mɨrɨ ipoken pʉra makoi pɨ ' iyesi pɨ ' , iyawɨron pɨ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eseru aimenkato ' pɨ ' :

text: Of sin , because they believe not on me ;
text2: makoi pɨ ' , apʉne pʉra ka ' pon amʉ ' uya uyapurɨ pʉra iyesi pɨ ' ;

text: Of righteousness , because I go to my Father , and ye see me no more ;
text2: iyawɨron pɨ ' , apʉne pʉra ikʉipʉnʉ piya ' utɨ pɨ ' , mɨrɨ enta ' uyene auya ' nokon pʉra iye ' to ' ya ' ;

text: Of judgment , because the prince of this world is judged .
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eseru aimenkato ' pɨ ' , apʉne pʉra serɨ orʉ epuru si esi pɨ ' eno ' masa ' pe .

text: I have yet many things to say unto you , but ye cannot bear them now .
text2: “ Eke pe rɨ tato ' uya man ɨpɨ ' nokon , e ' tane a ' si auya ' nokon poken pʉra iyesi .

text: Howbeit when he , the Spirit of truth , is come , he will guide you into all truth : for he shall not speak of himself ; but whatsoever he shall hear , that shall he speak : and he will shew you things to come .
text2: E ' tane kʉrɨ , i ' napairon A ' kwarʉ uye ' sa ' a ' tai , ayarɨ iya ' nokon mɨrɨ i ' napairon ya ' . Tiwano ' pe isauro ' to ' oton pen , tʉneta ' pʉ pɨ ' rɨken isauro ' to ' oton , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ekamato ' iya oton miyarɨ rɨ tʉuye ' sen .

text: He shall glorify me : for he shall receive of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Uyapurɨpɨ ' to ' ipɨ ' nepʉ iya mɨrɨ uiwano ' mo ' ka tʉuya winɨ i ' tunin pe ɨwesi kon pa ikupʉ iya .

text: All things that the Father hath are mine : therefore said I , that he shall take of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Tanporo ikʉipʉnʉ iwano ' pe na ' ne ' esi mɨrɨ uiwano ' rɨ . Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' ukayai ' ne ' , Iya ' kwarʉ uya uiwano ' mo ' ka i ' tunin pe ɨwesi kon pa ikupʉ iya .

text: A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me , because I go to the Father .
text2: Serɨ pe iwa rɨ mɨrɨ enta ' uyene auya ' nokon pʉra iyena mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ mɨrɨ tʉpo uyento ' auya ' nokon oton mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then said some of his disciples among themselves , What is this that he saith unto us , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me : and , Because I go to the Father ?
text2: Ipoitorʉ ton tonpa ton uya ta ' pʉ tʉtonpa kon pɨ ' , “ Ɨ ' rɨ ta iya e ' kwa pe iyesi , ‘ Serɨ pe iwa rɨ mɨrɨ enta ' uyene auya ' nokon pʉra iyena mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ mɨrɨ tʉpo uyento ' auya ' nokon oton mɨrɨ , ’ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ , ‘ Apʉne pʉra ikʉipʉnʉ piya ' utɨ pɨ ' , ’ nɨkayai ' ne ' ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: They said therefore , What is this that he saith , A little while ? we cannot tell what he saith .
text2: To ' esi ' pʉ usekama ' popɨ ' nɨ pɨ ' , “ Ɨ ' rɨ ta iya e ' kwa pe iyesi , ‘ serɨ pe iwa rɨ ’ nɨkayai ' ne ' ? Ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ ' nokon pʉra man , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Now Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him , and said unto them , Do ye inquire among yourselves of that I said , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me ?
text2: Sises uya ene ' pʉ tekama ' popai ' nokon to ' esi serɨ pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Ɨusekama ' popɨtʉ kon ɨ ' rɨ ta uya e ' kwa pe iyesi , ‘ Serɨ pe iwa rɨ mɨrɨ enta ' uyento ' auya ' nokon oton pen , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ mɨrɨ tʉpo uyento ' auya ' nokon oton nɨ mɨrɨ ’ ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , That ye shall weep and lament , but the world shall rejoice : and ye shall be sorrowful , but your sorrow shall be turned into joy .
text2: I ' napairon ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , ɨupokoitato ' oton kon , tʉuta ' kwarʉkai ' aukaranto ' oton kon pata epori ' ma tane . Ɨupokoitato ' oton kon , e ' tane ɨpokooi kon era ' tɨto ' oton epori ' man pe .

text: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow , because her hour is come : but as soon as she is delivered of the child , she remembereth no more the anguish , for joy that a man is born into the world .
text2: Tentusen uri ' san utaimerunpa mɨrɨ e ' ne ' pe tesi pɨ ' , apʉne pʉra tʉweyu e ' seposa ' pɨ ' ; e ' tane nin si tʉmʉre entusa ' a ' tai , e ' ne ' pe tesi ' pʉ pu ' tɨka ' nʉkʉ iya mɨrɨ , apʉne pʉra pori ' pe tesi pɨ ' mʉre entunʉ ' sa ' tʉuya pɨ ' orʉ pona .

text: And ye now therefore have sorrow : but I will see you again , and your heart shall rejoice , and your joy no man taketh from you .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa ɨwesi kon mɨrɨ : Ɨupokoita kon weyu si serɨ , e ' tane ɨyento ' uya ' nokon oton ; mɨrɨ a ' tai , ɨyepori ' ma kon mɨrɨ , ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ pori ' pe ɨwe ' to ' kon mo ' kato ' oton pen .

text: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing . Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name , he will give it you .
text2: Mɨrɨ wʉi a ' tai , ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' rɨ uyekama ' po auya ' nokon pen nɨ mɨrɨ . I ' napairon ekama uya serɨ ɨpɨ ' nokon ; ukʉipʉnʉ uya rɨ ɨrepa kon uyese ' yau ɨnekama ' po ' pʉ kon ke .

text: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name : ask , and ye shall receive , that your joy may be full .
text2: Serɨ pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ ɨ ' rɨ rɨ ekama ' posa ' auya ' nokon pʉra man uyese ' yau . Ekama ' potɨ ' ; mɨrɨ a ' tai , eporo auya ' nokon nɨ mɨrɨ , mararon pe pʉra pori ' pe ɨwe ' to ' kon esi mɨrɨ .

text: These things have I spoken unto you in proverbs : but the time cometh , when I shall no more speak unto you in proverbs , but I shall shew you plainly of the Father .
text2: “ Panton yai ayauro ' kapɨ ' sa ' uya ' nokon , e ' tane iweyu nʉye ' an serɨ rupɨ main yai ayauro ' kato ' uya ' nokon weyu pen nɨ , e ' tane sa ' man yai pʉra rɨ ukʉipʉnʉ ekamato ' uya oton ɨpɨ ' nokon .

text: At that day ye shall ask in my name : and I say not unto you , that I will pray the Father for you :
text2: Mɨrɨ wʉi a ' tai , uyese ' yau ekama ' poto ' auya ' nokon oton . Amaimu kon pe ikʉipʉnʉ ekama ' poto ' uya oton ta uya pen .

text: For the Father himself loveth you , because ye have loved me , and have believed that I came out from God .
text2: Kane , ikʉipʉnʉ uya rɨ tʉmɨrɨ pe ɨi ' nʉnka kon , apʉne pʉra ui ' nʉnkasa ' auya ' nokon pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa winɨ uye ' sa ' pɨ ' apurɨsa ' auya ' nokon pɨ ' .

text: I came forth from the Father , and am come into the world : again , I leave the world , and go to the Father .
text2: Uyee ' pʉ ikʉipʉnʉ winɨpai serɨ orʉ pona ; serɨ nin si orʉ nɨmɨ uya , ikʉipʉnʉ piya ' enna ' po , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: His disciples said unto him , Lo , now speakest thou plainly , and speakest no proverb .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ipoitorʉ ton uya ta ' pʉ , “ Mɨrɨ si ausaurokʉ ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ poken , panton yai pʉra .

text: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things , and needest not that any man should ask thee : by this we believe that thou camest forth from God .
text2: Serɨ si ina uya i ' tu tanporon nɨ i ' tunin pe ɨwesi mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ɨyekama ' poto ' i ' se pʉra rɨ ɨwesi . Serɨ uya ina kupʉ Papa winon pe ayapurɨnin pe , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Jesus answered them , Do ye now believe ?
text2: “ Mɨrɨ si apurɨsa ' auya ' nokon iu ' matʉ ya ' rɨ ! ” tukai ' Sises uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ .

text: Behold , the hour cometh , yea , is now come , that ye shall be scattered , every man to his own , and shall leave me alone : and yet I am not alone , because the Father is with me .
text2: “ E ' tane iweyu nʉye ' an , iye ' ka ' sa ' rɨ , ɨye ' ta ' nʉ ' to ' oton kon apata ' se ' kon ya ' ne . Tikin sarɨ unonkato ' auya ' nokon oton . E ' tane rɨ tikin sarɨ esi pen , apʉne pʉra ukʉipʉnʉ esi ke upiyau .

text: These things I have spoken unto you , that in me ye might have peace . In the world ye shall have tribulation : but be of good cheer ; I have overcome the world .
text2: “ Serɨ ton ekamasa ' uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , uyau ɨwesi kon pa ewankamanin pʉra . Serɨ orʉ po eke rɨ ɨyewankamanin kon esi , e ' tane ɨyewan kon imeruntɨtanʉ ' tɨ ' : Orʉ wapiya ' kasa ' uya man , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: These words spake Jesus , and lifted up his eyes to heaven , and said , Father , the hour is come ; glorify thy Son , that thy Son also may glorify thee :
text2: Serɨ ton ta ' pʉ Sises uya tʉpo , tenu tʉrʉ ' pʉ iya Epʉn winɨkʉi ' , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ , “ Papai , iweyu uye ' sa ' man . Ɨmu apurɨpɨ ' kɨ , ɨmu uya nɨrɨ ayapurɨpɨ ' to ' pe .

text: As thou hast given him power over all flesh , that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him .
text2: Tanporon kon esa ' pe iye ' to ' pe meruntɨ ke irepasa ' auya na ' ne ' kasa , tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko ' man nɨto ' tʉto ' pe iya , irepa ' pʉ auya na ' ne ' nan ena ' .

text: And this is life eternal , that they might know thee the only true God , and Jesus Christ , whom thou hast sent .
text2: Serɨ tɨwɨrɨ rɨ uko ' man nɨto ' , to ' uya ɨi ' tuto ' pe i ' napairon Papa pe ɨwesi , Sises Kʉrai nɨrɨ i ' tuto ' pe to ' uya ɨnennoko ' pʉ tukai ' .

text: I have glorified thee on the earth : I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do .
text2: Serɨ non po ayapurɨpɨ ' to ' ne ' sa ' uya man , tʉrawaso ɨntʉrʉ ' pʉ iku ' to ' pe uya i ' ma ' kasa ' uya winɨ .

text: And now , O Father , glorify thou me with thine own self with the glory which I had with thee before the world was .
text2: Papai , serɨ pe uyapurɨpɨ ' kɨ upiyau ɨwesi ke rɨ , pena ɨpokon pe esi a ' tai uyapurɨpɨ ' taine ' kasa non ekoneka wapiya .

text: I have manifested thy name unto the men which thou gavest me out of the world : thine they were , and thou gavest them me ; and they have kept thy word .
text2: “ Ɨi ' tuto ' pe ɨyenpoika ' pʉ uya ka ' pon amʉ ' urepasa ' auya na ' ne ' nan orʉ apai ena ' . Ɨiwano ' pe to ' esi ' pʉ ; to ' tʉsa ' auya uyena ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya amaimu apurɨsa ' .

text: Now they have known that all things whatsoever thou hast given me are of thee .
text2: To ' uya nɨrɨ i ' tusa ' serɨ tanporon urepa ' pʉ auya esi ɨwinon pe tukai ' .

text: For I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me ; and they have received them , and have known surely that I came out from thee , and they have believed that thou didst send me .
text2: Main urepa ' pʉ auya ike ke to ' repasa ' uya , mɨrɨpan anʉnsa ' to ' uya . To ' uya nɨrɨ i ' tusa ' ɨwinɨ uye ' sa ' tukai ' , uyenno ' sa ' auya tukai ' nɨrɨ to ' uya apurɨsa ' .

text: I pray for them : I pray not for the world , but for them which thou hast given me ; for they are thine .
text2: To ' pona ɨpʉrema . Orʉ pona ɨpʉrema pen , e ' tane urepa ' pʉ auya ton pona , apʉne pʉra ɨiwano ' pe to ' esi pɨ ' .

text: And all mine are thine , and thine are mine ; and I am glorified in them .
text2: Tanporo upiyau na ' ne ' nɨrɨ esi ɨiwano ' pe , tanporo ɨpiyau na ' ne ' esi nɨrɨ uiwano ' pe . Kamoro uriya ' uyapurɨpɨ ' to ' uye ' sa ' .

text: And now I am no more in the world , but these are in the world , and I come to thee . Holy Father , keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me , that they may be one , as we are .
text2: Inke serɨ orʉ po esi pen , e ' tane serɨ orʉ po to ' esi , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ utɨ nin si ɨpiya ' . Wakʉ ikʉipʉnʉ , ɨyese ' meruntɨ ke to ' iwapu ' tɨkɨ - - - itese ' urepa ' pʉ auya ike - - - tikin nɨ to ' e ' to ' pe , tikin nɨ e ' nɨ na ' ne ' kasa .

text: While I was with them in the world , I kept them in thy name : those that thou gavest me I have kept , and none of them is lost , but the son of perdition ; that the scripture might be fulfilled .
text2: To ' piyau esi koro ' tau , to ' wapu pe e ' sa ' man , to ' pa ' sima pɨ ' mɨrɨ itese ' urepa ' pʉ auya ike ke . Ɨnʉ ' rɨ utano ' masa ' pʉra man , kʉrɨ rɨken tʉuma ' tasen ye ' pe rɨ iye ' ku ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ iye ' menukasa ' itekare a ' ku ' tɨnin pe rɨ .

text: And now come I to thee ; and these things I speak in the world , that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves .
text2: “ Ɨpiya ' si utɨ serɨ , e ' tane serɨ ton ekama uya serɨ non po rɨ marɨ esi koro ' tau , pori ' pe e ' to ' eponin pe to ' e ' to ' pe tʉyau ' nokon .

text: I have given them thy word ; and the world hath hated them , because they are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Amaimu ke to ' repasa ' uya , mɨrɨpan kon ewaruma ' tɨ orʉ pon kon uya , orʉ pon kon pe pʉra to ' esi wenai , urɨ nɨrɨ esi orʉ pon pe pʉra na ' ne ' kasa .

text: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world , but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil .
text2: Ɨpʉrema orʉ apai to ' mo ' ka pa pen , e ' tane to ' wapu pe ɨwesi pa ɨri namai ' .

text: They are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Orʉ iwano ' ton pe pʉra to ' esi , orʉ iwano ' pe pʉra e ' ai ' ne ' kasa .

text: Sanctify them through thy truth : thy word is truth .
text2: Wakʉ pe i ' napairon poro to ' iku ' kɨ , amaimu esi i ' napairon .

text: As thou hast sent me into the world , even so have I also sent them into the world .
text2: Orʉ pona uyenno ' sa ' auya na ' ne ' kasa , mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ to ' enno ' sa ' uya non pon kon koro ' ta ' .

text: And for their sakes I sanctify myself , that they also might be sanctified through the truth .
text2: To ' iwano ' pe ekonekasa ' wakʉ pe , to ' nɨrɨ ekonekasa ' e ' to ' pe wakʉ pe .

text: Neither pray I for these alone , but for them also which shall believe on me through their word ;
text2: “ Kamoro rɨken pona ɨpʉrema pen , e ' tane kamoro uyapurɨnin nan pona nɨrɨ to ' maimu wenai .

text: That they all may be one ; as thou , Father , art in me , and I in thee , that they also may be one in us : that the world may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Tikin nɨ tanporo to ' e ' to ' pe , Papai , ɨmɨrɨ esi na ' ne ' kasa uyau , urɨ nɨrɨ ayau . To ' nɨrɨ e ' to ' pe tikin nɨ nɨrɨ uyau ' nokon , orʉ pon kon uya apurɨto ' pe uyenno ' sa ' auya tukai ' .

text: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them ; that they may be one , even as we are one :
text2: Uyapurɨpɨ ' to ' pe urepa ' pʉ auya na ' ne ' ke to ' repasa ' uya , to ' e ' to ' pe tikin nɨ , tikin nɨ e ' nɨ na ' ne ' kasa rɨ marɨ :

text: I in them , and thou in me , that they may be made perfect in one ; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me , and hast loved them , as thou hast loved me .
text2: urɨ to ' yau , ɨmɨrɨ nɨrɨ uyau . To ' ekonekato ' pe wakʉ pe tikin nan nɨ yau , uyenno ' sa ' auya tukai ' orʉ pon kon uya i ' tuto ' pe , to ' i ' nʉnkasa ' uya , ui ' nʉnkasa ' auya na ' ne ' kasa .

text: Father , I will that they also , whom thou hast given me , be with me where I am ; that they may behold my glory , which thou hast given me : for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world .
text2: “ Papai , urepasa ' auya ike na ' ne ' nan i ' se esi upiyau e ' ai ' ne ' yau , uyapurɨpɨ ' to ' ento ' pe to ' uya , urepa ' pʉ auya na ' ne ' ike , apʉne pʉra ui ' nʉnka auya pɨ ' , orʉ ekoneka rawɨrɨ rɨ .

text: O righteous Father , the world hath not known thee : but I have known thee , and these have known that thou hast sent me .
text2: “ Ipokena ' Papai , orʉ uya ɨi ' tu pʉra iye ' tane , ɨi ' tu uya . Uyenno ' sa ' auya tukai ' nɨrɨ pʉsamoro uya i ' tu .

text: And I have declared unto them thy name , and will declare it : that the love wherewith thou hast loved me may be in them , and I in them .
text2: Ɨyenpoikasa ' uya to ' ena ' , mɨrɨ kupʉ uya miyarɨ rɨ , ui ' nʉnkato ' auya e ' to ' pe to ' iwano ' pe , urɨ rɨ nɨrɨ si e ' to ' pe to ' yau , ” tukai ' iwɨpʉrema ' pʉ .

text: When Jesus had spoken these words , he went forth with his disciples over the brook Cedron , where was a garden , into the which he entered , and his disciples .
text2: Tʉwɨpʉrema e ' nonkasa ' a ' tai , Sises utɨ ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton pokon pe Kitʉron aranta tʉnɨ ' kwɨrɨ ' nʉ ' se . Iratoi po are ' e ' kwa esi ' pʉ , mɨrɨ ya ' tʉpoitorʉ ton pokon pe Sises utɨ ' pʉ .

text: And Judas also , which betrayed him , knew the place : for Jesus ofttimes resorted thither with his disciples .
text2: Isutas si , eparankanin oton , uya mɨrɨ pata i ' tu ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra mɨrɨ ya ' inke rɨ tʉpoitorʉ ton pokon pe tʉutɨpɨ ' sen pe Sises e ' pɨtʉ pɨ ' .

text: Judas then , having received a band of men and officers from the chief priests and Pharisees , cometh thither with lanterns and torches and weapons .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' , Isutas utɨ ' pʉ are ' e ' kwa na ' , tamu ' kuru ' tawon kon soisa amʉ ' arɨ pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Pari ' si amʉ ' poitorʉ ton arɨ pe . To ' uya ta ' sʉrai ' ton , raan ' pu ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tepaai kon arɨ esi ' pʉ .

text: Jesus therefore , knowing all things that should come upon him , went forth , and said unto them , Whom seek ye ?
text2: Sises uya tanporon nɨ tʉpɨ ' te ' ku ' ton i ' tu wenai , itɨ ' pʉ to ' ekama ' poi ' , “ Ɨnʉ ' i ' se ɨwesi kon ? ” tukai ' .

text: They answered him , Jesus of Nazareth . Jesus saith unto them , I am he . And Judas also , which betrayed him , stood with them .
text2: “ Sises , Nasare ' pon , ” tukai ' to ' uya eikʉ ' pʉ . “ Kʉrɨ rɨ urɨ , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya . ( Isutas nin si eparankanin e ' soto ' kasa ' esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ to ' pokon pe . )

text: As soon then as he had said unto them , I am he , they went backward , and fell to the ground .
text2: Sises uya , “ Kʉrɨ rɨ urɨ , ” ta etasa ' tʉuya ' nokon a ' tai , ta ' poi kon ya ' to ' enna ' po uta ' mo ' ka ' pʉ non pona .

text: Then asked he them again , Whom seek ye ? And they said , Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: To ' kanan ekama ' pokaa ' pʉ iya , “ Ɨnʉ ' i ' se ɨwesi kon ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨpan kon uya , “ Sises , Nasare ' pon , ” ta ' pʉ .

text: Jesus answered , I have told you that I am he : if therefore ye seek me , let these go their way :
text2: “ Kʉrɨ rɨ urɨ , ukayai ' ne ko , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya . “ Uwarinpa auya ' nokon pe iyesi yau , tɨwɨ pʉsamoro ka ' pon amʉ ' nʉtɨi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: That the saying might be fulfilled , which he spake , Of them which thou gavest me have I lost none .
text2: Serɨ e ' kupʉ ' pʉ isaurokʉ ' pʉ a ' ku ' tɨnin pe : “ Tikin nɨ rɨ urepa ' pʉ auya ton tonpa ano ' masa ' uya pʉra man , ” ta ' pʉ iya rʉ ' pʉ .

text: Then Simon Peter having a sword drew it , and smote the high priest ' s servant , and cut off his right ear . The servant ' s name was Malchus .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Saiman Pi ' ta , supara esa ' pe te ' sen uya imo ' ka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru poitorʉ pana enwo ' ne ' winon a ' tɨ ' pʉ . ( Ipoitorʉ ese ' esi ' pʉ Marʉ ' kas . )

text: Then said Jesus unto Peter , Put up thy sword into the sheath : the cup which my Father hath given me , shall I not drink it ?
text2: Sises uya Pi ' ta apiyo ' ma ' pʉ , “ Ɨsuparaai emaika ' ! Ukʉipʉnʉ uya pe ' uwo ' pasa ' na ' ne ' ike ensi uya pen ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then the band and the captain and officers of the Jews took Jesus , and bound him ,
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , tamu ' kuru ' tawon kon Roman soisaai amʉ ' , tepuru kon pokon pe esii ' ma , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' erasu ton uya Sises a ' si ' pʉ . To ' uya auronpɨtʉ ' pʉ ,

text: And led him away to Annas first ; for he was father in law to Caiaphas , which was the high priest that same year .
text2: mɨrɨpan kon uya arɨ ' pʉ wapiya Anas piya ' Kaya ' pas tamo , mɨrɨ wʉipiya yau use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru pe te ' sen .

text: Now Caiaphas was he , which gave counsel to the Jews , that it was expedient that one man should die for the people .
text2: Kaya ' pas kʉrɨ rɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pɨ ' wakʉ pe iwa iyesi mɨrɨ tikin nan ka ' pon uma ' tasa ' a ' tai ka ' pon amʉ ' iwano ' pe tawon nʉ ' pʉ .

text: And Simon Peter followed Jesus , and so did another disciple : that disciple was known unto the high priest , and went in with Jesus into the palace of the high priest .
text2: Saiman Pi ' ta mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉron nɨ ipoitorʉ uya Sises e ' ma ' pʉka esi ' pʉ . Apʉne pʉra use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ni ' tunʉ pe pʉse rɨ ipoitorʉ esi ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ Sises a ' kɨrɨ use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru iwʉ ' pʉ ' kʉ ta ' .

text: But Peter stood at the door without . Then went out that other disciple , which was known unto the high priest , and spake unto her that kept the door , and brought in Peter .
text2: E ' tane Pi ' ta esi ' pʉ mʉra ' ta nau itenupɨkɨrɨ e ' nɨ pɨ ' . Tʉron nɨ ipoitorʉ use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ni ' tunʉ , enna ' posa ' uyee ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya mɨrɨ yawon uri ' san auro ' ka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya Pi ' ta ewonnʉkʉ ' pʉ .

text: Then saith the damsel that kept the door unto Peter , Art not thou also one of this man ' s disciples ? He saith , I am not .
text2: “ Ɨmɨrɨ pen pe ' kʉrɨ rɨ , kʉrɨ rɨ poitorʉ ton tonpa , ɨmɨrɨ rɨ ? ” tukai ' uri ' san mʉra ' ta nawon uya Pi ' ta ekama ' po ' pʉ . Entakanoma ' pʉ iya , “ Urɨ pen nɨ kʉrɨ rɨ , ” tukai ' .

text: And the servants and officers stood there , who had made a fire of coals ; for it was cold : and they warmed themselves : and Peter stood with them , and warmed himself .
text2: Komi ' pe pata esi ' pʉ , mɨrɨ pɨ ' to ' poitorʉ ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eke ton nɨ e ' soto ' pɨ ' sa ' esi ' pʉ a ' non pɨ ' apo ' piyau . Pi ' ta rɨ nɨrɨ e ' soto ' kasa ' esi ' pʉ to ' koro ' tau a ' non pɨ ' .

text: The high priest then asked Jesus of his disciples , and of his doctrine .
text2: Mɨrɨ koro ' tau , use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru uya Sises ekama ' popɨtʉ ' pʉ ipoitorʉ pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ enupan nɨto ' iya pɨ ' .

text: Jesus answered him , I spake openly to the world ; I ever taught in the synagogue , and in the temple , whither the Jews always resort ; and in secret have I said nothing .
text2: Sises uya imaimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ama ' ai pʉra usauro ' sa ' man usenupan ku ' sa ' uya man Esuwerʉ amʉ ' usenupato ' iwʉ ' tau , use ' man nɨto ' , ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' tau , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' amʉrato ' yau ' ne .

text: Why askest thou me ? ask them which heard me , what I have said unto them : behold , they know what I said .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' uyekama ' po auya ? Uyetanin nʉ ' san ekama ' pokɨ . To ' uya rɨ i ' tu mɨrɨ umaimu rʉ ' pʉ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when he had thus spoken , one of the officers which stood by struck Jesus with the palm of his hand , saying , Answerest thou the high priest so ?
text2: Serɨ kasa isaurokʉ a ' tai , soisa amʉ ' tonpa iye ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' uya temiyatʉ ke itemʉ ' pɨ ' iwɨnɨ ' pʉ . “ Mɨrɨ kasa pe ' tʉmaimu ' sen kʉrɨ use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ? ” tai ' ma .

text: Jesus answered him , If I have spoken evil , bear witness of the evil : but if well , why smitest thou me ?
text2: Sises uya imaimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ipoken pʉra usauro ' sa ' pe iyesi yau , ekama ' . E ' tane i ' napairon pɨ ' usauro ' sa ' pe iyesi yau , ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' uwɨnɨ auya ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Now Annas had sent him bound unto Caiaphas the high priest .
text2: Anas uya ennoko ' pʉ auronpɨ ' sa ' pe rɨ marɨ Kaya ' pas piya ' use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru .

text: And Simon Peter stood and warmed himself . They said therefore unto him , Art not thou also one of his disciples ? He denied it , and said , I am not .
text2: Saiman Pi ' ta e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' esi koro ' tau a ' non pɨ ' . “ Ipoitorʉ ton tonpa pen pe ' ɨmɨrɨ ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya ipɨ ' . I ' tunin pe pʉra iye ' kuu ' pʉ , “ Urɨ pen nɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: One of the servants of the high priest , being his kinsman whose ear Peter cut off , saith , Did not I see thee in the garden with him ?
text2: Use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru poitorʉ tonpa pe te ' sen , Pi ' ta nakʉtʉ ' pʉ ipana tonpa pe te ' sen uya ta ' pʉ , “ Ɨmɨrɨ pen pe ' iya ' kɨrɨ are ' e ' kwa nau sentaine ' pen ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Peter then denied again : and immediately the cock crew .
text2: Pi ' ta kanan e ' ku ' kaa ' pʉ i ' tunin pe pʉra . Mɨrɨ a ' tai rɨ , kɨrɨtɨkɨ epiya ' tɨ ' pʉ uturun nɨ pɨ ' .

text: Then led they Jesus from Caiaphas unto the hall of judgment : and it was early ; and they themselves went not into the judgment hall , lest they should be defiled ; but that they might eat the passover .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' uya Sises arɨ ' pʉ Kaya ' pas piyapai Roman amʉ ' kopʉnaai iwʉ ' ta ' . Awanakʉi ' si pata enaka ' sa ' esi ' pʉ , ɨri pe enapai pʉra tesi kon pɨ ' Esuwerʉ amʉ ' ewomʉ ' pʉ pen mɨrɨ ya ' , enta ' napai tesi kon pɨ ' Itepoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ a ' taino pɨ ' .

text: Pilate then went out unto them , and said , What accusation bring ye against this man ?
text2: Paire ' epa ' ka ' pʉ to ' piya ' , “ Ɨ ' rɨ waraino ke eseru ' tɨ auya ' nokon ? ” tase ' na .

text: They answered and said unto him , If he were not a malefactor , we would not have delivered him up unto thee .
text2: To ' uya imaimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨri ku ' sa ' iya pʉra iyesi yau , ina nʉnepʉi ' no pen ɨyena ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Then said Pilate unto them , Take ye him , and judge him according to your law . The Jews therefore said unto him , It is not lawful for us to put any man to death :
text2: Paire ' uya ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Atɨ ' si iteseru aimenka kon pa main , Mosi ' winon awɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epuru ton uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Main , Mosi ' winon pe pʉra rɨ iyesi ɨnʉ ' rɨ tʉto ' pe ina uya iyeri ' to ' ya ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: That the saying of Jesus might be fulfilled , which he spake , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Serɨ e ' kupʉ ' pʉ Sises uya ta ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ uta ' ku ' tɨto ' pe mɨrɨ kasa eri ' to ' oton ta ' pʉ iya rʉ ' pʉ .

text: Then Pilate entered into the judgment hall again , and called Jesus , and said unto him , Art thou the King of the Jews ?
text2: Paire ' kanan ewonkaa ' pʉ tiwʉ ' ta ' , mɨrɨpan uya Sises kɨ ' ma ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' kin pe ' ɨmɨrɨ ? ” tukai ' .

text: Jesus answered him , Sayest thou this thing of thyself , or did others tell it thee of me ?
text2: Sises uya imaimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ɨmɨrɨ pe rɨ pe ' serɨ mʉkayan , tʉron kon uya rɨ katɨ ayauro ' kasa ' upɨ ' ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Pilate answered , Am I a Jew ? Thine own nation and the chief priests have delivered thee unto me : what hast thou done ?
text2: Paire ' uya imaimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Esuwerʉ pe ' urɨ ? Ɨtonpa ton , use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru uya ɨtʉsa ' uyena ' . Ɨ ' rɨ kupʉ ' pʉ auya ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus answered , My kingdom is not of this world : if my kingdom were of this world , then would my servants fight , that I should not be delivered to the Jews : but now is my kingdom not from hence .
text2: Sises uya imaimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Serɨ non po itesa ' pe e ' to ' esi pen . Serɨ non po itesa ' pe e ' to ' esi yau , upoitorʉ ton nepanta ' mai ' no Esuwerʉ amʉ ' uya uya ' si namai ' , e ' tane serɨ po itesa ' pe e ' to ' esi pen tʉron nɨ yau rɨ iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Pilate therefore said unto him , Art thou a king then ? Jesus answered , Thou sayest that I am a king . To this end was I born , and for this cause came I into the world , that I should bear witness unto the truth . Every one that is of the truth heareth my voice .
text2: Paire ' uya ta ' pʉ , “ Kin pe ka ' si ɨwesi wa ! ” ta ' pʉ iya . Sises uya imaimu eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Ipoken nɨ ɨwesi , kin pe esi mʉkayai ' ne ' . I ' nai rɨ , entu ' pʉ serɨ wenai , serɨ pɨ ' uyee ' pʉ serɨ non pona , i ' napairon ekamai ' . Tanporon kon i ' napairon winɨ na ' ne ' uya umaimu eta , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Pilate saith unto him , What is truth ? And when he had said this , he went out again unto the Jews , and saith unto them , I find in him no fault at all .
text2: Paire ' uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Ɨ ' rɨ mɨrɨ i ' napairon ? ” Serɨ ta pe , itɨ ' pʉ kanan Esuwerʉ amʉ ' piya ' . Ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' , “ Ɨ ' rɨ imakooi eposa ' uya pʉra man .

text: But ye have a custom , that I should release unto you one at the passover : will ye therefore that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: E ' tane ɨyeseru kon esi tikin nɨ a ' sisa ' nonkato ' pe Itepoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ a ' tai . Mɨrɨ wenai Esuwerʉ amʉ ' kin ken pe ' nonka uya ɨyena ' nokon ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then cried they all again , saying , Not this man , but Barabbas . Now Barabbas was a robber .
text2: Tʉukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉmʉ kon yau , “ Kane , kʉrɨ rɨ pen . Parapas kuru ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . Parapas esi ' pʉ Roman kopʉnaai ewa ' noma yau iye ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ .

text: Then Pilate therefore took Jesus , and scourged him .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Paire ' uya Sises anʉmʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan ari ' po ' pɨ ' to ' pe ikupʉ ' pʉ iya .

text: And the soldiers platted a crown of thorns , and put it on his head , and they put on him a purple robe ,
text2: Soisa amʉ ' uya tikʉkena ' e ' mepɨtʉ ' pʉ aro ' , kʉron pe , mɨrɨpan tʉrʉ ' pʉ to ' uya i ' pai pona . To ' uya ipontɨ ' pʉ tʉtariren ya ' ,

text: And said , Hail , King of the Jews ! and they smote him with their hands .
text2: mɨrɨpan ekare pɨ ' to ' utɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ , “ Miyarɨ , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' kin ! ” tapɨtʉi ' ma . To ' uya temiyatʉ kon ke iwɨnɨ ' pʉ itemʉ ' pɨ ' .

text: Pilate therefore went forth again , and saith unto them , Behold , I bring him forth to you , that ye may know that I find no fault in him .
text2: Paire ' epa ' kakaa ' pʉ kanan Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pɨ ' tase ' na , “ Apʉne entɨ ' , enpa ' ka uya serɨ ɨyena ' nokon i ' tu kon pa ɨri pe iyesi tato ' uya ipɨkɨrɨ pʉra rɨ iyesi , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then came Jesus forth , wearing the crown of thorns , and the purple robe . And Pilate saith unto them , Behold the man !
text2: Sises epa ' kasa ' a ' tai , ɨmɨ ' nɨ si e ' mepɨ ' sa ' iyarʉkooi pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉtariren pe si ipon , Paire ' uya si ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Pʉse rɨ si ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: When the chief priests therefore and officers saw him , they cried out , saying , Crucify him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Take ye him , and crucify him : for I find no fault in him .
text2: Ensa ' tʉuya ' nokon a ' tai , use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' poitorʉ ton ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉ ' pʉ , “ Kurusu ' pona ipokapɨ ' tɨ ' ! Kurusu ' pona ipokapɨ ' tɨ ' ! ” tukai ' . E ' tane Paire ' uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Anʉntɨ ' , kurusu ' pona ipokapɨtʉ kon pa . Urɨ nin , ɨri pe iyesi tato ' uya ipɨkɨrɨ pʉra nin man , ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: The Jews answered him , We have a law , and by our law he ought to die , because he made himself the Son of God .
text2: Esuwerʉ amʉ ' uya ta ' pʉ , “ Main esanon ina , mɨrɨ awɨrɨ ima ' tato ' pe rɨ iyesi , apʉne pʉra Papa Mumu pe iye ' kupʉ pɨ ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he was the more afraid ;
text2: Paire ' uya mɨrɨ etasa ' a ' tai , mɨrɨ uya rɨ miyarɨ rɨ enari ' pa ' pʉ ,

text: And went again into the judgment hall , and saith unto Jesus , Whence art thou ? But Jesus gave him no answer .
text2: mɨrɨpan enna ' po ' pʉ tiwʉ ' ta ' , mɨrɨpan uya Sises ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Nai winɨpai ɨuye ' sa ' ? ” tukai ' , e ' tane Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ pen .

text: Then saith Pilate unto him , Speakest thou not unto me ? knowest thou not that I have power to crucify thee , and have power to release thee ?
text2: “ Uyauro ' kapai pʉra si ɨwesi ? ” ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' . “ I ' tu auya pʉra pe ' iyesi tʉmeruntɨrʉ ke esi ɨmo ' kato ' ike mɨrɨ pe pʉra kurusu ' pona ɨpokapɨ ' to ' ike ? ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus answered , Thou couldest have no power at all against me , except it were given thee from above : therefore he that delivered me unto thee hath the greater sin .
text2: Sises uya eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Uyentai ɨmeruntɨrʉ pʉra iyesi ka ' tapai ɨrepa ' pʉ ike . Mɨrɨ pɨ ' kʉrɨ ɨyena ' utʉnin nʉ ' pʉ umakoitasa ' mɨrɨ eke pe kuru , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And from thenceforth Pilate sought to release him : but the Jews cried out , saying , If thou let this man go , thou art not Caesar ' s friend : whosoever maketh himself a king speaketh against Caesar .
text2: Mɨrɨ si ' kɨrɨ , Paire ' esi ' pʉ Sises ɨnmo ' kapai to ' uya iwɨnɨ namai ' , e ' tane Esuwerʉ amʉ ' ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉ ' pʉ , “ Pʉse rɨ utɨto ' pe iku ' sa ' auya yau , Sisa tonpa pe pʉra rɨ ɨwesi mɨrɨ . Ɨnʉ ' rɨ kin pe ne ' ku ' ai ' ne ' esi mɨrɨ Sisa ewa ' nomanin pe , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he brought Jesus forth , and sat down in the judgment seat in a place that is called the Pavement , but in the Hebrew , Gabbatha .
text2: Serɨ etasa ' tʉuya a ' tai , Paire ' uya Sises enpa ' ka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan ereuta ' pʉ eseru aimenkato ' apon po , pata , Tɨ ' Konekasa ' tato ' yau , ( Arami ' pe Kapa ' ta tato ' ipɨ ' ) .

text: And it was the preparation of the passover , and about the sixth hour : and he saith unto the Jews , Behold your King !
text2: Itepoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ e ' ma ta ' ekonekan nɨto ' pe iyesi ' pʉ , pʉre ' po ' si e ' to ' a ' tai rɨ , “ Pʉse rɨ si kin , ɨiwano ' kon , ” ta ' pʉ Paire ' uya Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pɨ ' .

text: But they cried out , Away with him , away with him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Shall I crucify your King ? The chief priest answered , We have no king but Caesar .
text2: E ' tane to ' ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨtʉ ' pʉ , “ Atɨ ' ! Atɨ ' ! Kurusu ' pona ipokapɨ ' tɨ ' ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . “ Kin pe ' ɨiwano ' kon pokapɨtʉ uya kurusu ' pona ? ” ta ' pʉ Paire ' uya to ' pɨ ' . “ Ina kin pʉra rɨ man , e ' tane Sisa rɨken ina kin , ” ta ' pʉ use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru uya .

text: Then delivered he him therefore unto them to be crucified . And they took Jesus , and led him away .
text2: Iye ' nonka pe rɨ nin si , Paire ' uya itʉrʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ to ' ena ' kurusu ' pona to ' uya ipokapɨ ' to ' pe . Soisa amʉ ' uya nin si Sises a ' sikaa ' pʉ mɨrɨ .

text: And he bearing his cross went forth into a place called the place of a skull , which is called in the Hebrew Golgotha :
text2: Tiwarɨ rɨ tʉkurusukuui arɨi ' ma itɨ ' pʉ Pu ' pɨ Ɨ ' pʉ Rʉ ' pʉ pata ' se ' ya ' ( Arami ' pe Korʉko ' ta tato ' ya ' ) .

text: Where they crucified him , and two other with him , on either side one , and Jesus in the midst .
text2: Serɨ yau si kurusu ' pona to ' uya ipokapɨtʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ , asa ' ron kon tʉron kon pokon pe , sen winɨ ' ne Sises si to ' aporo ' po .

text: And Pilate wrote a title , and put it on the cross . And the writing was , JESUS OF NAZARETH THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Paire ' uya ento ' ipɨ ' menukasa ' esi ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan tʉsa ' iya esi ' pʉ kurusu ' pɨ ' , sises , nasare ' pon esuwerʉ amʉ ' kin , tawon .

text: This title then read many of the Jews : for the place where Jesus was crucified was nigh to the city : and it was written in Hebrew , and Greek , and Latin .
text2: Tu ' kan kon Esuwerʉ amʉ ' uya serɨ tawon ene ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra a ' ko pe pata piyau Sises pokapɨ ' sa ' to ' uya esi ' pʉ , kurusu ' pona ento ' ipɨ ' e ' menukasa ' esi ' pʉ Arami ' pe , Ra ' ten pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Kiri ' pe .

text: Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate , Write not , The King of the Jews ; but that he said , I am King of the Jews .
text2: Esuwerʉ amʉ ' use ' mato ' , ɨpʉremato ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru ton eke ton kuru uya ta ' pʉ Paire ' pɨ ' , “ ‘ Esuwerʉ Amʉ ' Kin ’ tukai ' kʉ ' menukai , e ' tane pʉse rɨ e ' kupʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' kin pe , tukai ' rɨken imenuka ' , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: Pilate answered , What I have written I have written .
text2: Paire ' uya to ' eikʉ ' pʉ , “ Imenukasa ' uya na ' ne ' esi mɨrɨ , imenukasa ' uya pe rɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Then the soldiers , when they had crucified Jesus , took his garments , and made four parts , to every soldier a part ; and also his coat : now the coat was without seam , woven from the top throughout .
text2: Sises pokapɨ ' sa ' tʉuya ' nokon a ' tai kurusu ' pona , soisa amʉ ' uya ipon anʉmʉ ' pʉ asakɨrɨ ' ne tʉkaisarɨ ' nokon to ' uya ekamʉ ' pʉ , iyo ' non nɨken tʉnonkai ' . Serɨ ipon esi ' pʉ to ' sa rɨ ika ' sa ' tikin nan nɨ inakapu ponsi ' kɨ ipʉrakon pʉ ' kʉ pona .

text: They said therefore among themselves , Let us not rend it , but cast lots for it , whose it shall be : that the scripture might be fulfilled , which saith , They parted my raiment among them , and for my vesture they did cast lots . These things therefore the soldiers did .
text2: “ Ikarapɨ ' pai ' nokon pʉra , apʉne tʉusi ' tui ' te ' wapiya ' kai ' imo ' kapai ' nokon , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . Serɨ e ' kupʉ ' pʉ iye ' menukasa ' itekare uta ' ku ' tɨto ' pe , “ To ' uya tʉkaisarɨ ' nokon upon ekamʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉusi ' tui ' te ' wapiya ' kai ' to ' uya upon anʉmʉ ' pʉ , ” tawon . Mɨrɨ si kupʉ ' pʉ soisa amʉ ' uya mɨrɨ .

text: Now there stood by the cross of Jesus his mother , and his mother ' s sister , Mary the wife of Cleophas , and Mary Magdalene .
text2: Sises kurusukuui piyau isan e ' soto ' kasa ' esi ' pʉ , isan pasi Meri , Kʉro ' pas no ' pʉ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Meri Mataren .

text: When Jesus therefore saw his mother , and the disciple standing by , whom he loved , he saith unto his mother , Woman , behold thy son !
text2: Mɨrɨ yau Sises uya tʉsan ensa ' a ' tai , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉpoitorʉ tʉni ' nʉnkanʉ e ' soto ' kasa ' a ' ko pe , ta ' pʉ iya tʉsan pɨ ' , “ Kʉrɨ rɨ si ɨmʉre , ” ta ' pʉ iya ,

text: Then saith he to the disciple , Behold thy mother ! And from that hour that disciple took her unto his own home .
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉpoitorʉ pɨ ' , “ Kʉrɨ rɨ si asan , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨ a ' tai rɨ , ipoitorʉ uya arɨ ' pʉ tʉpata ' se ' ya ' .

text: After this , Jesus knowing that all things were now accomplished , that the scripture might be fulfilled , saith , I thirst .
text2: Emennʉ ' pʉ , tanporon nɨ enuka ' sa ' i ' tu tʉuya pɨ ' , imenukasa ' si itekare uta ' ku ' tɨto ' pe , ta ' pʉ mɨrɨ , “ Tuna ' kiri ' ke e ' ai ' , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Now there was set a vessel full of vinegar : and they filled a spunge with vinegar , and put it upon hyssop , and put it to his mouth .
text2: Moro iyesi ' pʉ mɨrɨ yau wai yawon waain peneka , mɨrɨpan ka ' su ' pa tʉki ' se , iyʉi i ' so ' pu ye ' pɨ ' to ' uya inta na ' itʉrʉ ' pʉ .

text: When Jesus therefore had received the vinegar , he said , It is finished : and he bowed his head , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Mɨrɨpan ku ' kasa ' tʉuya a ' tai , Sises uya , “ Nu ' ma ' tai si , ” ta ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ pe rɨ nin si , ti ' pai tʉpeimai ' ta ' kwarʉ tʉrʉ ' pʉ iya mɨrɨ .

text: The Jews therefore , because it was the preparation , that the bodies should not remain upon the cross on the sabbath day , ( for that sabbath day was an high day , ) besought Pilate that their legs might be broken , and that they might be taken away .
text2: Mɨrɨ si esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ ekonekan weyu pe , mɨrɨ ema ' sa ' yawon Sapa ' esi pɨ ' eke pe kuru To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ pe . Apʉne pʉra Sapa ' a ' tai eke ' amʉ ' i ' se pʉra tesi kon wenai kurusu ' po ' ne , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' uya Paire ' ekama ' po ' pʉ to ' pisi ton i ' kwɨ ' pɨ ' to ' pe iku ' to ' pe iya , mɨrɨpan kon ekepu nu ' tɨpɨ ' to ' pe kurusu ' poi .

text: Then came the soldiers , and brake the legs of the first , and of the other which was crucified with him .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' si soisa amʉ ' uyee ' pʉ wapiyaro ' pisi ton i ' kwɨ ' pɨ ' se ' na Sises pokon pe kurusu ' pona ipokapɨ ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ si isakon pisi ton .

text: But when they came to Jesus , and saw that he was dead already , they brake not his legs :
text2: E ' tane si Sises piya ' to ' uye ' sa ' a ' tai , iyeri ' ka ' sa ' pe to ' uya ene ' pʉ ; mɨrɨ wenai , to ' uya i ' si ton i ' kwɨ ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ pen .

text: But one of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side , and forthwith came there out blood and water .
text2: E ' tane nin , soisa amʉ ' tonpa uya apuruka ' pʉ iteire ' airɨ suparari ke , mɨrɨpan yai mʉn mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tuna e ' kwamʉ ' pʉ .

text: And he that saw it bare record , and his record is true : and he knoweth that he saith true , that ye might believe .
text2: Ka ' pon ennin nʉ ' pʉ uya ekamasa ' , mɨrɨpan nekama ' pʉ esi i ' napai rɨ . I ' tu iya i ' napai rɨ tʉnekamanʉ esi tukai ' , ɨmɨrɨ rɨ nɨrɨ uya apurɨto ' pe tʉkasimai ' pʉra .

text: For these things were done , that the scripture should be fulfilled , A bone of him shall not be broken .
text2: Serɨ ton e ' kupʉ ' pʉ iye ' menukasa ' itekare uta ' ku ' tɨto ' pe , “ Tikin nɨ rɨ iyɨ ' pʉ e ' kwɨ ' to ' oton pen , ” tawon ,

text: And again another scripture saith , They shall look on him whom they pierced .
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉron nɨ kanan iye ' menukasa ' , “ Tʉnapuruka ' pʉ kon enpɨ ' to ' oton to ' uya , ” tawon .

text: And after this Joseph of Arimathaea , being a disciple of Jesus , but secretly for fear of the Jews , besought Pilate that he might take away the body of Jesus : and Pilate gave him leave . He came therefore , and took the body of Jesus .
text2: Emennʉ ' pʉ iwa rɨ , Isose ' , Arama ' tiya pon uya Sises ekepu ekama ' po ' pʉ Paire ' pɨ ' . Isose ' esi ' pʉ Sises poitorʉ pe , e ' tane ama ' ai , apʉne pʉra Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pɨ ' tenari ' nʉmʉ pɨ ' . Paire ' uya ewai ' tasa ' pɨ ' iyee ' pʉ Sises ekepu kan .

text: And there came also Nicodemus , which at the first came to Jesus by night , and brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes , about an hundred pound weight .
text2: Nekutimas esi ' pʉ isakon pe , pena iwa Sises piya ' ewarupɨ nau itɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ . Nekutimas uya karapa mɨrʉ isumasa ' aro tato ' pokon pe nee ' pʉ , 75 pon e ' to ' airɨ rɨ .

text: Then took they the body of Jesus , and wound it in linen clothes with the spices , as the manner of the Jews is to bury .
text2: Asa ' ipɨ ' si esii ' ma Sises ekepu asa ' tʉuya ' nokon ontɨ ' pʉ to ' uya mɨrɨ a ' po ' nan pokon pe , pon renen tato ' atʉ saai ' pɨ ' sa ' ke . Serɨ esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' uya tekepu kon u ' na ' tɨ eseru yau .

text: Now in the place where he was crucified there was a garden ; and in the garden a new sepulchre , wherein was never man yet laid .
text2: Pata , Sises pokapɨtʉ ' pʉ to ' uya kurusu ' pona na ' ne ' airɨ iyesi ' pʉ umɨ , mɨrɨ umɨ yau emenna ' pe tɨ ' akasa ' uruwai ' pe esi ' pʉ ɨnʉ ' rɨ emaikasa ' rʉ ' pʉ pen nɨ ya ' .

text: There laid they Jesus therefore because of the Jews ' preparation day ; for the sepulchre was nigh at hand .
text2: Apʉne pʉra si Esuwerʉ amʉ ' ekonekato ' weyu pe iyesi pɨ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ a ' ko pe tɨ ' akasa ' uruwai ' pe esi pɨ ' , mɨrɨ ya ' Sises emaika ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: The first day of the week cometh Mary Magdalene early , when it was yet dark , unto the sepulchre , and seeth the stone taken away from the sepulchre .
text2: Awanakʉi ' kuru , suntaaka epiya ' tɨ pe , ewarupɨ pe rɨ marɨ pata e ' tane , Meri Mataren utɨ ' pʉ tɨ ' akasa ' uruwai ' pe pona , mɨrɨpan uya tɨ ' utamasa ' imʉra ' taai apai ene ' pʉ .

text: Then she runneth , and cometh to Simon Peter , and to the other disciple , whom Jesus loved , and saith unto them , They have taken away the Lord out of the sepulchre , and we know not where they have laid him .
text2: Mɨrɨpan eka ' tunsa ' utɨ ' pʉ Saiman Pi ' ta mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉron nɨ ipoitorʉ , kʉrɨ Sises ni ' nʉnkanʉ piya ' , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ , “ To ' uya Itepuru mo ' ka ' pʉ man tɨ ' akasa ' uruwai ' pe apai , mɨrɨpan i ' tu pʉra rɨ iyesi nai ya ' rɨ nawon to ' uya itʉrʉ ' pʉ ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Peter therefore went forth , and that other disciple , and came to the sepulchre .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' si Pi ' ta mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉron nɨ ipoitorʉ ton e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ tɨ ' akasa ' uruwai ' pe pona utɨn pɨ ' .

text: So they ran both together : and the other disciple did outrun Peter , and came first to the sepulchre .
text2: Asa ' rɨ rɨ to ' eka ' tumʉ esi ' pʉ , e ' tane isakon uya Pi ' ta entaka ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya tɨ ' akasa ' uruwai ' pe eporo ' pʉ iwapiya .

text: And he stooping down , and looking in , saw the linen clothes lying ; yet went he not in .
text2: Te ' tɨmuikai ' tenu tʉpɨtʉ ' pʉ iya pon renen atʉ saai ' pɨ ' sa ' kusan pe ene ' pʉ iya mɨrɨ yau , e ' tane iyewomʉ ' pʉ pen .

text: Then cometh Simon Peter following him , and went into the sepulchre , and seeth the linen clothes lie ,
text2: E ' tane nin si Saiman Pi ' ta , ite ' ma ' pʉ pe te ' sen uyee ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan ewomʉ ' pʉ tɨ ' akasa ' uruwai ' pe ya ' . Pon saai ' pɨ ' sa ' kusan pe renen tato ' ene ' pʉ iya mɨrɨ yau ,

text: And the napkin , that was about his head , not lying with the linen clothes , but wrapped together in a place by itself .
text2: eke ' on pe kanan te ' sen Sises i ' pai won nʉ ' pʉ . Tʉpona rɨ e ' mepɨ ' sa ' esi ' pʉ , pon renen atʉ saai ' pɨ ' sa ' kusan pe pokon pe pʉra .

text: Then went in also that other disciple , which came first to the sepulchre , and he saw , and believed .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ nin si tʉron nɨ ipoitorʉ , tɨ ' akasa ' uruwai ' pe eponin nʉ ' pʉ wapiya , rɨ marɨ ewomʉ ' pʉ . Mɨrɨpan uya tʉnene ' pʉ apurɨ ' pʉ .

text: For as yet they knew not the scripture , that he must rise again from the dead .
text2: ( To ' uya ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ pʉra rɨ marɨ iyesi ' pʉ iye ' menukasa ' itekare Sises e ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' oton terikʉ ' pʉ apai , tawon . )

text: Then the disciples went away again unto their own home .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ipoitorʉ ton enna ' po ' pʉ tʉpata kon ya ' ,

text: But Mary stood without at the sepulchre weeping : and as she wept , she stooped down , and looked into the sepulchre ,
text2: e ' tane Meri , e ' soto ' kasa ' esi ' pʉ tɨ ' akasa ' uruwai ' pe piyau ukaran nɨ pɨ ' . Akaramʉi ' ma te ' tɨmuikai ' tenu tʉpɨtʉ ' pʉ iya tɨ ' akasa ' uruwai ' pe ya ' ,

text: And seeth two angels in white sitting , the one at the head , and the other at the feet , where the body of Jesus had lain .
text2: mɨrɨpan uya asa ' ron kon aimu ' nan ipon ton inserʉ amʉ ' ereutapɨ ' sa ' ene ' pʉ , Sises ekepu pata ' pʉ yau , i ' pai pata ' pʉ airɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' ta pata ' pʉ airɨ isakon .

text: And they say unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? She saith unto them , Because they have taken away my Lord , and I know not where they have laid him .
text2: To ' uya ekama ' po ' pʉ , “ Ma ' non , ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' aukaramʉ ? ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . “ To ' uya uyepuru arɨ ' pʉ , nai ya ' rɨ nawon to ' uya itʉrʉ ' pʉ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And when she had thus said , she turned herself back , and saw Jesus standing , and knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Tai ' ma iyera ' tɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan uya Sises ene ' pʉ iye ' soto ' kasa ' mɨrɨ yau , e ' tane Sises tukai ' i ' tu iya pʉra iyesi ' pʉ .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? whom seekest thou ? She , supposing him to be the gardener , saith unto him , Sir , if thou have borne him hence , tell me where thou hast laid him , and I will take him away .
text2: “ Ma ' non , ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' aukaramʉ ? Ɨnʉ ' warinpa auya ? ” ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' . Umɨ tʉrawasomanin pe rɨ nin si tekamai ' , “ Apʉne ken , arɨ ' pʉ auya pe iyesi yau , ekamakɨ nai ya ' itʉrʉ ' pʉ auya , ikan utɨto ' pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya ipɨ ' .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Mary . She turned herself , and saith unto him , Rabboni ; which is to say , Master .
text2: “ Meri , ” ta ' pʉ Sises uya ipɨ ' . Iyera ' tɨ ' pʉ Sises winɨkʉi ' ɨkɨ ' pɨ ' nʉmʉi ' ma Arami ' pe , “ Raponai ! ” ( Ti ' sa ta e ' kwa pe ) .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Touch me not ; for I am not yet ascended to my Father : but go to my brethren , and say unto them , I ascend unto my Father , and your Father ; and to my God , and your God .
text2: Sises uya ta ' pʉ , “ Upɨ ' kata ' sii , apʉne pʉra enna ' posa ' pʉra rɨ marɨ man ikʉipʉnʉ piya ' . E ' tane , enta ru ' ku uyakon non piya ' , to ' pana ' tɨi ' , ‘ Utɨyai ' ukʉipʉnʉ piya ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨkʉipʉnʉ kon piya ' , itese ' pɨ ' e ' to ' piya ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itese ' pɨ ' ɨwe ' to ' kon piya ' , ’ ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Mary Magdalene came and told the disciples that she had seen the Lord , and that he had spoken these things unto her .
text2: Meri Mataren nin si utɨ ' pʉ mɨrɨ itekareei esa ' pe ipoitorʉ ton piya ' , “ Itepuru ene ' pʉ uya , ” ta ' pʉ iya . Tauro ' ka ' pʉ iya ke to ' pana ' tɨ ' pʉ iya .

text: Then the same day at evening , being the first day of the week , when the doors were shut where the disciples were assembled for fear of the Jews , came Jesus and stood in the midst , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Mɨrɨ rɨ suntaaka e ' sara ' tɨ ko ' mamiri pe , a ' samʉtʉ yau ipoitorʉ ton esi a ' tai , mʉra ' ta ta ' kopɨ ' se Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pɨ ' enari ' ke ' pe tesi kon pɨ ' , Sises uyee ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan e ' soto ' ka ' pʉ to ' koro ' tau , mɨrɨpan uya , “ Miyarɨ ' nokon ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' .

text: And when he had so said , he shewed unto them his hands and his side . Then were the disciples glad , when they saw the Lord .
text2: Serɨ ta tʉpo , temiyatʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉteire ' enpoika ' pʉ iya to ' ena ' . Ipan pe rɨ ipoitorʉ ton epori ' ma ' pʉ itepuru ensa ' tʉuya ' nokon a ' tai .

text: Then said Jesus to them again , Peace be unto you : as my Father hath sent me , even so send I you .
text2: Sises uya kanan takaa ' pʉ to ' pɨ ' , “ Miyarɨ ' nokon ! Ikʉipʉnʉ uya uyenno ' sa ' na ' ne ' kasa rɨ , ɨyennoko uya ' nokon serɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: And when he had said this , he breathed on them , and saith unto them , Receive ye the Holy Ghost :
text2: Mɨrɨ tai ' ma to ' pona ise ' netu ' ka ' pʉ , “ Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ anʉntɨ ' , ” tai ' ma .

text: Whose soever sins ye remit , they are remitted unto them ; and whose soever sins ye retain , they are retained .
text2: “ Ɨnʉ ' makoi ton pɨ ' rɨ ɨusentu ' ma yau , ipɨ ' rɨ usentu ' man ; mɨrɨ ton pɨ ' ɨusentu ' ma pʉra iyesi yau , mɨrɨ ton pɨ ' rɨ usentu ' man pʉra iyesi mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But Thomas , one of the twelve , called Didymus , was not with them when Jesus came .
text2: Tamas nin si ( Titimas tato ' ipɨ ' ) , 12 kaisaron kon tonpa pʉra iyesi ' pʉ , tʉtonpa ton koro ' tau Sises uye ' sa ' a ' tai to ' piya ' .

text: The other disciples therefore said unto him , We have seen the Lord . But he said unto them , Except I shall see in his hands the print of the nails , and put my finger into the print of the nails , and thrust my hand into his side , I will not believe .
text2: Tʉron kon nin si ipoitorʉ ton uya , Itepuru ensa ' tʉuya ' nokon nʉ ' pʉ ekama a ' tai , ta ' pʉ iya , “ Tui ' ɨ rʉ ' pʉ itemiyatʉ pokon , mɨrɨpan ya ' uyemiyatʉ tʉsa ' uya a ' tai , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iteire ' ya ' uyemiyatʉ tʉsa ' uya a ' tai kuru nin apurɨ uya mɨrɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And after eight days again his disciples were within , and Thomas with them : then came Jesus , the doors being shut , and stood in the midst , and said , Peace be unto you .
text2: Tikin nɨ suntaaka pata ' pʉ pe , ipoitorʉ ton kanan esi ' pʉ ɨutɨ tau , Tamas nin si esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ to ' piyau . Mʉra ' ta rɨ uta ' kosa ' e ' tane , Sises uyee ' pʉ to ' koro ' ta ' e ' soto ' kai ' , mɨrɨpan uya ta ' pʉ , “ Miyarɨ ' nokon ! ” ta ' pʉ iya to ' pɨ ' .

text: Then saith he to Thomas , reach hither thy finger , and behold my hands ; and reach hither thy hand , and thrust it into my side : and be not faithless , but believing .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ta ' pʉ iya Tamas pɨ ' , “ Ɨyemiyatʉ itʉkɨ se ya ' ; uyemiyatʉ ton enkɨ . Ɨyemiyatʉ tɨnkai ' uteire ' ya ' itʉkɨ . Ikasimato ' auya tʉnonkai ' apurɨkɨ , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And Thomas answered and said unto him , My Lord and my God .
text2: Tamas uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Uyepuru mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa , itese ' pɨ ' e ' to ' ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thomas , because thou hast seen me , thou hast believed : blessed are they that have not seen , and yet have believed .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , Sises uya ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Apʉne pʉra uyensa ' auya pɨ ' , apurɨsa ' auya ; pori ' pe kamo esi mɨrɨ ene tʉpo pʉra rɨ apurɨnin nan , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: And many other signs truly did Jesus in the presence of his disciples , which are not written in this book :
text2: Sises uya tu ' ke rɨ eke Papa tʉrawasooi ti ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ kupʉ ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton uya entane , e ' tane serɨ kareta pɨ ' iye ' menukasa ' pʉra iyesi .

text: But these are written , that ye might believe that Jesus is the Christ , the Son of God ; and that believing ye might have life through his name .
text2: E ' tane serɨ ton e ' menukasa ' apurɨ kon pa , Sises esi Kʉrai , Papa Mu , mɨrɨpan apurɨ auya ' nokon winɨ ɨuko ' manto ' kon eporo kon pa itese ' yau .

text: After these things Jesus shewed himself again to the disciples at the sea of Tiberias ; and on this wise shewed he himself .
text2: Mɨrɨ pata ' pʉ pe , Sises kanan usenpoikakaa ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ ton piya ' , Taipiriyas ku ' pɨri piyau . Se kasa iyesi ' pʉ :

text: There were together Simon Peter , and Thomas called Didymus , and Nathanael of Cana in Galilee , and the sons of Zebedee , and two other of his disciples .
text2: Saiman Pi ' ta , Tamas ( Titimas tato ' ipɨ ' ) , Na ' taniyerʉ , Kena , Kiyarari yawon winon ; Sepiti munkɨ amʉ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ asa ' ron kon tʉron kon ipoitorʉ ton esi ' pʉ a ' samʉtʉ yau .

text: Simon Peter saith unto them , I go a fishing . They say unto him , We also go with thee . They went forth , and entered into a ship immediately ; and that night they caught nothing .
text2: “ E ' saponka serɨ moro ' amʉ ' a ' sii ' , ” ta ' pʉ Saiman Pi ' ta uya to ' pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan pɨ ' , “ Aya ' kɨrɨ ina utɨ serɨ , ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya . Mɨrɨpan kon utɨsa ' ekanwa ' tɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ kanau ya ' , e ' tane mɨrɨ ewarupɨɨi tau , moro ' amʉ ' a ' si ' pʉ to ' uya pen nɨ .

text: But when the morning was now come , Jesus stood on the shore : but the disciples knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Awanakʉi ' kuru , Sises e ' soto ' kasa ' esi ' pʉ tuna e ' pi po , e ' tane ipoitorʉ ton uya ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ pʉra iyesi ' pʉ Sises pe .

text: Then Jesus saith unto them , Children , have ye any meat ? They answered him , No .
text2: To ' kɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpa ' pʉ iya , “ Utonpa ton , moro ' amʉ ' pe ' a ' sisa ' auya ' nokon pʉra nai ? ” ta ' pʉ iya . “ Kane ! ” ta ' pʉ to ' uya .
