text: But now we are delivered from the law , that being dead wherein we were held ; that we should serve in newness of spirit , and not in the oldness of the letter .
text2: E ' tane serɨ pe nin si , uyauron nin nʉ ' pʉ kon ya ' eri ' nɨ winɨ , emo ' kan nɨsa ' main apai emenna ' Iya ' kwarʉ eseru yau iyapiyo ' pe e ' nɨto ' kon pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ penaro ' iye ' menukasa ' main awɨron pen nɨ .

text: What shall we say then ? Is the law sin ? God forbid . Nay , I had not known sin , but by the law : for I had not known lust , except the law had said , Thou shalt not covet .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ ken si ta ' nokon serɨ , mɨrɨ a ' tai ? Makoi pe pe ' main esi ? Ta pen nɨ ! I ' nai rɨ , makoi mɨrɨ tukai ' si ' tui ' no pen nɨ , e ' tane main poro nin i ' tusa ' uya . Apʉne pʉra si ' tui ' no pen nɨ tonpa iwano ' i ' se e ' nɨto ' ipan pe , main uya , “ Ɨtonpa iwano ' i ' se kesii ipan pe , ” tasa ' pʉra iyesi yau .

text: But sin , taking occasion by the commandment , wrought in me all manner of concupiscence . For without the law sin was dead .
text2: E ' tane makoi , iku ' to ' uya iwinɨ ta ' sii ' apiyontɨn nɨto ' winɨ , uya uyau tanporon nɨ i ' se ipan pe esi ku ' sa ' . Apʉne pʉra main pʉra iyesi a ' tai , makoi esi iyeri ' sa ' pe .

text: For I was alive without the law once : but when the commandment came , sin revived , and I died .
text2: Pena nurɨne iye ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ urɨ main pʉra iyesi a ' tai ; e ' tane apiyontɨn nɨto ' uye ' sa ' a ' tai , makoi usenpoika ' pʉ ,

text: And the commandment , which was ordained to life , I found to be unto death .
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ erikʉ ' pʉ si . I ' tu ' pʉ uya mɨrɨ rɨ si mɨrɨ main uko ' man nɨto ' ne ' nin pe iku ' sa ' uya rɨ uma ' tan nɨto ' kuru rɨ nee ' pʉ .

text: For sin , taking occasion by the commandment , deceived me , and by it slew me .
text2: Makoi uya apiyontɨn nɨto ' apurɨsa ' mɨrɨpan uya uyenku ' tɨsa ' uya uwɨsa ' mɨrɨ main poro .

text: Wherefore the law is holy , and the commandment holy , and just , and good .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' , main esi wakʉ pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ apiyontɨn nɨto ' esi wakʉ pe , ipokena ' pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wakʉ pe .

text: Was then that which is good made death unto me ? God forbid . But sin , that it might appear sin , working death in me by that which is good ; that sin by the commandment might become exceeding sinful .
text2: Mɨrɨ ken pe ' si wakʉ pe te ' sen ena ' pʉ mɨrɨ upona uma ' tan nɨto ' pe ? Kane ku ! E ' tane makoi e ' to ' ka ' nʉ ' to ' pe makoi pe , uma ' tan nɨto ' ku ' sa ' iya uyau wakʉ pe te ' sen poro rɨ , main uya apiyontɨn nɨto ' poro makoi enato ' pe ti ' tusen pe ɨri pe kuru rɨ .

text: For we know that the law is spiritual : but I am carnal , sold under sin .
text2: I ' tu ' nokon main esi Papa A ' kwarʉ winon pe ; e ' tane urɨ esi Iya ' kwarʉ pɨkɨron pe pʉra , ikʉrʉpo ' pomasa ' pe makoi poitorʉ pe .

text: For that which I do I allow not : for what I would , that do I not ; but what I hate , that do I .
text2: Unkupʉnʉ i ' tu uya pʉra rɨ iyesi , apʉne pʉra ɨnku ' pai e ' to ' kupʉ uya pʉra iyesi , e ' tane uyewaruma kupʉ uya .

text: If then I do that which I would not , I consent unto the law that it is good .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ , ɨnku ' pai pʉra e ' to ' kupʉ uya yau , wakʉ pe main esi ta uya rɨ .

text: Now then it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: Iyesi na ' ne ' kasa , urɨ pe iyesi pen nʉku ' ai ' ne ' , e ' tane makoi uyau nʉko ' manyai ' ne ' .

text: For I know that in me ( that is , in my flesh , ) dwelleth no good thing : for to will is present with me ; but how to perform that which is good I find not .
text2: I ' tu uya wakʉ uko ' mamʉ pʉra iyesi uyau , mɨrɨ na ' ne ' u ' naino ipan makoi yau . Apʉne pʉra wakʉ pe na ' ne ' ɨnku ' pai esi , e ' tane arɨ uya pʉra iyesi .

text: For the good that I would I do not : but the evil which I would not , that I do .
text2: Apʉne pʉra siku ' ai ' ne ' esi wakʉ ɨnku ' pai e ' to ' pe pʉra ; ɨri , ɨnku ' pai pʉra e ' to ' kupʉ uya — serɨ kupʉ pɨ ' rɨ uko ' mamʉ .

text: Now if I do that I would not , it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: Serɨ si ɨnku ' pai e ' to ' pen kupʉ uya yau , urɨ uya ikupʉ pen , e ' tane makoi uyau nʉko ' manyai ' ne ' uya ikupʉ .

text: I find then a law , that , when I would do good , evil is present with me .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa si , serɨ main e ' tʉrawasoma pe i ' tusa ' uya : Wakʉ ɨnku ' pai esi a ' tai , ɨri esi mɨrɨ moro upiyau .

text: For I delight in the law of God after the inward man :
text2: Uyau Papa iwano ' main pɨ ' tepori ' masen urɨ ;

text: But I see another law in my members , warring against the law of my mind , and bringing me into captivity to the law of sin which is in my members .
text2: e ' tane tʉron nɨ main e ' tʉrawasoma ene uya upun pʉ ' kʉ ton yau , usenuminkato ' iwano ' main pokon pe usewa ' noma kupʉ iya , mɨrɨpan uya ukoneka main iwano ' makoi na ' si ' pʉ pe , te ' tʉrawasomasen upun pʉ ' kʉ ton yau .

text: O wretched man that I am ! who shall deliver me from the body of this death ?
text2: Pokoi rɨ sa ' ne urɨ ! Ɨnʉ ' uya upika ' tɨ serɨ uma ' tan nɨto ' meruntɨrʉ apai uyau e ' tʉrawasoman pɨ ' na ' ne ' ?

text: I thank God through Jesus Christ our Lord . So then with the mind I myself serve the law of God ; but with the flesh the law of sin .
text2: Tenki ta Papa pɨ ' — Sises Kʉrai , uyepuru kon poro ! Mɨrɨ pɨ ' si , urɨ rɨ usenuminkato ' yau esi Papa iwano ' main poitorʉ pe , e ' tane u ' naino makoi yau makoi iwano ' main poitorʉ pe esi .

text: There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , kamoro Kʉrai Sises yau na ' ne ' nan eno ' mato ' pʉra iyesi serɨ pe ,

text: For the law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus hath made me free from the law of sin and death .
text2: apʉne pʉra Kʉrai Sises poro uko ' man nɨto ' A ' kwarʉ iwano ' main uya umo ' kasa ' makoi mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uma ' tan nɨto ' iwano ' main apai .

text: For what the law could not do , in that it was weak through the flesh , God sending his own Son in the likeness of sinful flesh , and for sin , condemned sin in the flesh :
text2: Apʉne pʉra main , Mosi ' winon esi ' pʉ na ' ne ' ɨ ' sɨ ' mʉra ikupʉ iya pʉra , i ' naino makoi uya a ' tu ' mʉnka ' nʉ ' sa ' ke , Papa uya ikuu ' pʉ tiwano ' tʉmu tenno ' se tʉmakooikenan ka ' pon kasa makoi mo ' kanin pe tʉtʉsen pe . Mɨrɨpan uya makoi eno ' ma ' pʉ tʉmakooikenan ka ' pon yau ,

text: That the righteousness of the law might be fulfilled in us , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: ipokena ' pe e ' nɨ i ' se main e ' to ' e ' seposa ' e ' to ' pe eke pe uyau ' nokon , u ' naino kon umakooi kon pɨkɨrɨ tʉuko ' mansan pe pen e ' tane urɨ ' nokon Iya ' kwarʉ pɨkɨrɨ tʉuko ' mansan .

text: For they that are after the flesh do mind the things of the flesh ; but they that are after the Spirit the things of the Spirit .
text2: Kamoro tʉuko ' mansan ti ' naino kon tʉmakooi kon awɨrɨ uya tʉusenuminkato ' kon tʉsa ' mɨrɨ ti ' naino kon e ' to ' i ' se pona ; e ' tane kamoro tʉuko ' mansan Iya ' kwarʉ awɨrɨ uya tʉusenuminkato ' kon tʉsa ' mɨrɨ Iya ' kwarʉ e ' to ' i ' se pona .

text: For to be carnally minded is death ; but to be spiritually minded is life and peace .
text2: Tʉmakooikenan ka ' pon usenuminkato ' esi uma ' tan nɨto ' , e ' tane Iya ' kwarʉ e ' to ' itesa ' pe te ' sen usenuminkato ' esi uko ' man nɨto ' pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ usewankaman nɨto ' pen ;

text: Because the carnal mind is enmity against God : for it is not subject to the law of God , neither indeed can be .
text2: apʉne pʉra tʉmakooikenan usenuminkan nɨto ' esi ɨsɨ pe Papa pɨ ' . Papa iwano ' main ya ' iye ' tʉrʉ pʉra iyesi , mɨrɨ kupʉ iya poken pʉra rɨ nɨrɨ iyesi .

text: So then they that are in the flesh cannot please God .
text2: Kamoro to ' i ' naino makoi e ' to ' itesanon pe uya Papa pori ' ma poken pʉra rɨ iyesi .

text: But ye are not in the flesh , but in the Spirit , if so be that the Spirit of God dwell in you . Now if any man have not the Spirit of Christ , he is none of his .
text2: E ' tane rɨ , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon a ' naino kon amakooi kon esi pen ɨyesa ' kon pe , e ' tane Iya ' kwarʉ , Papa A ' kwarʉ uko ' mamʉ yau ayau ' nokon . Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨnʉ ' rɨ esi yau Kʉrai A ' kwarʉ esa ' pe pʉra , Kʉrai iwano ' pe pʉra rɨ iyesi .

text: And if Christ be in you , the body is dead because of sin ; but the Spirit is life because of righteousness .
text2: E ' tane ayau ' nokon Kʉrai esi yau , ɨpun kon esi iyeri ' sa ' pe apʉne pʉra makoi esi pɨ ' , e ' tane aya ' kwarʉ kon esi nurɨne apʉne pʉra Papa uya ayanʉmʉ kon pɨ ' ipokena ' ton pe .

text: But if the Spirit of him that raised up Jesus from the dead dwell in you , he that raised up Christ from the dead shall also quicken your mortal bodies by his Spirit that dwelleth in you .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Sises i ' mʉ ' sa ' kanin nʉ ' pʉ iyerikʉ ' pʉ apai A ' kwarʉ uko ' mamʉ yau ayau ' nokon , kʉrɨ rɨ Kʉrai i ' mʉ ' sa ' kanin nʉ ' pʉ iyerikʉ ' pʉ apai uya rɨ marɨ tʉuma ' tasen ɨpun kon repa mɨrɨ iko ' manto ' ke Ta ' kwarʉ poro , ayau ' nokon nʉko ' manyai ' ne ' .

text: Therefore , brethren , we are debtors , not to the flesh , to live after the flesh .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , utonpa ton , unkupʉnʉ kon kuru esi — e ' tane u ' naino kon umakooi kon pɨ ' pen , tʉuko ' mansan pe iteseru awɨrɨ pen .

text: For if ye live after the flesh , ye shall die : but if ye through the Spirit do mortify the deeds of the body , ye shall live .
text2: Apʉne pʉra ɨuko ' mamʉ kon pe iyesi yau a ' naino kon amakooi kon awɨrɨ , ɨyerikʉ kon ; e ' tane Iya ' kwarʉ winɨ ipun nʉkupʉ ' pʉ ipoken pʉra tʉsa ' auya a ' tai ima ' tato ' ya ' , ɨuko ' mamʉ kon nɨ ,

text: For as many as are led by the Spirit of God , they are the sons of God .
text2: apʉne pʉra kamoro , Papa A ' kwarʉ narɨnʉ ton esi Papa munkɨ pe pɨ ' .

text: For ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear ; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption , whereby we cry , Abba , Father .
text2: Apʉne pʉra iya ' kwarʉ eposa ' auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi enari ' ke ' pe e ' nɨ poitorʉ pe kanan ɨwesi kon pa pen , e ' tane Iya ' kwarʉ eposa ' auya ' nokon imunkɨ pe ɨkonekanin kon , mɨrɨpan winɨ , “ Apa , Papai , ” ta ' nokon .

text: The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit , that we are the children of God :
text2: Iya ' kwarʉ uya ekama tiwano ' pe uya ' kwarʉ kon pokon pe , urɨ ' nokon esi Papa munkɨ pe tukai ' .

text: And if children , then heirs ; heirs of God , and joint - heirs with Christ ; if so be that we suffer with him , that we may be also glorified together .
text2: Serɨ si munkɨ pe e ' nɨ ' nokon yau , intʉrʉnʉ anʉnnin pe e ' nɨ — Papa nʉtʉrʉnʉ anʉnnin pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Kʉrai nanʉmʉnʉ intʉrʉnʉ anʉnnin pe iya ' kɨrɨ , i ' nai rɨ iyekota ' mato ' yau e ' nɨsa ' yau , eke pe iku ' to ' yau rɨ marɨ e ' nɨto ' pe .

text: For I reckon that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us .
text2: Usenuminka serɨ pe ekota ' man na ' ne ' esi urɨ ' nokon yau tʉusenpoika ton Papa uya ikupʉ winɨ eke pe iku ' to ' kaisa rɨ i ' nʉnke ' pe iyesi pen nɨ .

text: For the earnest expectation of the creature waiteth for the manifestation of the sons of God .
text2: Ika ' sa ' kon enurikʉ tenu ke esii ' ma Papa munkɨ amʉ ' usenpoika enupɨkɨrɨ .

text: For the creature was made subject to vanity , not willingly , but by reason of him who hath subjected the same in hope ,
text2: Tanporo ika ' sa ' ton ko ' manʉkʉ ' pʉ itiwano ' pe ika ' sa ' epoto ' iya piyapai , ɨko ' manpai iyesi pɨ ' pen . Serɨ e ' kuu ' pʉ iye ' moronkato ' pe ku ' nin nʉ ' pʉ poro , te ' ku ' se

text: Because the creature itself also shall be delivered from the bondage of corruption into the glorious liberty of the children of God .
text2: ika ' sa ' kon nɨ emo ' kato ' pe ma ' tanʉ ' nin meruntɨrʉ apai , iyemo ' kasa ' kon Papa munkɨ pe eke pe te ' ton kon pe .

text: For we know that the whole creation groaneth and travaileth in pain together until now .
text2: I ' tu ' nokon tanporo ika ' sa ' kon a ' nʉmʉ mʉre entunʉkʉ pɨ ' e ' nɨ kasa serɨ pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ .

text: And not only they , but ourselves also , which have the firstfruits of the Spirit , even we ourselves groan within ourselves , waiting for the adoption , to wit , the redemption of our body .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨken pen , e ' tane urɨ ' nokon nɨ nɨrɨ , iyepiya ' tɨ pe te ' sen Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ eponin nʉ ' san nɨ a ' nʉmʉ u ' nau ' nokon enurikʉ tenu ke esii ' ma uyanʉnto ' kon pɨ ' imunkɨ pe , upun kon e ' mato ' .

text: For we are saved by hope : but hope that is seen is not hope : for what a man seeth , why doth he yet hope for ?
text2: Apʉne pʉra serɨ e ' ku ' nɨto ' yau epika ' tɨn nɨsa ' . E ' tane e ' ku ' nɨto ' tensen pe na ' ne ' esi e ' ku ' nɨto ' pe pʉra kuru rɨ . Ɨnʉ ' ken te ' ku ' sen tenawon pɨ ' rɨ ?

text: But if we hope for that we see not , then do we with patience wait for it .
text2: E ' tane e ' ku ' nɨ pe iyesi yau uyenau ' nokon pʉra na ' ne ' pɨ ' , itenupɨkɨrɨ e ' nɨ mɨrɨ tʉuseta ' kai ' pʉra .

text: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities : for we know not what we should pray for as we ought : but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ , Iya ' kwarʉ uya upika ' tɨ kon ɨ ' sɨ ' mʉra e ' nɨto ' yau . Ɨpʉreman nɨto ' i ' tu ' nokon pʉra iyesi , e ' tane Iya ' kwarʉ rɨ ɨpʉrema upona ' nokon ta ' nʉnse main uya ekama poken pʉra rɨ .

text: And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit , because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kʉrɨ uyewan kon warinpanin uya Iya ' kwarʉ usenuminkato ' i ' tu , apʉne pʉra Iya ' kwarʉ ɨpʉrema wakʉ ton Papa nʉkupʉ ' san pona Papa e ' to ' i ' se awɨrɨ .

text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God , to them who are the called according to his purpose .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' tu ' nokon tanporon yau rɨ Papa e ' tʉrawasoma wakʉ pe ti ' nʉnkanin ku ' nin pe , ikɨ ' masa ' kon mɨrɨto ' pe ta ' pʉ tʉuya awɨrɨ .

text: For whom he did foreknow , he also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his Son , that he might be the firstborn among many brethren .
text2: Kamoro iwano ' pe Papa uya wapiya i ' tu ' pʉ pena kanan to ' koneka ' pʉ iya Tʉmu kasa to ' e ' to ' pe iwaraino kon pe , eke kuru iye ' ka ' sa ' kon entaino pe wapiyaro ' tʉmu pe tu ' kan kon tonpa ton koro ' tau .

text: Moreover whom he did predestinate , them he also called : and whom he called , them he also justified : and whom he justified , them he also glorified .
text2: Kamoro si pena tʉnkoneka ' san , to ' kɨ ' masa ' iya rɨ marɨ ; kamoro tʉnkɨ ' ma ' san , anʉmʉ iya ipokena ' pe ; kamoro tʉnanʉmʉ ' san ipokena ' pe , kupʉ iya eke pe rɨ marɨ .

text: What shall we then say to these things ? If God be for us , who can be against us ?
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ ken si ta serɨ ei ' nin pe ? Papa esi pe iyesi yau uwenai ' nokon pe , ɨnʉ ' ken si esi uyewa ' nomanin kon pe ?

text: He that spared not his own Son , but delivered him up for us all , how shall he not with him also freely give us all things ?
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ Tʉmu teme ' nin nʉ ' pʉ pen , e ' tane inonkanin nʉ ' pʉ tanporon kon urɨ ' nokon iwano ' pe — nai kasa ken urɨ ' nokon repa iya pʉra nesii ' no ipokon pe wakʉ pe rɨ tanporon ke rɨ ?

text: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God ' s elect ? It is God that justifieth .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' uya nɨrɨ ken Papa nanʉmʉ ' san pɨ ' ɨri ton ta ? Papa kʉrɨ rɨ anʉnnin ipokena ' pe .

text: Who is he that condemneth ? It is Christ that died , yea rather , that is risen again , who is even at the right hand of God , who also maketh intercession for us .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' kʉrɨ eno ' manin ? Kʉrai Sises , iyeri ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ — mɨrɨ entai , iye ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' rʉ ' pʉ uko ' man nɨto ' ya ' — esi na ' ne ' Papa emiyatʉ enwo ' netʉ winɨ , urɨ ' nokon pona rɨ nɨrɨ ɨpʉreman pɨ ' te ' sen .

text: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ ? shall tribulation , or distress , or persecution , or famine , or nakedness , or peril , or sword ?
text2: Ɨnʉ ' uya pantakan Kʉrai uya ui ' nʉnkato ' kon apai ? Ɨ ' rɨ uya katɨ , usewankaman nɨto ' uya , sa ' man yau e ' nɨto ' uya , mɨrɨ pe pʉra iwenai pʉra kota ' man nɨto ' uya mɨrɨ pe pʉra iwankan uya , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ipon pʉra e ' nɨto ' uya , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨsɨ yau e ' nɨto ' uya , mɨrɨ pe pʉra supara uya katɨ ?

text: As it is written , For thy sake we are killed all the day long ; we are accounted as sheep for the slaughter .
text2: Iye ' menukasa ' na ' ne ' kasa : “ Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon epika ' tɨto ' pe uma ' tan nɨto ' yau ina esi pata tʉko ' manʉ ' se ; karimeru amʉ ' iwɨto ' kon pe iku ' sa ' kon kasa rɨ ina esi , ” tawon .

text: Nay , in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us .
text2: Kane , tanporo serɨ ton yau ' ne e ' nɨ ' nokon entakanin nan entai kuru rɨ , kʉrɨ ui ' nʉnkanin kon poro .

text: For I am persuaded , that neither death , nor life , nor angels , nor principalities , nor powers , nor things present , nor things to come ,
text2: Apʉne pʉra apurɨsa ' uya uma ' tan nɨto ' mɨrɨ pe pʉra uko ' man nɨto ' , inserʉ amʉ ' rɨ mɨrɨ pe pʉra makoi amʉ ' rɨ , serɨ pe na ' ne ' mɨrɨ pe pʉra serɨ enta ' na ' ne ' , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨ ' rɨ rɨ meruntɨ rɨ ,

text: Nor height , nor depth , nor any other creature , shall be able to separate us from the love of God , which is in Christ Jesus our Lord .
text2: ka ' tawon nɨ mɨrɨ pe pʉra i ' nawon nɨ , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨ ' rɨ rɨ tanporo ika ' sa ' yawon , uya pantakan pʉra rɨ iyesi Papa uya i ' nʉnkan nɨto ' apai Kʉrai Sises , uyepuru kon yau na ' ne ' .

text: I say the truth in Christ , I lie not , my conscience also bearing me witness in the Holy Ghost ,
text2: I ' nairon pe usaurokʉ Kʉrai yau — kasi pe esi pen , uya ' kwarʉ uya apɨtanʉkʉ Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ yau —

text: That I have great heaviness and continual sorrow in my heart .
text2: eke pe kuru ipan pe upokoitato ' man mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyereuta pʉra uyewan yau upokoitato ' esi .

text: For I could wish that myself were accursed from Christ for my brethren , my kinsmen according to the flesh :
text2: Ipa ' nʉ ' sa ' pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ imo ' kasa ' pe Kʉrai piyapai esi i ' se e ' ai ' , utonpa ton pika ' tɨnin pe , kamoro kuru tʉponaron kon upokon pe ,

text: Who are Israelites ; to whom pertaineth the adoption , and the glory , and the covenants , and the giving of the law , and the service of God , and the promises ;
text2: ka ' pon amʉ ' Esuwerʉ pon kon . To ' iwano ' pe munkɨ wannɨ pe to ' anʉnsa ' esi ; to ' iwano ' pe rɨ Papa a ' kwarii esi , to ' iwano ' pe rɨ ekonekan nɨto ' esi , to ' iwano ' pe rɨ main eporo esi , to ' iwano ' pe ɨpʉreman nɨto ' , use ' man nɨto ' iwʉ ' tau Papa apurɨpɨ ' to ' esi mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ikupʉ uya tasa ' rʉ ' san esi , to ' iwano ' pe .

text: Whose are the fathers , and of whom as concerning the flesh Christ came , who is over all , God blessed for ever . Amen .
text2: To ' iwano ' pe rʉko ' amʉ ' tɨpiya ton esi , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Kʉrai ka ' pon pe te ' to ' winɨ u ' tɨsa ' to ' apai , Papa , tanporon nɨ epoino , tɨwɨrɨ rɨ apurɨpɨtʉ nesii ! Amen .

text: Not as though the word of God hath taken none effect . For they are not all Israel , which are of Israel :
text2: Papa Maimu ɨpʉreme ' sa ' kasa iyesi pen . Apʉne pʉra tanporon kon Esuwerʉ apai iu ' tɨsa ' kon esi pen Esuwerʉ pe .

text: Neither , because they are the seed of Abraham , are they all children : but , In Isaac shall thy seed be called .
text2: Ipayan nʉ ' san pe rɨ to ' esi pɨ ' tanporo Epʉra ' an munkɨ pe to ' esi pen . E ' tane mɨrɨ kasa pʉra kuru rɨ ; “ Aisi ' poro ɨmunkɨ amʉ ' e ' seporo mɨrɨ , ” tasa ' .

text: That is , They which are the children of the flesh , these are not the children of God : but the children of the promise are counted for the seed .
text2: Tʉron nɨ pe tato ' yau , ka ' pon i ' naino kon esi pen Papa munkɨ pe , e ' tane ikupʉ uya tukai ' usauro ' nɨsa ' munkɨ ton esi Epʉra ' an munkɨ pe .

text: For this is the word of promise , At this time will I come , and Sara shall have a son .
text2: Apʉne pʉra se kasa ikupʉ uya tawon usekama ' pʉ : “ Iweyu pe iku ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ a ' tai enna ' po , mɨrɨ a ' tai Sera e ' to ' oton tʉmʉre ke , ” tukai ' .

text: And not only this ; but when Rebecca also had conceived by one , even by our father Isaac ;
text2: Mɨrɨ rɨken pe pʉra , e ' tane Rupe ' ka munkɨ amʉ ' esi ' pʉ tikin nɨ ikʉipʉnʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kʉrɨ rɨ rɨ to ' kʉipʉnʉ pe urɨ ' nokon tamokorii , Aisi ' .

text: ( For the children being not yet born , neither having done any good or evil , that the purpose of God according to election might stand , not of works , but of him that calleth ; )
text2: Mɨrɨ rɨ e ' tane , munui ' amʉ ' entu rawɨrɨ mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨ ' rɨ rɨ wakʉ mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨri kupʉ to ' uya rawɨrɨ — moro Papa uya anʉnto ' mɨrɨto ' pe tukai ' e ' to ' esi ' pʉ :

text: It was said unto her , The elder shall serve the younger .
text2: tʉrawaso winɨ pen e ' tane kʉrɨ ikɨ ' manin winɨ — ta ' pʉ ipɨ ' , “ Irui e ' to ' oton takon apiyo ' pe , ” ta ' pʉ .

text: As it is written , Jacob have I loved , but Esau have I hated .
text2: Iye ' menukasa ' na ' ne ' kasa : “ Seko ' i ' nʉnkasa ' uya , e ' tane I ' sa ewaruma ' tɨsa ' uya , ” tukai ' .

text: What shall we say then ? Is there unrighteousness with God ? God forbid .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ ken si ta mɨrɨ a ' tai ? Ɨri pe pe ' Papa esi ta ? Pen kuru rɨ !

text: For he saith to Moses , I will have mercy on whom I will have mercy , and I will have compassion on whom I will have compassion .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Mosi ' pɨ ' ta iya , “ Ɨsentu ' mapai rɨ e ' to ' ipɨ ' pɨ ' usentu ' ma , aiko kapai rɨ e ' to ' ipɨ ' pɨ ' aiko ta uya , ” tasa ' iya .

text: So then it is not of him that willeth , nor of him that runneth , but of God that sheweth mercy .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' si ka ' pon e ' to ' i ' se pɨ ' mɨrɨ pe pʉra inkuu ' pʉ pɨ ' iyesi pen , e ' tane Papa usentu ' mato ' pɨ ' iyesi .

text: For the scripture saith unto Pharaoh , Even for this same purpose have I raised thee up , that I might shew my power in thee , and that my name might be declared throughout all the earth .
text2: Apʉne pʉra iye ' menukasa ' itekare uya ta , Peero pɨ ' : “ Ɨi ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' uya serɨto ' pe , umeruntɨrʉ enpoikato ' pe uya ayau mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uyese ' usekamato ' pe tanporo non yau , ” ta iya .

text: Therefore hath he mercy on whom he will have mercy , and whom he will he hardeneth .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , Papa esi tʉusentu ' masen ɨsentu ' mapai te ' to ' ipɨ ' pɨ ' rɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ansa ' mantanʉ ' pai te ' to ' rɨ sa ' mantanʉkʉ iya .

text: Thou wilt say then unto me , Why doth he yet find fault ? For who hath resisted his will ?
text2: Ɨtonpa kon uya ta upɨ ' : “ Ɨ ' rɨ pe ken si iyesi pɨ ' Papa uya upona ' nokon eno ' ma ? Ɨnʉ ' uya iteseru wa ' kʉtʉ ? ” ta .

text: Nay but , O man , who art thou that repliest against God ? Shall the thing formed say to him that formed it , Why hast thou made me thus ?
text2: Aiko sɨ , ka ' pon . Ɨnʉ ' ɨmɨrɨ Papa Maimu ei ' pɨtʉ pa ? “ Inkaa ' pʉ uya pe ' ta mɨrɨ tʉka ' nin nʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' , ‘ Ɨ ' rɨto ' pe uka ' sa ' auya se kasa ? ’ ” ta ?

text: Hath not the potter power over the clay , of the same lump to make one vessel unto honour , and another unto dishonour ?
text2: Ɨinɨ ka ' nin pe ' e ' to ' pe pʉra tʉmeruntɨrʉ yau iyesi mɨrɨ rɨ ɨinɨ pun ke eke pata weyu a ' tai tapurɨsen mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉweyu ke pʉra rɨ tapurɨsen ka ' nin pe ?

text: What if God , willing to shew his wrath , and to make his power known , endured with much longsuffering the vessels of wrath fitted to destruction :
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi Papa uya anʉnsa ' pe iyesi yau kota ' man nɨto ' enpoikato ' pe tʉuya mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉmeruntɨrʉ usi ' tuto ' pe , uya imoronka tʉuseta ' kai ' pʉra kota ' man nɨto ' ton ipɨ ' — iyekonekasa ' kon tʉuma ' tato ' kon pe ?

text: And that he might make known the riches of his glory on the vessels of mercy , which he had afore prepared unto glory ,
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi serɨ ku ' sa ' iya yau eke pe tʉku ' to ' ipɨ ' usi ' tuto ' pe tʉusentu ' mato ' ton ipɨ ' , inkoneka ' san pena eke pe to ' e ' to ' pe —

text: Even us , whom he hath called , not of the Jews only , but also of the Gentiles ?
text2: urɨ ' nokon nɨ , inkɨ ' ma ' san nɨ marɨ , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' apai rɨken pen , e ' tane Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen piyapai rɨ marɨ ?

text: As he saith also in Osee , I will call them my people , which were not my people ; and her beloved , which was not beloved .
text2: Oseya yau ta pɨ ' na ' ne ' kasa : “ ‘ Umunkɨ , ’ ta uya to ' pɨ ' umunkɨ amʉ ' pen nɨ pɨ ' ; mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ‘ Ui ' nʉn , ’ ta uya ipɨ ' ui ' nʉn pen nɨ pɨ ' , ” ta ,

text: And it shall come to pass , that in the place where it was said unto them , Ye are not my people ; there shall they be called the children of the living God .
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ , “ Iye ' ku ' to ' oton to ' pɨ ' , ‘ Umunkɨ amʉ ' pen nɨ ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon , ’ ta ' pʉ yau kuru rɨ , ‘ Papa , tʉuko ' mansen munkɨ amʉ ' , ’ tato ' oton to ' pɨ ' , ” tasa ' iya .

text: Esaias also crieth concerning Israel , Though the number of the children of Israel be as the sand of the sea , a remnant shall be saved :
text2: Aisaya uya Esuwerʉ ekare ' tɨ ukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉmʉ : “ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' tu ' kanoro e ' tane rɨ parau e ' pi pon wɨ ' sɨ ' kasa rɨ , tu ' ke pʉra to ' tonpa ' san epika ' tɨto ' oton .

text: For he will finish the work , and cut it short in righteousness : because a short work will the Lord make upon the earth .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Itepuru uya iyekota ' mato ' ya ' non tʉrʉ inke pʉra mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨ ' rɨ kupʉ poken pʉra , ” ta .

text: And as Esaias said before , Except the Lord of Sabaoth had left us a seed , we had been as Sodoma , and been made like unto Gomorrha .
text2: Aisaya uya wapiya ekamasa ' na ' ne ' kasa : “ Itepuru meruntɨ pe kuru te ' sen ye ' uya rɨken upayan kon pʉra unonkasa ' kon yau , Satan kasa ena ' nokon nesii ' no , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Komora kasa e ' nɨ ' nokon nesii ' no , ” tukai ' .

text: What shall we say then ? That the Gentiles , which followed not after righteousness , have attained to righteousness , even the righteousness which is of faith .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ ken si ta mɨrɨ a ' tai ? Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen , ipoken e ' nɨto ' ku ' nin nʉ ' san pen , uya si eposa ' , tanʉnto ' kon ipokena ' pe apurɨto ' winɨ teposen ;

text: But Israel , which followed after the law of righteousness , hath not attained to the law of righteousness .
text2: e ' tane Esuwerʉ amʉ ' , main ipoken e ' nɨto ' ku ' nin nʉ ' san , uya eposa ' pʉra iyesi .

text: Wherefore ? Because they sought it not by faith , but as it were by the works of the law . For they stumbled at that stumblingstone ;
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' ? Apʉne pʉra to ' uya ikuu ' pʉ apurɨto ' iyawɨrɨ pʉra , tʉrawaso winɨ iyesi tato ' pe rɨ . To ' e ' pi ' po ' pʉ “ e ' pi ' pon nɨto ' tɨ ' ” pona .

text: As it is written , Behold , I lay in Sion a stumblingstone and rock of offence : and whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed .
text2: Iye ' menukasa ' na ' ne ' kasa : “ Entɨ ' , inonkasa ' uya Sayan po , tɨ ' , ka ' pon amʉ ' e ' pi ' poto ' ipona mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ , tɨ ' , to ' eno ' manin , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kʉrɨ , kʉrɨ rɨ si apurɨnin pe te ' sen ɨpiyɨ ' to ' oton pen , ” tukai ' .

text: Brethren , my heart ' s desire and prayer to God for Israel is , that they might be saved .
text2: Utonpa ton , uyewan e ' to ' i ' se mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨpʉremato ' Papa pɨ ' esi Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epika ' tɨto ' pe .

text: For I bear them record that they have a zeal of God , but not according to knowledge .
text2: To ' pɨ ' rɨ usaurokʉ Papa i ' tuto ' tʉuya ' nokon pɨ ' kuru rɨ ipan pe to ' e ' tʉsa ' tukai ' , e ' tane to ' e ' to ' ipan pe e ' tʉpai esi Papa i ' tuto ' pɨ ' pen nɨ .

text: For they being ignorant of God ' s righteousness , and going about to establish their own righteousness , have not submitted themselves unto the righteousness of God .
text2: To ' uya Papa uya anʉn nɨto ' ipoken e ' nɨto ' ya ' ku ' sa ' se pe rɨ pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan kon e ' warinpasa ' tiwano ' kon nɨ nin ipoken e ' nɨto ' ɨnkonekapai , to ' e ' tʉsa ' pʉra iyesi Papa uya anʉn nɨto ' ipoken e ' nɨto ' pe ya ' .

text: For Christ is the end of the law for righteousness to every one that believeth .
text2: Kʉrai esi main , Mosi ' winon u ' ma ' sa ' pe rɨ , tanporon kon nɨ apurɨnin nan iwano ' pe Papa uya anʉn nɨ ipokena ' pe e ' nɨto ' ya ' .

text: For Moses describeth the righteousness which is of the law , That the man which doeth those things shall live by them .
text2: Mosi ' uya ekama se na ' ne ' kasa ipoken e ' nɨto ' esi main winɨ : “ Ka ' pon serɨ ton ku ' nin uko ' mamʉ mɨrɨ ton winɨ , ” ta .

text: But the righteousness which is of faith speaketh on this wise , Say not in thine heart , Who shall ascend into heaven ? ( that is , to bring Christ down from above : )
text2: E ' tane Papa nanʉmʉnʉ ipokena ' pe e ' nɨto ' ya ' apurɨto ' winɨ te ' sen uya ta : “ Kʉkai ɨyewan yau , ‘ Ɨnʉ ' enuku Epʉn pona ? ’ ” kʉkai ta ( Kʉrai nu ' tɨnin pe ta e ' kwa pe ) ,

text: Or , Who shall descend into the deep ? ( that is , to bring up Christ again from the dead . )
text2: “ mɨrɨ pe pʉra , ‘ Ɨnʉ ' u ' tɨ serɨ i ' nawon ya ' ? ’ ” kʉkai ta ( Kʉrai arʉ ' nʉ ' nin pe eri ' nɨsa ' apai ta e ' kwa pe ) .

text: But what saith it ? The word is nigh thee , even in thy mouth , and in thy heart : that is , the word of faith , which we preach ;
text2: E ' tane ɨ ' rɨ ken si ta Mosi ' uya ? “ Main esi a ' ko pe ɨpiyau ; anta nau iyesi mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨyewan yau , ” ta iya , apurɨto ' maimu si ina nekamayai ' ne ' :

text: That if thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus , and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised him from the dead , thou shalt be saved .
text2: Anta ke ekama auya yau , “ Sises esi Epuru wannɨ , ” tukai ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ apurɨi ' ma ɨyewan yau Papa uya i ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ iyeri ' sa ' apai , ɨyepika ' tɨ rɨ .

text: For with the heart man believeth unto righteousness ; and with the mouth confession is made unto salvation .
text2: Apʉne pʉra ɨyewan pokon pe apurɨ auya mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨyekoneka , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ anta ke ekama auya mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ si ɨyepika ' tɨ .

text: For the scripture saith , Whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed .
text2: Imenukasa ' itekare nɨkayai ' ne ' kasa , “ Kʉrɨ apurɨ pɨ ' na ' ne ' ɨpiyɨ ' to ' pʉra rɨ iyesi , ” nɨkayai ' ne ' .

text: For there is no difference between the Jew and the Greek : for the same Lord over all is rich unto all that call upon him .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Esuwerʉ amʉ ' esi tʉron nɨ pe Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen kasa pʉra tato ' pʉra rɨ iyesi — kʉrɨ rɨ rɨ epuru esi tanporon kon epuru pe , mɨrɨpan uya eke pe rɨ wakʉ tʉrʉ tanporon kon tesa ' nin nan pona ,

text: For whosoever shall call upon the name of the Lord shall be saved .
text2: apʉne pʉra , “ Tanporon kon Itepuru ese ' esa ' nin nan epika ' tɨto ' oton , ” tasa ' iya .

text: How then shall they call on him in whom they have not believed ? and how shall they believe in him of whom they have not heard ? and how shall they hear without a preacher ?
text2: Nai kasa ken tʉnapurɨnʉ kon pen nɨ esakʉi ' no to ' ? Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ , nai kasa ken ɨ ' rɨ rɨ tʉneta ' pʉ kon ipɨ ' pen nɨ apurɨi ' no to ' ? Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ , nai kasa ken to ' uya eta , ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ itekare ekama tane pʉra rɨ to ' pɨ ' ?

text: And how shall they preach , except they be sent ? as it is written , How beautiful are the feet of them that preach the gospel of peace , and bring glad tidings of good things !
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ , nai kasa ken itekare ekama to ' uya tenno ' sa ' kon pen nɨ e ' tane ? Iye ' menukasa ' na ' ne ' kasa , “ Ɨ ' rɨ pan wakʉ ton nɨ i ' ta ton kamoro wakʉ itekare ne ' nin nan ! ” tawon .

text: But they have not all obeyed the gospel . For Esaias saith , Lord , who hath believed our report ?
text2: E ' tane tanporo Esuwerʉ amʉ ' esi ' pʉ pen wakʉ itekare awɨrɨ . Aisaya uya tasa ' kasa , “ Epuru , ɨnʉ ' uya ina nekamanʉ itekare apurɨsa ' ? ” tawon .

text: So then faith cometh by hearing , and hearing by the word of God .
text2: Itepe ' pʉ pe , apurɨto ' uyepʉ tekamasen eta winɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tekamasen useta Kʉrai maimu poro ina nekamanʉ pe te ' sen .

text: But I say , Have they not heard ? Yes verily , their sound went into all the earth , and their words unto the ends of the world .
text2: E ' tane ekama ' po uya : To ' uya pe ' eta pʉra iyesi ' pʉ ? A ' tai kanan ma : “ To ' maimu utɨsa ' siya rɨ non awɨrɨ , to ' maimu utɨsa ' non u ' matʉ ya ' rɨ , ” tasa ' .

text: But I say , Did not Israel know ? First Moses saith , I will provoke you to jealousy by them that are no people , and by a foolish nation I will anger you .
text2: Ekama ' pokapʉ uya kanan : Esuwerʉ uya pe ' ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ pʉra iyesi ' pʉ ? Wapiya rɨ , Mosi ' uya ta , “ Ɨyɨkɨntanʉkʉ uya ' nokon mɨrɨ kamoro tʉpataron kon pen nɨ winɨ ; asakoropa uya ' nokon mɨrɨ ito ' ka ' nʉ ' nin nan pen nɨ tʉpataron kon winɨ , ” ta .

text: But Esaias is very bold , and saith , I was found of them that sought me not ; I was made manifest unto them that asked not after me .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai nin si Aisaya uya ta mɨrɨ enari ' mʉra esii ' ma , “ Kamoro uwarinpanin nan pen nɨ uya uyeporo ' pʉ ; kamoro nai yau nai tawon nan pen nɨ ena ' usenpoika ' pʉ , ” ta .

text: But to Israel he saith , All day long I have stretched forth my hands unto a disobedient and gainsaying people .
text2: E ' tane Esuwerʉ pɨ ' ta iya , “ Pata tʉko ' manʉ ' se rɨ uyemiyatʉ tɨnkai ' uko ' mamʉ ka ' pon amʉ ' main awɨron kon pen mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ sa ' man nɨ itewan ton ena ' , ” ta iya .

text: I say then , Hath God cast away his people ? God forbid . For I also am an Israelite , of the seed of Abraham , of the tribe of Benjamin .
text2: Ɨyekama ' po uya ken si : Papa uya pe ' tʉmunkɨ amʉ ' ewaruma ' tɨsa ' ? Kane ku ! Urɨ rɨ nɨrɨ Esuwerʉ pon , Epʉra ' an pa rʉ ' pʉ , Pensiman ko ' winɨpaino .

text: God hath not cast away his people which he foreknew . Wot ye not what the scripture saith of Elias ? how he maketh intercession to God against Israel , saying ,
text2: Papa uya tʉmunkɨ ton ewaruma ' tɨsa ' pʉra iyesi , iwapiya rɨ tʉni ' tu ' san . I ' tu auya pʉra pe ' nai iye ' menukasa ' itekare uya ta Iraisa pɨ ' ipʉ ' kʉ yau — Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pataka ' pʉ iya Papa pɨ ' ɨri pe to ' e ' sa ' pɨ ' :

text: Lord , they have killed thy prophets , and digged down thine altars ; and I am left alone , and they seek my life .
text2: “ Itepuru , amaimu ekamanin nan pu ' kena ' amʉ ' wɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ to ' uya , mɨrɨpan kon uya ɨyena ' use ' man nɨto ' apon a ' morʉpɨtʉ ' pʉ ; urɨ rɨken e ' nonkasa ' , mɨrɨpan kon esi urɨ rɨ nɨrɨ ɨnwɨka ' pai , ” tawon ?

text: But what saith the answer of God unto him ? I have reserved to myself seven thousand men , who have not bowed the knee to the image of Baal .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ ken si tukai ' Papa uya eikʉ ' pʉ nai ? “ Uiwano ' pe 7 , 000 kaisaron kon nonkasa ' uya man iye ' sekunkasa ' kon pen Peyarʉ pɨ ' , ” tukai ' .

text: Even so then at this present time also there is a remnant according to the election of grace .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ , serɨ a ' tai tu ' ke pʉra to ' tonpa ' san esi wakʉ nonkasa ' winɨ anʉnsa ' kon .

text: And if by grace , then is it no more of works : otherwise grace is no more grace . But if it be of works , then is it no more grace : otherwise work is no more work .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wakʉ nonkasa ' winɨ iyesi yau , tʉrawaso winɨ iyesi pen ; mɨrɨ kasa iye ' sa ' yau , wakʉ nonkasa ' esi pen nɨ mɨrɨ wakʉ nonkasa ' pe .

text: What then ? Israel hath not obtained that which he seeketh for ; but the election hath obtained it , and the rest were blinded
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ ken ? Ipan pe tʉnwarinpa ' pʉ kon eposa ' Esuwerʉ amʉ ' uya pʉra iyesi , e ' tane tʉron kon to ' tonpa ton anʉnsa ' kon uya rɨken eporo ' pʉ . Tʉron kon to ' tonpa ton ewan usa ' manta ' pʉ ,

text: ( According as it is written , God hath given them the spirit of slumber , eyes that they should not see , and ears that they should not hear ; ) unto this day .
text2: iye ' menukasa ' na ' ne ' kasa : “ Papa uya to ' repa ' pʉ epe ' rɨ e ' nɨto ' a ' kwarʉ ke , en ton to ' uya ene namai ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pana ton to ' uya eta namai ' , serɨ wʉi pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ , ” tukai ' .

text: And David saith , Let their table be made a snare , and a trap , and a stumbling block , and a recompence unto them :
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Tepi ' uya ta : “ Tɨwɨ to ' tepʉrʉʉi nesii mare pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' sa ' manin pe , to ' e ' pi ' poto ' ipona pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' kota ' manin pe .

text: Let their eyes be darkened , that they may not see , and bow down their back alway .
text2: Tɨwɨ to ' enu newarumamʉi to ' uya ene namai ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' a ' poi nʉse ' mei tɨwɨro ' pe rɨ , ” ta .

text: I say then , Have they stumbled that they should fall ? God forbid : but rather through their fall salvation is come unto the Gentiles , for to provoke them to jealousy .
text2: Ekama ' pokapʉ uya kanan : To ' rɨ pe ' e ' pi ' po ' pʉ tʉuta ' mo ' kai ' te ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ton kon pe pʉra ? Pen nɨ ! E ' tane ru ' ku , apʉne pʉra main pʉremekʉ to ' uya pɨ ' , epika ' tɨn nɨto ' uye ' sa ' Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen piya ' , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' ɨkɨntanʉ ' nin pe .

text: Now if the fall of them be the riches of the world , and the diminishing of them the riches of the Gentiles ; how much more their fulness ?
text2: E ' tane main pʉreme ' sa ' to ' uya uya eke pe pata pʉremato ' ne ' sa ' yau , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' eno ' masa ' uya Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen pʉremato ' eke pe kupʉ yau , mɨrɨ entai kuru si eke pe rɨ pʉreman nɨto ' nepʉ tanporo wakʉ pe to ' konekasa ' Papa uya , uya !

text: For I speak to you Gentiles , inasmuch as I am the apostle of the Gentiles , I magnify mine office :
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon auro ' ka uya , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen . Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen ena ' itekare ekamai ' enno ' sa ' pe esi wenai , eke pe kuru utʉrawasooi kupʉ uya ,

text: If by any means I may provoke to emulation them which are my flesh , and might save some of them .
text2: te ' ku ' se utonpa ton ɨkɨntanʉ ' nin pe , to ' tonpa ton nɨ epika ' tɨto ' pe .

text: For if the casting away of them be the reconciling of the world , what shall the receiving of them be , but life from the dead ?
text2: To ' uya ewaruma ' tɨto ' esi yau non konekanin pe , ɨ ' rɨ pe to ' uya anʉnto ' uya ikupʉ ? Iyeri ' sa ' kon na ' po kasa iyesi nurɨne to ' e ' to ' ya ' .

text: For if the firstfruit be holy , the lump is also holy : and if the root be holy , so are the branches .
text2: Ipʉ ' kʉ pe wapiyaro ' iteperu ki ' masa ' tʉsa ' enasa ' yau wakʉ pe , mɨrɨ a ' tai nin si tanporon itonpa esi mɨrɨ wakʉ pe ; imi ' ton esi wakʉ pe , mɨrɨ kasa kanan ipanta ton esi mɨrɨ .

text: And if some of the branches be broken off , and thou , being a wild olive tree , wert graffed in among them , and with them partakest of the root and fatness of the olive tree ;
text2: Ipanta tonpa ton anpɨ ' pʉ pe iyesi yau , ɨmɨrɨ si , mɨ airon are ' enpu pe ɨwe ' tane , ike ipata ' pʉ yai rɨ are ' na ' tɨsa ' , mɨrɨpan nin si usewekʉ ite ' ku are ' mi ' winon pɨ ' ,

text: Boast not against the branches . But if thou boast , thou bearest not the root , but the root thee .
text2: mɨrɨ ton ipanta ton pɨ ' katapurɨi . Ikupʉ auya yau , se pɨ ' ɨsenuminka ' : Imi ' esa ' pe ɨwesi pen , e ' tane imi ' esi ɨyesa ' pe .

text: Thou wilt say then , The branches were broken off , that I might be graffed in .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai si , ta auya , “ Ipanta ton anpɨ ' pʉ urɨ ke itare ' na ' tɨto ' pe . ”

text: Well ; because of unbelief they were broken off , and thou standest by faith . Be not highminded , but fear :
text2: Iye ' to ' pe rɨ iyesi , e ' tane anpɨ ' pʉ mɨrɨ apʉne pʉra apurɨ pʉra iyesi pɨ ' , mɨrɨpan ɨmɨrɨ nin si esi mɨrɨ apurɨto ' auya winɨ ɨye ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' . Mɨ pe ke ' kupʉi , e ' tane enari ' nʉnkɨ .

text: For if God spared not the natural branches , take heed lest he also spare not thee .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Papa uya i ' naino ipanta ton enkurunpasa ' pʉra iyesi yau , ɨmɨrɨ rɨ nɨrɨ enkurunpa iya pʉra iyesi mɨrɨ .

text: Behold therefore the goodness and severity of God : on them which fell , severity ; but toward thee , goodness , if thou continue in his goodness : otherwise thou also shalt be cut off .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , mannʉ ' pe Papa e ' to ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨsɨ yai konekan nɨto ' iya pɨ ' ɨsenuminka ' : ɨsɨ yai kamoro ita ' mo ' kasa ' ton konekato ' iya , e ' tane mannʉ ' pe ɨpɨ ' iyesi , mannʉ ' pe iye ' to ' yau ɨwesi yau kanan . Mɨrɨ pʉra ɨwesi yau , ɨmɨrɨ rɨ nɨrɨ a ' tɨ mɨrɨ .

text: And they also , if they abide not still in unbelief , shall be graffed in : for God is able to graff them in again .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tapurɨi ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' yau to ' esi pʉra iyesi yau , to ' rɨ are ' na ' tɨ ipona , apʉne pʉra Papa rɨ esi to ' are ' na ' tɨka ' nin pe rɨ kanan .

text: For if thou wert cut out of the olive tree which is wild by nature , and wert graffed contrary to nature into a good olive tree : how much more shall these , which be the natural branches , be graffed into their own olive tree ?
text2: Mɨrɨ rɨ ta tane , auta ' tɨsa ' pe iyesi yau are ' e ' apai mɨ airon nɨ i ' naino airon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' naino waraino pen nɨ utare ' na ' tɨsa ' ipatamasa ' are ' e ' ya ' , mɨrɨ entai kuru rɨ nin serɨ ton , i ' naino ton ipanta ton , esi mɨrɨ itare ' na ' tɨ tʉye ' are ' e ' kuru rɨ nin pona !

text: For I would not , brethren , that ye should be ignorant of this mystery , lest ye should be wise in your own conceits ; that blindness in part is happened to Israel , until the fulness of the Gentiles be come in .
text2: Tonan tawon i ' tunin nan pe pʉra ɨwesi kon i ' se pʉra e ' ai ' , utonpa ton , autaperʉka kon namai ' : Esuwerʉ uya sa ' man pe enan i ' tusa ' mɨrɨ ipʉ ' kʉ pe rɨ tanporo Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen ewomʉ pʉ ' kʉ pona .

text: And so all Israel shall be saved : as it is written , There shall come out of Sion the Deliverer , and shall turn away ungodliness from Jacob :
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa nin si tanporo Esuwerʉ amʉ ' epika ' tɨ mɨrɨ , iye ' menukasa ' na ' ne ' kasa : “ Mo ' kanin uye ' to ' oton Sayan winɨ ; Papa pʉra e ' nɨto ' ra ' tɨ iya Seko ' piyapai .

text: For this is my covenant unto them , when I shall take away their sins .
text2: Serɨ nin si mɨrɨ to ' pokon pe ekonekato ' iwinɨ to ' makooi mo ' kasa ' uya a ' tai , ” tukai ' .

text: As concerning the gospel , they are enemies for your sakes : but as touching the election , they are beloved for the fathers ' sakes .
text2: Wakʉ itekare esi na ' ne ' awɨrɨ , ɨ ' seyaton pe to ' esi mɨrɨ ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon pɨkɨrɨ ; e ' tane utanʉn nɨto ' esi na ' ne ' awɨrɨ , to ' usi ' nʉnka tʉtamokori kon pɨkɨrɨ ,

text: For the gifts and calling of God are without repentance .
text2: apʉne pʉra Papa nʉtʉrʉnʉ ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kɨ ' man nɨto ' iya esi inna ' ponʉ pe pʉra .

text: For as ye in times past have not believed God , yet have now obtained mercy through their unbelief :
text2: Pena Papa Maimu awɨrɨ pʉra me ' ta ' tʉine ' kasa , main awɨrɨ pʉra to ' esi moron nʉ ' pʉ pe ɨpɨ ' nokon usentu ' man nɨto ' eposa ' auya ' nokon ,

text: Even so have these also now not believed , that through your mercy they also may obtain mercy .
text2: mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ , Papa usentu ' masa ' ɨpɨ ' nokon moron nʉ ' pʉ pe , to ' nin si enasa ' main awɨrɨ pʉra tʉpɨ ' nokon usentu ' man nɨto ' epoto ' pe tʉuya ' nokon .

text: For God hath concluded them all in unbelief , that he might have mercy upon all .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Papa uya tanporo ka ' pon amʉ ' a ' sisa ' main awɨrɨ pʉra e ' nɨto ' ya ' , tanporo to ' pɨ ' tʉusentu ' mato ' pe .

text: O the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and knowledge of God ! how unsearchable are his judgments , and his ways past finding out !
text2: Eke si i ' nawon nɨ Papa e ' to ' eke pe ipu ' ketʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' tunin pe iye ' to ' ! Iwarinpa pokena ' pen nɨ eseru aimenkato ' iya , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ e ' ma ' pʉka pokena ' pen nɨ ite ' ma ' pʉ !

text: For who hath known the mind of the Lord ? or who hath been his counseller ?
text2: “ Ɨnʉ ' uya Itepuru usenuminkato ' i ' tu ' pʉ ? Mɨrɨ pe pʉra , ɨnʉ ' rɨ esi ' pʉ ipana ' tɨnin pe ? ”

text: Or who hath first given to him , and it shall be recompensed unto him again ?
text2: “ Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ Papa repa ' pʉ , Papa uya te ' mato ' pe ? ”

text: For of him , and through him , and to him , are all things : to whom be glory for ever . Amen .
text2: Apʉne pʉra iwinɨpai mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iporo mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itiwano ' pe tanporon nɨ esi . Itiwano ' pe eke pe iku ' to ' nesii , tɨwɨrɨ rɨ ! Amen .

text: I beseech you therefore , brethren , by the mercies of God , that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice , holy , acceptable unto God , which is your reasonable service .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , ɨyekama ' po uya ' nokon kuru , utonpa ton , ɨsentu ' ke ' pe Papa esi pɨ ' , te ' tʉsen pe ɨwesi kon pa nurɨnan use ' man nɨto ' ton ike ye ' pe , wakʉ , Papa pori ' manin ye ' pe — iya ' kwarʉ yau apurɨpɨ ' to ' auya ' nokon .

text: And be not conformed to this world : but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind , that ye may prove what is that good , and acceptable , and perfect , will of God .
text2: Serɨ orʉ eseru awɨrɨ inke ke ' tʉu , e ' tane ɨsensimatɨ ' kuru ɨusenuminkato ' kon eseru kupʉ winɨ emenna ' pe , Papa eseru wakʉ pe te ' sen i ' tunin pe nin si ɨwesi kon pa mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wakʉ pe iyesi ta kon pa — pori ' manin pe te ' sen mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ima ' takʉʉi pʉra te ' sen .

text: For I say , through the grace given unto me , to every man that is among you , not to think of himself more highly than he ought to think ; but to think soberly , according as God hath dealt to every man the measure of faith .
text2: Apʉne pʉra wakʉ nonkasa ' uyena ' winɨ ta uya tanporo ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon pɨ ' : Eke pe kuru rɨ ɨpɨ ' nokon ke ' ku ' tʉu ɨwe ' to ' kon entai rɨ , e ' tane ru ' ku , eseru aimenkato ' yai ɨsentɨ ' nurɨnan yai , apurɨto ' auya ' nokon ke ti ' tui ' Papa uya ɨrepasa ' kon na ' ne ' ike .

text: For as we have many members in one body , and all members have not the same office :
text2: Tikin nɨ upun kon esa ' esi na ' ne ' kasa tu ' ke rɨ ipʉ ' kʉ ton e ' tane , mɨrɨpan serɨ ton ipʉ ' kʉ ton esi pen tikin nɨ itʉrawasooi ,

text: So we , being many , are one body in Christ , and every one members one of another .
text2: mɨrɨ kasa Kʉrai yau urɨ ' nokon , tu ' kan kon nɨ ena tikin nɨ ipun pe , mɨrɨpan esi ɨsipʉ ' kʉ pe ' ne .

text: Having then gifts differing according to the grace that is given to us , whether prophecy , let us prophesy according to the proportion of faith ;
text2: Ɨsi ' tai repapɨ ' nɨto ' esi , wakʉ nonkasa ' uyena ' nokon awɨrɨ . Ka ' pon repato ' ike pe pu ' kena ' pe usauro ' nɨto ' esi yau , tɨwɨ napurɨi apurɨto ' tʉuya yau iyesi kaisarɨ rɨ .

text: Or ministry , let us wait on our ministering : or he that teacheth , on teaching ;
text2: Apiyo ' pe iyesi yau , tɨwɨ apiyo ' pe nesii ; enupanin pe iyesi yau , tɨwɨ enupan pɨ ' nesii ;

text: Or he that exhorteth , on exhortation : he that giveth , let him do it with simplicity ; he that ruleth , with diligence ; he that sheweth mercy , with cheerfulness .
text2: pori ' mapɨ ' nin pe iyesi yau , tɨwɨ pori ' man pɨ ' nesii ; entu ' manin nan repanin pe iyesi yau , tɨwɨ amʉre ' mʉra ne ' repai ; epuru pe iyesi yau , tɨwɨ esa ' wannɨ pe nesii ari ' kena ' pe ; tʉusentu ' masen pe iyesi yau , tɨwɨ pori ' pe esii ' ma nʉkupʉi .

text: Let love be without dissimulation . Abhor that which is evil ; cleave to that which is good .
text2: Usi ' nʉnkan nɨto ' nesii i ' nairon pe kuru . Ɨri eseru ewaruma ' tɨtɨ ' ; wakʉ pɨ ' ata ' sitɨ ' .

text: Be kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love ; in honour preferring one another ;
text2: Tʉusi ' nʉnkasen pe e ' tɨ ' ɨsitonpa pe . Ɨtonpa kon tʉnamai ' ɨyentaino kon pe e ' tɨ ' .

text: Not slothful in business ; fervent in spirit ; serving the Lord ;
text2: Emiya ' ne ' pe ke ' tʉu , e ' tane ɨnku ' paino ye ' pe kuru aya ' kwarʉ kon ke , Itepuru apiyo ' ton pe e ' tɨ ' .

text: Rejoicing in hope ; patient in tribulation ; continuing instant in prayer ;
text2: Pori ' pe e ' ku ' nɨto ' yau , ɨsɨ yau e ' nɨ moronkanin pe e ' tɨ ' , ɨpʉreman yau te ' nonkasen pe pʉra .

text: Distributing to the necessity of saints ; given to hospitality .
text2: Papa munkɨ amʉ ' tekota ' masan tʉrepai ' e ' tɨ ' . Ka ' kʉran ereutanʉ ' sa ' a ' re ' tɨto ' eseru tʉku ' se e ' tɨ ' .

text: Bless them which persecute you : bless , and curse not .
text2: Tʉwɨpʉremai ' wakʉ kupʉ auya ' nokon wenai ɨkota ' manin kon pona e ' tɨ ' , te ' pa ' nʉ ' se pʉra e ' tɨ ' .

text: Rejoice with them that do rejoice , and weep with them that weep .
text2: Tepori ' mai ' tepori ' masan pokon pe e ' tɨ ' . Tʉukaranse tʉukaransan pokon pe e ' tɨ ' .

text: Be of the same mind one toward another . Mind not high things , but condescend to men of low estate . Be not wise in your own conceits .
text2: Wakʉ pe ɨseseru yau tʉko ' mansan pe e ' tɨ ' . Mɨ pe te ' ku ' san pe pʉra e ' tɨ ' , e ' tane se pe te ' san pokon pe te ' san pe e ' tɨ ' . Tʉutaperʉkasan pe pʉra e ' tɨ ' .

text: Recompense to no man evil for evil . Provide things honest in the sight of all men .
text2: Ɨri ku ' nin nʉ ' pʉ ɨpɨ ' nokon kʉse ' matʉu ɨri ke . Ti ' tui ' wakʉ iku ' tɨ ' ka ' pon amʉ ' uya ɨyentane ' nokon .

text: If it be possible , as much as lieth in you , live peaceably with all men .
text2: Ikupʉ poken iyesi yau , ɨiwano ' kon pe ɨwe ' to ' kon awɨrɨ , ɨko ' mantɨ ' ɨsɨ pe pʉra tanporon kon pokon pe .

text: Dearly beloved , avenge not yourselves , but rather give place unto wrath : for it is written , Vengeance is mine ; I will repay , saith the Lord .
text2: Kɨse ' matʉu , utonpa ton , e ' tane Papa uya kota ' man nɨto ' pata tʉku ' se e ' tɨ ' , apʉne pʉra iye ' menukasa ' esi : “ Urɨ iwano ' mɨrɨ e ' man ; urɨ uya rɨ e ' ma , ” ta Itepuru uya .

text: Therefore if thine enemy hunger , feed him ; if he thirst , give him drink : for in so doing thou shalt heap coals of fire on his head .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe pʉra : “ Iwan pe ɨyeyaton esi yau , a ' re ' tɨkɨ ; tuna ' kiri ' ke iyesi yau , iwo ' pakɨ . Serɨ kupʉ auya uya enkena ' kamarʉka ' amʉranʉkʉ mɨrɨ i ' pai pona , ” tasa ' iya .

text: Be not overcome of evil , but overcome evil with good .
text2: Ɨri kuru kʉsenanin ɨyentai ' nokon , e ' tane ɨri entai enatɨ ' wakʉ ke .

text: Let every soul be subject unto the higher powers . For there is no power but of God : the powers that be are ordained of God .
text2: Tanporon kon e ' tʉto ' pe iyesi eke ton esa ' wannɨ pe te ' san ena ' , apʉne pʉra moro ɨnʉ ' rɨ eke pʉra iyesi Papa nʉ ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ pen . Eke pe na ' ne ' nan esi Papa nʉ ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' san pe .

text: Whosoever therefore resisteth the power , resisteth the ordinance of God : and they that resist shall receive to themselves damnation .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , ɨnʉ ' rɨ eke pe te ' sen ewa ' nomanin uya Papa nʉkuu ' pʉ ewa ' noma mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kamoro mɨrɨ ku ' nin nan uya eseru aimenkato ' nepʉ mɨrɨ tʉpona ' nokon nɨ .

text: For rulers are not a terror to good works , but to the evil . Wilt thou then not be afraid of the power ? do that which is good , and thou shalt have praise of the same :
text2: Apʉne pʉra nari ' pe te ' san pen ton nɨ kamoro esanon wannɨ ipokena ' ku ' nin nan pona , e ' tane kamoro nin ipokena ' pen ku ' nin nan . Eke pɨ ' pe ' enari ' mʉra e ' pai me ' atʉu ? Ipokena ' ken si iku ' tɨ ' ayapurɨpɨ ' to ' kon pe iya nin si .

text: For he is the minister of God to thee for good . But if thou do that which is evil , be afraid ; for he beareth not the sword in vain : for he is the minister of God , a revenger to execute wrath upon him that doeth evil .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Papa poitorʉ pe iyesi wakʉ pe ɨku ' nin kon pe . E ' tane ipokena ' pen ku ' sa ' auya ' nokon yau , ipɨ ' enari ' nʉntɨ ' , notʉn pe supara esa ' pe te ' sen pen kʉrɨ rɨ . Papa poitorʉ kʉrɨ rɨ , Papa uya kota ' man nɨto ' ne ' nin kamoro ɨri ku ' nin nan kota ' mai ' .

text: Wherefore ye must needs be subject , not only for wrath , but also for conscience sake .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , e ' tʉn nɨto ' pe kuru iyesi eke ton ena ' , to ' uya kota ' man pɨ ' rɨken pen , e ' tane ewan wannɨ uya i ' tu pɨ ' rɨ .

text: For for this cause pay ye tribute also : for they are God ' s ministers , attending continually upon this very thing .
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai rɨ nɨrɨ tamʉranʉ ' sen pʉrata e ' ma auya ' nokon mɨrɨ , apʉne pʉra Papa poitorʉ pe eke ton esi pɨ ' , inke rɨ esa ' wannɨ pe te ' san pe .

text: Render therefore to all their dues : tribute to whom tribute is due ; custom to whom custom ; fear to whom fear ; honour to whom honour .
text2: Tanporo ɨnwoma ' san kon e ' matɨ ' : Tamʉranʉ ' sen omasa ' auya ' nokon yau , e ' ma ' tɨ ' ; ɨntʉrʉnʉ kon yau ɨye ' womasa ' kon yau , e ' matɨ ' ; eke pe iku ' to ' yau ɨye ' womasa ' kon yau , eke pe iku ' ka ' tɨ ' rɨ ; inamato ' yau ɨye ' womasa ' kon yau , inamaka ' tɨ ' rɨ .

text: Owe no man any thing , but to love one another : for he that loveth another hath fulfilled the law .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ rɨ te ' masen kʉsenkurunpatʉu te ' mai ' pʉra , ɨusi ' nʉnkato ' kon nɨken enkurunpatɨ ' miyarɨ rɨ usi ' nʉnkan pɨ ' , apʉne pʉra kʉrɨ tʉtonpa i ' nʉnkanin uya main a ' ku ' tɨsa ' pe iyesi .

text: For this , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not kill , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness , Thou shalt not covet ; and if there be any other commandment , it is briefly comprehended in this saying , namely , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Apiyontɨn nɨto ' ike ton , “ Iyemari ' masa ' pe esii ' ma kekumai , ” “ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ kʉ ' wɨnɨi , ” “ Ama ' pe kesii , ” “ Ipan pe ɨtonpa iwano ' i ' se kesii , ” mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨ ' rɨ ton nɨ apiyontɨn nɨto ' esi na ' ne ' amʉrasa ' mɨrɨ se tikin nan iporo e ' nɨto ' yau : “ Ɨtonpa i ' nʉnkakɨ , mɨsi ' nʉnkayai ' ne ' kasa rɨ , ” tawon .

text: Love worketh no ill to his neighbour : therefore love is the fulfilling of the law .
text2: Usi ' nʉnkan nɨto ' esi ɨsɨ pe tʉtonpa ku ' nin pen nɨ . Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , usi ' nʉnkan nɨto ' esi main awɨrɨ e ' nɨ ekamanin pe .

text: And that , knowing the time , that now it is high time to awake out of sleep : for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ serɨ si iku ' tɨ ' , serɨ pe e ' nɨto ' to ' ka ' nʉkʉ pe . Iweyu e ' seposa ' man aupakato ' kon ɨye ' nʉnto ' kon apai , apʉne pʉra a ' ko pe si epika ' tɨn nɨto ' esi pɨ ' wapiya apurɨ a ' tai iyesi ' pʉ entai .

text: The night is far spent , the day is at hand : let us therefore cast off the works of darkness , and let us put on the armour of light .
text2: Ewarupɨ utɨiwaka ' nɨ pɨ ' man ; pata ema ' kapʉ pe rɨ iyesi . Mɨrɨ pɨ ' ewarupɨ yau tʉku ' sen amaka ' pai ' nokon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ a ' kwa amataai ya ' enai ' ma .

text: Let us walk honestly , as in the day ; not in rioting and drunkenness , not in chambering and wantonness , not in strife and envying .
text2: Wakʉ pe te ' san pe e ' nɨpai ' nokon , wʉi naino kon pe , ipɨ ' rɨ te ' kamai ' e ' taripan pɨ ' pʉra mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ te ' taripasan pe pʉra , ekuman pʉra mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipan pe ɨri kupʉ pɨ ' ɨko ' manpai e ' nɨ pɨ ' pʉra , ɨseseru yau pʉra e ' nɨto ' pʉra mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨkɨntan pʉra .

text: But put ye on the Lord Jesus Christ , and make not provision for the flesh , to fulfil the lusts thereof .
text2: E ' tane ru ' ku , Itepuru Sises Kʉrai ke epontɨnpai ' nokon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ a ' naino kon makoi e ' to ' i ' se pɨ ' tʉusenuminkai ' pʉra imaimu awɨrɨ ɨwe ' to ' kon pɨ ' .

text: Him that is weak in the faith receive ye , but not to doubtful disputations .
text2: Ɨ ' sɨ ' mʉra na ' ne ' apurɨto ' iya yau , anʉntɨ ' , iteseru taimenkai ' pʉra tʉron nɨ pe iteseru esi pɨ ' ipokon pe te ' sei ' pɨ ' se pʉra .

text: For one believeth that he may eat all things : another , who is weak , eateth herbs .
text2: Tikin nan ka ' pon uya apurɨto ' uya ikupʉ tanporon pɨ ' rɨ tenta ' nasen pe , e ' tane tʉron nɨ , ɨ ' sɨ ' mʉra te ' sen apurɨto ' iya enta ' na ipatamasa ' kiyari pɨ ' rɨken .

text: Let not him that eateth despise him that eateth not ; and let not him which eateth not judge him that eateth : for God hath received him .
text2: Ka ' pon tanporon pɨ ' rɨ tenta ' nasen , kʉrɨ ipatamasa ' kiyari pɨ ' tenta ' nasen pɨ ' kʉ ' sewaruma ' tɨnin , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' pon tanporon pɨ ' tenta ' nasen pen kʉrɨ tanporon pɨ ' tenta ' nasen pe te ' sen eno ' manin , apʉne pʉra Papa uya anʉnsa ' pe iyesi pɨ ' .

text: Who art thou that judgest another man ' s servant ? to his own master he standeth or falleth . Yea , he shall be holden up : for God is able to make him stand .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' pe ken ɨwesi , ka ' pon poitorʉ rɨ eseru aimenka pa ? Itesa ' pona iye ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' pe iyesi mɨrɨ pe pʉra ita ' mo ' kasa ' pe rɨ . Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iye ' mʉ ' sa ' ka rɨ si , apʉne pʉra Itepuru uya iye ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' pe ikupʉ pɨ ' .

text: One man esteemeth one day above another : another esteemeth every day alike . Let every man be fully persuaded in his own mind .
text2: Tʉron nɨ ka ' pon pona eke tʉnamasen pe tikin nan wʉi esi tʉron nɨ ton kasa pʉra ; tʉron nɨ ka ' pon pona tanporon nɨ wʉi esi ɨsi ' kaisa rɨ . Tʉkaisarɨ ' nokon tʉusenuminkato ' kon awɨrɨ to ' nesii i ' se te ' to ' kon pe kuru .

text: He that regardeth the day , regardeth it unto the Lord ; and he that regardeth not the day , to the Lord he doth not regard it . He that eateth , eateth to the Lord , for he giveth God thanks ; and he that eateth not , to the Lord he eateth not , and giveth God thanks .
text2: Kʉrɨ eke pe kuru tikin nan wʉi esi nɨkayai ' ne ' uya ikupʉ mɨrɨ Itepuru iwano ' pe . Kʉrɨ o ' anyai ' ne ' uya anɨ mɨrɨ Itepuru iwano ' pe , apʉne pʉra Papa pɨ ' tenki ta iya ke ; mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kʉrɨ anɨ iya pʉra na ' ne ' uya ikupʉ mɨrɨ Itepuru iwano ' pe , mɨrɨpan uya tenki ta Papa pɨ ' .

text: For none of us liveth to himself , and no man dieth to himself .
text2: Apʉne pʉra urɨ ' nokon uko ' mamʉ uiwano ' kon pe rɨken pen , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eri ' nɨ uiwano ' kon pe rɨken pen .

text: For whether we live , we live unto the Lord ; and whether we die , we die unto the Lord : whether we live therefore , or die , we are the Lord ' s .
text2: Uko ' man nɨ pe iyesi yau , Itepuru iwano ' pe uko ' man nɨ ; mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eri ' nɨ pe iyesi yau , eri ' nɨ Itepuru iwano ' pe . Mɨrɨ pɨ ' si , uko ' man nɨ pe iyesi yau mɨrɨ pe pʉra eri ' nɨ pe iyesi yau , Itepuru iwano ' pe rɨ e ' nɨ .

text: For to this end Christ both died , and rose , and revived , that he might be Lord both of the dead and living .
text2: Serɨ wenai kuru si , Kʉrai erikʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨpan e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ nurɨne te ' to ' ya ' , iyeri ' sa ' kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ nurɨne te ' san epuru pe te ' to ' pe .

text: But why dost thou judge thy brother ? or why dost thou set at nought thy brother ? for we shall all stand before the judgment seat of Christ .
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ si , ɨ ' rɨto ' pe ɨtonpa eseru aimenka auya ? Mɨrɨ pe pʉra , ɨ ' rɨto ' pe ɨtonpa ewaruma ' tɨ auya ? Tanporo urɨ ' nokon e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' e ' to ' oton Papa uya eseru aimenkato ' apon piyau .

text: For it is written , As I live , saith the Lord , every knee shall bow to me , and every tongue shall confess to God .
text2: Iye ' menukasa ' : “ ‘ Uko ' manyai ' ne ' kasa , ’ ta Itepuru uya , ‘ Tanporon kon e ' sekunkato ' oton urau ; tanporon ani uya ekamato ' oton Papa pɨ ' , ’ ” tukai ' .

text: So then every one of us shall give account of himself to God .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' nin si , ukaisarɨ ' nokon usekaman nɨto ' oton kon Papa pɨ ' .

text: Let us not therefore judge one another any more : but judge this rather , that no man put a stumblingblock or an occasion to fall in his brother ' s way .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , utonpa kon amʉ ' eseru aimenkato ' ereutanʉ ' pai ' nokon . E ' tane ru ' ku , ɨusenuminkato ' kon ikonekatɨ ' ɨtonpa kon e ' pi ' poto ' ipona mɨrɨ pe pʉra iwa ' kʉ ' nin tʉrʉ auya ' nokon namai ' ite ' ma ta ' .

text: I know , and am persuaded by the Lord Jesus , that there is nothing unclean of itself : but to him that esteemeth any thing to be unclean , to him it is unclean .
text2: Urɨ , Itepuru Sises yau te ' sen ye ' pe , upona kuru ɨri pe te ' sen kiyari pʉra rɨ iyesi . E ' tane ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ɨri pe ikupʉ yau , ɨri pe rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ ipona .

text: But if thy brother be grieved with thy meat , now walkest thou not charitably . Destroy not him with thy meat , for whom Christ died .
text2: Ɨtonpa e ' kʉuma pe iyesi yau ananɨ ' pʉ pɨ ' , usi ' nʉnkan nɨto ' esi pen nɨ mɨrɨ ɨnkupʉnʉ yau . Ananɨ ' pʉ ɨtonpa ma ' tanʉ ' nin Kʉrai uma ' ta ' pʉ iwenaino pe rʉ ' pʉ .

text: Let not then your good be evil spoken of :
text2: Wakʉ pe ɨnkupʉnʉ kʉse ' nin ɨri pe usauro ' nɨto ' ipɨ ' pe .

text: For the kingdom of God is not meat and drink ; but righteousness , and peace , and joy in the Holy Ghost .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe esi pen enta ' nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ensi pe pen , e ' tane Papa uya anʉn nɨ ipokena ' pe , tʉusewankamai ' pʉra mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pori ' pe Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ yau ,

text: For he that in these things serveth Christ is acceptable to God , and approved of men .
text2: apʉne pʉra Kʉrai tʉrawasooi pe te ' sen serɨ kasa esi Papa pori ' manin pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' uya wakʉ tato ' ipɨ ' pe .

text: Let us therefore follow after the things which make for peace , and things wherewith one may edify another .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , tʉusewankamai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' ya ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨsi ' kaisa rɨ usemo ' kan nɨto ' pe apurɨto ' yau epika ' tɨn nɨto ' ya ' anin ku ' pai ' nokon .

text: For meat destroy not the work of God . All things indeed are pure ; but it is evil for that man who eateth with offence .
text2: Papa tʉrawasooi kʉ ' ma ' tanʉ ' tʉu kiyari pɨkɨrɨ rɨ . Tanporon kiyari esi wakʉ pe Papa enu yau , e ' tane ipoken pʉra iyesi ka ' pon enta ' na a ' tai tʉron nɨ e ' pi ' po emapu ' tɨnin pe .

text: It is good neither to eat flesh , nor to drink wine , nor any thing whereby thy brother stumbleth , or is offended , or is made weak .
text2: Wakʉ pe parɨ iyesi o ' tanse pʉra e ' nɨ mɨrɨ pe pʉra waain tensii ' pʉra mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨ ' rɨ rɨ tʉku ' se pʉra ɨtonpa uta ' mo ' ka emapu ' tɨnin pe .

text: Hast thou faith ? have it to thyself before God . Happy is he that condemneth not himself in that thing which he alloweth .
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai , mapurɨyatʉi ' ne ' serɨ ton pɨ ' enkurunpatɨ ' ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa ya ' rɨken . Pori ' pe te ' sen kʉrɨ rɨ ka ' pon tiwano ' pe tʉuseno ' masen pen wakʉ tato ' tʉuya ipɨ ' winɨ .

text: And he that doubteth is damned if he eat , because he eateth not of faith : for whatsoever is not of faith is sin .
text2: E ' tane kʉrɨ ka ' pon ikasimanin useno ' masa ' mɨrɨ iyenta ' nasa ' yau , apʉne pʉra iyenta ' nato ' esi apurɨto ' iya winɨ pʉra ; mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporon apurɨto ' winɨ pʉra nʉye ' ai ' ne ' esi makoi pe .

text: We then that are strong ought to bear the infirmities of the weak , and not to please ourselves .
text2: Urɨ ' nokon pana ' pe te ' san e ' to ' pe iyesi ɨ ' sɨ ' mʉnon pokon pe to ' uya ikupʉ pʉra iye ' to ' yau to ' pika ' tɨ pɨ ' , iwano ' wannɨ pe rɨ upori ' manin kon tʉku ' se pʉra .

text: Let every one of us please his neighbour for his good to edification .
text2: E ' nɨ na ' ne ' kaisa rɨ utonpa kon tʉpori ' mai ' e ' nɨto ' pe iyesi , wakʉ pe to ' ku ' nin pe , to ' pika ' tɨnin pe tʉusemo ' kasan pe to ' uya apurɨto ' yau .

text: For even Christ pleased not himself ; but , as it is written , The reproaches of them that reproached thee fell on me .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Kʉrai rɨ nɨrɨ uya tʉpori ' manin ku ' sa ' pʉra iyesi , e ' tane iye ' menukasa ' na ' ne ' kasa : “ Asapemato ' asapemanin nan uya uta ' mo ' kasa ' man upona , ” tasa ' .

text: For whatsoever things were written aforetime were written for our learning , that we through patience and comfort of the scriptures might have hope .
text2: Apʉne pʉra tanporon nɨ iye ' menupɨ ' sa ' na ' ne ' e ' menupɨtʉ ' pʉ uyenupanin kon pe , imoronka winɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iye ' menukasa ' itekare uya tʉpori ' mai ' , e ' ku ' nɨto ' epoto ' pe .

text: Now the God of patience and consolation grant you to be likeminded one toward another according to Christ Jesus :
text2: Tɨwɨ Papa imoronkato ' pe ku ' nin mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pori ' mapɨ ' nin a ' samʉtʉ yau ɨwesi kon a ' kwarʉ ke ɨrepatʉu Kʉrai Sises pɨkɨrɨ ɨwesi kon koro ' tau ,

text: That ye may with one mind and one mouth glorify God , even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: tikin nɨ nin si itewan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ inta esii ' ma urɨ ' nokon Epuru Sises Kʉrai e ' to ' itese ' pɨ ' Papa mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Ikʉipʉnʉ apurɨpɨtʉ kon pa .

text: Wherefore receive ye one another , as Christ also received us to the glory of God .
text2: Ɨtonpa kon si tanʉnse e ' tɨ ' , Kʉrai uya ayanʉnsa ' kon na ' ne ' kasa , Papa apurɨpɨ ' to ' ne ' nin pe .

text: Now I say that Jesus Christ was a minister of the circumcision for the truth of God , to confirm the promises made unto the fathers :
text2: Ekama uya ɨpɨ ' nokon Kʉrai enasa ' Esuwerʉ amʉ ' poitorʉ pe Papa e ' to ' i ' nairon pe ekamanin pe , isauro ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ iku ' to ' pe tʉuya tukai ' tamokori ton amʉ ' pɨ '

text: And that the Gentiles might glorify God for his mercy ; as it is written , For this cause I will confess to thee among the Gentiles , and sing unto thy name .
text2: Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen uya Papa apurɨpɨ ' to ' pe ɨsentu ' ke ' pe iyesi pɨ ' , iye ' menukasa ' na ' ne ' kasa : “ Serɨ wenai ayapurɨpɨtʉ uya mɨrɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen koro ' tau ; eren erenka uya mɨrɨ ɨyese ' pɨ ' , ” tasa ' iya .

text: And again he saith , Rejoice , ye Gentiles , with his people .
text2: Taka ' sa ' iya kanan , “ Epori ' matɨ ' , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen , imunkɨ amʉ ' pokon pe , ” tasa ' iya .

text: And again , Praise the Lord , all ye Gentiles ; and laud him , all ye people .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kanan , “ Itepuru apurɨpɨ ' tɨ ' , tanporon kon Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ apurɨpɨ ' to ' erenkatɨ ' , tanporon kon ka ' pon amʉ ' , ” tasa ' iya .

text: And again , Esaias saith , There shall be a root of Jesse , and he that shall rise to reign over the Gentiles ; in him shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kanan , Aisaya uya ta , “ Ise ' si Atʉ rʉ ' pʉ e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka mɨrɨ , kʉrɨ te ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ton tʉpataron kon esa ' pe te ' to ' pe ; Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen e ' ku ' to ' e ' to ' oton iyau , ” ta iya .

text: Now the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing , that ye may abound in hope , through the power of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Tɨwɨ Papa e ' ku ' nɨto ' ipɨ ' ɨkupʉi ' nokon eke pe kuru pori ' pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉusewankamasen pe pʉra tapurɨ auya ' nokon koro ' tau , ayanʉkʉ kon pa ɨye ' ku ' to ' kon ike ke Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ meruntɨrʉ winɨ .

text: And I myself also am persuaded of you , my brethren , that ye also are full of goodness , filled with all knowledge , able also to admonish one another .
text2: Sapurɨyai ' kuru rɨ , utonpa ton , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon esi wakʉ pe kuru rɨ , i ' tuto ' auya ' nokon yau iyenuka ' sa ' pe ɨwesi kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨtonpa kon enupanin nan pe kuru rɨ .

text: Nevertheless , brethren , I have written the more boldly unto you in some sort , as putting you in mind , because of the grace that is given to me of God ,
text2: Ɨmenukasa ' uya ' nokon man enari ' mʉra tʉron nɨ ton pɨ ' ne , ɨyemiya ' pontɨkapʉ kon pe rɨ kanan , Papa uya wakʉ nonkasa ' pɨ ' rɨ urepa pe ,

text: That I should be the minister of Jesus Christ to the Gentiles , ministering the gospel of God , that the offering up of the Gentiles might be acceptable , being sanctified by the Holy Ghost .
text2: Kʉrai Sises poitorʉ pe e ' to ' pe Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen iwano ' pe use ' man tʉrawasomanin eseru yau wakʉ Papa ekareei ekama pɨ ' , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen enato ' pe Papa nanʉmʉnʉ ton wakʉ tʉtʉsan ton pe , Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ winɨ iyekonekasa ' kon pe .

text: I have therefore whereof I may glory through Jesus Christ in those things which pertain to God .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , mɨ pe e ' kupʉ Kʉrai Sises yau Papa poitorʉ pe esi pɨ ' .

text: For I will not dare to speak of any of those things which Christ hath not wrought by me , to make the Gentiles obedient , by word and deed ,
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' rɨ usaurokʉ pen Kʉrai nʉkupʉ ' pʉ uporo pɨ ' rɨken Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen arɨ pɨ ' Papa Maimu awɨron kon pe usauro ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ unkupʉ ' pʉ winɨ —

text: Through mighty signs and wonders , by the power of the Spirit of God ; so that from Jerusalem , and round about unto Illyricum , I have fully preached the gospel of Christ .
text2: ento ' ipɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eke Papa tʉrawasooi meruntɨrʉ winɨ , Iya ' kwarʉ meruntɨrʉ poro . Mɨrɨ pɨ ' si Surusiran ponsi ' kɨ siyarɨ Iriri ' kun pona rɨ , wakʉ itekare Kʉrai iwano ' ekama pɨ ' e ' sa ' serɨ tanporo kuru rɨ .

text: Yea , so have I strived to preach the gospel , not where Christ was named , lest I should build upon another man ' s foundation :
text2: Wakʉ itekare ɨnekamapai kuru e ' pɨ ' pɨtʉ Kʉrai i ' tu pʉra na ' ne ' airɨ , ɨnʉ ' rɨ nʉtʉkaa ' pʉ po amɨ uya namai ' .

text: But as it is written , To whom he was not spoken of , they shall see : and they that have not heard shall understand .
text2: E ' tane ru ' ku , iye ' menukasa ' na ' ne ' kasa : “ Kamoro ipɨ ' auro ' kasa ' kon pen uya ento ' oton , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ etanin nʉ ' san pen uya ito ' ka ' nʉ ' to ' oton , ” tasa ' iya .

text: For which cause also I have been much hindered from coming to you .
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai inke rɨ ɨpiya ' nokon utɨ pʉra iyesi usemapu ' tɨpɨ ' sa ' mɨrɨ .

text: But now having no more place in these parts , and having a great desire these many years to come unto you ;
text2: E ' tane si serɨ ton nono yau e ' tʉrawasomato ' pʉra iyesi pɨ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ inke kuru rɨ wʉipiya tenno ' pɨ ' se ɨyenpai ' nokon e ' sa ' pɨ ' ,

text: Whensoever I take my journey into Spain , I will come to you : for I trust to see you in my journey , and to be brought on my way thitherward by you , if first I be somewhat filled with your company .
text2: ikupʉ pɨ ' nin si ekoneka utɨ a ' tai Sʉ ' pen pona . Utɨ koro ' tau ɨpiya ' nokon upika ' tɨ kon pa utɨto ' yau , mɨrɨ yau uyewakiri pe rɨ aka ' ne ' pe rɨ ɨpokon pe esi tʉpo .

text: But now I go unto Jerusalem to minister unto the saints .
text2: E ' tane pʉra rɨ , utɨ si serɨ Surusiran pona wakʉ ton mɨrɨ yawon kon apiyo ' pe .

text: For it hath pleased them of Macedonia and Achaia to make a certain contribution for the poor saints which are at Jerusalem .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Ma ' sitoniya mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ A ' kaya pon kon esi ' pʉ pori ' pe entu ' manin nan wakʉ ton koro ' tawon kon Surusiran pon kon pika ' tɨ tʉuya ' nokon pɨ ' .

text: It hath pleased them verily ; and their debtors they are . For if the Gentiles have been made partakers of their spiritual things , their duty is also to minister unto them in carnal things .
text2: Pori ' pe rɨ to ' esi ' pʉ ikupʉ tʉuya ' nokon pɨ ' , to ' uya iku ' to ' pe rɨ iyesi to ' iwano ' pe . Apʉne pʉra Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen uya Esuwerʉ amʉ ' neporonʉ iya ' kwarʉ pe te ' sen wakʉ rɨ eposa ' pe iyesi yau , to ' uya kuru rɨ iku ' to ' pe iyesi Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pokon pe rɨ non pon wakʉ rɨ tiwano ' kon ekanto ' pe iyesi .

text: When therefore I have performed this , and have sealed to them this fruit , I will come by you into Spain .
text2: Serɨ si tʉrawaso enuka ' nʉ ' sa ' uya tʉpo mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' uya si tʉneporonʉ kon eposa ' ene tʉpo , utɨ si mɨrɨ Sʉ ' pen pona utɨ pe ɨyenei ' ma ' nokon .

text: And I am sure that , when I come unto you , I shall come in the fulness of the blessing of the gospel of Christ .
text2: Si ' tuyai ' , uye ' sa ' a ' tai ɨpiya ' nokon , uyepʉ mɨrɨ eke pe kuru Kʉrai uya ɨpʉremasa ' kon esa ' pe .

text: Now I beseech you , brethren , for the Lord Jesus Christ ' s sake , and for the love of the Spirit , that ye strive together with me in your prayers to God for me ;
text2: Ɨyekama ' po uya ' nokon kuru , utonpa ton , urɨ ' nokon epuru Sises Kʉrai mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Iya ' kwarʉ usi ' nʉnkato ' winɨ , e ' suranmato ' yau tikin nɨ upokon pe ɨyena kon i ' se esi , upona Papa pɨ ' ɨwɨpʉrema kon yau .

text: That I may be delivered from them that do not believe in Judaea ; and that my service which I have for Jerusalem may be accepted of the saints ;
text2: Ɨpʉrematɨ ' apurɨnin nan pen Isutiya pon kon enapai emo ' kato ' pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Surusiran po e ' tʉrawasomato ' e ' to ' pe wakʉ ton mɨrɨ yawon kon nanʉmʉnʉ pe .

text: That I may come unto you with joy by the will of God , and may with you be refreshed .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai si Papa eseru pe iyesi pɨ ' uye ' to ' pe ɨpiya ' nokon pori ' pe ɨpokon pe e ' se ' na .

text: Now the God of peace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Papa , usewankaman nɨto ' pʉn nɨ nesii tanporo ɨpiyau ' nokon . Amen .

text: I commend unto you Phebe our sister , which is a servant of the church which is at Cenchrea :
text2: Ɨpɨ ' nokon ina parusi Pepi ekama uya , so ' si Senkʉre yawon poitorʉ pe te ' sen .

text: That ye receive her in the Lord , as becometh saints , and that ye assist her in whatsoever business she hath need of you : for she hath been a succourer of many , and of myself also .
text2: Ɨyekama ' po uya ' nokon Itepuru awɨrɨ anʉmʉ kon pa wakʉ ton anʉnto ' eseru yau mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨ ' rɨ rɨ i ' se iye ' to ' ɨwinɨpaino kon ke ipika ' tɨtɨ ' , apʉne pʉra eke pe rɨ tu ' kan kon nɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' pika ' tɨnin kʉrɨ rɨ , urɨ rɨ to ' tonpa pe .

text: Greet Priscilla and Aquila my helpers in Christ Jesus :
text2: Miyarɨ ka ' tɨ ' Pʉre ' sira mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ A ' kira pɨ ' , e ' tʉrawasoma Kʉrai Sises yau tonpa ton pɨ ' .

text: Who have for my life laid down their own necks : unto whom not only I give thanks , but also all the churches of the Gentiles .
text2: Tʉuma ' tato ' kon annau rɨ upika ' tɨ ' pʉ to ' uya . Urɨ rɨken pen e ' tane tanporon nɨ so ' si ton Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen iwano ' ton esi pori ' pe to ' pɨ ' .

text: Likewise greet the church that is in their house . Salute my wellbeloved Epaenetus , who is the firstfruits of Achaia unto Christ .
text2: Miyarɨ ka ' tɨ ' rɨ marɨ so ' si to ' iwʉ ' tau tamʉrasan pɨ ' . Miyarɨ ka ' tɨ ' utonpa rʉ ' kwɨ Epene ' tos pɨ ' , wapiya kuru iyera ' tɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ Kʉrai winɨkʉi ' Eisa nono po .

text: Greet Mary , who bestowed much labour on us .
text2: Miyarɨ ka ' tɨ ' Meri pɨ ' , sa ' man pe kuru ɨiwano ' kon pe iye ' tʉrawasomasa ' rʉ ' pʉ .

text: Salute Andronicus and Junia , my kinsmen , and my fellowprisoners , who are of note among the apostles , who also were in Christ before me .
text2: Miyarɨ ka ' tɨ ' Antʉroni ' kas mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Isuniyas , utonpa ton , upokon pe pariki ' si tau iye ' sa ' kon . Eke ton pe kuru itekare ekamai ' enno ' sa ' kon koro ' tau te ' san kamoro , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ urawɨrɨ Kʉrai yau to ' esi ' pʉ .

text: Greet Amplias my beloved in the Lord .
text2: Miyarɨ ka ' tɨ ' Anpʉriya ' tas pɨ ' , Itepuru yau uni ' nʉnkanʉ .

text: Salute Urbane , our helper in Christ , and Stachys my beloved .
text2: Miyarɨ ka ' tɨ ' Orʉpanos pɨ ' , Kʉrai yau e ' tʉrawasoman tonpa , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ utonpa rʉ ' kwɨ Sʉ ' ta ' kes .

text: Salute Apelles approved in Christ . Salute them which are of Aristobulus ' household .
text2: Miyarɨ ka ' tɨ ' A ' peres pɨ ' , wakʉ ye ' pe Kʉrai yau i ' tusa ' . Miyarɨ ka ' tɨ ' Arestoporos tonpa ton pɨ ' .

text: Salute Herodion my kinsman . Greet them that be of the household of Narcissus , which are in the Lord .
text2: Miyarɨ ka ' tɨ ' utonpa , Esuwerʉ pe te ' sen Eratiyan pɨ ' . Miyarɨ ka ' tɨ ' Narʉsisas amʉtʉ pe te ' san pɨ ' , Itepuru yawon kon .

text: Salute Tryphena and Tryphosa , who labour in the Lord . Salute the beloved Persis , which laboured much in the Lord .
text2: Miyarɨ ka ' tɨ ' Tʉrai ' pina mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Tʉrai ' posa pɨ ' , kamoro uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' sa ' man pe rɨ te ' tʉrawasomasan Itepuru apiyo ' pe . Miyarɨ ka ' tɨ ' utonpa rʉ ' kwɨ Pɨrʉses pɨ ' , kʉrɨ rɨ kanan uri ' san sa ' man pe kuru rɨ iye ' tʉrawasomasa ' Itepuru apiyo ' pe .

text: Salute Rufus chosen in the Lord , and his mother and mine .
text2: Miyarɨ ka ' tɨ ' Ru ' pos pɨ ' , anʉnsa ' Itepuru iwano ' pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ isan , usan pe rɨ kanan iye ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ .

text: Salute Asyncritus , Phlegon , Hermas , Patrobas , Hermes , and the brethren which are with them .
text2: Miyarɨ ka ' tɨ ' Asenkʉri ' tas , Pʉrekon , Ɨrʉmes , Pa ' tʉropas , Ɨrʉmas mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tonpa ton amʉ ' , to ' piyau na ' ne ' nan pɨ ' .

text: Salute Philologus , and Julia , Nereus , and his sister , and Olympas , and all the saints which are with them .
text2: Miyarɨ ka ' tɨ ' Pirorokas , Isuriya , Nereyas mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iparusi , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Orenpas mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporo wakʉ ton to ' piyau na ' ne ' nan .

text: Salute one another with an holy kiss . The churches of Christ salute you .
text2: Miyarɨ ka ' tɨ ' ɨsipokon pe wakʉ eseru yau auta ' su ' ka kon pe . Tanporon Kʉrai so ' sii ton miyarɨ nɨkayan .

text: Now I beseech you , brethren , mark them which cause divisions and offences contrary to the doctrine which ye have learned ; and avoid them .
text2: Ɨyekama ' po uya ' nokon kuru , utonpa ton , kamo e ' ta ' nʉ ' nɨ emapu ' tɨnin nan enei ' ma ɨwesi kon pa mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨye ' mata ' nokon awa ' kʉ ' nin kon tʉnin nan . To ' nʉkupʉnʉ esi ɨusenupa ' pʉ kon ipɨ ' kasa pʉra rɨ . To ' piyau ke ' tʉu .

text: For they that are such serve not our Lord Jesus Christ , but their own belly ; and by good words and fair speeches deceive the hearts of the simple .
text2: Apʉne pʉra pʉsamoro rupɨ esi uyepuru kon Kʉrai apiyo ' pe pʉra , e ' tane tiwano ' kon nɨ . Wakʉ pe kuru rɨ tʉusaurokʉ kon ke , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ennakan nɨto ' ike ke entu ' ma ' rɨ te ' san ka ' pon amʉ ' enku ' tɨ to ' uya .

text: For your obedience is come abroad unto all men . I am glad therefore on your behalf : but yet I would have you wise unto that which is good , and simple concerning evil .
text2: Tanporon kon uya rɨ main awɨrɨ ɨwe ' to ' kon etasa ' man , mɨrɨ wenai ipan pe rɨ pori ' pe e ' ai ' ɨpɨ ' nokon ; e ' tane wakʉ pe te ' sen ti ' tui ' ɨwesi kon i ' se e ' ai ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨri ku ' nin nan ye ' pe pʉra .

text: And the God of peace shall bruise Satan under your feet shortly . The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you . Amen .
text2: Papa usewankaman nɨto ' pʉn nɨ uya Se ' tan amo ' korokʉ mɨrɨ a ' ta kon o ' no . Uyepuru kon Sises uya wakʉ nonkasa ' nesii ɨpiyau ' nokon .

text: Timotheus my workfellow , and Lucius , and Jason , and Sosipater , my kinsmen , salute you .
text2: Temu ' ti , e ' tʉrawasoma tonpa man miyarɨ ta pɨ ' ɨpɨ ' nokon , Rusiyas rɨ , Ise ' sʉn mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ So ' sipa ' tɨrʉ , utonpa ton .

text: I Tertius , who wrote this epistle , salute you in the Lord .
text2: Urɨ , Tɨrʉ ' tiyas , kareta menukanin nʉ ' pʉ , miyarɨ nɨkayan ɨpɨ ' nokon Itepuru yau .

text: Gaius mine host , and of the whole church , saluteth you . Erastus the chamberlain of the city saluteth you , and Quartus a brother .
text2: Kayas , tewakiri kon pe urɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporo rɨ so ' si na ' ne ' serɨ yau itiwʉ ' tau te ' san miyarɨ nɨkayan ɨpɨ ' nokon . Erastas , eke pata pʉrataai esa ' pe te ' sen , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ utonpa kon Kuwarʉ ' tas miyarɨ nɨkayan ɨpɨ ' nokon .

text: Now to him that is of power to stablish you according to my gospel , and the preaching of Jesus Christ , according to the revelation of the mystery , which was kept secret since the world began ,
