text2: Apurɨpɨ ' to ' tʉpai ' nokon Papa ena ' ! Pana ' pe ɨye ' mʉ ' sa ' ka kon apurɨ auya ' nokon yau kupʉ iya , wakʉ itekare sekamayai ' ne ' kasa rɨ , itekare Sises Kʉrai pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ama ' aino i ' nairon onansa ' rʉ ' pʉ pena rɨ usenpoikasa ' na ' ne ' kasa rɨ .

text: But now is made manifest , and by the scriptures of the prophets , according to the commandment of the everlasting God , made known to all nations for the obedience of faith :
text2: E ' tane nin si isenpoikasa ' pu ' kena ' amʉ ' nʉmenuka ' pʉ awɨrɨ Papa tɨwɨ rɨ tʉuko ' mansen uya apiyontɨn awɨrɨ , tanporo tʉpataron kon uya tapurɨto ' pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉmaimu awɨrɨ to ' e ' to ' pe .

text: To God only wise , be glory through Jesus Christ for ever . Amen .
text2: Papa rɨken ta ' kwarʉ kenan iwano ' pe eke pe iku ' to ' nesii tɨwɨrɨ rɨ Sises Kʉrai poro ! Amen .

text: Be ye followers of me , even as I also am of Christ .
text2: Paarʉ , esa ' sa ' Sises Kʉrai nennokonʉ pe , Papa eseru winɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ utonpa kon Sostenes winɨpaino ,

text: Now I praise you , brethren , that ye remember me in all things , and keep the ordinances , as I delivered them to you .
text2: Papa so ' sii , Koren pon enakan , kamoro Kʉrai Sises winɨ iyekonekasa ' kon wakʉ pe te ' ton kon pe , kamoro mɨ awɨrɨ na ' ne ' nan amʉtʉ pe esii ' ma Sises Kʉrai , uyepuru kon esakʉ pɨ ' na ' ne ' nan , to ' epuru mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uyepuru kon nɨ nɨrɨ :

text: But I would have you know , that the head of every man is Christ ; and the head of the woman is the man ; and the head of Christ is God .
text2: Wakʉ nonkasa ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉusewankamai ' pʉra ɨwe ' to ' kon Papa , ukʉipʉnʉ kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Itepuru Sises Kʉrai winon nesii ɨyenau ' nokon .

text: Every man praying or prophesying , having his head covered , dishonoureth his head .
text2: Tɨwɨrɨ rɨ Papa pɨ ' tenki tawon urɨ ɨpɨ ' nokon , apʉne pʉra wakʉ nonkasa ' iya pɨ ' ɨpona ' nokon , Sises Kʉrai awɨrɨ .

text: But every woman that prayeth or prophesieth with her head uncovered dishonoureth her head : for that is even all one as if she were shaven .
text2: Apʉne pʉra kʉrɨ rɨ awɨrɨ eke pe rɨ eposa ' auya ' nokon tanporon yau rɨ — ausauro ' to ' kon yau , i ' tunin pe ɨwe ' to ' kon yau —

text: For if the woman be not covered , let her also be shorn : but if it be a shame for a woman to be shorn or shaven , let her be covered .
text2: apʉne pʉra Sises Kʉrai ekamato ' ina uya esi ' pʉ meruntɨ pe ayau ' nokon .

text: For a man indeed ought not to cover his head , forasmuch as he is the image and glory of God : but the woman is the glory of the man .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , ɨ ' rɨ rɨ Iya ' kwarʉ uya ɨyemeporʉ ' tɨto ' kon temeporʉ ke pʉra ɨwesi kon pen nɨ ɨnenpai kuru ɨyenurikʉ kon koro ' tau Sises Kʉrai usenpoika .

text: For the man is not of the woman ; but the woman of the man .
text2: Pana ' pe rɨ ɨyenkurunpa kon Uyepuru kon Sises Kʉrai uya mɨrɨ iu ' matʉ pona rɨ , imakooi pʉra ɨwesi kon pa tʉweyu a ' tai .

text: Neither was the man created for the woman ; but the woman for the man .
text2: Papa , tʉmu , Sises Kʉrai pokon pe ɨwesi kon pa ɨkɨ ' manin nʉ ' pʉ kon esi , tʉusaurokʉ ' pʉ awɨron pe .

text: For this cause ought the woman to have power on her head because of the angels .
text2: Ɨyekama ' po uya ' nokon kuru rɨ , utonpa ton , Uyepuru kon Sises Kʉrai ese ' yau , ɨsi ' kaisa rɨ ɨyeseru kon e ' to ' pe , ɨye ' ta ' nʉ ' pɨtʉ kon namai ' , wakʉ pe kuru rɨ auta ' sisa ' kon ɨsipona e ' to ' pe aya ' kwarʉ kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨusenuminkato ' kon yau .

text: Nevertheless neither is the man without the woman , neither the woman without the man , in the Lord .
text2: Utonpa ton , Kʉroi tonpa ton uya upana ' tɨsa ' man ɨsipɨ ' ɨwe ' pɨ ' to ' kon pɨ ' ɨsiwano ' pe .

text: For as the woman is of the man , even so is the man also by the woman ; but all things of god .
text2: Se pɨ ' sa ' ne ta uya : Tʉron nɨ uya , “ Paarʉ a ' kɨron nin urɨ ; ” tʉron nɨ , “ A ' poros a ' kɨron nin urɨ ; ” tʉron nɨ , “ Ke ' pas a ' kɨron nin urɨ ; ” tʉron nɨ nɨrɨ kanan , “ Kʉrai a ' kɨron nin urɨ , ” ta pɨ ' .

text: Judge in yourselves : is it comely that a woman pray unto God uncovered ?
text2: Kʉrai pe ' e ' ta ' nʉ ' sa ' ? Paarʉ pe ' pokapɨtʉ ' pʉ kurusu ' pona ɨiwano ' kon pe ? Ɨyepa ' taisima ' pʉ kon pe ' Paarʉ ese ' ya ' ?

text: Doth not even nature itself teach you , that , if a man have long hair , it is a shame unto him ?
text2: Epori ' mayai ' apa ' taisimasa ' uya ' nokon pʉra iyesi pɨ ' , Kʉrispos mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Kayas rɨken ,

text: But if a woman have long hair , it is a glory to her : for her hair is given her for a covering .
text2: ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ nin si uyese ' yau tepa ' taisimasa ' ta pʉra iyesi mɨrɨ .

text: But if any man seem to be contentious , we have no such custom , neither the churches of God .
text2: ( Ewai ' , Sitipanas pokon nɨ nɨrɨ kenʉ ' pa ' taisima ' pʉ uya man ; tʉron kon nin si pa ' taisima ' pʉ uya pʉra kuru man uyenu yau . )

text: Now in this that I declare unto you I praise you not , that ye come together not for the better , but for the worse .
text2: Kʉrai uya sa ' ne pa ' taisiman nɨse ' na uyenno ' sa ' pʉra iyesi , e ' tane wakʉ itekare ekamai ' — ka ' pon pu ' ketʉ maimu yai pʉra , Kʉrai kurusukuui e ' meruntɨrʉʉi ' ka namai ' .

text: For first of all , when ye come together in the church , I hear that there be divisions among you ; and I partly believe it .
text2: Apʉne pʉra kurusu ' ekareei esi se pe rɨ kamoro tʉuma ' tasan pona , e ' tane urɨ ' nokon iyepika ' tɨsa ' kon pona Papa meruntɨrʉ pe iyesi .

text: For there must be also heresies among you , that they which are approved may be made manifest among you .
text2: Apʉne pʉra iye ' menukasa ' : “ Pu ' kena ' ton pu ' ketʉ ma ' tanʉkʉ uya mɨrɨ ; emiya ' poke ' ton emeporʉ eno ' ma uya mɨrɨ , ” tasa ' iya .

text: When ye come together therefore into one place , this is not to eat the Lord ' s supper .
text2: Nai airɨ ken si pu ' kena ' nai ? Nai airɨ ken si isenupasa ' nai ? Nai airɨ ken si serɨ a ' taino kon pata eseru pɨ ' tʉusauro ' san nai ? Papa uya pe ' se pe te ' sen konekasa ' pʉra nai pata pu ' ketʉ pe ?

text: For in eating every one taketh before other his own supper : and one is hungry , and another is drunken .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Papa pu ' ketʉ yau , pata uya tʉpu ' ketʉ yau i ' tusa ' pʉra iyesi , Papa epori ' ma ' pʉ se pe te ' sen itekare ina nekamanʉ poro kamoro apurɨnin nan epika ' tɨto ' pe .

text: What ? have ye not houses to eat and to drink in ? or despise ye the church of God , and shame them that have not ? What shall I say to you ? shall I praise you in this ? I praise you not .
text2: Esuwerʉ amʉ ' esi i ' tuto ' ipɨkɨrɨ e ' kupʉ ɨnenpai , Kiri ' amʉ ' esi ipu ' ketʉ ɨnenpai ,

text: For I have received of the Lord that which also I delivered unto you , That the Lord Jesus the same night in which he was betrayed took bread :
text2: e ' tane Kʉrai pokapɨtʉ ' pʉ kurusu ' pona ekama ina uya : Esuwerʉ amʉ ' e ' pi ' popɨ ' to ' ipona , iya ' kwarʉ pʉra Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen pona te ' sen ,

text: And when he had given thanks , he brake it , and said , Take , eat : this is my body , which is broken for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: e ' tane kamoro Papa nʉkɨ ' ma ' san , asa ' rɨ rɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Kiri ' amʉ ' pona , Kʉrai esi Papa meruntɨrʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa pu ' ketʉ pe .

text: After the same manner also he took the cup , when he had supped , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood : this do ye , as oft as ye drink it , in remembrance of me .
text2: Papa e ' to ' iya ' kwarʉ pʉra esi ka ' pon pu ' ketʉʉi entai ipu ' ketʉ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa e ' to ' ɨ ' sɨ ' mʉra esi pana ' pe ka ' pon meruntɨrʉ entai .

text: For as often as ye eat this bread , and drink this cup , ye do shew the Lord ' s death till he come .
text2: Utonpa ton , ɨsenuminkatɨ ' ɨkɨ ' ma kon a ' tai ɨwesi ' pʉ kon nʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' . Tu ' ke pʉra rɨ ɨwesi ' pʉ kon pu ' kena ' pe ka ' pon eseru yau , eke ton pe , eke ton mʉre pe iyentusa ' kon pe .

text: Wherefore whosoever shall eat this bread , and drink this cup of the Lord , unworthily , shall be guilty of the body and blood of the Lord .
text2: E ' tane Papa uya iya ' kwarʉ pʉra te ' san non po anʉnsa ' ta ' kwarʉkena ' nan piyɨ ' nʉ ' nin pe , Papa uya ɨ ' sɨ ' mʉnon anʉnsa ' pana ' pa ' nan piyɨ ' nʉ ' nin pe .

text: But let a man examine himself , and so let him eat of that bread , and drink of that cup .
text2: Non enu yawon pen nɨ anʉnsa ' iya mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eno ' masa ' rɨ , ipʉn nɨ , moro te ' sen ma ' tanʉ ' to ' pe tʉuya ,

text: For he that eateth and drinketh unworthily , eateth and drinketh damnation to himself , not discerning the Lord ' s body .
text2: ɨnʉ ' rɨ utapurɨ namai ' tʉrau .

text: For this cause many are weak and sickly among you , and many sleep .
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ uriya ' Kʉrai Sises yau ɨwesi kon mɨrɨ , iyekonekasa ' rʉ ' pʉ upu ' ketʉ kon pe Papa winon pe — iyawɨron pe , wakʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uye ' manin kon pe .

text: For if we would judge ourselves , we should not be judged .
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai , iye ' menukasa ' na ' ne ' kasa : “ Tɨwɨ atapurɨpaino nʉtapurɨi Itepuru yau , ” tasa ' .

text: Now concerning spiritual gifts , brethren , I would not have you ignorant .
text2: Utonpa ton , ɨpiya ' nokon uye ' taine ' a ' tai , eke pe rɨ ika ' nɨ pe rɨ , pu ' kena ' pe rɨ Papa ekareei ekamai ' uyepʉ pʉn .

text: Ye know that ye were Gentiles , carried away unto these dumb idols , even as ye were led .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ i ' tunin pe pʉra rɨ e ' kupʉ ' pʉ , ɨpiyau ' nokon esii ' ma , Sises Kʉrai pokapɨtʉ ' pʉ rɨken kurusu ' pona .

text: Wherefore I give you to understand , that no man speaking by the Spirit of God calleth Jesus accursed : and that no man can say that Jesus is the Lord , but by the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ɨ ' sɨ ' mʉra rɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ enari ' ke ' pe rɨ e ' tɨtɨtɨ ' kai ' ma rɨ uyee ' pʉ ɨpiya ' nokon .

text: Now there are diversities of gifts , but the same Spirit .
text2: Uyekareei mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ekamato ' uya esi ' pʉ mɨrɨ eke pe ika ' nɨ pe pʉra rɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ apurɨnin pe ɨku ' nin kon pe pʉra rɨ , e ' tane Iya ' kwarʉ meruntɨrʉ rɨ nin usenpoika ' pʉ ,

text: And there are differences of administrations , but the same Lord .
text2: anapurɨnʉ esi namai ' ka ' pon pu ' ketʉ pɨ ' rɨ , e ' tane Papa meruntɨrʉ pɨ ' .

text: And there are diversities of operations , but it is the same God which worketh all in all .
text2: Mɨrɨ rɨ nin si e ' tane , ipu ' ketʉ ekareei ekama iyakʉ ' pʉsa ' kon koro ' tau , serɨ a ' taino kon pu ' ketʉ pen , mɨrɨ pe pʉra serɨ a ' taino kon epuru ton pu ' ketʉ pen , ipʉra enan pɨ ' na ' ne ' nan .

text: But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal .
text2: Usauro ' nɨ ' nokon serɨ ama ' aino Papa pu ' ketʉ pɨ ' , ipu ' ketʉ tonan tau iye ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ , uiwano ' kon a ' kwa pe Papa nʉkupʉ ' pʉ pata epiya ' tɨ rawɨrɨ rɨ .

text: For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom ; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit ;
text2: Serɨ a ' taino kon epuru ton uya ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ pen nɨ , to ' uya ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ yau , to ' a ' kwa Epuru pokapɨtʉi ' no pen kurusu ' pona .

text: To another faith by the same Spirit ; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit ;
text2: Mɨrɨ rɨ nin si e ' tane , iye ' menukasa ' na ' ne ' kasa : “ En nene ' pʉ pen nɨ , pana neta ' pʉ pen nɨ , usenuminkan nɨto ' ipɨ ' pen nɨ , Papa nʉkoneka ' pʉ kamoro ti ' nʉnkanin nan iwano ' pe rɨ esi , ” tasa ' iya .

text: To another the working of miracles ; to another prophecy ; to another discerning of spirits ; to another divers kinds of tongues ; to another the interpretation of tongues :
text2: E ' tane si Papa uya enpoikasa ' uyena ' nokon ta ' kwarʉ winɨ . Iya ' kwarʉ esi tanporon nɨ warinpanin , i ' nawon ton kuru rɨ Papa eseru pe te ' sen ton .

text: But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit , dividing to every man severally as he will .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' ken ka ' pon nai ka ' pon usenuminkato ' i ' tunin , iya ' kwarʉ rɨ nin tɨ iyawon nɨ ? Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ , ɨnʉ ' uya Papa usenuminkato ' i ' tu pʉra rɨ iyesi , Papa A ' kwarʉ uya rɨ nin i ' tu .

text: For as the body is one , and hath many members , and all the members of that one body , being many , are one body : so also is Christ .
text2: Non a ' kwarʉ eposa ' uya ' nokon pʉra iyesi , e ' tane iya ' kwarʉ Papa winɨpaino , ito ' ka ' nʉ ' to ' kon pe Papa uya urepa ' pʉ kon ike .

text: For by one Spirit are we all baptized into one body , whether we be Jews or Gentiles , whether we be bond or free ; and have been all made to drink into one Spirit .
text2: Serɨ pɨ ' si usauro ' nɨ ' nokon , ka ' pon pu ' ketʉ ke , isenupasa ' kon maimu ke pen , e ' tane main , Iya ' kwarʉ uya enupan nɨsa ' yai , iya ' kwarʉ yawon i ' napairon ekama pɨ ' iya ' kwarʉ maimu yau .

text: For the body is not one member , but many .
text2: Iya ' kwarʉ yawon pen ka ' pon uya Papa A ' kwarʉ winɨ teposen eporo pʉra rɨ iyesi , apʉne pʉra iya ' kwarʉ pʉra rɨ iyesi ipona , mɨrɨ ton to ' ka ' nʉkʉ iya pʉra rɨ iyesi , apʉne pʉra Iya ' kwarʉ yau rɨken ti ' tusen pe iyesi .

text: If the foot shall say , Because I am not the hand , I am not of the body ; is it therefore not of the body ?
text2: Papa A ' kwarʉ yen pe te ' sen ka ' pon uya rɨ tanporon nɨ aimenka , e ' tane ɨnʉ ' uya nin iteseru aimenkato ' pe pʉra iyesi :

text: And if the ear shall say , Because I am not the eye , I am not of the body ; is it therefore not of the body ?
text2: “ Ɨnʉ ' uya Itepuru usenuminkato ' i ' tu , enupato ' pe tʉuya ? ” ta iya . Urɨ ' nokon nin man tɨ Kʉrai usenuminkato ' esa ' pe .

text: Though I speak with the tongues of men and of angels , and have not charity , I am become as sounding brass , or a tinkling cymbal .
text2: Utonpa ton , ta ' kwarʉ kenan kon auro ' ka kasa ayauro ' kato ' uya ' nokon pʉra iyesi , e ' tane serɨ non pon kon pe rɨ nin ayauro ' ka uya ' nokon , amiyu amʉ ' pe rɨ Kʉrai pona .

text: And though I have the gift of prophecy , and understand all mysteries , and all knowledge ; and though I have all faith , so that I could remove mountains , and have not charity , I am nothing .
text2: Merʉ ' ke ɨwo ' pa ' pʉ uya ' nokon , sa ' man kiyari ke ɨrepa ' pʉ uya ' nokon pen , apʉne pʉra ɨyekonekasa ' kon pʉra iyesi pɨ ' , itiwano ' pe . I ' napairɨ rɨ , ɨyekonekasa ' kon pʉra rɨ marɨ iyesi .

text: And though I bestow all my goods to feed the poor , and though I give my body to be burned , and have not charity , it profiteth me nothing .
text2: Non pon kon pe rɨ marɨ ɨwesi kon . Apʉne pʉra moro rɨ ɨkɨntan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨsipɨ ' e ' nɨ esi pɨ ' ɨ ' koro ' tau ' nokon , non pon kon pe pʉra pe ' me ' atʉu ? Ka ' pon amʉ ' Papa pʉnon kon e ' to ' kasa pʉra pe ' me ' atʉu ?

text: Charity suffereth long , and is kind ; charity envieth not ; charity vaunteth not itself , is not puffed up ,
text2: Apʉne pʉra tʉron nɨ uya , “ Paarʉ a ' kɨron nin urɨ , ” ta ; tʉron nɨ uya , “ A ' poros a ' kɨron nin urɨ , ” ta ; ka ' pon amʉ ' pe pʉra pe ' me ' atʉu ?

text: Doth not behave itself unseemly , seeketh not her own , is not easily provoked , thinketh no evil ;
text2: Ɨnʉ ' kʉrɨ A ' poros ? Ɨnʉ ' kʉrɨ Paarʉ ? Poitorʉ ton nɨ nin , kamoro poro apurɨnin nan pe ɨyenasa ' kon — Itepuru uya to ' poirɨ ' ne to ' tʉrawasoi ' tɨpɨ ' sa ' awɨrɨ .

text: Rejoiceth not in iniquity , but rejoiceth in the truth ;
text2: Ite ' pɨmɨ uya , A ' poros uya nin si inanʉkʉ mɨrɨ , e ' tane Papa uya nin si a ' tanʉkʉ mɨrɨ .

text: Beareth all things , believeth all things , hopeth all things , endureth all things .
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai , kʉrɨ ipɨnnin mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kʉrɨ inanʉ ' nin esi mɨrɨ ɨ ' rɨ pan pe pʉra rɨ , e ' tane Papa rɨken ɨ ' rɨ rɨ a ' tanʉ ' nin .

text: Charity never faileth : but whether there be prophecies , they shall fail ; whether there be tongues , they shall cease ; whether there be knowledge , it shall vanish away .
text2: Ka ' pon ipɨnnin mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' pon inanʉ ' nin esi mɨrɨ tʉpona rɨ ' ne pʉra rɨ , mɨrɨpan kon e ' mato ' oton esi mɨrɨ itʉrawasooi rʉ ' pʉ pɨkɨrɨ rɨ .

text: For we know in part , and we prophesy in part .
text2: Ina esi Papa tʉrawasooi ku ' nin nan pe a ' samʉtʉ yau , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon esi Papa mainarʉ ton pe , Papa namɨnʉ ɨutɨ pe rɨ nɨrɨ .

text: But when that which is perfect is come , then that which is in part shall be done away .
text2: Wakʉ nonkasa ' ke Papa uya urepasa ' na ' ne ' ke , iyapon nonka uya isenupasa ' kuru ɨutɨ amɨnin ye ' pe , mɨrɨpan po tʉron kon amɨnin nan uya amɨto ' pe . E ' tane nin si tɨ ti ' tui ' kuru to ' uya amɨto ' pe iyesi tʉnamɨnʉ kon .

text: When I was a child , I spake as a child , I understood as a child , I thought as a child : but when I became a man , I put away childish things .
text2: Apʉne pʉra ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ tʉron nɨ iyapon nonka poken pʉra iyesi inonkasa ' na ' ne ' Sises Kʉrai , enta ' .

text: For now we see through a glass , darkly ; but then face to face : now I know in part ; but then shall I know even as also I am known .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ amɨ pe iyesi yau , serɨ iyapon po , korʉ ke rɨ , sirʉpa ke rɨ , epe ' kena ' ton nɨ tɨ ' amʉ ' ke , yʉi ke , iyaipʉtasa ' wana ' ke ,

text: And now abideth faith , hope , charity , these three ; but the greatest of these is charity .
text2: itʉrawasooi rʉ ' pʉ usenpoika mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ pe iyesi tukai ' , apʉne pʉra Iweyu uya inepʉ mɨrɨ a ' kwa ya ' . Apo ' uya enpoika mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ apo ' uya i ' tu mɨrɨ wakʉ pe to ' tʉrawasooi rʉ ' pʉ esi ento ' pe .

text: Follow after charity , and desire spiritual gifts , but rather that ye may prophesy .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' , ka ' pon amʉ ' uya i ' tuto ' pe iyesi ina esi Kʉrai poitorʉ ton pe , kamoro ama ' aino Papa iwano ' pe te ' sen esanon pe .

text: For he that speaketh in an unknown tongue speaketh not unto men , but unto God : for no man understandeth him ; howbeit in the spirit he speaketh mysteries .
text2: Esa ' sa ' pe iyesi kamoro itena ' inonkasa ' pe na ' ne ' nan e ' to ' pe iyesi tʉusaurokʉ ' pʉ kon iyawɨron kon pe .

text: But he that prophesieth speaketh unto men to edification , and exhortation , and comfort .
text2: E ' namato ' pʉra man uyeseru aimenka auya ' nokon yau , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ka ' pon amʉ ' uya rɨ ko ' tʉ yau ukupʉ yau ; i ' napai rɨ uiwano ' pe rɨ uyeseru aimenka uya pʉra iyesi .

text: He that speaketh in an unknown tongue edifieth himself ; but he that prophesieth edifieth the church .
text2: Uyewan nɨ man wakʉ pe , e ' tane mɨrɨ uya ɨri ku ' nin nʉ ' pʉ pe pʉra ukupʉ pʉra iyesi . Itepuru kuru kʉrɨ rɨ uyeseru aimenkanin .

text: I would that ye all spake with tongues , but rather that ye prophesied : for greater is he that prophesieth than he that speaketh with tongues , except he interpret , that the church may receive edifying .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , ɨ ' rɨ rɨ eseru kʉsaimenkatʉu iweyu rawɨrɨ rɨ ; apʉne rɨ e ' tɨ ' Itepuru uyepʉ pona rɨ . Onansa ' pe rɨ ewarupɨ yau te ' sen enpoikanin a ' kwa ya ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' ewan yawon nɨ enpoika iya . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , tʉkaisarɨ ' nokon tapurɨpɨ ' to ' kon eporo to ' uya Papa winɨ .

text: Now , brethren , if I come unto you speaking with tongues , what shall I profit you , except I shall speak to you either by revelation , or by knowledge , or by prophesying , or by doctrine ?
text2: Utonpa ton , serɨ ton ku ' sa ' uya ina pɨ ' , urɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ A ' poros , ɨiwano ' kon pe , ɨusenupa kon pa ina winɨ , ɨ ' rɨ ta e ' kwa pe se tawon esi , “ Imenukasa ' na ' ne ' enta ' kɨtɨtʉu , ” tawon . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , tikin nan apurɨ auya ' nokon namai ' isakon entai .

text: And even things without life giving sound , whether pipe or harp , except they give a distinction in the sounds , how shall it be known what is piped or harped ?
text2: Ɨnʉ ' uya ɨkonekasa ' kon tʉron nɨ pe , tʉron kon kasa pʉra ? Ɨ ' rɨ nai moro ɨpiyau ' nokon ɨneporo ' pʉ kon pen ? Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ si , eposa ' auya ' nokon pe si iyesi yau , ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' ken si autapurɨ kon eponin nʉ ' san pen kasa ?

text: For if the trumpet give an uncertain sound , who shall prepare himself to the battle ?
text2: Epoka ' sa ' auya ' nokon nɨ sa ' ne tanporo i ' se ɨwe ' to ' kon ta auya ' nokon ! Tanporon esa ' pe rɨ ɨyenaka ' sa ' kon ta auya ' nokon ! Kin pe rɨ ɨyenapɨ ' ka ' sa ' kon ina a ' kɨrɨ pʉra rɨ ta auya ' nokon ! Kin pe kuru rɨ ɨyenapɨ ' sa ' kon i ' se e ' ai ' , ɨpokon pe ina e ' to ' pe kin pe !

text: So likewise ye , except ye utter by the tongue words easy to be understood , how shall it be known what is spoken ? for ye shall speak into the air .
text2: Upona rɨ nin iyesi Papa uya ina itekare ekamai ' enno ' sa ' kon tʉsa ' tensan pe tʉutɨsan a ' mu yawon kon kasa , ka ' pon amʉ ' iyeri ' to ' pe eno ' masa ' kon kasa Roman amʉ ' usennakato ' pata ' se ' ya ' . Mɨ yawɨron kon nɨ , inserʉ amʉ ' rɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' rɨ nenpɨtʉnʉ pe ina ku ' sa ' .

text: There are , it may be , so many kinds of voices in the world , and none of them is without signification .
text2: Iya ' kwarʉ pʉnon kon pe ina esi Kʉrai iwano ' pe , e ' tane si ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon esi pu ' kena ' pe Kʉrai awɨrɨ . Ɨ ' sɨ ' mʉra ina esi , e ' tane ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon esi pana ' pe ! Tʉnamasan pe ɨwesi kon , ina esi tʉnamasan pe pʉra !

text: Therefore if I know not the meaning of the voice , I shall be unto him that speaketh a barbarian , and he that speaketh shall be a barbarian unto me .
text2: Serɨ iweyu pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ ina esi iwan pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tuna ' kiri ' ke , ipooi ' pɨ rɨ esi ina pon pe , tʉwɨpɨ ' san pe rɨ ina esi , ipata pʉra rɨ ina esi .

text: Even so ye , forasmuch as ye are zealous of spiritual gifts , seek that ye may excel to the edifying of the church .
text2: Sa ' man pe kuru rɨ sa ' ne temiyatʉ kon ke ina e ' tʉrawasoma . Ina pa ' nʉkʉ a ' tai , ina uya tʉpa ' nʉ ' nin kon pʉrema ; ina kota ' ma a ' tai iwenai pʉra , ina uya rɨ imoronka ;

text: Wherefore let him that speaketh in an unknown tongue pray that he may interpret .
text2: ina pɨ ' ɨri pe usauro ' nɨ a ' tai , ina uya eikʉ ɨ ' sɨ ' mʉn yai . Serɨ pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ ina esi non neno ' ma ' pʉ pe rɨ , pata e ' to ' i ' se pe pʉra rɨ .

text: For if I pray in an unknown tongue , my spirit prayeth , but my understanding is unfruitful .
text2: Ɨpiyɨ ' nʉ ' nin kon pe serɨ menuka uya pen , e ' tane apanama uya ' nokon , umunkɨ pe ɨwesi kon pɨ ' .

text: What is it then ? I will pray with the spirit , and I will pray with the understanding also : I will sing with the spirit , and I will sing with the understanding also .
text2: 10 , 000 kaisarɨ rɨ ɨyesanon kon e ' tane Kʉrai poro , tu ' ke pʉra ɨkʉipʉnʉ kon amʉ ' esi , Kʉrai poro ɨkʉipʉnʉ kon pe enasa ' wakʉ itekare poro .

text: Else when thou shalt bless with the spirit , how shall he that occupieth the room of the unlearned say Amen at thy giving of thanks , seeing he understandeth not what thou sayest ?
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , ɨyekama ' po uya ' nokon kuru unkupʉnʉ kupʉ kon pa .

text: For thou verily givest thanks well , but the other is not edified .
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai Temu ' ti ennoko uya serɨ ɨpiya ' nokon , umu uni ' nʉnkanʉ , usauro ' nɨsa ' awɨron Itepuru yau . Ɨyemiya ' pontɨ iya ' nokon mɨrɨ uko ' manto ' Sises Kʉrai yau eseru pɨ ' , enupan nɨto ' uya poron nɨ mɨ awɨrɨ rɨ so ' si kaisa rɨ .

text: I thank my God , I speak with tongues more than ye all :
text2: Mɨ pe te ' ku ' san pe ɨtonpa kon amʉ ' enasa ' man , ɨpiya ' nokon utɨto ' oton pe pʉra tekamai ' .

text: Yet in the church I had rather speak five words with my understanding , that by my voice I might teach others also , than ten thousand words in an unknown tongue .
text2: E ' tane utɨto ' oton mɨrɨ ɨpiya ' nokon serɨ pe ' ne kuru rɨ , ewai ' pe Papa esi yau ; mɨrɨ si i ' tu uya mɨrɨ pʉsamoro mɨ pe te ' ku ' san usauro ' to ' rɨken pen , e ' tane ɨ ' rɨ esi to ' pana ' pano pe tukai ' rɨ .

text: Brethren , be not children in understanding : howbeit in malice be ye children , but in understanding be men .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe esi usauro ' nɨ pe rɨken pen , e ' tane ipana ' pano .

text: In the law it is written , With men of other tongues and other lips will I speak unto this people ; and yet for all that will they not hear me , saith the Lord .
text2: Nai rupɨ i ' se me ' atʉu ? Ɨkota ' mai ' nokon pe ' utɨ i ' se me ' atʉu ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon tari ' po ' pɨ ' se , mɨrɨ pe pʉra usi ' nʉnkan pe , ɨ ' sɨ ' mʉn yaino pe katɨ iya ' kwarʉ ?

text: Moreover , brethren , I declare unto you the gospel which I preached unto you , which also ye have received , and wherein ye stand ;
text2: Isetasa ' man ekuman esi ɨ ' koro ' tau ' nokon tukai ' , ɨri kuru rɨ sa ' ne Papa i ' tunin nan pen koro ' tau te ' ku ' sen pen nɨ : ka ' pon esi tʉkʉipʉnʉ no ' pʉ tʉsanʉ ' tɨnin ya ' rɨ .

text: By which also ye are saved , if ye keep in memory what I preached unto you , unless ye have believed in vain .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' si mɨ pe ɨye ' kupʉ kon ! Ɨupokoitato ' kon ipɨ ' poken pʉra pe ' nai kʉrɨ rɨ pe ' ka ' pon serɨ ku ' nin nʉ ' pʉ enpa ' ka auya ' nokon poken pʉra nai ɨ ' koro ' tapai ' nokon ?

text: For I delivered unto you first of all that which I also received , how that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures ;
text2: Ipun pe ɨpiyau ' nokon e ' tane pʉra rɨ , iya ' kwarʉ pe esi ɨpiyau ' nokon . Kʉrɨ rɨ ka ' pon mɨrɨ ku ' nin nʉ ' pʉ pona eseru aimenkato ' nonkasa ' uya mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ yau esi kasa rɨ .

text: And that he was buried , and that he rose again the third day according to the scriptures :
text2: Ayamʉrasa ' kon a ' tai uyepuru kon Sises ese ' yau , urɨ ɨpiyau ' nokon iya ' kwarʉ yau , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uyepuru kon Sises meruntɨrʉ esi mɨrɨ yau ,

text: And that he was seen of Cephas , then of the twelve :
text2: pʉse rɨ ka ' pon itʉtɨ ' Se ' tan ena ' ipun uma ' tato ' pe , iya ' kwarʉ epika ' tɨto ' pe Itepuru weyu a ' tai .

text: After that , he was seen of above five hundred brethren at once ; of whom the greater part remain unto this present , but some are fallen asleep .
text2: Matapurɨyatʉi ' ne ' esi wakʉ pe pʉra . I ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra pe ' iyesi aiko rɨ a ' sarutanʉ ' nin e ' tʉrawasoma tanporo rɨ pʉrowa ki ' masa ' awɨrɨ ?

text: After that , he was seen of James ; then of all the apostles .
text2: Penaro ' rʉ ' pʉ a ' sarutanʉ ' nin eno ' matɨ ' , emenna ' iki ' masa ' pʉrowa pe ɨwesi kon pa a ' sarutanʉ ' nin a ' kɨrɨ pʉra — me ' atʉi ' ne ' pe kuru nin si , apʉne pʉra Kʉrai , urɨ ' nokon iwano ' To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ iwano ' karimeru mʉre , e ' wɨsa ' pɨ ' .

text: And last of all he was seen of me also , as of one born out of due time .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , To ' Epoi Itɨ ' pʉ Weyu Rʉ ' pʉ ku ' pai ' nokon , penaro ' a ' sarutanʉ ' nin ke pen , ɨri ɨsɨ pe e ' paino , ɨri iteseru pe e ' paino a ' sarutanʉ ' nin pen , e ' tane pʉreti a ' sarutanʉ ' nin a ' kɨron pen ke , pʉreti enku ' tɨnin pen , e ' tane i ' napairon ke .

text: For I am the least of the apostles , that am not meet to be called an apostle , because I persecuted the church of God .
text2: Ɨmenukasa ' uya ' nokon unennokonʉ ukaretaai yau tekumasan ka ' pon amʉ ' pokon pe ɨwesi kon namai ' .

text: But by the grace of God I am what I am : and his grace which was bestowed upon me was not in vain ; but I laboured more abundantly than they all : yet not I , but the grace of God which was with me .
text2: Serɨ non pon kon ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' ta uya pen , tʉtonpa kon no ' pʉ pokon kon , mentaino kon , tennakai ' ka ' pon rapumanin nan , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ika ' sa ' pɨ ' tʉwɨpʉremasan . Mɨrɨ pe iyesi yau , serɨ non nɨmɨ auya ' nokon mɨrɨ .

text: Therefore whether it were I or they , so we preach , and so ye believed .
text2: E ' tane ɨmenuka uya ' nokon , ɨtonpa kon pe te ' ku ' sen ɨnʉ ' rɨ , tekumasen mɨrɨ pe pʉra mentaino , ika ' sa ' pɨ ' tʉwɨpʉremasen , mɨrɨ pe pʉra tʉtonpa pɨ ' tʉusauro ' sen , te ' taripasen , mɨrɨ pe pʉra itepe ' pʉ pen nɨ esa ' nin , pokon pe ke ' tʉu . Pʉse rɨ rupɨ pokon pe rɨ kenta ' natʉu .

text: Now if Christ be preached that he rose from the dead , how say some among you that there is no resurrection of the dead ?
text2: Utʉrawasooi pe pe ' iyesi so ' si tawon kon pen eseru aimenkato ' pe uya ? Kamoro pe ' so ' si tawon kon eseru aimenkato ' auya pe pʉra iyesi ?

text: But if there be no resurrection of the dead , then is Christ not risen :
text2: Papa uya kamoro so ' si tawon kon pen eseru aimenka mɨrɨ . “ Ɨri ka ' pon enpa ' katɨ ' ɨ ' koro ' tapai ' nokon , ” tasa ' .

text: Now concerning the collection for the saints , as I have given order to the churches of Galatia , even so do ye .
text2: Ɨsipɨ ' ɨwe ' to ' kon esi yau ɨsitonpa pe , anapai kuru pe ' ɨwesi kon Papa uya tasa ' pen awɨrɨ te ' sen piya ' to ' uya iteseru aimenkato ' pe wakʉ ton piya ' ru ' ku tase pʉra ?

text: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store , as God hath prospered him , that there be no gatherings when I come .
text2: I ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra pe ' iyesi Papa munkɨ amʉ ' uya non eseru aimenkato ' oton tukai ' ? Non eseru si aimenkanin pe ɨwesi kon yau , mɨrɨ mʉre ' pʉ rɨ ken pe ' si eseru aimenka auya ' nokon poken pʉra iyesi ?

text: And when I come , whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters , them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem .
text2: I ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra pe ' iyesi urɨ ' nokon uya inserʉ amʉ ' eseru aimenkato ' oton ? Mɨrɨ entai rɨ sa ' ne serɨ po uko ' man nɨto ' yau eseru aimenka mɨrɨ ko !

text: And if it be meet that I go also , they shall go with me .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , ɨsipɨ ' ɨwe ' to ' kon esi yau serɨ rupɨ ton pɨ ' , ɨnepotɨ ' si so ' si tawon kon eseru aimenka ton kon , tʉnamasan ye ' ton pʉra rɨ to ' e ' tane !

text: Now I will come unto you , when I shall pass through Macedonia : for I do pass through Macedonia .
text2: Serɨ ta uya ɨpiyɨ ' nʉ ' nin kon pe rɨ . Ɨnʉ ' pʉra kuru rɨ pe ' iyesi ɨ ' koro ' tau ' nokon emiya ' pokena ' eseru aimenkanin ɨsipɨ ' ɨwe ' to ' kon pɨ ' apurɨnin pe esii ' ma ?

text: And it may be that I will abide , yea , and winter with you , that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go .
text2: E ' tane ru ' ku , tʉron nɨ uya tʉtonpa arɨ ko ' tʉ ta ' , apurɨnin nan pen nɨ rakʉi ' !

text: For I will not see you now by the way ; but I trust to tarry a while with you , if the Lord permit .
text2: I ' napai rɨ ɨtonpa kon pokon pe ko ' tʉ tau ɨwe ' to ' kon uya ekama , ɨneporonʉ kon eposa ' auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi . Tɨwɨ ipoken pʉra ɨku ' to ' kon anʉntɨ ' . Tɨwɨ tennakai ' to ' arapumatʉu .

text: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost .
text2: E ' tane ru ' ku , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon pe rɨ tʉusennakai ' ɨsitonpa pe esii ' ma ɨ ' senta ' ɨye ' rapuma kon , ɨsitonpa pe rɨ esii ' ma ɨ ' senta ' ipoken pʉra ɨwesi kon , ɨtonpa kon pokon pe kuru rɨ .

text: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me , and there are many adversaries .
text2: I ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra pe ' iyesi ɨri ton uya Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe eporo pʉra iye ' to ' oton ? Kɨsenku ' tɨtʉu : Tekumasan , mɨrɨ pe pʉra Papa tato ' ipɨ ' pe ika ' sa ' pɨ ' tʉwɨpʉremasan , iyemari ' masa ' pe esii ' ma tekumasan , warawoti ' si amʉ ' , warawo ' ku ' nin nan tʉtaan ' pʉ kon pe , tʉwaraino kon nɨ ku ' nin nan tʉno ' pʉ kon pe ,

text: Now if Timotheus come , see that he may be with you without fear : for he worketh the work of the Lord , as I also do .
text2: ama ' amʉ ' rɨ , mentaino kon nɨ , te ' taripasan nɨ , ɨri pe tʉtonpa kon pa ' nʉ ' nin nan , tʉtonpa kon a ' kwarʉkanin nan itimamin pɨ ' , uya Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe eporo pʉra iye ' to ' oton .

text: Let no man therefore despise him : but conduct him forth in peace , that he may come unto me : for I look for him with the brethren .
text2: Mɨrɨ ye ' pe ɨtonpa kon amʉ ' esi ' pʉ . E ' tane si ɨkorʉkasa ' kon , wakʉ pe ɨkonekasa ' kon Papa iwano ' pe , Papa pokon pe iyekonekasa ' pe ipokena ' pe , Itepuru Sises Kʉrai ese ' yau , Papa , itese ' pɨ ' e ' nɨto ' A ' kwarʉ ke .

text: As touching our brother Apollos , I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren : but his will was not at all to come at this time ; but he will come when he shall have convenient time .
text2: “ Tanporon nɨ ku ' to ' uya pe iyesi , ” ta rɨ — e ' tane si tanporon esi pen pika ' tɨnin pe . “ Tanporon nɨ ku ' to ' uya pe iyesi , ” ta rɨ — e ' tane tanporon nɨ e ' to ' pe pʉra iyesi uyepuru pe .

text: Watch ye , stand fast in the faith , quit you like men , be strong .
text2: “ Kiyari esi ewan wannɨ iwano ' pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ewan wannɨ esi kiyari iwano ' pe , ” ta rɨ — e ' tane Papa uya asa ' rɨ rɨ marɨ ima ' tanʉ ' to ' oton . Pun e ' to ' pe pʉra iyesi nɨkɨ ' pe e ' nɨ iwano ' pe , e ' tane Itepuru iwano ' pe , Itepuru kanan si pun iwano ' pe .

text: Let all your things be done with charity .
text2: Tʉpana ' pano ke Papa uya Itepuru i ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ iyeri ' sa ' apai , mɨrɨpan uya rɨ marɨ ui ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' oton kon .

text: I beseech you , brethren , ( ye know the house of Stephanas , that it is the firstfruits of Achaia , and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints , )
text2: I ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra pe ' nai ɨpun kon esi Kʉrai pʉ ' kʉ pe ' ne ? Kʉrai pʉ ' kʉ pe rɨken pe ' te ' sen tʉrʉ uya tʉtʉrawasooi pe ekuman ku ' nin uri ' san pʉ ' kʉ pe iye ' to ' pe ? Ikupʉ uya pen !

text: That ye submit yourselves unto such , and to every one that helpeth with us , and laboureth .
text2: I ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra pe ' iyesi kʉrɨ tekumasen pʉ ' kʉ pe iye ' tʉsa ' rʉ ' pʉ esi tikin nɨ ipokon pe ? Tasa ' iya esi , “ Asa ' rɨ te ' san ena tikin nɨ ipun , ” tasa ' .

text: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus : for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied .
text2: E ' tane kʉrɨ Itepuru pʉ ' kʉ pe iyenasa ' esi mɨrɨ tikin nɨ ipokon pe iya ' kwarʉ yau .

text: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours : therefore acknowledge ye them that are such .
text2: Ainʉntɨ ' ekuman nɨto ' apai . Tanporo tʉron nɨ ton makoi amʉ ' ka ' pon nʉkupʉnʉ ton esi ipun yau pʉra , e ' tane kʉrɨ tekumai ' imakoitasa ' na ' ne ' umakoitasa ' mɨrɨ tʉpun tʉma ' tanʉ ' se .

text: The churches of Asia salute you . Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord , with the church that is in their house .
text2: I ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra pe ' nai ɨpun kon esi Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ iwʉ ' pe , ayau ' nokon na ' ne ' , ɨneporo ' pʉ kon Papa winɨpai ? Ɨiwano ' kon pen nɨ ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon ;

text: All the brethren greet you . Greet ye one another with an holy kiss .
text2: te ' mai ' ennasa ' rʉ ' pʉ ton ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon ; mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , Papa inamatɨ ' ɨpun kon ke .

text: Paul , an apostle , ( not of men , neither by man , but by Jesus Christ , and God the Father , who raised him from the dead ; )
text2: Paarʉ , enno ' sa ' itekare ekamai ' — ka ' pon amʉ ' winɨpai enno ' sa ' pen , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ka ' pon nennoko ' pʉ pen , e ' tane Sises Kʉrai mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa , Ikʉipʉnʉ , i ' mʉ ' sa ' kanin nʉ ' pʉ iyerikʉ ' pʉ apai nennoko ' pʉ winɨpaino —

text: And all the brethren which are with me , unto the churches of Galatia :
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporon kon tonpa ton upiyawon kon winɨpaino , So ' si ton Kare ' siya po ' nan enakan :

text: Grace be to you and peace from God the Father , and from our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Tɨwɨ wakʉ nonkasa ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉusewankamai ' pʉra ɨwe ' to ' kon Papa , ukʉipʉnʉ kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Itepuru Sises Kʉrai winɨpaino nesii ɨyenakan kon pe .

text: Who gave himself for our sins , that he might deliver us from this present evil world , according to the will of God and our Father :
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ Sises Kʉrai iye ' tʉsa ' rʉ ' pʉ umakooi kon iwano ' pe umo ' kanin kon pe serɨ pe na ' ne ' ɨri pe e ' nɨto ' apai , urɨ ' nokon e ' to ' itese ' pɨ ' Papa , ukʉipʉnʉ kon e ' to ' i ' se awɨrɨ , nesii ɨyenakan kon pe .

text: To whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ Papa iwano ' pe eke pe iku ' to ' nesii tɨwɨrɨ rɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tɨwɨrɨ rɨ . Amen .

text: I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel :
text2: Usewansiukasa ' man inke pʉra kuru rɨ ɨkɨ ' manin nʉ ' pʉ kon wakʉ nonkasa ' Kʉrai uya winɨ nonka auya ' nokon pɨ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨyera ' tɨ kon tʉponaron nɨ itekare winɨkʉi ' —

text: Which is not another ; but there be some that trouble you , and would pervert the gospel of Christ .
text2: itekare parɨ pen kuru rɨ winɨkʉi ' . Tʉron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uya ɨyeno ' ma kon poken iyesi utaipon nɨto ' ya ' , mɨrɨpan kon esi wakʉ Kʉrai ekareei wʉuka i ' se .

text: But though we , or an angel from heaven , preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you , let him be accursed .
text2: E ' tane pʉra rɨ , ina mɨrɨ pe pʉra inserʉ Epʉn poino uya rɨ tʉron nɨ itekare ekama pe iyesi yau , serɨ ina nekamayai ' ne ' ɨpɨ ' nokon warai pen nɨ , tɨwɨ ipa ' nʉ ' sa ' pe nesii !

text: As we said before , so say I now again , If any man preach any other gospel unto you than that ye have received , let him be accursed .
text2: Ina uya taka ' sa ' na ' ne ' kasa rɨ , takapʉ uya kanan serɨ pe : Ɨnʉ ' uya tʉron nɨ itekare ekama pe iyesi yau ɨpɨ ' nokon , ananʉmʉ ' pʉ kon waraino pen , tɨwɨ ipa ' nʉ ' sa ' pe nesii !

text: For do I now persuade men , or God ? or do I seek to please men ? for if I yet pleased men , I should not be the servant of Christ .
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' uya pe ' uyapurɨto ' i ' se esi serɨ , mɨrɨ pe pʉra Papa uya katɨ ? Mɨrɨ pe pʉra ka ' pon amʉ ' katɨ ɨnpori ' mapai esi ? Ka ' pon amʉ ' ɨnpori ' mapai esi yau , Kʉrai poitorʉ pe pʉra rɨ esi mɨrɨ .

text: But I certify you , brethren , that the gospel which was preached of me is not after man .
text2: I ' tu auya ' nokon i ' se e ' ai ' , utonpa ton , sekamayai ' ne ' wakʉ itekare esi ka ' pon nʉkoneka ' pʉ pen .

text: For I neither received it of man , neither was I taught it , but by the revelation of Jesus Christ .
text2: Ka ' pon winɨ uneporo ' pʉ pen nɨ , mɨrɨ pe pʉra uyenupasa ' rʉ ' pʉ ipɨ ' pen nɨ ; e ' tane ru ' ku , Sises Kʉrai uya enpoika winɨ uneporo ' pʉ .

text: For ye have heard of my conversation in time past in the Jews ' religion , how that beyond measure I persecuted the church of God , and wasted it :
text2: Apʉne pʉra eta ' pʉ auya ' nokon uko ' mamʉ ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' eseru yau , ɨsɨ pe rɨ Papa so ' sii kota ' ma ' pʉ uya , anma ' tanʉ ' pai rɨ esi ' pʉ .

text: And profited in the Jews ' religion above many my equals in mine own nation , being more exceedingly zealous of the traditions of my fathers .
text2: Esuwerʉ amʉ ' eseru yau ukɨɨyisi kaisaron kon entai rɨ utɨsa ' esi ' pʉ utamokori ton eseru kuru awɨrɨ e ' nɨ pɨ ' .

text: But when it pleased God , who separated me from my mother ' s womb , and called me by his grace ,
text2: E ' tane Papa , uyamanin nʉ ' pʉ entu ' pʉ si ' kɨrɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ukɨ ' ma ' pʉ iya wakʉ nonkasa ' tʉuya winɨ , esi ' pʉ pori ' pe

text: To reveal his Son in me , that I might preach him among the heathen ; immediately I conferred not with flesh and blood :
text2: tʉmu ɨnenpoikapai uyau itekareei ekamanin pe e ' to ' pe Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen koro ' tau . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ɨnʉ ' rɨ ekama ' po ' pʉ uya pen upika ' tɨto ' pe iya ,

text: Neither went I up to Jerusalem to them which were apostles before me ; but I went into Arabia , and returned again unto Damascus .
text2: utɨsa ' pʉra rɨ iyesi Surusiran pona urawɨron kon itekare ekamai ' enno ' sa ' kon ense ' na , e ' tane ru ' ku utɨ ' pʉ inke pʉra Arepiya pona , emennʉ ' pʉ tenna ' po ton pe Tamaskas pona .

text: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter , and abode with him fifteen days .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ osorʉwau wʉipiya tʉpo , utɨ ' pʉ Surusiran pona Pi ' ta enupankase ' na , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipiyau uko ' mamʉ ' pʉ 15 kaisa rɨ wʉi .

text: But other of the apostles saw I none , save James the Lord ' s brother .
text2: Tʉron kon itekare ekamai ' enno ' sa ' kon ensa ' uya pʉra iyesi — Isens rɨken , Itepuru akon .

text: Now the things which I write unto you , behold , before God , I lie not .
text2: I ' nai rɨ kuru ekama uya , Papa uya entane , serɨ simenukayai ' ne ' esi kasi pe pen .

text: Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia ;
text2: Mɨrɨ tʉpo utɨ ' pʉ Siriya itese ' pata pona mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Siri ' siya itese ' pata pona .

text: And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judaea which were in Christ :
text2: Ka ' pon pe urɨ i ' tu so ' si amʉ ' Kʉrai yau te ' san Isutiya pon kon uya pʉra iyesi ' pʉ .

text: But they had heard only , That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed .
text2: Uyekareei rɨken eta ' pʉ to ' uya , “ Ka ' pon , ɨsɨ pe so ' si kota ' manin nʉ ' pʉ man tapurɨsen ima ' tanʉkʉ i ' se te ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ ekareei ekama pɨ ' , ” tawon .

text: And they glorified God in me .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa apurɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ to ' uya urɨ uriya ' .

text: Then fourteen years after I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas , and took Titus with me also .
text2: 14 kaisa rɨ wʉipiya tʉpo , Surusiran pona kanan utɨ ' pʉ Panapas pokon pe . Serɨ a ' tai , Tai ' tas nɨrɨ arɨ ' pʉ uya uya ' kɨrɨ .

text: And I went up by revelation , and communicated unto them that gospel which I preach among the Gentiles , but privately to them which were of reputation , lest by any means I should run , or had run , in vain .
text2: Isenpoikasa ' rʉ ' pʉ maimu eikʉ pe utɨ ' pʉ itekare ekamai ' to ' pɨ ' mɨrɨ unekamanʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen koro ' tau . E ' tane serɨ kupʉ ' pʉ uya ama ' ai , kamoro itepuru pe to ' esi tato ' ton iwano ' pe , apʉne pʉra enari ' ke ' pe esi pɨ ' eka ' tumʉ , mɨrɨ pe pʉra eka ' tunsa ' esi iwotori ' pɨ pʉra na ' kɨ ko , tukai ' .

text: But neither Titus , who was with me , being a Greek , was compelled to be circumcised :
text2: E ' tane rɨ Tai ' tas , uya ' kɨrɨ iye ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ a ' kwarʉka ' pʉ pen nɨ tʉyun pi ' pɨ puturʉkato ' pe iya , Kiri ' pe rɨ iye ' tane .

text: And that because of false brethren unawares brought in , who came in privily to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus , that they might bring us into bondage :
text2: Serɨ eseru usenpoika ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra ennakanin nan tonpa ton uyee ' pʉ ina uya i ' tu pʉra ɨ ' rɨ kan to ' uyee ' pʉ tukai ' , e ' tane to ' kenʉ ' uyee ' pʉ ina nʉkupʉnʉ mɨrɨ pe pʉra ina uko ' mamʉ eseru ense ' na , Kʉrai Sises nʉmo ' ka ' san pe esii ' ma , ina kanan ku ' se ' na a ' sisa ' kon pe .

text: To whom we gave place by subjection , no , not for an hour ; that the truth of the gospel might continue with you .
text2: Mara rʉ ' kwɨ rɨ to ' weyu ke to ' repa ' pʉ ina uya pen , mɨrɨ yau i ' nairon wakʉ itekare uko ' manto ' pe ɨpiyau ' nokon .

text: But of these who seemed to be somewhat , ( whatsoever they were , it maketh no matter to me : God accepteth no man ' s person : ) for they who seemed to be somewhat in conference added nothing to me :
text2: Kamoro eke pe na ' ne ' nan — ɨ ' rɨ pe rɨ to ' esi ' pʉ uya tʉron nɨ pe rɨ to ' kupʉ pʉra iyesi urɨ pona ; Papa uya kɨpo ' pon winɨ rɨ eseru wannɨ aimenka pʉra iyesi — kamoro ka ' pon amʉ ' uya ɨ ' rɨ ke rɨ uyekareei ponantɨsa ' pʉra iyesi .

text: But contrariwise , when they saw that the gospel of the uncircumcision was committed unto me , as the gospel of the circumcision was unto Peter ;
text2: Tʉron nɨ pe , to ' uya ene ' pʉ urepasa ' itekare ekamato ' tʉrawasooi ke Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen pana ya ' , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pɨ ' Pi ' ta uya itekare ekamato ' pe irepa ' pʉ itʉrawasooi ke na ' ne ' kasa .

text: ( For he that wrought effectually in Peter to the apostleship of the circumcision , the same was mighty in me toward the Gentiles : )
text2: Apʉne pʉra Papa , Pi ' ta e ' tʉrawasomato ' yau tʉrawaso pe iye ' sa ' Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pɨ ' itekare ekamai ' enno ' sa ' tʉrawasooi yau nɨrɨ e ' tʉrawasoma ' pʉ , mɨrɨpan nɨ marɨ esi ' pʉ utʉrawasooi yau itekare ekamai ' enno ' sa ' pe Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen pana ya ' .

text: And when James , Cephas , and John , who seemed to be pillars , perceived the grace that was given unto me , they gave to me and Barnabas the right hands of fellowship ; that we should go unto the heathen , and they unto the circumcision .
text2: Isens , Pi ' ta mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Isaan , anʉnsan kon itepuru ton pe uya urɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Panapas a ' si ' pʉ temiyatʉ kon enwo ' netʉ ke tʉtonpa kon pe , wakʉ nonkasa ' uyena ' to ' ka ' nʉkʉ tʉuya ' nokon a ' tai . To ' uya ewai ' ta ' pʉ , ina utɨto ' pe iyesi a ' tai Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen ton piya ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kamoro Esuwerʉ amʉ ' piya ' .

text: Only they would that we should remember the poor ; the same which I also was forward to do .
text2: To ' uya rɨken ekama ' po ' pʉ miyarɨ rɨ entu ' manin nan tʉku ' se ina e ' to ' pe tenu kon yau , serɨ kuru rɨ esi ' pʉ ɨnku ' pai e ' pɨ ' to ' .

text: But when Peter was come to Antioch , I withstood him to the face , because he was to be blamed .
text2: Pi ' ta uye ' sa ' a ' tai Antiyo ' pona , ipɨrɨ ' ka ' pʉ uya itenpa tau , apʉne pʉra ipoken pʉra kuru rɨ iye ' sa ' pɨ ' .

text: For before that certain came from James , he did eat with the Gentiles : but when they were come , he withdrew and separated himself , fearing them which were of the circumcision .
text2: Isens piyapai ka ' pon amʉ ' uyepʉ wapiya , Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen pokon pe tenta ' napɨ ' sen pe iyesi ' pʉ . E ' tane to ' uye ' sa ' a ' tai , to ' piyapai itama ' pʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iye ' wʉrʉuka ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra enari ' kena ' pe tesi wenai , iputurʉka tawon nan tonpa pe te ' san pɨ ' .

text: And the other Jews dissembled likewise with him ; insomuch that Barnabas also was carried away with their dissimulation .
text2: Tʉron kon Esuwerʉ amʉ ' e ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ wakʉ pe iye ' ku ' to ' eseru yau , mɨrɨ pɨ ' , wakʉ pe to ' e ' ku ' to ' winɨ Panapas rɨ nɨrɨ utano ' ma ' pʉ .

text: But when I saw that they walked not uprightly according to the truth of the gospel , I said unto Peter before them all , If thou , being a Jew , livest after the manner of Gentiles , and not as do the Jews , why compellest thou the Gentiles to live as do the Jews ?
text2: I ' nairon itekare poro pʉra to ' esi ensa ' uya a ' tai , tu ' kan kon koro ' tau Pi ' ta pɨ ' ta ' pʉ uya , “ Esuwerʉ pon pe ɨwesi , e ' tane rɨ Esuwerʉ pon pen kasa ɨuko ' mamʉ , Esuwerʉ pon kasa pʉra . Ɨ ' rɨ kasa ken si Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen a ' kwarʉka auya Esuwerʉ amʉ ' eseru yau to ' utɨto ' pe ?

text: We who are Jews by nature , and not sinners of the Gentiles ,
text2: “ Urɨ ' nokon kamoro tentu ' pʉ kon winɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' , ‘ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen tʉmakooikena ' nan ’ pen .

text: Knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law , but by the faith of Jesus Christ , even we have believed in Jesus Christ , that we might be justified by the faith of Christ , and not by the works of the law : for by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified .
text2: E ' tane urɨ ' nokon uya i ' tu Papa uya kamo Sises Kʉrai apurɨto ' esanon nɨken anʉmʉ . Mɨrɨ kasa iyesi wenai , urɨ ' nokon uya nɨrɨ Kʉrai Sises apurɨto ' esi apurɨto ' poro wakʉ pe ekonekan nɨto ' pe , main awɨrɨ e ' nɨ winɨ pen , apʉne pʉra main awɨrɨ te ' se ɨnʉ ' rɨ ekoneka pʉra iyesi wakʉ pe .

text: But if , while we seek to be justified by Christ , we ourselves also are found sinners , is therefore Christ the minister of sin ? God forbid .
text2: “ Kʉrai yau wakʉ pe ekonekan nɨto ' warinpa koro ' tau iyesi yau , tʉmakooi ke si usi ' tun nɨto ' ya ' enan , makoi rɨ tʉrawasoma Kʉrai uya , ta iya pe ' e ' kwa pe iyesi mɨ ? Kane ku !

text: For if I build again the things which I destroyed , I make myself a transgressor .
text2: Unma ' tanʉkʉ ' pʉ amɨ uya pe kanan iyesi a ' tai , main i ' kwɨ ' nin pe esi tukai ' usenpoika .

text: For I through the law am dead to the law , that I might live unto God .
text2: Main poro , eri ' sa ' main pona , uko ' manto ' pe Papa iwano ' pe .

text: I am crucified with Christ : nevertheless I live ; yet not I , but Christ liveth in me : and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God , who loved me , and gave himself for me .
text2: Urɨ e ' pokapɨ ' sa ' kurusu ' pona Kʉrai a ' kɨrɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uko ' mamʉ pʉra iyesi , e ' tane Kʉrai uko ' mamʉ uyau . Uko ' manto ' uko ' manyai ' ne ' ipun yau , Papa Mumu apurɨto ' uya yau uko ' mamʉ , ui ' nʉnkanin nʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉmɨrɨ pe iye ' tʉsa ' rʉ ' pʉ uiwano ' pe .

text: I do not frustrate the grace of God : for if righteousness come by the law , then Christ is dead in vain .
text2: Wakʉ nonkasa ' Papa uya nonka uya pen , Main poro ipoken e ' nɨto ' eporo pe iyesi yau , Kʉrai uma ' ta ' pʉ pe iyesi notʉn pe rɨ ! ”

text: O foolish Galatians , who hath bewitched you , that ye should not obey the truth , before whose eyes Jesus Christ hath been evidently set forth , crucified among you ?
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon pu ' pʉnon Kare ' siya pon kon ! Ɨnʉ ' uya ayawopasa ' kon ? Ɨyenu kon yau kuru Sises usene ' pʉ kɨpo ' po kurusu ' pona ipokapɨ ' sa ' pe .

text: This only would I learn of you , Received ye the Spirit by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Tikin nan ɨni ' tupai e ' ai ' ɨwinɨ ' nokon : Main , Mosi ' winon pe ' awɨrɨ ɨwesi kon pɨ ' Papa A ' kwarʉ eporo ' pʉ auya ' nokon , ɨneta ' pʉ kon katɨ apurɨ auya ' nokon pɨ ' ?

text: Are ye so foolish ? having begun in the Spirit , are ye now made perfect by the flesh ?
text2: Pu ' pʉra kuru rɨ pe ' ɨwesi kon ? Papa A ' kwarʉ a ' kɨrɨ ɨye ' sara ' tɨ kon tʉpo , serɨ pe i ' se ɨwe ' to ' kon pe ' eporo i ' se ɨwesi kon ka ' pon nʉkupʉnʉ winɨ ?

text: Have ye suffered so many things in vain ? if it be yet in vain .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨto ' pe pʉra rɨ pe ' ɨyekota ' masa ' kon ? Ɨ ' rɨ ku ' nin pe rɨ iyesi ' pʉ mɨrɨ .

text: He therefore that ministereth to you the Spirit , and worketh miracles among you , doeth he it by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Main , Mosi ' winon pe ' awɨrɨ ɨwesi kon pɨ ' Papa uya Ta ' kwarʉ ke ɨrepa ' pʉ kon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eke tʉtʉrawasooi pe ' kupʉ ' pʉ iya ɨ ' koro ' tau ' nokon , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨneta ' pʉ kon katɨ apurɨ auya ' nokon pɨ ' ?

text: Even as Abraham believed God , and it was accounted to him for righteousness .
text2: Epʉra ' an i ' tutɨ ' : “ Papa apurɨ ' pʉ iya , mɨrɨpan i ' tu ' pʉ iya wakʉ ipokena ' e ' pe kuru . ”

text: Know ye therefore that they which are of faith , the same are the children of Abraham .
text2: Ito ' ka ' nʉ ' tɨ ' , kamoro apurɨnin nan esi Epʉra ' an munkɨ amʉ ' pe tukai ' .

text: And the scripture , foreseeing that God would justify the heathen through faith , preached before the gospel unto Abraham , saying , In thee shall all nations be blessed .
text2: Itekare e ' menukasa ' uya pena rɨ ensa ' esi ' pʉ , Papa uya Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen konekato ' oton apurɨto ' to ' uya winɨ , mɨrɨ uya iye ' kupʉ rawɨrɨ rɨ itekare ekama ' pʉ Epʉra ' an pɨ ' : “ Tanporon kon tʉpataron kon pʉremato ' uya oton ɨporo , ” tukai ' .

text: So then they which be of faith are blessed with faithful Abraham .
text2: Mɨrɨpan kamoro apurɨto ' esanon pʉremasa ' Epʉra ' an , apurɨto ' esa ' pokon pe .

text: For as many as are of the works of the law are under the curse : for it is written , Cursed is every one that continueth not in all things which are written in the book of the law to do them .
text2: Tanporo kamoro Main pɨ ' tʉuta ' sii ' te ' san esi pa ' nʉ ' nɨsa ' o ' no , apʉne pʉra iye ' menukasa ' : “ Ipa ' nʉ ' sa ' kon pe kamoro esi tanporo Main apon pɨ ' iye ' menukasa ' kupʉ pɨ ' te ' san pen , ” tukai ' .

text: But that no man is justified by the law in the sight of God , it is evident : for , The just shall live by faith .
text2: Ene rɨ , ɨnʉ ' rɨ koneka Main uya pʉra iyesi Papa enu yau , apʉne pʉra , “ Ipokena ' pe te ' sen uko ' mamʉ apurɨto ' winɨ , ” tasa ' iya .

text: And the law is not of faith : but , The man that doeth them shall live in them .
text2: Main esi apurɨto ' pokon pen ; mɨrɨ e ' tane , “ Kʉrɨ rɨ serɨ ton ku ' nin uko ' mamʉ rɨ mɨrɨ winɨ , ” tasa ' .

text: Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law , being made a curse for us : for it is written , Cursed is every one that hangeth on a tree :
text2: Kʉrai uya uye ' masa ' kon , main uya pa ' nʉ ' nɨsa ' apai , ipa ' nʉ ' sa ' pe urɨ ' nokon pe tenai ' , apʉne pʉra iye ' menukasa ' , “ Ipa ' nʉ ' sa ' kon kamoro yʉi pɨ ' isinkasa ' kon , ” tukai ' .

text: That the blessing of Abraham might come on the Gentiles through Jesus Christ ; that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith .
text2: Uye ' masa ' iya ' nokon , Epʉra ' an pʉremasa ' rʉ ' pʉ utɨto ' pe Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen pona Kʉrai Sises poro , mɨrɨpan apurɨto ' winɨ Ita ' kwarʉ usauro ' nɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ ipɨ ' epoto ' pe .

text: Brethren , I speak after the manner of men ; Though it be but a man ' s covenant , yet if it be confirmed , no man disannulleth , or addeth thereto .
text2: Utonpa ton , apʉne wʉi kaisa rɨ uko ' man nɨto ' eseru pɨ ' sekamai ' ya . Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' ekonekasa ' rʉ ' pʉ pena iteseru ye ' awɨrɨ isara ' tɨsa ' mo ' ka mɨrɨ pe pʉra itonpa ' tɨ pʉra iyesi mɨrɨ . Mɨrɨ na ' ne ' kasa serɨ esi mɨrɨ .

text: Now to Abraham and his seed were the promises made . He saith not , And to seeds , as of many ; but as of one , And to thy seed , which is Christ .
text2: Usauro ' nɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ ton usekama ' pʉ Epʉra ' an pana ya ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ imu ena ' . Itekare iye ' menukasa ' uya , “ ɨmunkɨ amʉ ' , ” tasa ' pʉra iyesi , tu ' kan kon ta e ' kwa pe , e ' tane , “ ɨmʉre , ” tasa ' iya , tikin nan pɨ ' ; kʉrɨ rɨ si esi Kʉrai .

text: And this I say , that the covenant , that was confirmed before of God in Christ , the law , which was four hundred and thirty years after , cannot disannul , that it should make the promise of none effect .
text2: Se kasa ta uya e ' kwa pe iyesi : Main , 430 kaisa rɨ wʉipiya tʉpo isekamasa ' rʉ ' pʉ uya Papa ekoneka ' pʉ ka ' pon amʉ ' pokon pe iye ' sara ' tɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ kuka pʉra iyesi , ikupʉ tukai ' usauro ' nɨ ' pʉ eno ' manin pe .

text: For if the inheritance be of the law , it is no more of promise : but God gave it to Abraham by promise .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Papa uya repan nɨto ' esi yau main awɨrɨ e ' nɨsa ' wenai , isauro ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ wenai iyesi pen nɨ mɨrɨ , e ' tane Papa uya , wakʉ nonkasa ' tʉuya yau , Epʉra ' an repa ' pʉ iya ike tʉusauro ' sa ' poro .

text: Wherefore then serveth the law ? It was added because of transgressions , till the seed should come to whom the promise was made ; and it was ordained by angels in the hand of a mediator .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ ken si ku ' nin pe main esi mɨrɨ ? Iponantɨsa ' mɨrɨ makoi esi pɨ ' , ekamasa ' rʉ ' pʉ Epʉra ' an pa rʉ ' pʉ uyepʉ pona rɨ . Papa uya main tʉrʉ ' pʉ inserʉ amʉ ' poro Mosi ' , ka ' sanawon wannɨ ena ' ka ' pon amʉ ' enakan pe .

text: Now a mediator is not a mediator of one , but God is one .
text2: Tikin nan nɨken Papa , mɨrɨpan main uye ' sa ' pʉra iyesi iwinɨpai kuru .

text: Is the law then against the promises of God ? God forbid : for if there had been a law given which could have given life , verily righteousness should have been by the law .
text2: Main ken pe ' si esi Papa usauro ' sa ' ewa ' nomanin pe ? Kane ! Main e ' tʉsa ' pe iyesi yau uko ' man nɨto ' ne ' nin pe , ipokena ' pe e ' nɨto ' ne ' seporoi ' no main winɨ .

text: But the scripture hath concluded all under sin , that the promise by faith of Jesus Christ might be given to them that believe .
text2: E ' tane iye ' menukasa ' itekare uya ekama tanporo orʉ esi makoi na ' si ' pʉ pe , mɨrɨ si usauro ' nɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ ipɨ ' , iye ' tʉsa ' rʉ ' pʉ pe te ' sen apurɨto ' poro Sises Kʉrai yau , e ' tʉto ' pe kamoro apurɨnin nan ena ' .

text: But before faith came , we were kept under the law , shut up unto the faith which should afterwards be revealed .
text2: Serɨ apurɨto ' uyepʉ rawɨrɨ , Main uya a ' sin nɨsa ' esi ' pʉ , a ' kon nɨsa ' iya esi ' pʉ , apurɨto ' usenpoika pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ .

text: Wherefore the law was our schoolmaster to bring us unto Christ , that we might be justified by faith .
text2: Mɨrɨ yau Main e ' tʉsa ' esi ' pʉ esa ' wannɨ pe uyanin kon pe Kʉrai piya ' , ekonekan nɨto ' pe apurɨto ' winɨ .

text: But after that faith is come , we are no longer under a schoolmaster .
text2: Apurɨto ' si uye ' sa ' pɨ ' , main o ' no pʉra e ' nɨ ' nokon serɨ .

text: For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus .
text2: Tanporo Papa munkɨ amʉ ' pe ɨwesi kon Kʉrai Sises apurɨto ' auya ' nokon poro ,

text: For as many of you as have been baptized into Christ have put on Christ .
text2: apʉne pʉra tanporo ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon ipokon pe iyenasa ' kon ɨyepa ' taisima kon yau Kʉrai ya ' epontɨsa ' mɨrɨ Kʉrai ke .

text: There is neither Jew nor Greek , there is neither bond nor free , there is neither male nor female : for ye are all one in Christ Jesus .
text2: Mɨrɨ yau Esuwerʉ pʉra rɨ iyesi , Esuwerʉ pen pʉra rɨ , poitorʉ pʉra rɨ , a ' sisa ' pen pʉra rɨ , warawo ' pʉra rɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uri ' san pʉra iyesi , apʉne pʉra tikin nɨ ɨwesi kon Kʉrai Sises yau .

text: And if ye be Christ ' s , then are ye Abraham ' s seed , and heirs according to the promise .
text2: Kʉrai iwano ' pe ɨwesi kon yau , Epʉra ' an payan ton pe ɨwesi kon mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ yau usauro ' nɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ epoton kon pe .

text: Now I say , That the heir , as long as he is a child , differeth nothing from a servant , though he be lord of all ;
text2: Se ta uya , inonkasa ' rʉ ' pʉ anʉnnin esi pɨ ' mʉre pe rɨ marɨ , poitorʉ kasa pʉra tʉpona rɨ iyesi pen nɨ , tanporon nɨ tiwano ' esa ' pe rɨ te ' tane .

text: But is under tutors and governors until the time appointed of the father .
text2: Terasu ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tesan non nɨ enau iyesi ikʉipʉnʉ nʉkuu ' pʉ iweyu e ' seporo pona rɨ .

text: Even so we , when we were children , were in bondage under the elements of the world :
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ , mʉre amʉ ' pe e ' nɨ a ' tai , apiyo ' pe e ' nɨ ' pʉ orʉ eseru o ' noro .

text: But when the fulness of the time was come , God sent forth his Son , made of a woman , made under the law ,
text2: E ' tane si iweyu kuru e ' seposa ' a ' tai , Papa uya Tʉmu ennoko ' pʉ , uri ' san yai iyentu ' pʉ , main o ' no iyentu ' pʉ ,

text: To redeem them that were under the law , that we might receive the adoption of sons .
text2: kamoro main o ' no te ' san e ' manin pe , imunkɨ amʉ ' pe kuru e ' nɨto ' epoto ' pe .

text: And because ye are sons , God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts , crying , Abba , Father .
text2: Apʉne pʉra imunkɨ pe ɨwesi kon pɨ ' , Papa uya Tʉmu A ' kwarʉ ennoko ' pʉ uyewan kon ya ' , Ita ' kwarʉ tʉukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnsen , “ Apa , Papai , ” tukai ' .

text: Wherefore thou art no more a servant , but a son ; and if a son , then an heir of God through Christ .
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai poitorʉ pe ɨwesi kon pen , e ' tane imu pe ; imu pe si ɨwesi kon pɨ ' , Papa uya ɨkonekasa ' kon tʉnnonka ' pʉ anʉnnin pe .

text: Howbeit then , when ye knew not God , ye did service unto them which by nature are no gods .
text2: Pena rɨ , Papa i ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi a ' tai , apiyo ' pe ɨwesi ' pʉ kon kamo ti ' naino kon papa amʉ ' pen iwano ' pe .

text: But now , after that ye have known God , or rather are known of God , how turn ye again to the weak and beggarly elements , whereunto ye desire again to be in bondage ?
text2: E ' tane nin si serɨ si Papa i ' tu auya ' nokon — mɨrɨ pe pʉra ru ' ku , Papa uya ɨi ' tu kon — nai pe ken si ɨyenna ' po kon mɨ ton ɨ ' sɨ ' mʉnon , ɨri ton eseru ya ' ? To ' uya rɨ pe ' aya ' sikapʉ kon kanan i ' se ɨwesi kon ?

text: Ye observe days , and months , and times , and years .
text2: Eke ton pe te ' sen ton wʉi amʉ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kapʉi amʉ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pata weyu ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wʉipiya ton kupʉ auya ' nokon !

text: I am afraid of you , lest I have bestowed upon you labour in vain .
text2: Uyewankamayatʉi ' , ɨpɨ ' nokon nɨ sa ' ne wakʉ rɨ ku ' to ' uya i ' ma ' kasa ' uya pɨ ' .

text: Brethren , I beseech you , be as I am ; for I am as ye are : ye have not injured me at all .
text2: Ɨyekama ' po uya ' nokon kuru , utonpa ton , urɨ kasa enatɨ ' , akasa ' nokon enasa ' pɨ ' . Ɨri pe uku ' sa ' auya ' nokon pʉra rɨ man .

text: Ye know how through infirmity of the flesh I preached the gospel unto you at the first .
text2: Mi ' tuyatʉi ' ne ' kasa rɨ , apʉne pʉra takuru ' ke esi pɨ ' ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon pɨ ' kuru wapiya wakʉ itekare ekama ' pʉ uya .

text: And my temptation which was in my flesh ye despised not , nor rejected ; but received me as an angel of God , even as Christ Jesus .
text2: Takuru ' ke rɨ e ' to ' e ' tane ɨi ' tupɨ ' to ' kon pe , ɨri pe rɨ ukuu ' pʉ auya ' nokon pen mɨrɨ pe pʉra upɨ ' rɨ ɨunuirata ' pʉ kon pen nɨ . E ' tane ru ' ku , uyereutanʉkʉ ' pʉ auya ' nokon Papa inserʉʉi pe esi kasa rɨ , Kʉrai Sises pe esi kasa rɨ .

text: Where is then the blessedness ye spake of ? for I bear you record , that , if it had been possible , ye would have plucked out your own eyes , and have given them to me .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ pe tanporo rɨ pori ' pe ɨwe ' to ' kon enasa ' nai ? Mɨrɨ rɨ ekama uya , mɨrɨ ku ' sa ' auya ' nokon pe iyesi yau , ɨyenu kon nɨ mʉmo ' katʉi ' no uyena ' itʉrʉ kon pa .

text: Am I therefore become your enemy , because I tell you the truth ?
text2: Ɨyeyaton kon pe pe ' enasa ' serɨ i ' nairon tekamai ' ɨpɨ ' nokon ?

text: They zealously affect you , but not well ; yea , they would exclude you , that ye might affect them .
text2: Kamoro esi ɨmo ' kapai ' nokon kuru rɨ tʉwinɨkʉi ' no kon , e ' tane wakʉto ' pe pʉra rɨ . Ina piyapai rɨ nin ene amʉ ' pe ɨku ' pai ' nokon to ' esi , ɨwesi kon pa to ' winɨkʉi ' no kon pe kuru .

text: But it is good to be zealously affected always in a good thing , and not only when I am present with you .
text2: Wakʉ pe rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ kuru ɨnku ' pai ɨwesi kon a ' tai , wakʉ iwano ' pe iyesi pɨ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ mɨrɨ kasa te ' sen pe tɨwɨrɨ rɨ , ɨpiyau ' nokon nɨken esi a ' tai pen .

text: My little children , of whom I travail in birth again until Christ be formed in you ,
text2: Umunkɨ amʉ ' rʉ ' kwɨ , itiwano ' pe e ' tinkaka ' sa ' kanan na ' ne ' nan , Kʉrai e ' kapʉ ayau ' nokon pʉ ' kʉ pona ,

text: I desire to be present with you now , and to change my voice ; for I stand in doubt of you .
text2: ɨpiyau ' nokon kuru e ' pai e ' ai ' serɨ pe umaimu ensima pe , apʉne pʉra ɨpɨ ' nokon usewankama pɨ ' !

text: Tell me , ye that desire to be under the law , do ye not hear the law ?
text2: Apʉne upana ' tɨtɨ ' , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon main o ' no e ' paino kon , i ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra pe ' nai main uya rɨ tasa ' ?

text: For it is written , that Abraham had two sons , the one by a bondmaid , the other by a freewoman .
text2: Apʉne pʉra iye ' menukasa ' esi , Epʉra ' an esi ' pʉ asa ' ron kon imu , tikin nan esi ' pʉ poitorʉ pe te ' sen uri ' san winɨpaino , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉron nɨ ɨnʉ ' apiyo ' pen nɨ uri ' san winɨpaino .

text: But he who was of the bondwoman was born after the flesh ; but he of the freewoman was by promise .
text2: Imu poitorʉ pe te ' sen uri ' san winɨpaino esi ' pʉ entun eseru yau rɨ iyentusa ' pe ; e ' tane imu apiyo ' pen uri ' san winɨ iyentusa ' esi ' pʉ iye ' kupʉ tukai ' usauro ' nɨsa ' otori ' pɨ pe .

text: Which things are an allegory : for these are the two covenants ; the one from the mount Sinai , which gendereth to bondage , which is Agar .
text2: Serɨ ton amʉ ' anʉmʉ pe iyesi i ' tuto ' ipɨ ' pe , apʉne pʉra pʉsamoro uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' esi asa ' ron ekonekan nɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ pe . Tikin nan ekonekan nɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ esi Sainai Wʉpʉ winon , apiyo ' ton pe tʉumu ' tasen : Pʉse rɨ pʉse rɨ Ekarʉ .

text: For this Agar is mount Sinai in Arabia , and answereth to Jerusalem which now is , and is in bondage with her children .
text2: Ekarʉ si esi Sainai Wʉpʉ , Arepiya pon pe rɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ serɨ pe na ' ne ' eke pata Surusiran kaisa rɨ iyesi , apʉne pʉra tʉmunkɨ amʉ ' pokon pe apiyo ' pe iyesi pɨ ' .

text: But Jerusalem which is above is free , which is the mother of us all .
text2: E ' tane Surusiran ka ' tau na ' ne ' esi ɨnʉ ' apiyo ' pe pʉra rɨ , kʉrɨ rɨ si kʉrɨ rɨ usan kon .

text: For it is written , Rejoice , thou barren that bearest not ; break forth and cry , thou that travailest not : for the desolate hath many more children than she which hath an husband .
text2: Apʉne pʉra iye ' menukasa ' : “ Epori ' makɨ tʉumu ' tasen ye ' pen uri ' san , mʉre amʉ ' entunʉ ' nin pen ; eke pe ɨkɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnkɨ , ɨmɨrɨ entun nɨto ' pe e ' tinkan nɨsa ' i ' tunin pen ; apʉne pʉra tu ' ke imunkɨ inonkasa ' uri ' san esi pɨ ' tʉtaan ' pʉ kenan entai , ” tukai ' .

text: Now we , brethren , as Isaac was , are the children of promise .
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon si , utonpa ton , esi Aisi ' kasa , usauro ' nɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ iye ' kupʉ tukai ' munkɨ pe .

text: But as then he that was born after the flesh persecuted him that was born after the Spirit , even so it is now .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , imu , entun eseru yau rɨ iyentusa ' rʉ ' pʉ uya Iya ' kwarʉ winɨ iyentusa ' kota ' ma ' pʉ . Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ si iyesi serɨ pe .

text: Nevertheless what saith the scripture ? Cast out the bondwoman and her son : for the son of the bondwoman shall not be heir with the son of the freewoman .
text2: E ' tane ɨ ' rɨ ken nɨkayan imenukasa ' itekare ? “ Uri ' san poitorʉ pe te ' sen mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ imʉre inonkakɨ , apʉne pʉra poitorʉ pe te ' sen mʉre uya ɨnʉ ' enawon pen mʉre pokon pe inonkasa ' rʉ ' pʉ anʉmʉ pen mɨrɨ , ” tawon .

text: So then , brethren , we are not children of the bondwoman , but of the free .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , utonpa ton , urɨ ' nokon esi poitorʉ uri ' san munkɨ pe pʉra , e ' tane ɨnʉ ' enawon pen munkɨ pe e ' nɨ ' nokon .

text: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free , and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage .
text2: Apiyo ' pe pʉra e ' nɨto ' pe Kʉrai uya mo ' kan nɨsa ' serɨ . Mɨrɨ pɨ ' , pana ' pe e ' soto ' katɨ ' , ke ' wari ' sa ' tɨka ' tʉu kanan apiyo ' pe e ' nɨto ' ya ' te ' mʉkanse .

text: Behold , I Paul say unto you , that if ye be circumcised , Christ shall profit you nothing .
text2: Umaimu a ' si ' tɨ ' . Urɨ , Paarʉ uya apana ' tɨ kon , ɨyun kon pi ' pɨ puturʉka auya ' nokon pe iyesi yau , Kʉrai esi mɨrɨ ɨnʉ ' pe pʉra rɨ ɨpona ' nokon .

text: For I testify again to every man that is circumcised , that he is a debtor to do the whole law .
text2: Ekamakapʉ uya kanan , tanporon kon ka ' pon amʉ ' tʉyun kon pi ' pɨ puturʉkanin nan pɨ ' , to ' tʉrawasooi pe kuru iyesi tanporon main awɨrɨ to ' e ' to ' pe iyesi .

text: Christ is become of no effect unto you , whosoever of you are justified by the law ; ye are fallen from grace .
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon ekonekapaino kon main winɨ enasa ' mɨrɨ ene pe Kʉrai piyapai ; auta ' mo ' kasa ' kon wakʉ nonkasa ' ɨpona ' nokon piyapai .

text: For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith .
text2: E ' tane apurɨto ' winɨ ina enurikʉ kuru serɨ Iya ' kwarʉ poro ipokena ' pe e ' nɨto ' epoto ' pɨ ' te ' ku ' to ' kon pɨ ' .

text: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision ; but faith which worketh by love .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Kʉrai Sises yau iputurʉka mɨrɨ pe pʉra iputurʉka pʉra rɨ e ' nɨ esi mɨrɨ notʉn pe rɨ . Tikin nan nɨken ti ' tusen esi apurɨto ' , tiwano ' pe tʉusenpoikasen usi ' nʉnkan nɨto ' poro .

text: Ye did run well ; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth ?
text2: Wakʉ kuru rɨ eka ' tun nɨto ' yau ɨyeka ' tumʉ kon esi ' pʉ . Ɨnʉ ' uya ken ɨyereutanʉkʉ ' pʉ kon mɨrɨ i ' nairon apurɨto ' auya ' nokon piyapai ?

text: This persuasion cometh not of him that calleth you .
text2: Mɨrɨ waraino iku ' to ' pe pori ' manin uyepʉ pʉra rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ kʉrɨ ɨkɨ ' manin kon nʉ ' pʉ winɨ .

text: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump .
text2: “ Aiko rʉ ' kwɨ rɨ pʉrowa a ' sarutanʉ ' nin e ' tʉrawasoma mɨrɨ tanporon iki ' masa ' yau . ”

text: I have confidence in you through the Lord , that ye will be none otherwise minded : but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment , whosoever he be .
text2: Uyenu yau rɨ e ' ai ' , Itepuru yau , tʉron nɨ pe ene auya ' nokon pen nɨ tukai ' . Kʉrɨ ɨyeno ' ma kon pɨ ' na ' ne ' a ' pai kon utaka ' mato ' ya ' uya rɨ itepe ' pʉ pe e ' ma mɨrɨ , ɨnʉ ' pe rɨ ken nai .

text: And I , brethren , if I yet preach circumcision , why do I yet suffer persecution ? then is the offence of the cross ceased .
text2: Utonpa ton , iputurʉka pɨ ' rɨ marɨ usaurokʉ yau , ɨ ' rɨ pe ken iyesi pɨ ' ɨsɨ pe rɨ to ' uya ukupʉ rɨ marɨ ? Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' si , kurusu ' uya ɨkɨnʉntanʉ ' nɨto ' useno ' ma ' pʉ .

text: I would they were even cut off which trouble you .
text2: Kamoro si usauro ' nɨ pɨ ' te ' san asakoropanin kon esi i ' se e ' ai ' miyarɨ rɨ tʉ ' ma ' kai ' akʉ ' pɨtʉ pɨ ' !

text: For , brethren , ye have been called unto liberty ; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh , but by love serve one another .
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon , utonpa ton kɨ ' masa ' a ' sisa ' pe ɨwesi kon pa pen , e ' tane a ' sisa ' pe pʉra ɨwe ' to ' kon ɨku ' tɨ ' nin ɨri eseru kupʉ pɨ ' ; e ' tane ru ' ku , ɨsiyapiyo ' pe e ' tɨ ' ɨusi ' nʉnkato ' kon yau .

text: For all the law is fulfilled in one word , even in this ; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Tanporo main amʉrasa ' mɨrɨ tikin nan nɨ main ya ' : “ Ɨtonpa i ' nʉnkakɨ ɨmɨrɨ pe mɨsi ' nʉnkayai ' ne ' kasa rɨ , ” tukai ' .

text: But if ye bite and devour one another , take heed that ye be not consumed one of another .
text2: Usi ' kapɨ ' nɨ pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ utan nɨ pɨ ' ɨwesi kon yau , ɨsiwano ' pe rɨ auma ' ta kon mɨrɨ .

text: This I say then , Walk in the Spirit , and ye shall not fulful the lust of the flesh .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' si ta uya , ɨko ' mantɨ ' Ita ' kwarʉ winɨ , mɨrɨ a ' tai i ' naino ɨri eseru pori ' ma auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi mɨrɨ .

text: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit , and the Spirit against the flesh : and these are contrary the one to the other : so that ye cannot do the things that ye would .
text2: Apʉne pʉra i ' naino esi Ita ' kwarʉ kaisaron pe pʉra rɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Ita ' kwarʉ esi i ' naino kaisaron pe pʉra rɨ nɨrɨ . Tʉusewa ' nomasan pe rɨ to ' esi ; i ' se ɨwe ' to ' kon kupʉ auya ' nokon poken pʉra rɨ .

text: But if ye be led of the Spirit , ye are not under the law .
text2: E ' tane Ita ' kwarʉ esi pe iyesi yau ayanin kon pe , main o ' no ɨwesi kon pen mɨrɨ .

text: Now the works of the flesh are manifest , which are these ; Adultery , fornication , uncleanness , lasciviousness ,
text2: I ' naino makoi tʉrawasooi esi tense rɨ : ekuman nɨto ' , ɨri eseru kupʉ pɨ ' e ' nɨto ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ unɨkɨrun nɨto ' ,

text: Idolatry , witchcraft , hatred , variance , emulations , wrath , strife , seditions , heresies ,
text2: papa tato ' pe ipɨ ' ika ' sa ' pɨ ' ɨpʉreman nɨto ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ enwoke ' pe e ' nɨto ' ; ɨsewaruma ' ke ' pe e ' nɨto ' , ɨsipɨ ' e ' nɨto ' , ɨkɨntan nɨto ' , ipan pe rɨ usakorotan nɨto ' , amʉre ' pe e ' nɨto ' , ɨseseru yau pʉra e ' nɨto ' , eseru wannɨ pɨkɨrɨ usewa ' noman nɨto ' ,

text: Envyings , murders , drunkenness , revellings , and such like : of the which I tell you before , as I have also told you in time past , that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God .
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ikinike ' pe e ' nɨto ' ; e ' taripan nɨto ' , te ' kamai ' rɨ e ' taripan ekuman nɨto ' pe , mɨrɨ ton warai ' nan . Apanamakapʉ uya ' nokon serɨ , wapiya siku ' taine ' kasa , kamoro serɨ kasa tʉuko ' mansan uya Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe anʉnto ' oton pen nɨ .

text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love , joy , peace , longsuffering , gentleness , goodness , faith ,
text2: E ' tane Ita ' kwarʉ eperu ton esi usi ' nʉnkan nɨto ' , pori ' pe e ' nɨto ' , tʉusewankamai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' , tʉuseta ' kai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' , mannʉ ' pe e ' nɨto ' , wakʉ pe e ' nɨto ' , main nʉ ' pʉ awɨrɨ e ' nɨto ' ,

text: Meekness , temperance : against such there is no law .
text2: ɨsɨ pe pʉra e ' nɨto ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iwano ' wannɨ pe tʉuse ' se ' tɨi ' e ' nɨto ' . Serɨ ton namai ' no main pʉra rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ .

text: And they that are Christ ' s have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts .
text2: Kamoro Kʉrai Sises iwano ' pe te ' san uya kurusu ' pona ti ' naino kon ɨri eseru , ɨri pe e ' pai te ' to ' kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ekumapai te ' to ' kon pokapɨtʉ ' pʉ kurusu ' pona .

text: If we live in the Spirit , let us also walk in the Spirit .
text2: Ita ' kwarʉ winɨ uko ' man nɨ ' nokon pɨ ' , Ita ' kwarʉ pɨkɨrɨ e ' nɨpai ' nokon .

text: Let us not be desirous of vain glory , provoking one another , envying one another .
text2: Mɨ pe te ' ku ' sen pe enanpai ' nokon pʉra , tonpa tʉsakoropai ' pʉra , tɨkɨntai ' pʉra e ' nɨpai ' nokon .

text: Brethren , if a man be overtaken in a fault , ye which are spiritual , restore such an one in the spirit of meekness ; considering thyself , lest thou also be tempted .
text2: Utonpa ton , ɨnʉ ' rɨ e ' makoimasa ' a ' tai , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon , ta ' kwarʉ ke na ' ne ' nan nʉna ' poi ɨ ' sɨ ' mʉn yai . E ' tane ɨsenkɨ , a ' tai pʉra ɨi ' tupɨ ' to ' rɨ marɨ esi .

text: Bear ye one another ' s burdens , and so fulfil the law of Christ .
text2: Ɨtonpa kon wari ' sarʉ atɨ ' ; mɨrɨ a ' tai , Kʉrai maimu a ' ku ' tɨ auya ' nokon mɨrɨ .

text: For if a man think himself to be something , when he is nothing , he deceiveth himself .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ usenuminka pe iyesi yau ɨnʉ ' pe tesi tukai ' , ɨnʉ ' pe pʉra rɨ esii ' ma , tiwano ' pe rɨ isenku ' tɨ mɨrɨ .

text: But let every man prove his own work , and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone , and not in another .
text2: Tɨwɨ ka ' pon teseru i ' tui . Mɨrɨ tʉpo , mɨ pe te ' ku ' to ' pe , tʉron nɨ pokon pe tʉusi ' tui ' pʉra ,

text: For every man shall bear his own burden .
text2: apʉne pʉra tʉkaisarɨ ' nokon tʉwari ' sarʉ kon arɨ to ' uya mɨrɨ .

text: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ tenupato ' anʉnnin main yau esi a ' tai , tɨwɨ tanporo wakʉ ton pe te ' sen ekamʉi tenupanin ena ' .

text: Be not deceived ; God is not mocked : for whatsoever a man soweth , that shall he also reap .
text2: Kɨsenku ' tɨtʉu : Papa esi ɨnʉ ' nʉsapemanʉ pen nɨ . Ka ' pon uya tʉnpɨmɨ ' pʉ rɨ anʉmʉ mɨrɨ .

text: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption ; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting .
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ ti ' naino ku ' nin tʉpori ' manin pe esi a ' tai , mɨrɨ i ' naino uya ima ' tanʉkʉ ; kʉrɨ rɨ wakʉ Iya ' kwarʉ pori ' manin pe ipɨnnin esi a ' tai , Iya ' kwarʉ winɨpai inkero ' uko ' man nɨto ' eporo iya .

text: And let us not be weary in well doing : for in due season we shall reap , if we faint not .
text2: Useta ' kanpai ' nokon pʉra man wakʉ eseru ku ' tane , apʉne pʉra itepe ' pʉ anʉnto ' oton kon iweyu a ' tai , useta ' kan nɨsa ' pʉra iyesi yau .

text: As we have therefore opportunity , let us do good unto all men , especially unto them who are of the household of faith .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , uweyu kon esi koro ' tau , wakʉ eseru ku ' pai ' nokon tanporon kon ka ' pon amʉ ' pɨ ' , kamoro kuru Papa Maimu apurɨnin nan pe te ' san pɨ ' .

text: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand .
text2: Eke ton imenu entɨ ' ɨyena ' nokon imenuka uya koro ' tau uyemiyatʉ ke !

text: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh , they constrain you to be circumcised ; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ .
text2: Kamoro atapurɨpaino kon kɨpo ' pon pɨ ' rɨ aya ' kwarʉka i ' se na ' ne ' nan ɨyun kon pi ' pɨ puturʉkapɨtʉ pɨ ' . Tʉkota ' ma kon namai ' rɨken to ' uya ikupʉ Kʉrai kurusukuui wenai .

text: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law ; but desire to have you circumcised , that they may glory in your flesh .
text2: Kamoro nin iputurʉkapɨ ' sa ' na ' ne ' nan esi main awɨrɨ pʉra rɨ . Tʉutapurɨto ' kon pe ɨputurʉkapɨtʉ i ' se ' nokon to ' esi .

text: But God forbid that I should glory , save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ , by whom the world is crucified unto me , and I unto the world .
text2: Atapurɨpai pʉra e ' ai ' e ' tane uyepuru kon Sises Kʉrai kurusukuui pɨ ' rɨken utapurɨ , iporo upona orʉ e ' pokapɨtʉ ' pʉ na ' ne ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ urɨ rɨ e ' pokapɨtʉ ' pʉ na ' ne ' ipona .

text: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision , but a new creature .
text2: Iputurʉkato ' mɨrɨ pe pʉra iputurʉkato ' pen esi ɨ ' rɨ pe pʉra rɨ ; emenna ' pe nin e ' ka ' nɨto ' usi ' tu mɨrɨ .

text: And as many as walk according to this rule , peace be on them , and mercy , and upon the Israel of God .
text2: Tʉusewankamai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨsentu ' ke ' pe e ' nɨto ' esi tanporo serɨ iporo e ' nɨto ' iyawɨrɨ te ' san pona kan pe , kamo rɨ nɨrɨ Papa iwano ' ton nɨrɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pona .

text: From henceforth let no man trouble me : for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Iu ' matʉ pe , ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ uyanpokʉma i ' se pʉra e ' ai ' , apʉne pʉra Sises wenai ukota ' ma ' pʉ ɨ rʉ ' pʉ man upɨ ' .

text: Brethren , the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: Sises Kʉrai , uyepuru kon uya wakʉ nonkasa ' nesii aya ' kwarʉ kon piyau , utonpa ton . Amen .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , to the saints which are at Ephesus , and to the faithful in Christ Jesus :
text2: Paarʉ , Kʉrai Sises nennoko ' pʉ itekare ekamai ' Papa eseru winɨ , winɨpaino , Wakʉ ton E ' pe ' sas pon kon enakan , tʉusaurokʉ ' pʉ awɨron kon Kʉrai Sises yau :

text: Grace be to you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Wakʉ nʉnonkasa ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉusewankamai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' nesii ɨyenakan kon pe Papa , ukʉipʉnʉ kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Itepuru Sises Kʉrai winon .

text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ :
text2: Apurɨpɨ ' to ' nesii Papa mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uyepuru kon Sises Kʉrai kʉipʉnʉ iwano ' pe , wakʉ pe upʉremanin nʉ ' pʉ kon tanporon nɨ iya ' kwarʉ pe pʉreman nɨto ' Epʉn po e ' nɨ pata yau Kʉrai yau .

text: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world , that we should be holy and without blame before him in love :
text2: Apʉne pʉra uyanʉnsa ' iya ' nokon pɨ ' pata ekoneka rawɨrɨ wakʉ pe te ' san pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨri pe pʉra tenu yau . Tʉusi ' nʉnkato ' yau

text: Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself , according to the good pleasure of his will ,
text2: tʉmunkɨ pe e ' nɨto ' yau ku ' nɨ ' pʉ iya pena Sises Kʉrai poro , pori ' pe te ' to ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ teseru awɨrɨ .

text: To the praise of the glory of his grace , wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved .
text2: Ikuu ' pʉ iya tapurɨpɨ ' to ' pe , wakʉ nonkasa ' tʉuya pɨ ' , i ' nʉmʉra rɨ Tʉmu tʉni ' nʉnkanʉ yau .

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , the forgiveness of sins , according to the riches of his grace ;
text2: Iyau e ' man nɨto ' esi imʉnʉ poro , makoi pɨ ' usentu ' man nɨto ' , Papa uya wakʉ nonkasa ' na ' ne ' awɨrɨ eke pe kuru rɨ

text: Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence ;
text2: upona ' nokon itʉsa ' iya eke pe kuru rɨ tanporo tʉpu ' ketʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ito ' ka ' nʉ ' to ' pokon pe .

text: Having made known unto us the mystery of his will , according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself :
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ama ' ai tʉnkupʉnʉ teseru pori ' pe te ' to ' awɨrɨ koneka ' pʉ iya i ' tuto ' kon pe , te ' kuu ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ Kʉrai yau .

text: That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ , both which are in heaven , and which are on earth ; even in him :
