text2: Serɨ ekonekan nɨsa ' e ' ku ' to ' pe ita ' ku ' tɨto ' weyu ton e ' seposa ' a ' tai — tanporon nɨ Epʉn pon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ non pon amʉranʉ ' nin pe tikin nɨ itesa ' , kʉrɨ rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ Kʉrai .

text: In whom also we have obtained an inheritance , being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will :
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ yau rɨ nɨrɨ utanʉn nɨ ' pʉ ' nokon pena , inkuu ' pʉ iye ' ku ' to ' pe awɨrɨ rɨ tanporon nɨ tʉrawasomanin mɨrɨ kasa iye ' to ' pe tawon teseru awɨrɨ ,

text: That we should be to the praise of his glory , who first trusted in Christ .
text2: ina , wapiya Kʉrai yau te ' ku ' to ' ke iye ' sa ' kon , e ' to ' pe eke pe iku ' to ' apurɨpɨ ' to ' ku ' nin pe .

text: In whom ye also trusted , after that ye heard the word of truth , the gospel of your salvation : in whom also after that ye believed , ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise ,
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon nɨ nɨrɨ esi ' pʉ Kʉrai yau i ' nairon maimu etasa ' auya ' nokon a ' tai , wakʉ ɨyepika ' tɨto ' kon ekareei . Apurɨsa ' auya ' nokon a ' tai , ama ' kʉi ' tɨ ' pʉ kon a ' si ' to ' ike ke , usauro ' nɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ ipɨ ' Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ ,

text: Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession , unto the praise of his glory .
text2: itʉsa ' uneporonʉ kon ekamanin pe kamoro Papa iwano ' pe te ' san e ' ma pona rɨ — eke pe tesi pɨ ' tapurɨpɨ ' to ' pe .

text: Wherefore I also , after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus , and love unto all the saints ,
text2: Serɨ wenai , Itepuru Sises apurɨto ' auya ' nokon eta ' pʉ uya si ' kɨrɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wakʉ ton i ' nʉnkato ' auya ' nokon ,

text: Cease not to give thanks for you , making mention of you in my prayers ;
text2: ereutasa ' pʉra rɨ iyesi ɨpɨ ' nokon tenki tapɨtʉ pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨpona ' nokon ɨpʉremato ' rɨ esi uyenu yau .

text: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of glory , may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him :
text2: Urɨ ' nokon epuru Sises Kʉrai e ' to ' itese ' pɨ ' Papa , meruntɨ pe te ' sen Ikʉipʉnʉ , ekama ' po pɨ ' rɨ esi ɨrepato ' kon pe iya pu ' ketʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ enpoikanin A ' kwarʉ ke , wakʉ pe parɨ i ' tunin pe ɨwesi kon pa .

text: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened ; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling , and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints ,
text2: Ɨpʉrema rɨ nɨrɨ ɨyewan kon yau ɨyenu kon uta ' kwakato ' pe ɨkɨ ' mato ' iya ' nokon ipona ɨye ' ku ' to ' kon i ' tunin pe ɨwesi kon pa , eke pe kuru rɨ meruntɨ pe ɨneporonʉ kon esi wakʉ pe te ' san yau ,

text: And what is the exceeding greatness of his power to usward who believe , according to the working of his mighty power ,
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ mɨrɨ kaisaron ta pokena ' pen nɨ urɨ ' nokon apurɨnin nan iwano ' pe intʉrʉnʉ eke kuru rɨ ipana ' pano . Mɨrɨ ipana ' pano esi eke imeruntɨrʉ e ' tʉrawasoma pe rɨ ,

text: Which he wrought in Christ , when he raised him from the dead , and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places ,
text2: inapurɨ ' pʉ Kʉrai yau i ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ iya a ' tai iyerikʉ ' pʉ apai , mɨrɨpan aponontɨ tʉuya a ' tai temiyatʉ enwo ' netʉ winɨ Epʉn po e ' nɨ pata yau ;

text: Far above all principality , and power , and might , and dominion , and every name that is named , not only in this world , but also in that which is to come :
text2: ɨnnɨ rɨ tanporon nɨ esa ' wannɨ pe te ' sen mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eke ton , pana ' pano mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eke pata esanon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporon eke pe te ' sen ese ' ese ' tɨn nɨto ' , serɨ a ' taino rɨken pen e ' tane serɨ entakan pe rɨ te ' sen a ' taino entaino .

text: And hath put all things under his feet , and gave him to be the head over all things to the church ,
text2: Mɨrɨpan Papa uya tanporon nɨ tʉsa ' i ' ta o ' koi ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ anʉnsa ' iya tanporon nɨ i ' pai pe iye ' to ' pe so ' si iwano ' pe ,

text: Which is his body , the fulness of him that filleth all in all .
text2: ipun pe si te ' sen , kʉrɨ rɨ pe rɨ si tanporon nɨ arʉ ' tɨnin tanporon winɨ rɨ .

text: And you hath he quickened , who were dead in trespasses and sins ;
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon si , iyeri ' sa ' pe iye ' sa ' rʉ ' san main yawɨrɨ pʉra mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ amakooi kon yau ,

text: Wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world , according to the prince of the power of the air , the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience :
text2: ɨuko ' mamʉ ' pʉ kon na ' ne ' iyau serɨ orʉ eseru awɨrɨ ɨwesi kon a ' tai , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' yawon kon esanon , iya ' kwarʉ e ' tʉrawasoman pɨ ' na ' ne ' kamoro main awɨron kon pen yau .

text: Among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh , fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind ; and were by nature the children of wrath , even as others .
text2: Tanporo e ' nɨ na ' ne ' kaisa rɨ uko ' man nɨ ' pʉ ' nokon to ' koro ' tau pena a ' tai , u ' naino kon umakooi kon e ' to ' i ' se kupʉ pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' se iye ' to ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ isenuminkato ' pɨkɨrɨ utɨn pɨ ' . To ' kasa rɨ , i ' naino kota ' man nɨto ' iwano ' pe e ' nɨ ' pʉ .

text: But God , who is rich in mercy , for his great love wherewith he loved us ,
text2: E ' tane apʉne pʉra eke pe ui ' nʉnkato ' kon iya esi wenai , Papa , eke pe rɨ isentu ' mato ' te ' sen ,

text: Even when we were dead in sins , hath quickened us together with Christ , ( by grace ye are saved ; )
text2: uya nurɨne uku ' sa ' kon Kʉrai pokon pe iyeri ' sa ' pe rɨ e ' nɨ tane main awɨrɨ pʉra e ' nɨto ' yau . I ' nai rɨ kuru iyesi , eke wakʉ nonkasa ' winɨ ɨyepika ' tɨsa ' kon .

text: And hath raised us up together , and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus :
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa uya ui ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' kon Kʉrai pokon pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uyaponontɨsa ' iya ' nokon ipokon pe Epʉn pe te ' sen pata yau , Kʉrai Sises yau ,

text: That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus .
text2: enpoikato ' tʉuya serɨ entakan nʉye ' ai ' ne ' a ' tai mɨrɨ kaisaron ta pokena ' pen wakʉ nonkasa ' , enpoikasa ' iya ɨsi ' nʉnke ' pe te ' to ' yau upɨ ' nokon Kʉrai Sises yau .

text: For by grace are ye saved through faith ; and that not of yourselves : it is the gift of God :
text2: Apʉne pʉra wakʉ nonkasa ' winɨ ɨyepika ' tɨsa ' kon , apurɨto ' poro — mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ serɨ esi ɨwinon kon pen , Papa nʉtʉrʉnʉ mɨrɨ —

text: Not of works , lest any man should boast .
text2: tʉrawaso pɨkɨron pen , ɨnʉ ' rɨ utapurɨ namai ' .

text: For we are his workmanship , created in Christ Jesus unto good works , which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them .
text2: Apʉne pʉra Papa tʉrawasooi rʉ ' san urɨ ' nokon , ika ' sa ' kon Kʉrai Sises yau wakʉ tʉrawaso ku ' nin nan pe , Papa nʉkoneka ' pʉ uye ' mata ' nokon iku ' to ' pe .

text: Wherefore remember , that ye being in time past Gentiles in the flesh , who are called Uncircumcision by that which is called the Circumcision in the flesh made by hands ;
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , ɨyenu kon yau iku ' tɨ ' Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pe pʉra ɨwesi ' pʉ kon ɨyentusa ' kon winɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ , “ itun pi ' pɨ iputurʉkasa ' kon pen ” tukai ' ɨyesakʉ ' pʉ kon , “ itun pi ' pɨ iputurʉkasa ' kon ” tukai ' tʉusesa ' san uya ( ka ' pon amʉ ' nʉkupʉnʉ tʉpun kon pɨ ' temiyatʉ kon ke ) —

text: That at that time ye were without Christ , being aliens from the commonwealth of Israel , and strangers from the covenants of promise , having no hope , and without God in the world :
text2: ɨyenu kon yau mɨrɨ iku ' tɨ ' , mɨrɨ a ' tai Kʉrai piyapai iyemo ' kasa ' pe ɨwesi ' pʉ kon , Esuwerʉ yawon kon pe pʉra mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨnnon kon pe rɨ ekonekan nɨto ' pɨ ' usauro ' nɨto ' piyapai , iye ' ku ' to ' pʉra rɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa pʉra rɨ serɨ non po .

text: But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ .
text2: E ' tane si serɨ pe Kʉrai Sises yau ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon , pena ɨnnɨ iye ' sa ' kon ne ' sa ' si a ' ko pe Kʉrai mʉnʉ poro .

text: For he is our peace , who hath made both one , and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us ;
text2: Apʉne pʉra kʉrɨ rɨ rɨ esi usewankaman namai ' no pe , asa ' rɨ te ' san ku ' nin nʉ ' pʉ tikin nɨ , mɨrɨpan uya wa ' kʉ ' nin pe te ' sen ma ' tanʉkʉ ' pʉ , ɨ ' seyaton pe e ' nɨto ' wekupiri ,

text: Having abolished in his flesh the enmity , even the law of commandments contained in ordinances ; for to make in himself of twain one new man , so making peace ;
text2: tʉpun winɨ main , Mosi ' winon nonka ' pʉ tʉuya winɨ apiyontɨn nɨto ' iya mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyawɨrɨ e ' nɨto ' ton pokon pe . Ika ' to ' pe tʉuya iye ' ku ' to ' esi ' pʉ tikin nan pe asa ' ron apai , usewankaman pʉra si iyesi tʉku ' se ;

text: And that he might reconcile both unto God in one body by the cross , having slain the enmity thereby :
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ serɨ si tikin nan ipun yau to ' konekanin pe asa ' rɨ rɨ marɨ Papa piya ' kurusu ' po terikʉ winɨ , to ' usewa ' nomato ' mo ' ka ' pʉ iya .

text: And came and preached peace to you which were afar off , and to them that were nigh .
text2: Iyee ' pʉ mɨrɨpan uya tʉusewankamai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' ekama ' pʉ ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon ɨnnɨ te ' san pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ a ' ko pan kon nʉ ' san pɨ ' .

text: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father .
text2: Apʉne pʉra iporo asa ' rɨ rɨ marɨ urɨ ' nokon utɨto ' e ' ma esi Ikʉipʉnʉ piya ' tikin nan Iya ' kwarʉ winɨ .

text: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners , but fellowcitizens with the saints , and of the household of God ;
text2: Mɨrɨ epe ' pʉ pe , ɨnnon kon pe pʉra mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ sunwaron kon pe pʉra ɨwesi kon , e ' tane Papa munkɨ amʉ ' tonpa pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itiwʉ ' tau te ' san tonpa ye ' ton pe ,

text: And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets , Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone ;
text2: itamɨsa ' pe iyapon pe te ' san itekare ekamai ' enno ' sa ' kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pu ' kena ' amʉ ' po , kʉrɨ rɨ rɨ nin si Kʉrai Sises itekun airon eke tɨ ' pe .

text: In whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord :
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ yau tanporo mɨrɨ amɨsa ' enasa ' ɨsipona , mɨrɨpan nin si e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' wakʉ use ' man nɨto ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨpʉreman nɨto ' iwʉ ' pe tenai ' Itepuru yau .

text: In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit .
text2: Mɨrɨpan yau nin si ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon nɨ nɨrɨ utamɨsa ' mɨrɨ a ' samʉtʉ yau itiwʉ ' pe ɨyena kon pa Papa uko ' manto ' yau pe Ta ' kwarʉ winɨ .

text: For this cause I Paul , the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles ,
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai , urɨ , Paarʉ , Kʉrai Sises iwano ' pe a ' sisa ' pe te ' sen ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen iwano ' pe —

text: If ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me to youward :
text2: Eta ' pʉ auya ' nokon kuru rɨ Papa uya wakʉ nonkasa ' tʉrawasooi , iye ' tʉsa ' uyena ' , ɨyena ' nokon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉron kon ena ' ekanto ' pe uya ɨpika ' tɨnin kon pe .

text: How that by revelation he made known unto me the mystery ; ( as I wrote afore in few words ,
text2: Serɨ tonan tawon usenpoika ' pʉ uyena ' , to ' ken nʉ ' kwɨ imenukaka ' sa ' uya na ' ne ' ipɨ ' .

text: Whereby , when ye read , ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ )
text2: Mɨrɨ ene auya ' nokon a ' tai , ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ auya ' nokon Kʉrai nʉkupʉnʉ tonan tau ennin pe esi ,

text: Which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men , as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit ;
text2: ka ' pon amʉ ' uya i ' tuto ' pe iye ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ pen tʉron nɨ a ' tai iye ' sa ' kon ena ' serɨ a ' tai isenpoikasa ' na ' ne ' kasa Iya ' kwarʉ winɨ wakʉ ton Papa nennoko ' san itekare ekamai ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pu ' kena ' amʉ ' ena ' .

text: That the Gentiles should be fellowheirs , and of the same body , and partakers of his promise in Christ by the gospel :
text2: Serɨ tonan tawon , wakʉ itekare poro Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen esi Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pokon pe ɨsi ' kaisa rɨ itesa ' pe te ' ton kon pe , tikin nan nɨ ipun pʉ ' kʉ pe ɨsi ' kaisa rɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨsi ' kaisa rɨ ikupʉ tukai ' usauro ' nɨsa ' eponin nan pe Kʉrai Sises yau .

text: Whereof I was made a minister , according to the gift of the grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his power .
text2: Serɨ itekare poitorʉ pe iyenasa ' rʉ ' pʉ urɨ Papa uya wakʉ nonkasa ' ke urepasa ' pɨ ' tʉpana ' pano e ' tʉrawasoma poro .

text: Unto me , who am less than the least of all saints , is this grace given , that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ ;
text2: Se pe rɨ e ' tane sepan kon kuru nɨrɨ Papa munkɨ amʉ ' o ' koi ' kuru , serɨ wakʉ nonkasa ' ke urepa ' pʉ : Esuwerʉ amʉ ' ton pen ena ' iwarinpa pokena ' pen nɨ eke Kʉrai iwano ' ekamanin pe .

text: And to make all men see what is the fellowship of the mystery , which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God , who created all things by Jesus Christ :
text2: Uyanʉmʉ ' pʉ tonan tau Papa , tanporon konekanin nʉ ' pʉ , nʉkuu ' pʉ iyepiya ' tɨ si ' kɨrɨ ku ' nin pe sa ' man pe pʉra tanporon kon ena ' .

text: To the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenly places might be known by the church the manifold wisdom of God ,
text2: Iteseru esi ' pʉ serɨ pe si , so ' si poro , i ' tu pokena ' pen nɨ Papa pu ' ketʉ enato ' pe ti ' tusen pe esa ' wannɨ ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eke ton ena ' Epʉn eseru pe te ' sen yawon kon ,

text: According to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord :
text2: inkero ' rɨ mɨrɨto ' pe ta ' pʉ iya rʉ ' pʉ inenuka ' nʉkʉ ' pʉ Kʉrai Sises , uyepuru kon yau .

text: In whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him .
text2: Iyau mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ apurɨto ' uya ' nokon poro Papa epoto ' pe iteme ' nin pʉra mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ en wannɨ yau te ' se .

text: Wherefore I desire that ye faint not at my tribulations for you , which is your glory .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , ɨyekama ' po uya ' nokon , temiya ' nʉnse pʉra ɨwesi kon pa , ɨwenai ' nokon ekota ' ma pɨ ' , eke pe ɨku ' to ' kon ipɨ ' pɨ ' rɨ .

text: For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai Ikʉipʉnʉ rau e ' sekunka ,

text: Of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named ,
text2: Ikʉipʉnʉ tanporon kon a ' samʉtʉ yawon kon apurɨnin nan Epʉn mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ non pon kon uya tese ' kon eposa ' na ' ne ' iwinɨ .

text: That he would grant you , according to the riches of his glory , to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man ;
text2: Ɨpʉrema eke pe rɨ te ' sen eke pe tʉku ' to ' apai ɨmeruntɨtanʉ ' to ' kon pe iya tʉpana ' pano ke Ta ' kwarʉ poro ayau ' nokon ,

text: That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith ; that ye , being rooted and grounded in love ,
text2: mɨrɨ kasa si , Kʉrai e ' to ' pe ayau ' nokon apurɨto ' poro . Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨpʉrema kanan ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon , imisitasa ' pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyekonekasa ' pe ɨwesi kon pa usi ' nʉnkan nɨto ' yau ,

text: May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth , and length , and depth , and height ;
text2: tʉpana ' pano ke ɨwesi kon pa , wakʉ ton amʉtʉ pe , ito ' ka ' nʉ ' nin nan pe eke pe rɨ ika ' ta , kusan pe rɨ , ka ' tau rɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' nau rɨ Kʉrai usi ' nʉnkato ' esi ,

text: And to know the love of Christ , which passeth knowledge , that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God .
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' tu kon pa serɨ usi ' nʉnkan nɨto ' , i ' tunin pe e ' nɨto ' entaino rɨ — autarʉ ' tɨ kon pa eke pe kuru Papa uya ɨrepato ' kon ike ke .

text: Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think , according to the power that worketh in us ,
text2: Serɨ si ipona iku ' nin pe te ' sen ipʉ ' kʉ i ' tu pʉra rɨ ekama ' posa ' entai rɨ mɨrɨ kasa na ' kɨ tato ' entai rɨ , tʉmeruntɨrʉ awɨrɨ ne ' tʉrawasomayai ' ne ' uyau ' nokon ,

text: Unto him be glory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all ages , world without end . Amen .
text2: iwano ' pe eke pe iku ' to ' nesii , so ' si tau mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Kʉrai Sises yau siyaro ' kon poro rɨ , tɨwɨrɨ rɨ , tɨwɨrɨ rɨ ! Amen .

text: I therefore , the prisoner of the Lord , beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called ,
text2: A ' sisa ' pe Itepuru iwano ' pe esi koro ' tau , ipan pe ayapiyo ' ma uya ' nokon ɨuko ' mamʉ kon pa uko ' man nɨto ' yau ikɨ ' masa ' kon pe te ' san pe anʉnsa ' auya ' nokon na ' ne ' yau .

text: With all lowliness and meekness , with longsuffering , forbearing one another in love ;
text2: Mɨ pe te ' ku ' san pe pʉra kuru e ' tɨ ' , ɨ ' sɨ ' mʉn yaino kon pe e ' tɨ ' ; tʉuseta ' kasan pe pʉra , ɨusi ' nʉnka kon pɨ ' ɨtonpa kon tʉpika ' tɨi ' e ' tɨ ' .

text: Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace .
text2: Tikin nɨ ɨwe ' to ' kon Iya ' kwarʉ iwano ' yau enkurunpatɨ ' kuru tʉusewankamai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' na ' si ' ai ' ne ' poro .

text: There is one body , and one Spirit , even as ye are called in one hope of your calling ;
text2: Moro tikin nan ipun esi mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tikin nan Iya ' kwarʉ — ɨkɨ ' masa ' kon na ' ne ' kasa kuru tikin nan ɨye ' ku ' to ' kon ya ' ɨkɨ ' masa ' kon a ' tai —

text: One Lord , one faith , one baptism ,
text2: tikin nan Itepuru , tikin nan apurɨto ' , tikin nan epa ' taisiman nɨto ' ;

text: One God and Father of all , who is above all , and through all , and in you all .
text2: tikin nan Papa , tanporon kon kʉipʉnʉ , tanporon entaino , tanporon poron nɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporon yawon nɨ .

text: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ .
text2: E ' tane uiwano ' kon pe e ' nɨ na ' ne ' kaisa rɨ wakʉ nonkasa ' e ' tʉsa ' upona ' nokon Kʉrai uya iku ' sa ' na ' ne ' awɨrɨ .

text: Wherefore he saith , When he ascended up on high , he led captivity captive , and gave gifts unto men .
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai ta iya : “ Iyenu ' sa ' a ' tai ka ' ta ' , a ' sisa ' kon arɨ ' pʉ iya ta ' kɨrɨ , mɨrɨpan uya repan nɨto ' tʉsa ' ka ' pon amʉ ' ena ' , ” ta iya .

text: ( Now that he ascended , what is it but that he also descended first into the lower parts of the earth ?
text2: ( Ɨ ' rɨ ta e ' kwa pe “ Iyenu ' sa ' ” ta ? Iu ' tɨ ' pʉ pe rɨ marɨ iyesi non pona , non pe te ' sen ya ' .

text: He that descended is the same also that ascended up far above all heavens , that he might fill all things . )
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ iu ' tɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ iyenu ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ ka ' ta ' rɨ ka ' enta ' rɨ , tanporon nɨ mɨ yawɨron yau te ' to ' pe . )

text: And he gave some , apostles ; and some , prophets ; and some , evangelists ; and some , pastors and teachers ;
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ uya tʉron kon kuu ' pʉ itekare ekamai ' enno ' sa ' kon pe , tʉron kon pu ' kena ' amʉ ' pe , tʉron kon itekare ekamanin nan pe , tʉron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' ennin nan pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ti ' sa amʉ ' pe ,

text: For the perfecting of the saints , for the work of the ministry , for the edifying of the body of Christ :
text2: Papa munkɨ amʉ ' konekanin nan pe tʉrawaso ku ' nin nan pe , Kʉrai pun e ' ka ' to ' pe ,

text: Till we all come in the unity of the faith , and of the knowledge of the Son of God , unto a perfect man , unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ :
text2: tikin nɨ enan pʉ ' kʉ pona apurɨto ' yau mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa Mumu i ' tuto ' yau mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wakʉ pe iyakʉ ' pʉsa ' pe , Kʉrai yau eke pe utarʉ ' tɨn nɨto ' wakʉ ke eponin pe .

text: That we henceforth be no more children , tossed to and fro , and carried about with every wind of doctrine , by the sleight of men , and cunning craftiness , whereby they lie in wait to deceive ;
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai mʉre ' e ' nɨ ' nokon pen mɨrɨ , sipa ' sipa nʉna ' popɨtʉnʉ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ se airɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ mɨ airɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' uya enupan winɨ ennakanin nan a ' setunʉ uya apɨ ' nɨ enku ' tɨnin teseru kon ke pen .

text: But speaking the truth in love , may grow up into him in all things , which is the head , even Christ :
text2: E ' tane ru ' ku , usi ' nʉnkan yau i ' nairon pɨ ' tʉusauro ' sen pe , tanporon yau usemo ' ka ' nokon u ' pai kon pe te ' sen , Kʉrai kaisa rɨ .

text: From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth , according to the effectual working in the measure of every part , maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love .
text2: Iwinɨ tanporo ipun ena ɨsipona ikara ton ke , usemo ' ka e ' kapʉ tiwano ' pe usi ' nʉnkato ' yau , ɨsi ' kaisa rɨ tʉtʉrawasooi kon kupʉ to ' uya ke .

text: This I say therefore , and testify in the Lord , that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk , in the vanity of their mind ,
text2: Serɨ ta uya nin si ɨpɨ ' nokon , ta uya kuru rɨ Itepuru yau ɨpɨ ' nokon , kɨko ' mantʉu serɨ enta ' itekare apurɨnin nan pen , iwotori ' pɨ pʉra tʉusenuminkato ' kon yau te ' san kasa .

text: Having the understanding darkened , being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them , because of the blindness of their heart :
text2: To ' ewarumansa ' ito ' ka ' nʉ ' to ' tʉuya ' nokon yau , mɨrɨpan kon e ' ta ' nʉ ' sa ' Papa iwano ' uko ' man nɨto ' piyapai , apʉne pʉra to ' yau na ' ne ' ito ' ka ' nʉ ' nin pen esi to ' ewan usa ' manta winɨ .

text: Who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness , to work all uncleanness with greediness .
text2: To ' ewan enasa ' sa ' man pe , to ' rɨ e ' tʉsa ' ɨri ku ' to ' pe tʉuya ' nokon ipan pe rɨ tʉuse ' se ' tɨto ' kon nɨ tʉnonkai ' , mɨrɨpan kon uya ti ' tui ' pʉra rɨ ɨri ton kupʉ .

text: But ye have not so learned Christ ;
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon , mɨrɨ kasa Kʉrai i ' tunin pe ɨyena ' pʉ kon pen .

text: If so be that ye have heard him , and have been taught by him , as the truth is in Jesus :
text2: I ' nai rɨ eta ' pʉ auya ' nokon mɨrɨpan pɨ ' ɨusenupa ' pʉ kon i ' nairon Sises yau na ' ne ' awɨrɨ .

text: That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man , which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts ;
text2: Ɨyenupa ' pʉ kon , ɨuko ' mamʉ ' pʉ kon eseru pɨ ' , penaro ' ɨyeseru kon nonka kon pa , ɨyenku ' tɨpai ' nokon te ' sen pɨkɨrɨ ɨwesi kon nʉma ' tanʉkʉ ' pʉ ;

text: And be renewed in the spirit of your mind ;
text2: emenna ' pe ɨyenato ' kon pe ɨusenuminkato ' kon yau ;

text: And that ye put on the new man , which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness .
text2: emenna ' ɨyeseru kon ya ' ɨyena kon pa , iye ' ka ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ Papa kasa iye ' to ' pe i ' nairon ipoken e ' nɨto ' yau mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wakʉ pe e ' nɨto ' yau .

text: Wherefore putting away lying , speak every man truth with his neighbour : for we are members one of another .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , akaisarɨ ' nokon kasi ye ' pe te ' sen inonkatɨ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' nairon pɨ ' tʉusauro ' sen pe tʉtonpa pokon pe , apʉne pʉra tikin nan ipun pʉ ' kʉ pe e ' nɨ ' nokon wenai .

text: Be ye angry , and sin not : let not the sun go down upon your wrath :
text2: “ Asakorooi kon yau kamakoitatʉu . ” Wʉi enu u ' tɨ tane ke ' tʉu ausakorotasa ' kon nɨ marɨ e ' tane ,

text: Neither give place to the devil .
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ makoi pʉta yen oton kʉ ' ku ' tʉu .

text: Let him that stole steal no more : but rather let him labour , working with his hands the thing which is good , that he may have to give to him that needeth .
text2: Kʉrɨ ama ' pe iye ' pɨ ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ kʉse ' nin ama ' pe mɨrɨ enta ' , e ' tane tɨwɨ ne ' tʉrawasomai , ɨ ' rɨ rɨ kupʉ pɨ ' nesii temiyatʉ ke , kamoro entu ' ma ' na ' ne ' nan repanin pe te ' to ' pe .

text: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth , but that which is good to the use of edifying , that it may minister grace unto the hearers .
text2: Ɨri rɨ usauro ' nɨto ' kʉsepa ' kanin anta kon apai , e ' tane wakʉ pika ' tɨnin nɨken tʉron kon ka ' nin pe i ' se to ' e ' to ' awɨrɨ , kamoro etanin nan epika ' tɨto ' pe .

text: And grieve not the holy Spirit of God , whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Wakʉ Papa A ' kwarʉ kʉ ' pokoitanʉ ' tʉu aya ' si ' sa ' kon na ' ne ' ike ɨye ' mato ' kon weyu pona rɨ .

text: Let all bitterness , and wrath , and anger , and clamour , and evil speaking , be put away from you , with all malice :
text2: Ɨri pe ɨtonpa kon pɨ ' ɨwe ' to ' kon inonkatɨ ' , ewe ' toi ' pɨ ' to ' kon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ sakoro , e ' sa ' morʉpɨ ' nɨto ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨri pe ka ' pon pɨ ' usauro ' nɨto ' , tanporon nɨ ɨri pe e ' pai e ' nɨto ' pokon pe rɨ .

text: And be ye kind one to another , tenderhearted , forgiving one another , even as God for Christ ' s sake hath forgiven you .
text2: Mannʉ ' pe e ' tɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ aiko tawon pe ɨtonpa kon pɨ ' , ɨsentu ' kena ' pe ɨtonpa kon pɨ ' , Kʉrai yau Papa usentu ' masa ' ɨpɨ ' nokon na ' ne ' kasa .

text: Be ye therefore followers of God , as dear children ;
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , Papa kasa te ' san pe e ' tɨ ' , ini ' nʉnkanʉ ton imunkɨ pe ,

text: And walk in love , as Christ also hath loved us , and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour .
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉuko ' mansan pe usi ' nʉnkan nɨto ' yau , Kʉrai uya ui ' nʉnkasa ' kon na ' ne ' kasa , mɨrɨpan e ' nonka ' pʉ uiwano ' kon pe a ' po ' nan tʉtʉsen mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ use ' man nɨto ' Papa ena ' pe .

text: But fornication , and all uncleanness , or covetousness , let it not be once named among you , as becometh saints ;
text2: E ' tane ɨ ' koro ' tau ' nokon ekuman eseru rɨ kʉse ' se ' sa ' pɨ ' nin , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨri rɨ , mɨrɨ pe pʉra mentai e ' nɨto ' , apʉne pʉra serɨ ton esi ipoken pʉra rɨ wakʉ ton Papa munkɨ amʉ ' iwano ' pe .

text: Neither filthiness , nor foolish talking , nor jesting , which are not convenient : but rather giving of thanks .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨri pe rɨ usauro ' nɨto ' , iya ' kwarʉ pʉra rɨ usauro ' nɨto ' mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨri pe te ' sen main apurɨto ' , ipokena ' pen nɨ , e ' tane tenki tato ' rɨken imaimu pe .

text: For this ye know , that no whoremonger , nor unclean person , nor covetous man , who is an idolater , hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God .
text2: Serɨ pɨ ' i ' nai rɨ e ' tɨ ' : tekumasan , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨri kupʉ pɨ ' te ' san , mɨrɨ pe pʉra mentaino kon — esi ika ' sa ' apurɨpɨ ' nin pe — esi pʉra iyesi Kʉrai mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe epoton kon pe pʉra rɨ .

text: Let no man deceive you with vain words : for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ ɨyenku ' tɨtɨ ' nin itenpʉ ' pʉ rɨ main ke , apʉne pʉra mɨrɨ warai ' nan pona Papa uya kota ' man nɨto ' uyepʉ main awɨron kon pen pona .

text: Be not ye therefore partakers with them .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , to ' tonpa pe ke ' tʉu .

text: For ye were sometimes darkness , but now are ye light in the Lord : walk as children of light :
text2: Apʉne pʉra ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon nɨ nɨrɨ esi ' pʉ ewarupɨ pe , e ' tane nin si Itepuru yau iweyu pe ɨwesi kon . Ɨko ' mantɨ ' iweyu munkɨ pe ,

text: ( For the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth ; )
text2: ( apʉne pʉra iweyu eperu pe e ' nɨ esi tanporo wakʉ pe e ' nɨto ' yau , ipoken e ' nɨto ' yau mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' nairon yau )

text: Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord .
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Itepuru pori ' manin anwarinpatɨ ' .

text: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness , but rather reprove them .
text2: Teperu kenan pen nɨ ewarupɨ tʉrawasooi kʉsa ' pɨ ' pɨ ' tʉu , e ' tane ru ' ku enpoikatɨ ' .

text: For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret .
text2: Apʉne pʉra piyɨ ' nʉ ' rɨ iyesi ama ' ai iku ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ e ' sesa ' pɨtʉ yau .

text: But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light : for whatsoever doth make manifest is light .
text2: E ' tane tanporon nɨ isenpoikasa ' iweyu ke ena tensen pe ,

text: Wherefore he saith , Awake thou that sleepest , and arise from the dead , and Christ shall give thee light .
text2: apʉne pʉra iweyu esi tanporon nɨ ku ' nin pe tensen pe . Mɨrɨ wenai tasa ' iya : “ Aiko te ' nʉnsen , apakakɨ , eri ' nɨsa ' apai e ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' , Kʉrai uya ɨwei ' tɨto ' pe , ” ta iya .

text: See then that ye walk circumspectly , not as fools , but as wise ,
text2: Ti ' tui ' ɨko ' mantɨ ' — pu ' pʉra pen e ' tane pu ' kena ' pe ,

text: Redeeming the time , because the days are evil .
text2: wakʉ pe ɨweyu kon apurɨtɨ ' , apʉne pʉra wʉi ton man ɨri pe rɨ .

text: Wherefore be ye not unwise , but understanding what the will of the Lord is .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , iya ' kwarʉ pʉra ke ' tʉu , e ' tane Itepuru eseru tʉto ' ka ' nʉ ' se .

text: And be not drunk with wine , wherein is excess ; but be filled with the Spirit ;
text2: Waain pɨ ' ke ' taripatʉu , miyarɨ rɨ tʉuse ' se ' tɨi ' pʉra rɨ e ' pai ɨkupʉ iya ' nokon esi . E ' tane ru ' ku , Iya ' kwarʉ ke atarʉ ' tɨtɨ ' .

text: Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord ;
text2: Eren yai ɨtonpa kon auro ' katɨ ' , ɨpʉreman eremu mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iya ' kwarʉ pe te ' sen eren yai . Ɨserenkatɨ ' ɨyewan kon apai Itepuru pɨ ' ,

text: Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ ;
text2: tɨwɨrɨ rɨ tenki tawon pe e ' tɨ ' Papa , Ikʉipʉnʉ pɨ ' tanporon pɨ ' rɨ , uyepuru kon Sises Kʉrai ese ' yau .

text: Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God .
text2: Ɨsiyena ' te ' tʉse e ' tɨ ' , Kʉrai nama auya ' nokon pe rɨ .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as unto the Lord .
text2: No ' pʉ ton , ataan ' pʉ kon ena ' e ' tʉtɨ ' Itepuru ena ' ɨye ' tʉrʉ kon pe rɨ .

text: For the husband is the head of the wife , even as Christ is the head of the church : and he is the saviour of the body .
text2: Apʉne pʉra taan ' pʉ esi no ' pʉ i ' pai pe , Kʉrai esi kasa so ' si i ' pai pe , tʉpun , ipika ' tɨnin pe te ' to ' .

text: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ , so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing .
text2: So ' si ne ' tʉyai ' ne ' kasa Kʉrai ena ' , mɨrɨ kasa no ' pʉ ton e ' tʉto ' pe iyesi tʉtaan ' pʉ kon ena ' tanporon yau rɨ .

text: Husbands , love your wives , even as Christ also loved the church , and gave himself for it ;
text2: Taan ' pʉ ton , ɨno ' pʉ kon i ' nʉnkatɨ ' , Kʉrai uya so ' si i ' nʉnkasa ' na ' ne ' kasa , te ' nonkai ' itiwano ' pe ,

text: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word ,
text2: wakʉ pe iku ' nin pe , ikorʉka tʉuya winɨ tuna ke tʉmaimu winɨ ,

text: That he might present it to himself a glorious church , not having spot , or wrinkle , or any such thing ; but that it should be holy and without blemish .
text2: itʉto ' pe tʉuya tena ' rɨ enkena ' so ' si pe rɨ , ita ' si ' sa ' pe pʉra rɨ , mɨrɨ pe pʉra itepikɨrɨi pʉra rɨ , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨ ' rɨ rɨ ima ' takʉʉi pʉra rɨ , e ' tane wakʉ pe , imaku ' pɨ pe pʉra .

text: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies . He that loveth his wife loveth himself .
text2: Mɨrɨ na ' ne ' kasa , taan ' pʉ ton uya tʉno ' pʉ kon i ' nʉnkato ' pe iyesi tʉpun kon i ' nʉnka tʉuya ' nokon pe rɨ . Kʉrɨ tʉno ' pʉ i ' nʉnkanin usi ' nʉnka rɨ mɨrɨ .

text: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh ; but nourisheth and cherisheth it , even as the Lord the church :
text2: Ɨnʉ ' ken tʉpun ewaruma ' tɨnin , e ' tane ewekʉ iya mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ imainanpa iya , so ' si ku ' ai ' ne ' Kʉrai kasa —

text: For we are members of his body , of his flesh , and of his bones .
text2: apʉne pʉra ipun pʉ ' kʉ pe e ' nɨ pɨ ' .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and shall be joined unto his wife , and they two shall be one flesh .
text2: “ Mɨrɨ wenai , warawo ' uya tʉkʉipʉnʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉsan nɨnto ' pe iyesi , mɨrɨpan ena tʉno ' pʉ ya ' tikin nɨ , mɨrɨpan kon ena tikin nɨ ipun , ” tasa ' .

text: This is a great mystery : but I speak concerning Christ and the church .
text2: Serɨ serɨ eke kuru ama ' aino — e ' tane usaurokʉ serɨ Kʉrai mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ so ' si pɨ ' .

text: Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself ; and the wife see that she reverence her husband .
text2: Mɨrɨ nin si e ' tane , akaisarɨ ' nokon kuru ɨno ' pʉ kon i ' nʉnkato ' auya ' nokon pe iyesi mɨsi ' nʉnkayatʉi ' ne ' kasa , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ no ' pʉ uya tʉtaan ' pʉ namato ' pe iyesi .

text: Children , obey your parents in the Lord : for this is right .
text2: Mʉre amʉ ' , asanon kon maimu awɨrɨ e ' tɨ ' Itepuru yau , apʉne pʉra serɨ esi ipokena ' pe .

text: Honour thy father and mother ; ( which is the first commandment with promise ; )
text2: “ Ɨkʉipʉnʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ asan inamakɨ ” — wapiyaro ' rɨ apiyontɨn nɨto ' ikupʉ uya tukai ' usauro ' nɨsa ' itonpa —

text: That it may be well with thee , and thou mayest live long on the earth .
text2: “ wakʉ pe ɨwesi pa inke ɨuko ' mamʉ pa serɨ non po , ” tawon .

text: And , ye fathers , provoke not your children to wrath : but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord .
text2: Ikʉipʉnʉ ton , ɨmunkɨ kon tʉsakoropai ' pʉra e ' tɨ ' ; e ' tane ru ' ku , to ' emo ' katɨ ' Itepuru eseru yau to ' tenupai ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' tauro ' kai ' .

text: Servants , be obedient to them that are your masters according to the flesh , with fear and trembling , in singleness of your heart , as unto Christ ;
text2: Apiyo ' ton , non pon kon ɨyepuru kon maimu awɨrɨ e ' tɨ ' , to ' nama pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tenari ' nʉnse to ' pɨ ' , wakʉ pe itewan , Kʉrai maimu awɨrɨ ɨwesi kon pe rɨ .

text: Not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but as the servants of Christ , doing the will of God from the heart ;
text2: To ' maimu awɨrɨ e ' tɨ ' , to ' uya ɨyenpɨ ' tane ' nokon nɨken pen wakʉ tato ' pe to ' uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , e ' tane Kʉrai apiyo ' ton pe , Papa eseru kupʉ pɨ ' ɨyewan kon apai .

text: With good will doing service , as to the Lord , and not to men :
text2: Iyapiyo ' pe e ' tɨ ' ari ' kena ' pe , Itepuru apiyo ' pe ɨwesi kon pe , ka ' pon amʉ ' pen ,

text: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth , the same shall he receive of the Lord , whether he be bond or free .
text2: apʉne pʉra i ' tu auya ' nokon Itepuru uya tanporon kon e ' ma wakʉ inkuu ' pʉ pɨ ' , poitorʉ pe te ' sen mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨnʉ ' enawon pen nɨ .

text: And , ye masters , do the same things unto them , forbearing threatening : knowing that your Master also is in heaven ; neither is there respect of persons with him .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ esanon , ayapiyo ' kon iku ' tɨ ' mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ . To ' kʉsenari ' patʉu , i ' tu auya ' nokon ke kʉrɨ asa ' rɨ rɨ ɨyepuru kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' epuru esi Epʉn pon , tenu yawon kenan pen nɨ nin .

text: Finally , my brethren , be strong in the Lord , and in the power of his might .
text2: Iu ' matʉ pe , pana ' pe e ' tɨ ' Itepuru yau mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ meruntɨ ipana ' pano yau .

text: Put on the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil .
text2: Tanporo kuru Papa amataai ya ' enatɨ ' , wakʉ pe ɨye ' soto ' ka kon pa makoi eseru namai ' .

text: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood , but against principalities , against powers , against the rulers of the darkness of this world , against spiritual wickedness in high places .
text2: Apʉne pʉra pun pokon pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ mʉn pokon pe e ' suranman pɨ ' e ' nɨ ' nokon pen , e ' tane esanon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eke ton , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ serɨ ewarupɨ orʉ meruntɨrʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨri a ' kwarʉ ton pana ' pano , ka ' eseru yawon kon pokon pe nin e ' suranman .

text: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day , and having done all , to stand .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , tanporo Papa amataai ya ' enatɨ ' , ɨri weyu e ' seposa ' a ' tai , wakʉ pe ɨye ' soto ' ka kon pa , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporon nɨ kupʉ tʉpo , ɨye ' soto ' ka kon pa .

text: Stand therefore , having your loins girt about with truth , and having on the breastplate of righteousness ;
text2: Pana ' pe e ' soto ' katɨ ' i ' nairon ɨpokʉrʉʉi kon pe ɨworo ' pai kon oi , ipoken e ' nɨto ' ɨpɨtɨ kon wapu pe ,

text: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace ;
text2: a ' ta kon temaikai ' tʉusewankamai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' wakʉ ekareei ya ' wakʉ pe iye ' kamasa ' pe .

text: Above all , taking the shield of faith , wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked .
text2: Serɨ tonpa ton pe apurɨto ' anʉntɨ ' awapu kon pe , serɨ ke tanporon ɨri pʉre ton i ' nɨ ' panʉkʉ kon pa .

text: And take the helmet of salvation , and the sword of the Spirit , which is the word of God :
text2: Epika ' tɨn nɨto ' anʉntɨ ' ayarʉkooi kon pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨsuparaai kon pe Iya ' kwarʉ , Papa Maimu pe te ' sen .

text: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit , and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints ;
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨpʉrematɨ ' Iya ' kwarʉ yau tanporo te ' ku ' sen a ' tai rɨ , ti ' tui ' pʉra rɨ ɨpʉreman nɨto ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ esa ' to ' yai . Serɨ itewan yau esii ' ma , tenu ke esii ' ma mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tɨwɨrɨ rɨ ɨpʉremai ' ma tanporon kon wakʉ ton pona .

text: And for me , that utterance may be given unto me , that I may open my mouth boldly , to make known the mystery of the gospel ,
text2: Upona nɨrɨ ɨpʉrematɨ ' , unta a ' koka uya a ' tai , main ke urepato ' pe enari ' mʉra tonan tawon itekare ku ' to ' pe uya ti ' tusen pe ,

text: For which I am an ambassador in bonds : that therein I may speak boldly , as I ought to speak .
text2: kʉrɨ rɨ pe rɨ enno ' sa ' pe e ' ai ' ne ' i ' sen yau . Ɨpʉrematɨ ' enari ' mʉra ekamato ' pe uya , e ' to ' awɨrɨ .

text: But that ye also may know my affairs , and how I do , Tychicus , a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord , shall make known to you all things :
text2: Tai ' ki ' kas , tonpa rʉ ' kwɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyawɨron apiyo ' Itepuru yau , uya tanporon nɨ ekama mɨrɨ ɨpɨ ' nokon , i ' tu kon pa mɨrɨ kasa esi mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' esi .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that ye might know our affairs , and that he might comfort your hearts .
text2: Ennoko uya ɨpiya ' nokon mɨrɨ pɨkɨrɨ , ina i ' tu kon pa mɨrɨ kasa ina esi tukai ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨpori ' manin kon pe .

text: Peace be to the brethren , and love with faith , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Tʉusewankamai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ usi ' nʉnkan nɨto ' apurɨto ' pokon pe Papa , Ikʉipʉnʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Itepuru Sises Kʉrai winon nesii utonpa kon enakan pe .

text: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity . Amen .
text2: Tɨwɨ wakʉ nonkasa ' nesii kamo uyepuru kon Sises Kʉrai i ' nʉnkato ' to ' uya usenkʉ ' sa ' pʉra na ' ne ' nan enakan pe .

text: Paul and Timotheus , the servants of Jesus Christ , to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi , with the bishops and deacons :
text2: Paarʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Temu ' ti , Sises Kʉrai poitorʉ ton winɨpaino , Tanporo wakʉ ton a ' samʉtʉ pe so ' si epuru ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' pika ' tɨnin nan pokon pe te ' san Sises Kʉrai yau Piri ' pai yau te ' san enakan :

text: Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Wakʉ nonkasa ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉusewankamai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' nesii ɨyenakan kon pe , Papa , ukʉipʉnʉ kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Itepuru Sises Kʉrai winɨpaino .

text: I thank my God upon every remembrance of you ,
text2: Tenki tapɨtʉ uya Papa pɨ ' ɨyenuminkapɨtʉ uya ' nokon kaisarɨ rɨ .

text: Always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy ,
text2: Tanporo ɨpona ' nokon ɨpʉrema yau , tɨwɨrɨ rɨ ɨpʉrema pori ' pe esii ' ma ,

text: For your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now ;
text2: apʉne pʉra utonpa pe ɨwesi kon wakʉ itekare yau , iye ' sara ' tɨ ' pʉ si ' kɨrɨ serɨ pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ ,

text: Being confident of this very thing , that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ :
text2: serɨ i ' tu uya pɨ ' kuru rɨ , kʉrɨ wakʉ tʉrawaso piya ' tɨnin nʉ ' pʉ ayau ' nokon uya ikupʉ iu ' matʉ pʉ ' kʉ pona , Sises Kʉrai uyepʉ weyu pʉ ' kʉ pona .

text: Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all , because I have you in my heart ; inasmuch as both in my bonds , and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel , ye all are partakers of my grace .
text2: Iye ' to ' pe rɨ serɨ kasa e ' ku ' ai ' tanporo ɨpɨ ' nokon , apʉne pʉra uyewan yau ɨkupʉ uya ' nokon pɨ ' , ɨ ' rɨ pe rɨ esi yau a ' sisa ' pe mɨrɨ pe pʉra e ' wa ' kʉtʉ yau mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wakʉ itekare meruntɨtanʉkʉ uya yau , tanporo ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon uya Papa uya wakʉ nonkasa ' eporo upokon pe .

text: For God is my record , how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ .
text2: Papa uya tanporo ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon i ' se e ' to ' ekama mɨrɨ Kʉrai Sises usi ' nʉnkato ' ike ke .

text: And this I pray , that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all judgment ;
text2: Serɨ serɨ ɨpʉremato ' : ɨusi ' nʉnkato ' kon enato ' pe miyarɨ rɨ eke pe i ' tunin pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipan pe ennin pe ,

text: That ye may approve things that are excellent ; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ ;
text2: mɨrɨ si wakʉ pe te ' sen i ' tunin pe ɨwesi kon pa , ɨri tato ' ipɨ ' pe pʉra mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ esuken Kʉrai weyu pʉ ' kʉ pona ,

text: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness , which are by Jesus Christ , unto the glory and praise of God .
text2: ipokena ' pe e ' nɨto ' nepetanʉkʉnʉ ke itarʉ ' tɨsa ' pe tʉuye ' sen Sises Kʉrai poro — eke pe Papa ku ' to ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ apurɨpɨ ' to ' pe .

text: But I would ye should understand , brethren , that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel ;
text2: I ' tu auya ' nokon i ' se e ' ai ' , utonpa ton , iye ' ku ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ upɨ ' uya miyarɨ rɨ wakʉ itekare usekama ku ' sa ' man .

text: So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace , and in all other places ;
text2: Mɨrɨ moron nʉ ' pʉ pe tensen pe tanporo kopʉna pata ' se ' erasu ton koro ' tawɨrɨ iyenasa ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporon kon pona rɨ Kʉrai iwano ' pe i ' sen yau esi .

text: And many of the brethren in the Lord , waxing confident by my bonds , are much more bold to speak the word without fear .
text2: Uya ' sisa ' wenai tu ' ke rɨ tonpa ton pe te ' san Itepuru yau , epori ' mapɨ ' sa ' tʉusauro ' san pe Papa Maimu pɨ ' epiyɨ ' kena ' pe pʉra mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ enari ' mʉra .

text: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife ; and some also of good will :
text2: I ' nairɨ rɨ iyesi tʉron kon uya Kʉrai ekareei ekama tɨkɨnta kon pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉusakorota kon pe , e ' tane tʉron kon uya ekama wakʉ pe kuru nin iteseru esii ' ma .

text: The one preach Christ of contention , not sincerely , supposing to add affliction to my bonds :
text2: Serɨ pe iwa na ' ne ' nan uya ikupʉ usi ' nʉnkan nɨto ' yau , i ' tui ' ma serɨ ya ' e ' tʉsa ' esi wakʉ itekare wapu pe .

text: But the other of love , knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel .
text2: Wapiyaro ' kon uya itekare ekama ' pʉ Kʉrai pɨ ' tiwano ' kon pe ɨnku ' pai te ' to ' kon i ' napai rɨ pʉra rɨ , ekamʉn ne ' nin pe upona a ' sisa ' pe esi koro ' tau .

text: What then ? notwithstanding , every way , whether in pretence , or in truth , Christ is preached ; and I therein do rejoice , yea , and will rejoice .
text2: E ' tane , ɨ ' rɨ pe ken iyesi ? Eke esi mɨrɨ tanporon yau , kasi ye ' rɨ eseru wannɨ mɨrɨ pe pʉra i ' nairo ' yau , Kʉrai ekareei usekamasa ' ; serɨ wenai nin si pori ' pe esi . Ewai ' , miyarɨ rɨ epori ' man pɨ ' esi ,

text: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer , and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ ,
text2: i ' tu uya wenai ɨwɨpʉremato ' kon winɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ epika ' tɨto ' esi Sises Kʉrai a ' kwarʉ winɨ , serɨ iye ' ku ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ upɨ ' esi mɨrɨ upa ' kanin pe .

text: According to my earnest expectation and my hope , that in nothing I shall be ashamed , but that with all boldness , as always , so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body , whether it be by life , or by death .
text2: Enurikʉ serɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ e ' ku ' to ' esi epiyɨ ' to ' pe pʉra , e ' tane enari ' ke ' pʉra e ' to ' serɨ pe siya rɨ Kʉrai namato ' pe upun yau , uko ' manto ' yau mɨrɨ pe pʉra eri ' to ' yau .

text: For to me to live is Christ , and to die is gain .
text2: Apʉne pʉra urɨ pona , uko ' man nɨ pe Kʉrai esi , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eri ' nɨ esi eporo pe .

text: But if I live in the flesh , this is the fruit of my labour : yet what I shall choose I wot not .
text2: Apʉne pʉra uko ' mamʉ pe iyesi yau upun yau rɨ , serɨ esi mɨrɨ miyarɨ rɨ epekena ' pe e ' tʉrawasoma ta e ' kwa pe . Mɨrɨ rɨ e ' tane , ɨ ' rɨ kuru ken si anʉmʉ uya ? I ' tu uya pʉra rɨ iyesi !

text: For I am in a strait betwixt two , having a desire to depart , and to be with Christ ; which is far better :
text2: Ekaraka serɨ asa ' ron a ' sanau : emo ' kapai rɨ esi mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Kʉrai a ' kɨrɨ e ' to ' pe , wakʉ pe kuru rɨ nin ;

text: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you .
text2: e ' tane miyarɨ rɨ ɨiwano ' kon pe kuru upun yau e ' to ' pe iyesi ,

text: And having this confidence , I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith ;
text2: Si ' tuyai ' rɨ serɨ , si ' tuyai ' serɨ yau rɨ e ' to ' esi tukai ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporo aya ' kɨrɨ ' nokon nɨ esi mɨrɨ ikupʉ kon pa mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pori ' pe ɨwesi kon pa apurɨto ' auya ' nokon yau ,

text: That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again .
text2: mɨrɨ kasa si urɨ esi ɨpiyau ' nokon kanan uya pori ' pe ɨkupʉ kon , Kʉrai Sises yau ɨwe ' to ' kon anʉ ' kato ' pe urɨ pɨkɨrɨ .

text: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ : that whether I come and see you , or else be absent , I may hear of your affairs , that ye stand fast in one spirit , with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel ;
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ rɨ e ' ku ' tane , ɨiwano ' kon pe rɨ iye ' to ' awɨrɨ Kʉrai ekareei yau e ' tɨ ' . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , uyepʉ ɨyense ' na ' nokon , mɨrɨ pe pʉra eta uya rɨken ɨpɨ ' nokon , urɨ pʉra rɨ iye ' tane i ' tu uya rɨ mɨrɨ , ɨye ' soto ' kasa ' kon pana ' pe tikin nɨ iya ' kwarʉ tikin nan ka ' pon pe itekare apurɨto ' pɨ ' ,

text: And in nothing terrified by your adversaries : which is to them an evident token of perdition , but to you of salvation , and that of God .
text2: tenari ' nʉnse pʉra ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' rɨ ɨyewa ' nomanin kon nʉkupʉnʉ pɨ ' . Serɨ esi mɨrɨ to ' uya ento ' ipɨ ' , to ' uma ' ta ekamanin , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon nin si epika ' tɨ tane , Papa winɨ .

text: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ , not only to believe on him , but also to suffer for his sake ;
text2: Ɨyena ' nokon iye ' tʉsa ' pɨ ' , Kʉrai iwano ' pe apurɨ kon pa rɨken pen , e ' tane ɨyekota ' mato ' kon pe rɨ iyesi itiwano ' pe ,

text: Having the same conflict which ye saw in me , and now hear to be in me .
text2: mɨrɨ awɨrɨ rɨ sa ' ne ɨutɨ kon esi mɨrɨ e ' suranman pɨ ' uyenta ' tʉine ' awɨrɨ rɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ serɨ pe eta auya ' nokon urɨ rɨ esi e ' suranman pɨ ' .

text: If there be therefore any consolation in Christ , if any comfort of love , if any fellowship of the Spirit , if any bowels and mercies ,
text2: Ɨuko ' manto ' kon Kʉrai yau uya pana ' pe ɨku ' sa ' kon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ isi ' nʉnkato ' uya aya ' kwarʉ kon ne ' sa ' , mɨrɨpan uya Iya ' kwarʉ pokon pe ɨku ' sa ' kon ɨsi ' nʉnkena ' pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨsentu ' kena ' pe ɨtonpa kon amʉ ' pokon pe .

text: Fulfil ye my joy , that ye be likeminded , having the same love , being of one accord , of one mind .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , ipan pe ɨyekama ' po uya ' nokon mararon pe pʉra pori ' pe uku ' tɨ ' ɨsi ' kaisa rɨ tʉusenuminkai ' , tʉusi ' nʉnkai ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tikin nɨ iya ' kwarʉ , tikin nɨ isenuminkato ' te ' se .

text: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory ; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves .
text2: Amʉre ' pe rɨ ɨwesi kon pɨ ' ɨ ' rɨ rɨ kʉ ' ku ' tʉu mɨrɨ pe pʉra rɨ autaperʉka kon pe rɨ , e ' tane se pe rɨ e ' ku ' tɨ ' , tʉron kon kupʉi ' ma wakʉ pe ɨyentai ' nokon .

text: Look not every man on his own things , but every man also on the things of others .
text2: Akaisarɨ ' nokon ɨtonpa kon tense e ' tɨ ' , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon pɨ ' rɨken pen .

text: Let this mind be in you , which was also in Christ Jesus :
text2: Ɨyeseru kon nesii Kʉrai Sises esi ' pʉ kasa :

text: Who , being in the form of God , thought it not robbery to be equal with God :
text2: I ' naino pe kuru rɨ Papa pe te ' sen , e ' tane Papa kaisa rɨ esi i ' se iyesi ' pʉ pen , ta ' sisen pe ,

text: But made himself of no reputation , and took upon him the form of a servant , and was made in the likeness of men :
text2: e ' tane tanporon nɨ nonka ' pʉ iya , i ' naino ipoitorʉ pe e ' nɨto ' anʉmʉ ' pʉ iya , ka ' pon pe tekonekasa ' pɨ ' .

text: And being found in fashion as a man , he humbled himself , and became obedient unto death , even the death of the cross .
text2: Ka ' pon pe si tʉusene pɨ ' , se pe rɨ iyena ' pʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uma ' tan nɨto ' maimu awɨrɨ rɨ iyesi ' pʉ — kurusu ' po rɨ uma ' tan nɨto ' !

text: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him , and given him a name which is above every name :
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , Papa uya anʉmʉ ' pʉ kakʉi ' kuru rɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itese ' ke irepa ' pʉ iya , tanporo ese ' pe te ' sen entaino ke rɨ ,

text: That at the name of Jesus every knee should bow , of things in heaven , and things in earth , and things under the earth ;
text2: mɨrɨ pɨ ' Sises ese ' pɨ ' tanporon ese ' mu ton e ' sekunka , Epʉn yawon kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ non pon kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ non o ' non kon ,

text: And that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord , to the glory of God the Father .
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporon kon uya ekama Sises Kʉrai esi Itepuru pe , Papa Ikʉipʉnʉ ku ' to ' eke pe kupʉ pe .

text: Wherefore , my beloved , as ye have always obeyed , not as in my presence only , but now much more in my absence , work out your own salvation with fear and trembling .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , utonpa ton nʉ ' kwɨ , main awɨron kon pe rɨ ɨwe ' pɨtʉ kon — moro rɨken esi pɨ ' pen , e ' tane serɨ pe mɨrɨ entai ipʉra esi pɨ ' — ɨyepika ' tɨto ' kon tʉrawasooi pɨ ' rɨ e ' tɨ ' ɨyetʉipɨtʉ kon , e ' tɨtɨtɨ ' ka pe rɨ ,

text: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure .
text2: apʉne pʉra Papa e ' tʉrawasoma ayau ' nokon iku ' nin pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨnku ' pai ɨwesi kon pa ipori ' manin pe te ' sen .

text: Do all things without murmurings and disputings :
text2: Tanporon nɨ iku ' tɨ ' tepatakai ' pʉra mɨrɨ pe pʉra te ' sei ' pɨ ' se pʉra ,

text: That ye may be blameless and harmless , the sons of God , without rebuke , in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation , among whom ye shine as lights in the world ;
text2: mɨrɨ si wakʉ pe , ɨri pʉra mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ esuken ɨwesi kon pa Papa munkɨ pe , tʉuko ' mansan pe ɨri yau mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨri ton koro ' tau tʉma ' takʉʉi ke pʉra . To ' koro ' tau e ' wei ' tɨtɨ ' sirikɨ amʉ ' te ' wei ' tɨsan kasa ka ' yau ;

text: Holding forth the word of life ; that I may rejoice in the day of Christ , that I have not run in vain , neither laboured in vain .
text2: to ' pɨ ' uko ' man nɨto ' ekareei ekama auya ' nokon koro ' tau . Mɨrɨ kupʉ auya ' nokon yau , utapurɨto ' esi mɨrɨ Kʉrai weyu a ' tai , apʉne pʉra enpoika iya mɨrɨ utʉrawasooi , unkuu ' pʉ e ' sa ' pʉra iyesi notʉn pe .

text: Yea , and if I be offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith , I joy , and rejoice with you all .
text2: E ' tane ɨ ' rɨ pe pʉra rɨ iyesi use ' man nɨto ' ike pe te ' sen tensisen kasa rɨ use ' man nɨto ' pona rɨ e ' ma tane apurɨto ' auya ' nokon winɨ , pori ' pe rɨ esi epori ' ma rɨ tanporo aya ' kɨrɨ ' nokon .

text: For the same cause also do ye joy , and rejoice with me .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ pori ' pe e ' tɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ epori ' matɨ ' upokon pe .

text: But I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timotheus shortly unto you , that I also may be of good comfort , when I know your state .
text2: Itepuru Sises yau , e ' kupʉ kuru rɨ serɨ Temu ' ti enno ' to ' pe uya serɨ pe ' ne rɨ ɨpiya ' nokon , pori ' pe e ' to ' pe ɨyekareei kon etasa ' uya a ' tai .

text: For I have no man likeminded , who will naturally care for your state .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' pʉra rɨ man iwaraino , i ' napai rɨ ɨuko ' manto ' kon ennin .

text: For all seek their own , not the things which are Jesus Christ ' s .
text2: Tanporon kon nɨ nin esi tiwano ' kon pɨ ' , Sises Kʉrai iwano ' pɨ ' pen nɨ nin .

text: But ye know the proof of him , that , as a son with the father , he hath served with me in the gospel .
text2: Temu ' ti i ' tusa ' auya ' nokon nɨ , imu esi tʉkʉipʉnʉ a ' kɨrɨ kasa uya ' kɨrɨ iye ' sa ' wakʉ itekare tʉrawasooi yau .

text: Him therefore I hope to send presently , so soon as I shall see how it will go with me .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , enno ' to ' pe uya kuru rɨ e ' kupʉ serɨ inke pʉra ɨ ' rɨ pe rɨ te ' sen e ' kupʉ ensa ' uya a ' tai upɨ ' .

text: But I trust in the Lord that I also myself shall come shortly .
text2: Urɨ nɨrɨ esi uyenu yau Itepuru yau serɨ pe rɨ urɨ rɨ utɨto ' oton pɨ ' .

text: Yet I supposed it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus , my brother , and companion in labour , and fellowsoldier , but your messenger , and he that ministered to my wants .
text2: E ' tane usenuminka serɨ E ' pa ' pʉrotai ' tas na ' po pɨ ' ɨpiya ' nokon , utonpa , uya ' kɨrɨ te ' tʉrawasomasen , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uisakon pe soisa pe te ' sen , amaimu kon nɨrɨ ekamanin , ɨnennoko ' pʉ kon i ' se e ' to ' ennin pe .

text: For he longed after you all , and was full of heaviness , because that ye had heard that he had been sick .
text2: Apʉne pʉra ɨyenpai ' nokon iyesi mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ika ' nɨ ' pʉra rɨ iyesi , apʉne pʉra takuru ' ke iyesi tawon etasa ' auya ' nokon pɨ ' .

text: For indeed he was sick nigh unto death : but God had mercy on him ; and not on him only , but on me also , lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow .
text2: I ' nai rɨ , takuru ' ke iyesi ' pʉ , ima ' taiwa ' pʉ rɨ . E ' tane Papa usentu ' ma ' pʉ ipɨ ' , kʉrɨ rɨ pɨ ' rɨken pen , urɨ pɨ ' rɨ nɨrɨ , pokoi pe e ' to ' tonpa ' tɨ pe rɨ iyesi namai ' pokoi ke .

text: I sent him therefore the more carefully , that , when ye see him again , ye may rejoice , and that I may be the less sorrowful .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , miyarɨ rɨ mɨrɨ pɨ ' ɨnenno ' pai esi ensa ' auya ' nokon a ' tai kanan , ɨyepori ' ma kon pa mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ usewankamato ' pʉra iye ' to ' pe .

text: Receive him therefore in the Lord with all gladness ; and hold such in reputation :
text2: Mereutanʉ ' tɨi ' Itepuru yau ipan pe , pori ' pe esii ' ma , ka ' pon amʉ ' kʉrɨ rɨ waraino kon mʉnamatʉi ' ,

text: Because for the work of Christ he was nigh unto death , not regarding his life , to supply your lack of service toward me .
text2: apʉne pʉra ima ' taiwa ' pʉ rɨ Kʉrai tʉrawasooi pɨ ' , ɨsɨ rɨ tʉuma ' tato ' annau rɨ iyena ' pʉ upika ' tɨnin pe , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon uya ikupʉ poken pʉra iyesi pɨ ' .

text: Finally , my brethren , rejoice in the Lord . To write the same things to you , to me indeed is not grievous , but for you it is safe .
text2: Iu ' matʉ pe rɨ si , utonpa ton , Itepuru pɨ ' pori ' pe e ' tɨ ' ! Mɨrɨ rʉ ' pʉ rɨ marɨ menuka uya ɨyena ' nokon uya uyanpokʉmato ' pʉra man , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨserasu kon pe iyesi .

text: Beware of dogs , beware of evil workers , beware of the concision .
text2: Kamo pero amʉ ' enei ' ma e ' tɨ ' , kamo ka ' pon amʉ ' makoi ku ' nin nan , kamo pun ma ' tanʉ ' nin nan .

text: For we are the circumcision , which worship God in the spirit , and rejoice in Christ Jesus , and have no confidence in the flesh .
text2: Apʉne pʉra urɨ ' nokon kamoro iputurʉkasa ' ton , tʉwɨpʉremasan Papa A ' kwarʉ awɨrɨ , Kʉrai Sises apurɨto ' ipɨkɨrɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pun kupʉ pɨ ' tenu kon yau te ' san pen —

text: Though I might also have confidence in the flesh . If any other man thinketh that he hath whereof he might trust in the flesh , I more :
text2: urɨ rɨ mɨrɨ wenai uyenu yau esi tato ' uya e ' tane . Ɨnʉ ' rɨ usenuminka yau mɨrɨ wenai ipun esi uyenu yau tukai ' , urɨ man mɨrɨ entai rɨ :

text: Circumcised the eighth day , of the stock of Israel , of the tribe of Benjamin , an Hebrew of the Hebrews ; as touching the law , a Pharisee ;
text2: itun pi ' pɨ iputurʉkasa ' 8 pan wʉi a ' tai , ka ' pon amʉ ' Esuwerʉ pon kon pe , Pensiman rʉko ' pe , Ipuru amʉ ' pe ; main , Mosi ' winon awɨrɨ , Pari ' si pe ;

text: Concerning zeal , persecuting the church ; touching the righteousness which is in the law , blameless .
text2: ipan pe ɨnku ' paino pe e ' to ' pɨ ' , so ' si amʉ ' kota ' ma pɨ ' ; Mosi ' nʉnonka ' pʉ awɨrɨ e ' nɨ pɨ ' , ima ' takʉʉi pʉra .

text: But what things were gain to me , those I counted loss for Christ .
text2: E ' tane si tɨ , ɨ ' rɨ rɨ eporo uya mɨrɨ winɨ tasa ' uya e ' tane , eposa ' uya pʉra iyesi tukai ' ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ uya Kʉrai uriya ' rɨ si .

text: Yea doubtless , and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord : for whom I have suffered the loss of all things , and do count them but dung , that I may win Christ ,
text2: Mɨrɨ entai , tanporon to ' ka ' nʉkʉ uya teposen pe pʉra rɨ , i ' tu tanporo eke pe te ' sen entai Kʉrai Sises uyepuru i ' tuto ' esi , kʉrɨ rɨ uriya ' tanporon nɨ nonka ' pʉ uya serɨ . Eno ' masa ' pe rɨ ene uya , Kʉrai epoto ' pe uya

text: And be found in him , not having mine own righteousness , which is of the law , but that which is through the faith of Christ , the righteousness which is of God by faith :
text2: kʉrɨ rɨ yau iye ' seposa ' pe e ' to ' pe , uiwano ' pe ipoken e ' to ' pe pen main winɨ tʉuye ' sen , e ' tane mɨ Kʉrai apurɨto ' poro — wakʉ ipokena ' Papa winon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ apurɨto ' winɨ tʉuye ' sen .

text: That I may know him , and the power of his resurrection , and the fellowship of his sufferings , being made conformable unto his death ;
text2: Kʉrai ɨni ' tupai esi mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iye ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ meruntɨrʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ita ' kɨrɨ iyekota ' ma ' pʉ yau esi , ikasa rɨ ena iyeri ' to ' yau ,

text: If by any means I might attain unto the resurrection of the dead .
text2: mɨrɨ pɨ ' si mɨrɨ kasa rɨ iye ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ terikʉ ' pʉ apai eponin pe e ' to ' pe .

text: Not as though I had already attained , either were already perfect : but I follow after , if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus .
text2: Tanporo serɨ ton anʉnka ' sa ' uya pen , mɨrɨ pe pʉra wakʉ pe ekonekaka ' sa ' pen , e ' tane uta ' kwarʉka uta ' sito ' pe Kʉrai Sises uya uya ' sisa ' na ' ne ' pɨ ' .

text: Brethren , I count not myself to have apprehended : but this one thing I do , forgetting those things which are behind , and reaching forth unto those things which are before ,
text2: Utonpa ton , uta ' sika ' sa ' pʉra iwa rɨ man ipɨ ' e ' tane tikin nan kupʉ uya , uye ' ma ' pʉ ta ' te ' sen tʉpu ' tɨka ' nʉ ' se mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ sa ' man pe uta ' kwarʉka urawɨrɨ te ' sen ekare pɨ ' ,

text: I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus .
text2: teposen ekare pɨ ' uta ' kwarʉka epoto ' pe uya , Papa uya ukɨ ' masa ' na ' ne ' ipona Epʉn winɨkʉi ' Kʉrai Sises awɨrɨ .

text: Let us therefore , as many as be perfect , be thus minded : and if in any thing ye be otherwise minded , God shall reveal even this unto you .
text2: Tanporo urɨ ' nokon iyakʉ ' pʉsa ' ton uya ento ' esi . Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉron nɨ airɨ usauro ' ai ' ne ' pɨ ' tʉron nɨ pe ɨusenuminka kon yau , mɨrɨ rɨ kanan enpoika Papa uya ɨyena ' nokon .

text: Nevertheless , whereto we have already attained , let us walk by the same rule , let us mind the same thing .
text2: Utɨnpai ' nokon eporo ' pʉ uya ' nokon na ' ne ' awɨrɨ rɨken .

text: Brethren , be followers together of me , and mark them which walk so as ye have us for an ensample .
text2: Tʉron kon a ' kɨrɨ e ' sara ' tɨtɨ ' unkupʉ ' pʉ kupʉ pɨ ' utonpa ton , kamo ina nʉkupʉ ' pʉ kasa tʉuko ' mansan entɨ ' .

text: ( For many walk , of whom I have told you often , and now tell you even weeping , that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ :
text2: Apʉne pʉra wapiya tapɨtʉ pɨ ' rɨ e ' sa ' ɨpɨ ' nokon , serɨ pe kanan si takapʉ uya akaramʉi ' ma , tu ' kan kon nɨ uko ' mamʉ Kʉrai kurusukuui eyaton pe .

text: Whose end is destruction , whose God is their belly , and whose glory is in their shame , who mind earthly things . )
text2: To ' utɨto ' ya ' esi uma ' tan nɨto ' , to ' e ' to ' itese ' pɨ ' esi to ' ewan , to ' e ' to ' eke pe esi to ' epiyɨ ' to ' yau . To ' usenuminkato ' esi non eseru pɨ ' rɨ .

text: For our conversation is in heaven ; from whence also we look for the Saviour , the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: E ' tane urɨ ' nokon esi Epʉn pon kon pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ enuri ' nɨ ' nokon itenupɨkɨrɨ pika ' tɨnin Itepuru Sises Kʉrai uyepʉ mɨrɨ winɨ ,

text: Who shall change our vile body , that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body , according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself .
text2: imeruntɨrʉ uya tanporon nɨ ena iyo ' koi ' emapu ' tɨ , sepan nɨ upun kon ensima iya , a ' kwa tʉpun kasa iye ' to ' pe .

text: Therefore , my brethren dearly beloved and longed for , my joy and crown , so stand fast in the Lord , my dearly beloved .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , utonpa ton , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon uni ' nʉnkanʉ ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itenupɨkɨrɨ e ' to ' ton , pori ' pe uku ' nin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uyarʉko kʉron ton , mɨrɨ kasa kuru meruntɨ pe Itepuru yau te ' mʉ ' sa ' kai ' e ' tɨ ' , utonpa ton nʉ ' kwɨ !

text: I beseech Euodias , and beseech Syntyche , that they be of the same mind in the Lord .
text2: Iyotiya mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Sinti ' ki , ɨyekama ' po uya ' nokon ipan pe ɨseseru yau ɨwesi kon pa Itepuru yau .

text: And I intreat thee also , true yokefellow , help those women which laboured with me in the gospel , with Clement also , and with other my fellowlabourers , whose names are in the book of life .
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ , uisakon pe te ' tʉrawasomasen ekama ' po uya pʉsamoro uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' ipika ' tɨkɨ uya ' kɨrɨ wakʉ itekare pɨ ' ita ' sisa ' kon , Kʉremen pokon pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉron kon e ' tʉrawasoma tonpa ton , to ' ese ' e ' menukapɨ ' sa ' na ' ne ' uko ' man nɨto ' karetaai pɨ ' .

text: Rejoice in the Lord alway : and again I say , Rejoice .
text2: Pori ' pe Itepuru yau e ' tɨ ' tɨwɨrɨ rɨ . Takapʉ uya kanan : Pori ' pe e ' tɨ ' !

text: Let your moderation be known unto all men . The Lord is at hand .
text2: Tɨwɨ tanporon kon pɨ ' ɨsɨ pe pʉra ɨwe ' to ' nʉsenei . A ' ko pe Itepuru man .

text: Be careful for nothing ; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ pɨ ' rɨ kɨsewankamatʉu , e ' tane tanporon yau rɨ , ɨwɨpʉrema kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ekama ' po auya ' nokon yau , ɨyepori ' ma kon pe , ɨnesakʉnʉ kon itʉtɨ ' Papa ena ' .

text: And the peace of God , which passeth all understanding , shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉusewankamai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' Papa iwano ' , tanporon nɨ ito ' ka ' nʉ ' to ' entaino rɨ esi ɨyewan kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨusenuminkato ' kon erasu pe Kʉrai Sises yau .

text: Finally , brethren , whatsoever things are true , whatsoever things are honest , whatsoever things are just , whatsoever things are pure , whatsoever things are lovely , whatsoever things are of good report ; if there be any virtue , and if there be any praise , think on these things .
text2: Iu ' matʉ pe rɨ , utonpa ton , ɨ ' rɨ rɨ i ' nai rɨ na ' ne ' , ɨ ' rɨ rɨ tese ke na ' ne ' , ɨ ' rɨ rɨ ipokena ' , ɨ ' rɨ rɨ esukenan , ɨ ' rɨ rɨ wakʉ pe oso tato ' ipɨ ' pe na ' ne ' , ɨ ' rɨ rɨ en yau na ' ne ' — ɨ ' rɨ rɨ wakʉ pe kuru rɨ na ' ne ' mɨrɨ pe pʉra tapurɨpɨ ' sen ye ' pe , mɨrɨ waraino ton pɨ ' kuru ɨsenuminkatɨ ' .

text: Those things , which ye have both learned , and received , and heard , and seen in me , do : and the God of peace shall be with you .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ rɨ uwinɨpai ɨusenupa ' pʉ kon pɨ ' mɨrɨ pe pʉra ananʉmʉ ' pʉ kon mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨneta ' pʉ kon mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨnene ' pʉ kon uyau — iku ' tɨ ' si . Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ nin si Papa usewankaman nɨto ' pʉn nɨ e ' to ' pe ɨpiyau ' nokon .

text: But I rejoiced in the Lord greatly , that now at the last your care of me hath flourished again ; wherein ye were also careful , but ye lacked opportunity .
text2: Eke pe kuru epori ' mayai ' Itepuru yau , emennʉ ' pʉ rɨ upɨ ' ɨusewankamato ' kon enpoikasa ' auya ' nokon pɨ ' . I ' nairɨ rɨ sa ' ne , pena upɨ ' ɨusewankama ' pʉ kon , e ' tane enpoikato ' auya ' nokon a ' tai pʉra iyesi ' pʉ .

text: Not that I speak in respect of want : for I have learned , in whatsoever state I am , therewith to be content .
text2: Ekota ' ma pɨ ' ta uya pen serɨ , apʉne pʉra isenupasa ' urɨ ɨ ' rɨ pe rɨ e ' nɨ yau pori ' pe te ' sen pe .

text: I know both how to be abased , and I know how to abound : every where and in all things I am instructed both to be full and to be hungry , both to abound and to suffer need .
text2: I ' tu uya rɨ ekota ' man nɨto ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' tu uya rɨ eke pe itesa ' pe e ' nɨto ' . Usenupasa ' man mɨrɨ yau e ' nɨto ' eseru pɨ ' pori ' pe te ' sen pe ti ' tui ' pʉra rɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporon yau rɨ e ' nɨto ' pɨ ' , eke pe rɨ tenta ' nai ' mɨrɨ pe pʉra iwan pe rɨ e ' nɨto ' yau ; eke pe rɨ itesa ' pe e ' nɨto ' yau mɨrɨ pe pʉra ipʉra e ' nɨto ' yau .

text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me .
text2: I ' tu uya rɨ , tanporon nɨ kupʉ , imeruntɨrʉ ke .

text: Notwithstanding ye have well done , that ye did communicate with my affliction .
text2: E ' tane wakʉ pe rɨ upika ' tɨ pɨ ' ɨwe ' sa ' kon man ekamʉn yau esi koro ' tau .

text: Now ye Philippians know also , that in the beginning of the gospel , when I departed from Macedonia , no church communicated with me as concerning giving and receiving , but ye only .
text2: Mɨrɨ tonpa ' tɨ pe , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon Piri ' pai pon kon ni ' tuyai ' ne ' kasa rɨ , pena wakʉ itekare to ' ka ' nʉkʉ pɨ ' ɨyena kon yau Ma ' sitoniya poi utɨ a ' tai , tikin nan nɨ so ' si uya upika ' tɨsa ' pʉra iyesi urɨ tʉrepai ' i ' se e ' to ' ke , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon nɨken ;

text: For even in Thessalonica ye sent once and again unto my necessity .
text2: Tesaroni ' ka po rɨ kanan esi a ' tai i ' se e ' to ' enno ' pɨtʉ pɨ ' ɨwe ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ kon .

text: Not because I desire a gift : but I desire fruit that may abound to your account .
text2: Urepato ' auya ' nokon , enupɨkɨrɨ esi pen , e ' tane ɨnkupʉ ' pʉ kon epe ' pʉ eporo auya ' nokon enupɨkɨrɨ nin esi .

text: But I have all , and abound : I am full , having received of Epaphroditus the things which were sent from you , an odour of a sweet smell , a sacrifice acceptable , wellpleasing to God .
text2: Tanporo kuru rɨ , iye ' to ' entai rɨ ɨwinɨpai ' nokon eposa ' uya man , serɨ kanan si epoka ' sa ' uya E ' pa ' pʉrotai ' tas winɨ ɨnennoko ' pʉ kon urepato ' auya ' nokon ike . A ' po ' nan ikɨtun tʉtʉsen pe iyesi , tanʉnsen ye ' use ' man nɨto ' pe iyesi Papa pori ' manin pe iyesi .

text: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' nin si Papa itese ' pɨ ' e ' to ' uya tanporon nɨ i ' se ɨwe ' to ' kon ke ɨrepa kon mɨrɨ eke pe rɨ itesa ' pe te ' to ' ke Kʉrai Sises yawɨrɨ .

text: Now unto God and our Father be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Papa itese ' pɨ ' e ' nɨto ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ukʉipʉnʉ kon iwano ' pe eke pe iku ' to ' nesii inke rɨ , inke rɨ te ' sen pe . Amen .

text: Salute every saint in Christ Jesus . The brethren which are with me greet you .
text2: “ Miyarɨ , ” ka ' tɨ ' Kʉrai Sises yau wakʉ ton pɨ ' . Utonpa kon amʉ ' upiyawon kon , “ Miyarɨ , ” tato ' ennoko pɨ ' man .

text: All the saints salute you , chiefly they that are of Caesar ' s household .
text2: Tanporo wakʉ ton , “ Miyarɨ , ” tato ' ennoko pɨ ' man ɨyena ' nokon , kamoro kuru Sisa iwʉ ' tawon kon .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Wakʉ nonkasa ' Itepuru Sises Kʉrai iwano ' nesii aya ' kwarʉ kon piyau . Amen .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timotheus our brother ,
text2: Paarʉ , Kʉrai Sises nennoko ' pʉ itekare ekamai ' Papa eseru awɨrɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ utonpa kon Temu ' ti winɨpaino ,

text: To the saints and faithful brethren in Christ which are at Colosse : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Wakʉ ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉusaurokʉ ' pʉ awɨron kon tonpa ton Kʉrai yau Koro ' se pon kon enakan : Tɨwɨ wakʉ nonkasa ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉusewankamai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' nesii ɨyenakan kon pe , Papa , ukʉipʉnʉ kon winon .

text: We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , praying always for you ,
text2: Inke rɨ tenki ta pɨ ' ina man , Papa , uyepuru kon Sises Kʉrai kʉipʉnʉ pɨ ' , ina ɨpʉrema ɨpona ' nokon a ' tai ,

text: Since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus , and of the love which ye have to all the saints ,
text2: apʉne pʉra Kʉrai Sises apurɨsa ' auya ' nokon pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporo wakʉ ton i ' nʉnkasa ' auya ' nokon etasa ' ina uya pɨ ' —

text: For the hope which is laid up for you in heaven , whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel ;
text2: apurɨto ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ usi ' nʉnkan nɨto ' Epʉn po na ' ne ' ɨiwano ' kon pe ɨye ' ku ' to ' kon pɨkɨron , ɨnetakaa ' pʉ kon nʉ ' pʉ i ' nairon main yau , wakʉ itekare

text: Which is come unto you , as it is in all the world ; and bringeth forth fruit , as it doth also in you , since the day ye heard of it , and knew the grace of God in truth :
text2: ɨpiya ' nokon iye ' sa ' na ' ne ' . Tanporo non poro serɨ wakʉ itekare esi epetan pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ epan nɨ pɨ ' , ɨ ' koro ' tau ' nokon ne ' ku ' taine ' kasa kuru eta ' pʉ auya ' nokon si ' kɨrɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa uya wakʉ nonkasa ' to ' ka ' nʉkʉ ' pʉ auya ' nokon tanporo i ' nai rɨ iye ' to ' yau .

text: As ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellowservant , who is for you a faithful minister of Christ ;
text2: Serɨ pɨ ' ɨusenupasa ' kon ina tonpa rʉ ' kwɨ E ' pa ' pʉras winɨ , Kʉrai apiyo ' pe tʉusaurokʉ ' pʉ awɨrɨ te ' tʉrawasomasen ina pe rɨ ,

text: Who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit .
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ekama ' pʉ iya ina pɨ ' ɨusi ' nʉnkato ' kon esi Iya ' kwarʉ uya ɨkupʉ kon ke .

text: For this cause we also , since the day we heard it , do not cease to pray for you , and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding ;
text2: Mɨrɨ wenai , ɨyeta ' pʉ kon tʉuya ' nokon si ' kɨrɨ ɨpona ' nokon tʉwɨpʉremato ' kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa ekama ' poto ' tʉuya ' nokon ayarʉ ' tɨto ' kon pe iya iteseru i ' tuto ' auya ' nokon ike ke tanporo iya ' kwarʉ ipu ' ketʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ito ' ka ' nʉ ' to ' poro ereutanʉ ' sa ' ina uya pʉra rɨ iyesi .

text: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing , being fruitful in every good work , and increasing in the knowledge of God ;
text2: Ina ɨpʉrema serɨ pɨ ' ɨuko ' mamʉ kon pa Itepuru enu yau wakʉ pe te ' sen uko ' man nɨto ' yau , mɨrɨpan pori ' manin pe ɨwesi kon pa tanporon yau rɨ , tanporon yau rɨ wakʉ tʉrawaso yau epetan pɨ ' Papa i ' tuto ' yau usemo ' kan pɨ ' ,

text: Strengthened with all might , according to his glorious power , unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness ;
text2: imeruntɨtasa ' pe tanporon meruntɨ ke a ' kwa yau iye ' to ' meruntɨrʉ ke , imoronkato ' esa ' pe ɨwesi kon pa eke pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉuseta ' kai ' pʉra ɨwe ' to ' kon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pori ' pe esii ' ma

text: Giving thanks unto the Father , which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light :
text2: tenki ta pɨ ' Ikʉipʉnʉ pɨ ' , ɨkonekanin nʉ ' pʉ kon wakʉ ton pokon pe ɨwesi kon pa a ' kwa pe iweyu pe te ' sen e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe anʉmʉ pɨ ' .

text: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness , and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son :
text2: Apʉne pʉra ewarupɨ meruntɨrʉ apai umo ' kasa ' iya ' nokon , mɨrɨpan uya une ' sa ' kon tʉmu , tʉni ' nʉnkanʉ e ' to ' esa ' wannɨ pe ya ' ,

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , even the forgiveness of sins :
text2: kʉrɨ rɨ winɨ umakooi kon use ' masa ' , upɨ ' nokon isentu ' ma ke .

text: Who is the image of the invisible God , the firstborn of every creature :
text2: Kʉrai esi tʉusensen pen Papa pe rɨ , Eke Kuru tanporon iye ' ka ' sa ' ton na ' ne ' entaino .

text: For by him were all things created , that are in heaven , and that are in earth , visible and invisible , whether they be thrones , or dominions , or principalities , or powers : all things were created by him , and for him :
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ winɨ Papa uya tanporon nɨ koneka ' pʉ : ka ' yawon ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ non pon ton nɨ , tʉusensen mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉusensen pen , apono ' amʉ ' , pata esanon , meruntɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eke ton nɨ kanan ; tanporon ekoneka ' pʉ iwinɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itiwano ' pe .

text: And he is before all things , and by him all things consist .
text2: Tanporon nɨ wapiyaro ' pe iyesi , mɨrɨpan yau tanporon nɨ uta ' si a ' samʉtʉ pe .

text: And he is the head of the body , the church : who is the beginning , the firstborn from the dead ; that in all things he might have the preeminence .
text2: Tʉpun , so ' si i ' pai pe iyesi ; mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipʉrakon pe iyesi , iyepiya ' tɨ pe iyepa ' kasa ' rʉ ' pʉ pe iyesi eri ' nɨto ' apai , mɨrɨ pɨ ' tanporon epoi eke pe kuru te ' to ' pe .

text: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell ;
text2: Apʉne pʉra Papa esi ' pʉ pori ' pe tanporo rɨ tʉmɨrɨ rɨ esi pɨ ' iyau ,

text: And , having made peace through the blood of his cross , by him to reconcile all things unto himself ; by him , I say , whether they be things in earth , or things in heaven .
text2: mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Sises poro tanporon nɨ ekonekato ' pe Papa pokon pe non mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ka ' po na ' ne ' rɨ , kʉrɨ rɨ imʉnʉ iye ' kwansa ' rʉ ' pʉ kurusu ' po uya tʉusewankamai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' ku ' sa ' .

text: And you , that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works , yet now hath he reconciled
text2: Ɨnnɨ Papa piyapai ɨwesi ' pʉ kon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iteyaton non pe ɨwesi ' pʉ kon ɨusenuminkato ' kon yau apʉne pʉra ɨri kupʉ auya ' nokon pɨ ' .

text: In the body of his flesh through death , to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight :
text2: E ' tane serɨ pe ɨkonekasa ' iya ' nokon tʉpokon pe , Kʉrai pun winɨ iyeri ' to ' winɨ , ɨtʉto ' kon pe tʉuya wakʉ pe tenu yau , imaku ' pɨ pe pʉra , ɨpɨ ' nokon e ' nɨto ' iwenai pʉra —

text: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled , and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel , which ye have heard , and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven ; whereof I Paul am made a minister ;
text2: miyarɨ rɨ apurɨto ' auya ' nokon yau ɨwesi kon yau iye ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pana ' pan pe , tʉutamai ' pʉra , ɨye ' ku ' to ' kon apai wakʉ itekare nekama ' pʉ . Serɨ serɨ wakʉ itekare ɨneta ' pʉ kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ isekamasa ' rʉ ' pʉ tanporon kon ika ' sa ' kon pana ya ' ka ' o ' non kon iwano ' pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ urɨ , Paarʉ , enasa ' ipoitorʉ pe wenai .

text: Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you , and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body ' s sake , which is the church :
text2: Serɨ pe si pori ' pe e ' ai ' , ɨiwano ' kon pe ekota ' man nʉ ' pʉ pɨ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ upun yau nin si arʉ ' tɨ uya ipʉra na ' ne ' Kʉrai ekota ' ma ' pʉ airɨ , ipun pɨkɨrɨ , so ' si pe na ' ne ' .

text: Whereof I am made a minister , according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you , to fulfil the word of God ;
text2: Ipoitorʉ pe enasa ' man , Papa nʉtʉrʉ ' pʉ unkupʉnʉ pe uyena ' winɨ , ɨyena ' nokon itʉto ' pe uya imaimu tanporo iye ' to ' awɨrɨ —

text: Even the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations , but now is made manifest to his saints :
text2: ama ' aino tonan tau iko ' mansa ' rʉ ' pʉ inke kuru rɨ penaro ' kon piyapai rɨ nɨrɨ , e ' tane serɨ pe isenpoikasa ' wakʉ ton ena ' .

text: To whom God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles ; which is Christ in you , the hope of glory :
text2: To ' ena ' enpoikato ' pe tʉuya Papa e ' ku ' sa ' Esuwerʉ amʉ ' pen koro ' tau ama ' aino eke pe rɨ te ' sen , Kʉrai pe na ' ne ' ayau ' nokon , eke pe e ' nɨto ' pɨ ' e ' ku ' nɨto ' pe te ' sen .

text: Whom we preach , warning every man , and teaching every man in all wisdom ; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus :
text2: Ina man ekama pɨ ' , ka ' pon amʉ ' auro ' ka pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ to ' enupa pɨ ' tanporon ipu ' ketʉ pokon pe , ina uya tanporon kon tʉto ' pe wakʉ pe Kʉrai yau .

text: Whereunto I also labour , striving according to his working , which worketh in me mightily .
text2: Serɨ pʉ ' kʉ pona e ' tʉrawasoma serɨ , e ' suranman pɨ ' tanporo ipana ' pano ke iye ' tʉrawasoma meruntɨ pe kuru uyau .

text: For I would that ye knew what great conflict I have for you , and for them at Laodicea , and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh ;
text2: I ' tu auya ' nokon i ' se esi sa ' man pe kuru e ' tʉrawasoman pɨ ' esi ɨiwano ' kon pe , Ʉrawote ' siya pon kon iwano ' pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporon kon ka ' pon pe uyennin nʉ ' san pen nɨrɨ .

text: That their hearts might be comforted , being knit together in love , and unto all riches of the full assurance of understanding , to the acknowledgement of the mystery of God , and of the Father , and of Christ ;
text2: Mɨrɨ kupʉ ' pʉ uya pana ' pe to ' e ' to ' pe tewan kon yau mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tikin nɨ tenai ' tʉusi ' nʉnkai ' to ' e ' to ' pe , tanporo , iye ' to ' awɨrɨ , eke pe kuru rɨ ito ' ka ' nʉ ' nin pe e ' nɨto ' epoto ' pe to ' uya ama ' aino Papa eseru i ' tunin pe to ' e ' to ' pe , Kʉrai si .

text: In whom are hid all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge .
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ yau tanporo mamin , pu ' kena ' pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' tunin pe e ' nɨto ' e ' so ' nansa ' na ' ne ' mɨrɨ .

text: And this I say , lest any man should beguile you with enticing words .
text2: Apana ' tɨ uya ' nokon serɨ ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ wakʉ pe rɨ tʉusauro ' se ɨyenku ' tɨ kon namai ' .

text: For though I be absent in the flesh , yet am I with you in the spirit , joying and beholding your order , and the stedfastness of your faith in Christ .
text2: Apʉne pʉra ka ' pon pe ɨpiyau ' nokon e ' tane pʉra rɨ , uya ' kwarʉ yau rɨ ɨpiyau ' nokon esi mɨrɨ , wakʉ pe ɨwesi kon pɨ ' epori ' mapɨ ' nɨ pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pana ' pe kuru Kʉrai apurɨto ' auya ' nokon esi pɨ ' .

text: As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord , so walk ye in him :
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' , Kʉrai Sises anʉnsa ' auya ' nokon pɨ ' Itepuru pe , miyarɨ rɨ iyau ɨko ' mantɨ ' ,

text: Rooted and built up in him , and stablished in the faith , as ye have been taught , abounding therein with thanksgiving .
