text2: E ' tane nin pʉse rɨ use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin uya tikin ite ' kwa rɨ use ' man nɨto ' makoi iwano ' pe tʉrʉ ' pʉ siyaro ' pe rɨ , mɨrɨpan nin si ereutasa ' Papa emiyatʉ enwo ' netʉ winɨ .

text: From henceforth expecting till his enemies be made his footstool .
text2: Mɨrɨ si ' kɨrɨ , iyenurikʉ si ti ' ta apon pe teyaton non koneka enupɨkɨrɨ ,

text: For by one offering he hath perfected for ever them that are sanctified .
text2: apʉne pʉra tikin nan nɨ use ' man nɨto ' ike ke kamoro wakʉ pe tekonekasan konekasa ' iya wakʉ pe inkero ' pe rɨ .

text: Whereof the Holy Ghost also is a witness to us : for after that he had said before ,
text2: Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ uya rɨ nɨrɨ serɨ ekamasa ' upɨ ' nokon . Ta iya wapiya :

text: This is the covenant that I will make with them after those days , saith the Lord , I will put my laws into their hearts , and in their minds will I write them ;
text2: “ Serɨ serɨ to ' pokon pe ekonekato ' mɨrɨ tʉpo , ta Itepuru uya . Main uiwano ' emaika uya to ' ewan ya ' , to ' usenuminkato ' pɨ ' imenuka uya . ”

text: And their sins and iniquities will I remember no more .
text2: Mɨrɨpan pirikʉ iya : “ To ' makooi mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ main uya tato ' awɨrɨ pʉra to ' nʉkupʉnʉ kupʉ uya pen uyenu yau , ” ta iya .

text: Now where remission of these is , there is no more offering for sin .
text2: Serɨ ton pɨ ' si usentu ' man nɨsa ' pɨ ' , makoi ku ' sa ' pɨ ' use ' man nɨto ' pʉra rɨ iyesi mɨrɨ .

text: Having therefore , brethren , boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus ,
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , utonpa ton , ewon nɨ ' nokon Ipan Wakʉ Kuru Pata ya ' tukai ' uyenu kon yau e ' nɨ ' nokon pɨ ' Sises mʉnʉ winɨ ,

text: By a new and living way , which he hath consecrated for us , through the veil , that is to say , his flesh ;
text2: emenna ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ nurɨnan uye ' ma kon uta ' kokasa ' pɨ ' iwapu awɨrɨ , ipun nɨ si ,

text: And having an high priest over the house of God ;
text2: eke si use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin esi pɨ ' Papa iwʉ ' esa ' pe ,

text: Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith , having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience , and our bodies washed with pure water .
text2: uye ' nɨpai ' nokon si a ' ko pe Papa piya ' wakʉ pe itewan , apurɨto ' esa ' pe uyewan kon yau , iyepai ' pai ' masa ' ukorʉkanin kon pe ɨri ku ' nin nʉ ' pʉ pe usi ' tun nɨto ' apai mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ upun kon iyekorʉkasa ' pe esukenan tuna ke .

text: Let us hold fast the profession of our faith without wavering ; ( for he is faithful that promised ; )
text2: Uta ' sinpai ' nokon pana ' pe e ' ku ' nɨto ' unekamanʉ kon pɨ ' , apʉne pʉra isauro ' sa ' rɨ esi tʉusaurokʉ ' pʉ awɨron pe rɨ .

text: And let us consider one another to provoke unto love and to good works :
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ utonpa kon pɨ ' tʉusenuminkasen pe e ' nɨpai ' nokon to ' pori ' manin pe tʉusi ' nʉnkasen pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wakʉ ku ' nin pe to ' e ' to ' pe .

text: Not forsaking the assembling of ourselves together , as the manner of some is ; but exhorting one another : and so much the more , as ye see the day approaching .
text2: Amʉrapɨ ' nɨto ' eseru nonkapai ' nokon pʉra , tʉron kon nʉnonkayai ' ne ' kasa , e ' tane utonpa kon pori ' mapɨ ' pai ' nokon — miyarɨ parɨ apʉne pʉra Iweyu e ' seporo enkapʉ auya ' nokon pɨ ' .

text: For if we sin wilfully after that we have received the knowledge of the truth , there remaineth no more sacrifice for sins ,
text2: Ipɨ ' rɨ te ' ku ' se umakoitan pɨ ' uko ' man nɨ yau i ' nairon anʉnkapʉ tʉpo , mɨrɨ rupɨ makoi iwano ' pe use ' man nɨto ' e ' ku ' sa ' pʉra iyesi mɨrɨ ,

text: But a certain fearful looking for of judgment and fiery indignation , which shall devour the adversaries .
text2: e ' tane enari ' nʉn nɨto ' rɨken eseru aimenkato ' e ' seporo pɨ ' , ɨsɨ rɨ apo ' , Papa eyaton non po ' tɨ ton .

text: He that despised Moses ' law died without mercy under two or three witnesses :
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ Mosi ' winon main awɨron pen wɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ usentu ' man pʉra rɨ ipɨ ' , asa ' ron kon mɨrɨ pe pʉra osorʉwawon kon uya tʉnene ' pʉ kon ɨri kupʉ iya ekamasa ' pɨ ' .

text: Of how much sorer punishment , suppose ye , shall he be thought worthy , who hath trodden under foot the Son of God , and hath counted the blood of the covenant , wherewith he was sanctified , an unholy thing , and hath done despite unto the Spirit of grace ?
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ kaisa rɨ ken si ka ' pon kota ' mato ' pe iyesi , Papa Mumu wasa ' pɨ ' nin ti ' ta ke , sepan pe rɨ tʉkonekanin pe te ' sen ekonekan nɨto ' mʉnʉ ku ' nin , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wakʉ nonkasa ' Iya ' kwarʉ uya sapemanin nʉ ' pʉ tukai ' , mi ' tuyatʉu ?

text: For we know him that hath said , Vengeance belongeth unto me , I will recompense , saith the Lord . And again , The Lord shall judge his people .
text2: I ' tu ' nokon serɨ tawon nʉ ' pʉ , “ Urɨ rɨ e ' manin ; urɨ uya ina ' po , ” mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kanan , “ Itepuru uya tʉmunkɨ amʉ ' eseru aimenka . ”

text: It is a fearful thing to fall into the hands of the living God .
text2: Ɨsɨ pe rɨ iyesi Papa nurɨnan ena ' uta ' mo ' kan .

text: But call to remembrance the former days , in which , after ye were illuminated , ye endured a great fight of afflictions ;
text2: Ɨyenu kon yau nesii iweyu anʉnsa ' auya ' nokon a ' taino rʉ ' pʉ , meruntɨ pe ɨye ' soto ' ka ' pʉ kon eke rɨ sa ' man usi ' tun nɨto ' annawɨrɨ rɨ .

text: Partly , whilst ye were made a gazingstock both by reproaches and afflictions ; and partly , whilst ye became companions of them that were so used .
text2: Tʉron nɨ a ' tai annau rɨ asapemapɨtʉ ' pʉ kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨsɨ pe rɨ ɨkota ' ma ' pʉ kon ; tʉron nɨ a ' tai kamoro mɨrɨ kasa tʉku ' san pokon pe rɨ ɨye ' soto ' pɨtʉ ' pʉ kon .

text: For ye had compassion of me in my bonds , and took joyfully the spoiling of your goods , knowing in yourselves that ye have in heaven a better and an enduring substance .
text2: Kamoro pariki ' si tau te ' san pɨ ' ɨusentu ' mapɨtʉ ' pʉ kon , ɨimamin kon nɨ mo ' kasa ' e ' tane pori ' pe rɨ ɨwesi ' pʉ kon , apʉne pʉra i ' tu auya ' nokon ke wakʉ parɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ inke tʉuko ' mansen ɨiwano ' kon esi pɨ ' .

text: Cast not away therefore your confidence , which hath great recompence of reward .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' ɨyenu kon yau ɨwe ' to ' kon kʉseno ' matʉu ; eke pe ɨyepe ' pʉ kon eporo auya ' nokon mɨrɨ .

text: For ye have need of patience , that , after ye have done the will of God , ye might receive the promise .
text2: Sa ' man annawɨrɨ rɨ ɨutɨto ' kon pe iyesi te ' nonkai ' pʉra , Papa e ' to ' i ' se ku ' sa ' auya ' nokon a ' tai , isaurokʉ ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ iye ' ku ' to ' pe eporo kon pa .

text: For yet a little while , and he that shall come will come , and will not tarry .
text2: Apʉne pʉra serɨ pe iwa ' ne rɨ , “ Tʉuye ' sen uye ' nɨ pɨ ' man , emennʉ ' pʉ iyepʉ pen .

text: Now the just shall live by faith : but if any man draw back , my soul shall have no pleasure in him .
text2: E ' tane ipokena ' e ' pe te ' sen uko ' mamʉ mɨrɨ apurɨto ' winɨ . Tesi ' pʉ ya ' iyenna ' posa ' yau , pori ' pe ipɨ ' esi pen mɨrɨ , ” tasa ' iya .

text: But we are not of them who draw back unto perdition ; but of them that believe to the saving of the soul .
text2: E ' tane urɨ ' nokon kamoro to ' kasa tenna ' posan pen mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉuma ' tasan pen , e ' tane kamoro apurɨnin nan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tepika ' tɨsan iye ' ton pe te ' san .

text: Now faith is the substance of things hoped for , the evidence of things not seen .
text2: Serɨ si apurɨto ' esi mɨrɨ i ' nai rɨ iyesi tato ' e ' ku ' nɨto ' pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ moro kuru iyesi tato ' entane pʉra rɨ .

text: For by it the elders obtained a good report .
text2: Serɨ pɨ ' penaro ' kon apurɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ .

text: Through faith we understand that the worlds were framed by the word of God , so that things which are seen were not made of things which do appear .
text2: Apurɨto ' winɨ ito ' ka ' nʉkʉ tanporo non ekoneka ' pʉ Papa maimu ke , tensen pe na ' ne ' ekoneka ' pʉ tensen pen apai .

text: By faith Abel offered unto God a more excellent sacrifice than Cain , by which he obtained witness that he was righteous , God testifying of his gifts : and by it he being dead yet speaketh .
text2: Apurɨto ' winɨ Eperʉ uya wakʉ tʉuse ' mato ' tʉrʉ ' pʉ Papa ena ' wakʉ Keen nʉtʉrʉnʉ entaino . Apurɨto ' winɨ apurɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ ipokena ' e ' pe te ' sen tukai ' , Papa usauro ' sa ' a ' tai wakʉ pe intʉrʉnʉ ton pɨ ' . Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ apurɨto ' winɨ isaurokʉ rɨ , teri ' sa ' rɨ e ' tane .

text: By faith Enoch was translated that he should not see death ; and was not found , because God had translated him : for before his translation he had this testimony , that he pleased God .
text2: Apurɨto ' winɨ Iino ' enuku ' pʉ serɨ yau uko ' man nɨto ' apai , eri ' nɨto ' i ' tu tʉuya namai ' ; iye ' seporo pʉra rɨ iyesi ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra Papa uya anʉmʉ ' pʉ . Apʉne pʉra itanʉmʉ rawɨrɨ , apurɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ pori ' pe Papa ku ' nin tukai ' .

text: But without faith it is impossible to please him : for he that cometh to God must believe that he is , and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him .
text2: Apurɨto ' pʉra iye ' tane pori ' pe Papa kupʉ auya pʉra iyesi , apʉne pʉra ɨnʉ ' rɨ ipiya ' tʉuye ' sen uya apurɨto ' pe kuru iyesi moro iyesi tukai ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' nai rɨ tʉwarinpanin nan e ' ma iya tukai ' .

text: By faith Noah , being warned of God of things not seen as yet , moved with fear , prepared an ark to the saving of his house ; by the which he condemned the world , and became heir of the righteousness which is by faith .
text2: Apurɨto ' winɨ Nowa esi ' pʉ , tʉpanama a ' tai tʉusensen pen nɨ pɨ ' , Papa nama tʉuya pɨ ' a ' kaa ' pʉ iya tamʉtʉ pokon pe tepika ' tɨto ' yau . Iko ' manto ' winɨ apurɨto ' yau non pon kon eno ' ma ' pʉ iya , e ' tane Papa uya tanʉmʉ kuu ' pʉ iya ipokena ' pe e ' nɨto ' anʉnnin pe apurɨto ' iya winɨ .

text: By faith Abraham , when he was called to go out into a place which he should after receive for an inheritance , obeyed ; and he went out , not knowing whither he went .
text2: Apurɨto ' winɨ Epʉra ' an , tʉkɨ ' masa ' a ' tai tʉutɨto ' pe pata tʉpata ' se ' pe itʉton ya ' , uya apurɨ ' pʉ mɨrɨpan utɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨ ya ' utɨ tukai ' i ' tui ' ma pʉra rɨ .

text: By faith he sojourned in the land of promise , as in a strange country , dwelling in tabernacles with Isaac and Jacob , the heirs with him of the same promise :
text2: Apurɨto ' winɨ tʉpata oton koneka ' pʉ iya usauro ' nɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ ipɨ ' nono yau , ka ' kʉran pe rɨ ɨnnon nɨ pata yau ; ta ' porin tau iko ' manpɨtʉ ' pʉ , Aisi ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Seko ' pokon nɨ nɨrɨ uko ' mamʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ kasa , mɨrɨ rɨ marɨ usauro ' nɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ ipɨ ' eponin nan ipokon pe ,

text: For he looked for a city which hath foundations , whose builder and maker is God .
text2: apʉne pʉra eke pata , tapon kenan , Papa nʉkoneka ' pʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ inamɨ ' pʉ enupɨkɨrɨ tesi kon wenai .

text: Through faith also Sara herself received strength to conceive seed , and was delivered of a child when she was past age , because she judged him faithful who had promised .
text2: Apurɨto ' winɨ Epʉra ' an , ipan pe kɨɨyi ' pe kuru rɨ iyenasa ' e ' tane — mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Sera rɨ kanan e ' tane umu ' tan poken pʉra rɨ — to ' rɨ umu ' ta ' pʉ , apʉne pʉra tʉusaurokʉ ' pʉ awɨrɨ Papa esi tukai ' apurɨ iya wenai .

text: Therefore sprang there even of one , and him as good as dead , so many as the stars of the sky in multitude , and as the sand which is by the sea shore innumerable .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa si pʉse rɨ tikin nan nɨ ka ' pon apai , iyeri ' sa ' pe rɨ te ' sen apai rɨ , tu ' ke rɨ ipayan ton e ' seporo ' pʉ mɨrɨ , itu ' kanoro i ' tu poken pʉra rɨ , sirikɨ amʉ ' ka ' awon kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wɨ ' sɨ ' parau e ' pi pon kasa rɨ .

text: These all died in faith , not having received the promises , but having seen them afar off , and were persuaded of them , and embraced them , and confessed that they were strangers and pilgrims on the earth .
text2: Tanporo pʉsamoro ka ' pon amʉ ' uko ' mamʉ rɨ esi ' pʉ apurɨto ' winɨ tʉuma ' ta kon a ' tai rɨ . Usauro ' nɨsa ' ipɨ ' rʉ ' pʉ eporo ' pʉ to ' uya pen nɨ ; to ' uya rɨken ene ' pʉ ɨnnonsi ' kɨ mɨrɨpan ereutanʉkʉ ' pʉ to ' uya . To ' uya ekama ' pʉ serɨ non esi tʉpata kon pe pʉra tukai ' .

text: For they that say such things declare plainly that they seek a country .
text2: Ka ' pon amʉ ' mɨrɨ tawon nan esi tʉpata kon kuru enupɨkɨrɨ te ' san pe .

text: And truly , if they had been mindful of that country from whence they came out , they might have had opportunity to have returned .
text2: Tʉnnɨmɨnʉ kon tʉpata kon pɨ ' to ' usenuminka yau , to ' rɨ enna ' po ' pʉ nesii ' no .

text: But now they desire a better country , that is , an heavenly : wherefore God is not ashamed to be called their God : for he hath prepared for them a city .
text2: E ' tane ru ' ku , wakʉ kuru pata , Epʉn pon enupɨkɨrɨ to ' esi . Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , Papa ɨpiyɨtʉ pen nɨ , to ' e ' to ' itese ' pɨ ' ta a ' tai tʉpɨ ' , apʉne pʉra to ' pata konekasa ' tʉuya pɨ ' .

text: By faith Abraham , when he was tried , offered up Isaac : and he that had received the promises offered up his only begotten son ,
text2: Apurɨto ' winɨ Epʉra ' an , Papa uya ti ' tupɨtʉ a ' tai , uya Aisi ' tʉrʉ ' pʉ tʉuse ' mato ' ike pe . Kʉrɨ rɨ si usauro ' nɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ eponin nʉ ' pʉ esi ' pʉ tikin nan nɨken tʉmu ke use ' man pɨ ' ,

text: Of whom it was said , That in Isaac shall thy seed be called :
text2: Papa uya rɨ , “ Aisi ' winɨ usauro ' nɨsa ' kon ipɨ ' apayan ton uyepʉ mɨrɨ , ” tasa ' e ' tane .

text: Accounting that God was able to raise him up , even from the dead ; from whence also he received him in a figure .
text2: Epʉra ' an uya i ' tu Papa uya rɨ Aisi ' i ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ima ' tato ' apai tukai ' , Papa uya rɨ si Aisi ' i ' mʉ ' sa ' ka ' pʉ iyerikʉ ' pʉ apai kasa rɨ si .

text: By faith Isaac blessed Jacob and Esau concerning things to come .
text2: Apurɨto ' winɨ Aisi ' uya Seko ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ I ' sa pʉrema ' pʉ mɨrɨ enta ' to ' uko ' manto ' pɨ ' .

text: By faith Jacob , when he was a dying , blessed both the sons of Joseph ; and worshipped , leaning upon the top of his staff .
text2: Apurɨto ' winɨ Seko ' uya terikʉ a ' tai Isose ' munkɨ amʉ ' pʉrema ' pʉ to ' kaisa rɨ , mɨrɨpan e ' tʉnkasa ' tʉteke ' semu putu pona uya Papa apurɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ .

text: By faith Joseph , when he died , made mention of the departing of the children of Israel ; and gave commandment concerning his bones .
text2: Apurɨto ' winɨ Isose ' , a ' ko pe tʉweyu esi pɨ ' , isaurokʉ ' pʉ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' utɨto ' pɨ ' Isi ' apai mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉyɨ ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ ato ' pe to ' uya ta ' kɨrɨ ' nokon to ' auro ' ka ' pʉ iya .

text: By faith Moses , when he was born , was hid three months of his parents , because they saw he was a proper child ; and they were not afraid of the king ' s commandment .
text2: Apurɨto ' winɨ Mosi ' sanon uya onamʉ ' pʉ osorʉwau kapʉi iyentu ' pʉ awonsi ' kɨ , apʉne pʉra wakʉ pe rʉ ' kwɨ iyesi ene ' pʉ to ' uya , mɨrɨpan kon esi ' pʉ kin maimu pɨ ' to ' enari ' nʉmʉ pʉra rɨ .

text: By faith Moses , when he was come to years , refused to be called the son of Pharaoh ' s daughter ;
text2: Apurɨto ' winɨ Mosi ' esi ' pʉ , tʉusemo ' kasa ' a ' tai , Peero ensi mʉre ta i ' se pʉra tʉpɨ ' .

text: Choosing rather to suffer affliction with the people of God , than to enjoy the pleasures of sin for a season ;
text2: Papa munkɨ amʉ ' pokon pe tʉkota ' mato ' pe iye ' kuu ' pʉ , makoi eseru yau pori ' pe tʉuko ' mamʉ namai ' aka ' ne ' pe rɨ .

text: Esteeming the reproach of Christ greater riches than the treasures in Egypt : for he had respect unto the recompence of the reward .
text2: Kʉrai pɨkɨrɨ sapeman nɨto ' esi epe ' kena ' pe Isi ' pon mamin entai tukai ' i ' tu tʉuya ke , apʉne pʉra tepe ' pʉ ɨnepopai tesi pɨ ' .

text: By faith he forsook Egypt , not fearing the wrath of the king : for he endured , as seeing him who is invisible .
text2: Apurɨto ' winɨ Isi ' nɨmɨ ' pʉ iya , kin sakorooi pɨ ' te ' namai ' pʉra ; sa ' man annau rɨ apʉne pʉra tʉusensen pen ensa ' tʉuya pɨ ' .

text: Through faith he kept the passover , and the sprinkling of blood , lest he that destroyed the firstborn should touch them .
text2: Apurɨto ' winɨ To ' Epoi Itɨto ' pɨ ' enta ' nan nɨto ' tɨpiyarʉka ' pʉ iya . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , mʉn pai ' pai ' mato ' pe mʉra ' ta wakapuri pona to ' uya ikuu ' pʉ iya , wapiya iyentusa ' ma ' tanʉ ' nin uya wapiya iyentusa ' Esuwerʉ amʉ ' mʉre ma ' tanʉkʉ namai ' .

text: By faith they passed through the Red sea as by dry land : which the Egyptians assaying to do were drowned .
text2: Apurɨto ' winɨ Esuwerʉ amʉ ' uya Isuweyu Parau nɨ ' kwɨrɨ ' nʉkʉ ' pʉ a ' mun non poro utɨn kasa rɨ ; mɨrɨ kupʉ i ' se Isi ' pon kon e ' tane , to ' aputa ' pʉ .

text: By faith the walls of Jericho fell down , after they were compassed about seven days .
text2: Apurɨto ' winɨ Iseri ' ko wekupiri uta ' mo ' ka ' pʉ , 7 kaisa rɨ wʉi iwoi Esuwerʉ amʉ ' utɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ e ' sorʉ ' mai ' ma tʉpo .

text: By faith the harlot Rahab perished not with them that believed not , when she had received the spies with peace .
text2: Apurɨto ' winɨ Reyapu , pʉrata pɨkɨrɨ tekumasen , wɨnɨ pʉra iyesi ' pʉ , main awɨron kon pen pokon pe , apʉne pʉra , ama ' ai non ense itɨsa ' kon ereutanʉ ' sa ' iya pɨ ' .

text: And what shall I more say ? for the time would fail me to tell of Gedeon , and of Barak , and of Samson , and of Jephthae ; of David also , and Samuel , and of the prophets :
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ ta uya mɨrɨ enta ' ? Uweyu pʉra man , Kitiyan pɨ ' , Para ' pɨ ' , Sansʉn pɨ ' , Ise ' ta pɨ ' , Tepi ' pɨ ' , Sanwerʉ pɨ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pu ' kena ' amʉ ' pɨ ' usaurokʉ weyu ,

text: Who through faith subdued kingdoms , wrought righteousness , obtained promises , stopped the mouths of lions ,
text2: apurɨto ' winɨ esa ' wannɨ pe te ' sen pata ton mo ' kapɨ ' nin nʉ ' san , ɨsi ' kaisa rɨ ekamʉra te ' san tʉrawasomapɨ ' nin nʉ ' san , usauro ' nɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ ipɨ ' epopɨ ' nin nʉ ' san ; rayan amʉ ' mʉta a ' kopɨ ' nin nʉ ' san ,

text: Quenched the violence of fire , escaped the edge of the sword , out of weakness were made strong , waxed valiant in fight , turned to flight the armies of the aliens .
text2: apo ' i ' nɨ ' panʉ ' pɨ ' nin nʉ ' san , supara yɨ apai iyainʉnsa ' kon ; ɨ ' sɨ ' mʉra to ' e ' to ' enapɨ ' sa ' rʉ ' san meruntɨ pe ; pana ' pe to ' enapɨtʉ ' pʉ to ' usewa ' noma a ' tai , mɨrɨpan kon enapɨtʉ ' pʉ ɨnnon kon soisaai amʉ ' entai kuru .

text: Women received their dead raised to life again : and others were tortured , not accepting deliverance ; that they might obtain a better resurrection :
text2: Uri ' sami ' si amʉ ' uya iyeri ' sa ' kon tʉtonpa kon e ' mʉ ' sa ' kasa ' epopɨtʉ ' pʉ . Tʉron kon kota ' ma ' pʉ ipan pe tʉnonka kon i ' se pʉra to ' esi pɨ ' , wakʉ te ' mʉ ' sa ' kato ' kon epoto ' pe tʉuya ' nokon te ' san terikʉ kon tʉpo .

text: And others had trial of cruel mockings and scourgings , yea , moreover of bonds and imprisonment :
text2: Tʉron kon uya tʉpatakapɨtʉ kon moronka ' pʉ tari ' po ' pɨtʉ kon , tʉron kon auronpɨtʉ ' pʉ pariki ' si ta ' to ' tʉpɨtʉ ' pʉ to ' uya .

text: They were stoned , they were sawn asunder , were tempted , were slain with the sword : they wandered about in sheepskins and goatskins ; being destitute , afflicted , tormented ;
text2: To ' wɨnɨ ' pʉ tɨ ' ke ; to ' sara ' mo ' pʉ saka ke a ' sa ' mʉyai ; supara ke to ' wɨnɨ ' pʉ . To ' upinimʉ ' pʉ karimeru mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kapirita pi ' pɨ ipon pe , entu ' ma ' , ikota ' masa ' pe e ' ne ' pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨri pe rɨ iku ' sa ' pe —

text: ( Of whom the world was not worthy : ) they wandered in deserts , and in mountains , and in dens and caves of the earth .
text2: non esi ' pʉ wakʉ pe pʉra rɨ to ' pona . To ' usarɨ ' pʉ te ' ma ke pʉra rɨ rɨmono ' ta awɨrɨ , wʉ ' poro ' ne rɨ , tɨ ' euta nau ' ne rɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ non euta nau ' ne rɨ .

text: And these all , having obtained a good report through faith , received not the promise :
text2: Tanporo pʉsamoro apurɨpɨtʉ ' pʉ to ' uya apurɨto ' pɨkɨrɨ , e ' tane ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ipɨ ' usauro ' nɨsa ' rʉ ' pʉ eporo ' pʉ pen nɨ .

text: God having provided some better thing for us , that they without us should not be made perfect .
text2: Papa uya mɨrɨ entaino kuru wakʉ konekasa ' uiwano ' kon pe , urɨ ' nokon pokon pe rɨken to ' ekonekasa ' e ' to ' pe wakʉ pe .

text: Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about with so great a cloud of witnesses , let us lay aside every weight , and the sin which doth so easily beset us , and let us run with patience the race that is set before us ,
text2: Mɨrɨ pe si iyesi pɨ ' , tu ' ke kuru rɨ kamoro iye ' kupʉ tʉnene ' pʉ kon ekamanin nan esi pɨ ' uwoi ' nokon , eno ' mapai ' nokon tanporon nɨ uko ' manʉkʉ kon pɨ ' na ' ne ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ makoi upɨ ' nokon ita ' sisa ' na ' ne ' sa ' man pe rɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eka ' tun nɨpai ' nokon ikupʉ uya kuru tai ' ma eka ' tun nɨto ' iyawɨrɨ pe iye ' ma ' kʉmasa ' na ' ne ' awɨrɨ .

text: Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith ; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross , despising the shame , and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God .
text2: Sises pɨ ' uyenu kon tʉtʉse e ' nɨpai ' nokon , apurɨto ' piya ' tɨnin nʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wakʉ pe ikonekanin nʉ ' pʉ , pori ' pe te ' to ' esi pɨ ' tʉrau kurusu ' moronkanin nʉ ' pʉ , ɨpiyɨ ' nɨto ' tʉnamai ' pʉra rɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ si Papa apon enwo ' netʉ winɨ iyereuta ' pʉ .

text: For consider him that endured such contradiction of sinners against himself , lest ye be wearied and faint in your minds .
text2: Serɨ moronka ' pʉ iya pɨ ' tewa ' noma tane tʉmakooikena ' nan ka ' pon amʉ ' uya pɨ ' ɨsenuminkatɨ ' , ɨuseta ' ka kon namai ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨyewan kon mo ' ka auya ' nokon namai ' .

text: Ye have not yet resisted unto blood , striving against sin .
text2: Makoi ya ' ɨusewa ' noma kon e ' suranma yau , ɨmʉnʉ kon enno ' ka ' sa ' auya ' nokon pʉra man .

text: And ye have forgotten the exhortation which speaketh unto you as unto children , My son , despise not thou the chastening of the Lord , nor faint when thou art rebuked of him :
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ main , “ Umunkɨ amʉ ' , ” tawon pu ' tɨka ' nʉ ' sa ' auya ' nokon ɨpori ' mapɨ ' nin kon pe te ' sen : “ Mooi , usennakan pe Itepuru uya main awɨron pe ɨkonekato ' kʉ ' kupʉi , ɨyewan kʉ ' mo ' kai ɨyeseremekʉ iya a ' tai ,

text: For whom the Lord loveth he chasteneth , and scourgeth every son whom he receiveth .
text2: apʉne pʉra Itepuru kʉrɨ rɨ tʉni ' nʉnkanʉ ton konekanin main awɨron kon pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporon kon tʉmu pe tʉnanʉmʉnʉ ton kota ' ma iya , ” tawon .

text: If ye endure chastening , God dealeth with you as with sons ; for what son is he whom the father chasteneth not ?
text2: Sa ' man imoronkatɨ ' main awɨron kon pe ɨkoneka kon pe ; Papa uya enpoika tʉmunkɨ pe ɨwe ' to ' kon pe . Ɨnʉ ' moro mʉre esi ' pʉ ikʉipʉnʉ nʉkonekanʉ pen main awɨrɨ iye ' to ' pe ?

text: But if ye be without chastisement , whereof all are partakers , then are ye bastards , and not sons .
text2: Main awɨron pe tʉkonekasan pe pʉra ɨwesi kon yau ( tʉron kon koneka koro ' tau main awɨron pe ) , pʉrau pe rɨ nin ɨwesi kon mɨrɨ , i ' nairon kon imunkɨ pe ɨwesi kon pen nɨ .

text: Furthermore we have had fathers of our flesh which corrected us , and we gave them reverence : shall we not much rather be in subjection unto the Father of spirits , and live ?
text2: Tʉkʉipʉnʉ kenan kon urɨ ' nokon main awɨron pe ukonekanin kon , mɨrɨ pɨ ' nin si to ' namanin nan urɨ ' nokon . Mɨrɨ entai nin si , Epʉn pon Kʉipʉnʉ wannɨ ena ' e ' tʉn nɨto ' pe iyesi mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ uko ' man nɨto ' pe !

text: For they verily for a few days chastened us after their own pleasure ; but he for our profit , that we might be partakers of his holiness .
text2: Ukʉipʉnʉ kon uya main awɨron kon pe ukoneka kon aka ' nero ' pe rɨ , wakʉ pe tʉpona ' nokon te ' sen awɨrɨ ; e ' tane Papa uya main awɨron pe ukoneka kon wakʉ pe uku ' nin kon pe , wakʉ pe iye ' to ' yau ipokon pe e ' nɨto ' pe .

text: Now no chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous , but grievous : nevertheless afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby .
text2: Main awɨron pe e ' nɨto ' pe konekan a ' tai wakʉ pe pona wannɨ iyesi pen nɨ , e ' tane e ' ne ' pe rɨ . E ' tane rɨ emennʉ ' pʉ ipokena ' awɨrɨ te ' sen pe e ' nɨto ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉusewankamai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' akʉ ' pɨ ' nʉkʉ iya kamoro iwinɨ isenupasa ' kon iwano ' pe .

text: Wherefore lift up the hands which hang down , and the feeble knees ;
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , kʉkʉkʉ pe te ' sen ɨyemekon kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨ ' sɨ ' mʉn ɨyese ' mu kon imeruntɨtanʉ ' tɨ ' .

text: And make straight paths for your feet , lest that which is lame be turned out of the way ; but let it rather be healed .
text2: “ Ɨsi ' kaisa rɨ a ' ta kon e ' ma ikonekatɨ ' , ” ise ' mesa ' pe te ' sen utakonomapɨtʉ namai ' , e ' tane isepi ' tɨto ' pe .

text: Follow peace with all men , and holiness , without which no man shall see the Lord :
text2: Tʉusi ' tui ' ɨko ' mantɨ ' tʉusewankamai ' pʉra tanporon kon ka ' pon amʉ ' pokon pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wakʉ pe te ' san pe ; wakʉ pe te ' san pe pʉra esii ' ma , ɨnʉ ' yan uya Itepuru ene pʉra iyesi .

text: Looking diligently lest any man fail of the grace of God ; lest any root of bitterness springing up trouble you , and thereby many be defiled ;
text2: Tense e ' tɨ ' ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ wakʉ nonkasa ' Papa uya pʉremekʉ namai ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' ne ' mi ' rɨ kʉsa ' tanin ekamʉn ku ' ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tu ' kan kon ma ' tanʉ ' ton pe .

text: Lest there be any fornicator , or profane person , as Esau , who for one morsel of meat sold his birthright .
text2: Entɨ ' ɨnʉ ' rɨ esi namai ' tekumasen pe , mɨrɨ pe pʉra Papa i ' tunin pe pʉra I ' sa kasa , tikin ite ' kwa rɨ tenta ' nato ' epe ' pe irui pe tesi neporonʉ kuru kʉrʉpo ' pomanin kasa .

text: For ye know how that afterward , when he would have inherited the blessing , he was rejected : for he found no place of repentance , though he sought it carefully with tears .
text2: Mɨrɨ pata ' pʉ pe , mi ' tuyatʉi ' ne ' kasa , serɨ si tʉpʉremato ' eporo i ' se iyesi a ' tai , inurunpa ' pʉ si . Inkuu ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ enna ' po poken pʉra iyesi ' pʉ , tʉukaranse tʉpʉremato ' warinpa tane iya rɨ .

text: For ye are not come unto the mount that might be touched , and that burned with fire , nor unto blackness , and darkness , and tempest ,
text2: Wʉ ' piya ' ɨuye ' sa ' kon pen ta ' pɨ ' sen mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ apo ' nʉpo ' tɨnʉ ; ewarupɨ ya ' , ipan ewarupɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pana ' pan a ' setun ;

text: And the sound of a trumpet , and the voice of words ; which voice they that heard intreated that the word should not be spoken to them any more :
text2: tʉronpi ' uturunto ' ya ' , mɨrɨ pe pʉra main usetato ' ya ' , etanin nan e ' to ' miyarɨ ɨnetapai pʉra ya ' ,

text: ( For they could not endure that which was commanded , And if so much as a beast touch the mountain , it shall be stoned , or thrust through with a dart :
text2: apʉne pʉra tapiyo ' masa ' kon ipɨ ' moronka tʉuya ' nokon poken pʉra iyesi pɨ ' : “ O ' uya rɨ wʉ ' a ' pɨ ' sa ' pe iyesi yau , tɨ ' ke iwɨto ' pe iyesi , ” tawon .

text: And so terrible was the sight , that Moses said , I exceedingly fear and quake : )
text2: Nari ' pa ' rɨ iyesi ' pʉ , Mosi ' uya , “ Etʉipɨtʉ utɨtɨtɨma pɨ ' man , ” ta ' pʉ mɨrɨ pɨ ' .

text: But ye are come unto mount Sion , and unto the city of the living God , the heavenly Jerusalem , and to an innumerable company of angels ,
text2: E ' tane Sayan Wʉpʉ pona ɨuye ' sa ' kon , Epʉn pe te ' sen Surusiran pona , nurɨnan Papa pata ' se ' eke kuru ya ' . Tu ' kan kon , tu ' kan kon inserʉ amʉ ' pori ' pe iyamʉrasa ' kon piya ' ɨuye ' sa ' kon ,

text: To the general assembly and church of the firstborn , which are written in heaven , and to God the Judge of all , and to the spirits of just men made perfect ,
text2: iyɨmʉrewato ' ton imunkɨ amʉ ' so ' sii ta ' , itese ' iye ' menukapɨ ' sa ' kon Epʉn po . Papa piya ' ɨuye ' sa ' kon , tanporon kon eseru aimenkanin piya ' , ipokena ' kon nʉ ' san a ' kwarʉ ' pʉ ton ekonekasa ' wakʉ pe piya ' ,

text: And to Jesus the mediator of the new covenant , and to the blood of sprinkling , that speaketh better things than that of Abel .
text2: Sises emenna ' ekonekan nɨto ' tʉneporo ' pʉ tʉnin piya ' , mʉn pai ' pai ' masa ' wakʉ pe parɨ imaimu tʉusauro ' sen Eperʉ mʉnʉ entai .

text: See that ye refuse not him that speaketh . For if they escaped not who refused him that spake on earth , much more shall not we escape , if we turn away from him that speaketh from heaven :
text2: Entɨ ' kʉrɨ tʉusauro ' sen nurunpa auya ' nokon namai ' . To ' ainʉmʉ poken pʉra iye ' sa ' yau , kʉrɨ non po tʉpanamanin kon tʉnurunpai ' , mɨrɨ o ' koi ' pe ' e ' nɨ ' nokon upanamanin kon Epʉn poi piyapai era ' tɨn nɨsa ' nokon yau ?

text: Whose voice then shook the earth : but now he hath promised , saying , Yet once more I shake not the earth only , but also heaven .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai , imaimu uya non i ' ki ' ma ' pʉ , e ' tane si serɨ pe isauro ' sa ' ikupʉ tʉuya pɨ ' , “ Serɨ rɨken pe non nɨken i ' ki ' ma uya pen , e ' tane ka ' rɨ nɨrɨ , ” tasa ' iya .

text: And this word , Yet once more , signifieth the removing of those things that are shaken , as of things that are made , that those things which cannot be shaken may remain .
text2: Main ton , “ Serɨ rɨken pe , ” nɨkayai ' ne ' uya ekama tʉusi ' ki ' masen pe te ' sen ama — ika ' sa ' ton pe te ' sen — tʉusi ' ki ' masen ton pen nin si e ' to ' pe moro .

text: Wherefore we receiving a kingdom which cannot be moved , let us have grace , whereby we may serve God acceptably with reverence and godly fear :
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , tesa ' ke e ' nɨto ' yau tʉusi ' ki ' masen pen eporo pɨ ' , tenki tapai ' nokon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa apurɨpɨ ' pai ' nokon ipori ' manin pe inama mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eke pe i ' tuto ' winɨ ,

text: For our God is a consuming fire .
text2: apʉne pʉra , “ Papa , itese ' pɨ ' e ' nɨto ' esi ma ' tanʉ ' nin apo ' pe rɨ , ” tasa ' iya .

text: Let brotherly love continue .
text2: Tʉusi ' nʉnkai ' e ' tɨ ' ɨsitonpa pe .

text: Be not forgetful to entertain strangers : for thereby some have entertained angels unawares .
text2: Kɨpu ' tɨka ' tʉu ka ' kʉran amʉ ' ereutanʉ ' to ' pɨ ' , mɨrɨ ku ' nin nan tʉron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' uya inserʉ amʉ ' ereutanʉkʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ i ' tui ' ma pʉra .

text: Remember them that are in bonds , as bound with them ; and them which suffer adversity , as being yourselves also in the body .
text2: Pariki ' si ta ' a ' sisa ' kon tʉku ' se ɨyenu kon yau , to ' pokon pe rɨ a ' sisa ' pe ɨwesi kon pe te ' ku ' se , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ kamoro ɨsɨ pe tʉkota ' masan , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon nɨ ekota ' ma pe .

text: Marriage is honourable in all , and the bed undefiled : but whoremongers and adulterers God will judge .
text2: Tanporon kon emari ' man nɨto ' namai , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyemari ' masa ' kon nesii tʉmaimu rʉ ' pʉ kon awɨrɨ , apʉne pʉra temari ' masa ' e ' tane iyekumasa ' rʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporo tekumasan eseru aimenkato ' oton Papa uya pɨ ' .

text: Let your conversation be without covetousness ; and be content with such things as ye have : for he hath said , I will never leave thee , nor forsake thee .
text2: Pʉrata wenai tʉuta ' kwarʉkai ' pʉra ɨko ' mantɨ ' , ɨyenau ' nokon na ' ne ' pɨ ' rɨ tepori ' mai ' e ' tɨ ' , apʉne pʉra Papa uya , “ Ɨnɨmɨ uya pʉra kuru iyesi ; ɨnonka uya pʉra kuru iyesi , ” tasa ' .

text: So that we may boldly say , The Lord is my helper , and I will not fear what man shall do unto me .
text2: Uyenu kon yau si esii ' ma ta serɨ , “ Itepuru esi upika ' tɨnin pe ; enari ' nʉmʉ pʉra rɨ iyesi . Ɨ ' rɨ pe ken ka ' pon uya ukupʉ ? ” ta ' nokon .

text: Remember them which have the rule over you , who have spoken unto you the word of God : whose faith follow , considering the end of their conversation .
text2: Ɨyepuru kon amʉ ' iku ' tɨ ' ɨyenu kon yau , Papa Maimu ekamanin nʉ ' san ɨpɨ ' nokon . To ' uko ' mamʉ ' pʉ otori ' pɨ pɨ ' ɨsenuminkatɨ ' , to ' uya apurɨto ' ipatakapɨ ' tɨ ' .

text: Jesus Christ the same yesterday , and to day , and for ever .
text2: Sises Kʉrai kʉrɨ rɨ , kʉrɨ rɨ rɨ ko ' mamiyau iye ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ serɨ pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ inkero ' rɨ .

text: Be not carried about with divers and strange doctrines . For it is a good thing that the heart be established with grace ; not with meats , which have not profited them that have been occupied therein .
text2: Ti ' tui ' pʉra rɨ ti ' tupɨ ' sen pen nɨ enupan nɨto ' ayano ' matɨ ' nin . Wakʉ pe rɨ iyesi uyewan kon umeruntɨtato ' pe wakʉ nonkasa ' ke , kiyari rɨ pɨ ' teseru ke e ' nɨto ' winɨ pen , ipɨ ' tenta ' nasan pika ' tɨnin pen nɨ .

text: We have an altar , whereof they have no right to eat which serve the tabernacle .
text2: Moro use ' man nɨto ' apon esi ipoi kamoro ta ' porin tau te ' tʉrawasomasan enta ' nato ' itau pen nɨ .

text: For the bodies of those beasts , whose blood is brought into the sanctuary by the high priest for sin , are burned without the camp .
text2: Use ' man nɨto ' tʉrawasomanin nan epuru uya o ' mʉnʉ rʉ ' pʉ arɨ Ipan Wakʉ Kuru Pata ya ' makoi ku ' sa ' epe ' pʉ pe tʉtʉsen , e ' tane nin ipun nʉ ' pʉ po ' tɨ ɨnnɨ rɨ pʉroroi apai .

text: Wherefore Jesus also , that he might sanctify the people with his own blood , suffered without the gate .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ marɨ , Sises ekota ' ma ' pʉ e ' ne ' pe eke kuru pata mʉra ' taai pʉroroi entau , wakʉ pe tʉmunkɨ amʉ ' ekonekato ' pe tʉmʉnʉ winɨ .

text: Let us go forth therefore unto him without the camp , bearing his reproach .
text2: Utɨnpai ' nokon ipiya ' ɨnnɨ pata apai , ipiyɨ ' nʉ ' nin pe te ' sen moronkai ' .

text: For here have we no continuing city , but we seek one to come .
text2: Apʉne pʉra serɨ yau inke tʉuko ' mansen eke upata kon pʉra iyesi , e ' tane tʉuye ' ton eke pata enupɨkɨrɨ e ' nɨ ' nokon serɨ .

text: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually , that is , the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , Sises poro miyarɨ rɨ Papa ena ' use ' man pe apurɨpɨ ' pai ' nokon — mʉta tʉrawasooi winɨ itese ' pɨ ' tʉsauro ' sen .

text: But to do good and to communicate forget not : for with such sacrifices God is well pleased .
text2: Wakʉ ku ' to ' auya ' nokon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨtonpa kon pokon pe te ' repai ' ɨwe ' to ' kon kʉ ' pu ' tɨka ' nʉ ' tʉu , serɨ warai use ' man nɨto ' esi Papa pori ' manin pe .

text: Obey them that have the rule over you , and submit yourselves : for they watch for your souls , as they that must give account , that they may do it with joy , and not with grief : for that is unprofitable for you .
text2: Ɨyepuru kon amʉ ' maimu awɨrɨ e ' tɨ ' , to ' pana ' pano o ' no te ' tʉse e ' tɨ ' . Apa ' sima kon pɨ ' to ' esi , tʉusekama ton kon pe Papa pana ya ' . To ' maimu awɨrɨ e ' tɨ ' to ' tʉrawasooi e ' to ' pe pori ' pe e ' nɨto ' pe , e ' tape ' ne ' pe pʉra , mɨrɨ uya ɨpika ' tɨ kon pʉra iyesi .

text: Pray for us : for we trust we have a good conscience , in all things willing to live honestly .
text2: Ina pona ɨpʉrematɨ ' . Ina uya i ' tu ina ewan esi wakʉ pe , ekamʉn ku ' sa ' ina uya pʉra mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporon yau rɨ wakʉ pe tʉnamasan pe ɨko ' manpaino kon pe .

text: But I beseech you the rather to do this , that I may be restored to you the sooner .
text2: Ɨyekama ' po uya ' nokon kuru ɨwɨpʉrema kon pa , ɨpiya ' nokon enna ' poto ' pe inke pʉra .

text: Now the God of peace , that brought again from the dead our Lord Jesus , that great shepherd of the sheep , through the blood of the everlasting covenant ,
text2: Tɨwɨ Papa tʉusewankamai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' esa ' , siyaro ' pe ekonekan nɨto ' mʉnʉ poro iyeri ' sa ' uyepuru kon Sises i ' mʉ ' sa ' kanin nʉ ' pʉ , kʉrɨ rɨ eke kuru karimeru amʉ ' Pa ' simanin ,

text: Make you perfect in every good work to do his will , working in you that which is wellpleasing in his sight , through Jesus Christ ; to whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: ɨrepai ' nokon tanporon wakʉ ton ke i ' se iye ' to ' kupʉ kon pa , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tɨwɨ uyau ' nokon nʉtʉrawasomai tʉpori ' manin pe te ' sen , Sises Kʉrai poro , itiwano ' pe eke pe iku ' to ' nesii , inke rɨ , inke rɨ . Amen .

text: And I beseech you , brethren , suffer the word of exhortation : for I have written a letter unto you in few words .
text2: Utonpa ton , ipan pe ɨyekama ' po uya ' nokon apanamato ' kon uya eta kon pa , apʉne pʉra to ' ken nʉ ' kwɨ rɨ kareta menukasa ' uya ɨyena ' nokon .

text: Know ye that our brother Timothy is set at liberty ; with whom , if he come shortly , I will see you .
text2: I ' tu auya ' nokon i ' se e ' ai ' utonpa ton Temu ' ti si nonkasa ' man . Serɨ pe iwa iye ' sa ' yau , iya ' kɨrɨ utɨ mɨrɨ ɨyense ' nokon .

text: Salute all them that have the rule over you , and all the saints . They of Italy salute you .
text2: Miyarɨ ka ' tɨ ' ɨyepuru kon amʉ ' pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporo Papa munkɨ amʉ ' pɨ ' . Kamoro I ' tari winon kon miyarɨ nɨkayan ɨpɨ ' nokon .

text: Grace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Wakʉ nonkasa ' nesii ɨpiyau ' nokon .

text: James , a servant of God and of the Lord Jesus Christ , to the twelve tribes which are scattered abroad , greeting .
text2: Isens , Papa mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Itepuru Sises Kʉrai poitorʉ winɨpaino , 12 kaisaron kon iko ' amʉ ' tʉpataron kon koro ' tawɨrɨ iye ' ta ' nʉ ' sa ' kon enakan : Miyarɨ ' nokon .

text: My brethren , count it all joy when ye fall into divers temptations ;
text2: Utonpa ton , pori ' pe kuru e ' tɨ ' , tu ' kan nɨ ɨ ' si ' taino ton i ' tupɨ ' nɨto ' uye ' sa ' a ' tai ɨpona ' nokon ,

text: Knowing this , that the trying of your faith worketh patience .
text2: apʉne pʉra i ' tu auya ' nokon apurɨto ' auya ' nokon i ' tupɨ ' to ' uya iyannawɨrɨ utɨn nɨto ' kupʉ .

text: But let patience have her perfect work , that ye may be perfect and entire , wanting nothing .
text2: Entakato ' tʉtʉrawasooi i ' ma ' kai , iyakʉ ' pʉsa ' pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyenuka ' sa ' pe ɨwesi kon pa , ɨ ' rɨ i ' se pʉra rɨ .

text: If any of you lack wisdom , let him ask of God , that giveth to all men liberally , and upbraideth not ; and it shall be given him .
text2: Ipu ' ketʉ pʉra ɨtonpa kon esi yau , Papa pɨ ' nekama ' poi , itʉnin amʉre ' pe pʉra esii ' ma tanporon kon ena ' , irepa iya rɨ mɨrɨ , ipɨ ' tʉusakorotai ' pʉra .

text: But let him ask in faith , nothing wavering . For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed .
text2: E ' tane apurɨi ' ma nekama ' poi ikasimai ' ma pʉra , apʉne pʉra kʉrɨ rɨ ikasimai ' ma ekama ' ponin esi mɨrɨ sipa ' sipa parau po , pese ' tɨ nʉposi ' manʉ nʉpininpanʉ kasa .

text: For let not that man think that he shall receive any thing of the Lord .
text2: Kʉrɨ rɨ ka ' pon kʉ ' senuminkanin ɨ ' rɨ eporo tʉuya Itepuru winɨpai tukai ' ;

text: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways .
text2: ikasimanin pe kuru iyesi mɨrɨ , inkupʉnʉ esi mɨrɨ petenan pe pʉra .

text: Let the brother of low degree rejoice in that he is exalted :
text2: Entu ' manin akon wannɨ ne ' kupʉi mɨ pe eke yau tesi pɨ ' .

text: But the rich , in that he is made low : because as the flower of the grass he shall pass away .
text2: E ' tane imaminke ' ne ' kupʉi mɨ pe aiko pe tenasa ' pɨ ' , apʉne pʉra wana ' ipʉrʉ uma ' ta kasa ima ' tato ' oton .

text: For the sun is no sooner risen with a burning heat , but it withereth the grass , and the flower thereof falleth , and the grace of the fashion of it perisheth : so also shall the rich man fade away in his ways .
text2: Apʉne pʉra wʉi enu uyepʉ punin ta ' netʉ a ' kɨrɨ , mɨrɨ uya ite ' seketanʉkʉ ; itipʉrʉ uta ' mo ' ka , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itakorʉwanooi uma ' ta . Mɨrɨ kasa imaminke ' uma ' ta tʉtʉrawasooi kupʉ iya koro ' tau .

text: Blessed is the man that endureth temptation : for when he is tried , he shall receive the crown of life , which the Lord hath promised to them that love him .
text2: Pori ' kʉrɨ rɨ ka ' pon ti ' tupɨ ' to ' entakanin , uko ' man nɨto ' arʉkooi , kʉron tato ' epoto ' iya oton , Papa nekama ' pʉ kamoro ti ' nʉnkanin nan pɨ ' .

text: Let no man say when he is tempted , I am tempted of God : for God cannot be tempted with evil , neither tempteth he any man :
text2: “ Papa uya i ' tupɨ ' nɨto ' ya ' utʉsa ' , ” kʉ ' kanin ɨnʉ ' rɨ i ' tupɨ ' nɨto ' ya ' te ' tʉsa ' a ' tai , apʉne pʉra Papa esi i ' tupɨ ' nin pen ɨri ke , ɨnʉ ' rɨ i ' tupɨ ' nin pen kʉrɨ rɨ ;

text: But every man is tempted , when he is drawn away of his own lust , and enticed .
text2: e ' tane ka ' pon e ' tʉrʉ i ' tupɨ ' nɨto ' ya ' ɨri i ' se iye ' to ' winɨ , mɨrɨ uya rɨ ipi ' sikʉ mɨrɨpan epori ' ma ɨri pɨ ' .

text: Then when lust hath conceived , it bringeth forth sin : and sin , when it is finished , bringeth forth death .
text2: Mɨrɨ a ' tai si , ɨri i ' se te ' sen entusa ' a ' tai , ɨri ton eseru ku ' nin pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ si mɨrɨ ɨri ton eseru usemo ' kasa ' a ' tai , uma ' tan nɨto ' ya ' arɨ iya .

text: Do not err , my beloved brethren .
text2: Kɨsenku ' tɨtʉu , utonpa ton nʉ ' kwɨ .

text: Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above , and cometh down from the Father of lights , with whom is no variableness , neither shadow of turning .
text2: Tanporon wakʉ ton mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipan nɨ wakʉ ton repan nɨto ' esi ka ' tawinɨ tʉuye ' sen ka ' a ' kwarii Kʉipʉnʉ winɨpai , tʉusensimasen pen a ' kwarʉ ' pʉ usensimapɨtʉ kasa .

text: Of his own will begat he us with the word of truth , that we should be a kind of firstfruits of his creatures .
text2: Teseru poro ne ' nɨsa ' iya i ' napairon main awɨrɨ , tanporo wapiyaro ' kon inkapʉ ' san imunkɨ amʉ ' pe usen nɨto ' kon pe inkapʉ ' san koro ' tau .

text: Wherefore , my beloved brethren , let every man be swift to hear , slow to speak , slow to wrath :
text2: Utonpa ton nʉ ' kwɨ , mɨrɨ wenai i ' tutɨ ' : Tɨwɨ tanporon kon ka ' pon amʉ ' nesii inke pʉra etanin nan pe , tɨnɨn pɨ ' tʉusauro ' san pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tɨnɨn pɨ ' tʉusakorotasan pe ,

text: For the wrath of man worketh not the righteousness of God .
text2: ka ' pon sakorooi uya Papa e ' to ' i ' se ipokena ' pe uko ' man nɨto ' nepʉ pʉra iyesi .

text: Wherefore lay apart all filthiness and superfluity of naughtiness , and receive with meekness the engrafted word , which is able to save your souls .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , ɨri eseru mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨri inonkatɨ ' eke pe ɨwoi ' nokon na ' ne ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ mɨ pe te ' ku ' se pʉra Papa Maimu anʉntɨ ' ɨyewan kon ya ' , iye ' pɨnka ' sa ' na ' ne ' ayau ' nokon ; main ɨpika ' tɨnin kon pe kuru te ' sen .

text: But be ye doers of the word , and not hearers only , deceiving your own selves .
text2: Wakʉ main awɨrɨ e ' tɨ ' , etanin pe rɨken pʉra . Mɨrɨ a ' tai , ɨiwano ' kon pe ɨusenku ' tɨ kon pen .

text: For if any be a hearer of the word , and not a doer , he is like unto a man beholding his natural face in a glass :
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ esi a ' tai main etanin pe e ' tane iku ' nin pe pʉra , kʉrɨ rɨ esi mɨrɨ ka ' pon , wanamari ya ' temʉ ' ennin kasa ,

text: For he beholdeth himself , and goeth his way , and straightway forgetteth what manner of man he was .
text2: mɨrɨpan utɨ tʉusene ' pʉ tʉpo , inke pʉra rɨ mɨrɨ kasa tesi tukai ' tʉusene ' pʉ pu ' tɨka ' nʉkʉ iya .

text: But whoso looketh into the perfect law of liberty , and continueth therein , he being not a forgetful hearer , but a doer of the work , this man shall be blessed in his deed .
text2: E ' tane kʉrɨ ipoi rɨ tenu tʉtʉse wakʉ main , mo ' kanin wannɨ ennin mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉuko ' mansen serɨ kupʉ pɨ ' tʉneta ' pʉ tʉpu ' tɨka ' nʉ ' se pʉra e ' tane ikupʉ pɨ ' — kʉrɨ rɨ uya wakʉ epoto ' oton mɨrɨ tʉnkupʉnʉ yau .

text: If any man among you seem to be religious , and bridleth not his tongue , but deceiveth his own heart , this man ' s religion is vain .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ ka ' pon esi yau Papa pokon pe tʉuko ' mansen pe te ' ku ' sen pe tani mainanpai ' ma pʉra , kʉrɨ rɨ usenku ' tɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa pokon pe iko ' manto ' napurɨnʉ esi notʉn pe rɨ .

text: Pure religion and undefiled before God and the Father is this , To visit the fatherless and widows in their affliction , and to keep himself unspotted from the world .
text2: Wakʉ kuru esukenan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ imaku ' pɨ pʉn Papa pokon pe uko ' man nɨto ' , Papa , ukʉipʉnʉ kon e ' to ' i ' se esi se kasa : piyapaino kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itaan ' pʉ ima ' tasa ' kon tʉmainanpai ' to ' usewankamato ' yapai , ɨri serɨ non eseru uya tʉma ' tanʉ ' to ' apai nɨrɨ te ' mainanpa pe .

text: My brethren , have not the faith of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Lord of glory , with respect of persons .
text2: Utonpa ton , a ' kwa yawon Uyepuru kon Sises Kʉrai apurɨnin pe ɨwesi kon koro ' tau , tenu yawon ke ke ' tʉu .

text: For if there come unto your assembly a man with a gold ring , in goodly apparel , and there come in also a poor man in vile raiment ;
text2: Ka ' pon uyepʉ pe iyesi yau ayamʉrasa ' kon koro ' ta ' , korʉ pun konekasa ' irimuui pe , wakʉ ya ' iyepontɨpɨ ' sa ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ entu ' manin , ɨri rɨ nin ipon nɨrɨ uyepʉ .

text: And ye have respect to him that weareth the gay clothing , and say unto him , Sit thou here in a good place ; and say to the poor , Stand thou there , or sit here under my footstool :
text2: Kʉrɨ kuru wakʉ pe iyepontɨpɨ ' sa ' kupʉ auya a ' tai wakʉ pe , “ Se kuru wakʉ ayapon , ” tai ' ma ipɨ ' , entu ' manin pɨ ' , “ Mɨ airɨ e ' soto ' ka ' , ” mɨrɨ pe pʉra , “ Ereuta ' non po u ' ta piyau , ” tai ' ma . Mɨrɨ ku ' sa ' auya ' nokon a ' tai ,

text: Are ye not then partial in yourselves , and are become judges of evil thoughts ?
text2: iye ' menkasa ' kon pe pʉra pe ' me ' ku ' atʉu mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eseru aimenkanin pe ɨyenasa ' kon , ipoken pʉra ɨri pe ɨusenuminka kon winɨ rɨ ?

text: Hearken , my beloved brethren , Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith , and heirs of the kingdom which he hath promised to them that love him ?
text2: Etatɨ ' , utonpa ton nʉ ' kwɨ : Papa uya pe ' kamoro pata enu yau entu ' manin nan pe te ' san anʉnsa ' pʉra nai apurɨto ' yau eke pe to ' e ' to ' pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ isauro ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ , esa ' wannɨ pe te ' to ' anʉnnin pe ti ' nʉnkanin nan e ' to ' pe ?

text: But ye have despised the poor . Do not rich men oppress you , and draw you before the judgment seats ?
text2: E ' tane entu ' manin nan sapemasa ' auya ' nokon . Imaminke ' ton pen pe ' kamoro ɨkota ' manin kon ? Kamoro pen pe ' kamoro ko ' tʉ ta ' ɨpi ' si ' nin kon ?

text: Do not they blaspheme that worthy name by the which ye are called ?
text2: Kamoro pen pe ' kamoro eke ipɨ ' ɨye ' tʉsa ' kon na ' ne ' ese ' sapema pe tʉusauro ' san pen ?

text: If ye fulfil the royal law according to the scripture , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself , ye do well :
text2: Eke , Itepuru maimu iye ' menukasa ' na ' ne ' itekare yau yawɨrɨ kuru ɨwesi kon yau , “ Ɨtonpa i ' nʉnkakɨ , mɨsi ' nʉnkayai ' ne ' kasa , ” tawon , ipoken ɨwesi kon mɨrɨ .

text: But if ye have respect to persons , ye commit sin , and are convinced of the law as transgressors .
text2: E ' tane tenu yawon ke ɨwesi kon yau , aumakoita kon ; Main , Mosi ' winon uya nin si ama ' tanʉkʉ kon mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ Main i ' kwɨ ' nin pe ɨwesi kon pɨ ' .

text: For whosoever shall keep the whole law , and yet offend in one point , he is guilty of all .
text2: Apʉne pʉra ɨnʉ ' rɨ tanporo Main yawɨrɨ na ' ne ' e ' tane rɨ ita ' mo ' ka tikin nan yau rɨ esi mɨrɨ ɨri pe , tanporo rɨ i ' kwɨ ' sa ' iya pe .

text: For he that said , Do not commit adultery , said also , Do not kill . Now if thou commit no adultery , yet if thou kill , thou art become a transgressor of the law .
text2: Apʉne pʉra kʉrɨ rɨ , “ Iyemari ' masa ' kʉsekumankai , ” tawon uya rɨ marɨ , “ Ɨnʉ ' rɨ kʉ ' wɨnɨi , ” tasa ' esi . Iyemari ' masa ' ekumankanin pe pʉra rɨ ɨwesi yau , e ' tane iwɨsa ' auya yau , main i ' kwɨ ' nin pe rɨ ɨyenasa ' mɨrɨ .

text: So speak ye , and so do , as they that shall be judged by the law of liberty .
text2: Asauro ' tɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iku ' tɨ ' , kamo Main , mo ' kanin wannɨ yai , iteseru aimenkato ' naimenkaton kon pe ,

text: For he shall have judgment without mercy , that hath shewed no mercy ; and mercy rejoiceth against judgment .
text2: apʉne pʉra Papa uya eseru aimenka usenpoikato ' oton usentu ' man pe pʉra kʉrɨ isentu ' masa ' rʉ ' pʉ pen pona . Usentu ' man uya eseru aimenka wapiya ' ka mɨrɨ !

text: What doth it profit , my brethren , though a man say he hath faith , and have not works ? can faith save him ?
text2: Wakʉ pe pe ' iyesi , utonpa ton , ka ' pon e ' kupʉ yau apurɨto ' esa ' pe e ' tane ɨ ' rɨ rɨ kupʉi ' ma pʉra ? Mɨrɨ warai pe ' apurɨto ' uya ipika ' tɨ ?

text: If a brother or sister be naked , and destitute of daily food ,
text2: Utonpa kon , warawo ' mɨrɨ pe pʉra uri ' san esi yau ipon pʉra , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ wʉi kaisa rɨ inanʉmʉnʉ iti ' kiyari pʉra ,

text: And one of you say unto them , Depart in peace , be ye warmed and filled ; notwithstanding ye give them not those things which are needful to the body ; what doth it profit ?
text2: ɨtonpa kon uya ta pe iyesi yau ipɨ ' , “ Enta , wakʉ pe e ' kɨ ukayai ' ɨpɨ ' ; ikomi ' pe pʉra ɨko ' mankɨ , wakʉ pe mata ' re ' tɨi ' , ” e ' tane ɨ ' rɨ kupʉi ' ma pʉra rɨ i ' se iye ' to ' pɨ ' , wakʉ pe pe ' iyesi ?

text: Even so faith , if it hath not works , is dead , being alone .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ , apurɨto ' esi , ikupʉ uya isakonʉ ' tɨ pʉra iyesi yau , iyeri ' sa ' pe rɨ iyesi .

text: Yea , a man may say , Thou hast faith , and I have works : shew me thy faith without thy works , and I will shew thee my faith by my works .
text2: E ' tane tʉron nɨ uya ta poken iyesi , “ Apurɨto ' esa ' pe ɨwesi ; iku ' to ' esa ' pe esi , ” ta . E ' tane ta uya nin , “ Anapurɨnʉ ikupʉi ' ma pʉra enpoikakɨ uyena ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ unapurɨnʉ ikupʉi ' ma enpoikato ' pe uya ɨyena ' , ” tasa ' .

text: Thou believest that there is one God ; thou doest well : the devils also believe , and tremble .
text2: Apurɨ auya moron tikin nan nɨ Papa . Oso ! Mɨrɨ rɨ marɨ apurɨnin nan kamoro ɨri a ' kwarʉ ton , ɨsi ' nʉkʉi ' ma ipɨ ' .

text: But wilt thou know , O vain man , that faith without works is dead ?
text2: Iya ' kwarʉ pʉnon ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon ! Ɨni ' tupai pe ' me ' atʉu apurɨto ' ikupʉi ' ma pʉra e ' nɨ esi notʉn pe ?

text: Was not Abraham our father justified by works , when he had offered Isaac his son upon the altar ?
text2: Utamokori kon pe ' Epʉra ' an pɨ ' ipokena ' e ' ta ' pʉ pen pe ' inkupʉ ' pʉ wenai Aisi ' tʉmu tʉsa ' iya a ' tai , Papa ena ' use ' man nɨto ' apon po ?

text: Seest thou how faith wrought with his works , and by works was faith made perfect ?
text2: Ene auya ' nokon inapurɨnʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ inkupʉnʉ e ' tʉrawasoma ' pʉ ɨsi ' kaisa rɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ inkupʉnʉ uya nin si inapurɨnʉ enuka ' nʉ ' sa ' mɨrɨ .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled which saith , Abraham believed God , and it was imputed unto him for righteousness : and he was called the Friend of God .
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ itekare iye ' menukasa ' nin si uta ' ku ' tɨsa ' , “ Epʉra ' an uya Papa apurɨ ' pʉ , mɨrɨ pɨ ' nin si ipokena ' pe te ' sen ta , ” mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa tonpa tukai ' esa ' sa ' na ' ne ' .

text: Ye see then how that by works a man is justified , and not by faith only .
text2: Ene auya ' nokon ka ' pon koneka Papa uya wakʉ pe inkupʉnʉ winɨ , inapurɨnʉ winɨ rɨken pen .

text: Likewise also was not Rahab the harlot justified by works , when she had received the messengers , and had sent them out another way ?
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ , Reyapu , ekumanpɨ ' te ' sen pɨ ' ipokena ' e ' ta ' pʉ inkupʉ ' pʉ wenai , ama ' ai non ense ' na itɨsa ' kon apontɨsa ' iya a ' tai , mɨrɨpan kon ennoko ' pʉ iya tʉron nɨ awɨrɨ pɨ ' pen pe ' ?

text: For as the body without the spirit is dead , so faith without works is dead also .
text2: Pun , iya ' kwarʉ pʉn esi iyeri ' sa ' pe kasa , apurɨto ' tʉku ' sen a ' kɨrɨ pʉra esi iyeri ' sa ' pe rɨ .

text: My brethren , be not many masters , knowing that we shall receive the greater condemnation .
text2: Utonpa ton , ti ' sa amʉ ' pe esi i ' se ke ' tʉu , apʉne pʉra urɨ ' nokon enupanin nan pe te ' san eseru aimenkato ' oton mɨrɨ ipan pe ɨsɨ pe .

text: For in many things we offend all . If any man offend not in word , the same is a perfect man , and able also to bridle the whole body .
text2: Tanporo tu ' kan yau rɨ tʉuta ' mo ' kasan urɨ ' nokon . Ɨnʉ ' rɨ esi yau ipoken pʉra te ' sen pe pʉra tʉusaurokʉ yau , wakʉ pe kuru iyesi mɨrɨ , tʉpun nɨ si esa ' pe iyesi .

text: Behold , we put bits in the horses ' mouths , that they may obey us ; and we turn about their whole body .
text2: Kaware mʉta ya ' itewa pʉ ' kʉ tʉsa ' a ' tai , umaimu kon awɨrɨ iye ' to ' pe , tanporo rɨ kaware ra ' tɨ mɨrɨ .

text: Behold also the ships , which though they be so great , and are driven of fierce winds , yet are they turned about with a very small helm , whithersoever the governor listeth .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe pʉra eke kanau amʉ ' pɨ ' i ' tutɨ ' . Eke ton pe rɨ iye ' tane , pana ' pan nɨ a ' setun narɨnʉ pe , aiko rɨ e ' se ' tɨnin uya e ' se ' tɨ , anin e ' to ' i ' se awɨrɨ itɨto ' pe .

text: Even so the tongue is a little member , and boasteth great things . Behold , how great a matter a little fire kindleth !
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa si ani aiko rɨ pun pʉ ' kʉ esi , e ' tane eke pe tʉutapurɨsen . Ɨsenuminkatɨ ' eke rɨ yu ' epo ' tɨ pɨ ' aiko rɨ apo ' e ' sirinkasa ' ke .

text: And the tongue is a fire , a world of iniquity : so is the tongue among our members , that it defileth the whole body , and setteth on fire the course of nature ; and it is set on fire of hell .
text2: Ani rɨ marɨ esi apo ' pe , eke pe rɨ ɨri yen pe rɨ iyesi upun kon pʉ ' kʉ pe . Tanporo rɨ ka ' pon a ' si ' sa ' iya , iko ' manto ' eseru rɨ epo ' tɨto ' pe ikupʉ iya , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iyepo ' tɨ rɨ apo ' , ekota ' man pata ' se ' yau .

text: For every kind of beasts , and of birds , and of serpents , and of things in the sea , is tamed , and hath been tamed of mankind :
text2: Tanporon kon nɨ o ' amʉ ' , toron amʉ ' , ene amʉ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ parau kawon kon nɨ ene amʉ ' , moro ' amʉ ' rɨ esi tenupansan pe , mɨrɨpan kon nɨ enupankasa ' ka ' pon uya ,

text: But the tongue can no man tame ; it is an unruly evil , full of deadly poison .
text2: e ' tane ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ ani enupanka pʉra iyesi . Tereutasen pen nɨ ɨri pe kuru rɨ iyesi , eke pe rɨ eri ' nʉ ' kanin paisin yen pe iyesi .

text: Therewith bless we God , even the Father ; and therewith curse we men , which are made after the similitude of God .
text2: Ani ke uyepuru kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ukʉipʉnʉ kon apurɨpɨtʉ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ mɨrɨ ke rɨ ka ' pon amʉ ' pa ' nʉkʉ , Papa waraino kon pe ika ' sa ' kon .

text: Out of the same mouth proceedeth blessing and cursing . My brethren , these things ought not so to be .
text2: Mɨrɨ rɨ mʉta apai apurɨpɨ ' to ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ e ' pa ' nʉ ' nɨto ' epa ' ka . Utonpa ton , serɨ kʉse ' ku ' nin !

text: Doth a fountain send forth at the same place sweet water and bitter ?
text2: Asa ' rɨ rɨ marɨ pe ' wakʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ine ' ne ' tuna epa ' ka poken nai mɨrɨ rɨ marɨ tuna epa ' kato ' euta yai ?

text: Can the fig tree , my brethren , bear olive berries ? either a vine , figs ? so can no fountain both yield salt water and fresh .
text2: Utonpa ton , pi ' e ' pe ' epeta poken nai are ' pe , mɨrɨ pe pʉra kʉre ' e ' pe ' epeta poken nai pi ' pe ? Ine ' ne ' pe tepa ' kasen tuna uya wakʉ enpa ' ka pen nɨ nɨrɨ .

text: Who is a wise man and endued with knowledge among you ? let him shew out of a good conversation his works with meekness of wisdom .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' nai pu ' kena ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ito ' ka ' nʉ ' nin ɨ ' koro ' tau ' nokon ? Tɨwɨ nenpoikai wakʉ pe tʉuko ' manto ' eseru ke , mɨ pe te ' ku ' se pʉra tʉnkupʉnʉ ke ipu ' ketʉ winɨpai tʉuye ' sen .

text: But if ye have bitter envying and strife in your hearts , glory not , and lie not against the truth .
text2: E ' tane ɨsɨ pe ɨyɨkɨntato ' kon , amʉre ' pe ɨwe ' to ' kon esi yau ɨyewan kon yau , ipɨ ' katapurɨtʉu , mɨrɨ pe pʉra i ' napairon pɨ ' kasi kʉkatʉu .

text: This wisdom descendeth not from above , but is earthly , sensual , devilish .
text2: Mɨrɨ waraino rɨ ipu ' ketʉ u ' tɨ pʉra iyesi Epʉn poi , e ' tane non winon nɨ , iya ' kwarʉ pen nɨ , Makoi winon nɨ .

text: For where envying and strife is , there is confusion and every evil work .
text2: Ɨkɨntan nɨto ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ amʉre ' pe e ' pai e ' nɨto ' yau , ɨsiporo pʉra e ' nɨto ' , tanporon nɨ ɨri rɨ ku ' to ' eporo mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ yau .

text: But the wisdom that is from above is first pure , then peaceable , gentle , and easy to be intreated , full of mercy and good fruits , without partiality , and without hypocrisy .
text2: E ' tane ipu ' ketʉ , Epʉn poi tʉuye ' sen esi mɨrɨ wapiya kuru esukenan nɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉusewankamai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' , tʉusi ' nʉnkasen , tʉron kon ennin , main awɨron nɨ , ɨsentu ' kena ' rɨ , eke rɨ wakʉ ku ' nin , te ' menkasen pen nɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' napairon nɨ .

text: And the fruit of righteousness is sown in peace of them that make peace .
text2: Tʉusewankamai ' te ' san i ' nɨ ' panʉ ' pɨ ' nin nan , usewankaman nɨto ' yau pʉra te ' pɨnsan uya ipoken e ' nɨto ' akʉ ' pʉsa ' anʉmʉ .

text: From whence come wars and fightings among you ? come they not hence , even of your lusts that war in your members ?
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ uya epanta ' man ɨsipɨ ' e ' nɨ emapu ' tɨ ɨ ' koro ' tau ' nokon ? Ipan pe i ' se ɨwe ' to ' kon ayau ' nokon na ' ne ' usewa ' noman pɨ ' yapai pe ' iyepʉ pen mɨ ?

text: Ye lust , and have not : ye kill , and desire to have , and cannot obtain : ye fight and war , yet ye have not , because ye ask not .
text2: Ɨ ' rɨ rɨ i ' se ɨwesi kon e ' tane eporo auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi . Iwenai ɨye ' wɨnɨ kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨ ' rɨ rɨ enkuui pe ɨwesi kon , e ' tane i ' se ɨwe ' to ' kon eporo auya ' nokon poken pʉra iyesi . Ɨsipɨ ' ɨwesi kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨyepanta ' ma kon . Eporo auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi , apʉne pʉra Papa pɨ ' ekama ' po auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi pɨ ' .

text: Ye ask , and receive not , because ye ask amiss , that ye may consume it upon your lusts .
text2: Ekama ' po auya ' nokon a ' tai , eporo auya ' nokon pʉra iyesi , apʉne pʉra ɨri pe iteseru esii ' ma ekama ' po auya ' nokon , ɨneporo ' pʉ kon ma ' tanʉkʉ ke ipan pe i ' se ɨwe ' to ' kon nɨ kupʉ pɨ ' .

text: Ye adulterers and adulteresses , know ye not that the friendship of the world is enmity with God ? whosoever therefore will be a friend of the world is the enemy of God .
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon temari ' masa ' kon e ' tane tekumasan waraino kon ka ' pon amʉ ' , i ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra pe ' iyesi , orʉ kupʉ auya ' nokon ɨtonpa kon pe a ' tai , Papa ewaruma ' tɨ auya ' nokon pe iyesi ? Ɨnʉ ' rɨ orʉ tonpa pe e ' paino ena mɨrɨ Papa eyaton pe .

text: Do ye think that the scripture saith in vain , The spirit that dwelleth in us lusteth to envy ?
text2: Mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨusenuminka kon nɨ katɨ iye ' menukasa ' Papa Maimu uya ta iwenai pʉra rɨ , “ Iya ' kwarʉ uyau ' nokon iko ' manto ' pe inkupʉ ' pʉ esi tiwano ' pe rɨken ui ' se ' nokon , ” tukai ' ?

text: But he giveth more grace . Wherefore he saith , God resisteth the proud , but giveth grace unto the humble .
text2: E ' tane eke pe miyarɨ parɨ wakʉ nonkasa ' iya upona ' nokon . Mɨrɨ pɨ ' , iye ' menukasa ' Papa Maimu uya ta , “ Papa uya mɨ pe te ' ku ' sen ewaruma ' tɨ , e ' tane mɨ pe te ' ku ' sen pen pona wakʉ nonkasa ' tʉrʉ iya , ” ta iya .

text: Submit yourselves therefore to God . Resist the devil , and he will flee from you .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' si , Papa ena ' e ' nonkatɨ ' . Makoi iwa ' kʉ ' tɨ ' , mɨrɨpan ainʉnto ' pe ɨpiyapai ' nokon .

text: Draw nigh to God , and he will draw nigh to you . Cleanse your hands , ye sinners ; and purify your hearts , ye double minded .
text2: A ' ko pe Papa piya ' ɨsi ' tɨ ' , a ' ko pe ɨpiya ' nokon iye ' to ' pe . Ɨyemiyatʉ kon ikumi ' tɨ ' , tʉmakooikena ' nan ka ' pon amʉ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨyewan kon ikorʉkatɨ ' , ikasimanin ye ' ton kuru .

text: Be afflicted , and mourn , and weep : let your laughter be turned to mourning , and your joy to heaviness .
text2: Aya ' kwarʉ kon tainʉnpai ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉuta ' kwarʉpɨ ' se , tʉukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨ ' se akarantɨ ' . Auta ' kɨrɨto ' kon ensimatɨ ' tʉuta ' kwarʉpɨ ' se ukaran nɨ pe , pori ' pe ɨwe ' to ' kon ipan pe ɨusewankono ' ma kon pe .

text: Humble yourselves in the sight of the Lord , and he shall lift you up .
text2: Mɨ pe te ' ku ' sen pe pʉra enatɨ ' Itepuru rau , ayanʉnto ' kon pe iya .

text: Speak not evil one of another , brethren . He that speaketh evil of his brother , and judgeth his brother , speaketh evil of the law , and judgeth the law : but if thou judge the law , thou art not a doer of the law , but a judge .
text2: Utonpa ton , ɨtonpa kon pɨ ' ɨri pe isapema pe tʉusauro ' se pʉra e ' tɨ ' . Ɨnʉ ' rɨ ɨri pe isapema pe tʉtonpa pɨ ' tʉusauro ' sen , mɨrɨ pe pʉra iteseru aimenkanin usaurokʉ main , Mosi ' winon pɨ ' ɨri pe isapema pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iteseru aimenka iya . Main eseru aimenka auya a ' tai , iyawɨrɨ ɨwesi pen mɨrɨ , e ' tane iteseru aimenkato ' auya po ɨyereuta .

text: There is one lawgiver , who is able to save and to destroy : who art thou that judgest another ?
text2: Moro tikin nan nɨken Main tʉnin mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iteseru aimenkanin esi , kʉrɨ rɨ kʉrɨ rɨ tʉmeruntɨrʉ kenan ipika ' tɨto ' ike mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ima ' tanʉ ' to ' ike . E ' tane si ɨmɨrɨ — ɨnʉ ' pe ɨwesi ɨtonpa eseru aimenka pa ?

text: Go to now , ye that say , To day or to morrow we will go into such a city , and continue there a year , and buy and sell , and get gain :
text2: Apʉne etatɨ ' , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon , “ Serɨ pe , mɨrɨ pe pʉra awanapai rɨ se pata , mɨrɨ pe pʉra mɨ pata ya ' utɨn mɨrɨ , tikin nɨ wʉipiya enno ' se ' na mɨrɨ yau , pʉrata epoto ' kupʉ pɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pʉrata eporo pɨ ' , ” tawon nan kon .

text: Whereas ye know not what shall be on the morrow . For what is your life ? It is even a vapour , that appeareth for a little time , and then vanisheth away .
text2: I ' tu auya ' nokon pʉra rɨ iyesi ɨ ' rɨ e ' kupʉ awanapai rɨ tukai ' . Ɨ ' rɨ mɨ ɨuko ' manto ' kon ? Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon esi kapuru ' pe , aka ' ne ' pe rɨ tʉusenpoikasen mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tapasen kasa .

text: For that ye ought to say , If the Lord will , we shall live , and do this , or that .
text2: E ' tane ru ' ku , “ Itepuru eseru pe iyesi yau , se , mɨrɨ pe pʉra mɨ kupʉ pɨ ' , uko ' man nɨ ' nokon mɨrɨ , ” tato ' auya ' nokon pe iyesi .

text: But now ye rejoice in your boastings : all such rejoicing is evil .
text2: Na ' ne ' nin esi , mɨ pe ɨye ' kupʉ kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ autapurɨ kon . Tanporo serɨ waraino utapurɨn esi ɨri pe .

text: Therefore to him that knoweth to do good , and doeth it not , to him it is sin .
text2: Ɨnʉ ' rɨ , wakʉ tʉnkupʉnʉ i ' tunin , ikupʉ iya pʉra na ' ne ' umakoita mɨrɨ .

text: Go to now , ye rich men , weep and howl for your miseries that shall come upon you .
text2: Apʉne etatɨ ' , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon imaminke ' ton , akarantɨ ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉukɨ ' pɨ ' nʉnpɨ ' se akarantɨ ' , apʉne pʉra usewankaman nɨto ' uye ' nɨ pɨ ' man ɨpona ' nokon .

text: Your riches are corrupted , and your garments are motheaten .
text2: Ɨimamin kon a ' motasa ' man , ene amʉ ' uya ɨpon kon ɨ ' sa ' man .

text: Your gold and silver is cankered ; and the rust of them shall be a witness against you , and shall eat your flesh as it were fire . Ye have heaped treasure together for the last days .
text2: Ɨkorʉʉi kon mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨsirʉpaai kon ukaranpɨ ' sa ' man . Serɨ ikaranpɨ ' sa ' uya apa ' nʉkʉ kon mɨrɨ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨpun kon anɨ iya apo ' kasa . Eke pe kuru ɨimamin kon amʉranʉ ' sa ' auya ' nokon serɨ iweyu ton u ' matʉ yau .

text: Behold , the hire of the labourers who have reaped down your fields , which is of you kept back by fraud , crieth : and the cries of them which have reaped are entered into the ears of the Lord of sabaoth .
text2: Entɨ ' ! Amainarʉ kon yau iye ' tʉrawasomasa ' kon epe ' pʉ , to ' e ' ma ' pʉ auya ' nokon pʉra na ' ne ' ike ukaran nɨ pɨ ' man apa ' nʉkʉ kon pe . Ɨi ' kiyari kon akʉ ' pʉsa ' anʉnnin nʉ ' san ukaramʉ uya Meruntɨ pe kuru te ' sen ye ' Itepuru pana eposa ' man .

text: Ye have lived in pleasure on the earth , and been wanton ; ye have nourished your hearts , as in a day of slaughter .
text2: Ɨuko ' mansa ' kon man serɨ non po eke pe rɨ ɨimamin kon tepose , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipan pe i ' se ɨwe ' to ' kon kupʉ pɨ ' . Ɨyeka ' pɨ ' sa ' kon ɨwɨnɨ kon weyu a ' taino pe .

text: Ye have condemned and killed the just ; and he doth not resist you .
text2: Ɨri ku ' nin nʉ ' san pen nɨ eno ' ma ' pʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉ ' ka ' pʉ auya ' nokon , ɨyewa ' nomanin kon pokena ' nan pen nɨ .

text: Be patient therefore , brethren , unto the coming of the Lord . Behold , the husbandman waiteth for the precious fruit of the earth , and hath long patience for it , until he receive the early and latter rain .
text2: Mɨrɨ pɨ ' si , tʉuseta ' kai ' pʉra e ' tɨ ' , utonpa ton , Itepuru uyepʉ pʉ ' kʉ pona rɨ . Apʉne temaina ' tɨsen entɨ ' : tenuri ' sen non uya epe ' kena ' kiyari epetanʉkʉ enupɨkɨrɨ , tʉuseta ' kai ' pʉra te ' sen tuna e ' sara ' tɨ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tuna iu ' matʉ yawon enupɨkɨrɨ .

text: Be ye also patient ; stablish your hearts : for the coming of the Lord draweth nigh .
text2: Ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon nɨrɨ tʉuseta ' kai ' pʉra e ' tɨ ' , pana ' pe e ' soto ' katɨ ' , apʉne pʉra a ' ko pe Itepuru uye ' to ' man .

text: Grudge not one against another , brethren , lest ye be condemned : behold , the judge standeth before the door .
text2: Ɨtonpa kon pɨ ' te ' naipɨ ' se pʉra , utonpa ton , ɨyeseru kon kuru nin aimenka mɨrɨ . Eseru aimenkanin man mʉra ' ta nau rɨ iye ' soto ' kasa ' !

text: Take , my brethren , the prophets , who have spoken in the name of the Lord , for an example of suffering affliction , and of patience .
text2: Utonpa ton , tʉuseta ' kai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' ento ' ipɨ ' ɨsɨ moronka a ' taino pe , pu ' kena ' amʉ ' entɨ ' , isauro ' sa ' kon Itepuru ese ' yau .

text: Behold , we count them happy which endure . Ye have heard of the patience of Job , and have seen the end of the Lord ; that the Lord is very pitiful , and of tender mercy .
text2: Mi ' tuyatʉi ' ne ' kasa rɨ , ipʉremasa ' pe to ' esi ta , kamoro imoronkanin nʉ ' san pɨ ' . Isopu uya imoronkasa ' rʉ ' pʉ etasa ' auya ' nokon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ iu ' matʉ pe ene ' pʉ Itepuru nʉkupʉ ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ . Itepuru esi eke pe tʉusentu ' masen mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ aiko tawon nɨ .

text: But above all things , my brethren , swear not , neither by heaven , neither by the earth , neither by any other oath : but let your yea be yea ; and your nay , nay ; lest ye fall into condemnation .
text2: Mɨrɨ entai kuru , utonpa ton , ɨnku ' ton kon pɨ ' ausaurokʉ kon a ' tai Epʉn kʉsesa ' tʉu , mɨrɨ pe pʉra non nɨ , mɨrɨ pe pʉra ɨ ' rɨ rɨ . Tɨwɨ , “ Ewai ' , ” tato ' auya ' nokon nesii , ewai ' pe rɨ ; “ Kane , ” tato ' auya ' nokon nesii , kane pe rɨ , ɨyeno ' ma kon kuru nin mɨrɨ .

text: Is any among you afflicted ? let him pray . Is any merry ? let him sing psalms .
text2: Ɨtonpa kon nɨ na ' kɨ nai ekamʉn yau ? Tɨwɨ nɨpʉremai . Ɨnʉ ' rɨ pe ' nai pori ' pe ? Tɨwɨ apurɨpɨ ' to ' eremu yai nʉserenkai .

text: Is any sick among you ? let him call for the elders of the church ; and let them pray over him , anointing him with oil in the name of the Lord :
text2: Ɨtonpa kon nɨ na ' kɨ nai takuru ' ke ? Tɨwɨ so ' si epuru ton kɨ ' mai tʉpona to ' ɨpʉremato ' pe , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉkarapaimato ' pe Itepuru ese ' yau .

text: And the prayer of faith shall save the sick , and the Lord shall raise him up ; and if he have committed sins , they shall be forgiven him .
text2: Apurɨto ' yau iyɨpʉremasa ' uya takuru ' kenan epi ' tɨ mɨrɨ ; Itepuru uya rɨ i ' mʉ ' sa ' ka . Imakoitasa ' pe iyesi yau , ipɨ ' rɨ usentu ' man .

text: Confess your faults one to another , and pray one for another , that ye may be healed . The effectual fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much .
text2: Mɨrɨ pe iyesi pɨ ' , ɨtonpa kon pɨ ' rɨ amakooi kon ekamatɨ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨtonpa kon pona rɨ ɨpʉrematɨ ' , ɨusepi ' tɨ kon pa . Ipokena ' e ' pe te ' sen ka ' pon ɨpʉrema esi mɨrɨ ipan pe meruntɨ pe mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉwotori ' pɨ ke .

text: Elias was a man subject to like passions as we are , and he prayed earnestly that it might not rain : and it rained not on the earth by the space of three years and six months .
text2: Iraisa esi ' pʉ ka ' pon uwarai ' nokon nɨ . Iyɨpʉrema ' pʉ tʉuta ' kwarʉpɨ ' se , tuna uyepʉ pʉra iye ' to ' pe , tuna uyepʉ pʉra si iyesi ' pʉ non amankanin pe osorʉwawon pona a ' sa ' mʉyai wʉipiya airɨ rɨ .

text: And he prayed again , and the heaven gave rain , and the earth brought forth her fruit .
text2: Iyɨpʉremakaa ' pʉ kanan , mɨrɨ a ' tai ka ' awonsi ' kɨ si tuna uyee ' pʉ , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ si non uya kiyari epetanʉkʉ ' pʉ .

text: Brethren , if any of you do err from the truth , and one convert him ;
text2: Utonpa ton , tikin nɨ rɨ ɨtonpa kon utano ' ma pe iyesi yau i ' napairon apai , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉron nɨ uya ina ' po ,

text: Let him know , that he which converteth the sinner from the error of his way shall save a soul from death , and shall hide a multitude of sins .
text2: se nesii ɨyenu kon yau : Ɨnʉ ' uya rɨ tʉmakooikenan na ' po ipokenan pen apai uya ipika ' tɨ mɨrɨ ima ' tato ' apai , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tu ' kan nɨ makooi nɨpontɨ iya mɨrɨ .

text: Jude , the servant of Jesus Christ , and brother of James , to them that are sanctified by God the Father , and preserved in Jesus Christ , and called :
text2: Isutʉ , Sises Kʉrai poitorʉ , Isens akon nɨrɨ winɨpaino , Kamoro ikɨ ' masa ' kon , Papa Ikʉipʉnʉ ni ' nʉnka ' san , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Sises Kʉrai nʉpa ' sima ' san enakan :

text: Mercy unto you , and peace , and love , be multiplied .
text2: Usentu ' man nɨto ' , tʉusewankamai ' pʉra e ' nɨto ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ usi ' nʉnkan nɨto ' nesii ɨiwano ' kon pe miyarɨ rɨ .

text: Beloved , when I gave all diligence to write unto you of the common salvation , it was needful for me to write unto you , and exhort you that ye should earnestly contend for the faith which was once delivered unto the saints .
text2: Utonpa ton nʉ ' kwɨ , ɨmenukapai ' nokon esa ' e ' tane , ina nekamanʉ epika ' tɨn nɨto ' ekareei pɨ ' , ɨmenukato ' kon pe uya kuru e ' kupʉ ' pʉ mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ipan pe kuru ɨyekama ' po kon pe apurɨto ' Kʉri ' san pe e ' nɨ pɨ ' wenai ɨyetokʉ kon pa Papa nʉtʉrʉ ' pʉ tikin nan parɨ rɨ , tʉusensimaton pe pʉra rɨ wakʉ ton ena ' .

text: For there are certain men crept in unawares , who were before of old ordained to this condemnation , ungodly men , turning the grace of our God into lasciviousness , and denying the only Lord God , and our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Apʉne pʉra pena rɨ to ' eno ' mato ' pɨ ' iye ' menukasa ' rʉ ' san tʉron kon ka ' pon amʉ ' ewonsa ' man ama ' ai ɨ ' koro ' ta ' nokon . Papa uya tasa ' pen nɨ awɨrɨ te ' san ka ' pon amʉ ' , Papa , itese ' pɨ ' e ' nɨto ' uya wakʉ nonkasa ' ensimanin nʉ ' san makoi eseru ya ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Sises Kʉrai tikin nan nɨ rɨken eke , uyepuru kon tʉnonkai ' .

text: I will therefore put you in remembrance , though ye once knew this , how that the Lord , having saved the people out of the land of Egypt , afterward destroyed them that believed not .
text2: Tanporo serɨ ton i ' tusa ' auya ' nokon e ' tane , ɨyemiya ' pontɨpai ' nokon esi Itepuru uya tʉmunkɨ amʉ ' enpa ' ka ' pʉ Isi ' apai , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ apurɨnin nan pen to ' koro ' tau te ' san ma ' tanʉkʉ ' pʉ iya .

text: And the angels which kept not their first estate , but left their own habitation , he hath reserved in everlasting chains under darkness unto the judgment of the great day .
text2: Inserʉ amʉ ' nɨrɨ kanan , eke pe te ' to ' kon yau enkurunpaino kon pen e ' tane tʉpata ' se ' kon nonkanin nʉ ' san pɨ ' ɨyemiya ' pontɨ uya ' nokon — pʉsamoro ku ' sa ' iya ewarupɨ yau a ' sisa ' pe inke rɨ eseru wannɨ aimenkato ' Weyu pona rɨ .

text: Even as Sodom and Gomorrha , and the cities about them in like manner , giving themselves over to fornication , and going after strange flesh , are set forth for an example , suffering the vengeance of eternal fire .
text2: Mɨrɨ kasa rɨ Satan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Komora mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ pata ton ipiyawo ' nan yawon kon e ' tʉrʉ ' pʉ ekuman mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ nɨkɨ eseru ya ' . Apo ' inkero ' ke ekota ' man nɨto ' ento ' ipɨ ' pe to ' esi ' pʉ .

text: Likewise also these filthy dreamers defile the flesh , despise dominion , and speak evil of dignities .
text2: Mɨrɨ na ' ne ' kasa kuru rɨ marɨ , pʉsamoro te ' ne ' pɨ ' san uya tʉpun kon ma ' tanʉkʉ , meruntɨ tentaino kon pe te ' sen nurunpa , inserʉ amʉ ' sapema rɨ nɨrɨ .

text: Yet Michael the archangel , when contending with the devil he disputed about the body of Moses , durst not bring against him a railing accusation , but said , The Lord rebuke thee .
text2: E ' tane Maikarʉ , inserʉ amʉ ' epuru tonpa e ' maimu ' pɨtʉ a ' tai Makoi a ' kɨrɨ , Mosi ' ekepu wenai isapema i ' se iyesi ' pʉ pen e ' tane , “ Tɨwɨ Itepuru ɨyeseremekʉi ! ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: But these speak evil of those things which they know not : but what they know naturally , as brute beasts , in those things they corrupt themselves .
text2: E ' tane rɨ pʉsamoro ka ' pon amʉ ' usaurokʉ tʉnto ' ka ' nʉkʉnʉ kon pen nɨ tʉsapemai ' ; to ' nʉto ' ka ' nʉkʉnʉ tʉpe ' nokon , o ' amʉ ' tʉusenuminkasan pen kasa — serɨ ɨri ton uya kuru to ' ma ' tanʉkʉ mɨrɨ .

text: Woe unto them ! for they have gone in the way of Cain , and ran greedily after the error of Balaam for reward , and perished in the gainsaying of Core .
text2: Ɨsɨ yau to ' esi ! Keen e ' ma rʉ ' pʉ anʉnsa ' to ' uya man ; to ' utɨsa ' man tʉneporonʉ kon epose ' na Peran utano ' ma ' pʉ ya ' kasa rɨ marɨ ; to ' uma ' tasa ' man tiwano ' pe e ' pai Kora esi ' pʉ ya ' .

text: These are spots in your feasts of charity , when they feast with you , feeding themselves without fear : clouds they are without water , carried about of winds ; trees whose fruit withereth , without fruit , twice dead , plucked up by the roots ;
text2: Pʉsamoro esi ɨri pe iteseru usi ' nʉnkan pe usewe ' nɨto ' yau , enta ' nan pɨ ' aya ' kɨrɨ ' nokon , mara rʉ ' kwɨ rɨ to ' ɨpiyɨ ' to ' pʉra rɨ — karimeru amʉ ' pa ' simanin nan tiwano ' kon pe tʉuta ' re ' tɨsan pe rɨ to ' esi . Kapuru ' tuna a ' kɨron pen pe rɨ to ' esi , a ' setun nʉposi ' manʉ ; wʉi a ' taino yʉi ton , iteperu pʉnon , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ikuru ' kasa ' — asa ' ite ' kwa ima ' tasa ' pe to ' esi .

text: Raging waves of the sea , foaming out their own shame ; wandering stars , to whom is reserved the blackness of darkness for ever .
text2: Parau pon ɨsɨ sipa ' sipa pe to ' esi , to ' ɨpiyɨ ' to ' a ' koronta ; sirikɨ amʉ ' tʉutano ' ma kon pe tʉupininsan , to ' iwano ' pe ipan nɨ ewarupɨ ekonekasa ' tɨwɨro ' pe rɨ .

text: And Enoch also , the seventh from Adam , prophesied of these , saying , Behold , the Lord cometh with ten thousands of his saints ,
text2: Iino ' , Atan awonsi ' kɨ 7 pe iku ' nin usaurokʉ ' pʉ pu ' kena ' pe pʉsamoro pɨ ' : “ Apʉne entɨ ' , Itepuru uye ' nɨ pɨ ' man 1 , 000 kaisaron kon pona rɨ 1 , 000 kaisaron kon , tu ' kan kon wakʉ ton tiwano ' ton pokon pe

text: To execute judgment upon all , and to convince all that are ungodly among them of all their ungodly deeds which they have ungodly committed , and of all their hard speeches which ungodly sinners have spoken against him .
text2: tanporon kon eseru aimenkase ' na , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ Papa uya tasa ' pen nɨ awɨrɨ te ' san eno ' mase ' na , Papa uya tasa ' pen nɨ awɨrɨ te ' san nʉkupʉ ' pʉ Papa uya tasa ' pen nɨ awɨrɨ te ' san eseru yau , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tanporon nɨ ɨsɨ pe Papa uya tasa ' pen nɨ awɨrɨ te ' san tʉmakooikena ' nan usauro ' sa ' rʉ ' pʉ ewa ' noma pe , ” ta ' pʉ iya .

text: These are murmurers , complainers , walking after their own lusts ; and their mouth speaketh great swelling words , having men ' s persons in admiration because of advantage .
text2: Pʉsamoro ka ' pon amʉ ' esi tentarunsan , ɨri ɨnenpaino kon nɨken ; i ' se te ' to ' kon makoi eseru poro tʉutɨsan ; tʉpɨ ' nokon nɨ tʉutapurɨsan mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ tʉron kon pɨ ' wakʉ pe itese ' tʉusauro ' san wakʉ epoto ' pe tʉuya ' nokon .

text: But , beloved , remember ye the words which were spoken before of the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ ;
text2: E ' tane , utonpa ton nʉ ' kwɨ , ɨyenu kon yau iku ' tɨ ' uyepuru kon Sises Kʉrai nennoko ' san nekama ' pʉ rʉ ' pʉ .

text: How that they told you there should be mockers in the last time , who should walk after their own ungodly lusts .
text2: Ta ' pʉ to ' uya ɨpɨ ' nokon , “ Iweyu u ' matʉ a ' tai , sapeman pe tʉuta ' kɨrɨsan e ' to ' oton , ɨri eseru i ' se te ' to ' kon awɨrɨ te ' san , ” tawon .

text: These be they who separate themselves , sensual , having not the Spirit .
text2: Pʉsamoro kamoro ka ' pon amʉ ' ata ' nʉ ' nin kon , tʉpun kon eseru awɨron kon Iya ' kwarʉ esanon pen .

text: But ye , beloved , building up yourselves on your most holy faith , praying in the Holy Ghost ,
text2: E ' tane , ɨmɨrɨ ' nokon , utonpa ton nʉ ' kwɨ , wakʉ kuru apurɨto ' auya ' nokon yau e ' ka ' tɨ ' , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ ɨpʉrematɨ ' Wakʉ A ' kwarʉ eseru yau .

text: Keep yourselves in the love of God , looking for the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ unto eternal life .
text2: Papa usi ' nʉnkato ' yau e ' tɨ ' , uyepuru kon Sises Kʉrai usentu ' mato ' enupɨkɨrɨ ɨwesi kon koro ' tau , miyarɨ rɨ ɨuko ' manto ' kon ya ' ayase ' na ' nokon tʉuye ' sen .

text: And of some have compassion , making a difference :
text2: Ikasimanin nan pɨ ' tʉusentu ' mai ' e ' tɨ ' ;

text: And others save with fear , pulling them out of the fire ; hating even the garment spotted by the flesh .
text2: tʉron kon imo ' katɨ ' apo ' apai , to ' pika ' tɨ pe ; tʉron kon pɨ ' ɨusentu ' mato ' kon enpoikatɨ ' , enari ' nʉn nɨ pokon pe tʉsumai ' — ɨri iteseru ton ke to ' na ' sikʉ ' pʉ to ' pon ewaruma ' tɨi ' ma .

text: Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling , and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy ,
text2: Mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ serɨ si , tanporo eke pe iku ' to ' nesii Papa iwano ' pe , ɨye ' pi ' po namai ' ɨku ' nin , ayaton a ' kwa pe te ' to ' ya ' , tʉmakooikenan pe pʉra mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ eke pe rɨ pori ' pokon pe .

text: To the only wise God our Saviour , be glory and majesty , dominion and power , both now and ever . Amen .
text2: Tanporo eke pe iku ' to ' nesii itiwano ' pe , kʉrɨ rɨ rɨken Papa upika ' tɨnin kon , Sises Kʉrai uyepuru kon poro . Ewai ' , eke pe iku ' to ' , eke pe iye ' to ' yau imeruntɨrʉ , ipana ' pano , mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ meruntɨ esi itiwano ' pe , itɨpiya yau rɨ , serɨ pe na ' ne ' mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ siyaro ' rɨ ! Amen .

text: The Revelation of Jesus Christ , which God gave unto him , to shew unto his servants things which must shortly come to pass ; and he sent and signified it by his angel unto his servant John :
text2: Serɨ kareta esi Sises Kʉrai nenpoika ' pʉ , Papa nʉtʉrʉ ' pʉ itena ' , tʉpoitorʉ ton auro ' kato ' pe iya serɨ pe ' ne kuru te ' ku ' sen pɨ ' . Kʉrai uya serɨ ton enpoika ' pʉ tʉpoitorʉ Isaan ena ' , tinserʉʉi tenno ' se ipiya ' .

text: Who bare record of the word of God , and of the testimony of Jesus Christ , and of all things that he saw .
text2: Tanporo Isaan uya tʉnene ' pʉ menukasa ' , serɨ si inmenuka ' pʉ Papa maimu mɨrɨ awonsi ' kɨ i ' napairon Sises Kʉrai nenpoika ' pʉ .

text: Blessed is he that readeth , and they that hear the words of this prophecy , and keep those things which are written therein : for the time is at hand .
